reviewText: I do freelance writing and I also have arthritis. My hands and fingers would hurt after a long day of writing with a regular keyboard. With this keyboard it is much easier and doesn't hurt so much. The rubberized keys make it easy to stay on the keys and I don't have to press very hard for it to work. The lighted keyboard makes it fun to use too. This keyboard is not only for gamers, but for regular people too!

I won't go too lengthy on this one.

The keyboard is stunning.  You can program macro's for ease of use, although it couldn't do everything I wanted.

The backlight in blue is awesome, you can hold down many buttons at once and still get a response from all the buttons, and it just genuinely feels great.

If you're not a nerd and you want something that looks cool on your rig this is a great buy.
summary: Love the look, Love the feel

reviewText: my wife and I used to play this game back in the day. This is by far, one of the finest titles on the Wii. The puzzles are challenging and there was always different to do. If you are looking for a good multiplayer game don't pass this one up. Literally fun for all ages.

Borrowed this game from a friend and loved it.  So I decided to get a copy for myself.  Even though it is an old game, it is an all-time party game.  Once I started the game and played a few rounds, the guests would jump in and want to try.

We played this game at a friend's house and loved it so much we had to get a copy... and a wii!

This game has been enjoyed by our whole family (ages 25 to 67)

It makes very good use of the Wii controller and has a wide variety of game styles.

This game gets you to use your brain a little and solve problems as a team.

We are looking forward to purchasing the sequel.

I bought this for my son's 10th birthday.  He had played it over at a friends house and really wanted it.  It's a great game for our whole family to play.  I have three boys ages 4-10 and they all play it and love it!

My boyfriend and I borrowed this game from my 12 nephew  and fell in love with it.  When he asked for it back, we had to find our own copy.  We don't have a lot of Wii games, but of all our games this is the one we play the most.  Now our friends love it too!

I love this game. I got it this weekend & had a hard time putting it down. It's geared more towards kids; but it's fun anyway. The graphics are good-colorful. There's a wide variety of levels to keep you playing. The game itself is kinda like Jenga, with a twist-more variety of things to do than Jenga. You can shoot "bomb blocks" to get points, combine chemcial blocks for an explosion, etc. If you like puzzle games, pick it up.

It doesn't get any better. This game is one of the best if not the best game for Wii. You have more fun with this game then any other I can think of. Its not only great for kids its even more fun for adults. It is well worth the price - trust me, you will not be disappointed. Its outrageous fun destroying things and just playing this game period.

I was very disappointed by how little there is to do in this game. Basically there are 4 different mini-games that you play and each only last a couple of minutes. That is it. I know... I know... you are thinking that there has to be more than that, right? But there isn't.

This game is awesome.  It is easy to learn and tough to master.  I am not a big gamer but a friend shared with me and I was immediately hooked.  I shared with my sister and nephew and they were immediately hooked.  Both bought the game the next day. This is a wonderful group or family game since it is so easy to learn.

I love playing this game. In fact, I have a sore arm from playing so much. It is a lot about angles and physics. I am still on the training levels, but this game seems to be fun and easy for anyone to start playing.
summary: Great game, played so much I have a sore arm

reviewText: This turns out to be a very challenging game.  It can get very competitive when playing others, which makes it even more fun to play.  This is fun for all ages.  I am 62 and have a great time with it, and my grandson requested it for Christmas this year which made buying a gift for him very easy.

Great game.  My sons (4 and 6) and I love it.  There are many different modes and you can create your own levels.  There are competitive and cooperative multiplayer levels, so you have a lot of options.
summary: A lot of fun for adults and kids

reviewText: This bar-none is the best multi-player game on the Wii. I play it whenever I have a little time to spare. There are so many options and challenges to keep you playing for hours on end. It is also good for all ages. My 5 year old Nephew loves to play this game with me whenever he comes over. I like the challenge and he likes making all of the blox fall over.

I purchased this for my son- 7 years old- and it is a lot of fun.  It took him a while to get the concept, but once he did he has great fun.  we still haven't figured out everything, but it's definitely worth buying.

The controllers seem to fade in and out of wanting to work properly.  I have used them (I bought two) on more than one computer with this same result.  They look great and, when they're working properly, are great. Overall, I am displeased with my purchase and wish I had spent the extra money to buy something better.

If anything else, this is probably one of the better space RTS out there in the market. It is a lot of fun and will keep you playing for at least several hours.

however, this game is not for everyone. It requires quite a long time to get used to the game with its fairly median learning curve, but once you get the hang of it, enjoyment is assured. If your up for battling for control of a universe and creating the largest fleet of ships to annhilate yr opponent, then by all means get this game

I have nothing but high praise for Sins of a Solar Empire in every category.  The Graphics are top notch, the gameplay is both unique and intuitive, not to mention addicting!  And the sound and music is spot on.  The only thing that would make this game better would be a single player campaign.
summary: The only thing it lacks is a Campaign mode.

reviewText: This game is very tactical and perfect for players that like to lead. It is not what you expect at first, but the more you play it the better it gets. Overall I give it 5 stars and I recommend it for players that have played Star Wars Republic Commando because you basically have authority over a grand army, it's just not first person and you need to use your smarts on how to build your army.
summary: It is one of the best games in my collection

reviewText:
Great pad for those who miss the RedOctane Ignition series.  The foam that comes with it isn't as good as the Ignition's was, but I solved that problem by just shoving my Ignition foam into it.  They're almost exactly the same size, so it fit with no problems at all.

The pad plays perfectly on my PC, but my PS3 sometimes fusses with it for some reason.  It also registers as a controller on my PS3 rather than a pad, and I'm not sure if there's a way to make it register as a pad.
summary: Hurray for a RedOctane Ignition replacement!

reviewText: Unfortunately, I did not read reviews before purchasing this because I have owned several other Battlefield titles and have been reasonably satisfied with them all. I play singleplayer almost exclusively, but I cannot understand why I would need to set up an account and connect to a server to play the game. To make matters worse, EA customer support is nonexistent. This will probably be the last EA game I purchase.

So I tried to run this game after a few months of being away from it. Guess what?
I entered login information and it says that user doesn't exist in their database.
I tried to make a new one, but it won't let me do this either.
Don't buy.

This game is great! Must have for all BF fans. The only problem with this is that registration takes a loooong time. Sometimes you have to download a bunch of stuff to get it working and its hard to find the last update on the EA site. So if you do buy this game, just google the update. Youll find it.

If you have a chance to get your hands on this system- GRAB IT! The graphics in some games are so superior to their time. Games like Mario 1, 2, 3, Mega Man, Duck Hunt and Tetris are classics. Some of these games are even better than what the Wii has to offer!! If your kids haven't tried this- GRAB IT!
summary: Love this classic system- GRAB IT!

reviewText: I played this game for years.  I just recently got back into it.  It's a great game that keeps me entertained  for hours.  I like the strategy of the game.  I have it installed on my laptop that runs  Windows 8.1. It runs perfect.  The only thing I don't like is that it makes you creat a Steam account.

Fun strategy game, letting you take control of a medieval European power as you try to expand your borders. Takes a little while to get the hang of, but once you do it's hours and hours of fun. This version of the game comes with all the expansions, and all of the factions are already unlocked (usually you have to defeat some countries to be able to play as them in future games).

Words cannot describe the countless hours of fun I have had playing this game since I received it. I am a huge total war fan and a huge fan of medieval warfare, so this game just absolutely blows my mind. I would go as far as to say that this is the best in the total war series. The only con about this game is the lack of players online. There are usually only about 10-15 matches open to play. But, no biggie, it's better than no matches at all.

This is one of the poorest games I have ever played. No story, you have no idea what in the world is going on in the game. The combat is very pointless and there is nothing new about this game at all. The only real positive is that I played this game for about 20 minutes and earned 300 gamerscore in that period.

Honestly I found that the controls made the game completely unplayable. The Wii remote controls are complicated and unresponsive. The game does support gamecube controllers which may have excellent controls, but they can't be used on newer Wiis or the Wii U. The game doesn't support the classic controller so you're SOL if you can't play it on an older Wii. I loved the original Sonic Riders, but I would advise people to stay away from this one.
summary: Poor controls make this game completely unplayable :/

reviewText: I bought these for my Husband for his Birthday/Christmas Present (his birthday is Dec. 25th) . He had 2 Call Of Duty games (not these 2 ) and he loved them ! I bought these to add to his Collection . This games come very well packaged and super fast shipping ! I couldn't be more thrilled and I am sure my Husband is going to love them !

As a fan of Army of Two, I thought this would be fun for me and a friend to try. We honestly played for about ten minutes, and had to shut it off. The graphics aren't very good, controls are terrible, and weapons are cheap. I'm glad I rented this game instead of buying. Definitely try the game for yourself. I'm sure there are a couple people who will like this game, but it's certainly not for me.

This last version of the Warhammer 40K experience on PC is the best adaptation of the miniatures game that has yet been offered. There are an incredible number of playable factions that each have their own special abilities.

This huge span of playable factions means this game can be played for hours and hours as you develop strategies specific to each faction.

Well worth the price.

I love this game. It is easily the best game that I gave ever played. In fact I'll be so bold to name it my favorite game. The gameplay is phenomenal and the art is so beautiful and different than anything I've ever experienced. It's the perfect game for anyone that likes involved RPGs.
summary: This game is the best I've ever played!

reviewText:
If you're a Japanophile or anyone with any interest into medieval Japanese history/culture, play this.
If you like good video games, play this.
If you like beautiful art, play this.
If you like Legend of Zelda, play this.
....
you get the picture, now play the game!

As far as games I've played go, this is one of the best.  The story is awesome and steeped in Japanese mythology.  The gameplay is entertaining and intuitive.  The graphics are fantastic and captivating.  It may not be perfect, but it's still fairly amazing.

I got this game for my kids, now 16 and 11, a little more than a year ago and they have really enjoyed it. My son finished the game and is currently playing it over from the beginning again! He says he loves the graphics, the characters, and the way that players interact with the game.
summary: One of my kids' favorite games

reviewText: I played and completed the PS2 version and I was really excited to see what it would be like with the Wii controls. I personally found it much more difficult to accomplish what I could really easily accomplish with the PS2 controller. If you have it already on PS2, don't waste your time/money. If you have never played and all you have is a Wii, it is a great game.

One of the first Wii games i ever bought. I was at a flea market and i saw the game, so i though: "this looks pretty cool." So $8 later i was amazed by how great this game was. There are a few controller quirks with this game, but that's to be expected since it was one of the first great games to come out for the Wii. But, that won't take away from the value of this game.

If you played the PS2 version before (like me), be cautious.  Of course, the control scheme is different for the Wii and it takes a bit of patience to get used to this version.  I was very frustrated at the beginning, but decided to give it a second shot.  Seems to me like this version is a bit pickier about your lines and drawings, but once you get used to it, the game becomes very interesting and fun.  If you are a video game enthusiast like me, definitely this one is worth adding to your collection.
summary: If you played the PS2 version...

reviewText: I love this game. The paint brush takes a little getting used to, but the developers added some nice control to really help out. All in all, this is a really great looking game that is more fun that I could have hoped for.

Okami is wonderful. The style is beautiful, the controls on Wii are fluid and fun (once you get the hang of them!) and the story is filled with epic adventure and great humor. This game is a must have for any gamer who relies on the Wii for great gameplay.

I think this is one of the best games I have ever played. If you're a huge fan of Zelda games (like I am) or adventure games, you will absolutely love this game. Great story, great art, great music and super fun. Get the Wii version. I purposely dragged the game out because I didn't want it to end. Highly recommended.

Although its a game that came out originally on the Playstation 2, This was a fantastic game to play on the Wii. If you haven't played this game before then you need to give it a try, games like these are rare and aren't made that much anymore. If you are patient with the game you will find a truly remarkable experience, and at this price their is really no excuse.

This game has it all:
It is very Zelda-esk, which is a good thing.
It has hilarious dialog.
A good story line.
Amazing art work.
And best of all it utilizes all of the Wii functions. I would recommend it to anybody. I have been playing for 45 hours now and I still haven't beat it.
summary: Best Wii Game I Have Played

reviewText:
I LOVE THIS GAME!!! It is one of the best games I've ever played. The animation is beautifully done, the battles are fun, but sometimes a little easy, and the characters are colorful and interesting. On top of that the adventures to be had...

SO SO SO MUCH FUN!!!

I had no problems with the controls the only way I can see somebody might have had problems with them is if the sensor bar was smudged up or if the sensitivity needed to be changed.

I LOVE THIS GAME!!!!

I bought this for my 12 year old daughter, and she simply loves it, the game is beautifully designed, the graphic art is amazing, and the challenge to solve the adventure is large enough to keep the user entertained for many weeks.

Great game for kids without any graphic violence.

Have fun!

This is a fun game that is good for kids of any age (mine are 15 and 19). It's creative, interactive, and entertaining. It sparks the imagination and does all that good stuff with hand-eye coordination. It helps teach kids about Japanese culture and mythology. It makes my kids happy and it makes me happy. Great game!
summary: Okami for the Wii is awesome!

reviewText:
Buy this game.  Consumers need to support games like this if we want more high quality third part games on the Wii.  This game is innovative, original, and fun.  And it also uses the Wii-mote in a way that feels natural instead of gimmicky or contrived.
This game is more than just a great Zelda alternative, and it is more than just a great port; it is proof that 3rd party developers can still make great games that are fun to play on the Wii.

This game is great for anyone who likes to be involved in games for a long time. It's visually beautiful, fun to play, and leaves me wondering what will happen next in the story. It's also very good at reusing maps so that you don't have to learn the intricate details of a new map for every adventure.

This is one of those games you don't wanna miss on your Wii. Okami is an adventure/action game, with an awesome art style and equally impressive graphics effects. The story is good as far as you can enjoy the adventure part.
If you like japanese-style art, you'll fall in love with okami.
Overall, a pretty good game.

If you had to decide between this or the Zelda game on the Wii, this game should be the choice. Sure, the controls are a bit clunky at first, but once you get down the controls this game is actually quite fun. You run, jump, paint, battle, and the like, but you'll enjoy the story and humor the most.

This game is so much fun! I would recommend this for just about anyone. It does have mild violence so if you don't want your children fighting Goblins this isn't your game, but it's fun it's challenging and can be a learning tool for children. It's a very cute game.

I bought this game as a surprise for my niece. Needless to say I opened it before I gave it to her. Once the game loaded, I was hooked. This game is absolutley fun to play! I especially enjoyed playing as Thimbletack. He's a great little character who roams around behind the walls. I love the way he speaks in rhymes. I reccommend this game to all who are looking for a puzzle game with a twist.
summary: Puzzle solving is so much fun!

reviewText: I have spent hours playing poker at night while watching TV.  I have really enjoyed this poker trainer a lot.  The one thing I have learned is that even when you know what your doing it is NO guarantee that you will win.  But at least now I know how to play.

How can you not love Mario Party games? This one is great, as it has a night/day theme that keeps things interesting throughout the party. The mini-games are pretty fun, as are the mini-game modes. Must buy.

I was really looking forward to playing this game but it did not work on my computer. We have Vista but I could not get it to work. I ended up giving it to my dad and he was able to get it to work on his computer. Unfortunaltly I live an hour away from him and have not yet been able to play the game.

If there was an award for best game of the decade, this would be it right here. I have never seen a more compelling story. If you needed only one reason to buy the game, it's the soundtrack. Just on the soundtrack of this game, it is deserving of best game of all time and of course the story drives you to tears and all sorts of emotions.

Exactly as described. Game was really good. Good plot behind it. It does have a lot of cut-away scenes and sometimes it feels more like a movie than a game, but when you get to the gaming part, it is a pretty good RPG all-in-all.
summary: Game was really good. Good plot behind it

reviewText:
Great game.
Shame it takes so many discs, but it's worth it.
The storyline and characters are easy to get into.
Great to follow through.
If you're a fan of any Final Fantasy game, or even a Tales game, give this a shot.

It's just like an old school Final Fantasy, but HD graphics and all! Character design by Takehiko Inoue (Slam Dunk) is just superb. Music by Nobuo Uematsu (Final Fantasy), you just can't go wrong with that, and of course, Hironobu Sakaguchi's ("The Father of Final Fantasy") direction and all.... Really, what can you say about this game that would make it less awesome? Nothing.

Excellent RPG! I loved the turn based combat system, it is fun and far more relaxing than real time. The skill system is also very good. Normally, I don't like RPG's with a horde of extra characters, but the leveling xp system in Lost Odyssey for underlevelled characters is fast and very good

The story in Lost Odyssey is excellent. The music is outstanding. Even the graphics are good.

Lost Odyssey is a very good RPG, highly recommended.

Lost Odyssey is by far one my favorite games for the 360. The story is long and emotional, and the characters are well-developed. As in most RPGs, the random battles get a little tedious, but they're well worth the time, as the boss battles in this game can be pretty challenging. A great game for anyone who appreciates a good storyline.

One of the best XBOX 360 games I have ever played. Game plays with your emotions and can make you happy, sad, angry, etc. very moving story. I recommend this and Witcher 2 for all fans of XBOX 360 RPGs

I'm a 30 year old gamer, and this really brings me back to the late 80's and early 90's.  It's classic JRPG.  When we think of classic JRPGs we think of a game being story driven, having a great battle system, and challenging.  This game has all these elements.  You really need to be prepared to commit 30+ hours to enjoy this game.  It gets better and better as you go through the game.  Pick this game up, you will not be disappointed!
summary: Solid Game.  This is what FF 13 should have been

reviewText: This game is fantastic! The random battles can become tedious, but the story is very involved and intriguing. The characters are well-developed, you even find yourself becoming attached to them. The environment is just gorgeous and the background and characters are very well-rendered. Some of the portions where your party is divided can be annoying, but you always find all sorts of cool items during those phases. Overall, a beautiful, smooth, intriguing game.

I had high expectations for this game, because it was developed by the same guys who did FFX.  Lost Odyssey definitely met my expectations.  It's really awesome how the story unfolds, and most of the characters are extremely well done.  The dream sequences are impeccable.  Overall, this game offered me and my roommate a fantastic 90+ hours of gameplay each.  I would definitely recommend it to others.

I was waiting for the song to appear. I did not play the whole game, as I have to get used to the controls for it. My character kept going backwards instead of forward. It seems like a really fun game, but I work so much overtime, that I stopped playing when my character

This is one of the best games on the x-box 360. The graphics are amazing. The story if incredible. And the game play is fun and there is a lot to the game. If you liked the other RE games then you have to play this one!
summary: One of the best games on the 360.

reviewText: Having played this and the PS3 version, I have to say this, while not as advanced in terms of graphics, is still very fun. I think the aiming in this version, with the Wii remote, is much better than the PS3 version. You also get to solve more puzzles and blast more things than in the PS3 version. The only drawback is some of the subtitles don't match up with the dialogue, but you won't be disappointed.

I got started on this series with the RE4 for Wii, and I fell in love with it. As an avid fan of the zombie genre, I felt compelled to play this game. The game play is amazing, and the graphics are even more so. When an infected gets after you, it will make you jump out of your skin! This is a great game, and it definitely deserves all five stars that I gave it.

The game has far too many combinations to remember for the characters to do things. The environment is confusing, some things are interactive and some are not, and when you are in a hurry being attacked by zombies, it's hard to take the time to figure out what there is to do, and where to go. I'm giving this game away to get rid of it. I loved playing Resident Evil: Nemesis 3 in the past.

I love this game. Got a good price for it too. it has everything i like in first person shooters: blood, gore, good story, cool weapons. The only complaint i have is not being able to move if you are aiming your gun.

I'm a huge fan of Resident Evil 4 and Dead Space, so needless to say I've been waiting for this game for a long time. I've played about 3 hours so far and I'm blown away! The graphics and sound are outstanding. The controls take a little getting used to, but it's a rewarding experience. A triple-A release and a must buy!

I recently got Infamous 2 and had so much fun with it that I got the original Infamous again! I don't know why I am attracted to this game on such a level but I know part of it is just how well the game is put together. It never feels tedious like some games can be. And the boss battles are actually a good level of difficulty. I hate bosses that are next to impossible to beat and take 20 mins to complete. This and Infamous 2 are great games if you like the action adventure genre.
summary: I have re-purchased this game twice after finishing it and trading it

reviewText:
Recently bought a PS3 and I was looking for some cheap games to load it up with. I've always wanted to play this game--couldn't till I got the PS3. This game is AWESOME.

I don't spoil, so I'll say that it's just super fun and if you haven't played it, you're missing out! Good controls (sometimes the camera angles get kinda messed up though) Good graphics. Good story, good action.

My only advice; DON'T THINK YOU CAN TAKE THEM ALL!! Because you can't.

Now go buy it!

This was one of the first games I bought when I finally got a PS3 and I wasn't disappointed. The action is so cool in this game and the idea that your decisions make you a hero or a villain and can effect the kind of powers you have make it so much fun to play over and over again. I really love it.
summary: Such a fun game to play!

reviewText: First of all, buy this game if you haven't already!  It has a fantastic story, great gameplay, and good characters.  Second, as of 6/14 this game is free on the playstation store so you can get it there too!  Have fun!

The game seems fairly long. I've only put in a few days of play and have barely scratched it. Decent game play, the aiming is a bit annoying at times. I would definitely recommend this game though. I will end up buying the second one when it comes out for less than twenty

I wasn't sure what to expect from this game, but was pleasantly surprised as soon as I began.
The game is simple fun.  I enjoyed the open environment and the ability to do what I wanted, when I wanted.  The storyline is interesting and the gameplay is great.  It is just a lot of fun.

I loved the Ghostbusters movies as a kid. To me, the game really captured the atmosphere of the movies. A few years after completing it, this is still one of my favorite PS3 games.

Not too difficult for someone with overall poor motor skills :) I think the game is much more about atmosphere than technical challenge-- which is just fine for a casual gamer like me.

If you grew up in the 80s with the movies, this is a must-have!
summary: I loved the Ghostbusters movies as a kid

reviewText: I can't give this game any more than a 1 star based on the number of glitches I have experienced within the first week.  I have played at least half way through the game and have had screen tearing, glitches everywhere, and the game has frozen on me at least 10 times where I have had to restart!  No kidding!  That is inexcusable.  Its an awesome game I just wish it would work all of the time!
summary: VERY FUN BUT TOO MANY GLITCHES! WOW

reviewText: This is a great game with a great story! Some minor control issues get annoying at times but not enough to take away from the fun in electrocuting everything. I am a gamer who thrives on a good story and I found this to be one of the best stories in both substance and execution.

This game really nails it. Since we are probably never getting a Ghostbusters 3 from the original cast, this is the third movie. The game is fun and it actually plays well. It's truly unique in a world of copycat first person shooters or third person action titles. Even if you're not a Ghostbusters fan, this is a solid playthrough. It's also the reason I got a Ps3 in the first place. Of course I'm glad I did since there are tons of other amazing titles for this generation.

I'm a big fan of the ninja gaiden genre and this game is great!. If you love the hack and slash type games where its not just about button mashing but also about solving puzzles then this is the perfect balance. Its not short, but not too long and the graphics and cut scenes are amazing. The game is hard though so if your not patient then this is not for you. I love the game and I'm getting the third installment ASAP.
summary: I'm a big fan of the ninja gaiden genre and this game is great!.

reviewText: This is a great family game and its really fun to play. This is a great game for kids to play. It was fairly easy to play and had a really good campaign. I loved the movie and this game made it a lot more interesting from watching the movie.

I'm glad I got this as a gift because I may not have purchased it myself, and I would have been missing out. The demo didn't do it justice. This game has consumed more hours than any other, and it is still fun. It is deserving of the 9+ review ratings it has received and provides a lot of bang for the buck.

Outside the original Xbox's title Ninja Gaiden, Ninja Gaiden 2 sets the bar as one of the best action games on the XBox 360. If you are new to the series make sure to pick this one up and play through it completely. You'll enjoy it.
summary: Ninja Gaiden 2 sets the bar as one of the best action games on the XBox 360

reviewText:
this is an awesome game.
i wasn't expecting for it to be detailed. but its beautiful in terms of graphics.
the game play is great.
the story is every thing you expect out of a great game.
i love it over all.

Let me get this out of the way, inFAMOUS is the greatest PS3 exclusive. It's a hell of a ride, allowing you to choose from being a good guy or being a bad guy. I became obsessed with this game, couldn't stop playing it. I even manage to get my first PLATINUM TROPHY with inFAMOUS, is just that addictive. For anyone out there who wonders if it's worth spending the money, well my friend, stop wondering and buy it. Trust me you won't regret it. PEACE............

This series has been my favorite game since the Nintendo. So as soon as I got my XBOX 360 this was the first game I bought. The graphics are awesome, and the gameplay is top notch. I am not a full time gamer but do love to play ad this is my favorite game. A lot of fun and really challenging.

Dear Everyone,
This game is great! I have enjoyed every minute of it. It will have a much higher replay value than expected. If you love Ghostbusters and their corny jokes than you will enjoy this game. I am very glad that it was made and actually can't wait for a follow up. It is challenging and timeless. A must have for fans of the movie and ghosts. Have fun!!

Ninja Gaiden 2 is a good sequel to Ninja Gaiden on the Xbox. Team Ninja could have made the story feel more interesting. When playing Ninja Gaiden I felt a cool feeling throughout the whole game. In Ninja Gaiden 2 I did not really feel as entertained. The voice acting could have been better too. Still Ninja Gaiden 2 is worth playing. I had fun playing the game.

I bought this game when I saw it on sale for $10.  I remembered liking Ninja Gaiden on the original Xbox, so I figured this couldn't be half bad.  In fact, it is completely bad.  The graphics are terrible!  Even worse is the camera!  It never stays in a good position and likes to flip around at inappropriate times.  Every encounter with an enemy is the same, so it gets redundant in about an hour.

I bought this game not knowing what to expect.  I love the games made by Sucker Punch and decided to give this a try.  To my enjoyment, this is a great game.  You can choose two different paths, you can either decide to be good or evil.  It has many different side quests to add hours to the gameplay.  As you progress through the game, it really draws you into the story.  I would definitely recommend this game to anyone.  A must have in my opinion.

This game is incredibly good, I have been playing it since I got it and don't think I'll put it down any time soon. The images are incredibly good and all the different moves you can perform with each weapon give the game a great interaction.

I loved Ninja Gaiden since I was 5 years old back on the NES.  Now it's only gotten better (as you'd hope) on the newest generation of consoles.  There are some camera flaws, and the difficulty has gone down due to the new health system, but overall the experience has only gotten better, with faster action and more beautiful cinematics.

I recommend this to any Ninja Gaiden fan who owns an xbox 360.
summary: Ninja Gaiden still has it on next gen console

reviewText: This game is amazing.  If you're waiting for a reason to buy a PS3, this is it.  Everything in this game is fun collecting the shards and finding the "drops" to expand the story is a blast.  Exploring isn't tedious, since the main character is so much fun to control.  Also the fights are a blast as well, since the main character has such an arsenal at his disposal.  I'm evil, and have just cleared island 2, can't wait to finish the game and play through on the "good" path.  It's that much fun.

I just finished this game not to long ago and it was quite a rush. It wasn't as hard as the first one but still a challenge. It took me 4 days to beat it. The game was absolutely amazing and full of surprises.
summary: In love with Ninja Gaiden II

reviewText:
Well, I just got the game in today, but since there are those who seem to be reviewing the game based on how well it pairs up with their TVs, I thought I'd give my 2 cents. It looks GORGEOUS and just plain BEAUTIFUL on my 73 inch TV!! I cannot express just how impressed I am at how well this game compliments my TV.. It's like going to buy a car, but when you buy the car, the engine runs at 125%!!!! MUST BUY!!

Oh yeah.. the game is pretty fun too!

I have to say that this is the best PS3 game I have played to date! The first time I tried it, I ended up playing for about 7 hours without realizing the time. The game has great flow and lots of challenges, I am going to play thru 2x, to try out the good and evil paths.

Infamous is infamously fun!

Epic. This game made the series for me, and really is perfect for it's genre. It is intense all the way through, and can move you in ways most games will never even have an opportunity to. Disturbing, violent, intense, challenging, and really makes you feel like you're in the middle of something huge. Really great game.
summary: This'd be the one I'd use to introduce someone to Gears

reviewText: If you're a fan of third person shooters, you'll love this! I did. This is an overall awesome game, on top of awesome graphics and a multi-player mode that will always leave you wanting more! Highly recommended! Although if you're going to play this on Insane, I would recommend doing it with a friend.

My roommate took this game and I never saw it again.  I was getting tired of him never bringing it back so I just had to buy a new one, it's one of those games you can't go too long without playing.  Can't wait for Gears 3 to come out.
The CD is broken and the game console does not read, get under these conditions

I just beat this game recently, and had a lot of fun doing it. I'm not sure why people say the story isn't that strong, I thought the gameplay throughout was pretty good. The graphics are jaw-dropping and all the different types of vehicles and perspectives towards the end of the game made it even more impressive to me. I played a little multi-player and its pretty good, but Call of Duty is still better in my honest opinion. I guess everybody just has a preference for different types.

Gears of War 2 is a great game, better than the first. It has awesome graphics and gameplay, a great storyline, along with some very unique levels. This game will keep you entertained for hours, and that's before you play on Xbox Live!
summary: Gears of War 2... A Must Have!

reviewText: I loved the original Gears of War. I played it online almost everyday last year. I don't have gold anymore, and that might be part of the reason I don't like this game, but the story didn't even suck me in. If a game only has 5 acts, the exposition should clearly take place in the first act. The second act bored me more than the first one did. I stopped playing after that and got half my money back. What a waste.

If you loved the first Gears, you will love this one as well.  The multiplayer coop and Horde modes are fantastic and will keep you and your friends busy for hours.  The story mode was fun as well, but the story somewhat confused me and I hope it gets wrapped up well in the 3rd game.  I felt alot of the content in the story and story mode play were lifted from Halo, but not enough to get your panties in a bunch over.  If you are looking for some mindless, violent fun, this is the game for you.

One of the best games I have ever played. If you are squeamish and you can't stand the sight of blood, do not get it. If you are a parent, you may be inclinded to buy another game. But all in all, WOW!!!!! Alot of action and the story flows quite well. I loved it. It took me about 10 to 12 hours to complete in normal mode. If you want a great FSP with alot of action and alot of action, this is the game for you!!!!
summary: Great Game!!!! Not for the Fient of Heart

reviewText:
I got the PS2 version at midnight last night, the game play is very characteristic of classic Playstation 2 and it has a very nostalgic feel for those of us who are old enough to have seen the movie at the theaters. It is great that the original actors/actresses have done all the voices.

I look forward to playing the PS3 version after I finish the PS2 version.

TWO THUMBS UP!

The PS2 version of Ghostbusters is a subpar port of the game. It is buggy and freezes at several points throughout the game. Obviously, the quality control wasn't done properly, if at all, for this version. Save your money, and opt instead for any other version of the game (it is also available for Nintendo DS, Wii, PC, PS3, and Xbox 360). It is THAT bad.

It can't be much fun when you keep on wondering whether the game will stop working in the middle of a level...
summary: Avoid this version at all costs!

reviewText: What can I say, I played the original Starcraft years ago when it first came out. I guess I'm biased because even though my ancient laptop can hardly handle it with low graphics I just can't stop playing. I'm actually considering upgrading my laptop just to be able to bump up the quality to see what I'm missing (though I don't think it's much). I haven't tried multiplayer yet, but the campaign has been great so far.
summary: Really fun sequel to original Starcraft

reviewText: I love this game. The gameplay is engrossing, the graphics are fantastic, and the multiplayer gameplay is addictive and fun. I have lost many hours of my life and my sleep to this game (and for the most part, it was worth it).
summary: Fantastic game for both single player solo campaign and multiplayer mayhem

reviewText: First time Ive played a single player game in a while and was happy from the get-go. Gameplay is very nice. It looks really really good. The voice acting is really done well and makes you feel like your really there. A+ game here.

Great Game.  The graphics are very good, and the cut-scenes feel like you are watching a movie.  New units and features, and has the old units included as well.  If you enjoyed the original Starcraft then you should definitely get this game.  One confusing aspect is that you need to have an account in order to play the game, and log in when the game starts.  In addition, you do not need to insert the disc to play the game.

Being not a much of a gamer, I knew little about this game, but purchased it based on the hype of my friends. I quickly became addicted and loved it. It's a great challenging game that will make you wonder how you were possibly playing for so many hours without realizing it. If you like real time strategy, you'll love this game. Be prepared to become addicted.

I loved the campaign for this game. I don't play multiplayer, but it was good fun running through the campaign a couple times to see the different talents you could choose and how they impacted gameplay.

Oh the story... It is so lackluster it's not even funny. I'm not going to spoil it for anybody, so I'll just leave it at that. However, the multiplayer is the real reason why most of you guys came to buy this. The multiplay is good, but after a few days of examining and testing out the various ways of micro, because of the change from BW to WoL, it changed a lot. I'm too lazy to write anything more, but for people who loved the BW ways of micro, be ready to lose a lot of units.

I love this game and enjoy some of the new features it has over the older version allowing for variations in the game play.  Like some others I do not like the fact I need an internet connection to play the game, or it at least seems that way.  But a very enjoyable game with great graphics and story line.

If you are a fan of the original StarCraft, this is a must buy.  Read some of the reviews by the professional game reviewers for the gameplay details; I'll just pitch in that it is awesome.  My only complaint is that you can't just play the game; you have to have a username and password and you must be logged in to battle.net.  I know that this is just the order of things for all modern, otherwise easily copyable games, but that doesn't mean I have to like it.

This site helped me a lot, and it has some great tips: http://summified.com/2013/06/starcraft-2-hots-tips/ if you need anymore help just email me at jddjensen@gmail.com, or if you have any tips you would like added.

First off, let me say this again, this game is one of the best video games ever, graphically, gameplay, scale, and presentation. THIS IS A SHORT REVIEW, PLEASE WATCH THE FULL VIDEO REVIEW AT THE YOUTUBE LINK BELOW:

GRAPHICS: 10/10
GAMEPLAY: 10/10
SCALE: 10/10
PRESENTATION: 10/10
STORY: 9/10

WATCH THE FULL GameSpot VIDEO REVIEW ON YOUTUBE : [...]
summary: One of the GREATEST Video Games EVER.

reviewText: I was a huge fan of Starcraft when it first came out, and the long-awaited sequel doesn't disappoint.  There are so many features that we wanted in the last one that are now reality.  People who are critics just had expectations that were unrealistic for any game, because there was a 12-year gap between the two.  The fact is, this is one of the best real time strategy games ever made and the multiplayer will keep it relevant and fun for years.

I ordered this with a lot of enthusiasm, and it didn't disappoint. I was happy to find that it arrived on time, and installed it on my brother's computer on vacation. It's nice to have a DVD copy of the game, because it's huge and takes forever to install over even the fastest of Internet connections.
summary: Starcraft II is an instant classic

reviewText: If you're looking to get into starcraft or RTS's for the first time, this game is amazing!  I love the fast-passed nature of it, and the complex strategies.  I've been playing it a while and still have a long way to go up the ladder.  If you're not sure about buying it they offer a starter edition, which lets you use most of the game's features.

This video game was ordered as a bundle created by my fiancee and myself. We are both huge fans of video games, and all of the games ordered on Amazon arrived on time and in brand new condition. We are very satisfied with the games, and continue to enjoy playing them even a year after their original purchase!

He plays this game non-stop. He thinks it is one of the greatest games he has ever played and rarely puts it down. He misplaced his first game so I had to buy him another one as he was lost without it. I definitely recommend this game!

I purchased this game because, well, I'm a diehard Ghostbusters fan!!! I thought it would be fun to bring my granddaughter in on all the ghostbuster fun and since I am 53 and she is only 10, it definitely bridged that gap.  She loves it as much as I do!  It is really fun, graphics are great, and it definitely passes the time before you know it.  I definitely recommend this game!

I have played the original Starcraft for a long time. I have been trying to purchase Starcraft II for 6 months but the price was always too high at Wal-You know what. Glad I found it here.

Game play is as good, if not better than, the original game. The cinamatics are way better than the original. If this is your type of game I highly recommend Starcraft II.

When I heard this game came out I was excited because my dad had shown me how to play the first Starcraft. I love the experience and how they had upgraded the look of everything. On the other hand I loved the campaign that shows the story of what had happened. If you have not played the first one before, it is best to start with the campaign first, of course. It gets a little harder as you go.

I haven't played a whole lot of strategy games like this one.  The last one I played was warhammer many years ago.  I like that Blizzard made it easy for a beginner to learn the game.  The campaign is the perfect length to learn skills.  But the real fun is in the multiplayer games.  Don't be discouraged if you have trouble at first.  Timings become important with whatever race you choose.

I was an avid OG Starcraft fan way back in my middle school days.  As an adult, I was hesitant to jump on the SCII bandwagon, but I'm glad I did!  This game provides hours of fun for all ages.  It is an awesome strategy game, and great to play online with your friends.  I can't wait for the next installment!

I wasn't to sure about this game when I watched the preview, but it turned out to be a great game. I grew up watching Ghostbusters and for a few years really thought I would be one when I grew up. Long story short, that didn't happen, but I've been having a good time running through New York capturing ghosts in the game.

Lets forget a second about how cool it is that you can fight with Darth Vader and Yoda on this game, because that is very cool. What makes this game great is the fluidity of play, the tremendous amount of action, as well as all the extra missions you can go on. Not to mention all the personalization you can give each character. This is still one of my favorite games to play and I can't wait to get the next one!

If you've played the first Starcraft (like my husband), this one goes way beyond to make a great game. Excellent campaign mode and online multiplayer. If you've never played (like me), there are a lot of tutorials to help you get going. An excellent game for all levels! If your computer is a little slow, expect to wait a bit while games load, but the game itself keeps up with real-time (if you select low settings), even with a slow computer.

I have been trying to activate this game for the last 72 hours and still can't figure it out.  It took me about 48 hours to download and when I manage to install it there is no way I can log in and play. I have done everything and can't figure out how to start playing this thing!  Seems that is a way of pushing me into buying it out of desperation.  Well I will definitely not spend money on a game where playing a demo seems to be the ultimate challenge!

This is a great game that has been out for a long time. That said, I don't need to write a wall of text telling you why to buy it. I will tell you that if you pay attention you can get it from amazon for a better price with less hassle than anywhere else.

I bought this game when it came out but haven't got the time to write a review, but if I could say in three words what this game is, it would be ultra super badass game. Graphics are amazing and the game play is very fun. The puzzle are alright but the boss battles are visually spectacular. Buy this game if you can.

If you are a fan of strategy games then this is a must have. Even if you are not into the starcraft sci-fi theme, this game is entertaining, re-playable and loads of fun with multiplayer. The story line is gripping, filled with great graphics and interactive. Definitely worth the consideration to get.

Now here's a game that is very clean in it's programming. I give it 5 stars because the level of detail and thought put into this game is substantial. There are many characters to choose from. Online play is definitely great. If you like fighting games, then this will definitely hold you over for a while. I recommend buying.

THIS GAME IS GREAT AND EXCITING. THIS GAME FEATURES ARE EXCELLENT. ESPECIALLY NEW CHARACTER "DARTH VADER" IS LOOKING GREAT. ALSO THE COMPUTER EFFECT WAS NICE. I ENJOY THE GAME. THIS GAME WILL HIT. I RECOMMANDED IT.

There is really nothing much to say about this game, but that the fact that an active internet connection is REQUIRED to play, despite the fact that I just shelled out 60$ for the game is ridiculous. I just spent 60$ to RENT a game. This is deserving of more expletives than I could possibly get away with. Infuriating.

I'm 28 and me and my other half freaking LOVE this game (and the second one).  This is not just a kids game but can be fully enjoyed by adults who are kids at heart.  The humor in it is cute.  All the characters are fun to play and I love the co-op mode.  Such a fun, fun game.

I purchased this game on a cd, and couldn't play until i went online and created an account.  If was free game, i would understand, but its not.  There is no reason for this, especially when you have to enter your password to play.  Would not buy it for this reason, and will never buy another blizzard game for this reason.

I loved this game from start to finish.  It was epic, long, fun, replay value was there (though I only finished it once), and a great finale to the series.  Get this game if you're a fan of the God of War series, or even if you aren't.  It's incredible.

Do you like Greek mythology? Buy this game!
Do you like hack and slash 'em game? Buy this game!

I recommend playing the other games first especially if you are interested in the story.
If you just want to play a good hack and slash 'em game you can skip the first 2 games....for now, after playing it I'm sure you will want to!

This game was truly epic!  It went on....and on.....and on.  But trust me there were so many challenges and surpises in this game that it never got old.  I actually wondered if I would ever get to the end of this game.  I don't know how many hours I actually played until I completed the game, but it seemed like 40+.  This was definitely one of the best games I've ever played.  Highly recommended.

Great game, but, I didn't buy the "Greatest Hits" edition.

No collection should have a "Greatest Hits" version. Only buy that for your kids or if you don't collect anything and just want to play the game.

Ever since I was a child I have been playing with Legos and wanting to be Batman.  This game is the perfect mix of both my dreams.  The game play is super cool, the puzzles are great.  I would recommend this classic to any gamer.

Hands down, this is the best RTS on the market.  While it can't be all things to all people, it gets much more right than it does wrong.  In addition to the great gameplay, it has one of the best communities on the internet.  A must-have for any fan of the real-time strategy genre.

God of war is my favorite favorite favorite games of all time. God of war takes place after the end of god of war 2, from there I am not going to tell you the story. You must play the first game which came out on the ps2. You can buy the god of war collection on the ps3. If you our looking for a kick-ass bloody game involving greek mythology, this is the game for you!!! See a gameplay on youtube and if you like it, BUY IT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Best game of the series so far; can't wait for Ascension.  This game has the best graphics I've seen to-date on any PS3 game I've played.  I really like how each game in the series includes different weapons/abilities.  Some of the camera angles in this game are really cool too.  This game warrants a replay soon.

This was the first Lego game that I played (it came with our Xbox) and it got me hooked on the Lego franchise. I love that the game is good for adults as well as children. While some of the puzzles may be challenging for young kids by themselves, it gives adults the challenge needed to keep it interesting.

To play this game -- even to play it alone, without connecting to anybody -- you are required to give the company your real name, email address, home address, birthdate, and phone number.  This is required information, not optional.

this is a game i brought for my nephew. i watched him play then i wanted to play myself. he liked the game so much that he will not let anyone else play the game so i had to order my own game in ps3 because he has a xbox 360.

I gave this game to my friend for Christmas. He has been waiting for StarCraft 2 for the longest. The first copy I got was defective, it didn't load, so sad that my friend had to wait 5 days to get a new copy from Amazon.com but the new copy worked and he loved it. If you love Command & Conquer you'll love StarCraft 2.

I got this game a few weeks ago from a different online store and I must say that the campaign was a ton of fun and was very exciting. After you beat the campaign there isn't much replay value so I would recommend to rent for a week but it is definitely a game I would suggest to play.
summary: Best campaign I have played in a LONG time.

reviewText: I bought this for my grandson for Christmas, so I don't know how he'll like it; however, he asked for it specifically, and he has other Lego video games, so I know he'll love it!  As far as the purchase end of it, ordering was simple, and it arrived in a flash!  I'm totally happy with this transaction.

I'm not going to waste my time and write a novel so that I can repeat everything that has been said already. This game is fantastic, the campaign is infinitely better than the original's and the multiplayer, though different, is just as much fun. If you liked the original Starcraft, don't even think twice about picking this up. Just do it.
summary: Fantastic Game. That's all there is to it

reviewText: StarCraft II is a disappointment. The game is short and really easy. A lot of the missions are just retreads from the original StarCraft. It might be worth picking it up if you like multiplayer and want to game against your friends. Don't get it for the single player.

I will not write a wall of text to describe this game because if your reading this then you already know its great. I will tell you this is an epic series and this game is the best of them all.  This game is mature and should be played by adults. Lastly this is the best game made to date on any platform in my opinion.  If you like this type of game then you cant go wrong with this one.

All the games I have I play on the Xbox 360. I have had a PS3 for over 2 years and use it daily as a  Blu Ray player. God of War 3 is the only game that made me buy for PlayStation. I love this game it is better than the first two, which were great. This game is Epic and a must have for everyone who has a PS3.
summary: The only PS3 game I own

reviewText: I never played any of the previous titles, but for my first time i all i can say is that it was well worth the money i spent on it. I love how he kills everyone i mean he kills everyone! If that's not vengence then i don't know what is.
summary: Definitly Up there as one of the best.

reviewText:
Absolutely amazing!

I have been waiting for Starcraft 2 for a very long time, and Blizzard didn't disappoint.

Surprisingly, the game actually runs off less CPU usage than expected, and overall the game runs smoothly.

I only have one complaint, the need to sign up online before usage every time can become a hastle, but that's a minor problem.

Overall, 5/5. Awesome job Blizzard!

I paid $4.99 for this game (on a special amazon deal) and did not expect a lot from it. However, the graphics were amazing and so was the game play. Sony did a good job with the game. The only thing I did not like about the game was the in-game videos were not skipable.

The graphics were so detailed it made me dizzy at first. I love the gameplay and it was so amazing. The ending was confusing and it just doesnt make sense, but don't let that stop you from buying this game. GET THIS GAME ITS AWESOME!

This game is almost perfected. The gameplay is excellent, the graphics is outstanding and if you have been playing God of War 1 & 2, the story will blow your mind. The only thing I was disappointed it was a bit too short. Besides that, all I have to say, "GET IT NOW! WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR!"
summary: God of War III is the God particle for video games

reviewText: This is a PS3 defining game.  Excellent graphics, well thought out adventure.  The whole game is excellent, even if you are not a fan of the hack and slash genre.  This game features one of the BEST boss battles in any video game I've ever played.  Ever.  The price of admission is worth this one battle boss battle alone...  I haven't met one person that said they didn't enjoy the game. Myself included.

This is probably one of the coolest game I have ever played on a console.  The action sequences are absolutely incredible.  I could go into a lot of detail but I don't want to spoil it for you.  If you own a PS3 you really should try this game, either rent or buy.  If you like action games and aren't turned off by gore, this should be one of the first few games you try.

Kick ass game.

This game is by far the best game i have played so far, I you don't have this, your missing out on something incredible. This game is so amazing your gonna have to play it to get the full effect, words just cant describe it.

Quite the worthy sequel to the original Starcraft.  The campaign is significantly longer than I was expecting.  And, of course, the multiplayer is phenomenal.  My only complaint is that it's a bit more complex than I would like and if you want to be good in multi you have to be good at microing your units.

As someone who had only sparingly played the GOW trilogy prior to this game, I was pleasantly surprised with this game. The graphics are spectacular and the sheer scale of the game can be incredible at times. The story provides a fitting ending and will not let you go until you have finished the game. This game also has a lot of replay value, as there is much to collect and use on your next playthrough. I highly recommend this game, one of the best for the PS3.

If you have never played Starcraft, you have been missing out on one of the best strategy games of all time. Starcraft II doesn't dissapoint either. The folks at Blizzard have done an excellent job with the gameplay. Each faction is very well balanced and most missions are challenging but not impossible. It is definitely worth the money. Enjoy!

From the very beginning you will be blown away by the sheer beauty of this game. The game has one of the best introductions ever and the pace of the game is just right.

My only regret is watching the videos of the game before it got released.

A must buy.

If you like quick, easy and fun games, this one is for you. I don't have a lot of time to play during the week, so GOWIII gives me the opportunity to jump in for an hour or so and jump back out without losing any of the fun factor!

Don't have a lot of time on your hands and enjoy brutally violent, button mashing fun (with a few boobs thrown in for good measure)? GOWIII is your game!
summary: Gog Of War III? More like God Games!

reviewText:
One of the best games I have ever played.  I have been playing games since Atari.  I have owned every system and played countless amounts of games in the past 27 years.  I just finished this game and I'm about to play it through again because it's THAT good!

I wasn't even that big of a fan of the first two GOW games.  But number three is Amazing!
summary: If you like viedo games you'll LOVE this game!

reviewText: I haven't played much of the Saints Row series until I got this game, but I am really glad that I did. Saints Row is one of those games that you can do basically whatever you want. Anytime you have a lot of freedom to do as you please that's a good thing, right, because isn't that why we love democracy. This style of game is similar to the GTA series but I would say that Saints Row has much more freedom to screw around and do whatever you want.

I thoroughly enjoyed the game.  I usually play console games, but I decided to give this a shot. I thought it was terrific.  I've started playing again with different difficulty levels, checking out the game paths I didn't choose the first time, and playing multi-player.  None of the issues there have been complaints about bother me.  I'm looking forward to the next two expansions as well.

Hats off to Sony for coming up with another great game. I was already blown away with Uncharted 2, but you made God of War 3 even better. The graphics is stunning. Story and gameplay are awesome. This is easily the Game of the Year!

I won't rehash in detail what many have already said here regarding the many flaws of Starcraft II (mostly Blizzard's gestapo-style regulation of the game). I will simply say that, as a former Starcraft maniac and huge fan of the game, the sequel has been a massive letdown in almost every way. If this weren't the sequel to one of the greatest video games ever, I might have given it 2.5 stars.

Not only is this game extremely fun to play, it is also incredibly artistic. Every part of the game is hand crafted and unique. Aside from the enemies, none of the scenery is reused throughout the game. Every area is new (except the few times when you revisit a place) and beautiful to look at. It is also an extremely violent and graphic game. Just be aware of that.

If you love action adventure games then this game is for you. If you have played the previous games in the series and you liked them then you will love this game. I have beaten the game and I am doing another play through.

This game is by far greater than i thought. It's fun and crazy in the same time. I've never played something like that before and that's the reason why i give it 5 stars for surprising me in so many ways.

Just like the title says, this has everything you could hope for in a game.  A great storyline (especially if you've played all three), stunning graphics, and, of course, great gameplay.

The new weapons and magic system are a significant improvement over the previous two games.

What are you waiting for?  Just get the game already....
summary: Everything you could hope for in a game.

reviewText: Saints Row 2 took the design philosophy of "If it's fun, it's in the game" and ran with it. There's a million things to do and none of them feel like filler. And at $20, you really can't beat it. I can not recommend this game highly enough.

This game is amazing. The grahpics are beautiful, cutscenes are awesome. I've only played part of the campaign so far but I'm loving it already. It's hard enough that it's fun but not so hard that you can't do anything.  I also really like the music. It only gets a little annoying when the characters say the same things over and over again. But I guess that should be expected.

One of the best games I have ever played. Lives up to the greatness that is Starcraft 1 and fixes a lot of annoyances and nags with the original Starcraft 1. Runs smooth and is incredibly fun. Highly recommended.
summary: One of the best games I have ever played.

reviewText: I couldn't put this game down and beat it in just a few short hours.  Normally, that would cause me to deduct 1 star from the review... HOWEVER... the few short hours of gameplay were probably the best hours of my gaming life.  If you haven't played the original games yet, I highly suggest getting the God of War collection (1 & 2) first.  This sets an insane bar for all PS3 games in the future.  If you own a PS3, you need to experience this game.

There are enough good reviews on this game, the only reason I'm doing this review is because I truly feel obligated to rate it a 5 star. But to sum it up this game is ridiculous. It's almost too awesome.  The visuals are mind blowing and the action is crazy. To be honest I didn't even like hack and slash games before this. My only regret is not playing the 2 sequels before it.

If you have a ps3, get God of War 3. If you don't have a ps3, go buy a ps3 and then get God of War 3.

I wondered if this was going to live up to its hype. As a huge fan of the first two games, I wasn't sure if this would belong in the trilogy. But by God (no pun intended, here), it surpasses its right to be part of the trilogy. They did so much more with this game than I could have ever imagined, and surprisingly, managed to keep the gameplay fresh after three long games.
summary: Simply put, the best game I have ever played.

reviewText: I have to be honest when i first played this game I didn't really like it, but after playing it over and over again I grew to love it. I realize that the game is more fun when played on hard mode than on normal or easy. So if you want to challenge yourself it's better to play on Hard or very hard. So now god of war 3 has got me hooked and I play it everyday. The new weapons and the hot graphics make the game worth while. So what you waiting for? Don't hestiate and buy this game.

There's not much that I can say that has already been said in the other reviews.

But if you've played the E3 demo, it truly doesn't do the actual game justice.  The real game is more polished and epic.
summary: The demo doesn't do it justice.

reviewText: If you like this type of game this is the best of them all. Graphics are some of the best ever seen. Only game that maybe better is Uncharted 2. Story is excellent. As you can tell I'm a huge fan and this is the best game of all-time. I don't see how you could be disapointed.
summary: Kratos the God of Hack and Slash

reviewText:
I'm going to keep this short and sweet.  This game is amazing.  If you don't own a copy, go pick one up!  If you don't own a PS3, go pick up a PS3 with this game!  The graphics are the best and the game-play is so smooth.  Welp, that's all I want to say for now, back to playing GOW3... ;)

Oh and one other thing...Playstation rules! :)
summary: One of the Best Games Ever!

reviewText: This game is the result of a great work, that was well done game, thanks to a group of people that have decided to do a great game. We live in a cause and effect universe. Health is a result, happiness is a result, wealth is a result, and this game is a result of a great job.
summary: THANK YOU FOR THE CREATION OF THIS OUTSTANDING GAME

reviewText: I understand everyone's complaints about the single human campaign, and the lack of LAN play. But really, I don't care. I got this game mostly for the single-player campaign. I played for a few hours and it was just as hard to stop as it was with the first game. I love this game. I'm sure I'll be irritated when I run out of missions on the single player campaign, but you know what? That's the mark of a good game.

I bought this game as a gift for my boyfriend as I had it and we wanted to play together. I was able to buy it and ship it easily and he got it super fast! So that's great. The game itself is a pretty good game I wasn't much of a gamer till I met my boyfriend but I really enjoyed playing this game with him. It's like all the other Soul Calibur games. It was easy to play and the controls were easy to understand. I would definitely play it again.
summary: I was able to buy it and ship it easily and he got it super fast

reviewText: 99.9% of the one star reviews are based on a product that they don't even have in their hands, and plenty of their information is unreliable. You don't have to use an internet connection to play, the game is great, and it is longer than the first game, even though people are claiming that it's just the Terran campaign from the first one. This is one of the best games ever made. Do not hesitate to buy.
summary: Don't listen to the 1 star reviews

reviewText:
This is a great game. I am about halfway through it and having a blast and the multiplayer is great. Most of these negative reviews are from people who are grumpy because they can't pirate the game or have their LAN parties which most people don't even partake in. They give it 1 star because it doesn't have LAN? Total B.S.

Ignore the haters. This is a fantastic game and you should see for yourself.

Also, the expansions are not going to be $60 nubs.

If I had known that I have to be online to play the single player campaign I would have not bought this game.  I usually play Versus AI. Now I have to be online just to play that too.

...not happy with my purchase, i wish I can return it.  I am happy I did not shell out the money for the collector's edition.

my biggest problem with the game is not being able to play my game off-line.  Blizzard, I will not be buying Diablo 3!
summary: Do not buy if you like playing offline

reviewText:
Since every opinion has been mentioned already in these reviews, I'll keep mine short.

12 years has done the Starcraft franchise well. The graphics are AMAZING. The level of detail in some of the characters (if not all) is a sight to be seen.

The single player campaign is way better than SC1. You have 26 missions to complete, and the story and gameplay go much more in-depth than the first game.

Overall, great game
summary: Amazing Sequel To An Amazing Game

reviewText: This game is a solid sequel to the series. I love how they have a new costume and an old school one for each character. The create a character system was a little weak this time around, but they made up for it by adding a tweaking system to the already made characters. Other than that I found this an awesome fighting game just like the rest of the series.

This game is the best fighting game I have ever played. The graphics are beautiful, the music is fantastic, and the voicework is great. The addition of Yoda makes this game even better! There is a wide range of characters, and if 32 isn't enough, create your own character with the Create a Soul mode! When you're done customizing your characters armor, hair color, weapons, skills, etc., you can take on other Soulcalibur IV players all over the world! I give this game a 9/10!

This game is awful. Everything it changes from the original is a downgrade, and it doesn't even have the full game in it! You would think that after working on it for like, 20 years they could finish the darn thing.

"OMG GRAPHICS" is pretty much the game's only redeeming point, but that doesn't make it fun to play.

This may be the best game ever made, but I wouldn't know. I pre-ordered months ago, only to find out now that Amazon doesn't plan to ship my copy until August 2nd. So glad I pre-ordered... I could walk down the street and get a copy sooner.

Never pre-ordering anything from Amazon again.
summary: Why'd I bother pre-ordering? Thanks a lot, Amazon.

reviewText:
To enjoy this game you must do two things:

Get over the absence of LAN. It sucks, but things must evolve.

Get over the fact there will be 3 installments. (the last two of which, I expect to be a bit cheaper than this one.)

If you put those two things aside, this is a great game. Dont take my word for it, read through the negative reviews. Those two things are 90% of what people don't like about it.

I haven't bought this game or even have a computer to run it, but I am mad that they don't have a LAN option and only have one campaign. The first game had 3 campaigns!  What I did see from videos on YouTube is that the game play looks solid and the graphics are very nice. I don't like that I would need an internet connection to play the game. If I ever buy a computer I won't be getting this game for sure.

I love Level 5! They were the people who brought me Dark Cloud 2 and for that, they will always hold a special place in my heart. White Knight plays like an MMO and has a fairly engaging story. I really like that you can make your own character and have them play a role in the game's story. I wish they would let me make my own knight in this game, but they added it later in White Knight 2.

I love RPG's and MMORPG's. I wish there were more of them to play. Not only for the PS3, but I'd like to see more for "MAC". This game was fun. I moved right along the story., excited to see what's next. And then it just stops. No more content. You can keep leveling up, I was hoping there was more to come, but there isn't. After a few more days of killing the stuff over and over, I got bored and shelved it.

Okay, so maybe if you're a diehard RPG player looking for 200+ hours of gameplay and endless character customization, then yes, this isn't the game for you. If you ARE looking for a fun adventure RPG with a great combat system, excellent graphics/scenery and a fun story line....then this is the game for you.
summary: Great game. Ignore the bad reviews.

reviewText: People have been asking for good rpgs on the ps3 for awhile now and WKC is an awesome addition to the PS3. Its got a pretty good single player but the multiplayer is a blast. I played multiplayer with a friend for close to 2 hours on our first time on it. Its a great game and you shouldn't hesitate to buy it if you've seen those critics reviews. Its a breath of fresh air into the PS3 library so go out there and get it.

This game is sooo real, that it makes you feel like you are actually there on an African Safari, taking pictures for the National Geographic magazine. I can't get enough of this game. My wife, who isn't interested in computer,or Playstation games loves this game too. The graphics are so real. I'm a photographer, so have that interest too. In my opinion, this is one of the best games out there.

The blue tooth headset is well worth the $60 I paid for both the game and the headset.  However the game is major turd.  I'll be trading it in for something else at gamestop or game crazy.

I knew going in it was going to be a third person shooter, but I underestimated how bad it would really be.  The sniping is ok but overall I have no desire to play this game.

The headset works great.  It has great talk time and is very clear.  It works perfectly with my cell phone too.

This game is excellent to say the least. One of the best shooters I have played in a while, as well as awesome graphics to go along with it. All of these bad reviews on it being laggy and glitchy and such have been fixed for the most part, and the rest they haven't fixed will be fixed very shortly. Even with minor lag in the game (which will be fixed in an upcoming patch) this game is A+ for your console. If you're on the edge of getting this game or not, definitely get it and you won't be dissapointed.
summary: Don't be fooled by the bad reviews!

reviewText: I was disappointed in the fact that it is an online game. You can create a group if you have enough people with the game. If you don't, you join groups already established. That can be an awkward experience considering the rude and crude language of the players. Now remember, the online content is not rated by the ESRB, but you have to play online. So if you were considering buying this game keep that in mind.

The game is fun, but if you are expecting GTA or Saint's Row type freedom to roam then you will be disappointed. It's got a great atmosphere, the 40's and 50's in the US. If you love unique settings, especially historical settings, you will love the game. The music is great, the graphics are very good, and the game plays pretty well. 4/5

I grew up playing King's Quest 7. I beat the game like 50 times. I was sitting in one of my college courses, bored out of my mind, and decided that I needed to play it again. So I got this awesome 7-pack and it cost less than if I were to get just the 7th game.

Compared to today's games, the graphics suck, the controls are difficult to use, and I loved every minute of it.  I used to play this game while my mom watched.  We would stay up until the middle of the night trying to figure out a problem.  This brought back so many memories and worked great on my Windows Vista machine.
summary: A great game from my past

reviewText: This game is full of funny wit and satire and good puzzles. It will take you on an adventure where you need to click and check things over and over, trying to figure out how to move on to the next step. the stories are fun and the characters are usually pretty good. they just don't make games like this anymore and it's a shame!

I don't play electronic games, for the most part, but years ago, as a graduate student, I remember playing one of the King's Quest games. Since then, I have never seen anything else quite like it, with the same mix of puzzles and adventure. If you also enjoyed playing these games, then you will love this package. It's all that you remember!
summary: Still fun after all these years

reviewText: So I only had the original pad with me when I first bought the game. Every once in a while, my friends would ask if they can play... well, you can see the problem here. This is a wonderful game :D Thanks for the pad!
summary: YES! Now I can play with my friends!

reviewText:
I picked up this kit off the shelf at a Best Buy, and I have to say it is brilliant. The silver cover fits and matches my psp 3000 perfectly and the battery lasts a very long time.

I'll admit I haven't done any real tests on just how long this battery will last, but in my anecdotal testing I definitely believe it will get the advertised 8 hours.

Not much more to say about this, if you want your psp to run all day buy this.

I haven't even been able to drain this battery yet, so I can't complain.

The only negative I have about it is even the though the additional weight is next to nothing, you notice it in your hands after a while. But the extra life is worth it.

My four year old son loves playing this game. He hasn't seen any of the Indiana Jones movies yet, but he loves figuring out the puzzles and getting through each level.
