He likes the fact that the Lego Star Wars characters are hidden throughout the game. He gets excited when he sees them.

If your kids or you like the Lego Star Wars games, this game is a must.
summary: Lego Indiana Jones-Great game for kids

reviewText:
Picked up this and a number of other Lego titles for my son's 9th birhday.  We've played a number of the Lego titles and we all enjoy playing them.

To the point, we find these games good, clean fun.  On top of that, we've not experienced glitches, freeze-ups or other problems while playing.

As to which of the Lego titles is "the best", I'll leave that up to you to decide.  We've had fun with all of the ones we've played (Batman, Indy, Harry Potter, Lord of the Rings, ...).
summary: Like a lot of games, this was exactly what my son wanted!

reviewText: I was thrilled with this game for my grandson. He loves it. It is so nice to have a game for kids which does not have all the graphic violence. He loves to play with his legos and build things so this is so nice for him as well.

We've got Lego Star Wars and Lego Indiana Jones, and I want to get Lego Harry Potter. But from what I have experienced, Lego Indiana Jones is definitely the best. My six-year-old son and I really like playing the game. There is a lot of humor, the storyline follows the movies really well, and I look forward to earning more points each time through. Highly recommended!
summary: The best Lego video game ever!

reviewText: All right, all right, I grew up on the movies.  I was like 9 when Raiders came out.  So, there is some nostalgia value here.  But this is a great game from what little I've played.  This is fun in the same vein as the Lego Star Wars game.  Very tongue in cheek.  Good enough for a laugh and challenging enough to make you want to keep playing.

This is a great game, at first I wasn't sure I was going to like it because I usually prefer puzzle games but my son really wanted it so I bought it. I love the game you have to search for spots and clues and maps which makes it interesting. Even my 6 year old son loves it, we each have played it a lot but haven't been able to finish it yet. Would recommend for any age, its real fun.

I first got this game thinking it would be stupid.  I rented it from the library and after playing it, I loved it so much, I had to buy it.  I'm not even a super huge fan of Indiana Jones, but the game is so fun for any age and like any LEGO game, is adorable and funny.  If you're considering it, buy it!

I purchased this game for my son who is 7 years old.  He has a love of all things LEGO and so I decided that this would be a good game to get for him.  He now has a new-found LOVE for Indiana Jones as well.  He loved all the action in it and has enjoyed this game very much.  I would definitely reccommend it.

I bought this game for my 6.5-year-old son. Here is his review...
It is a good game. I like it less than Lego Clone Wars, but I still enjoy playing it. I'm still learning how to play it and so far think it is fun.

The Lego games are fun, adorable without being childish, and challenging to play.  I love that you don't "die," your character flies apart, and you lose points, but you pick up right where you left off.  The challenge is solving puzzles and collecting points, not survival, which makes the game even more fun and less frustrating than many other games.  I am a fan of Indiana Jones, and it's fun to see how they handle integrating the story into a cool game.
summary: I love all the Lego games

reviewText: I remember about 3 years ago I used to play the demo for this game for hours on end, and I really wanted to buy it. After some time I forgot about this game, but ever since I bought it I've had so much fun with this game. Truly one of the best games for PS3.

Had a cheapo one from the grocery store. My sister-in-law had this one and it was very sharp and wasn't rusty, like my store one. This is very nice and very sharp. I do put in the top shelf of my dishwasher too. Over all I am very pleased with this purchase.

I had looked all over for these at party supply stores, only to find that they were for mail order only. So as I often do, I turned to Amazon and found just what i needed. the best part is that they were prime eligible. I could not have asked for better.

I bought this as a gift for my sister and she absolutely loves it! It is really pretty hanging on the outside of the house and it has been quite durable. Highly recommended if you have a dolphin lover in the family!

I am the owner of two cats, they are both a year old. When I first adopted the two of them only one of them would eat the dry food I put out for them. (They both ate wet food however.) My partner was given a few free samples of Wysong Cat food at a pet store and when I put it out for my cats I was surprised to see my cat that does not regularly like dry food eating it. It was at that moment that I ordered the bag of Wysong from Amazon.com and will continue to order it.

My mom wanted a cross for her room.  I saw this after much searching.  I loved it right away but I was worried it wouldn't look as nice on arrival.  But when it got here I was nicely surprised.  It's even prettier in person and has a nice weight to it.  My mom fell in love with it immediately.  Of course, I was thrilled.  Thank you!
summary: Really nice, especially as a gift

reviewText: So glad I got this. Boils water in no time. This is preferable to a plastic kettle because it imparts no odd taste to the water. I have had this kettle for months now and have never had a problem with it. If it does ever go out on me I will replace it with the same item.

I have searched high and low for this Jack Daniel's coffee, and as typical, I found it on Amazon!  I am a die-hard Starbucks fan, but for home brewed coffee, this is the best!  I received my order on time and feel it was a great deal. I am making my second order soon!

I bought this for my husband for Valentine's Day.  He is a coffee addict and was given a small sampler size for Christmas.  We couldn't find it anywhere until I tried here on Amazon.  As soon as it came he opened it up and went straight to the coffee maker.  He says it is some of the best coffee he has ever had!

The product description clearly states the size of the bear, but upon receiving it in person, I was pleasantly surprised at just how big the bear is! He's almost twice as big as the standard "large" Gund Snuffles bears. He's big, super-soft and cuddly, and has a unique two-toned fur that makes him different from other Gund Snuffles bears. For the price, this bear is a great bargain, and is sure to put a smile on anyone's face.

I gave this set to my four-year-old son and he loves it, as do his daddy and I.  The only problem is that he made something that took almost all the pieces and he likes it so much he won't take it apart!  Now we have to get another set for his birthday so the grown-ups can play, too.  If you get these (and I highly recommend them), get a lot; everyone will want them, especially if you have a house full of builders and geometers like we do.

This is not really a sleeve, but it is somewhat like a laptop case. If you are looking for durable case/sleeve then should be the one to buy. I am using it with my Macbook and it fits it perfectly. Plus you can store the Macbook charger and other accessories (headphones, wallet, etc.) in the side pocket. I recommend it for all.

This is an excellent game for individuals who casually enjoy a video game now and again.  Anyone can pick up the controller and enjoy the game without trying to memorize what all the buttons are for (Note: just press the "X" button as quickly as possible).  My wife and I have played Dynasty Warriors 4 on the Xbox, and we feel that Dynasty Warriors 6 is just as fun and enjoyable.

I've been looking to get this game since it's backwards compatible on the Xbox One, and I was happy to see this digital code for $6.  Gamestop is selling the game used for $15, so I got to save some money and don't have a disc to worry about.  It does get mailed to you physically, but I didn't mind waiting the two days for it to arrive.  I was even able to enter the code directly with my Xbox One and have it start downloading, so I'm happy I went with this option!

This is still one of my favorite games ever. The ending is a bit confusing but the premise and tension are great. If you have not played this classic you should pick it up asap. I wish they would make a sequel already.........
summary: This is still one of my favorite games ever

reviewText: I am a gamer and was unsure how I would feel about this game because I am a major fan of all things Zelda and a major fan of the Fables and didn't think it would be up to par.  However, I was pleasantly surprised, this game is a great puzzle game.  I highly recommend it!
summary: this game is a great puzzle game

reviewText:
I bought Alan Wake the day it came out and it is still one of the best gaming experiences I've had with the Xbox 360.

The episodic thriller story did a great job sucking me in. It reminded me a lot of the film "In the Mouth of Madness" and playing similarly to Max Payne.

If you like Alan Wake I also recommend the two DLCs "The Signal" and "The Writer" each adding a couple hours more of story and game play.

'Alan Wake's American Nightmare' is also a fun side story!
summary: Still One of the Best Gaming Experiences I've had with the Xbox 360

reviewText: I purchased this game the day before Christmas. It has arrived earlier than expected, in perfect condition, with unused game codes included (I did not pay extra for this and was not told it would be included, it was a very, very pleasant surprise). I'm not very far into the game but I'm extremely happy with the seller, and hope to continue to enjoy the game.

This is a fun game, but I won't review the game since you can find a lot of reviews elsewhere.  Instead, I'll review the method of delivery.

I wan unsure if this would be a scam since it was so cheap.  It is not a scam, you are sent what looks like a DVD card with a pull tab on the back that you can redeem on XBOX Live to download the game.  You need about 7GB free to download it, but it is a great way to get this game cheap!

I played this game and I was blown away. I knew it was good from the reviews but was still amazed at the quality and fun of this game. It has a very good story, characters, graphics, you name it. In fact it is one of the best games I ever played. It can get quite scary at times but its really fun and gripping. There are also some funny moments which are hilarious! If you have an xbox you have no excuse not to play this game.

I was very suprised how good this game is.  The best story of any video game I've ever played by far.  If I would have bought it day one for $60, I would have still felt it was a good purchase.  For this price, it's a must play.

This game is awesome.  At $22, the price is even better!  It's exactly what i was looking for.  What I ordered is what came to me. What more could I ask for?

Just a quick thought: The game is rated T for Teen so there's no crazy amounts of gore;  BUT don't get me wrong, this game will give you the chills and plays for hours.
summary: Great price for a great game

reviewText: I played this game like 5 months ago so I have to think back but this is honestly one of the best single player games the Xbox 360 has to offer. It plays in a tv show kind of style which is really cool. I typically have a short attention span when it comes to video games but I played the game for probably 10 hours straight when I got it. Kind of scary game but it's pretty cool. I haven't ran into many games that kept my interest like this one. Really fun and enjoyable, I highly recommend it.
summary: One of the best story lines on the 360.

reviewText: This game took me by surprise as one of the best stories in a video game I have ever seen. I think I liked it so much because of the fact that it was so similar to David Lynch's pseudo-soap opera/mystery thriller Twin Peaks. But the whole game was awesome and it was just like reading a good book which is what I think the aim was supposed to be.

If you love horror games or want to see your wife/girlfriend jump, you have to get this game.  This has been the best horror game I have played in a very long time.  The story is outstanding.  The voice acting is top notch.  And lets not forget, Previously on Alan Wake!!!!  Get this game, you won't regret it!!

Great game, great gameplay, great story. I love how it plays out like a movie series. It's a very original, moderately suspenseful game. I had a great time playing and I want to go find the soundtrack for it because the music was amazing as well. 5 Stars! I can't wait to finish my deployment so I can download the bonus material!

This is the first game I have ever played that has this unique gameplay. I love the intense storyline and the interesting characters. I also love how they set it up as if you were watching a TV show with different episodes. At first I wasn't sure if I was going to like this game but I have had so much fun with it and have recomended it to all my friends.

It is well done visually, controls are smooth and simple. Its a great game, superb story, and a very much needed change of pace from all the other games out now. Highly recommended for anyone who wants to try something new, or a hardcore gamer looking for some new flavor.

Alan Wake is one of the best gaming experiences ever. It is scary, it is thrilling, it is beautiful--it has it all. If you are on the fence with this game, then I highly suggest that you just dive in and gamble on it. It's a little on the short side, but the game is so good that you might be influenced to replay it. The 2nd time is slightly altered on the higher difficulty, as well.

The game is reallllyyy underrated. Buy this game!
summary: This game is so, so amazing.

reviewText: A pleasant suprise, not only did my 11 year old daughter love this game (which was her Christmas gift) so did the rest of the family, including my 14 year old son. It's quite addictive and my son was pleased with the varied songs available on the game. All in all you can't go wrong with this game.
summary: Great fun for the whole family

reviewText: i love this game too much. Last night i received it in the mail and i was on it all night, knowing that I had to get up the next morning early for work. I am 21 yrs old and i love this game. I mean everything is still the same about the game, but the songs are the only thing different. The one thing is that the eyetoy usb wasn't included like i thought it was. I love this game. I would recommend this game to anyone who loves to sing, or just do karaoke.....

Pata-pata-pata-pon!

This game was easy to pick up and hard to put down.  If you own a PSP, you owe it to yourself to try this game.

Just checked the price -- in February 2014, you can own a *new game* for $2.00... It costs less than a cup of coffee!  If you are on the fence, buy it now and you won't regret your choice. :)

I don't want to say a lot, because as with every video game there's a ton of reviews for it. All you need to know is that Patapon is one of the best games for the PSP, if not the best (Patapon 2 might beat it out if anything). Not to mention you can't beat this price!

I just had to write to recommend this game, I am usually a fan of the Ratchet and Clank games but I can't seem to put this one down to play those. It can be challenging at times, took me awhile to figure out the rain juju, and I agree with other reviewers that says a tutorial would have been a good enhancement. But there is no mistaking that this is a very fun and original game and a must own for the PSP, part two is coming out in May, can't wait!

This game is great.  One of my favorite co-op experiences ever.  Can go through the entire campaign with a friend.  There is also the co-op terrorist hunt mode( also can be done single player) which I spent most of my time on.  My only real complaint was that there was no map editor.  Would have loved to be able to play user made content.  Don't know if we'll ever see a Rainbow Six Vegas 3 but we can hope.
summary: This game is great. One of my favorite co-op experiences ever

reviewText: Great game. Unfortunately, you need to mess with it to get it to be playable with a controller, but I didn't really mind that as not everyone plays with a controller. Also, this game is not available through steam when bought on amazon. that was a bummer, but not the game's fault.

I enjoyed this game much more than the first one. It took me years to finish the first game because I became stuck at certain points. I was able to finish this game in a reasonable amount of time and am enjoying playing it at higher levels.

I first played this back when it came out, renting it from Blockbuster (heh). Then I bought it for my Xbox 360. Played it some more. Then my friend got it for his PS3. Played it some more. Then in 2013 I bought it for my PS3, and it is still just as fun. I don't really remember the campaign story at all, but terrorist hunt is really all you need. The ability to customize your loadout for every level, before every match, is loads of fun.
summary: No matter how many times I play it, still fun.

reviewText:
The good:
-Great co-op modes, tons of fun with 4 players.
-Lots of intense action in competitive multiplayer
-Plenty of weapons
-Amazing customization options for your character

The bad:
-Graphics are a bit behind, textures sometimes lag
-Steep learning curve for some

Overall, this is the best tactical FPS on the PS3. If you're tired of games like COD, try this out.
summary: As far as tactical shooters go, this is king.

reviewText: I love this game so much.  I cannot wait til the next one comes out, if there is going to be a next one.  I hope it is because this is, hands down, my favorite game to play at the moment.  Only downfall is that it does have small glitches from time to time, but most games do.

I'm late to the Assassin's Creed series, but I am hooked now. Great story, great game, can get somewhat frustrating when you are fighting off a lot of mobs, but once you get the hang of it, even that isn't too bad. Looking forward to catching up on the series!

This game is a must play. The music, storyline, graphics... everything still impresses me even though it was released almost six years ago. The one tiny bug I encountered though was with launching it under Steam. If you add it as a non-Steam game to your library, you need to select the game executable itself. Selecting the Assassin's Creed Launcher will cause a crash when you try to play the game. Other than that, I'm very happy with this purchase.

This game is simply amazing. Based on the current price everyone should buy it. It is a great game with a great story line. I will warn you however, if you play the first game you will love it and then you will find yourself purchasing them all. I purchased this game through amazon and it was shipped very quickly.

Bought this for my 4 year old's new DS. The DS has been dropped twice with this on it and the worst that happened was that the top cover popped off. It did a great job of protecting the unit. Not a single scratch! Not even on the clear case. This is way more durable than it looks. Plus it's not so bulky that it gets in the way or prevents it from fitting in the mini folio I bought for it. This is a great buy for your kid's DS!

I got Master Poker a couple weeks ago and it's brilliant. I love it. Congrats on making the best poker AI I've ever seen. I can't believe it took me so long to find it. This lets me practice new techniques & strategies without risking a dime.

This item was great and worth the 8 bucks I paid for it.  The feel is very nice, smooth and velvety.  The fit is perfect: because there are holes cut out in the cover to accommodate the buttons, at first I thought at first that the edges of the holes would be loose and curl up in an annoying way, but they didn't.  They stayed down flat.  The color is just as depicted in the picture.

Great game. Our 5 year old son loves this game, and so do his father and I.  We can all play it together.  It's challenging for my son and promotes his problem-solving skills, but it's certainly not too difficult for him.  He is able to read, however.  Some friends of ours with children the same age find the game a bit more difficult because they can't read; but it doesn't prevent them from being able to play and enjoy it.

I looked everywhere for this game, and the only place we could find it for a reasonable price was here at amazon.  My grandson was so excited to get this game for Christmas.  We were so pleased with the price we paid, although it wasn't fulfilled by amazon, it was listed on the menu options.  Thanks amazon!

This game is a lot of fun to play. I have had a chance to play the xbox 360 and the PC version. I prefer the 360 version.
In this game, you get to ride elephants, battle lego Arabs, Chinese, Indians, Build lego structures, solve puzzles, and collect coins.
It is fun to play co-op mode with family and friends. Definitely a recommended purchase!

This is a great game. It's suitable for all ages, even adults. The game has excellent level design; it's challenging enough to be fun but not frustrating. The graphics are as good as they can be an still be recognizably Lego. The game features clever and interesting twists on the original story. There are a number of amusing moments. I can't wait until Lego Batman comes out!
summary: Great game in a great series

reviewText: We've played the other Lego Star Wars games for the xbox360 and really enjoyed playing them. It's rare to have a game that the entire family can enjoy playing together. the puzzles within the game are challenging and fun.
summary: it's fun for my 4 year old, my wife, and ME!!!

reviewText: I am a big fan of the LEGO game series, if you liked the LEGO Star wars you will enjoy this game. Sometimes the AI can be a bit too accurate with projectiles, it makes it a bit frustrating at times, but all in all it oozes LEGO comedy awesomeness.
summary: If you love LEGO Star Wars or the Indiana Jones movies, this game is for you!!

reviewText:
Crisis Core takes place before FF7, it shows us who Zack is and more about what he did for Cloud. It also is about Aerith and Zack's realtionship and why they are together at the end of Advent Children.
This game is a very good game. The ONLY problem I would have to say is it too short of a game, and it is very hard to level up. But other then that it is the best game ever! All in all if you like Final Fantasy games you should like this one! And the graphics are awesome!

This is the first Final Fantatsy Game that I've ever played, and I love it.  I'm 26, but I wish I had gotten into the series sooner, because this is just an all around great game.  The storyline is great, the audio and visuals for the PSP are fantastic, and I really enjoy the combat modes.  I'm only about 10% done with the game, but it's the best game I've played for PSP yet.  Anyone who is into Action/RPG, get this!

I am not a fan of the Final Fantasy series but i really love this game. I love it story, picture and sound effect. It is the best PSP game i play except the Monster Hunter 1 and 2. The game is quite easy at the beginning but if you want to finish all the mission, it will very hard. If you want only to finish the story, it will be very easy and you can finish it in around 30-40 level in the normal model however, i feel satisfied the game. It is worth what it cost. I will play the hard model in the future.

This is the prequel to the amazingly popular PS1 game, Final Fantasy VII. I thought this game was quite fun and unlike the first time I played the PS version, not too difficult. The storyline, though a little confusing at the end, is quite good. So is the sidequest segment of this game. A lot of it is the same after awhile, but if you don't mind that, you should really enjoy this game!

This game is freakin awesome! I have much more respect for Zack since I barely knew him. He made me smile and laugh a lot! I recommend this game to everyone. It has awesome battle scenes, good friends to aid you, and great special moves. You should TOTALLY buy this game! If you don't, then what will your tell your friends? I mean, really, its an awesome game so BUY IT! It's totally worth your money!

Crisis Core: Final Fantasy VII, in my opinion, is the best PSP game yet. The characters, AMAZING graphics, materia, story, world, music, everything about it is amazing. If you have a PSP, you would be missing out on a lot of fun if you don't get this game!
summary: Crisis Core is the Best Game Yet for PSP

reviewText: It was a little shakey at first getting used to the different control aspects of this game vs the other past games but after you play it for a while you not only get used to it but for me the game has become super addicting; is defiently one of the greatest PSP games out there to date and I would recommend it to anyone thats looking for a good one and you don't have to be a fan of the series to really enjoy the game.
summary: Great game especially for fans of the series

reviewText: An Amazing headset. Very cheat and very good. Has amazing mike quality and has a superb battery life! When I first bought this, it looked small and bad, but when I started using it for gaming, it was an amazing mike! I loved it so much and it can be used on any device. I am using it for my computer, my PS3, PS4, Ipad, and Samsung Galaxy S6 EDGE.

This mic is amazing, I've had mine for a few months now and I never had a problem with it and I can wear it for hours and it never gets uncomfortable. I would definitely recommend this to anyone who loves to play video games.

Works great. Ordered it 7 months ago and it still works fine. I've bought a total of 3. One for my best friend, one for myself, and one for my brother in law. Everyone's still works great. We play a lot of call of duty black ops 2 & it's held up great.

This headset was perfectly good and did exactly what I wanted it to...for about 2 months. Then it stopped charging at all. So, if you're looking for a headset for just a liiiiittle bit, this thing will be perfect for you. If you want to spend your money on something that will last, I can't recommend this product.

You can't go wrong with this deal! Item arrived fast and it was up and running within in an hour! (i set it on the charger to ensure functionality) I ordered this for my son to use on his PS3, but I have used it several times and it works great! I will be ordering a second one soon!

If you're nerd enough to get a headset, then you might also be nerd enough to get a nice sound system so that when you're pwning some unsuspecting nubz, you can hear them squeal and whine as they die like dogs on the battlefield. Unfortunately I have to turn my sound system down to a whisper in order to hear voice chat in this headset. If you want to be able to hear your teammates loud and clear, go with a better headset.

I bought this headset for my little brother for his birthday. He loves using it during his war games and he says he can hear everyone clearly and everyone hears him just fine as well. The only downfall is it's a little big for his ear and can sometimes feel "loose" to him. He's 12 though and needs to "grow into it". It fits on my ear just fine (I'm in my 20's). It's so nice for the price! I was impressed compared to other models. He hardly even needs to charge it either.

For $17 I couldn't have asked for anything more. The sound is great and the ear piece is comfortable. It doesnt even feel like its there. Its wireless, so you can get up if you need to get a drink or something and step away from the game. The sound quality isn't amazing, but its good enough to talk to people in online game play. Shipping was fast, it took less than 5 minutes to synch to my PS3, and it holds a charge for quite some time. I really couldn't have found a better product for such a low cost.

If you are looking for something cheaper than the normal PS3 headset, stop looking and just buy this one. It works fantastic. Now if you are looking for something that you can hear the rest of the game very well in, get something else, but if you just need something to talk into for in-game comms, just buy this. Its cheaper, its battery I think is a little better than they advertise, and it fits very well.
summary: Have a PS3 and need a headset? Buy this

reviewText: A great headset.  A must own for all PS3 gamers.  The device is extremely comfortable, and within minutes you will not know that it's there behind your ear.  The voices are crystal clear.  The battery lasts around 4 hours long, so you'll need to keep it recharged via the supplied micro USB cable.  I do wish that the battery is bigger, so that the headset will last twice as long between charges.  5 stars either way for such an affordable device.
summary: A must have for FPS games like MAG

reviewText: This headset is great! I got two, one for me, and one for my brother. When he talks in the game, I can hear him on mine perfectly. The sound quality is great and the headset is very comfortable. I highly recommend this headset! It is great quality and for a great price.

This game is the one that made me finally decide to switch to video gaming.  I'm tired of paying $50 for a PC game and it turns out to be unplayable. This is one of the worst games I have ever seen. The controls are terrible. So I went out and bought an XBOX 360 and hooked it up to my monitor and speakers. It looks and sounds great. Also I noticed the price on this game has dropped $20 since it was released just over a month ago.  That should tell you something.
summary: Alone in the Dark is now Alone in the TRASH

reviewText: I was given "Star Wars: The Force Unleashed II" for my birthday in early November. I really like this game. Thinking, "Star Wars: The Unleashed"  would be just as good, it isn't.  After reading all the good reviews, I ordered it and received this game yesterday. Tried to play it right after arrival and discovered it was the worst game I have ever played.

Honestly I beat the game the first time in a weekend. It has a good storyline, great controls, and really entertaining gameplay. The only con to the game is the poor graphics, but that's what I get for buying the Wii version.

This is one of the worst games I have ever played. I own the 2nd one and absolutely love it, I figured the first one would be equally fun to play. However, I was wrong. With disappointing graphics and slow game play, I wouldnt suggest anyone buy this game.

There was something about this game that had me obsessed with it for a long time.  Great story line, intense (but not too difficult) challenges, and awesome game features.  I really enjoyed playing this game from start to finish, as it keeps a good pace and doesn't drag out the plot.  Highly recommended for any Star Wars fan.
summary: Best Video Game I've ever played

reviewText:
This is a great game.  It is an ABSOLUTE MUST for any starwars fan, or anyone who loves gaming in general.  It has great graphics, an amazing story, and fun gameplay. You should seriously get this game.
HAPPY GAMING, AND GO NINTENDO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

I just finished the game and it was so much fun.  I loved it.  I know some people complained but I did not have any problems with it, except I wish I could play through to beat the characters, but that being said.  This game is exactly what it is intended for...fun!!  I hope they make another!!

I was looking forward to this game, and then my PS3 died. Well I sent back in the PS3 for repair and bought the game on the Wii instead. Yes the graphics are not as good as the PS3 but the game play is awesome. The dual lightsaber fighting game is fun for my wife and I to play. Then if I'm alone, I can play the story game. I have only owned the game for a couple of days, and I am a casual player, because I am a grown man who works a salary job. It's great down time to play this game.

I had a lot of fun with this game! Some of my friends didn't like it but you have to appreciate the way the game was made. Simply awesome. I hope they make a part two 'cause the ending of part one was awesome and I would LOVE to see what they come up next in part two!

The game doesn't follow the movie very closely, and the graphics during the movies are a bit bad, but the gameplay is nothing but a good time.  I highly recommend this to anyone who's not really picky about things, and is looking for a good superhero game to play.  A great purchase.

This game is really fun. I had a wonderful time playing this game and I think everyone should play it. The story is fun to play and the achievements are fun to get. The achievements upgrades your skills, which comes useful in the story mode. I would buy this game agian, really fun.

I haven't personally played this game, but I bought it for my husband.  He has a ton of playstation games but rarely finds time to play any of them.  I remember the first PS2 Hulk game that came out a few years ago was a big hit with him, so I decided to take a chance on this one too.  He LOVES it! I swear I didn't see the whites of his eyes for about 2 weeks straight because he was so addicted to the game and having so much fun playing it.

reviewerName: Oreo Cookie Chocolate Peanut Butter Pie 2018
reviewText: This game is awesome. I love this game. i'm glad they made a decent iron man game. and it's based on the movie. I like all the cool stuff you can do as iron man. this game is tons of fun. if you have not played this game then I recommend you do

I have had it with this game. I bought it to have fun and just getting started is a pain in the neck. Every time I open the game and try to continue gameplay, it resets to the beginning. I know it's because I don't meet the time objectives, but give me a break. This was supposed to be fun. It's not. My copy will be on eBay later today.

I got this for my husband and we use a zapper to play.  My husband plays it for hours and has a wonderful time.  I enjoy it, too.  There are several levels of difficulty as well as different settings.  My 7 year old plays sometimes.  It is easy to understand and start playing immediately.  I highly recommend it!

The beauty of this product is in its user-friendliness. It works exactly like the guitar that came with the game. Just insert the remote in the guitar and select 2-player mode and you're on your way to a guitar duel.

Maybe it's a bit premature to say, as I am about 50% through the game, but I am thoroughly enjoying it. The game mechanics are quite nice, as is the combat system. The story is fun, immersive, and well acted. I am really enjoying reliving some of that "magic" I enjoyed as a kid playing D&D back before there were "computer games." Even though this is a computer game, it's a great way for us adults to relive the fun without having to resort to visiting a gaming center, complete with sweaty teenagers.

I own the older version and played it often but this newer version is great. To put it lightly I play it daily and it never gets boring or tiresome. Many games I play a few times, they get old and I look for something else and it sits on the shelf. Not this one. If you enjoy this type of game I highly recommend it.

I've been playing these games for a few years now. I have to say that I have yet to find one that impresses me... They are very glitchy and I just don't think the company is dedicated to this franchise.

I purchased this adapter after my original one stopped working.  This one works great and has not failed as other reviews suggest.  It is a lot lighter than the original adapter and that probably says something about the quality of the product, but I have not seen a difference yet.  I do not use my Wii very often (twice a week maybe), and this may have helped with the longevity of the product.  A good deal!

This adapter, along with a plug adapter, made it possible for my wife and I to bring our Wii with us when we went to South Korea. It always worked reliably.

It is very light and seems to be almost hollow, but it worked well for us.

I gave it a high rating because I am a fan of the Silent Hill franchise. The game play is similar to previous games. The overall atmosphere is dark and ominous. Some of the puzzles are difficult to complete because there are no indicators to guide you throughout the game. If you have never played any previous games, you are not missing anything. None of the games have any continuing story. Each game is independent.

I am a pretty big Silent Hill fan and have been playing these games since the first one hit the shelves. This game really is a lot of fun although it isn't as challenging as the previous games (what games are these days?) and it is nice to revisit some places from the very first Silent Hill. It helps connect some of the story but at the same time in other places it feels a little forced.
Overall if you are a fan of Silent Hill 1 I think you will really enjoy this game!

I definitely think everyone who has a wii needs two wii remotes with nunchucks.
This is a regular nintendo wii remote with nunchuck, exactly like the one that comes in the box with the wii.
We can't tell the difference between the two, they both work exactly how they should, so no complaints!

Have fun playing wii!
summary: Wii remote and nunchuck are a must have for your wii

reviewText: I bought this cable for my daughter who accidentally bent the prongs on her old one. She is very happy to have her Wii up and running again, so she highly recommend this cable. I recommend the price too, which was very reasonable.

They're cheap for a reason. We got two, opened the first one and tried to plug it in, but it was kind if hard to push it in and it had to be in the right position to even charge. We tried the second one and it fit better, but had the same issue with charging. Definitely better to just spend the extra money and buy a higher quality plug.

I seem to have bad luck with Play and Charge cables.  They work for about six months, then they just won't connect to the controller any more.

This one works just as well as the Microsoft ones, but comes in at a fraction of the price.

I will buy another one when this one stops working.  It's more cost effective.

Very good quality A/V cable for use with the Wii gaming console.  The product arrived in excellent condition and worked perfectly straight out of the box.  For the price, this was an excellent replacement, and I would definitely recommend to others considering to purchase.

I used this for my Playstation 2, so I could get better video for my HDTV.
It works as you'd expect. You can get up to 1080i, but the only game that allows that, is Gran Turismo 4.
Otherwise, you can only get 480i, unless the games you have allow 480p.

Check out this wikipedia page for more information:
[...]

I just bought an Xbox 360 and the cable for it works great so far. I know it's not HD, but it works perfectly with my TV here at college. I can't really afford a new TV with HD. Anyways, hope the cable lasts a long time for me.

It did not fit my Xbox 360. I read the reviews of others getting the wrong plug and they were able to exchange it for the proper one. I was only given the option for a refund. Too bad it didn't work because the price was right.

I received an Xbox 360 as a gift and it only had an HDMI cable, so I needed to purchase an AV cable for my TV.
Works just the way it's supposed to. Haven't had any problems. Movies and games look great.

I purchased this as a replacement to my original dance mat that was included in my bundle. It works great, however you can tell it is a little lighter than the original. So far it is working really well, however I am not sure if the lighter material is better or not, so I guess we will see. Also the price was really good under $30.

I bought this so I could have a 2nd player for Hottest Party 2, and it doesn't work with this game. I'd assume there would more than likely be a warning of some sort on the product description, but there isn't. I didn't realize this until it was too late to send it back (it stayed in my closet for a few months).

I purchased 3 of these a month ago and still haven't used them.  As soon as I opened the box, I was knocked out by the fumes so I quickly took them out to the garage to prevent my 2 babies from breathing the fumes.  Today I finally decided to bring them inside even though there was still a lingering odor.  Upon unfolding them, I was again knocked out by the fumes.  So they are back in the garage unfolded.  Hopefully I can try them out soon.
summary: Stinky chemical odor strong enough to give you a migraine

reviewText:
James is under 13 so he can't,so I called him and he said:
"This was better than I thought it would be. It's my favorite Wii accessory. Even though, it would be best to have two guns when you are playing with someone, if you put the wii remore inside the gun, it will hit the button on the wii remote, so both can play. When you press the trigger with the Wii remote inside it, it actually feels like you are shooting a gun because you are hitting the wii remote."
summary: My grandson should be reviewing this

reviewText: We got this game for our 2 year old for Christmas.  She always wants to play wii, but most games are too hard for her.  This game is perfect!  She and her 5 year old sister play it all the time and really enjoy playing it.
summary: Great for 2 year olds and older kids

reviewText: This game is perfect for my 5 year old son (even his older brother likes to play this one).  It's not too hard, but not too easy either.  It's got plenty of intrigue to hold their attention- they play this game often enough that I know it's a good one.

This was purchased for my 3-year-old. She loves the game. Asks to play it frequently, although we've tried to implement a rule that it is only for special treats. That said, it is relatively easy for her to understand. If she plays it a bit too long (more than 20 minutes), she does start to get frustrated and ask for help.

Based on other games available for toddlers, I think this is a great start for any toddler.

The game is an absolute must for those who own a Wii and have a young child who wants to play.  I recently got a Wii and the game I got was tough for my four year old.  He was discouraged and crying.  He felt he could not win and didn't like players dying.  I was refered to this game and it is so great.  My son can play by himself and he is so happy.  He loves the game.  Since the game is easier to play it doesn't take long to finish, but my son plays over and over.  Definite buy.
summary: Must Buy for young Wii players

reviewText: I was looking for a game my 3yo could play and this one is great!  It's just like watching the show except you actually have to do the things they prompt you to do.  I went through the first adventure with my kid to get him used to what he's supposed to do, but after that he could play it all by himself.  He loves it!!

In spite of being a big soccer fan, I was a bit hesitant about buying a soccer game with Wii's hand held controls for a leg controlled sport. After reading great reviews about the game, I bought it a couple of days back and was very pleased with the purchase. The Wii controls are pretty fun and the training mode prepares you well. The only thing that would beat this is having an Wiimote attachment to your leg. But for now, this is great fun!
summary: Great soccer game for the Wii!

reviewText: I bought this cable assuming I would be able to play PSP games on my TV with it, but, when I get it I find that it only shows movies and other stuff on my TV...NOT GAMES!  DO NOT BUY THE AV CABLE if you want to play games on your TV with your PSP.  BUY THE COMPONENT CABLE which allows you to play games !

THIS GAME IS AWESOME!!! YOU GET TO TAKE A GROUP OF GUYS AND DO STUFF!!! YOU GET TO MOVE AROUND AND THINGS LIKE THAT AND KILL STUFF!!! YOU CAN EVEN OPEN STUFF TO GET STUFF AND IT PLAYS MUSIC AND SHOWS YOU PICTURES AND STUFF THAT EVEN TALK!!! BETWEEN BATTLES STUFF TALKS ALSO!!! THIS GAME IS COOL BECAUSE OF ALL THE STUFF YOU GET TO DO!!! IF YOU LIKE DOING STUFF IN GAMES, THEN THIS GAME IS FOR YOU!!! GO BUY IT AND START DOING STUFF TODAY!!!
summary: THE BEST SRPG ON THE XBOX 360!

reviewText: This is a great baseball game for the PSP! The graphics are crisp and the controls are easy to use. Also it has the "road to the show" mode where you can create a player and guide him from the minors all the way to the bigs.  The level of depth in this is really awesome and it's truly addictive. I am so glad I made this purchase, you will not be disappointed!!
summary: Great Baseball game for the PSP

reviewText: I HAVE ALL OF TWISTED METAL GAMES FOR PLAYSTATION.  TWISTESTED III IS BY FAR THE BEST, IN MY IN MY OWN OPINION.  TWISTED METAL BLACK IS GOOD BUT THE GRAPHICS ARE TOO DARK.  TWISTED METAL: HEAD ON IS MUCH LIKE TWISTED METAL BLACK, BUT WITH A LITTLE FAST PACE.  I WOULD RECOMMEND PURCHASING THIS GAME
summary: TWISTED METAL: HEAD ON, EXTRA TWISTED EDITION

reviewText: This port of the original PSP game is incredibly disappointing. It's not so much that Size Matters is a bad installment in the series; on the PSP it's a superior product to be sure. But this port is awful. It's filled with slowdown, the graphics are terrible and the camera is broken. There's some enjoyment to be had but certainly not for $30. I can't even recommend it to fans of the series. Either grab the PSP version or wait to pick it up in the bargain bin of your local game store.

How Sony would allow their name to be attached to this game and sully the reputation of the Ratchet and Clank series is beyond me. This game is just plain bad. Being a port from the PSP is no excuse for them to let something like this get released. If you ignore my warning and get this game on the precious merits of the rest of the Ratchet and Clank series, you will be sorely disappointed.

I bought this game for my grandson.  He called to tell me the game was "awesome".  My daughter says when he is playing this game he is laughing a lot.  So I would assume it is very entertaining to a 10 year old.  Thanks Amazon for helping to make my grandson happy.

I bought this sensor as an extra so that I wouldn't have to move the wires when I took the wii other places. I am very disappointed in this sensor. It will not sense the remote if it is more than 7 ft. away. The seller was very nice and sent me a new one but the new one was just as bad.

My daughter loves this. She bought this with her own money and was pleasantly suprised when it arrived in the mail. I don't use it, but she is 12 and loves it.

The cool thing about this is it has all the DS connectors you could need and the car charger in one nice little package.

I liked this thing right out of the box. It is really neat looking. The retractable cord is pretty sweet too. I've only used this with my psp and ds. the only annoying thing about this product is the bright blue light that comes on when you plug it in. It's not too bad but at night when you're trying to sleep it's pretty bright.

My son's wires for his XBOX 360 was misplaced. I ordered the wires, and I received them in about 4-5 days. My son was ecstatic. He has been playing his XBOX 360 daily. Now when he is looking for something for the XBOX such as an old game, he's all over amazon.com surfing the web. Thank goodness for amazon.com because my son told me that I would have had to buy another XBOX360 if we couln't get the electrical wires. Whew!!!

I bought this game for my youngest son's 9th birthday. He and his 13-year-old brother play for one hour a day in the co-op mode, and would play all afternoon if I let them. He thanks me on a daily basis for what he calls "the best game in the world." My middle son has the Lego Star Wars v. 1 & 2 games, and loves them just as much, so all are winners.

I bought this for my son for his birthday.  A week after buying it, we still can't get it to run correctly.  We have already had to download a major patch from the manufacturer, but it still runs choppy and freezes.

You might want to wait for them to work all of the bugs out before you buy.

My son is still very disappointed.

Loved this game as a kid so I bought it for fun. I use it on my vaio laptop with windows 8 and it works just fine, never had any problems. Would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a simple fun game to pass the time.
summary: Loved this game as a kid so I bought it ...

reviewText: I've played this amazing gem of gaming since it came out years ago, and I assure you that it has not lost the charm since then. After my old copy got scratched and destroyed from almost 10 years of overuse, I had to go out and buy a new copy. This is easily one of my favorite games of all time
summary: Amazing game for people of any age

reviewText: I have always loved this game. It's always been not only my favorite of the series, but also one of my all time favorites. I'm so happy I was able to find it able to run on my laptop and desktop, which are both windows 7. Also, it's nicely priced!

I played it so much as a kid and then when I was able to buy it when I was older I couldn't have been happier. It was exactly how I remembered it from being a kid. I shared it with a friend and they had the same experience. Great game for kids. It kept me occupied for hours because you can create these little worlds (zoos) and have control over almost every aspect. You can be very creative and I really like that.
summary: God I love this game - great for kids!

reviewText: For an old game, this is quite addicting. The game's only downfall is just that it's old. The graphics are dated, sound is so-so, but it's a great game to play. If you like Sim City, you'll like this, too.

This game is one I will love forever. It brings out the kid in me again! I bought this item to use on my Windows 7 computer and thought it would not be compatible, but it is! I was very excited when I got this in the mail and couldn't wait to pop it into my computer. Despite what some of the other comments say about the discs being fake, they are not. They came in retail packaging and are real. I would definately reccomend this game to a friend.

The only problem with this game is that I can't stop playing it! I'm addicted! I've always loved the "city-building" genre and tycoon games and this one is one of the best! I love to name the animals and watch their little families grow!

I LOVE BUILDING GAMES AND THIS ONE IS SO WONDERFUL.FUN,EASY TO PLAY AND IT WAS ONE OF THE 1ST GAMES I BROUGHT.I LOVE TO PLAY THIS FOR HOURS AND HOURS AND BUILD MY OWN ZOO AND TAKE CARE OF ALL THE ANIMALS.I ALSO GOT THE ZOO TYCOON 2 WHICH IS EVEN BETTER AND ALL THE EXPANSION PACKS,MARINE MANIA & EXTINCT ANIMALS TO GO WITH IT.THE ORGINAL ONE HAS MORE BUILDINGS AND STUFF WITH IT AND GIVES YOU MORE THINGS TO BUILD A GREAT ZOO. THE ZOO TYCOON 2 HAS UNLIMITED MONEY AND THAT HELPS ALOT.
summary: THIS IS SO GREAT TO PLAY

reviewText: When I first bought this game, I thought it would something fun to do in my free time. Something to make the time pass, that I would eventually grow out of. That was not the case. I became addicted to this game. It's much better than the 2nd one. I never grew out of it. I recommend this for anyone.

I LOVE THIS GAME. SO DOES MY 6 YEAR OLD SON. IT HAS A KIDS MODE WHERE THERE IS UNLIMITED MONEY SO HE NEVER HAS TO WORRY ABOUT RUNNING OUT. HE LOVES THE DINOSAURS. THIS GAME IS VERY FUN. I ALSO BOUGHT TRAIN TYCOON AND MALL TYCOON, BOTH OF THOSE WERE A DISAPOINTMENT. MICROSOFT SHOULD HAVE MADE THEM LIKE ZOO TYCOON. WHEN I PURCHASED THIS GAME IT WAS $20. NOW IT HAS CAME DOWN TO $10, WHICH IS A GREAT DEAL. I PURCHASED ONE FOR MY 7 YEAR OLD NEPHEW FOR CHRISTMAS. THIS IS A GAME THAT KIDS AND ADULTS WILL ENJOY.

This is one of the best games I've ever played! I love the graphics and just the overall fun of fighting a war, without all the blood & guts. I hope there will be other games similar to this one. I don't think one needs to have all the reality action to have fun. This game is fun and challenging. Good work whoever the creators are.

The game is fun from many aspects, from the multitude of weapons you can pick up, to the interaction of the characters in the game itself.

Needs a major expansion pack as well, to add to the game or further downloadable content, but the game is great!

We love it. It's a nice clean, non violent game. It even teaches the kids a few things like the value of a dollar, saving your money, planning ahead, and to spend your money wisely. It gives you a bit of a challenge too.

This is my first Hot Shots Golf game and it make me want more. The game is easy to learn and fun to play. There is a nice variety of courses and some great scenery. The characters are very entertaining and each one has his/her own personality. I would definitely recommend this for kids and adults.

I've had the game for probably 6 or 7 months. I bought it from Amazon.

I don't play it much anymore, but it is a very fun game. This is the third HSG game I've had and I enjoyed them all. 5 stars for it fun factor.
summary: Fun game just like the "Hot Shots Golf" titles before it

reviewText: I have bought many video games in my life . Never have I bought one for under twenty bucks and been impressed. I asked a friend of mine ,who plays video games more than I do. I asked him what he thought of it and he said , I should try it,because I might like it. He was right , it is an impressive game. If you have plenty of time on your hands, get it you will not be disappointed. Overall a fun game
summary: I was impressed for the price

reviewText: This game is great fun. You can destroy anything and everything. The parkour animations are spot on. The graphics on the PC version are far better than the console versions because of the higher resolution. It also controls very well with keyboard and mouse. The story is a bit scattered - you discover a little at a time as you consume people. If you like fast-paced mindless action that's not too hard to be fun, this is the perfect game.
summary: The city is truly your playground

reviewText: I bought this game to play with my boyfriend because Resident Evil 5 was soo fun to play together. However this game was not as exciting/thrilling as RE5 but it is still a good game. The price was reasonable and I'm happy.

I wasn't sure what to expect coming into the game because the original was such a fun play. I really think they stepped it up with Resistance 2. The game is more realistic in that you can't carry 19 guns at once and the way that you can actually stun enemies now by shooting them is a big plus. I definitely recommend this game for anyone who enjoys a good FPS.

If you own a PS3 then you should buy this game plain and simple. Everything about it is amazing. From single player to some of the best multiplayer to date this game is worth every penny. Join the Resistance and defend America from the Chimera!!

The single-player campaign is so much more cinematic this time around, and the bosses add a nice touch to the pacing of the game.

The scale is incredible, not only in the setting, but also the bosses and enemies.

I've played a few hours of multiplayer so far (I'll probably log a few hundred hours into this one, as I did with the first.). I've only played competitive. I'll play cooperative at a later time.

If you're a first-person shooter fan, I definitely recommend it. Insomniac delivers again.

Just got the game today, so far I haven't been dissapointed. The online matches run silky smooth. Theres an option in single player mode, where players can challenge you to a online match while you are playing a single player match. I'm very impressed with the graphics, and I liked the fact that they kept this a 2D game. Its probably more enjoyable on the PS3 than it is on the 360 just because of the controller.

This game is amazing! At first it was hard to get used to the controls and how to fight, but once I got the hang of it I was hooked. This product got here promptly and it was in great condition! My friends and I have had to pause the game so that we can actually get homework done instead of playing this game! It was worth my money for sure.
summary: This game is amazing! At first it was hard to get used ...

reviewText: One of the best Street Fighters games I've played in many years. The game is notable for its highly updated graphics with new characters, new moves, and beautiful fighting stages. It is a fighting game I would recommend to anyone.

When I buy a game I want to be able to buy the FULL game. So if there is DLC for the game I want to be able to buy that too.

So Eidos decide DLC is available for the Xbox 360 ONLY. Which means the PS3 version is never the full product.

So now I have to buy it on the xbox 360 to get the full experience AFTER buying it already.

One star for a shocking business practice.

i bought this game a while back, and i just have to say it was fun. i did not finish it, but ive played for 2 hours, and it is pretty good. the picture is very sharp hd quality, and the sound is marvelous. i wish everyone could enjoy this game as i did so far. just gotta wait till i have time and finish up the game.
summary: great game !! just like uncharted great story

reviewText: This installment turned out to be much better than I expected, after reading a lot of negative reviews about it.  I saw some bugs in the game, but they really didn't bother me much, it still runs very well.  The graphics were amazing, the combat was weird at first but once you get the hang of it, it's really fun.  And the soundtrack was great as well.  Overall I was glad I purchased this game and I look forward to the next one.

Have good characters, good music, good scenes to fight, good history and movie animation of every fighter, when they begin and finish are good. I recomend it if you know or not something about street figther. Have good characters, good music, good scenes to fight, good history and movie animation of every fighter, when they begin and finish. I recomend it if you know or not street figther

I picked this up a few weeks ago, and have been nothing but satisfied. It's challenging enough to keep you busy for a long time if you're not a super hardcore fighting game master. The last boss gets frustrating some time but it feels good when you finally take him down.

The graphics are great, the new characters are fun to play as, and I love the stages and music. I love the 2D Street Fighter games as well, but this one exceeded my expectations in almost every way in its depth and level of polish.

Being a fan of street fighter for a long time, I was really excited when I heard that Capcom was going to go back to it's roots and reserrect this franchise. Boy was I dissapointed. This game is way too hard.  Not fun. And the music is some of the worst I have ever heard in a video game. And what happened to Blanka? He is like an 18 year old transvestite on steroids. They missed the boat on this one, sorry. It sucks big time

This is the worst Tomb Raider game I have ever played. It is supposed to on a Next Gen console but it looks horrible. The graphics look worse than what they did on Tomb Raider Anniversary for the PS2. The gameplay isn't much to compare to past Tomb Raider games either. Don't buy this game.

The fighting game that revived the entire genre.  This game is single handedly responsible for reviving the fighting game genre from my childhood.  It is an excellent addition to the Street Fighter series, the best to date in my opinion.  If you have any interest whatsoever in fighting games, you need this.

Despite a couple of in-game glitches/bugs (there's many a forum discussion on the internet), this game rocks.  Being a PS3 release, I expected the graphics and sound quality to be off the hook - and I wasn't disappointed.

Awesome story, great gameplay, and some of the effects are breathtaking - the water/ocean is about as realistic as I've ever seen.

If you're a fan of the franchise yet have been disappointed with previous releases, this will instill your confidence in the brand.

The game developers have done an excellent job with an upgrade into next-generation gaming.  As you may know, the "Tomb Raider" series has been around for over 12 years.  This latest game does not miss a beat with a storyline surrounded by Norse mythology.  I have recently played through most of the game... and am sure that I will play it through several more times.  The latest "Tomb Raider" is a must have if you enjoy this type of adventure play.
summary: A fresh feel for an old classic.

reviewText: Originally on the fence before the game was released, I was quite impressed by the Gamespot.com review. I immediately had the courage to buy it and I'm glad I did! One of the most beautiful fighting games I think I have seen. The stages are sheer gorgeous (when played in HD)! WOW!! The music is great and all the moves you've come to love are back and bigger and better than ever!

Graphics: 10/10

Sound: 10/10

Game Play: 10/10

Fun: 9/10 (After awhile it just seemed repetitive, it would have been a lot more fun if you could play with a friend)

I highly recommend this game to anyone. My girlfriend is not a gamer but she likes this. So if you liked previous SF games then you would love this.

I was a huge SF II fan back in the day, and when I heard that this game was coming out I was very excited.  Well I wasn't disappointed when I got my copy.  This game is simply amazing!

My favorite ps3 game so far!
summary: Old School Classic has a new face!

reviewText: this game is incredibly frustrating. i've read dozens of negative reviews here, and they all hit the nail on the head. this is one of the most horrendous games i've ever played. the odds of playing through a single game and not running into bugs, errors, glitches, and wtf? moments are absolutely zero. this game is FUBAR.
summary: uh, yeah...as bad as all that

reviewText: After I installed the game and chose Play, the game opened up normally. When the game opened and I clicked "new game" and the game automatically shut down saying that there was an error. I installed the game for like 3 times and the same thing happened. I cant return the game because it was a software download, so basically I lost $10 in exchange for nothing.
summary: Has a bug, cant play the game.

reviewText: The game may be good, but I can't be sure as I am unable to save any progress. Each time I try to save my game I get an error message that the save failed. Can't find anything on the web anywhere that can solve the problem. Uninstalled.
summary: Error message when trying to save game

reviewText: If you want to have fun with a great game I recommend you play Tomb Raider Underworld, it contains very good graphics and a good story that motivates you to continue to the end. I recommend it if you want a great time.

I love this game, it has great graphics, storyline, music and tons of action. I have some friends that are still crying because it is not the same kind of game like Resident 1, 2 and 3 but I think is a breath of fresh air.

I just recently discovered this genre on the PC. I really enjoy turn based rpg's on consoles so I thought I would give this type of game a shot. King's Bounty is everything you could want in this type of game. Great graphics that bring the game world to life, but still able to run on a mid level system, lots of customization, and many hours of turn based strategy. The only slight drawback was the story, but the gameplay more than makes up for it.

I bought this as a gift for an avid gamer.  I have not played this game myself.  He, however, loved it.  I was a little concerned because he usually prefers the rpg type of computer game, but this had enough of that in it that he enjoyed it.  In fact he liked it better than some of the straight rpg games he's played.

RE 5 on PS3 is an excellent game. The graphics are gorgeous and the gameplay is very fun. Don't expect to be scared silly, but the game is definitely spooky and jumpy at times.

The action is fun, and even more fun to play online with other people. Replay value is high, especially if you want to unlock all the special features and unlimited ammo on weapons, which makes the game a lot of fun to replay.

If you can get this game for $15 or less, don't hesitate, its well worth the price.
summary: Excellent action game with nice scares

reviewText: This game is not as scary as the past Resident Evil games, but this one has a better story then Resident Evil 4. This is a great game, from beginning to end I wanted to play more without ever getting bored. The play mechanics for this game are perfect, I had no issues switching partners. Great game.
summary: Resident Evil 5 Is A Great Game Period!

reviewText: This Resident Evil game is by far the most fun. My boyfriend and I play together all the time and it is great to both be able to play. It definitely teaches couples a lot about communication skills! We have played this game over and over again working our way up the different skill levels. It is harder to play solo because of the artificial intelligence of the second player but is still fun. I found it the most fulfilling while playing with another person.

this game is great.  It has great gameplay and gives you plenty of reasons to play it over and over again.  If you have a friend who also likes to play games like this, there is a great co-op mode that even works over the internet. highly recommended

I love this game, it has great graphics, storyline, music and tons of action. I have some friends that are still crying because it is not the same kind of game like Resident 1, 2 and 3 but I think is a breath of fresh air. Different doesn't mean bad.

The only little thing I would add, it would be the possibility of shooting while you walk or run. Just like you do it in Dead Space.

A must have for any Resident Evil fan. !!

The replacement drive for the Xbox 360 was in perfect condition upon arrival. Although my delivery did get rescheduled, I found it to be worth the wait. I installed it and it is working perfectly now. I give 5 stars to the company for an excellent product.

There is a lot to do in the game itself. A lot of free play choice so that you are not stuck in a story. The only issue I had with the game is that the controls are a little hard to learn at first but gets easier over time.

This is a great game.  I bought it for my son's 11th birthday.  He likes and I like it even more.  I love how it's basically just an open world for you to explore.  There are some boundaries, but the map is huge.  You can steal and drive any vehicle from little mopeds to fighter jets.  It's very entertaining.

When I say this game is huge I mean the map is humongous. This is probably the biggest free roaming game I have ever played. If it wasn't for the helicopters and planes it would take forever to finish. Even driving the vehicles seems like it would take forever. In all though this game is real fun. It takes forever to go through. I could probably put 100 hours into this game or more. I would say though that if you want a long game that has some great dynamics to get this.

I bought this game for my grandson who is 10 years old, he is rough with his things, but they play this game almost daily and it is his favorite! If it holds up for him and his friends it is definately a good buy!

I normally don't comment on video games but this game I must. The one word that keeps coming to me about this game is "addictive". There is so much to do you won't get bored with it. You could play all day and not get tired of playing! I'm not a serious gamer. I play games every now and then but this game I can't put down! If you want a game that don't cost too much money and is a quality game you should get this!!!
summary: You Can't Put This Game Down!!

reviewText: This game is a game that you can play for an entire day and still not explore half of the map.  There are so many differant cars, planes, and bikes that I have been playing for 16 hours and still haven't used them all.  If you like sand box games where you can do whatever you want then this is the game for you.

I didn't like the demo of this game at 1st but so many people said it was a lot of fun so I gave it another chance and I am glad, this is a great game, the story is weak but the gameplay upgrading weapons and opening up new locations is fun. There is so much you can do and places to explore.  I like this game more than the open world Grand Theft Auto IV, the main character is more likable IMO and gameplay is more fun.

Other reviewers will say it better, but I'll say it again. Fantastic game. I would have paid twice as much for this game had I known how much fun it would be when I bought it. I actually prefer it to GTA which obviously has a huge following. It might be the best game I've ever played on the PS3 system. That much enjoyment while playing it.
summary: I bought this game for $19.99? Are you kidding me?

reviewText:
Large worlds to explore, good combat sequences, awesome character designs, unique and interesting story. Tomb Raider: Underworld has all the things you need for a really fun game.

It met every qualification, in my mind, of a good game. I'd reccommend this to anyone who likes action or adventure games. There weren't any problems that I had with it, and it arrived exactly when expected.

I bought this for my 5 year old son and he absolutely loves the game. It took him a little while to get the hang of it but now that he knows what he's doing it keeps him entertained for a long time. Great for car rides.

I love the Advance Wars series and this one took a different approach to it. The story was more mature and the graphics were very dark compared to the lighthearted art style of previous entries. Despite being almost like a reboot of the franchise this is every bit as fantastic as the others. I highly recommend it!
summary: Every bit as great as previous entries

reviewText: This game is amazing, some people I know say it sucks but it is cool. the end is confusing, you will think you did something wrong but you did it right. It is fun only for 1 time but if you play it more than once it gets boring.

I've played quite a few FPS's in my day, and this one sure is a lot of fun to play.  In addition to the expansive single player story, the Terrorist hunt missions are a lot of fun too.  I have a blast playing online with my buddy who just moved to another country.  I highly recommend this game.

I had a lot of trouble when I tried to download this game so I decided to buy it instead.  It is really challenging.  The objects are hard to find.  The graphic are great which also makes it hard to find the objects.

I really enjoyed this game. The Mystery Case Files games are some of my favorites. The hidden object games were fun, but not too difficult. The puzzles were awesome! They really make you think outside the box. I would definitely recommend this to anyone who wants a good mix of puzzles and a leisurely game.

This game is fun when searching for hidden objects, however, when it comes to solving the "puzzles" at the end of each level, there are really no instructions or clues on how to do it.  Very frustrating.  We felt that we didn't stand a chance.  Guess we're just not smart enough for this game.

I bought this puzzles because I don't like having jigsaw puzzles taking up table space until I can get to it so this solves that problem by saving it.  I have vision problems so the fact that you can make the puzzle pieces as large as you need is terrific for any one who has vision issues.  You can also decide how many pieces you want your puzzle to be so you determine how easy or difficult it will be.  I am happy with the variety of puzzles on this disc.  I highly recommend this puzzle for all ages.

I love puzzles and this one is fantastic.  It allows you to decide how many pieces you want the puzzle to be and the level of difficulty.  I'll be enjoying this one for a long time to come, and the price was so affordable.

The Nintendo 64 is one of the best game systems ever! It's graphics have room to improve but the host of games you can get with it are fun and exciting. And if you're buying one now it's way cheaper than buying a new game system because you can get almost any game you want for $10-20!
summary: One of the Best Game Systems Ever!

reviewText: I missed a couple of generations of consoles during late high school and college, so now I'm catching up. I bought this as a Valentine's gift for my husband specifically so we could play Smash Bros. (since that's how we spent many nights in college), and it's as fun now as it was then. I have very little to say against Nintendo in general, and this is no exception; it's a great console with some great games available.

This is a cool game just because it's different and makes good use of the Nintendo DS system.  It's not a perfect game by any means, but if you like cars, you'll probably enjoy it as I do.  I think it'd be a great game for them to do a sequel to and add on to the concept - more cars, more parts to work on, etc.

Just bought the FrontMan Wireless Guitar for the Wii and love it!  In my opinion it's just as good as (if not a tad better than) the original one that came with the game.  I like the fact the buttons feel a bit tighter and the fret bar seems to be a tad quieter.  I purchased mine in a local game store and it was still $10.00 less than the original and well worth it to me!

I purchased this guitar for $25 and it works perfectly fine for Rock Band 2 on the Wii.  I was a little hesitant purchasing it since I wasn't sure if it was compatible with Rock Band 2, but I haven't had any issues with it so far.  It is a cheaper guitar so for someone on a budget this guitar is perfect.  It's powered off of your Wii remote's batteries.
summary: Nyko Frontman and Rock Band 2 for Wii, Good Stuff!

reviewText:
I was looking for a replacement for an x-clamp, and just looking at the picture, I thought that's what it was.  NOPE.  Just screws and washers.  Order this, and you'll still be stuck with the original X-clamp.  I'd suggest going with the complete Uni-Clamp kit for $18 or so.  You'll still get the screws and washers, but much more as well.

Don't bother with this kit.  Over-priced.

Read the reviews, tried all the 'fixes' and it still won't work for Rockband. Didn't try it with Guitar Hero because if it doesn't work for both I don't want it. I expect a product to work like it says it should, and I'm more than a little pissed that it doesn't. Oh well! Next time I will know better!

I bought this kit and was very happy.  It does come with thermal compound which is not pictured.  It does not come with tools to open the case or any cleaners for the chips.  If you already know how to open your case and clean the chips your will be very happy with this kit.  It has a web site where you can go to get instructions which I would recommend looking at before you start.  You can also check online for video instructions.  I used this kit on two xbox 360's and both worked.
summary: Great kit if you know what to do.

reviewText: Guitar is worth less than I paid for it, and I didn't pay very much, thank goodness. I was hoping for just a cheap guitar for my 7 year old son to play Rock Band with and the guitar doesn't even work. I don't know if it's because we have Rock Band 2 or because we have a Playstation 3 but the guitar is not worth the money.

I may have just received a defective guitar, but I could not get it to sync with my PS3 Rock Band game.  We had to send it back after one day.  When looking for a replacement at local stores, I noticed that every other guitar for the PS3 Rock Band game is double the price.  This could just be a case of a cheapo bargain guitar and you get what you get and you don't get upset.

I've had this for a couple years now at least, and it's been great. Charges the controllers fairly quickly, and the lights indicate if the charge is complete or not. I would definitely recommend if you're looking for a rechargeable battery set.

I bought this because I have 4 controllers for Xbox 360 and this product works great and my controller is always charged. If you have at least 2 controllers I would recommend this to you because you have a place to store your controller as well as charged it all in one device and it fits perfectly if you have the white Xbox 360.

So after doing a lot of homework on various play and charge/battery kits, I decided to give this one a shot. Sure glad I did, because it's been fantastic. The charging base looks great, keeps controllers orderly, charges em' quickly and the battery life is great. If you're looking for the best charging kit out there, this one is it. Well worth the price!

This product is a bit of a no-brainer now that I have it.  I bought this pretty much out of the gate, so I've never had to worry about batteries, but I'm glad I did.  I can't imagine the having to think about batteries.  For such a small price, you end up with a solid product that just makes the experience that much better.

I actually like this one more than the power adapter that came with my Wii.  This has an indicator light that lets me know if it is plugged in.  It also has a Velcro strap for the cord that is very convenient.  The Wii has not had any problem with this third-party power adapter; it works completely normal.  I would highly recommend this, even over the one that comes with the Wii.
summary: Love It.  Better than the orginal adapter that came with the Wii

reviewText: There isn't a whole lot to say other than "it works". I picked this up because I wanted to be able to easily move my Wii from my living room to my Family Room so I could play Monster Hunter Tri and not disturb my family. It powers my Wii just fine. Cable management is also a plus.

This is a great game and I received it at a great price. It was delivered fast and in perfect shape. I'm a big fan of warhammer and warhammer 40k on the tabletop and this is a nice way to get my fix when i don't have time for the real thing. A game worth getting from a reliable place.
summary: great game, never could get enough

reviewText:
Installation was pretty easy overall. The screws take a little muscle to get started, but once they're started, they go right in. I've been using the Pedal Metal for about a month now and it works great so far. I can't speak for long-term usage, but I guess time will tell.

Buyers should keep in mind that Rock Band 2 comes out in a couple months and the new drum set will come with a metal food pedal, so this product shouldn't be needed much longer.
summary: Great product to hold you over until Rock Band 2!

reviewText:
I bought this game recently (Sep 2011) and it will not run. I just want to warn anyone who is like me and was wanting to skip out on paying $36 on the Mac App Store, but just bite the bullet and download it. This disc version is no longer supported, and when you go to the website to "troubleshoot", it just informs you the page no longer exists.

Of course as a buyer, do whatever you think is best, but you have been warned. If you buy this you will be returning it not long after.
summary: DO not BUY, doesnt work anymore!
