reviewText: Although it took a while for the package to arrive their customer service was sublime and a great help in rushing the order as soon as possible. The product was brand new and in great condition upon arrival. I will definitely buy from them again.

I'm a recent Mac Convert and I am impressed with this game. If you like FPS, then this is a game for you. Warning: You will have to have upgraded your MacBook to 4GB for this game to play normally. Otherwise, it will be all sketchy and lagging from frame to frame.

Works perfectly on my 2008 iMac at a fairly high resolution.  The game is super fun in single player, and especially fun on multiplayer.  If you want a first person shooter game for your iMac, this one is a must-have.

If you're ever wondering if there's such thing as a perfect anime, Cory In The House is your game.
A direct sequel to "Hannah Montana", this anime's art style is so perfect, you'll think you're watching an actual live-action TV show.
If you think you've seen amazing anime like " Gurren Lagann", "TRIGUN" or even "Fish Hooks", trust me, you haven't seen anything on the same level as Cory In The House.
summary: ... you're ever wondering if there's such thing as a perfect anime, Cory In The House is your game

reviewText: If you haven't played it yet, you must do it now. This game I got at a flea market for 5$, and I can tell you with certainty, that it was the best 5$ I ever spent, If I knew just how superb the game was, I'd have paid 60$. This is the most incredible game I will ever play, without a doubt. I implore you to play it, it will change the way you think of all video games.

I can't believe I have never played this game. I mean wow...this is a master piece. The graphics are jaw dropping. The cast is amazing and the story is complex and intelligent. don't get me started on the gameplay, the action parts are balanced by the puzzles and stealth. I highly recommend this game for anyone.

I Love this game so much! It's so original and just takes full advantage of everything that the DS can do. The game is a little tricky to get used to but it really eases new players into it. You get to choose your level of difficulty at any given point in the game. You decide how easy or hard the game is going to be. You also choose when and who you want to fight. There are NO random battles to drag you down in this game. I would recommend this game to anyone who is looking for a new and great RPG.

SE delivers again! This game is absolutely amazing.  It's fun and challenging.  The graphical style is sweet and the sound... The sound is so good they released the soundtrack on itunes.

I wish they would have included graphical change on clothing styles since it does play a role in the game.  I understand it's not necessary but it would've been a nice addition.

For those of you thinking this game is only for kids, it's not.  I'm a 30 y/o guy and find this game to be one of NDS's overall top ten.

This game has aged gracefully. It makes excellent use of the touchscreen, and the story is both interesting and engaging. I may have waited way  too long to pick up and play it, but I'm very pleased with my purchase. It has been money well spent. The music is catchy and atmospheric. I am intrigued enough with the storyline to see where it goes next.

To this day, this is my favorite game released on any portable platform. The story, music, and design are all near flawless, and they combine to make one of the most interesting games of all time. I won't go into any detail about it. Just play it. You won't regret it.

PERFECT GAME. ABSOLUTELY AMAZING.
Some people are gonna have a problem with the complexity of the battle system in this game. This game is not for those people. It's not that hard to learn and even allows you to adjust the difficulty. I find myself picking up the game every few months just to play it.
Amazing, wonderful story. Easily remember-able characters.
Superb soundtrack. Perfectly fits with the setting and characters.
I'm patiently (oh, so patiently) waiting for a sequel.

I love this game! This is the Best game of all time and they need to make a second one soon!!!!!!! I love the soundtrack to this game and it was perfect to play even though it started off being a little emo in the beginning.

The gameplay is a little challenging because you have to control two character; one on each screen but the story is amazing.  Once you get used to the battle system, it's not so bad.  I would highly suggest this game to anybody that wants to play it.

I thoroughly enjoyed this game. The storyline, one of the most important aspects for me, was interesting and entertaining. The fighting style is different and really utilizes the dual-screen platform. One of my current favorite games.

The World Ends with you is an awesome game, it's one of the "Must Have" games for the Nintendo DS handheld. It's got a great story, great stylized art, a great interactive battle system that utilizes both of the DS's screens and a great soundtrack. This is another great hit from Square-Enix and if you don't have a Nintendo DS/DSi/3DS/2DS then you can get the Solo Remix of this game for certain iOS devices. It's over all just a great game.
summary: Best Nintendo DS game (In my Opinion)

reviewText:
Anyone who loves the DS, this is pretty much the game for you.
The whole game is wonderfully addicting - from the beautifully crafted storyline, the rockin' soundtrack, and the amazing game play. I'm normally not one who cares about game play, but holy crap! I LOVE playing this game! I have never had so much fun farming!
summary: I adore this game so much it hurts a little

reviewText: This game was released before I actually had a Nintendo DS; after finally getting the right hardware I searched high and low and of course found it here. This game was worth the wait; the characters are great, I love the story, and the music is awesome, i'll be looking for the soundtrack! This game is a must play!!!

I owned this game a few years back and I absolutely loved it. However, it's very challenging and I ran into an enemy I couldn't beat and I couldn't turn back in the game. I let the frustration get to me and I sold the game off. I recently re-purchased the game because not finishing it was such a huge regret when it was such a great game. So excited to have this game back in my hands again!
summary: I Love This Game So Much I Bought It Twice

reviewText: This is one of my favorite games.  I really enjoyed that you can just play the game through without much thought.  The additional features that lurk in the game add an extra degree of complexity that I always enjoy when I am playing a game.

I am a fan of many games such as the Kingdom Hearts series and the Final Fantasy series. This game is by the same company, but offers a different game play. I was uncertain of whether I would like it or not, but after the first few hours, game play became innate to me. It has a great, compelling story line that keeps you wanting to play more. I would definitely recommend.
summary: This game is right down my alley..

reviewText:
I bought this game as a present because my boyfriend kept talking about it - apparently it is one of the best games he's ever played.  He had sold his back, and I figured it would be something thoughtful to buy for him - he was thrilled.  It didn't disappoint.

I guess I should have him write a review - all I can say is that he is an experienced gamer, and isn't easily impressed by games.  He still finds this game enthralling, and challenging at the same time (despite playing it through many times)

I really like this game. I've played it twice now. I had been interested in it for a while, but it took the fact that the characters would be in "Kingdom Hearts: Dream Drop Distance" that finally compelled me to buy it. And I've enjoyed it since. The story line is great. The gameplay is different - in a good way. I like the characters and I even like the music. It's great.

love this games storyline, but im not to fond of the gamplay aspect of the game. Don't get me wrong, it is very fun but not what i expected. one of the best games i've played. also, i love the soundtrack for this game

I am a huge fan of RPG's and had been looking for a new one before purchasing this.  I have put at least 40 hours into this game and still haven't finished.  The story is very engaging, you get a feeling for each of the characters, some good, some not.

I cannot wait to finish the game and start it again.  The gameplay is really open, you can fly through the game, or spend your time leveling up pins, trying new strategies, etc.

Highly recommend this game!
summary: Hours of fun and innovative gameplay

reviewText: I bought this game after a friend of mine recommended it to me a while back. I was hooked soon after I started playing. The storyline and music within this game was great! My favorite tracks in this game are 'Deja Vu' and 'Calling'~ This quickly became one of my favorite DS games~

This is by far one of the most underrated games on the ds. It has a wonderful story, likable characters who change throughout the trials they're put through, and a killer soundtrack. The gameplay itself can be very difficult sometimes, but you can actually adjust how hard you want the game to be whenever you want (honestly I wish all games did that sometimes). This game is well worth the money and time you put into it, and by far one of the best games Square has come out with in a long time.

Okay so i'll admit the only reason i played this was because of the upcoming KH3D game. I saw that they are going to include these characters in the game and i wanted to know what it was about. Well Square Enix does not disappoint. This game is easily one of my favorite games of all time now. A DS game this entertaining is hard to come by. The story, game play, and music was flawless.

This game requires you to think and move fast. It's music is a great addition to the game. The main character, Neku, is not what I call a cliche character. His style and emotions are unique compared to that of previous anime game characters. The music is great, which is unusual for some video games. The story is cool and very suspenseful. It keeps you wanting more. It's great to see Neku's relationship with other people change.

One of the best plots in a videogame.
One of the best RPGs out there - on the DS or otherwise.
One of the best games in terms of originality.
One of the best games for good music in a game.
One of the best games for replayability and additional content past the end-game.

One of the best games for the DS. Peroid.

Absolutely awful.  I read all the great reviews, and I tried to give it a chance, but it was so amazingly boring that I had to put it down.  The text went on and on - I kept wanting to play the game, but I wasn't interested in what the people were saying.  By the time I tried to play the game I was so bored that I didn't care.  This is the most overrated game I have ever played.  Play Zelda instead.

I tried this game out on a friend's recommendation last year, and loved everything about it! I recently bought another copy to give to my younger sister so that she can enjoy the game, too. The game is full of style, with beautiful 2D visuals, a great story, unique and fun controls, memorable characters, and a catchy soundtrack.

If you want to be immersed in a deep single player experience on the DS, there's no better game than "The World Ends With You".
summary: My Favorite DS Game to Date!

reviewText: This game was amazing. It hooks you and makes you constantly charging your DS because it is too much fun to put down. The story is fantastic, the replay value is by far the best of any game. There are so many reasons to buy this game, and on amazon, the first motivation should be the $15 price tag.
summary: A fantastic deal on a fantastic game

reviewText: The masters of crafting an excellent story, who are behind the Final Fantasy franchise set their sights on the DS and created what is probably one of the best games for the Nintendo DS. This game has excellent action, music, storytelling, and gameplay. Highly recommended for anyone who is a fan of the RPG genre.

The World Ends With You is the best Japanese RPG I've played in years. I thought the plot and characters were well developed and relevant, the advancement mechanics very fun, and the combat to be intricate and deep. It may seem a bit difficult at first, but it's well worth it to learn the system, as it's very rewarding.

I highly recommend it to anyone who likes japanese RPGs
summary: The best Japanese RPG in years

reviewText: Fun game with a lot of dynamics.  There are a lot of gameplay components that can be a bit overwhelming at first, but the game eases you in fairly well.  The story is well composed and well told.  Highly recommended if you want a challenging rpg.

This was the best DBZ game that has come out so far. It was a great story line and it is about time it came out on the 360. Very happy with the service from Amazon to get it to me and very happy with the game.

I have been a fan of the Metal Gear games ever since the original was released on the 8 bit Nintendo in 1987. These are so much better than that. Anyone who has ever played them knows what I'm talking about. As I am writing this, Amazon has the set listed at $50, but I found it at Wal-Mart for $19.96 brand new. So my advice is to do a little shopping, you may be able to find it at a better price. $20 for these fabulous games is a steal!

This is a deal no one should pass up!
You get three great games for a real low price.
Classic Psone Metal Gear Solid.
Metal Gear Solid 2 Substance
And Metal Gear Solid 3 Subsistence!

Buyer beware of the only downfall of this deal. (Just my opinion)
Metal Gear Solid 3 Subsistence only comes with Disc 1.
If you want Disc 2 that has the 8-bit old school Metal Gear 1-2
then you have to buy the standalone Metal Gear Solid 3 Subsistence.

Other than that this is the best deal I have seen so far.

This is the best collection series you can buy for the price of one, because these games are hard to find anywhere else. The collection features: MGS 1, MGS 2 Sons of Liberty, MGS 3 Snake Eater, in which MGS 1 & 2 have Substance part of the game.

This is, all in all, a fantastic way to get caught up on what is easily the most epic and well-crafted video game franchise in history. You will need both a PS1 and PS2 memory card, but that's a small price to pay to experience this series from this early point.

My only gripe is that the second disc from MGS3 wasn't included, as that one included lots of additional content that I would have liked to have. Still, for the price it's hard to go wrong.

I have been a fan of the MGS series since I bought a Playstation 2 seven years ago.  I applaud Konami for releasing this box set.  This presents newbies the chance to catch up with the story just in time for the PS3 release of Metal Gear Solid 4.  For $30 this is a steal.  All 3 games are well worth the price of admission.  You simply can't go wrong with this deal.

I am glad I only paid $10 for it. After 3 minutes of play I tossed in the trash. You can't adjust the camera more than 4% in any direction. Therefore, you can't see where you are going. You start the game in battle, you can't see where you are headed, so you have to run around hope'n you can figure out what you are do'n.... Don't buy this game.

I should have researched this a little more, but I thought the Wii Wheel was required for Mario Kart. I ordered 4 of these and they are good quality, the remotes fit snug and are easy to get in and out of. It's fun to use the steering wheel, but it is not required in order to play the games!

I bought this extra wheel for use with my Nintendo Wii, and like all Nintendo licensed products, it is very well constructed and designed. It is much more comfortable to use instead of just the Wii Remote tilted sideways. I use this wheel main for Mario Kart Wii, and I am very happy with the purchase! You can't beat the price on Amazon, don't pay more than $10 anywhere else!

The Wii wheel is great. Beautiful, functional, and fun. I am a grown man, and it still works well in my hands. Some people say that game-play is not improved vs using the wiimote on its own. That is not a concern for me - I'm not entering a video game tournament, I'm racing at home with my wife. I love using the wheel for racing games.

There are only two wiimote accessories worth buying (in my opinion): a gun (for shooting) and a wheel (for steering).

My grandson is 3 years old and I had bought two generic wheels and I had one original. Each time he would come over to play on the Maria Kart he always had to have the original wheel. So, one day I decided to play with him and I used the generic one and it was harder to drive. He went home and I decided to use the original and what a difference. So, now we both play with the original wheels.

The price was awesome and I received it quickly. Great service.

Using the Wii wheel is the best way to enjoy Mario Kart.  It is surprisingly accurate and way easier than trying to "drive" with a remote.  The ergonomics are such that it fits as well in my husband's big hands as it does in my 3 year old's hands as well as for the other 3 kids in between.  I highly recommend this product for all who want a real racing experience in their Wii play.

The Wii Wheel isn't really necessary for the child or adult who can play Mario Kart really well.  However, for those who aren't too familiar with the game it is great as a training tool.  My niece who is five years old has been using it and she is improving day by day.  My nephew who is seven, no longer uses the Wii Wheel.  He just uses the remote on his own.  I on the other hand, feel more comfortable with the Wii Wheel.  I've never been good at racing games, but the Wii Wheel is helping with that.

The Wii Wheel, although just a piece of plastic in the shape of a steering wheel, is surprisingly useful when playing Mario Kart Wii.  At first I thought it was a waste of money, but after trying to play the game without it (just holding the controller sideways), I quickly realized that it's worth the money for the ease of use it brings.  Since most of the time there's only 1 or 2 people playing, one additional Wii wheel is probably fine, but I probably wouldn't buy 2 additional to have a set of 4.

I bought the wheel when I bought Mario Kart Wii (so I have 2 wheels).  I can't imagine playing the game without them.  They make the game more interactive and fun.  There are 3 kids in my household who also use the wheels, no problems or complaints so far.

You can also find this exact wheel at Wal-Mart for about $10.

The item itself is fairly simple, and hard to complain about. Some people prefer MK Wii without the wheel, but this is easy to determine by playing with the wheel included with the game.

If you're buying this extra wheel, I assume you already know what you're in for. You snap in the Wii remote, and... that's about it. It works just fine and as you'd expect.

Really the bonus here is the price, which is lower than you'll find it in most stores.

The Wii Wheel is well made, solid, and attractive.

As far as its usefulness is concerned, that's completely up to the buyer.  My girlfriend prefers the wheel hands down when playing Mario Kart.  Personally, I find the wiimote/nunchuck combo to be the best for me.

Since that's up to personal preference, there's no reason to include it in my rating.  So the product gets 5 stars for what it is -- a well-designed, well-finished product with good ergonomics.
Mario Kart Wii with Wii WheelOfficial Nintendo Wii WheelGreat buy Great fun to play

I never played the original, but the Wii version of the Mario Kart game is a total hoot!!! The Wii wheel adds a lot to the enjoyment of the game and at such a low cost, you should get one for each ADDITIONAL controller (handset) you own. Remember, one wheel comes with the game itself, so you don't have to buy one for that if it's the only controller you own. The controller fits very snugly into the wheel and enhances the feel of the game.

Being an avid gamer and part time store manager at a local game retailer, I'm usually in the know about all things game related and this wheel is no exception.  I actually bought four of them so the whole family and friends could enjoy the experience.  It's by no means a necessity but it does enhance the experience.  The wii remote easily fits inside and does what it's supposed to do.  It just works.  Do yourself a favor and pick one up!

Some people like using the wheel and some don't.  We purchased the Mario Kart game and had so much fun using the wheel that everyone starting fighting over whose turn it was to use the wheel.  Now with two wheels, the kids are having a great time.

The wheel isn't anything special, but that's why it's only $10.  I think it's more fun to use.  Also, it is much easier to play in Manual mode (drifting) with the button on the back of the wheel than it is with just the wiimote.
summary: Wii Wheel - Well built, works great

reviewText: This is a great tool for playing Mario Kart. It really puts the driving feel into the game. It works great. You can easily access all the buttons while driving, and it's very easy to use the IR features of the remote while in the wheel.

This is a pretty cool accessory. It does feel a bit cheap and fragile though. The Wii remote fits nice and snug in the wheel and it's easy to take out also. The price is pretty great, except in order for it to work you need to buy an extra wii remote which is $40 plus the $10 for the wheel. It's very easy to use, and it brings you into the game.
summary: Wii Wheel provides an invisible car

reviewText: I too thought this would be a fun game and was very disappointed in it. I even had my son try it out to see if I just wasn't understanding how to play it (since he's great at the game world), but he also couldn't understand it. It turned out to be a flop in our house, a waste of money! I wish I waited to read these other reviews before buying it... next new game I buy I'll come here first and read the reviews before I buy any new game.

My son wanted to buy this game, because it was a problem having to borrow it constantly from his sister, because she likes to play it a lot, too. He likes it very much (he is a teenager already), and since he received this game several days ago, he has not played anything else with his DSi.

I bought this game from Tech Supply Center, and I am very happy with the service. The game arrived just as described, well packed and in time!

I bought this game for my little brother's birthday. I have no idea how pokemon works but I know my little brother is obsessed with it and when I gave it to him he absolutely loved the game. Can't say much about how the game is but the shipping was fast and the item was in great condition.

It's a extremely dark Pokemon game. Much, much darker then usual.

It requires a lot of reading, so I wouldn't recommend it for the easily bored or people who can't read well, and it is quite hard.

I still love it, though. It's an excellent dungeon crawler.

This was a great game!  I loved the story!!  Of course, I can't beat the boss at the very end of the game.  Which is the guild that goes after you.  That's hard!!  At least for me it was.  I loved the fact that your the pokemon.  Anyways, I have no complaints about it.  It was 1 fantastic game!  Buy it!  Buy it!  Buy it!

A friend of mine bought me Pokemon Mystery Dungeon: Explorers of Darkness after she found out that I had bought Explorers of Time. And I love it just as much. This game just keeps all my attention. I play this game to relax and unwind. It feels very different from Explorers of Time, even though it's not different by much. I have not finished either game yet, but I still enjoyed the games as much as the first day I got them. This game is incredibly fun. I love it!
summary: May be almost the same as Explorers of Time, but also just as fun

reviewText: I've never played this game, but my 12-year-old says it's awesome. And judging from the amount of time he spends playing it, I have to believe it's got all the right stuff. It's his favorite DS game of the moment. If your kid has a DS and loves Pokemon, I don't think you can go wrong with this one.

The game is a lot of fun. The thing I like about this version compared to the first Mystery Dungeon game that came out is the fact that your partner shares your room with you, instead of going off to his own area. This game keeps you wondering what's coming next up to the end. And once you finish, you still have challenges to solve.
summary: Pokemon Mystery Dungeon Explorers of Darkness

reviewText: My daughter loves horses and she loves this game. She gets to pick her own character and horse out and ride the horse, etc. She knows more than I do on this. I tried the game and I thought it was boring but for a 6 year old its great.

Talk about having fun at night when everyone has gone to bed and you're not tired. I have to admit that these games are so much fun that when I get home from work I will sit and play these games just to see how high of a score I can get before i go to bed. It's hard to try and beat your previous score knowing that you only have about a few minutes before you need to go to bed. I love how these games keep you thinking which way will Guarantee the best success in getting the high score.

The kids play this all the time and they are loving it. Great because there isn't just one game- there are several, when they get tired of one they just go to another one. Keeps them busy. I would definitely recommend purchasing this game.

We played this game with our 6 year old granddaughter.  My husband said we 'had' to get it because we had fun.  The games are simple enough for the younger kids to enjoy.  We have a great time with the kids and laugh a lot!  Would recommend it to anyone looking for a few simple games.  It doesn't have a lot of content - but the price was right!

This is a simple but great game with a ton of play value.  It feels like everything is moving very fast, but the player has control over the car.  There are consequences to driving badly, but you aren't blowing up all the time and you don't have to have a perfect race to win, place or show.  What I'm trying to say is that for me it was challenging without being frustrating, and it is a lot of fun.

I was looking forward to playing this game after reading the reviews, but I noticed they were written 4 and a half years ago. If you have played Mario Kart, then this game is awful. After playing this game, I love Mario Kart even more. Speed Racer is probably the worst wii game I have purchased. You don't even have to turn, it does it all for you. If you just held down the gas, you could get 1st place with absolutely no steering. I played this for about 10-15 minutes and don't plan on playing it again.

Our kids range from ages 4 through 10. All of our kids love this game. It's one of the few that they can agree on. The game is a great value. As an adult, however, it took me some time to stop feeling motion sickness as I was playing this game. It's very fast moving and the graphics are wild and take you through many twists, turns, and loops at at fast rate.

As a beginner, this game has helped me learn how to use the remote and nunchuck in a very fun way! It has me up on my feet instead of on the couch, laughing at myself when I goof up and jumping up and down with delight when I triumph! I recommend it for anyone who is new to gaming and wants a mixture of challenge and success while learning to used the controllers.

I had high hopes for this game and it was AWFUL! We had no fun playing it. The games were complicated and there was no advancing. The instructions were vague. It was nowhere near as fun as WiiSports and I was quite heartbroken by how lame this game was. I read the reviews and they made the game seem fun...in all honesty, it could be worse...but we did not really enjoy it

This game is great for all players of all ages.  It offers a variety of different sports from which to choose.  The games are user friendly, and will get you up and moving.  You can't go wrong with this one.
summary: Must have for your Wii collection

reviewText: I would consider this game to have a steep learning curve, as it definitely takes some time to master the controls. Other than that, the game has many customizability options, a lot of tennis courts and players, and decent graphics.

My 6 year old daughter loves this game. There are some difficult aspects to the game for young children, however it's nothing that an adult can't help with. My daughter loves the movie, so this was a must have.

This controller is SO MUCH BETTER than the original N64 controller! It's design allows me to comfortably hold it far more than the original, and the analog stick is a lot like the PS1 Dualshock analog sticks, which is amazing in my eyes as it allows for smoother, more comfortable control. That's the key point here: it's much more comfortable to use than the original.

This game is a great addition to my Playstation 3 system. The graphics are outstanding, the gameplay is smooth, the characters are fun to play as, and multiplayer is awesome. I recommend this game to any body who enjoyed the movie for any system. Take my advice and get this game.

Very good looking game with all the excitement of the original versions.  The graphics look fantastic on my MacBook Pro, 2.6 Ghz w/512MB video RAM.  This game is a lot of fun!  If you are a Tomb Raider fan I highly recommend it!
summary: Lara is back & she's gorgeous & tough!

reviewText: The first time I played this game, I was at my friends house and they have this game. We played for about 30 minutes and I knew right then I will get this games. So yeah I do like this game that you should get this game.

My 5 year old absolutely loves this game and learned how to play it himself very quickly. My younger boys still struggle with it a bit, but I'm sure they'll grow into it. With loads of game options, this has enough variety to keep them entertained for years to come. I love how it really gets them moving. Even my active husband was amazed at how well the games get your heart rate up! Lots of fun for the whole family.
summary: Fun game, keeps the kids hopping

reviewText: Very disappointed in this game. There are not enough different options within the game for the price you pay in comparison to some of the other games such as Sports and Fitness. Hopefully there will be a lot more games put out in the near future that will require the mat that came with this. It kept me busy but not amused for the first hour that I had it. Too bad I couldn't return it and get my money back!

If you are looking for a workout as having fun, this is it!  Every time I play this, I am totally out of breath and sweaty.  It is awesome that I can get a workout without going to the gym and instead in the privacy of my own family room.  Highly recommend this one.

I bought this game for my 6 year old nieces and 8 year old nephew. They opened it on Christmas and we ALL had a great time playing. The kids took about 15 minutes to get the hang of it. I broke out in a sweat for the running ones.

I bought this game for my 8 year old son for his birthday and it is great.  It is fun and also can be a great workout.  All the activities make you get up and move.  They start out fairly easy, but then get more difficult the longer you play.  I would recommend this game!!

I had wanted a wii fit to go with my new wii. Since I am unable to find a wii fit in the area, a co-worker suggested this. I am amazed with it. It really makes you get up and move! Although I have never used the wii fit so I can't compare it, but the Outdoor challenge is a great game for the money ... do not hesitate to buy it, you won't be sorry.
I am still looking for the wii fit and won't stop until I find it!
summary: Great substitute if you cant find a wii fit

reviewText: I'm a mom of 5 with one more on the way.  I'm always looking for ways to keep myself and my kids active and healthy.  Wii sports has been great but I wanted more variety.  Wii fit was my first thought but when it couldn't be found...I researched and found this.  WE LOVE IT!  It is a great way to spend time together as a family and sweat away the pounds at the same time!  Games are fun and challenging and the pad works great!  I highly recommend this game if you want a fun way to get up a move!
summary: Great way to exercise, lose weight, and have fun with your family!

reviewText:
Bought this as a holiday present for my kids (age 7 & 5).

The games are simple enough that they can do it, yet challenging enough to make them want to keep playing.  The mat works well and is a nice change from the regular Wii controller.

As a parent, I love that they are running, jumping, and using teamwork to complete the games.

Overall, a great game for kids up to 14.  For adults, it is still fun.  However, I think adults wouldn't keep playing this game after a few weeks.

This is a great game for the whole family.  I purchased this game for my girls ages 6-11 and my 16 year old son ended up playing as well.  Before the day was up, I was jumping up and down on the mat as well and trying to catch my breath.

This game provides a challenging video game along with good physical activity.

I highly recommend this game to any family.

I asked for this for Christmas.  My husband rolled his eyes.  But, he's amused too.  It's simple, yet fun.  The kids like it, I like it.  My husband laughs at me.  What more can you ask for?

It's tiring enough to keep my heart rate up, yet entertaining enough that I don't lose interest.  So far, my favorite game is the mole stomp.
summary: I'm having fun with this game...

reviewText: This is a great game. I'm so glad Wii came up with the mat. It's a great way to get the kids up off the couch. I don't see how you can play this game and not get a workout. My 10 year old loves it. We're still waiting to get a turn...

I wanted to say that I received these cables in perfect condition and shipped quickly.  I have not had a chance to actually try them yet because I have been very ill and have to leave the country for medical care.  They look brand new and I think they will be great! Thank you!

I got a similar cable for my Xbox so when I found an old PS2 I got this for it, works very well and makes a significant amount of difference for some games, if you have a PS2 its worth it because otherwise the games won't look right on an HDTV.
I cant vouch for using it on a PS3 but for a PS2 it is a must buy especially for the price.
summary: Makes a surprising amount of difference.

reviewText: Bought this cable from SF Planet. Although it claims to work on both PS2 and PS3, it did not work on my PS2. I have the original PS2, not the slim version. The PS side of the cable does not look exactly like the original cable. I tried it anyways and there is no video signal. Audio works. Do not buy this cable for PS2. Not sure if it works on PS3. Wish I could return it but its not worth the cost and effort.

I purchased this cable to connect my PlayStation 2 to my HDTV (as it doesn't have any composite inputs) and it works just fine. The cable is dark, so it's easily concealable and it's long enough to go from the system to the television with no issues.
summary: I can play PlayStation 2 on my HDTV now!

reviewText: Comes with charging battery pack to use in the back of the remotes and the remotes sit perfectly on the charging dock. Lights on the front of the charging dock lets you know when the remotes are fully charged. Good price and I would recommend it.

The cord didn't come torn. I didn't notice it at all until a month or so later. I was very disappointed but it was too late to send it back. Not happy at all. The torn cord sometimes turns the charger station off and I have to jiggle it to get it to work again

I was expecting a lot more out of this product, but I guess it's true; you get what you pay for.  It feels and looks cheap.  The lights (notifiers) don't work correctly so you don't know if you're WiiMote is charged, and I don't think it's charging fully.  I left my WiiMote on the charger over night, and I only got 30 minutes of operation.  Very disappointed.

They no longer charge the controllers. I'm very disappointed. I feel like I wasted my money and I have no way of getting my money back or even a replacement.  My son can no longer play with any of the controllers, the charger doesn't work.

I liked the idea of rechargeable batteries, but this device is very touchy and difficult to use. It is almost impossible to charge two remotes simultaneously, and the batteries do not stay charged long at all. We were having to constantly recharge the batteries (which often interrupted our Wii usage) until we gave up and started using regular batteries.

I love everything about this product, especially how the lights turn red when they're done charging. The one thing I don't like about this is that you have to unplug it to turn it off, rather than there being an on/off switch. I still love it though!

This is a good thing to have because my daughters play with the controller without the game on and the batteries don't last too long. Now I can recharge them and not have to worry about dead batteries.

I love my charging station. I would recommend it to anyone. It's easy to use and when the remote batteries are getting low or dead just throw it on and it's easy to charge. Easy to use, but if you have more remotes I would recommend the 4 remote charging station.

I bought this game a while back and I gotta say, this game easily packs hundreds of hours worth of nonstop fun and explosions in a huge open world. If you like open world 3rd person shooters, then this game would make a great addition to your collection.
summary: this game easily packs hundreds of hours worth of nonstop fun and ...

reviewText:
This game has everything you could want from an action movie.
Story aside (because the story isn't great), as a sandbox game this is incredible. The visuals are top notch.
I still can't believe this game came out more than 6 years ago.
summary: One of my favorite games of all time

reviewText: This game is a lot like GTA in many ways. It's open world, and the world map is HUGE, and your objective is to blow things up and cause chaos. Not much of a story but it makes up for that by allowing you to parachute from anywhere and grapple hook anywhere and shoot things with jets and rockets. It's pretty nuts and had me laughing a few times at the ridiculousness. If you're into open world games like Grand Theft Auto then I'd think it'd be safe to say you'd like this one too.

If I had to describe this game to someone, I would tell them it's basically Grand Theft Auto on a much grander scale.  When I finished the main plot, I was still only 30% complete of everything this game has to offer.  If you're looking for the best game to keep you occupied for months, or if you just like blowing stuff up, Just Cause 2 is for you.

This game was exciting, versatile, and fun to play.  It's an open world game with a wide array of in-game mission options.  I would recommend this game to anyone looking for a cheap way to have several hours of fun.  This is one that will stay in my game library.

As I don't really play X-box I will let my son write about this game! He has spent if not then close to a 100 hours playing this game already!
Here you go:
This game is the best game I have played in my entire life! My friends love the game. We can't stop playing it. The only thing I don't like about this game is nothing! The only frusturating thing about this game is when my mom turns it off!
summary: Great game for my 10 year old!

reviewText: this is my favorite game of all time! the graphics are incredible, and the gameplay is awesome! granted the story and voice acting is not the best but its easy to overlook when everything else in the game is just awesome.

I bought this game for my boyfriend and we both thoroughly enjoy playing it. He said it's a wonderful change from the first game which was not very exciting or fun. He's put a lot of time into this game so far and says he hasn't even begun to complete the game. I would recommend this game to anyone.

Yes you read that title right. If you are still using windows xp, like a majority of PC gamers are, then you can not play this game. I actually purchased this game, got it home and before I got it out of the box I luckily noticed that it said Windows Vista/7 on the box. I promptly returned it for a refund.

I repeat, no Windows XP support, be warned.

This is a amazing game, it is fast paced and you are never bored, but it is EXTREMELY unrealistic but that's what makes it so fun.

But i would HIGHLY, HIGHLY recommend downloading the demo before purchasing to make sure your PC can run it.

This game is great. It's like a cross between crysis and gta. It's easy to pick up and play and very satisfying. The only thing I wish was different would be if some of the bigger buildings were destructible.

Crap! This game was no fun! I bought this at GS for $10. I threw it in the trash a week later! There are so many things wrong with this game that I don't have the time to list them. The idea/story was cool but it just wasn't fun to play!

I enjoyed this game very much, it was fun and challenging, there are many levels and it gets more creative and full of hidden objects as you move up, I would recommend this to anyone who loves to find hidden things in pictures.
summary: I enjoyed this game very much,

reviewText: This game is great! There are going to be people who complain about everything, so, unless you feel like they do, you will enjoy this game! It is so fun! I have been playing since we got it. My brother, sister, and I play against each other and with each other. I love all the songs on it. I am glad it is not all Aerosmith, that would probably be boring, but there is a mix of Aerosmith and non-Aerosmith songs. I love it!

This is an amazing game! However, I do not recommend purchasing because you can buy the entire Mass Effect trilogy from EA's own digital store Origin for $20. If this was a review for the game itself I would give it 6 out of 5 stars because it truly is that great of a game. However, because you can save money and get 2 extra great games I do not recommend buying this product.
summary: Great game, but don't buy it here

reviewText: Portal was one of those games I heard about a lot, but never played until a few years after the fact.  And I'm glad I played it!  I've always had a mind for puzzle games, and this is no exception.  I found it extremely enjoyable, if a bit short, and listening to GLaDOS was very entertaining.  XD  Definitely worth picking up, though I would definitely recommend grabbing it straight from Steam instead of getting a hard copy.  It's less expensive that way.

I highly recommend that the entire trilogy be played in order, so you'll definitely want to start from the beginning. I'm not a shooter fan, and I didn't think I liked sci-fi much either, but I fell in love with this trilogy. It's my favorite game series by far.

Honestly if you have any doubts as to the quality of this game, they are worth throwing out the window because you will hate yourself if you don't give this a chance. You don't want to miss an opportunity to experience this trilogy of games. One of my favorites.
summary: One of the best game series of all time

reviewText: Maybe it's just my nostalgia for what I considered the Golden Age of video games, but the original Mass Effect will always be one of my favorites.  An amazing story, lots of customization, solid strategy, and a touch of precision shooting make for one heck of a combination.  Does it look a little rough?  Sure.  Is the format identical to a number of games in that era?  Sure.  But it's still pretty much the pinnacle of the genre.  Play and enjoy, folks!
summary: The original may be the best.

reviewText:
Portal is one of the most imaginative, unique, and fun games I've ever
played! It does a great job of messing with your senses and going beyond your expectations. The puzzles are great. I've never played anything like this. Great game!

Mass Effect is a series that will stay with me forever.

This game may be old, but I have recently replayed it for the Xbox and I still enjoyed it more than many games that have recently been released. So much so that I purchased it for the PC!
summary: One of my favorite games to this day

reviewText: It's a good game, and for $5.00 you can't really beat that.  Newer games have slightly better graphics but this is one I think you will enjoy even though it's been out a while.  You may also want to pick up a copy of ME2 ;)

Team Fortress 2 is one of those rare games that can always be fun no matter what. With all the different classes, weapons, and hates to choose from it is no wonder why this is excellent. Valve has proved once again that they can make a great game.
summary: A great game for the PC

reviewText: It's a fun sci-fi/RPG - created by BioWare, which has had a pretty solid reputation for turning out good games (like the Baldur's Gate series, Dragon Age, etc.). Whether you're more of a shooter or RPG kind of person, Mass Effect satisfies both. However, I did find the inventory a little annoying since you seemed to be inundated with all sorts of useless junk all the time. Other than that, it has a great plotline, multiple alien races, and interesting characters.

I know there are a ton of other reviews out there for this game on the PC so i wanted to be straight up with everyone. This game for me is, without a doubt, EASILY placed on my top 10 favorite RPG's of all time for any console. The elements in this game and the story line make this game NEAR PERFECT. I played through this, then i went straight to Mass Effect 2 for the PC, and you know what? Mass Effect 3 can't come soon enough. Period. A fan of RPG's? A fan of FPS's? Welcome to paradise my friends.
summary: Ok. And now we move PAST the PC tech issues. EPIC!

reviewText: If you purchase this game on Steam, as I did, you won't have to worry about SecuRom. This is an excellent game, which should appeal to FPS and RPG players alike. I'm a first-person player myself, and there was enough action in this game to keep me happy for hours. It's a little buggy, but I had such fun, I hardly even noticed. Nice cut-scenes, excellent story, all around great game - as long as you get it from Steam.

This game excels in every dimension. It's the first single player RPG where I was actually interested in the dialog, which by itself says a lot about the writing in the game. Ultimately, I have the say it was hands down the best single player RPG experience I've ever had.
summary: Easily the Best Single Player Game I've Played

reviewText:
As a big fan of the KOTOR series, I've been looking forward to playing this game.

Then I read about the DRM ...

I didn't buy Bioshock --- because of DRM. I didn't buy Spore --- because of DRM. And now I'm not going to buy Mass Effect --- because of DRM. When will these companies learn? You can't treat your customers like criminals.

First of all, if you're buying this game because you think there's nudity in it, DON'T! Because there is NO NUDITY! As for the game mechanics, they are absolutely atrocious. The storyline is sleep-inducing. The controls are almost impossible to get used to. The characters are as uninteresting as they could possibly be. PLEASE don't waste your money on this game!

Mass Effect is one of the best games I have ever played.  I loved the story, action, dialogue choices, etc.  I would definitely recommend this game to anyone who loves RPGs, or more specifically space/science fiction RPGs!
summary: One of the best RPGs ever!

reviewText:
Well, my copy of the game hasn't even arrived, and yet I see that I paid $10 too much for it (49.95).  That's not a very good starting point for a game that I bought on the reviews alone.

I'll write a review when I have some time to play, but I wanted to air my sour grapes about the price drop.
summary: Paid too much and hasn't arrived

reviewText: My 9 year old got this for his birthday and loves using it with GranTurismo. I have it clipped to an end table and that works well. It is not a cheap junky toy. It is of good quality that I believe will be used for years. You have to read the instructions on how to get it to work with some games, but the instructions are easy to understand, especially if you are familiar with the PS3. For the price, it just can't be beat

This wheel will not work for PS2. The item description and photo are wrong. If you look in the lower left hand corner of the box in the photo you can see it says PS3, PS2 and PC but the item they ship will only say it's for PS3 and PC. The manufacture still makes a PS3, PS2 and PC version but this is NOT it. I pointed the problem out to Amazon when I returned it the 1st time then they shipped me the same / wrong item a second time.
summary: Wrong item description - this will NOT work for PS2

reviewText:
What are you still sitting there for? BUY THIS GAME.

I know The Sims 4 is out. And it's great. But if you haven't ever played The Sims 2 this is THE one to buy.

You will see how different the game was back when, and how they've both improved and hurt the game in the later editions.

Was a little hesitant about buying this used, but the game arrived in decent condition and had the install codes. I was also worried it wouldn't install on my computer (gaming laptop running Windows 8.1) since it's an older game but I didn't have any problems with that.

These guys were super awesome. When i got the game it didn't come with the serial code to install it which was no big deal at all. They were very nice and offered a full refund for the inconvience. It wasn't not their fault at all that the game didn't have a serial code so I would definitely still buy stuff from them.
summary: These guys were super awesome. When i got the game it didn't ...

reviewText: I bought this for my daughter and she loves it. Loves it more than Sims 3. I agree with her. It is easier to build houses and game play is not as complicated. She hasn't stopped playing since she got it.

The game doesn't work after I installed it. It will not launch and says there is an error. I have not been able to fix this despite many tries from what I have read with others who have had this problem as well. Considering I bought this brand new only 2 days ago, I will be returning this and getting my money back.

Thank you Electronic Arts. You are awesome. I love the game and this is the first time owning a PC game for sims. It's very fun and I played it for a very long time. My sims neighborhood is so big now. Thank you!

This game stopped working shortly after I purchased it. My XBOX 360 could not read the disc. Upon closer examination of the game disc, it appeared that it was a copied disc. I will not buy from this seller again.

I downloaded this and as soon as it tried to open it said "unable to open please redownload" now I have tried to redownload it 3 times each time taking 2 hours out of my day, I have sent in a note to support and hopefully they can fix my problem or give me a refund, what a waste of time and money.

I downloaded it and installed it with no problems, but as soon as I tried to play it, I got an error message:

"Game is not able to start properly. Please reinstall your game."

Great, $20 down the toilet. I would suggest skipping the worthless download, and just buying the disc.
summary: Installed, but the game won't start!

reviewText:
I really..really..really love playing this game. Sadly, many hours of my life have passed me by just playing with my Sim creations.  This is one of the better deals for this game, it has Sims 2 and two expansion packs, you're not going to find it for a better price. There is so much to do and create with the Sims 2, I'd recommend anyone buy it.

*I have Windows 7 and I haven't had any problems with my computer since I've installed it.

I bought this game as a Christmas gift for a friend and we had so much fun making Sims and arranging their houses! I played the first one a couple of years ago and it was great, but all the improvements they've added have made the game superb! Sims 3 is coming out soon, but I wonder "how can you improve on perfection?"

I have enjoyed this package from day one and can barely stop playing it! It has so many different things to do, it's a load of fun. Especially if you can get everyone in the family hooked on playing it as well! I am very pleased with my products from Amazon.com. Thanks!
summary: The Best Sim City Package Yet!

reviewText: When I saw this game on Amazon, I wasn't sure if I should buy it or not. I looked at the reviews and they were favorable, but I still wasn't sure. In the end I decided to buy it. I loved the game I instantly started playing it. The game was colorful, the animation was fantastic, the characters were amazing, and the story was great. Who knew that making a game that makes you paint building could be so much fun.

Tried this game on a whim and I am so glad I did. It is an excellent game with great graphics. I love the color scheme they have with the black and red on the areas under nazi control. Plus you get to sabotage nazi equipment, what's not to love about that?

This game is great for a non-gamer. The moves are easy to pick up, and while the levels can present a bit of a challenge, nothing feels impossible. The graphics are really fun. I would definitely recommend this product!

Oh, this is exactly the type of game I like.  It is a great, fun, challenging, interesting puzzle type game but still has action.  The music and graphics are top rate.  The animation is smooth and accurate.  Another great thing is that you can't really get "stuck" without the ability to proceed.  I highly recommend.

de Blob is based on an incredibly simple game mechanic--you're a rolling blob of paint, and the entire experience boils down to collecting and mixing the right colors to paint various things.  So simple, in fact, that you might call it a gimmick.

But it's implemented so well, and polished to such a degree, that any fan of platformers would be doing him/herself a disservice by missing out on this game.

Give de Blob a shot.
summary: Simple mechanic makes for a very enjoyable game

reviewText: The Silent Hill franchise has always been very enticing to me. I remember when my friends used to play these games, and we just enjoy being scared. This game I wouldn't say is terrifying, but certainly keeps you on your toes. The graphics are fantastic. The storyline is (as always) full of twists and turns. Highly recommended!

The first 5 minutes of the game look great. Sadly, Konami decided to go against the grain and not allow inversion of the camera. Now, while this may not affect everyone, it does hurt a good number of people. Inversion isn't something you can just stop doing if you're used to it, and every other game I've ever played allows it. So, I'm taking my copy back after 5 minutes of playtime, and giving my money to a developer that doesn't suck.
summary: Might be good, but with no invert, it's a bust

reviewText: Keep in mind I have not yet finished this, or even played a Silent Hill game before. This game is amazing, It's not as good as Dead Space, but in my opinion it's very close. I'm glad I bought this today instead of Prince of Persia, M rated games are always better.
summary: Wouldn't want this to be my home

reviewText: Every time I have purchased this game, it has glitches and then stops working altogether. When I talked to the people of Konami, they informed me this was a common issue. I was fully refunded but I would have liked to have been able to play the game because I love the Silent Hill series.
summary: I was fully refunded but I would have liked to have been able to play the game because ...

reviewText: We bought this for our 7 year old son. He loved the demo and kept doing it over and over until he could find his way through. He loves to figure things out and doesn't want to give up. He may get frustrated and shut it off, but he will eventually go back and try it again. He has a hard time concentrating on things; example - he has a hard time sitting still to watch a movie. He will have to watch that in segments. So if you have a child that loves Parkour type games you might want to try this.

I had this game for over a year and I wasn't sure if I was ever going to play it.  A couple of times I thought about selling it, but man am I glad I didn't.  This was one of the most exhilarating  gaming experiences I have ever had.  Incredible free form running is the best part about the whole game.  It also has a solid story, great music, and they created an incredibly believable futuristic city.  I really hope they make a sequel to this, the potential for this franchise is limitless.

This is quite an excellent addition to the Silent Hill series. I have played 1,2,3,4 and this is just as good as all the others. The only complaint I have is that the graphics could have been a little better, but that's OK.

I love this game. I absolutely adore it. It is one of my top ten games of all time. It is so unique. There is so much atmosphere in this game. It is impossible to explain how this game makes me feel. It is great and you owe it to yourself to check it out. Especially now since it is $15.

I had heard from many reviews that this game was fun, but I was blown away at how much I really enjoyed simply running around and exploring the world most of the time ignoring the main story. I like how they give you a choice on either shooting the bad guys or disarming them by using your running skills. I highly recommend this game to anybody who wants a break from shooting games and instead would like to try a fast paced solid gaming experience.
summary: Great graphics combined with fluid animations make this a winner

reviewText: Mirror's Edge is an amazing game. That isn't to say that there are no faults with the game. Occasionally the game has some glitch issues with catching ladders. However, it's not a big deal. The game is fun. The story can be unclear, but I did not run into that problem. The game is worth a look no matter what. I am recommending this to everyone.

Ok I've played the demo to this game and I don't think its a bad game. I just think it's hard. Out of all the first person view type games, this one actually made my eyes hurt, 4 the 1st time. It's not a bad game once you get used to the controls (which is a lot to remember)and it's so realistic the graphics are pretty cool. But the game is nice it's not a complete waste of money. It just takes gettin used too.

I bought this game after looking up some gameplay videos online and i have to say that it certainly does not disappoint! Be aware that the main draw of this game is the parkour, or free running aspect of it. If your looking for a detailed or in depth storyline then you're setting yourself up for disappointment. On the other hand jumping across fences, walls, rooftops, and other places is fun and some of the puzzles might have you pausing for a moment. It's a short game but you'll love every minute of it!

I've had my own copy of Island of Happiness for many years, but I bought it as a present for my boyfriend, who loved it.
The basic premise of the game is you are stranded on an island, and you take over a ranch there. You can grow crops, raise animals, compete in contests, make friends, find a spouse, and so much more. This game has brought me tons of joy, and I hope it will do the same for you!

This is actually the second time I've purchased this game. It was great when it came out and it still is. After playing it the first time I owned it, I traded it in. I decided to buy it again while it's still available as it's my favorite Harvest Moon game. I'll be keeping it this time.

I had the Harvest Moon for the GameBoy Advanced and LOVED it! So I decided to get this one and, to be perfectly honest, I didn't think I would like the game when I first got it. So much was different and it was really hard in the beginning of the game but I kept playing and now, I think I like it better than the first one!

I haven't had it very long, but I already LOVE this game.  It's so much more challenging!  The controls are not as complicated as many have said.  I personally like the stylus controls.  If you can maneuver yourself in The Legend of Zelda: The Phantom Hourglass, then you can for sure get accustomed to the stylus controls in this game!  I like that you have to progress more slowly in the game as well, it's certainly gives you more for you money that way!

First racing game I bought for the ps3. My friend bought this game for his 360 and told me about it. I then bought this game and had a blast with it. I think the game is missing some things, but over all the racing is fun and the grafix is good. I was not disappointed it is a racing game and that is what you do race. If the price is right pick up this game.

THIS GAME WILL NOT SAVE. I first opened up the game and put it in my xbox. As soon as I started playing it I fell in love with the Assassin's Creed like game play, French setting, and the corny storylines. Unfortunately after playing it for about a month my copy turned out to be defective. I could not save any progress that I attempted to make. Don't make the same mistake as me, don't buy this game.
summary: As soon as I started playing it I fell in love with the Assassin's Creed like game play

reviewText: Grid is a great game. I enjoy it with the Logitech GT Force wheel. It has good graphics and gameplay. It's not like Gran Turismo when it comes to upgrades and modifications. You just get different cars without doing any modifications to it. It's not trying to compete with GT. It's a arcade/simulation. The racing is pretty simulation-like. But the other frills that come with GT are lacking. However, that is fine with me. If I wanted a game like GT, I would get GT. GRID stands on its own and does it well.

I'd say that for the amount of enjoyment this game has to offer you don't have to worry about wasting your money.  There's a huge variety of cars and different types of races.  You won't get bored playing this after just a couple runs.
summary: just buy it, hours of fun ahead.

reviewText: I really love this game. It is easily one of my favorites. I wish they would make another part to it. I think it was really fun and interesting. Way better than gta. And it was a challenge to escape Nazis at time but that is a fun part along with blowing stuff up and seeing how many Nazis you can kill without being spotted. I would give it ten stars if I could.

This is such an enjoyable game and there's just too many things to do and accomplish. I wish there's a follow up to this..i would be first in line to buy it. Thanks to the developers for such a wonderful and entertaining game! Loved it!

It's not often one runs into a driving game that is just pure fun. I play other driving games such as Forza 4, the Need for Speed series and the like. They all good, but not all of them are pure fun. This game is just that; no frills, no bells and whistles, just.... well, fun. Well worth the price, especially now that it is relatively cheap.

Eric

I was hooked on the GRID Demo and finally after 2 weeks of playing that I decided to buy the game. This game is amazing. The graphics are amazing and the GRID World part of the game is a lot of fun. Online is lots of fun. This game might be 3 years old, but it has beaten every racing game I have played including Forza.

This game is all about RACING. It's not about tricking out your cars with rims and lights and spoilers. This is the most fun I've ever had in a racing game. I challenge you to play GRID and not have a ton of fun. The graphics are top notch, and the sensation of speed is great. By far the best racing game of this generation.. all we need now is GRID 2.
summary: Best racing game of this generation

reviewText: I grew up playing a Nintendo and recently when I found it, a cable had been missing. I looked up on amazon to get this cable and here it was! When I got it, you have no idea how happy I was to see that it fit my Nintendo and being able to play it brought back good memories :)

Persona 3 is fantastic in every sense of the word. Gameplay is addictive, characters are well written and make you want to learn more about them,  and the music is probably the best I've heard in any game. If you have any doubts about the Persona 3, don't because you're doing yourself a major disservice by missing out on what I consider to be the greatest video game of all time.
summary: Possibly The Best Video Game On The PS2

reviewText: My daughter asked me for this game and has pretty much been not only playing it non stop since she got it but she cannot stop talking about it. She wants to get the next one too. It came in great condition even though it is an old game for an older gaming system. She loves it. It was a great price too! I was not able to find the game anywhere else but on Amazon!
summary: My daughter asked me for this game and has pretty much been not only playing it non stop since ...

reviewText: If you have already played Persona 3, you must buy this updated version. If you have never played Persona 3 you can still jump right into this game. This game provides plenty of hours of extra game play and is definitely worth every penny.
summary: A must buy for every Persona fan

reviewText: The only difference between Persona 3 and Person 3 FES, it is the "expansion" they included in this version. The mechanics, the story, and the cast are the same. They added some new features, like more animated cutscenes, and some S. Links. It is a great game, and if you are interested in knowing more of the story or if it is your first time playing it, I highly recommend buying this version of Persona 3, the "Expansion" adds around 30 hours more to the story.

This is the best game i have ever played. There is so much story and its really fun to be able to choose your own path and not have a set storyline. It is amazing. If you want a game that will last you forever buy Persona 3 FES. I have had this game for about a month and have put in over 90 hours of gameplay, and thats just the main game. The FES version has a second chapter called The Answer (the main story is called The Journey) that has an extra 30 to 40 hours of extra gameplay. BUY THIS GAME!!!

I bought another copy of this game so I could play with my friends (they all bought it).. I haven't played it in a while - but the graphics are fantastic and its one of the best multiplayer games ever.e

This game topped the first in graphics and storyline. I love the gameplay of this game and when I first got it I played it for 2 days straight. I have also played it through campaign with a friend and I can't wait for the third to come out.
summary: One of the Best Games of 2008

reviewText: Gears of War 2 is a fantastic game. The story line has improved since the first game and the overall game play is better. Plus there are more options as far as multiplayer and the online game play is better as well.

I found this game to be very disappointing. I expected to be able to play more than one golf course without unlocking them, but that doesn't seem to be the case. In addition, the graphics are dark and muddy and the text is difficult to read. The manual is written in a southern drawl which makes it difficult to read and seems completely unnecessary. It doesn't do a very good job of explaining how to play the game. I just can't find any reason to keep playing this.
summary: Wait for a better miniature golf game

reviewText: I purchased this game for my grandson's 10th birthday. He had already given me a "hint" as to what he wanted. After he opened this gift, he was "locked in" for the rest of the day. Nothing else mattered. The birthday party went on without him as he was off into another world. I have not played this game myself, but I am sure he considers it his best gift. To grab and keep the attention of a 10-year old, it has to be the best.

This is a nice game and a really differnt type of playing regarding a pokemon game. I prefer the regular Pokemon games, but this one isn't too bad. It does take a little bit to get used to the way the game is, but over all it is a nice game for all.

Love how this looks on my DS. It is a perfect fit and I love how I can still see the original color of my DS through the clear case. If you like Mario, and need a case for your DS, this is the way to go. Now I wish they would make something like this for my 3DS too.

I LOVE WII AND I REALLY DONT KNOW WHAT TO WRITE ABOUT THIS PRODUCT EXCEPT THAT IT DOES EXACTLY WHAT IT SAYS IT WILL DO.. I HAVE NO TECH ISSUES WITH IT AND ITS A PRETTY COOL LOOKING FOR MY FREAKIN WII.. I LOVE FREAKIN WIIIIII

I'm a huge fan of the original Fable.  So, when fable II came out, I actually bought a 360 just to play this game.  Fable II definitely takes everything that's great about Fable and improves it.  The dog, the combat, the new story line are all great improvement to the already great fable.  The only issue I have with Fable II is the map is not easily accessible or easily read.  This makes navigation much more difficult the original.
summary: Great improvement on a great game

reviewText:
Fable 1 will forever hold a place in my heart as the best in the series; Fable 2 will always hold a place in my heart for the massive amount of time I've put into it and the fun I've had with it. It most certainly improves upon everything in Fable 1, but Fable 1 will always be my favorite.
You won't need Fable 1 to get started in Fable 2.
You will not want to play local coop or online coop as either way you're forced to tether yourselves together on one screen. It's not enjoyable this way.
summary: ... forever hold a place in my heart as the best in the series

reviewText:
I bought this as a Christmas gift for my daughter. It's very apparent she likes the game and is happy with it, because she plays it at least an hour everyday--and she's a busy girl!
She hasn't voiced anything negative about it. And trust me, if she didn't like something about it, she would let me know.

i bought this for my son, he seems to really like it. i am just really impressed with customer service. the first one i ordered never arrived. when i told you about it. you sent a second one that got here just in time for Christmas. thank you.

If you know anything about the 1st fable, it's amazing, and Fable 2 does justice for a sequel.  The Gameplay is great and the story is pretty good, it's just the bugs.  There are so many bugs and glitches in the game it's ridiculous.  I have no clue why there are so many in the game, but it's such a good game that you tend to not even care that there are these terrible bugs.  If it were any other game, I would have quit for the glitches, but it's just such a sweet game that I didn't want to stop playing.

I think this is a very good game to buy for the PS3.  Great characters and moves.  The graphics are incredible and the sound is great in surround sound.  The outfits are fun to use.

Overall, this is a fantastic game to add to your collection.

My daughter is crazy over Kung-Fu panda, and I'm not gonna lie I like him too. How can you not? Anyhow, both of my children love playing this game. My son doesn't play a lot of games with his sister, BUT this one he will. I even like playing it. It is fun! If your child likes Kung-Fu Panda, I'd recommend this game for them, and it's not too hard either.

I had to order this online because my local game store only had the wireless connectors. As soon as I received this I plugged it into the Wii and into my modem. I followed the instructions on the options console and everything worked the first time. I've been using it for about two weeks now and have had no problems. It was worth the money because it came with the cord, other ones I've looked at you had to purchase the cord seperately.

I bought this because for some reason I couldn't get my Wii connected wirelessly. I don't know why that is because we do have a wireless modem. But all the same with this I was able to hook my system up with my LAN line and was able to get online. So I think it was worth it because there were games over the network that I wanted to buy.

The cable that came with it was just bonus =D. But anyway this thing is really awesome.

I had not heard much about this title when it came out for PS3. I really liked the 2 that were put out for PS2 so I thought I'd give this one a shot. I was not disappointed in the least. This game has the best destruction I have ever seen in a game. If the thought of running around and smashing buildings apart with a sledgehammer appeals to you then you have to get this game.

I've just finished playing through the single player campaign.  It is very engaging and challenging.  The dynamics of choosing your own mission, among many different choices, is very enjoyable to me.  I've also played with a friend taking turns to see how much destruction we could do.  That was fun.  I've only played a couple of online missions, and those are fun too.  To me, the thing that differentiates this game from the rest, is the single player campaign.

This game is great! Overall I am extremely impressed with the Nintendo Wii and the interactivity of the games. I get a great workout with this game and have found wall ball to be my favorite game. The con that I have found at this point is that you have more options at game play when there are 2 players instead of just one. With 1 player you have to go up to the other kids in the playground and ask them to play with you, which I really didn't enjoy. But that notwithstanding, this game is a must have!

The game is fun to play but crashes in the same spot every time. There is still no patch for this game and many other people are having the same problem. If you want a game you can play about 1/3 of this is your game.

I was always curious about this game when it first came out years back. But never got around to purchasing it. Saw it on amazon and had to try it. The game is pretty freakin fun and challenging which I like alot. Wish I had bought it earlier haha.

All I can say is this is the most fun I have had in a Video Game all year. The story is basically just there to let you blow stuff up. This is more fun than it sounds. This game is also packed to the core with content, I have spent more than 30 hours playing the single player and skipped about half of the side missions so far.

I just ask you to rent the game. You will like it so much that you will most likely want to buy it.
summary: Blow Stuff Up like an Action Star

reviewText: I took a long time trying to decide on what PS3 system to purchase. I wanted this MGS4 package because of its backwards compatibility, four USB cables, and memory card readers. It did not disappoint me at all and it has been running excellent from day one. It was a little more expensive but with the DualShock 3 controller and a copy of MGS4, it would be the same price to me if I had purchased it all separately. Get one while you can!
summary: The best option for a PS3

reviewText:
I bought the PS3 because I'm a gamer. I love videogames since I was 9. But the main reason I purchased the PS3 is because of the Blu-Ray capability. If you own an HD TV or projector just like me, you'll be amazed at the quality the BR standard brings to your home theater experience.

Look at it as a Blu-Ray player that also gives you the opportunity to play the best games available in the videogame industry as of now. It's a two in one bargain.
summary: Excellent buy even if you don't play games.

reviewText: My son loved the PSP and the game ("Give it 10 out of 10", he said). The only thing that bothered me is that the PSP does not include any sort of storage for saved games, so be sure to pick up a memory stick when you buy it.

I love the God of War series ever since it came out. When I saw they made a God of War PSP, I knew I had to have it. It took me a while, but I finally got it. It's awesome and beautiful, and I love it.

God of War Chains of Olympus is a great game for the PSP.  I always wanted a PSP, and the God of War series is one of my favorites, so it was perfect for me to get this combo.  I'm just sorry that I wasn't aware of this combo's availability until recently.  The red Kratos PSP unit looks great, too.

I just LOVE my new red psp!!!! I've been a huge fan of GOW for a while on my PS2, but now I can take it everywhere and I love it. I'll admit I was a little concerned because when I played Sims 2 Castaway on it, the game seemed to run a little slow and lag a little, but GOW didn't do ANY of that! It was smooth and, as always, I have TONS of fun killing everything that moves! I HIGHLY recommend this bundle

I'm not a big video game freak, but I do enjoy this PSP and God of War.  It is a somewhat short game, but I don't have the patience that I once had for video games.  Action packed and easy to play for a bit, save and come back to it later.  If you don't have a PSP, this one seems like a great buy - I don't think I would have gotten as much gameplay out of Daxter or the Star Wars game that comes in other packages.

Really a great game if you're a fan of the original FFVII. I was afraid they would have to force the storyline to work but that wasn't the case at all. Everything plot related was very linear and the gameplay and graphics were very enjoyable.

This game is fantastic. The cut scenes looked great for a PSP game and the combat, even if extremely repetitive, was very straight forward and simple to understand.
But the real kicker here is the story. Oh man the story. This game is the prequel to the original FF7 and in my honest opinion a much better tale to tell. We get to know the origins of Aerith and Sepiroth, for example.

I can't recommend this game enough, it's such a shame that it's not available on the PS Vita store!
summary: Zack is everything that Cloud should have been, game is also good :D

reviewText: I actually like Crisis Core more than the original game, but I also thought FF7 was entirely too long for no reason. Anywho, Final Fantasy fans of all ages will enjoy Crisis Core, and even if you don't like Final Fantasy, the unique battle system is definitely worth a try. It was really fun to explore the world of FF7 in a whole new way.

This product was bought as a Christmas gift for my daughter.  It is new and still in shrink-wrapped packaging.  We have had a difficult time finding this game in "new" condition and I am sure she will enjoy it.

One of the best games ever made for the PSP or for any system.  I literally cried when it was over.  If you're looking for a fun, immersive experience for the PSP, do yourself a favor and get this game.

I am a really big fan of Final Fantasy VII. So when this game came out I really wanted to get a PSP so I'd be able to play this game. I was a little sad when it seemed like I wouldn't have been able to get this game. But when I finally got a PSP this was the first game I got. Things are much different from other Final Fantasy games, but it is still quite fun.
