One of the best PSP games ever made, Crisis Core gives you a fun and great looking story of the events that happened before Final Fantasy VII. You will be drawn in to hours of gameplay with tons of side missions. If you like Final Fantasy games, you will love this one.

If you're looking for a great RPG for the PSP, this is the one.
The gameplay is fun and inuitive. The combat system is seamless with normal gameplay.
The cutscenes are gorgeous, and the storyline is interesting.
For fans of Final Fantasy VII, this game will bring back fond memories... It elucidates some mysteries while creating other interesting ones.
summary: Worthy addition to the Final Fantasy franchise

reviewText:
This was the one must-have game for PSP when I purchased the system a few days ago.  I have had a hard time putting it down since.  The story is compelling and the cutscenes are all first-rate.  There's plenty of action between the mission system and the storyline.
Some Final Fantasy fans may have to get used to the new leveling system but after a little bit of playtime, it begins to make sense and is really very interesting.  A great addition to any RPG fan's PSP library!
summary: Everything you would expect from FF!

reviewText: If you have been a fan of previous Final Fantasy games, you will enjoy this game.  The combat is different, but the game is still a blast.  This is an excellent game for the PSP.  If you own one, this is one of THE games to get for your handheld system.

This is a great game.  My 7 year old plays the game and has so much fun with it.  There are challenging parts that I help him with but there is so much to this game that even if you are stuck in a certain part it does not detract from the game play.  The graphics are great and this is one our top pick games.

A fun strategy game. The goal of this game is to become a chocolatier and build an international empire of chocolate. To do this, you need to travel to new lands, meet new people, find new ingredients, and most importantly, develop new and more exotic recipes. It's not the most challenging game ever, but it is addictive and very entertaining. Try it!

I was surprised to find this item. I was even more surprised that it worked so well. Shipping was fast and the packaging was unopened and brand new. I only ended up needing one of the two batteries I ordered but I am saving the second one just in case.

I definitely recommend this product instead of having to buy a new controller or even try and make a warrantee claim through Sony.

I purchased an PS3 for Christmas for my family. I did not want my system to sit out and collect dust so I needed a case to protect and store my system. It works and I am able to place it on the shelf and go about my business. Yes, I would recommend this to a friend. I plan to buy another one for my PS2

This controller is NOT in Very Good condition. It will not turn off automatically. I have tried everything to get it to turn off and it will not. This controller should have been sold in a "fair" condition.
summary: This controller is NOT in Very Good condition. It will not turn off automatically

reviewText: This controller was a piece of crap I bought it in November. And of course the warrantee went out in January. And here I am the first week of April I can't charge it I can't turn it on I can't reset it I can't do anything I've had the thing less than six months and it is absolutely useless. I can't return it I can't get anything for it I am very disappointed

Got this for my son and husband, as they needed a second remote for our PS3 and it works great. It's matte so the feel is very smooth. It connected right to our PS3 when we plugged it in and works really well wirelessly. I'm glad we decided to go with this one because I read a lot of bad reviews beforehand, about other remotes on Amazon and felt that this one is the best one. And it really is!
summary: as they needed a second remote for our PS3 and it works great. It's matte so the feel is very smooth

reviewText: Sony customer service is the worst I have ever experienced. I had to pay to return a defective product.  They exchanged it for the wrong item and then refused to provide the appropriate replacement even if the wrong one was returned.  The story is longer but I am now stuck with a PS4 controller that I can't use on my PS3.
summary: Worst customer experience I have ever had

reviewText: I got this as a replacement for my husband's controller which had been used so much it was starting to short out. I got a good condition used unit. It looks brand spanking new, tbh. I don't know how much it was used, but it wasn't much. It synced right up to the Play Station. It's charging right now. I don't know much about consoles or controllers, but I do know that I am really happy with this purchase, and I know he will be, too.

I bought two of these thinking it would be great to buy something used. The first one started not working the day it came in the mail so I was able to return it for a refund. The second one however, started doing the same thing a month after purchase so it was no longer under the warranty. My advice, don't waste your time and money when you will have to buy new eventually.

Very disappointed that this did not come with the charging cable. I made sure to read the description to see if it stated that it did not come with one and nothing in the description said it didn't. If that would have been listed I would have purchased the cord at the same time or found one that included it.

As long as you don't play any FPS games as hard as I do, & don't wear out the left thumb stick, you'll be good. Also, this 1 for some reason has a few times where it won't sync with my PS3. I don't know what that's about, but I'm going to need to get a new 1 soon...

I'm a PC gamer, but I don't much care for the D-Pad on XBox 360 controllers. To use these with my PC, I employ: http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00DSFW5MA?psc=1&redirect=true&ref_=oh_aui_detailpage_o00_s00. Be advised that if you wish to use two PS3 controllers with X Input games, you'll need two adapters. Other than that, the system works great for me.
summary: the system works great for me

reviewText:
Does exactly what it is intended to do.
Works great with both the official Sony brand controllers as well as the off brand ones.
The rumble still works on the controller when I use the extension.
It plugs in snugly.
It's pretty durable.
I bought two of them and they have lasted me over a year. There is no indication that they are going to break any time soon either.
summary: Good bang for the buck & does what it's supposed to.

reviewText: If you're like me, and you still want to play your PS2 games, but your living room sitting area is much farther away from your PS2, and you DON'T want to go out and buy a wireless controller for the PS2, then this is what you want to buy.  I don't think there's anything else to say about this product.  The connectors are good and the wire is sturdy.  If you need more than 6 feet, then buy 2. =)
summary: Simple exactly what the title says it is

reviewText: This isn't a game, but an extension for my controller.  This is the second one I purchased.  The first one, I gave to my son.  I decided I need one also.  The extension makes it easier to play and not worry about the game falling over if I pull it too much.  I definitely recommend this to any game player.

This works pretty well. It does exactly as it should. You simply plug it into a PS2 and it extends the length of the cable. I use it so I can play while on my bed. It does not lag and it constantly sends a signal. There are not any breaks at all. Definitely worth it.

Now that we're all getting bigger TV's, we're not sitting as close as we used to. For those of us who have yet to upgrade to a PS3, Xbox 360, or Wii, we have two options: Go and buy an expensive wireless controller (I'm not knocking on them, it's just... when you're playing old-school games, you're either nostalgic or on a budget) or pick up one of these bad boys. I haven't had a problem with mine since I got it. It's worked great. I've got two running off of a Ps2 slim. Get it! It's worth it.
summary: Does exactly what it needs to.

reviewText:
I've bought two more lately, a red and a white one; owned a PS3 since 2006 with the controller that came with it, and bought another in 2008. The older ones are still holding up well, and there are no problems with charging and battery life. Well worth the money, and I intend to use them for even a longer time to come.

Only flaw was that the newer ones did not come with chargers, though it's a problem on my part, as I didn't read through the content printed on the boxes carefully.
summary: Holds up well through the years

reviewText: I'm still playing it and I just love it!!!  It's a very interesting game with a lot of exciting things to do. The story is funny but a good one and it's not just for kids, I'm a 71 year old lady and I'm having the time of my life with these games. I hooked up my PSP to my 32" tv so I can see it better and now I'm on it 5 to 8 hours a day. "thanks" for having such good quality items.

Nice wheel, I have been using it now for almost a year and a half and everything still works great.  I use it for Iracing and it does everything I need.  It doesn't have an off switch though, you just have to unplug which isn't a big deal.
summary: Nice wheel, I have been using it now for ...

reviewText: The package I received was incomplete and a mess. The box was full of receipts from other products/stores and food places. The package was also missing the power adapter. When I purchased my own adapter, the product did not work. The product also had a Goodwill sticker on it. I didn't expect a garage sale like product from this purchase. I will not purchase from this seller again.

I've been using this wheel for almost 2 years on iRacing, and it's still running strong. There are plenty of buttons on this wheel, my hands never have to touch the keyboard during a race. Any adjustment I need to make can be done at my fingertips. For the price, this can't be beat.

this is probably one of my favourite "Tales of..." games. The story is so interesting, the music is amazing, and the graphics are simply exquisite. Even to this date, I feel like this game is one of the best looking Tales of games out there. The game arrived in excellent condition as advertised. Loved it.
summary: This is a fantastic game, great story, great gameplay, and amazing graphics.

reviewText: God, I did not realize how much I love this game until I finished it. One of the best tales games in the series. And I have played them all. The characters will grow on you and the combat is not bad. The story is beautifully told. Everything you want in a JRPG and more.

This is an excellent game. Like every other Tales game I've played, it is very well made with an engaging storyline, exceptional voice work, and a beautiful in-game world. Would recommend for fans of Tales and those who just like a good game.

Love the game, it reminds me of Tales of Symphonia that I played on the GameCube, it says that Tales of Vesperia is a sequel and I would like to know what was the first in it's series so that I know the whole story.

I've purchased two of these in the last year.  Not because I like the wheel so much that I had to have another, but because the first one just died after about two months.
I ordered a second one, and that one died after about two weeks.
I will not be ordering a third.

This is an awesome game. The story, voice acting, combat, and world are all amazing and I have yet to find a single downfall to the game. The combat is great despite its simplicity, and takes a little to get used to, but is still great. The only problem I had with this game is that the case came with a shattered corner and wouldn't close right so I had to replace the case, but the artwork, booklet, and disc were all in perfect condition.
summary: Awesome game definitely worth checking out

reviewText: I have never enjoyed GT5 as much as I have since I bought the wheel.  There's a significant learning curve going from a controller to a wheel, but once you get over that the driving experience is much more enjoyable and the game really comes to life.  Seems to be holding up very well, however the one gripe I have with it is the clamping mechanism which can and will come loose if you're not careful.  Still easily 5 stars.

If you played Tales of Symphonia for the GameCube or the Second one for the Wii, then I would recommend playing this one. Its basically a re-skinned version of that game but with a new story, new setting and a new set of character that you will absolutely fall in love with, I mean who can resist a Dog that not only wears an Eye Patch and smokes a 3 foot pipe, but a Dog that wears an Eye Patch and smokes a 3 foot pipe that you can play as!!!
summary: If you played Tales of Symphonia . . .

reviewText: I BOUGHT THIS ITEM FOR MY DAUGHTER WHO SUFFERS FROM AUTISM.  SHE RECEIVED IT IN RECORD TIME.  AFTER GETTING IT SHE SAID SHE LOVED IT AND IS ENJOYING PLAYING IT. ANY THING THAT MAKES MY DAUGHTER HAPPY, MAKES ME HAPPY.  YES I WOULD RECONMENT THIS ITEM TO MY FRIENDS.

I wanted to keep playing it forever!! The game is really good but a little short for the liking of some players. It really is worth playing and the story is entertaining. I would recommend this game to anyone.

Tales of Vesperia is in my top three Tales games ever. Vesperia is even better than Symphonia and I know a lot of people love that game. I like Vesperia because the battle system seems to flow a lot better and the game itself is beautiful. The soundtrack is amazing and the cast.... the cast is one of the best Tales casts I've ever had the joy of falling in love with. Any RPG fan should own this game.
summary: One of the best Tales titles of all time

reviewText: This is without a doubt one of the best games ever made! it has a great storyline, fantastic characters that will seem real by the end of the game, and playability that actually makes levelling up not a drudge. I rank it right up there with Final Fantasy X, the best of the FF series. You will want to play this game over and over again!

I can not use the PS3 controllers for racing games.  I have F1-2010, F1-2011, F1-2012 & F1-2013.  With this wheel I'm able to drive smoother lines and have a better driving experience than with a controller.  For some reason F12012 is terrible with this wheel so don't bother to use it with that version but all of the others are great.  The feedback is good. the feel is good.  I'm sure there are other better wheels out there but for a much increased price.
summary: Best bargin wheel on the PS3

reviewText: I think that this game is just as much fun as the first one. This one is set after the two worlds have been united, but because you visit many of the same places as the first game it makes you want to play the first one all over again and compare. I think the characters are just as fun and I like being able to have monsters in your party. I haven't finished the game yet but I am sure it will have an excellent replay value as did the first.
summary: As much fun as the first one

reviewText: I really love this game. It's great and an overall good game. Loved the characters and their stories, though the voice acting could have been a bit better. Another thing that bothered me was the reiteration of story details that made things a bit annoying. The game would re-tell facts that I already knew and didn't need to know. But aside from that it's such a great game.

i mean it this is one of the best games ever. no question about it if you have not played it play it now!! and if you have some extra money you might consider getting the ps3 version but if you don't know japanese you should go for the 360 version. i played both of them and they are magnificent.
summary: one of the best games ever

reviewText:
My family LOVES this game so much. My 16, 14, and 9 year old all love it. The little details make the experience so fun. Taking pictures, fireworks, and more.

This game is a big win, and well worth the money.
summary: 10 stars on a five star scale!

reviewText: Bought this back when I purchased my PS3 and Gran Turismo 5, wheel works perfectly and has lasted a long time for me. I hope it's compatible on the PS4 because I'd like to continue using it in the future.

This game is boss. Granted I played it on easy because I just wanted to breeze through the game and enjoy the story some more, but what can I say that really hasn't already been said. Of course it sucks that the ps3 version that hasn't come out here yet has some extra content, but hey for those of you with 360's that like RPG's give this one a shot. If you're at all familiar with the Tales of series or the earlier Star Ocean games, then well, this is for you. Period. Buy it. Play it. Enjoy it.
summary: How can you not like this game.

reviewText:
This is simply the best RPG You'll ever play; yes, even better than Final Fantasy VII, and a lot better than XIII.

It has tons of side quests, characters are fully developed, lots of customization, the story is told in a very interesting way, and there is simply lots and lots of stuff to do.

It's worth every single coin you trow at it.

I bought this to play iRacing with and, for the price, I couldn't have been more pleased. The force feedback is excellent and the buttons right on the wheel are really great. If you're a hardcore racer, you may want to look into something like the G27 with a shifter and clutch, but if you're just getting into sim racing, look no further than this.

While the game has an average story, it's still one worth hearing. Its characters are great, especially the main character. The length of the game is 40-60 hours, but that isn't including the second play through. If you love RPG's that allow you to make your characters into incredibly cheap fighters, then this game is for you.
summary: One of the best RPG's I have ever played.

reviewText:
This game is one of the best RPGs i have played in recent years. it was very fun and i was into the game til the very end. It has a very good story and battle system too.
Seriously, i couldn't get sick of the battle system, it was fun throughout the whole game.

This game isn't even short, if you do all the sidequests too you can finish the game in maybe 70 hours so its well worth it.

Even the load times were short, i pretty much have nothing bad to say about this game so if you like RPGs get this game.
summary: Best Tales game and Best JRPG on the 360.

reviewText: I use this wheel for IRacing and it hasn't let me down. Ive had mine for 2 years now and it still works great. I originally got this to hold me over until i could afford the more expensive wheels, but this one worked so well I still use it.

I really enjoyed this game, I am an adult and I play this almost every evening. My daughter is also in love with it. It is affordable and is pretty easy to get the hang of. I feel like im really at a ski resort.

I was not sure when I first bought this game if it would be worth playing... well, I am pleased to say I am addicted. The fighting and leveling systems are awesome, the story is very well done, and the character development is MUCH better than a lot of the rpgs I have played recently. This is my first Tales game, and definitely it will not be my last.
summary: One of the best since FF7/FF8

reviewText: I never really played any of the tales games... so I was kind of skeptical about getting this game. I just have to say, the more you play, the better this game gets. Instant classic for Xbox 360. If you enjoy RPGs back in the 90's when I was a teenager, then check this game out. Best JRPG out there today.

Better believe it.
This game reminds me of the great Grandia series from the Saturn and Dreamcast days. Real-time combat, great storyline and characters, pretty decent voice-acting.
You won't be able to put this one down. If you enjoy RPG's at all, you deserve to play through this game at least once.
summary: A classic RPG gem in your Xbox 360?

reviewText:
This game was lots of fun, for an hour or so.  Even my 6 year old got bored with it rather quickly.  The game needed more variety.

The difficulty levels in the game are also terrible.  We were skiing double black diamond runs within a half hour with no trouble, yet couldn't get past the first level of moguls.  We took all of the training courses and still couldn't get past it.

All in all, I'm glad I rented this game before I bought it or it would have been a major waste of money.

My boys (ages 7 & 9) love this game.  They love the games that they unlocked such as Search and Rescue/Orienteering.  They are always laughing and having a great time while playing this!  Plus, the price is right for as much fun as it is!  Definitely a great game to add to your collection!

If you are serious about racing or just want a more realistic feel when racing this is a perfect wheel. There are many wheels out there but for the price this is the best one IMO.

For the price you cannot go wrong, this is a great wheel...not the best for something like dirt 3 but awesome on iRacing. If you want this for iRacing you will be amazed at the feedback you get :D

I think this is one of the most fun Wii games on the market today. Up to 4 players can compete skiing down the various mountain trails. You can even use the Wii balance board if you wish. Very pleased with this game and highly recommend it to anyone.
summary: Wii Ski is LOTS OF FUN!

reviewText: Costa Rica pura vida!!! Great purchase! Highly recommended!

This game is so much fun.  It is great for avid gamers and for those just wanting to play with the family. You feel a little silly at first as you try to manage your mii down the slope but it so much fun that you get over it quickly.  All in all this is a great game.
summary: Great game for the entire family

reviewText: Using the wheel over the controller makes all of the difference in GT5! It takes some getting used to at first because of the force feedback. After a bit, you feel like you're connected to the road. Also, I'm not sure if it was listed, but this has paddle shifters on the back of the wheel so you don't have to take your hand off the wheel to use the little sequential shift knob. Great product!

This Wheel is great. I was thinking about buying the G25 because I thought that it would be nicer. This thing feels almost exactly the same as the G25. I bought mine on here for $79, and compared to the G25's price of $252 this thing a must buy. It feels so realistic and the red dial is awesome, and for the price, I'd pick it over the G25.

I bought GT5P and this wheel to treat myself after being a fan of the Gran Turismo series for a long time. I've got to say, its quite an experience. My friends and I built a mount for it and it feels fantastic.

The wheel itself is comfortable and solid feeling. The pedals are heavy and don't move when you're playing, especially on wood floors.

The clamping system is good and keeps the wheel in place during tight turns.

I ordered the guitar from Amazon because places like Gamestop don't sell used guitars anymore and this was the one I wanted. I can use this guitar for both the Xbox 360 and my laptop. Everything works great, all the buttons, the strum bar, and whammy bar are all in good condition. The only problem with the guitar is that the start and select button are really tiny and hard to get but that isn't a problem unless your trying to get 1st place on high scores.

I normally do not review games, but this one was so good.  My husband and I have been playing computer games for years.  We each have our own pc and play games at the same time.  The storyline was great but there was still plenty of action, visual effects were super, had a good beginning, middle and wonderful ending.  You felt like you were leaving good friends behind when the games ended.  Hopefully BioWare will continue to make such outstanding games.

Mass effect is a great game.  I can't say enough good things about it.  One of my favorite things is that it doesn NOT use steam, which I totally hate.  I found myself wishing the game was longer because I enjoyed it so much.

After playing for the first hour, the story had me hooked. I played because I wanted to know more about the characters and the plot was better than any game I can think of. Worth playing all the way to the end, my jaw was on the floor the entire way.
summary: Best plot in a video game, ever

reviewText:
I just got this cable today to hook up my PS3 to my projector. I followed the instructions to a T and the result: an extremely faded image. I can't even read the text, and the colors are completely off. I tried to change the settings of the projector to see if that would help the image, but unfortunately, it didn't do much. An S-Video input does better than this! As soon as the Post Office opens tomorrow, I am returning this item.

Don't waste your time or money on this product.

I was looking for a good, solid controller for PS2 and PS3 that didn't cost an arm and a leg. This controller is reasonably priced, delivers good performance, and is plug and play with most games for PS2 and PS3. It is also easy to configure with PC if you're using MAME, giving a true arcade stick feel.
summary: Solid Controller for PS2/PS3 and PC

reviewText: This is a great arcade stick! I use it for mame and ps3 games mostly and I really like it. The joystick was a little loose for my taste but it was not hard to open it up and adjust it a little to tighten it up.
summary: good arcade stick for the price

reviewText: This fighting stick is absolutely amazing. I've been using it for USF4 and I went from crap at the game to an apprentice in training, my friends. If you're looking for a fighting stick on a budget, this is the stick for you. It's very comfortable to handle and works perfectly on the PC (haven't tried it on any of the other two since I don't own them), just plug it in and play.
summary: This fighting stick is absolutely amazing. I've been using it for USF4 and I ...

reviewText: I purchased this joystick to use with two keyboard-controlled PC games. It simply does not work with those games. The instructions for the joystick are badly written, but state that the device may not work with keyboard-controlled games. In my case, it definitely did not work.
summary: Will Not Work with Some Keyboard-controlled Games

reviewText:
I haven't used it for too long, but I can definitely say this is a well-made, easily modded, and (most important to me) inexpensive arcade stick.

That it works on most major platforms is just a great bonus.

This is a great fighting stick for the price. If you're new to an arcade controller and don't want to spend way too much on, say, a Hori, then definitely pick this up!! It feels great and it's a great value!!

HOWEVER, if you're already experienced, then you might want to get something else for a bit more $$ or build your own!!

Liked this game very much, seems overwhelming at first, but once you get the hang of it, it's very engaging.  This game has a lot of replay value, and I can't think of any other games that are this massive of a scale.  Up to scalable play with 8 players at once, 1000 controllable units per player, 100+ km maps, 4 factions, and many different unit types.

It hasn't even arrived yet, but I have played this game a lot over the years. It is one of the greatest RTS games of all time. The AI can be tough on harder settings, plus you can have multiple AI's gang up against you. The resource management isn't tedious, just metal and power. The controls are very easy to pick up, like second nature. It's a blast to build up a army of robots and vehicles and clash with your enemies.

...and buy this game. This game is arguably the greatest RTS ever made. Any fan of RTS game should enjoy this game immensely. The scope of this game is still, to this day, unprecedented.

I personally enjoy this game more than Starcraft 2.

This is one of my favorite RTS games of all time! It's up there with Company of Heroes! The scale of this game is absolutely crazy having up to 500 units per player in a single match. I would recommend this game to anyone who likes strategy games!

If you've invested in a Wii Fit, this is a must buy. This is a well-engineered silicone sleeve, it fits snugly but is also easy to put on the board. I use my Wii Fit in my bare feet, and this sleeve keeps the board clean and also provides a nice, slip-free cushion. I highly recommend this product to anyone who owns a Wii Fit.

This guitar is very nice and cool, works really fine and looks really awesome, the only thing I didn't like was the first time I used it, for some reason the yellow button didn't work, but I just remove the arm of the guitar and put it again and started to work fine. And then the "string" of the guitar didn't work well but after some use started to work fine. I had some minor problems but it works ok. =D

I actually bought this for the low price, but it came in handy when i tried to walk in a room and not turn the light on. It stood out. And this board weighs quite a bit, so you wouldn't want it falling on your foot.

I don't know why, but I've bought a LOT of pink stuff and it's CHEAPER than other colors. I can only say that the sleeve I got was a good fit and showed no sign of tearing. It is thin, but gives me a little cushion and a much better grip. I'm very pleased with mine.

This item is a good product. It was easy to put on the fit and it did not break for me like other customers. I don't think it is worth a lot, but if you can find it for cheap, I would recommend this product.
summary: Great for keeping your fit clean!

reviewText: I thought this would be great. At first it seemed so. Then my balance board starting malfunctioning. I sent it back to Nintendo and they sent me a new board. As soon as I put the sleeve on the new one the right quadrant stopped working. I called Nintendo. As we discussed the problem I mentioned the sleeve. I do believe it caused both boards to malfunction. I am now on my third board and have thrown away the sleeve.

I just got this amazing Clear Silicone Sleeve. And it seems like I'm on a spending spree when it comes to my wii. It's worth every penny. After looking for this product everywhere, I FINALLY got my hands on one and it was sooo worth it! this is a must have for every Wii owner. It is a useful and almost necessary! wow, I'm going to buy another one for my sister can't wait.

I thought it wouldn't matter if I got this mat or not, but it makes a big difference in comfort and ease of exercise. It's sturdy, easy to store, and makes getting up and exercising a little easier. I would recommend this accessory.

When I purchased the Wii Fit, I also purchased this pack at the same time.

It's definitely a good value, since the Wii Fit probably drains AA batteries quickly. I've used mine for 9 days with no problems. As long as the battery pack is charged, I can unplug the board and use it as far away as I'd like.

Unfortunately, the USB cord is pretty short and, in addition, the recharge pack covers the Sync button you use to setup the board.

Overall a good value, but those issues are minor annoyances.
summary: A good value but two annoyances

reviewText: This battery only works sporadically. It was a challenge to get it to provide power to the balance board when first installed, and now in the middle of use, the balance board will sometimes suddenly lose power. It's incredibly frustrating, so I would recommend buying a different battery.

I was not happy with this product. It would not fit into my balance board and when I contacted customer service, I was told there was never a problem with these before. I did keep it and kept trying to use it  but to no avail. SO for me, it was money wasted.
summary: Wii Fit balance bosrd battery charger

reviewText: This product is a life saver.  I was so sick and tired of changing the batteries in the balance board.  This rechargeable battery pack is easy to use and it will save you lots of money wasted in batteries. I definitely reccomend this product!
summary: Wii Fit Balance Board Rechargeable Battery

reviewText: Using recharging packs like this with the Wii Fit Board will cause electrical problems and the board will not work.  I used the one that came with my Wii Fit Bundle and within two days my board would not work anymore.  I called Nintendo and they would not help me even though it came with their bundle.  I ended up having to buy a new board and basically throw away $90 on the broken board.  Do not make the same mistake!

I got the battery charger as part of a pack of items. It just plain doesn't work. I tried charging it from my computer. When it showed a full charge, I put it in my balance board. No power. Replaced batteries, had power. I tried plugging it into the Wii and into the balance board while it showed a full charge. No power. Replaced batteries, had power.

I'm going to get a battery charger and some rechargeable batteries. Could have gotten a decent one for the amount they're charging for this piece of junk.

Why have to worry about the battery power on the Wii Fit when you can just plug it in and forget about it while it's not in use.  The Wii Fit uses a lot of energy if you are on it for long periods of time.  This is a great option.  You can plug it in overnight and then when you are ready to use it you can unplug it and move the balance board wherever you like or you can leave it plugged in, the cord is pretty long.  Either way it beats replacing the batteries so frequently.
summary: Battery Pack for the Wii Fit

reviewText: I was excited to receive the battery pack, but after the first two days with it, I'm very disappointed.  The instructions state to charge the battery for 12 hours or more before first use, and then full charges thereafter can be obtained in 5-7 hours.  I guess it never said how long a full charge would last, but it was dead after about 35 minutes the first day, and 17 minutes the second day.  I'm back on alkalines while I look for another battery pack.

This is absolutely the best battery pack I have ever had.
I've been looking all over for a good battery pack for my balance board till I came across this battery pack on Amazon.com I purchased it and it works great. Thank You CTA
summary: Thanks For Making The Best Battery Pack

reviewText: This game was a lot of fun to play since you can play both heros and villains. So you can play one side of the story and then play the other. The characters were also very cute and I like how each one was different in their mannerisms. Lots of fun to play and my younger siblings loved it.

My kids and I have played through several of these Lego xyz games.  We really enjoy playing them together.  If I had a complaint about the series, it would be that we can't play more than two people at a time.
summary: Great fun for the whole family

reviewText: Got this game for my little brother and he loves it. He kept nagging me to find him a game that he can play and he wanted Halo and that was not going to happen because he is only 8 years old. So this was the alternative and he loves it. Check your specs before buying

We borrowed it from the library to try it out, and it was a big hit.  My son, who is 4 1/2, loves this game, almost too much.  This is all he thinks about and wants to do!  He wants to keep it forever.  There are lots of funny moments during the game, which make me laugh, but go right over his head.

I ordered this game in September but did not receive it until mid December.  I don't know if it got lost or what but since it didn't cost that much I had basically given up on ever seeing it. The one-star ratings reflect the late delivery of the product. I haven't played the game yet, so I cannot rate it at this time.

Great game so far. I have been disappointed with the last few versions but I think they have really improved this one by adding some new features and bringing back some of the more fun features from the past. If you like TW then definitely get this one.

I bought this title for $15 at Target late last week and let me just say that it would have been a steal at twice the price! I can't get enough of this game so far and with all the different game and career modes along with the still active online play I can't see myself getting tired of it anytime soon!

I'm not a hard core gamer by any means...But I got the hang of this one pretty quickly. I love the look of the game and the music. My 5 year old plays it with me :). I have only gotten to Episode 3, but I can tell it will be fun!

I was nervous after purchasing this game. Some friends of mine who are huge video game buffs said it was not that great as far as games and RPGs go. I bought it anyway, and I am glad I did. The gameplay is fun, and very innovative. If you are a sonic fan, like me, you will like this game.

Sonic is controlled in the same way as Link in Phantom Hourglass and this system works fine, but it is a little frustrating that you have to use the stylus. During battles when you just want to tap A and get through them quickly, you can't, you have to click attack and then select the target. It isn't a huge problem, but it is just a bit frustrating.

I really like the game itself and wanted it. The problem is this. It said it was for windows xp and it didn't work. I didn't want to send it back but it would have cost as much to send back as it cost to purchase.

When this came, it was in a white plastic bag with no label or directions which concerned me.  After getting it out it was pretty durable and easy to figure out how to use.  I was able to buy 2 of them for $3.88 each so for that price it was very much worth it, even if at first I was concerned.

I haven't played this game in a while due to the fact that I can't find the CD. However, it is a really fun game and I recommend buying it if you are into the Sims franchise. I don't think that you would regret purchasing it. Honestly, I liked it much more than Sims 4 and I know someone with the same opinion on the two games

I truly consider the Sims 3 to be better than Sims 4, though I know some people prefer Sims 4. I think it depends on what age you are, as I have had the benefit of having Sims from the beginning 1-3. I just like Sims 3 better. Works better on my old computer also. I like the Sims creator and the ability to change textures and patterns of objects in-game. Something you can't do with Sims 4

When I purchased this months ago, I didn't even receive the right one..I got the starter pack. Because I love the sims so I decided to give it a chance and tried to play it but the code wouldn't even work. This has happened to more than 1 person so I highly advise to not get this product, you will just be wasting your money
summary: Because I love the sims so I decided to give it a ...

reviewText: I love this game. One of the best games I have ever played. I would spend hours playing this game.  It's very addicting. I suggest you guys buy this game, it's a lot of fun and you can set a challenge to do for your Sims. You can do all kinds of things in the game.
summary: The Best Game I Have Ever Played

reviewText: I ordered this with the expansion bundle for my 12-year old granddaughter, who lives across the country from me, for a surprise gift for her. She has been texting me telling me she loves it and it is fun, so I am conveying her review here.

This game is incredibly fun. The Sims offers so many different things you can do. It really is like living a real life, except if you want to do more than the basics, you are going to have to invest in an expansion pack if you are that die hard of a Sims fan. I have hours of fun playing this game as well as many others, and you might become one of those people too!
summary: This game is incredibly fun. The Sims offers so many different things you ...

reviewText:
Even with all the bugs, ctds, lag, glitches, etc. I still have to give it a 5/5... The game is honestly a step up from the Sims 2 in the right direction. Just make sure you have plenty of ram, hard drive space, and a nice graphics card and all is well.

For those running on an older machine I recommend the Sims 1 or the Sims 4. The Sims 2 and 3 are memory hogs and they don't run well on older PCs but they are still worth playing if one has a newer PC.
summary: the Sims 3, is a step up in the right direction.

reviewText: I bought this as a gift for a friend. The Sims has always been one of my favorite games for PC. I love the many new features they've added. We have come a long way since the original Sims. The only thing I hate are the graphics. I miss Sims 2 graphics to be honest.

I've been playing the Sims since the original came out way back when, so it's been a blast watching it change over time. I really love some of the new features of this game, like the tattoos. Hopefully with the next generation you can change things like height. I think that would be interesting.

The Sims 3 is a pleasant upgrade in graphics and gameplay from the Sims 2. It is however a little bit more tedious than its predecessor. Overall, I am pleased at the replay quality of this game. If I could give Sims 3 a 7 star rating, I would.

This game is a lot of fun.  Unfortunately, my computer does not have a whole lot of GBs, and so once it was installed, my computer was extra slow.  Had to remove it for actual important stuff, but that's not the game's fault :).  While I was able to play it, it was entertaining.

All I can say is that the game was GREAT! This is my first time I play sims game on a computer. I have the Sims 1 & 2 game, but its for xbox 360. I am satisfied on everything about this game. I think I like playing sims game on the computer than on the xbox 306.

I love this game, I have been playing sims since I was 6 or 7. It's such a great game. Everyone, of any age (given that they understand how to use a computer) can play this. When my little 7 year old cousin came to visit, I let her play. She created the cutest little house and family I could ever imagine. This is a game for all ages.

Of course, like many players. I like to add mods. Like most of nrass's mods. This game is definitely not complete unless you add some custom content or mods.

I chose to give this item 5 stars because it is AWESOME!!!  I love this game... I play it daily!!!  It is fun, entertaining, and a great creative outlet!!!  I would most definatly recommend this game!!!

I'm not sure why there are so many negative reviews. After reading many of them I became hesitant on downloading this, but I decided to risk it and try it. It downloaded in about 45 minutes and the game works great! Everything went well. Quick download, easy setup, and a great game overall. I'm having lots of fun with it right now.

I definitely recommend downloading this game through Amazon :)

I love the game! The updates they have on this game are a big improvement that I really like and enjoy. It was well worth the money. I play it quite a bit. The game came in great condition and like they said. I couldn't register it like they said but it didn't matter. Got it earlier than expected. All in all, great product and service. I will order from them again if needed.

I love being able to travel without having to wait for the next location to load. Being able to customize pretty much everything is really awesome, too. It's a good distraction when things get too stressful around the house. ^.^

I really love this game! I've never played sims 2 so i have nothing to compare it to other than the xbox sims games. I highly recommend it. The only downside is I've had a few glitches which forced me to quit the game and reboot it but other than that is great!!

This is the best Sims game yet. Everything is so detailed and you can do so much more on this game. Everything is so much more realistic. It's like a real town. The game is even better with expansion packs and better with downloaded custom content.

The Sims is always a great game to play. The Sims 3 is so advance in graphics! It looks great and the play isn't bad either. Sure, it is a hassle to buy the add on games, but I think it is worth it. The Sims 3 is very fun, especially if you have The Sims 3 Adventures. If a Sims 4 ever comes out I probably won't buy it. The Sims 3 is highly entertaining and I do not think it could get much better.

This is the sims like you have never experienced. Not only are you able to control every aspect of their lives, but you are able to leave your house and go into a town and do a multitude of things such as go to the theatre or the pool. Great Game!!!
summary: A Great New Approach to Sims

reviewText: After the first day the item would not charge and I didn't even use it. When I got it I made sure to see if it worked and it did then, the next day when I went to use it it didn't work and it no longer had the charging light. So disappointed in this!!! I am not sure if I got a faulty product or if it does not work.
summary: This product didn't work for me

reviewText: I'm not one to leave negative feedback, but this game is just terrible. I didn't like one thing about it. I deleted all my Sims 2 off my computer to make room for this and I can't believe what I got. Graphics are terrible, there's hardly any hairstyles to choose from, and the sims just look terrible. I went to change a wallpaper and the game froze. $50 down the drain. Should of read the reviews before buying.

I have been waiting for this game to come out on the store shelves for so long, as I am a huge fan of Wii Sports and thought it would be similar but with more games. I was really let down. The controls are so hard and don't seem natural in anyway. Save your money.

It reminded me of the movie CLUE that I saw back in the 1980s.  I loved the film but never played the board game.  It took a little bit of time to figure out how to play the game, and once I got the swing of using the cards and notepads, I started winning in batches.  It is fun and easy going but at times since the characters are so one dimensional, I just wanted to hurry up and get to the next level.  But nevertheless, it was fun!

I do not own too many games, but I cannot imagine anything worse than this game.  The graphics are ok.  Music is annoying.  The controls are horrible; which makes the gaming experience unbearable.

I have never written a review about anything.  This game is so horrible that I wanted to make sure no one waste a penny on it.
summary: Worst Wii game ever - DO NOT BUY

reviewText: I bought this game for the family for Christmas.  Single-player mode works fine, and the games are fun.  However, I cannot play multiplayer mode in this game.  I actually brought it back to the store and got a new one, thinking the disc was bad.  Wrong--same problem.  The game just does not recognize more than one remote.  I tried everything to sync the remotes, changed batteries, nothing worked.  I highly recommend not wasting your money on this game if you want multiplayer options.

I was also disappointed with Deca Sports.  If you are looking for more of Wii Sports, this isn't it.  The games aren't fun and they don't really make good use of the Wiimote or the nunchuks.  Overall, this game was a big disappointment.

It's been a while since I purchased this and I forgot about it to be honest. They did what they were supposed to do and prevented scratches to my daughters PSP. I didn't have any problems whatsoever applying the film and they lasted for quite a while before I had to replace them. My daughter is careful with her things though so for someone who is more forceful with the stylus it might need replaced more often. I don't regret this purchase and would recommend this product to others.
summary: I don't regret this purchase and would recommend this product to others

reviewText: The screen protector itself is a decent enough product. My issue with it lies in the fact that it was advertised for the psp 3000. I received mine in the mail yesterday, and when I went to go apply the screen protector, I found my psp 3000's screen to be significantly bigger than the protector itself. These protectors would work well with the psp go or a smart phone, but not with the psp 1000-3000 series.

I bought this product six months ago for my psp 3000 and it was great. So I recently ordered it again for another PSP. This time, however, the screen protector was about a half inch too small. I don't know if this is some kind of scam or what, but do NOT order this product. It is NOT compatible with ANY model of the Sony PSP.

These are just like any other cheap screen protector out there on the web. If you know what they are doing they are great. I've put these cheap screen protectors on all sorts of devices for family and friends and never have any issues. If you are new to putting on screen protectors I would suggest maybe buying a few packs, just because it does take some practice to learn how to put them on properly, but after a few tries you should be able to put them on without any bubbles.

Don't bother with these screen protectors. In order for these to work properly they should be manufactured to be EXACTLY the same size as the screen (or about a millimeter smaller on all sides). Instead, these are about 1/8th of an INCH too long and about 3 millimeters too tall. They CANNOT be applied properly and it is almost impossible to cut them with a razor blade.

Don't waste your time or money on this junk.
summary: These don't even fit the screen

reviewText: You can't beat this product!  It worked perfectly and the price made it even better.  Just make sure you have something flat to smooth it out so you don't get any bubbles.  It even comes with a cleaning cloth!

I had a problem with my order. For some reason I did not receive the product I've purchased...it was X-mas time and it probably got lost on the mail. So I contacted the seller and they immediately sent me an other one at no charge. They were very nice through the whole process. They showed me an appreciation that every seller should have with their customers. I do recommend this seller.

If you have a surround sound system, this game is for you. This is what the PS3 was made for. It's almost eerie how awesome the sound is on this game. It's almost worth it just for that.

Luckily, the multiplayer experience is even better than the sound. Even though it's nothing that hasn't been done before, it still is one of the best MP experiences out there. Buy this game if you like FPS.

I'm an avid gamer. I play practically all genres. I love FPS games and the Call of Duty series ever since CoD 2. CoD Modern Warfare is still my favorite Call ofDuty to play. The campaign has a great story line (or at least I thought so) and the multiplayer was top notch. It may be 6 years old but I still love going back and playing this one. Honestly, any other CoD is better than Ghosts.

This game is great, from the gripping storyline, political intrigue and edge-of-seat action, to the orchestral soundtrack and the fine-tuned gameplay. A must have for anyone who enjoys first-person-shooter games.
summary: An excellent beginning to a beloved series.

reviewText: We bought this as a gift for my boyfriend's little brother. He's going to flip out when he sees it! He's wanted it for a while, and we just know he's going to love it. It also came in great time, in good packaging.

This is NOT the Game of the Year edition. It's just the "Greatest Hits" edition, and does not include the DLC. Save yourself the time and trouble and just download the Game of the Year edition from the Playstation Store for $19.99

I purchased the game of the year edition which is supposed to include 4 additional maps.  I checked the order over and over to make sure that I was purchasing the correct version.

Unfortunately the game that I received did not include the additional maps.  It is misleading to have selected the game of the year edition and to have received another version of the game. There is no one to call to even ask the question.

Amazon should look into this misleading description.

If you like first person shooters, this is the game for you!  The graphics are amazing and the gameplay is very realistic.  I love the on-line portion of the game.  The campaign mode is a bit short, but the online portion will keep you playing this game for a long time.

OF COURSE WHAT 11 YEAR OLD BOY ISN'T GONNA LOVE SOMETHING LIKE THIS..HE ALWAYS PLAYS THIS GAME AND DON'T CARE IF HE LOSES..HE WILL TELL ME, "MOM, I DON'T CARE IF I DIE, I'M GONNA KILL AS MANY BAD PEOPLE AND CLEAR THE WAY FOR MY FRIENDS"..SADLY HE WILL DO JUST THAT..I SAY HONEY IT'S A GAME, NOT A REAL MISSION, "I KNOW MOM, I KNOW!!"

Although I bought a used version, there wasn't a single scratch I could find, and I'm pretty protective when it comes to my electronics and favorite games. This was an old favorite of mine that I unfortunately lost. The one I bought could have fooled me for new, it just wasn't in a seal.

I am happy with my purchase!

I BOUGHT THIS GAME WHEN IT WAS FIRST RELEASED AND STUPIDLY LOANED IT OUT... SO OF COURSE I NEVER SAW IT AGAIN... THIS IS ONE OF THE FEW GAMES I CAN GET LOST IN PLAYING... I CAN SIT AND PLAY FOR HOURS AND BE PERFECTLY HAPPY!!!

I absolutely loved this game, enjoyed the story, enjoyed the gameplay immensely. But, I bought it used for $15. I couldn't imagine paying $60 for this game given that it's so short. That being said, I'll be playing again on hard mode, and will be playing the two sequels.

I have played this game in the PC version when it just came out and purchased it in the xbox version. To date this game is excellent online and will continue to entertain for years to come. I have played other Modern Warfare games and keep coming back to this one.

The single player portion of the game is basically a tutorial for the multiplayer, but the multiplayer is worth every penny. The maps are diverse and allow for different play styles and the RPG-style leveling up extends the replayability.
summary: Don't buy this unless you have Live

reviewText: I've always thought that Fallout 3 was one of the best games for the 360/PS3 and have been a giant Fallout fan dating back to the 2 PC versions, so when I saw that they were releasing a collector's edition with the Lunch Box and Bobble head I knew I had to get one.  This collector's edition is exactly what any Fallout fan would LOVE.  The Bobble Head doll is great and very cool sitting on your desk.
summary: Excellent Collector's Edition for any Fallout Fan!

reviewText: I was really excited to find the collectors edition of Fallout 3 for the Xbox 360; however, when I received the game, it was the PC version, not the Xbox version. Luckily the person I was giving the set to already had the game itself and wanted the "extras" that come with the collectors edition, but I was a little disappointed that it was not for the game system pictured in the product description.

This is a role playing game with a bit of first person shooter. This is an overall I would say great game. Very addictive. I would only recommend it for those with Xbox 360's or PC. This is because the downloadable content is not available for PS3, sorry guys. The downloadable content gives more to the overall experience and more is coming soon. I give this game a 10 out of 10. Those that praise first person shooters may not appreciate the whole game concept with this title.

Fallout 3 is an excellent game.  It is a perfect continuation of the Fallout universe taking place in the ruins of Washington DC, and with the addition of downloadable content (not included in purchase price) the game branches out to locations like Alaska and Pittsburgh as well.  Even without DLC, the base game is highly enjoyable, and the bonus features in the Collector's edition are well worth the price for any true fans of the originals.

This game is ridiculously immersive. It has a great story and hours upon hours of bonus quests. The graphics are great and the gameplay is addictive. Watching a super mutant's head get blown into pieces in slow motion never gets old. I would highly suggest this game to anyone, especially fans of Oblivion. Just make sure you have a lot of free time.

Pure and simple this is one of the best games I've ever played. Once you've completed it there isn't a lot of reason to got back to it but the overall game experience was great. Will warn you though. The game does have some glitches and bugs. Even with them it is a 5 star game.
summary: One of the Best Games I've Ever Played

reviewText: One of my favorite games of all time the game play is very fun. And the story is one of the best written in the history of gaming. There isn't many games out there like this that make you care about the characters.

My original review was taken down for some reason, so I'll review it again. My fiance has been waiting on this game for a long time, and I finally ordered it so he could show it to me. He was so thrilled and the disc was in great condition. Couldn't be happier.

While this game may not be as strong as the original in terms of suspense or plot, it does make up for it with some neat innovations and a multiplayer mode that can be a lot of fun. For anyone in the mood for a good slice of storytelling then this is the game for them... and for those of you yearning for a return to Rapture, then this will be the perfect tonic.

I thought that this game wouldn't be nearly as good as the original game, but I was dead wrong. The graphics are outstanding and the gameplay is great. But it's always the story that draws me in with Bioshock. This is easily one of the best games I've ever played.

I enjoyed playing this game. I love the music, I love the characters and I like the plot. It's not better than the first game, but it's still a good game. I'm glad I bought this game and I have no regrets.
summary: This is a well developed sequel.

reviewText: If you really want to play as a Big Daddy, here is your chance! This game wasn't quite as good as the first one, but its an amazing game. Your choices seem to have a bigger impact on the world in this game and the best part is towards the end when you can play as a little sister. Buy it if you love Bioshock.
summary: One of my favorite games ever!

reviewText: I bought this because it had great reviews, I'm not much of a gamer but bought a used xbox 360 a while back and wanted to sample some of the top-rated games. This certainly deserves the praise it receives.

This game is so fun.  Most FPS's have pretty weak campaigns it seems because they focus heavily on multiplayer functionality.  Bioshock 2 on the other hand is the opposite.  The single-player campaign is just plain awesome.  Great visuals and great additions over the also-great Bioshock.  I played Bioshock 2 first and loved it.  I then got a copy of Bioshock, played it, and loved it.  I cannot wait for Bioshock Infinite!

I don't care who you are, or where you live. If you came to this page and you're thinking about buying this game, DO IT. It's TEN BUCKS, brand new. You won't find a better deal than that anywhere, even used. This game is an awesome FPS.

BUY IT.

Bioshock 2 was released back in February of 2010. It's been almost 2 years later and still holds as one of the best games on the 360. This is what a FPS should be. The story is outstanding, the graphics are haunting yet beautiful. The gameplay is very well paced, and can get pretty intense at times. I highly recommend this game in anyone's 360 library, a definite must have!
summary: Almost 2 years and this game still holds.

reviewText: Like the first game Bioshock 2 was fun, gritty, and captivating. It is better in some ways than the previous game, worse in others. The storyline was not as strong as the first game and some of the gameplay concepts weren't as good. However a lot of the gameplaying aspects were improved and Bioshock 2 managed to explore possibilities lost in the first Bioshock. Overall it wasn't as good as the first installment, but was still a great experience with tons of replay value (six possible endings).

I got the first game to see what all the fuss was about and was blown away. This game is equally fun. Great handling and look carry over from the first and overall compares very favorably to the first. On my top ten list, definitely. If you liked the first Bioshock, you'll like the sequel.

I don't know if this is the game developer's idea of immersing you in the action, but not being able to zoom out and get a better look at your layout is REALLY annoying and a major limiting factor in this game for me. If that doesn't bother you, you might really like it.

I downloaded the file and its just great, it works really good with easy installation.

The game is so good that I had to buy 3 more serials for my friends so we can play it online.

The best part is the easy way to access to the game, with the download option I don't have to go to the store or wait for the disc to come home.

Very fun game and explains more of the story of Bioshock.  Definately worth picking up and has over 20 hours of playback.  Pretty much very similar gameplay to Bioshock 1 and that isn't a bad thing.  The story isn't as well presented as Bioshock 1 but still is interesting no less.

Great game. I would give it a 9/10. The only real thing lacking is the story isn't quite as memorable as the original Bioshock and if you played the first it's not overwhelmingly different (but that is a good thing in my opinion)

If you've never played the first Bioshock, go buy that and try it since it's a great game. If you don't like Bioshock you're probably not gonna like Bioshock 2.
summary: If you enjoyed Bioshock, You'll enjoy Bioshock 2.

reviewText: I loved Bioshock and had to get Bioshock 2. Perfect sequel, I don't know how they could have done it any better. In fact some things are better. The weapon use is improved and hacking is far less frustrating. To put it simply, if you liked the original you'll Bioshock 2.

As addicting as the first game, BioShock 2 is one of the better games of the year. While many are saying that it's more of the same, yes, it is. But it's also from a different side by playing as the Big Daddy. Highly recommend.
summary: If you loved the first one, you'll love this.

reviewText: While the game itself is enjoyable to play, the DRM that ships with it is very difficult to deal with.  I bought it to use on two computers, just to play with a friend at my house.  Unfortunately, this will not work.

I don't own this game but I would have bought this game if it weren't for the DRM. Sounds like a great game. I have played the whole Command and Conquer series and loved every one of them. But I will not purchase a game that is restricted by the DRM or Secure Rom or any other type of software that makes it so I cant play my games on my computer while deployed. A deployed soldier does not have the luxury of internet... =(

I enjoyed the first Bioshock game and I liked this one too, but not as much. I wasn't to keen on being a hulking slow robot-like player. I still like the atomosphere of the game. The graphics are superb and very unique. All-in-all a very good game. One real bummer though is that is very short in terms of hours of play.

If you like Bioshock 1 you will love this game. There is not much of a change, but why change something that really doesn't need to be changed. I also feel like Bioshock 2 is a longer game play then Bioshock 1. Great game, I would highly recommend this game to anyone who thought Bioshock 1 was remotely fun.

I can't believe how cheap this game was on Amazon! I couldn't NOT buy this game, it was just too cheap and I know how awesome the bioshock series is.

I love this game as well.  It has a very distinct atmosphere and allows players to become immersed and fully involved!

When the players begin to delve deeper into the bioshock universe, the different particle effects and physics really help to make the game more vibrant and fun to play!

I bought this game for my 4yr old who loves it!  The good thing is that my 8yr old loves it even more!!!  This game has a bunch of different carnival type of games in it so the kids don't get bored.  Some are more challenging for the little ones than others.  It keeps the kids busy for hours.  I love some of the games myself.  I would definitely recommend it to parents who have little ones.  Older kids may find it boring.

Bought for my 11 year old daughter. She loves the game, plays it quite a bit, and is very happy with it. She's not a "all-consumed by video games" kind of kid, but she plays a little almost every day, and she has alot of fun with this game.

Fallout 3 is amazing. If you haven't played it, you need to play it right now. The collector's edition is very much worth the price, especially if you want to look cool carrying around a Fallout 3 lunch box. The art book is quite neat because it shows aspects of Fallout 3 that you will never see from the game itself. The quality of the art in the book is higher than the actual game play. One caviate is that the lunch box is made of 100% aluminum. So it dents very, very easily.

This was a really impressive game.  This is one of those great games that may be overlooked.  The story line has a great amount of depth and the gameplay is also fun and innovative.  I would recommend this game for all fans of role playing games.
summary: This is one of those great games that may be overlooked

reviewText:
It's too bad Sega never patched the game for trophies.  Other than that, this game is absolutely fantastic.  It's a gem that not enough people on the PS3 enjoyed.  If you like strategy RPGs ie Fire Emblem, FF Tactics etc...then you owe it to yourself to play this great game.  It has a decent story, with memorable characters and a great combat system.

The art style is fabulous and really holds up over time.  If they rereleased this game for the PS4 I would purchase it again.
summary: It's too bad Sega never patched the game for trophies

reviewText: I originally purchased this game for myself, but it ended up becoming my husband's game. I really like RPG, so I thought this could be a great intro into strategy games since it has an rpg element. The art, voice work, and characters are amazing! However, it is basically if XCOM and an RPG got together to make a baby this would be it. My husband is obsessed with XCOM, so he has been playing it every weekend non stop. I would highly recommend it if you like strategy games with a strong story element.

I first played this game's demo years ago when I first had my PS3. It blew my mind. The strategy and art style was wonderful.

I no longer own a PS3, but I always have kept this one game. I couldn't bring myself to get rid of it. Even if I can't play it.
summary: The strategy and art style was wonderful. I no longer own a PS3

reviewText: I've always wanted to buy this game (again). It was the first RPG I played on PS3 when it was released, but I stupidly sold it, being I was obsessed with Metal Gear Solid 4. Now I have it again and can't wait to play it.

OMG! THIS IS THE BEST GAME EVER. Although the graphics are a little outdated, its Intense story and unique battle system makes up for it. I bought 18 games right after I bought my ps3 but Valkyria Chronicles is one of the few games I was able to finish to the end. Definitely a must have.
summary: THIS IS THE BEST GAME EVER

reviewText:
I bought this game for no other reason except that it was cheap and that I hadn't had the time to try it back when it came out. I was shocked by the quality that lays behind every corner of this game. The art is gorgeous with wonderful character models, the story is intriguing with a world war plot and easy to like characters and best of all the combat mechanics are superb.

A must buy for any PS3 rpg players or strategy fans.
summary: The art is gorgeous with wonderful character models

reviewText: I wasn't sure I'd like the gameplay, but I love it. Great for any strategy lover. It may seem like an FPS just by looking at the trailers, but the real emphasis is on tactics. If you hate shooters, you'll still love this game.

I'm not a fan of first person shooters, instead I really, really like role-playing games as well as strategy games. This one combines pretty much these three genres and the result is a really interesting and entertaining. I'm enjoying this game a lot. Besides, it adds one more reason to resume watching the anime series.

This is a great game!  The story scenes are interesting, and the battles are fun and well thought out.  You invest in your characters and don't want to lose them in battle. A+, I recommend this game to everyone.  It's very different than any I have ever played before.

I love this type of play, it reminds me of "Final Fantasy" earlier versions.  It can be frustrating when you get killed and have to start from back, but that's why this is a strategy type of game.  I like it, it's not for everyone but I'd love for a sequel.  This game is very different from other type of games.

I had no idea what to really expect when I bought this game.  I read a review or two and needed something that would kill some time.  This game has gone from an unknown to one of the greatest video game investments I have ever made.  Graphics, story and even sound are all superb.  I love the story, both flow and progression.  Even if you hate RPGs/Strategy based games, give it a shot.  This game was worth triple the price, how did I not find this years ago when it came out?

I just got my game yesterday. I haven't tried it yet because I'm waiting to get my PS3 on Christmas so I don't have to restart all over again. I have the second game and I absolutely love it! It's definitely one of my favorite games. I know I'm probably going to love this one just as much. I wish they'd bring the third one over in English. I can't get enough. The game arrived in excellent condition and I'm very happy with my purchase!

This is one of the best games on the PS3.  It may seem old and out-dated at first, but the more you play and get engaged, it will become your favorite game, trust me!  This was not a mainstream game and was not advertised as much as some other titles, but anyone who has played this game will marvel at this masterpiece.
summary: If you love video games, you must play this game!

reviewText:
I know I'm late to the craze for this game, but I'm glad I finally made it.
I love the graphics and the game play is the perfect combination of challenge and reward.

As a big strategy video game fan, I was worried Valkyria wouldn't satisfy me like Fire Emblem does, but oh boy I was wrong!

If turn based combat set in a fantasy world sounds good then this is the game for you. There are things to complain about like every game but overall this is one of the most entertaining games I have played in a long time.

If you like anime, you will love this game.  The look, feel, and story all make you feel like you are re-living your favorite anime tv series.  The scale is epic, there is a good amount of complexity in gameplay options, and the level difficulty definitely keeps the brain cranking.

One of my favorite PS3 exclusive games of all time!

I haven't played a good JRPG in a long time, and was recommended this one by some friends.  I was not dissappointed.  The battles are fun and even though the story is a little weak, you can't help but fall in love with the characters.  All in all, great game, highly recommended.

Recently I had been bored with all of my games, so I decided to pick this one up. I didn't really expect a whole lot out of it but wow! The game has completely exceeded my expectations. I love the way the game looks and play. The combat system is very fun and actually makes you think about the attacks and the position of your troops. It's just a great game. I would recommend this to any RPG fan who is looking for a very well priced and very fun game.

I for one enjoyed this game, it was the main reason I got a Playstation 3. It's a very beautiful game with a very good story. It's set in a fictional World War 2. You take on missions that let you command up to 10 units in battle (8 Infantry units and 2 tanks) whose jobs include Snipers, Lancers (Anti-tank infantry), Scouts, Shocktroopers, and Engineers. The game is pretty long, I would definitely recommend it if your looking for something new to try out.

This is definitely one of the greatest exclusives the PS3 has. The combat system is great, and you will get more than your money's worth in playtime. I highly recommend it. Also get this game while you can, it's pretty hard to find this game at your local stores.
summary: One of the greatest PS3 games, 10/10

reviewText: Quite simply, one of the best PS3 games ever!  Great storyline, great gameplay, challenging to finish and not too easy, tons of fun, what more can you ask for?  If you're a fan of old school turn-based strategy games, this will probably be the best PS3 game you'll ever play.  Kudos to Sega for making a game like this, where's the sequel?
summary: One of the best PS3 games EVER

reviewText: It is like playing chess, but more fun than that. Or maybe I can say it is like a card game. However, since we have graphic and story, and we can level up the characters, it is more fun. I like this type of game, and need to use some strategy to play better. It is a good game for all the age.

This is an incredible game. It now has a cult-like following, but it was not popular at release. I got it a couple months ago, put it on the shelf, finally picked it up a few weeks ago and it is incredible.

The graphics are wonderfully not technical and the story line is done very well.
It is challenging, but it is not frustratingly difficult.

One of my favorite games I own.
summary: fun, beautiful, challenging, a must own for strat and rpg fans

reviewText: I had read a bit before I purchased this game. I was excited to try it. I have not been disappointed. Valkyria Chronicles is an excellent game. Wonderful music and graphics. Excellently thought out characters and story. This game is easy to find at a bargain price. It is a shame it is not more well known than it is. I have been playing games for over 20 years and it is right up there with the best games I have ever played. I hope more people would take the time to discover this game.

I'm not really in the mood to write a long review, suffice to say Valkyria Chronicles is the best game I've played in a while, I'd recommend it to any one even if you don't think you're going to like it(I didn't think I was going to), and that I'll probably write a longer review later.  By the way you can use R2 instead of going into another menu while in book mode.
summary: Broke my streak of unfinished games

reviewText:
I'm not a big console gamer. I'm still trying to figure out the circles and triangles, and how people play a FPS with a controller. I buy games because of the reviews and hype hoping I will "see what the big deal is" but I usually don't like them. InFamous being the exception.

And I'm not a big anime fan. I mean, it's ok, I have nothing against it, it looks cool, I just never got into it.

But this game makes me love my PS3 and anime!

It feels like I'm part of a movie, a good movie!
summary: This game just made me stop playing InFamous for a while! It's great!

reviewText:
This is what a remake of the classic X-COM series should have looked like.
Great story, with likable characters and beautiful cutscenes.
The gameplay and controls are well designed and the difficulty is just right.

Highly recommended for anyone who likes RPG OR strategy games.
summary: Best fusion of strategy and RPG!

reviewText: The gameplay is very addictive and such a unique experience that everyone should try, even if you just rent the game. Valkyria Chronicles is also very hard to find, none of my local stores have it in-stock so I would suggest getting this game while you can.
summary: Must buy for any JRPG/Strategy fan

reviewText:
RPG/Strategy/Shooter

Never thought I'd see all three combined in a game.  But in Valkyria, this is done very well.  Amazingly fun game with a deep story.  This game can be quite the challenge.  This is probably THE best game on the PS3 to date.

This game is the best game of it's kind on any system. If you love strategy, if you love JRPGs you must check this one out. Top notch graphics, sound, story and gameplay. Sega has taken a genre of gaming and really taken it to the next level. Not only have they bumped up the graphics like you would expect in a next gen title, but the gameplay as well. They have really added a great dimension to the strategy genre.
Just a beautiful game.

I don't know what I can say that hasn't already been said, but this game is wonderful.  It has a great blend of different genres to it, a great story that immerses you deeper into the game, and it's just really well done.  You have to play this game.

The depth of the gameplay and overall length of the game make this a great purchase for any PS3 owner. The addition of characters from Skies of Arcadia are a real treat as well. You don't have to be a die hard SRPG fan to enjoy this title. The game is open enough that any non-closed minded person could pick it up and learn how to enjoy the game in 10 minutes or less.

This is easily the best RPG available on the PS3 and the one all PS3 owners have been waiting for.

I normally get sick of strategy RPG's within a few hours, but I can't put this one down. It's been forever since I've actually played through an entire RPG and was still begging for more at the end.

A second play-through is definitely going to happen.

If you love RPG's you will love this game. Period.

Valkyria Chronicles is a refreshing, one-of-a-kind game with a few nitpicky problems. It is, by far, the best Tactical RPG that has been released this generation of consoles, and I'd go so far as to say the past two generations. From an RPG snob like myself, I have absolutely no problem recommending it to anybody who is a fan of the genre, or to anybody who wants to learn what it means to love a game.

I can't stand anime, I am often irritated by the cutesy story presented in Valkyria Chronicles, but the gameplay is so addicting and deep I can't stop playing it. Probably one of my most favorite games of the last 2 years.
summary: Tactical Strategy game of the year

reviewText: This game is absolutely fantastic. It's made by Overworks the same people who made the excellent Skies of Arcadia. The other reviews are already doing this game justice, so I'll just say this: if you have a PS3 and like any kind of RPG you need to play this game.

It has been a while since a game made me stay up all night.  But this game is so good, that you won't be able to stop playing!  I was not sure if I was going to get this game, but I took a chance and I am really glad that I did.  Trust me, just buy it.  The story, game play, design, everything is so wonderfully mixed together.  This game will change the way you look at SRPG.  I am really hoping that SEGA will make a sequel.  My vote for the best game of the year.

Certainly not everyone will appreciate this game due to it's strategic turn based battle system.  But if you do enjoy a more chess like battle system, or if you take the game for what it is then it's hard to not enjoy it.
