I would've liked a few more upgrade options and ways to customize the units, but that in no way means that the current options aren't enough.  Overall, I'd have to say that this is my favorite PS3 title so far as everything was done very well (gameplay, graphics, story, ect)

Every once in a while, a game will appear and revolutionize its genre, such that you don't ever want to go back to playing any of its predecessors. Valkyria Chronicles is the latest of those of the tactical RPG genre.

With its innovative BLiTZ combat engine, Valkyria Chronicles blows away everything that came before. This game will make you feel that grids are anachronisms in this generation of gaming.
summary: The best tactical RPG I've ever played

reviewText:
This is the most refreshing role-playing game to come out in awhile.  It combines beautiful art with great characters, a decent story, and a combat system that everyone from the most casual gamer to the most hardcore can marvel at.

Do yourself a favor and download the demo.
summary: The RPG that everyone can love

reviewText:
Ladies and gentlemen.

I'm not going to say much about how this game plays since you can find great video reviews in youtube, gametrailers, etc...

so let's skip all the BS and get to the road straight.

If you don't buy this game, you are missing this gen's greatest turn based strategy game. I have handful of PS3 games in my library, but this game is definitely something I will keep ... well, FOREVER.

We got this game for Christmas and it has been so much fun.  It is great to play by yourself, but it is also fun to play with a group.  There is a large variety of vehicles to choose from and you can play with up to 4 people.  My son is 12 and it was alot of fun to have little competitions between family members.  I would definitely recommend this game.

I recently bought a PS3 and this was the first game that I purchased. I am glad that I did. This is one of the best racing games out there. I used to own an XBox 360 and this game beats every racing game that I've played on the 360. It stretches PS3 graphics to the max, especially the water & mud splashing effects. If you are a racing fan, this game is true delight to play.
summary: One of the most adventurous racing games out there!

reviewText: Although I loved the first Motorstorm, this one takes it to a whole different level with outstanding graphics and tracks to race on. Everything just seems more fun than the first in general. If you did not like the first one, then you should rent this, but if you liked/loved the first one then you will no doubt love this one.

I pre-ordered this game as soon as I could. I am so glad I did. I did not think they could make a better racing game than the first MotorStorm. Boy, was I wrong. I was addicted to the first one and now I am to the second also. I love MotorStorm!!!

I can't believe you can pick up a copy of this game for less than 5 bucks! It's a METAL GEAR SOLID for the ps3, with some polished graphics, great voice acting, and truly thrilling and funny moments. I'm on my third play through, using all the guns and tactics I didn't use the first two times...there's a lot of entertainment to be had here!

Alpha Protocol is, hands down, the best stealth espionage game I have played to date. It is creative, fun, intense and full of atmosphere. Best of all, it has an insane replay value because of branching paths and dialogue trees and endless decisions to make which all affect the game in subtle and significant ways.

A must have if you own a PlayStation 3.

Nowhere in the description of Rock Band did it mention that it was not compatible with some Guitar Hero devices.  Instead, the advertising implies that it will work with WII Guitar Hero.  After it was delivered to my house, I opened it with enthusiasm.  After about an hour of trying, I finally went to the web and found out that it was not compatible at all!  I will need to buy another guitar that is not wireless in order for it to work with my WII.  I feel cheated!

My husband and I have been playing with our Wii for several years so when this game got some scratches on it, we most definitely wanted to get it replaced since it is one of our very favorite games to play.

Bought this game for my daughter for Christmas.  I wasn't quite sure how all this game stuff works.  I figured I would have to purchase accessories but...  There don't seem to be any RockBand guitars available and they were way more expensive than I imagined.  So, I have no idea if this is a good game or not...  It seems like the Guitar Hero is a better bet.

We play this together almost every day. The kids play it for hours at a time, even though we have had it for a while. I just wish we had another guitar! We are looking forward to the next version for more songs!

I purchased this for my 9 year old and the drums broke after a month. They cracked where they are attached. They should have been made better for the price. I had to throw them away because there was no way to fix them. Would not recommend

We bought this for Christmas and everything was fine except the drums.  The drums on this game suck. We thought we had gotten a bad drum set and sent it back to the manufacturer.  They sent us a new drum set and it did the same thing.  We called Amazon to let them know what was going on and they were great. We sent it back and our money was credited back to our credit card.  I would not recommend Rock Band for the Wii

I think this game is a lot of fun.  I was not familiar with a few of the songs on here or didn't particularly like a few.  Overall, it is great though. Plenty of enjoyment to be had.  I just wish you could access all the songs instead of having to work your way up to them.  I know there is a way to do it, I just haven't taken the time to even try.  I would definitely recommend Rock Band for anyone who would like to be a Rock Star!

My children were pleasantly surprised when the box arrived just a few short days after I order it.

I was at work when it arrived. They are 11 years old and had it all together and were playing it in no time. It is an absolute blast for all of us to play. Anyone could play. It's alot of fun.

I'm very happy with this Wii Rock Band Drum Set. I received the item very quickly. My friends and I play rock band a lot, and this was the last instrument that I needed. Now that we have the complete set, it makes the rock band experience more enjoyable. This drum set works great, looks nice, and is a lot of fun!
summary: Wii Rock Band Drum Set Review

reviewText: I got a package with a Wii AV cable. That's what I wanted. I already had a good one, but the Wii U doesn't come with one (only an HDMI cable) and I don't have anything compatible with HDMI in my house. This saves me from having to switch cables every time I want to switch between Wii and Wii U.

Have used these for several months and have been very happy with them.  They definately dampen the sound when hitting the drum pads and I haven't noticed any changed in the accuracy by using them.  Since the foam extends to the rim of the drum pad, it has actually helped since you hit the foam instead of the hard rim.  The adhesive seems to be holding up well.  Overall I am very pleased with these.

Fear 2 is great in a lot of ways. Its come a long way since the fear one game. The graphics are better and more importantly the storyline is a little more in depth. I really didn't like the way that it ended even though i understand that i was building up for a second game. I would have enjoyed it a little more if there was a few more puzzles in it too, there was a lack of that in this game. This was an amazing game and im sure everyone would have a great time playing it.

This game would have been as good if not better if I played it first, before the original Fear. The game itself is like the first Fear with a different story line and had an equal amount of scary moments and tense action scenarios in it. I waited till this came down in price since I do not like paying $50 for any game. It was well worth the $30 that i paid for it. If you liked the first Fear, you can not go wrong.

As with any sequel, it is not as great as the original, but it is still a great game. The graphics are very good and the game loads quickly. The game is very generous with ammo, armor and health, which takes some of the challenge away from using the right weapon in the right situation, but I am still happy I purchased the game and spent a beautiful weekend indoors playing the game instead of enjoying the great weather.

I have been playing FEAR since the first game's release. The Story line is original and a lot of fun. FEAR2 has great graphics and playability just like the first three games. I would recommend this game for its playability and story line.

For years, I eagerly awaited a sequel to F.E.A.R., knowing that it would be the most incredible FPS ever played. It is, however, not. It is a steaming pile of crap that they should have been ashamed to put their name on. It is not a PC game; it is a crappy console port that plays poorly, looks dismal, and is in every way an utter joke, and epic failure. No thank you, Warner Brothers. I'm returning this product for a full refund.

This is a great game. The graphics are realistic and fun. The physics are excellent and feel true to real life. The crazy amount of tricks you can do is unrealistic but insanely fun!

Pick up a copy and race with the whole fam!

I'll keep this short since other reviews mostly cover XBlades. This game is sweet! I like everything from the level design to the character design. I have not had this much fun with a game in a while. It's definitely a game that I would recommend to my friends.

I hope that South Peak decides to do a sequel, I want to see more. I give this game 5 stars, along with my highest recommendation.

Recommended!

If you are a ATV racing fan, this is the game for you. The graphics are phenomenal and the action is intense! I really enjoy this game as a single player, online play is a hit or miss because sometimes immature people join in and ruin the fun. This game seems to have the same "flavor" as DIRT and GRID on Xbox360. The controls take a little to get used to, but can be learned within a few races. Enjoy!

Despite my low expectations this game managed to disappoint me on every aspect. I genuinely wanted to like it but the combination of bad graphics, disjointed dialogues, bad writing and a very generic setting was too much to overcome. I tried to but couldn't finish it.

This game is quite pretty - Bloom effects, lens flare, cell shading, and the most fantastic backgrounds I've ever seen. Simply put, this is a beautiful cherry blossom of a game.

Seriously, once I stopped drooling, I played the game. It is smooth and fluid - and the main character is easy to control. It is just a shooter, but a FUN SHOOTER that has a good story to boot.

So, if you are looking for something different in a third person shooter -this will be the game for you.

This game has one of the most original and customizable magic systems. Unfortunately, the rest of the game is a train wreck. The graphics, voice acting, controls, and combat are abysmal. I collect any RPG I can, but I gave this one away.
summary: So much potential, do poorly designed.

reviewText: I bought this game from GameStop and played it for 1-2 hours before bringing the game back. The story was slow and not that interesting. Some of the controls were annoying and I could never suggest this game to anyone.

If you are looking for a solid game along the lines of Skyrim or Dragon Age, this isn't it. The interface is awkward, the graphics dated, and the controls are not intuitive. Try Reckoning or the DLC for either of the games mentioned here. This will not give you the RPG fix you are looking for.

This game looked so promising...
The combat could have been done better. The skills set kinda sucked. The voice acting was terrible. The game was completely devoid of any good story line. I spent $50 on this when it came out and was only able to get $17 back. Pretty lame...
If you're new to RPGs, you might like it, but if you're an RPG fan (you've played games such as Knights of the Old Republic 1 and 2, Morrowind, Oblivion, Fallout 3, etc.), just let me give you a piece of advice. SAVE YOUR MONEY!

This reminded me of The Elder Scrolls.  The graphics are awesome and seamless.  The character runs, jumps, swims, etc.  There are plenty of treasures, side-quests, and mini-games. The game allows you to save whenever you want.  Just be sure that your character has good mage skills and weapons or good archer skills and weapons, if you want to do better at beating the last boss.

This game is a "little rough," but is quite excellent once you give it an hour or two.  Though the world is not as huge as it appears to be, it can still be a lot of fun.  In fact, once you beat the single-player game you can move on to the online play, which has cooperative play and a "town" that you can build and grow.  It has fairly decent replay value.

I just got this game and have only been playing it for a little bit, but so far I love it. The game play is very smooth and it has pretty good graphics too. I just wish you could play it as a female character...
summary: Love it... just wish you could be a female

reviewText: The latest installment in the Sherlock Holmes software mysteries does not disappoint!  This game is very long and in-depth, and provides quite a bit of gameplay.  The puzzles are clever, and you're never left wondering what to do next.  It is definitely challenging in parts, but the curiosity of what will happen next keeps you moving along.  I highly recommend this to any Sherlock Holmes fan. This was wonderfully different from the previous release, "Awakened," which was very dark and gruesome in parts.
summary: In-depth Story and Lots of Gameplay

reviewText:
I got about half way through. I really enjoyed it up until this one point. I had to keep figuring out the same kind of thing over and over again. The fun was totally drained out of the game at this point. It was a burden.

I never finished it. I have these games for my enjoyment...not for tedious tasks that drag on and on and on and on.

I will read all the reviews of the next Sherlock Holmes before I buy another one. This game became SO bad that I did not finish it.

I decided to purchase this because I have 2 young children and thought it would be a good choice for them. Not only do they love playing it, but so do their mom and dad. It's addictive! We have hours of fun together when we play this. Only drawback is that we all think we can really play guitar, bass, and drums now!

This is more of a kid game, but I like it because you play with the band and it gives you a great workout for your arms. I got it to play the drums, but you have to play all the band in order to progress. Once I started playing all the band, I couldn't quit. Love this game. I wish I had more remotes to have the whole the family play at once. One day maybe. But really, I think this is fun if your into music and can't get into a band for real. Try it, you won't be sorry.

This is a great dungeon crawler game. I am kinda surprised how many people don't actually know about this game that I have talked to. It has a great storyline, but some of the background music can be repetitive. Have had this game before and re-bought it.
summary: Great Dungeon Crawler but some music repetative

reviewText: I bought this game for my daughter and she really liked it, but was able to get through it and solve it within one and a half days.  She is 10-years-old and it was way too easy for her.  But, I recommend it for younger children.

This guitar looked very promising online, however it's not worth the money you're shelling out for the damn thing. I purchased this as a christmas present for my boyfriend and we tried it out one day and the thing only worked for a couple hours. It says on the box "80 Hours of Playing time" but due to a hardware problem the guitar will not sync with the playstation 3 even though it worked for a short while. If you are looking to buy a playstation 3 guitar DO NOT buy this one.

THIS DOES NOT WORK.  DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!!  PER NYKO IT DOESN'T WORK AND THEY DON'T CARE TO FIX IT.  ITS STILL ON THEIR TODO LIST AND THEY HAVE TAKEN IT OFF THEIR PRODUCT LIST.  THEY DON'T ANSWER CALLS OR EMAILS..  DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!!
summary: DOES NOT WORK ON PS3!!!!! DO NOT BUY THIS!!! NYKO DOESNT EVEN TRY TO FIX!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

reviewText: Took a chance on this guitar after reading the reviews, have had two of them for a little over a month now and absolutely no problems with them at all. The only thing that you have to remember is if you're using the guitar with RockBand 2 the selector has to be set to "Guitar Hero" mode, that's probably why so many people report it being defective. Easy fix, well worth the $12 I paid for each guitar... saw this same guitar in a GameStop location yesterday, sells for $49.99 as of 6/29/09.
summary: Works perfectly for me... Must be a lot of user error happening out there.

reviewText: I just picked this up for $35 and am very pleased. I have only played co-op mode, but it is a total blast. The humor is spot on. It feels like Crackdown meets Burnout Paradise. You can loose yourself here for hours and enjoy every moment.
summary: Way more fun than I expected

reviewText: I bought this for my husband as a christmas present and he adores it! Better graphics, more options... Just better than the first one! However, if you're going to buy this, buy the first one as well if you don't already have it. If you don't buy the first one or haven't played the first one previously, nothing that goes on in this game will make any sense. It truly does continue the story from the first game. The awsome movie scenes are a bonus!!! EVEN I LIKE WATCHING THEM!!!

I bought this as a gift for my little bro. He wanted me to drive him to gamestop {45 min away} one weekend to get this game. He kept telling me nonstop how badly he wanted the game so I ordered it for him with prime shipping  and gave it to him 2 days before he thought he was going to get it. He was really happy about it so I assume the game is pretty good.

I received the game very quickly.  The product arrived in perfect condition.  I purchased the game for my son, he says that it's a great game and lots of fun.  He plays it all the time.  Highly recommended.

My son said he likes this game more than GTA.  I was not impressed with the cars.  Missions are pretty cool.  When playing the game, you do not have to do a mission, you can go look around and check the area out.  Graphics are not too bad, but I think the cars are too square and the movement is choppy.

I bought this game for my boyfriend for Christmas but gave it to him early and he has been playing in non-stop for three days now.  Grand Theft Auto has been his favorite game until now.  He said that he gives Grand theft a 98 out of a 100 and Saints Row a 100!!  The graphics are better and the music is much better.  Its really cool how you get to create your own character to play the game.  I even enjoy watching him play!!

The first thing I notices is the flight controls, once you get the hang of it the rest of the game should fall into place. So far the game looks good, plays good and the music is great as well. Can't wait to see what happens later on in the game!

I love this game but don't have a ton of time to play it. I really wish it had a local two player option so I could get the kid playing with me instead of one of us watching the other play. My biggest gripe? Too many options. Building a bike takes a long time but in the end that is part of the fun :)

I loved this charger immensely! It saved me money on batteries and was convenient to use. I didn't have any problems as far as communications with the Wii as the previous poster did, so it worked well for me. However, after only 2 months of usage, the charger is completely dead and won't charge anymore. It was good while it lasted, but now I'm going to be buying another brand that will hopefully last a bit longer than 2 months!

I've had this battery pack for a couple months now.  I have had no performance problems with the balance board, probably because I am using the foot extenders that came with the balance board.  (If you are using the board on carpet without the extenders, this might cause problems.)

The last time I charged the pack was about a month ago, and the board has been used about 5 hours a week, so I'm very happy with how long the charge lasts.

I've had this product for a week now and I am very pleased with it. No problems as of yet. I hit the jackpot, paid only $6.98 new and with free shipping. It fits perfectly under my board. I have charged it once and it is still going strong. Very nice product :-)

We decided to go with a battery pack for our Wii balance board, thinking it would save time and money. Well, it was wasted money from the opening of the package. The light never came on, the charger never charged and it was a complete dud. I do not recommend this product to anyone.

I am so impressed with this game.  The presentation is pretty much spot on.  The graphics are great and it's just so much fun to play.  I just got this a few days ago and I'm really hooked on it.  I want to get the latest version (2011) so I can have the updated roster.  If you like wrestling, get this game or one of the later versions. Even if you don't like wrestling, there is a lot of fun to be had with this game.

Picking this up, I was worried that it would become boring and that I'd get burnt out on it so quickly, like the other games.  This one offers a couple different storylines in the "Road to Wrestlemania" feature.  Also, the Create-A-Finisher is amazing.  The only thing I noticed wrong about this game, so far, is that when you're creating a character, you cannot change the positioning or the size of the tattoos.  Other than that, amazing game and waaaaay better than the other ones.

This was my favorite game on the GameCube back in 2002, and I'm so happy to have purchased it again. This seller is reputable and sold me a perfect copy - no skips, scratches, or glitches. This game is really fun and a cute twist on the story of Mario, Peach and Bowser. Yes, it's expensive, but not much more so (if at all) than you'd find on eBay, and much less risky to buy from Amazon. I've been playing nonstop, I'm so happy!

Loved it, or at least the person that I gave it to did. My boyfriend stole my best friend's copy of Super Mario Sunshine, so I ended up replacing it for her a year and a half later. Great service, excellent game, and good price for a legendary game of our childhood.

I LOVE THIS GAME. I love the music. I love the colors. I love how it makes me yell. I love how it makes me want to cry. I love how it makes me run to the power button and then makes me go on hiatus. Lol but seriously this game was so much fun. I was kinda sad when I FINALLY beat Bowser because I wanted to play some more. But I never completed it 100% so that'll do. Also I was always discovering different/new ways to use FLUDD through the many walkthroughs I had to watch to keep my sanity...

This game is awesome. In my opinion, it is the greatest video game in history. It is nice and challenging, and the levels are very fun. The addition of F.L.U.D.D makes it even more unique and fun. I highly reccomend this game to anyone.

No controller support on PC, so no couch co-op, and no mention of it before. This seller doesn't allow returns, either, so I'm stuck with a single-player game when I was looking for a beat-em-up to play with my girlfriend.

This is a great game, albeit a little short. If you level up in the early acts, the later ones are not much of a challenge, but the graphics are fantastic. It still sets the benchmark for the hack-n-slash genre.
summary: This is a great game, albeit a little short

reviewText: Such a big disappointment after Diablo 2 was so good. If you haven't heard of Path of Exile, check it out, it's what Diablo 3 should have been. I had high hopes for this game and wish I never wasted my time.

I never was a fan of any RPG games. My friend played the first and second Diablo games when they came out. He gave me a trial key that came with the game and I was hooked. People can complain all they want about a game, it's really what you do with it is what matters. I enjoy it then and now. Must have if your an ARPG fan, and if you weren't, give it a try. I did and it's fun!
summary: I enjoy it then and now

reviewText: My husband and I played this game together and it was SO much fun! I love almost every minute of it... I'm arachnophobic, so there were some parts that weren't my favorite. Other than that, totally worth the price.

This game is a lot of fun. If you only play through on normal mode you will be disappointed for sure as it takes only a few hours to beat the story line. On more difficult levels its more challenging. If you do not like to repeat areas and gear grind like you do in WoW this game is not for you. I own both this and expansion and I enjoy it but like I said its not for everyone.
summary: This game is a lot of fun. If you only play through on normal mode ...

reviewText: Blizzard is legendary when it comes to making quality games and this one is no different. While it isn't as great as the earlier Diablo games, it is still a fantastic experience especially with the expansion pack and all the changes they have made.
summary: While it isn't as great as the earlier Diablo games

reviewText:
I hated this game when it was released because I was playing it overseas on a poor internet connection.  Even single player there was a 3 second delay between input and result due to the always-on requirement.  I didn't realize this was a requirement when I bought it.

However, since returning to normal internet I can say this is one of my favorite games.  It is not quite up to snuff with Diablo 2, but it's still pretty good.
summary: I hated this game when it was released because I was ...

reviewText: There is a lot of negative feedback for this game, but for me this was one of the best games I have ever played. I love how their seasons work and how now they are introducing new items such as the ancient legendary drops and certain sets that work with the current patch meta. I have honestly put in more hours into this game than I have in any other game in my life. After you get your character to level 70 and start gaining paragon levels you will play non-stop!
summary: Don't judge a book by its cover

reviewText: I am sure you have read the reviews.  This game was a serious let down.  Blizzard tried to capitalize on the Auction House and it made the game fail.  Shame on you Blizzard for being so greedy.  There are many other aspects of this game that were good but if you are looking for a hack and slash that you can grind for hours and also spend hours trading, this is not the game.  Fun the first time, boring all the rest.
summary: There are many other aspects of this game that were good but if you are looking for a hack and ...

reviewText: Diablo 3 is my first experience with the Diablo franchise. I had always been a Blizzard fan due to the Warcraft and Starcraft series. Diablo 3 didn't disappoint and is a must own for anyone looking for a hack and slash dungeon crawler. The game has a great deal of replayability due to all of the random loot. I'm really looking forward to the expansion!

For real people.  I can't believe so many tools on here have rated this game so low.  You should be ashamed of yourselves.  It was a fantastically fun game that became increasingly challenging after you completed normal mode.  At times it was frustrating, but that is what a game is all about.  I highly recommend 10/10!
summary: Obviously you fail at life if you rate this game less than 4 stars.

reviewText: It's been ages since I've played a diablo game, and this one definitely doesn't disappoint. I'd been avoiding it for quite a while because of all the DRM, but other then the occasional aggravating update Blizzard pushes through, it's just what I hoped it would be.

I have played this game on PS 3 and Xbox 360and so far it has been great, I heard my cousins on this game so I thought i would buy it for myself and it turned out to be a terrific game, but there are a couple things I prefer on the PC rather then the consoles.

I've had this game over a year now, and am only now writing a review.  I still play this quite a bit and wonder if there's more to come.  I thoroughly enjoy most of Blizzard's products, so if you liked the first two Diablo games and expansions, this is definitely worth your time.
summary: Still play this all the time.

reviewText:
One of my favorite games. Wish I had more time to play it.

I was a die hard Diablo II player and wasn't disappointed with D3. I wish there were PvP, but what are you going to do? Can't wait for the expansion.

I bought this for my boyfriend for Christmas and he has been hooked to the game since. Anyone who was into the previous Diablo games will love this one too. The graphics are much better and the game is lots of fun.

With how long Blizzard took to create this game and get it released, I admit I expected a lot more from the game than the rushed and repetitive game that it turned out to be.  It had potential to easily be one of the best games of the year, but it lacked the luster and fun that Diablo 2 had.

I've played Diablo II for about 8 years and have to say I am impressed by Diablo III, the only shortcoming of the game I see so far is that there is no PvP but it is coming soon, so I'm not deducting stars for that, I am glad Blizzard is taking their time properly balancing PvP and not releasing it until it is ready.

Patch 1.0.5 added a lot of content into the game! I am looking forward to all of the other patches and content that will be added.

Graphics and classes were great!

The maps are the same, the bosses are the same, and there aren't any unique quests.

You run and fight through 4 acts from level 1 through 25 on normal.

Then you do it again. And again. And again.

Have been looking forward to this game for 20 years but after reading all the reviews, I've decided to skip Diablo 3. Mainly because of the online only thing. This is why I never buy games the day they come out. I just saved 60 bucks.

This game definitely lives up to the hype that it generated over the years before its release. I still can't put it down after having it for a few months. There's so much to do outside the main quest line that it keeps you coming back, very addicting. Also the graphics are that of the new generation games. Brilliantly designed and engineered!

Best Max Payne game to date.  I've purchased the other two, this one is hands down the best, but its part of a longer ongoing story about the main character.  You will appreciate the story much more if you get 1 and 2.  With that said, the game does stand up on its own, because all of the NPC characters are new in this one.  There are many similarities between Max Payne 3 and the Denzel Washington movie "Man on Fire".  You will not regret this purchase.
summary: Fantastic product, can't wait for the next one.

reviewText: Well I have tried it for over 2 months and I have to say the execution on this game is one of the worst of any game I have ever played and I have been playing since video games first came out..  None of the people who started to play with me still play it and I am on the verge of quitting. The frustration with this game is off the charts.
summary: I really wanted to like this game

reviewText: Max Payne 3 is great!  The graphics on the PC are insane!  I had no trouble installing the game and I was up and playing in no time at all.  The game is fun to play, it is nice and long, it is just a great game a new PC game, you cannot go wrong with Max Payne 3.  Way to go Rockstar!!!

I actually liked the game the first few days I played it. I liked the gameplay, story and was actually addicted to it. But then it gets boring really quickly. There is no depth to this game and no replay value. I am beginning to believe that Blizzard has lost its plot to make great games. Maybe the key people behind the success of older Blizzard titles are no longer working for the company.

This game was fun for the first 20 levels or so... After that, it simply became a grind, and not a fun one at that. The randomization of the maps found in D2 just seemed non existent in D3. I level 2 characters to 60, and couldn't stand it any longer. Don't buy this game if your looking for long term playability. If you want a game you can play solo long term, go with Skyrim or a Final Fantasy. If you want a MMO, go with anything else. This was the biggest let down in blizzard history.

This game is not D3. It's Jay Wilson's Auction House Trader 3. I bought the game without ever playing it based on how good D2 was. I will not be buying another Blizzard game.  This game is very disappointing. Do not buy this game. It's a waste of time and money. Jay Wilson should be fired for this crap. This game is a stain that will follow Jay Wilson for the rest of his days.

Diablo III: Standard Edition

I liked the game so much, I ordered it for a friend.  I've seen a lot of reviews both great and negative.  Personally, I think the game is fantastic, and exactly what I was waiting for.  My only wish, is that they don't wait too long for the expansion packs!

Game was big let down.  Blizzard waited so long to develop the game that by the time it was ready for release it was already outdated, wrong for the current gaming era.  I'm sure the developers are embarrassed to be associated with it.  Blizzard did such a good job with Starcraft 2 and World of Warcraft.  Diablo 3 will be remembered for a long time as an epic flop, or perhaps it's fallen angel that could never get back up.

The game would be a lot more fun if I could get online to play it.  All I want to do is play single-player but I can't because
 (a) they require you to be online even for single-player and (b) their servers are down...again.  Buying this game was a serious mistake.

The game will be fun for the first few days, but once you hit 50+(which will be in 2-3 days) the game goes down hill and you will have no intention of playing again. Save your money and go buy something else.

I could point out all the flaws but it looks like all the other reviewers already have so I will just say this, as a old player of Diablo 1 and Diablo 2, I had high hopes for this game, it had so much potential , but ultimately it was a big let down, what a shame.

I have had a great time playing this game for the last two weeks. It's classic Diablo with some improvements. If you are looking to play some Diablo with some new systems and have a great time running around clicking and smiting your enemies, this is your game. Don't let the bad reviews dissuade you. I saw the reviews before I played, undeterred I bought it anyways, and I have had a great time.

Diablo 3 took a long time to be released however, I think it was well worth it! The game is a combination of Diablo 2 and World of Warcraft. Easy to learn and fun to play with friends. My wife, a non-gamer type, is now playing Diablo 3 with me and doing really well! I highly recommend this game!

Everything's pretty much already been said about this game, so I'll just sum up by saying - by know you know that people either love it or hate it.  I am among those that love it.  It's fantastically fun, and the character classes are interesting and different than any other game I've played.  I, unashamed, recommend this game to anyone that reads this review.

Just wanted to get my one star review in to add to the chorus of disappointment. I looked forward to this game for so long, and it's hard to find time to play a computer game, so I really want it to work when I do get a chance to sit down to play. But alas, the servers don't seem to be able to keep up and so this is just an exercise in frustration as I get shut out of my game again and again. They got my money this time, but never again.
summary: Keep getting kicked off the server. Can't play. Money down the drain.

reviewText: I don't know why everyone is hating on this game. Maybe it's because I'm not a real "gamer". I don't play very many video games, but this is a pretty damn good game. Sure it could have been made to be a little better, but overall really fun!!! Don't listen to these cranky gamers who have nothing better to do than to complain. Get lives!!!

The game mechanics are a big improvement over DII, allowing for a wide variety of skills to be used at any moment. The story line is great so far, and the cinematics are amazing. I have had some server related problems, but I'm sure Blizz will get these ironed out pretty quickly.
summary: They went the natural direction from DII to DIII

reviewText:
Not a vastly different game than Diablo II but way better.

Plays great on a variety of computers so if you don't have the latest rig it might still work for you. I expect there to be a demo at some point so if you wanna try it out before buying you might wait on that.

There were some initial launch issues with the servers but those seem to be over.

It's so clear that Blizzard has given up on trying to make quality games and is just milking their brands for all they are worth. Diablo 3 is the most rushed, ill-conceived Blizzard game I've ever played and honestly I'm not sure if I will ever buy another Blizzard game again. Right now the game feels like it's still in beta test, which shows me that it was rushed out the door for profit's sake. I used to love Blizzard, but as of now, we're broken up.

Even with the 6 month delay in bringing the game out to market, this game is still broke. Trying to log into the game is a nightmare. I'll try playing the game again after a few more patches (2-3 months) come out to fix the bugs.

Just a heads up, there's no solo or offline version which is what I really wanted. My fault for not doing more research before I bought it. I can't really say if the gameplay itself is good or bad, since I didn't bother playing once I realized I couldn't get rid of the social media/chat/multiplayer garbage. It seems like a glorified Farmville as far as I can tell. YMMV.

If you want a social/multiplayer/PVP game it may be right for you.

I love playing this game. The problem is, I paid a lot of money for a product that will not let me play it due to online DRM activation. I sure hope things get fixed soon so I can amend this review. The game is fun - it just won't let me play.

This game is basically unplayable. You must remain connected to game servers at all times. After an hour of play, I disconnected at least 20 times. The game is only saved when you reach a check point, and I can't past the 3rd check point without a server crash. If I had known this game would require logging into servers every time, I would not have bought it.

I do not know what the point in pre-ordering this game was.  I should have just wait for the price to go down.

I've had it for two days now and still have not been able to play due to the battle.net server being down.  This is not okay.  The got my $60 they should let me play the game.

Never buying from blizzard again.  Cancelling my Starcraft II Heart of the Swarm pre-order.
summary: Day 2 still cannot play the game

reviewText:
The first four hours alone have been the most fun I've had playing any game in years. For all of those worried about the servers being down, simply wait a few days and buy the game. I personally haven't had any problems other than being disconnected once while Blizzard patched the game.

I'm new to the series, and the amount of polish that has been given to the gameplay is incredible. The game's atmosphere coupled with the non-stop action keeps it from becoming boring or redundant.
summary: One of the few games that has ever lived up to all of the hype.

reviewText: This game has one major unforgivable flaw. It is a single player game and you simply cannot play unless you have an active internet connection. Even once the game is "activated", you cannot play single player without being connected to the problem prone Battle.net servers. That means if your internet goes down, you simply cannot play.

As a long time gamer but first time diablo player, the launch of this game has been horrendous and having to be online all the time to play the single player portion is ridiculous and limiting to say the least. If you're a fan of diablo, you've most likely already purchased the game, however if you're looking to try a new game, this should NOT be it.

I've been playing the Diablo games since the late 90's and the third title in the series does not disappoint!  This game is amazing!  There was a little bit of a hiccup when the servers went live but get over it.  It's fixed and I for one can't stop playing it.  If you've played D1 and D2 buy this game.  If you like RPG's buy this game.  If you like playing games with your friends buy this game.  In short, BUY THIS GAME you won't be disappointed!

You cannot play this game UNLESS their servers are up.  If they are down, you can't do anything with it.  Its a copy protection scheme, but if they are having problems (like today) and you spent your money, you can't use it.

I played in the beta.  Played Diablo and Diablo II.  Diablo II is more fun than this game.  Granted I only was able to play for about 4 hours today, with all the server problems, but its just not fun and doesn't feel like Diablo.

Save your money.  Buy something else.  I wish I had.
summary: Do not spend money on this game and here's why

reviewText: People make mistakes. Even the greatest of people make mistakes. They will fix the server issues, it's only the first day. I've played for about 10 hours now and I really enjoy this game. Give these hard working developers a break, they'll fix it, and this game will be phenomenal for years to come.
summary: Great Game - Despite the Server issues

reviewText:
Sure, there are some server issues at launch, but other than that, it's AMAZING.
Don't listen to what other people have to say! If you are a gamer, especially a RPG person, buy it, you won't be disappointed.

For now at least, do not buy this game. The game doesn't work. You cannot play it. Blizzard has put out a product that literally cannot be used. For the limited amount of time that I've actually been able to touch the game, I loved it. It was a lot of fun. BUT, it's not worth the $60 because you cannot log-on to play. DO NOT BUY.

Don't believe any of the negative reviews here. If you enjoyed WoW and Diablo II, you will love this game.

The game play is easy and fun, the story line is engaging. Lots of quests and dialogue. The spells are very cool and you have choices to make that give your character a distinctive look and feel. Graphics and sound effects are phenomenal.

Just played for about 4 hours so far. Looking forward to the rest of the content.

It would be nice to be able to actually play the single player game.  The servers have been down since the game has been released. You would think Blizzard would actually be prepared for this.  What a joke.  I wish I could return this, and get Max Payne 3.  Maybe the servers will be fixed in a week.
summary: Was fun the the 15 minutes I got to play

reviewText: I was going to go out and buy the game, but i decided to read the reviews prior to leaving. glad i did. i won't be purchasing this game solely on the fact that i have to have an internet connection to play. I travel a lot and a connection is not always possible, so this is basically a kill joy of a game in that aspect.

This is the best game I've ever played, over the newly released PC games, or xBox games, whatever it may be.

The graphics are amazing, and the story plot is too.

This game does take a very long time to complete, but I just love this.

This is such a fun & addictive game. It's one of the most refreshing Sonic games out there. The nighttime "Werehog" missions are a little different than most Sonic games, but they add a new dynamic gameplay to the Sonic franchise. If you're a Sonic fan or just a fan of platforming games in general then I strongly recommend this game!
summary: One of the best Sonic games in recent history!

reviewText: We got this game and before long, the entire family was playing it. It is addicting and you will find yourself going back to it over and over again. It requires a good memory and a sense of adventure. I would recommend this for both kids AND adults. It's just a really fun time.
summary: Very fun and challenging in a good way

reviewText:
I loved both of the Syberia games, and I would recommend them to anyone with a passion for great adventure games.
The plot, scenery, and music in this game were stellar.
It would be a game you could pick up years later and enjoy again.
Need a stocking stuffer? It might be an old game, but it's timeless.
summary: Great Adventure Game in a Fading Genre

reviewText: This is another game I found to be a fun game. It's like most games of this type once you get used to how it's played you really can enjoy it. I'm having a lot of fun figuring out the puzzles. I'm really liking this game. A really good buy since you get both Syberia 1 and 2 in the deal. Suggest buying this one.

In my opinion Halo Wars is Highly underrated.  I love the Halo Universe, and to experience Halo in a completely different genre was awesome.  Halo Wars takes place many years before the events of Halo: Combat Evolved, and tells the story of the UNSC Spirit of Fire.  The story is captivating, and the multiplayer (in its hay day) was one to enjoy.  I sure hope there will be a Halo Wars 2 on the next gen Xbox One

Great game. It merges the tactical planning and time management of strategy games with the pick-up-and-play nature of the Halo series, all in the familiar backdrop of the Halo universe. The best pure strategy game on a console to date.

Normally, I write reviews to talk about the good and the bad about a product's quality and usefulness. This time, I just wanted to stop and say I LOVE THIS GAME. It's a good addition to the Halo series and is in RTS form, so a nice change of pace from the normal Halo FPS. Great game!

I regret not getting this game sooner.  Ensemble did a great job of making a functional RTS for console.  The controls are well laid out and don't feel cumbersome, so if you're an RTS fan and hesitant about the transition to console, fret not.

Anyone who enjoys the RTS genre and the Halo series needs to check this one out!

Unlike most people, I get legitimately nervous when playing FPS games by myself. I love the Halo franchise and this game nails it for me. While the campaign may be easy to finish, it's fun to build your army and send them off to defeat the Covenant, or vise versa. Controls are simple to get used to after a day or so. The only downside: you can only do multiplayer if you're playing against someone on another console, whether it be in your network or online. Other than that, it's a blast!
summary: Awesome Halo game for those who aren't fond of FPS

reviewText:
I played "Sam and Max Hit the Road" on an old 386 about 15 years ago. When I saw this one, I wondered if it would live up to that experience. It did!

What a great game - It's a puzzle game, so probably not suitable for smaller kids, but my 10 and 13 year old kids love it, too!

This is one of the best Sonic games ever. I have the Play Station 2 version and it is a ton of fun. Excellent graphics. Challenging gaming. The day levels are a blast and the night levels are fun too! You will definitely have fun with this awesome game!

This controller performs admirably and boasts a unique look to boot. Not only that, but I got a memory card for it for free! The controller feels light and slim; lighter and slimmer than you'd expect. The buttons are all fully responsive and the joystick is nice and tight. If you're looking for a good N64 controller, really spend the extra money and buy yourself a solid first-party controller like this one.

I've had a set of these for less than a year and they are falling apart.  The wire that connects the headphones to the volume control has come apart.  The headphones are no longer adjustable and are being held together with duct tape.  The product should be much better constructed for this price.
summary: Great sound but not built to last

reviewText: I'm not going to type a really long review here. If your in the market for a really good pair of headphones for gaming, movies, or computer usage, then look no further. I have been using the older white Tritton model for over a year now, and I have no complaints. The quality is amazing. It really enhances anything you do with them. I use them to communicate on xbox live, playstation online, and on Skype on my PC. I promise it will not dissapoint.

I enjoyed this game very much. Not a huge Aerosmith fan, but I like them enough to enjoy the game, and rock out on some good old tunes. My 9 year old son even liked the music enough to finish the game in co-op mode. All in all a great purchase. You get a good game and a wireless guitar for under [...] and to me that's a good deal. They did a good job with the song selections from both Aerosmith and the opening bands. Hope others enjoyed it as much as I did.

Its expensive nowadays but its the best quality controller on the market.  If you are looking for a controller for casual gaming then I would recommend saving money by getting a cheaper controller.  If you trying to find a controller for competitive gaming then I highly recommend this controller.  I myself am using this controller for SSBM competitions.
summary: Best Controller For the Competitive Gamer

reviewText: There are slight distinctions between GameCube controllers, believe it or not. The originals tend to work just fine, while the new WiiU ones have a couple quirks. This controller is the second "wave", the one for the Nintendo Wii. In terms of Super Smash Brothers Melee, this controller tends to be able to shield drop in an incredibly smooth way, which helps a lot. If you don't know what that means, you can ignore it - essentially, this controller is the best GameCube controller on the market.

I love this controller. The cord is a hell of a lot longer than the cord on my previous controller, which mainly means I can actually play from the couch instead of from the floor in front of the couch. Other than that, it's a perfectly functional controller for Gamecube, and I would definitely buy it again.

This is by far my favorite controller. Everything on it works perfectly, and it even has an extra long cable which I appreciate. I love it so much I don't even let my friends use it. I highly recommend this controller!

Yep! It's a Gamecube controller! It has a nice long cable, it handles like a dream, and is the best video gaming controller of all time. Too bad I can't use it for games on my computer!

Yes, that's an opinion. I do love this controller though.
summary: The best game controller of all time.

reviewText: This is the real deal right here. I got this controller to play Super Smash Bros. Melee competitively and it feels great, functions perfectly, and gives me all the precision I need to play in tournaments. I've purchased 3rd party controllers for GameCube before and they just can't compare to the official ones.
summary: I got this controller to play Super Smash Bros

reviewText: When Super Smash Bros came out for the Wii U, my friends did a big party and said for everyone to bring their controllers. I didn't have one, so I bought this one! It's great and I have been so happy with it. The cord is longer than the standard Game Cube controllers, the white matches the Wii. Ultimately my friends giggled at me because they had a ton of extra controllers and I didn't need to buy my own, but I'm glad I did. :)
summary: When Super Smash Bros came out for the Wii U

reviewText: This controller looks and feels great. The extra cord length is very useful and there was no lag at all for what I used it for (Mainly Super Smash Brothers). It takes a bit to loosen a few of the buttons but it's not much of an issue. Would definitely recommend this to a friend
summary: This controller looks and feels great. The extra cord length is very useful and ...

reviewText: The controller is perfect and works with the Wii U as well. When I received the box, it happened to be a Japanese edition of the controller. The origin country does not seem to change anything though. I give it five stars, but I would have liked to know that it was from Japanese to check out if it worked with Nintendo.
summary: The controller is perfect and works with the Wii U as well.

reviewText:
Don't purchase generic, third-party Gamecube controllers. None of them hold up. I suppose if you only plan on playing puzzle games on the gamecube you can use a cheap third-party controller. However, if you need to move around, save up and get the real thing.

I'll be using this thing for Smash Bros Melee and PM. I've tried playing both with fake controllers and it isn't pretty.

Buy this controller and you can't go wrong.
summary: I've tried playing both with fake controllers and it isn't pretty. Buy this controller and you can't go wrong

reviewText: I've only used this controller for about 1/2 hour, but so far it's been great. It's very responsive (much better than other controllers I've had) and feels very comfortable to hold. It also looks really great with the white color (however, only time will tell if it starts to get discolored).

It's exactly what I expected, and exactly what I needed. It's a fully functional GameCube controller with incredible build quality, perfect responsiveness, and unbelievably comfortable to hold. And that makes sense--the official Nintendo controller is bound to have all of these qualities and make it worth the money. I highly recommend it.
summary: No better GC controller on the market than the official Nintendo one.

reviewText:
If you own a Wii that can play GameCube games, this is the controller for you.

With a 10 ft cable, it gives you plenty of slack. Buttons are very responsive and the controller is very comfortable.

The white matches the white on the Wii as well.

I would recommend this product to anyone that needs an extra controller. The longer cord works great for multiplayer. I ordered this product because a few of my gaming buddies had one, and I wanted a complete set of wired controllers for my Wii. This product is worth it.

There isn't much to say about this other than it is awesome. If you know anything about Gamecube controllers (or most console controllers for that matter) you know that the official controllers are the best. The controller is extremely solid, works as it should, and has a great length of wire.

This GCN controller is made by Nintendo, so the quality is just as great as you'd expect. In fact, it feels slightly better than past controllers I've bought (and that's saying a lot since I've had many). It also sports a 9 foot cord, which is longer than earlier versions you'll find.

I highly recommended this product to any Nintendo fan out there as it is arguably the finest controller Nintendo has ever made.

This is the cheapest one to get brand new, but it is by no means a bad controller. This controller is excellent and is very durable. the buttons, joystick, and trigger do seem a little different from what I remember on my old GameCube controller, but nonetheless very well built. If you need a new controller, I'd recommend getting this if you really want a brand new controller, it gets the job done and you'll get adjusted to the difference pretty easily.
summary: Cheapest Brand New GameCube Controller you'll get

reviewText: My nephew wanted an older gamecube game to play in our Wii. Once I purchased the game for him, we found out that the Wii controllers won't work with the gamecube games when played in the Wii. After doing a little research, I realized we needed the classic gamecube controller and a gamecube memory card. Once we got both of those, the gamecube game that we bought finally worked! He is happy!

I play a number of Gamecube games on my Wii.  The Gamecube controller I was using is pretty worn out so I was looking for a replacement.  This controller is perfect because 1) it is a genuine Nintendo product and 2) its cord is almost twice as long as the original Gamecube controller.  I considered buying a used Wavebird since they can often be found for a similar price, but I decided against it because I don't want another device to feed batteries and the Wavebird doesn't have rumble functionality.
summary: Great controller with a long cord

reviewText: If you have a Wii and still want to play your Gamecube games, This controller is the best thing you can have. Its extra long cord helps to ensure you can play from anywhere without the worry of pulling your system off a shelf. The best part is, its an official Nintendo product, so you know you will have that brand name quality

This is the real deal on GameCube controllers.  It is an official Nintendo branded controller and performs exactly as it should.  I highly recommend this if you are looking for a better way to play your GameCube titles on your GameCube or Wii.  It also makes a great controller for WiiWare and Virtual Console titles.  This item is imported from Japan, but don't fear the Japanese characters on the box, it will work just fine with your American Wii or GameCube console.

This game controller is much better than any other controller that I have used on the Gamecube. Although the A button is stiff the controller itself is and is very well built. I will recommend getting this controller for the Gamecube if you love playing your games for a long time.

I was very excited to purchase this charger, but unfortunately it did not work.  I left it charging for 12 hours, checked it, and it was still not fully charged.  I tried charging it longer.  No luck.  I charged the batteries with and without the remote attached.  Still didn't work.  I've decided to return the packs to Amazon for a replacement.  I'm still hopeful that I will get a functioning product the 2nd time around.

So far, so good. It works well, other than the fact it is just a little stiff and the buttons/joysticks are sticky right out of the box and need to be worked a little. Our original controller had joysticks that started drifting onscreen even when they were not being pressed, so we needed a new one and were happy with the price of this controller.

I got them in perfect condition and I opened them to see how the buttons work. I played with the buttons and it seems fine to me which is great for such a cheap price. I haven't used it to play yet but I can't wait and if it does work, I cannot wait to buy more from here cause it comes clean and well packaged!
summary: I got them in perfect condition and I opened them to see how the ...

reviewText: I got these for my ps2 slim. I got to say I noticed a big difference in graphics. The only strange thing is the top of my screen seems to look as if it's having a seizure. I don't know if it's the game or my television because it's a Sanyo flat screen from 2011. But it's not really a problem for me.

Exactly what I was looking for, though I was hoping that the component cable would result in a clearer picture than the composite cable. Unfortunately, on my TV this was not the case. I have since upgraded to using an HDMI cable with a DVI adapter since my TV is too old to support HDMI cables directly. Either way, this cable was great for the time being that I used it!
summary: Perfect Component Cable for the PS3

reviewText: I bought this not really expecting it to work, but lo and behold, it does! The colors look good, and I can't really ask for more than that, given what I paid for the cable. There is a blob of color on the edge of the picture, but it lets me play my PS2 on my HDTV and that's all I wanted. If you don't really care about it being the prettiest ever and just care about functionality, you won't be disappointed.

There is not a lot to say about this product, but it works just as it should.  I haven't had any problems with it and it works exactly as it should for my uses.  It came quickly and in perfect condition.  I would recommend this product if you need to have an HD component cable.

My son loves to bowl. But the wii game we bought him a while back isn't very realistic. So I tried this one out since it was a good price. It's definitely a lot better than any other bowling game out there. My boyfriend loves the boxing game. It's easy and gives you a workout. I highly recommend it to anyone!

I bought this for my 8 year old nephew and 5 year old niece and they love it.  They especially like the boxing and play against each other.  They enjoy the bowling, tennis and baseball, too.

This game is a great introduction to the Wii with motion sensor.  If you have young kids who enjoy video games, I think they'd like this game.

Does anyone know of any other games with the motion like this that are as good or better than this (for the Wii)?

This game is a big reason why I ended up buying a Wii in the first place, and it was really the only game I needed for a long time.  I like bowling the best, but I also really enjoy doing home run derbys.  Boxing is awesome, and gives you a really good workout.  Golf is another favorite.  Overall, I think the game is great, and I give it a very high recommendation.

I purchased this game because the original that came with the console got scratched. I was very happy to find it on Amazon and I purchased the product used. It arrived when it was supposed to and it was in excellent condition. It looked like a brand new game! I couldn't wait to play wii bowling, which is my favorite. I will definately purchase from this seller again.

When we bought our Wii, it was a Wii Fit bundle, so Wii Sports was not included.  I bought the game for my husband for Christmas.  He loves it!  I love it!  Our four-year-old daughter loves it!  She can play the baseball game.  We have family Wii Sports night and have a ball.

This was a replacement game for the original that our grandkids lost. It is a really fun and easy game for kids and adults. Our grandkids are 5 and 2 and they both have a great time playing all the games.

My husband and I love the golf game in this package and wish Nintendo would come out with an expansion. We play this game a lot.  No other golf game we tried compares.  It's not realistic like the Tiger Woods Golf game, but it's fun. Up to 4 people can play at once, making it great family entertainment. Also, as another reviewer said, it's a great introduction to the WII. I was somewhat intimidated by the WII until I tried this game. Give it a try; you'll like it! It's addictive.

Works as good as the original. Now that I have two sets of cords it allows me to easily move my Wi to another room without having to unplug and then plug everything from the back of the TVs. Have been using it for several months with no problems. Highly recommend especially at this price.
summary: Works as good as the original!

reviewText: I never got a chance to play it. The game wouldn't play after I installed it. Said I needed to upgrade my graphic card. After doing that I was able to go into the game to play but it ran so choppy that it wasn't even worth it.
summary: I Really Wanted to Like This Game

reviewText: I used to play HOMM3 many hours a day back in the good old days.  I was worried that I would think this version was tired and sappy.  I bought it because of the fond memories and the low price.  But it's aged very well.  I am ecstatic that I bought it because it's just as much fun as it ever was!  I am unable to review HOMM4 because I'm so obsessed with 3 that I haven't even tried 4.

This game, after so many years, still entertains me for hours and hours. It works on windows 7 even though the installation wizard may tell you you have the wrong operating system for it. Just go ahead and install it. I am happy I get to play it again.
summary: Still fun after so many years!

reviewText: I bought this game as I remember playing it as a 12 year old or so, and it is just as fun now that I am 20. The game system is perfect for this style of game and I spent 6hours playing this the day I opened it.

I have a few friends that have played Heroes III on and off for about 4 years now, so I thought I'd give it a try.  If you like Fantasy-turn based strategy games, this is one you should pick up.  I bought III & IV for $10, I've put probably 20-30 hours into it and having a great time for the money.

This game was not even close to as good as Ace Combat 6. I played 2 levels and was bored out of my mind with the story line and action of game play. I would not recommend this to anyone who likes aerial combat sims. Too bad I can't rate it zero stars.

Ace Combat 6 got me back into flight games. Being able to use the Ace Combat 6 Flight Controllers make this game awsome. The graphics are great, the mission briefings do tend to get long from time to time, but they never make the game unbearable. I highly reccomend getting this game. Can't wait to see what H.A.W.X. 2 has to offer.

This is the worst game that I have ever played.  It is way too hard for a kid and way too hard for an adult.  I even had the 14 year old game-junkie from next door try to play and no one could get past the first level.  It is painful to play.  I cannot believe that a horrible game like this can even be sold.  I cannot warn you more strongly to avoid this horrible horrible horrible game.
summary: the worst game I have ever played

reviewText: Love this game! It's easy enough for everyone in the family to play each other and it's challenging enough in individual mode also. The graphics are great and the fight scenes are AWESOME. I definitely recommend this game.

My brothers and I have always been a fan of the Mortal Kombat series, so when we saw this, we had to go for it. The style of fighting is the same style as always which is great and the character option for this one is awesome.

This game was actually purchased as a Christmas present for my Fiance' and when I ordered, I got it the very next day! I am sure he will love the game as he has been wanting it for awhile now, and this company is great to buy from!

Didn't have much fun with this game..for some reason I thought it would be like the rest of the mortal kombat game (hence the title) but it wasn't. The special moves of each character are difficult to figure out and overall the game is seems a little slow, not enough action. This is supposed to be a fighting game...but I'm still yawning from the experience...

This is a fun addition to the MK series but definetly not its best. The story mode isn't as good as it has been in the past. I can't say it is a good game but it's a fun addition. I played for about a week and have not played it again.

I have been waiting for this game to come out of a LONG time. I have not gotten to play MKvsDCU as much as I would like to, but it has been great. The gameplay is very fluid (cutscenes to fighting, etc.) The graphics are amazing and the character interpretations are spot-on!

I do not have time to play many video games, but the graphics on this game are amazing and the gameplay is pretty cool too. I bought this game because I played a lot of MK as a kid and this game brought me back and it is basically a really cool fighting game that I would definitely recommend.

I remember i use to love playing this game as a child and i knew my kids would have a good time with this game. They love playing against each other and they like to watch the characters do the finishing moves. This was one of the best games i bought for the ps3.

This game is worth every penny!  The graphics are amazing and it is very entertaining. I bought this for my husband as one of his Christmas presents and now I can't get him away from the TV! I'm not a gamer and even I love this game.
summary: Totally worth it! The best of both worlds.

reviewText: I purchased this game for my daughter who is 11 years old and she says its the best game that she has ever had.  She loves it and wants to play it constantly. You must have great rhythm to play this game, I have tried and didn't do well at all.  For all you dancers and cheerleaders, this game is definitely for you!!!!!!

"This game is really fun, I bought it for my 11 and 6 year old daughters, and I have played it more than they have so far. My husband however is not about to test his manhood out on this game though!! In other words, this game is a "girly" game."

I bought this game for my 7 year old daughter who wants to be a Cheerleader for Christmas. She absolutely loves it. Our 13 year old loves it as well. It has great music and I can see why so many adults here that have reviewed this game buy it for themselves for a work out program. Definitely one of the better Wii games we have bought.

My daughters are eight years old and have been playing this game for 2 days now. They love it. It was easy for them to figure out the moves and the music is fun to listen to. They said it was their favorite Wii game so far. It's good exercise and I can even use it for workouts in the workout mode. No extra equipment is needed, just the basic Wii remotes.

Well it is safe to say that my fiance loves this game. We just got it today and he cracked it open and started playing right away. Fast shipping. It got here fast and it was a very reasonable price for a brand new game. I have no complaints at all. He is very happy with it.

This video game was ordered as a bundle created by my fiancee and myself. We are both huge fans of video games, and all of the games ordered on Amazon arrived on time and in brand new condition. We are very satisfied with the games, and continue to enjoy playing them even a year after their original purchase!

This game is a cool concept, I haven't really had the chance to play, but it looks pretty cool.  I have been playing MK since I was a teen.  Pretty soon I will give it a try.  I got it for my brother and he enjoys it.  Plus the Amazon price was amazing.  Thanks Amazon!

You can beat the game even without knowing about special movements. But if you are a really hardcore gamer you'll find a challenge to get all the trophies in this game.

It's also really fun to play it online.
summary: If you want a challenge, this one has it but it's still fun.

reviewText: I have grown up on Mortal Kombat. This is a great game to have some of the main characters of Mortal Kombat vs. DC. A fantastic edition to add to the realm of Mortal Kombat. I actually played the game and a friend's house and thought it would be great to add to my gaming collection.

I bought this game because I used to love Mortal Kombat when I was a kid. My son and I love this game. I really only play sport games but this game is good, lots of action. Fun for my son when he beats me! lol

Mortal Kombat vs DC Universe has met all my expectations of what a fighting game should be.

The characters for Mortal Kombat and DC are great: each with two fatalities and there's plethora of combos for each character.

I'm a huge DC fan and so far this is the best game out there; however, as a Mortal Kombat perspective, the fatalities are a bit watered down.

I highly recommend this game to anyone that has not experience a fighting game, or those who want to see the superheroes in action.
summary: THE BEST ALL AROUND FIGHTING GAME

reviewText: I was apprehensive when I first heard that MK8 would be a crossover game, but after playing it, I changed my mind. It's lots of fun alternating between the MK universe and playing in Gotham City, Metropolis, and other places. It's fun collecting trophies for your accomplishments. Story Mode is very fun as well, and I can't wait for the downloadable content. My only complaint is that I wish they could have included more than just 11 characters from each franchise.

wow i love this game so much. if you are trying to buy this for you kids, you should think about it twice, because of the language they use in it and violence and stuff. but if you are playing it yourself, i am sure you would love it

I bought this game for my grandson.  He had one but his brother ruined it.  He wanted another one so bad.  Amazon had the best price so I bought it.  He loves it and was excited about it.  I am glad I bought it.

I bought this game for my six year old for a Christmas present.  He likes it okay..., but is disappointed it's not the playstation 3 game.  I'm more than disappointed because the cost of the game greatly out weighs the quality of the game.  I now read video game reviews before I buy any games for my son.  I wish I had read all the ones regarding this game.  I would have never bought it.
summary: I now read reviews before I buy games

reviewText: I buy every Spider-Man game that comes out. And this game has the best web swinging, the best combat, and the best story out of every single one. The choices they offer are also a nice touch. I love how you can replay this entire game with all your upgrades. I am a HUGE Spidey fan and I can say without doubt this is the best Spidey game, ever. Anyone interested in this game might want to check out The Amazing Spider-Man game as well.

I wanted this game for a long time, and it didn't disappoint at all. I love playing this game I just can't put it down. Plus the story line is awesome. Its like playing GTA, but spidey because how he roams and the things you can do.

I found this game to be great.  This is one of my favorite Spidey games for the Wii at this point.  There are alternate story lines that you get to choose from by making good Spidey or dark Spidey choices.  I think that was awesome.  The story was top notch.  The only problem I found was that, for the Wii, it had some visual glitches.  It would have been great if it rendered faster.

This is a really great mouse for both gaming and doing other things on your computer. I have the Mac edition of the mouse and I'm using it on a MacBook Pro 2.4GHz computer. It works fine, I have no problems with any of the button functions. The menu to change its settings is easy to use and simple. I use it to play world of warcraft and its quick, responsive, and works every time. 5/5

This is what I have been waiting for.  A good Spider-Man game.  Glad it came out on the PS3.  Plus I need more games that I can play on the PS3 that are kid-friendly so that I don't have to shoo my boys away while I play....as long as the wifey isn't around that is...heheheheh.
summary: The way a Spider-Man game should be.

reviewText: i started playing this game at my boyfriend's moms house and now every time i go there, i have to play it. my son played it one time and now he loves it as well, so i had to buy it! it's such a fun game, and addicting!

This game is great fun...so much to do, and so hilarious!! Very easy to play, and quite addictive...I like the graphics, I like the sound, I love the characters and I love love love this game...great for kids or adults....and I recommend it highly!!!!!

I didn't know what to expect with this game.  It was pretty cheap and I wondered if it wouldn't be much fun.  Boy was I wrong!!  My husband and I have had a really good time playing this one.  It is addictive and very fun.  The way you have to use the Wii to cook different items is really ingenious!!  I recommend this one to everyone.

I love this game. It's easy to master and fun to play. I'm *ahem* older, so it's good to find a game that is fun, easy to learn, and engaging for both me  and my  children.  My  11 year old son won't admit it to his friends, but he LOVES  to play this game with his mom.

If you're one of those people who enjoyed Fable, this is the game for you. It has great dialogue, humor, and it's just amazingly entertaining. Your minions can get drunk and start peeing all over the place, you kidnap helpless townsfolk for your castle, you can kill hobbits (well, they're called halflings in the game, but same thing), and a bunch of other fun things. :D Get the game! You won't be disappointed!
summary: One of the best games I've played

reviewText: My son and brother like this game they play it as often as they can when they do not have other things to do. I play it as often as I can when I am not busy with housework . I think they like this game more than are you smarter than a fifth grader . My husband doesn't like it he prefers the quiz type games. The game was shipped fast and was received in great shape. If anyone likes the show then this is a game they should have in their house if they have a wii.

This is a great addition to your game collection, especially if you love the classic Final Fantasy Games, or if one of your favorite games is the original Final Fantasy IV for the snes (which was released in the US as Final Fantasy II).
summary: Great rendition of Final Fantasy IV

reviewText: I can't tell you how lucky I was to get this game for so cheap during Prime Day!! I was waiting and waiting for the price to go down and it finally did. I never played FF IV and being a fan of the franchise, I just had to get this game and play it!! Love the story and the game just looks absolutely amazing!!

A 3D version of my favorite Final Fantasy? Sign me up! One of the reasons I got a DS. Not a true "definitive" version like the PSP remake, but it feels like a whole new game. Like watching the Battlestar remake. You know the story, but it's all new at the same time. This is such a great game! Too bad they don't do all the older Final Fantasy games like this.

Final Fantasy IV is a great re-visit for fans of the series or anyone playing it for the first time. Hard to believe how far this series has come in the past 20 years! Then again, when you can go back, play the old ones, & still enjoy it... It's not so hard to believe after all.

Obviously, I'm not here to critique the game like other people, because I'd just write a letter to Square-Enix. Or something.

I can say that when they say it's like new, they mean it! The only hint of wear I found on the package was a slight bend in the manual. And that was it. Everything else is perfect, and it was delivered in a timely manner. I appreciate it.

MY DAUGHTER LOVE THIS GAME SO MUCH!!!!!
This is one of the best games my daughter has ever played on her DS. She can't put it down! Whenever she has any free time, the first thing she wants to do is to play this game. She would recommend it to anyone who loves to play games. According to her, you won't be able to put it down.

This is nothing more than an enhancement of a redo from a couple of years ago.  I thought that there was new elements, but they are so few and far in between that there really is none.  If you already have the previous version, save your money and buy a different game.  If you do not have it, then buy the earlier version, because there are too few save points in this game and if you are killed, you have to start from the start.

I don't know how much I can say about this, I mean it's a screwdriver.
It's exactly what you need to take apart an Xbox360 controller, and it did great for me for doing that.
