The packaging was a little ridiculous. Something that fits in the palm of my hand came in a box that my cat took a nap in. Of course, that has nothing to do with the product itself.
summary: Simple, does what it needs to do.

reviewText: Perfect fit for my XBox wireless controller. You don't have to buy a tool specifically designed for XBox components, but this was cheaper than anything else I've seen on the net and the quality is excellent. My only complaint is that I waited so long to order. Don't wait! Order it now! I'm impressed.

This game is very low quality and not very fun at all.  There are only 6 games and they are so boring.  I really can't imagine that anyone would like this game.  It is the worse game I have seen for the Wii and I am taking it back to the store now.  OMG it's just awful!

My son loves Ben 10 and thinks this game is lots of fun.  He is 5 years old.  I like that he can do it on his own.  I think it is one of his better Nintendo DS games, but that is also because he enjoys Ben 10 so much.  If you kid is a Ben 10 fan, and between 5 and 8 years of age, it is a good buy.

The gameplay is too repetitive and the fighting action is too simplistic in my opinion. Maybe I didn't give it enough time, but I've played through 6 hours of it, and I end up finding that mashing buttons is more effective than trying to perform anything strategic. I only bought this to try it out, and I wish I could return it. It'll be taking up shelf space for years to come.
summary: The gameplay is too repetitive and the fighting action is ...

reviewText: This is one of the best fighting games i have ever played. The fmv in this game is amazing. It looks even better than the anime. The controls are rather simple, and easy to get used to. The storyline is slightly off from the series, and some of the battles are a little different from what actually happened. But aside from these slight differences, the game is fantastic. You should definetly pick this one up.

This is a game for Naruto fans and the ones who follow the series. The game is based on the first part of the show. You will have a whole lot of fun playing the missions in story mode, it follows the anime. There are extra missions you can do and characters to unlock. If you have siblings or a friend who play multiplayer with, you'll find yourself having a lot of fun. The battle experience is different from most other fighting games, you'll find it to be very enjoyable and entertaining.

THIS IS THE BEST NARUTO GAME SO FAR, I HAVE PLAYED ALL THE VERSIONS AND THIS IS THE BEST, THE ONLY THING I DON'T LIKE OF THIS GAME IS THAT HAVE NOT ONLINE MODE, VERY SORRY ABOUT, BUT I THINK WILL HAVE IN THE NEXT NARUTO GAME.

The game is awesome, there is not a single thing bad about it IMO.

The delivery of the game is just a HORRIBLE experience, here i warn all of you buyers out there, DO NOT CHOOSE that stupid SUPERSAVER shipping thing.

It will take 2+ weeks for it to be delivered. And there will not be any tracking information. Customer service will not help you, they will just repeat the same thing over and over again on the phone.

GG amazon...
summary: PRO to everything about the game, CON to AMAZON

reviewText: I've been a fan of Naruto for years and I can say that this game doesn't disappoint me. The video and sound effects are incredible plus the game's story brings people back to the very beginning of Naruto, so for those who never know anything about Naruto, they will also easily get into the story. I can't wait to play the next version of Naruto's game which I hope should be the beginning of Shippuden series.

We love this game and spend a lot of time laughing over the avatar antics. My only complaint is the controllers don't work 100% of the time. We bought it used and it came without instructions so we are still trying to figure it out.
Other than that, the actual game is fun. We haven't gotten bored yet.

I bought this game for my 13 year old nephew and he loves it. I have played the game with him several times and it is very fun! There so many different categories of questions, so anyone can do well. The categories range from cartoons to 80's music to natural science and so many more. The game is set up in a way that even if you have the lowest amount of points, you can still win it all in the last round which makes it exciting for everyone!

I purchased this game so my husband and I would have a game we could play together.  This game is tons of fun.  We've played it several times and we love it.  It's a great game for family night.  We had a little trouble getting the controllers detected; but once they were we had a blast.

I love this game.  I was somewhat skeptical that it would be much fun, but it is a lot of fun to play with a group.  Not a lot of fun by yourself, but then again that's not what this game is for!  It's a party game.  The ability to play this online by yourself is a good option, but it still isn't as much fun as playing with a group of friends.  My friends and I are always looking for good party games & this one is it!  I just wish that the buzzers were available for purchase by themselves.

I bought this game because the mini-games looked fun. They are fun, and wandering around the park completing mini-missions are entertaining too. It's an easy game for kids to learn to play. It's rewarding for kids when they win prizes, but it's even fun for older people to try to win the big prizes. The only bad thing about this game is that you have to wait 10-15 seconds when you click on a game and wait for it to load, but that's not a reason to not buy the game.

I have had this game for 3 months and still love it! I wanted something to exercise with, other than my treadmill, and this game definitely provides a workout! I like that there are 4 levels of difficulty for each song, and you also are graded after each song, so it provides you with motivation to do better and better. I have no complaints about this game; it's great fun!

I was really looking forward to this game as a great exercise option.  After several attempts I can't seem to get it to register my moves.  The arrows come up and before I can do anything it tells me I missed.  There is something blocking the arrows as soon as they come up.  I keep trying to change something to correct this but nothing seems to work.  I can't find anything in the book to help.  So far I have no use for it other than frustration.  I really like the Wii Fit.

I didn't know what to expect when I purchased this game, but was definitely surprised how good it was.  The graphics are great and the cinematics is a nice touch.  The game is rather short, but it keeps you wanting to play to find out how the story unfolds.  A great game overall and would recommend this to anyone.

I loved this game when I was younger, and thanks to my uncle who got me a gift card to Amazon, I was able to reunite with my favorite game. Delivery was fast, thank goodness. I was dying to get my hands on it! Once I did, Installation was fast and easy. Does not slow my computer down a bit. I love it! (:

Great deal for the price. Two guitars fit in the case and the stand is well built and sturdy. The guitar strap is better than the one I got with the Beatles Rock Band Lennon guitar so i didn't have to run out and buy a different one. Great deal for the price.

I agree with all the other five-star reviews -- this bag is really nice, especially considering the price.  It would be worth $14 even without the guitar stand and strap.  My only complaint, and this is a minor one, is that the bag is slightly too large for the Rock Band guitars, so it's not a snug fit.  But the bag is well padded, and the two pockets are very useful.  If you travel at all with your Rock Band or Guitar Hero guitars, definitely get this bag.

This is a very good game, especially playing with a friend in co-op mode. If you have the patience to install the game, install steam, create a Windows live account (it's easy) then you will enjoy this game. You won't need to bother with anything else except playing the game.

I like the protection and the fit it provides.  I'm skeptical about the handles.  I don't feel comfortable carrying the board by the handles.  It doesn't provide enough room for the legs of the board.  You have to take them off in order for it to fit in the sleeve.  It would have been nice to have a pocket placed on the outside to put the legs in.  The sleeve is okay for storage at home.  I love the game!

We ran over the cord to our original Wii Sensor Bar with the vacuum, so we needed a replacement.  I was a little worried to order this because it wasn't the official Nintendo brand.  However, for the price, I figured it was worth it to take the risk.  I'm glad I did!  This works perfectly.  It plugs perfectly into the Wii, and the Wiimotes work flawlessly with it.  I am very glad I ordered this.  If we accidentally vacuum this one up too, I'll order this one again!

Had to buy this to replace original sensor bar and must say this one works just as good as the original. Couldn't believe how cheap it was and was initially leary on buying it due to the low price but after reading the reviews decided to go for it and boy am I glad I did. I would definitely not hesitate buying another if I need to. Buy this and you'll be happy too!

I bought this product as a replacement for the original sensor bar that got sucked up by the vacuum. I believe it works every bit as well as the original. The reviews I read said that the sensor range is a little smaller, but I honestly have not noticed a difference. If you are looking for a wired replacement, I definitely suggest getting this one! I sure beats spending a small fortune on batteries for the wireless sensors.

This product came on time and was easy to set up. I had read other reviews that said they had to calibrate it to work with their remotes correctly but in my case I believe this one actually worked better then the first one without having to do anything to it at all. Now all I have to do is make sure I don't cut the cord on this one...lol.

I was somewhat worried about this, since it isn't a Nintendo brand item. I thought it might not work as good, since the price is extremely low. It has worked perfectly since the day I bought it, and is still working just as good now. It serves its purpose as good as anything else could, and costs the least. This makes it a 5/5 product.
summary: Works well, and the price is right!

reviewText: This is one of those products that is worth every penny that you pay, probably more. I wasn't sure that it would work when I bought it, but everything turned out great. Should have bought two, just in case I need one in the future.

I got this for my niece who just turned 6. I bought it because other reviewers noted that you do not need to read to play the game, plus my niece is very into anything "Barbie". So far she really likes it. She found it a little complicated at first, but is starting to get the hang of it (she still needs help at the end putting on the fashion show). With more practice she should soon be able to do it all herself. Her favorite part is decorating the clothes, and there is a variety of ways to do it!

My 9 year old absolutely LOVES this game.  It is very fun and entertaining if you like to design clothes.  Very easy to control and navigate.  Very happy with this game and would recommend it to anyone.
summary: SUPER FUN FOR YOUR LITTLE FASHION DESIGNER

reviewText: The only reason I put 1 star because I haven't played the game yet but I could have gotten this game at Walmart about 5 or 6 years ago in a 3 pack for $10.00 I was going to get it but I didn't have any money on me.

This game review was written by: Rose McCutcheon's grandson

This game is hard, but fun. It is a little bit hard, but I like it. The guns are decent, and some of the animals are hard to kill.

Pros: Great weapons; variety of animals

Cons: Harder to kill animals; Can't see where the animal(s) is after it attacks you

This was our first Harvest Moon game. It is a lot of fun for my girls to play. We have a 9 year old and 6 year old who love it - and can play independently. Our 4 year old loves to watch but she cannot read yet so cannot play on her own. They love the missions and completing tasks.
summary: Fun for younger Wii players too...

reviewText: This is a great game! Bought it for my little brother but I enjoy it too. I like how theres a lot to do, like getting married, figuring out the puzzle, and having kids. I haven't passed it yet, but I will once I get a break from work and school. I recommend this game and hope you buy it because it's worth it.

It was exactly what I was looking for and I was very happy to be able to get it so quickly. My 19 yr old son had a tonsillectomy and a septoplasty done together. He was miserable for a week and this was a nice diversion from his pain. Yeah, it's old school, but when your in pain it's nice to just sit back and relax with a familiar old book, or in this case, game.

I have been wanting this game for a while, not just for myself but for my kids. So when i finally decided to order it, i was nervous. Mainly because i knew i couldn't find a new copy, and wasn't sure if a used copy would work well enough. It does. It was delivered on time, and it works perfectly.  My kids and i are really enjoying the game.

This game has taken hours and days to play.  Once you start it is addicting and you will need to tell yourself that it is time to go to bed.  There are so many details in the game, so many steps to take, so many things you can do....it seems the game can be played for years.

My wife, kids and I have all played and at times fight for "whose turn it is".

A little hard to figure out at first, but once you get the hang of it you'll be playing it for long periods at a time.  Compared to the other harvest moon games this one was alot easier to understand for me.  The plot makes sense to the game and it is guided along as you go.

I don't like using the word stupid to describe this game, but honestly, it kind of is. The game doesn't test you on any skill; I feel like most of it's luck. I got it out of the library, and it was pretty much a waste of time. It was really boring and pointless.

This game is a straight waste of money. After playing Wii sports I was hopeful that this game would be as fun. I was WRONG. I played it for about 10 minutes before I decided to turn it off and will sell this on ebay. What a waste of money.
summary: This game is one of the worst I have ever played on any console

reviewText: Awesome game... I so wish they would make more! I have been a fan of Spyro since the beginning, and this game did not disappoint. I found it very challenging, but not too challenging to be enjoyable. I guess I'll just keep replaying it until I've had enough or they come out with a new one. Spyro and Rayman are my favorite games of all time... I wish I could find others I enjoyed as much.
summary: Awesome game... wish they would make more!

reviewText: Probably one of the worst games I've ever played.  The controls are horrible, and the camera is out-of-control bad.  I played the original Spyro and Spyro 2 for PS1, and couldn't wait to play this one.  Found it for 16.98 on this site and ordered immediately.  Turns out I would have rather burned that money than buy this game.

i like this game a lot. it was one of the only games i ever played a while back. i had this game before, but i was never able to finish it (it was stolen). that upsetted me a lot
so i bought a new one, and finished it within 4 hours :) i had a lot of fun playing it too, and it wasn't expensive at all. im going to keep replaying it until i have exactly 100% done.

This game was never meant to be a follow up of the previous PS1 series. It is its own series with a different story line. I personally had fun with this series and this is coming from a guy who played the original PS1 series. Gameplay, story and graphics are good.
summary: Don't know what all the hate is about.

reviewText: This is a game about a fish that has to find his grandmothers' kelp treasure. First of all, it is only for one player, so not very much fun to have others watch you. Second, it is very very very very simple. My 5 year old played it for about 10 minutes, and then asked me if "Mom, does this game do anything else?" I tried for a little bit, and then agreed, it was pretty boring. I didn't see much educational value in it at all.

I've played Spyro games from the beginning and have always loved them. I was excited to try this for the Wii, but after an hour of game play I finally just gave up. The controls are not at all intuitive, and instead of exploring and solving puzzles I am just fighting enemy after enemy. I love my Wii, and I do love Spyro, but this might not be the best combination.

my 13 yr old son saw this game on you tube and asked me if I would find it. I did see that there was a good number of negative reviews but my son really wanted it. So I went ahead and got it since he would be the one playing it anyway. HE loves the game and has a friend who has also purchased the game after seeing my son play it. So I say give it a try.
summary: I did see that there was a good number of negative reviews but my son really wanted ...

reviewText: Downloaded the game and was hoping to play. Unfortunately, you have to then install a separate software or something by creating an account at steampowered. I have spent the better part of two hours trying to get an account, with no luck.

I've never played a Total War game before, but after some research, this seemed like a good place to start. The battles are huge, and epic, and feel so awesome. In my opinion, the campaign's lacking, but I don't play it for the campaign! You can play against AI or other people, but either way is so much fun, and once you get used to everything, can be very addicting! It has minor issues, but  there's an awesome mod called the "DarthMod" that will fix most of the major issues. Enjoy!

At first I purchased a used copy and it turned out that I couldn't install the game. I contacted the seller and he replied in a matter of minutes. The issue was resolved in a matter of days and now I'm able to enjoy what I had paid for.
summary: The game is very fun, especially the sea battles.

reviewText: This product does not work and Amazon has a firm policy of not giving refunds. They would not give me a refund and I lost $14.92 for nothing. The download does not work, and you will not be issued a refund of any kind. Thank you for reading my review.

This game is everything you'd expect out of the Total War series.  It is addicting and challenging.  You will never have the same outcome even if you set up the battle the exact same way.  Great to play but does require a lot of time for the campaign.  Overall a great buy for the average person who likes a good video game.

I love this game. Unfortunitly you buy this game used and they have already used the steam code. It won't work because steam only allows one person to use that code and if that person creates a new account then that code cant be used again. But don't get me wrong. I have played this game for a long time and it was really fun. If you are going to buy it please don't waist your money on the used version buy the new version.
summary: Great Game don't buy it used!

reviewText: This game is a great addition to the Total War franchise. I loved it, and played it for hundreds of hours. Replay value is high, battles are better, AI is better, and naval battles add a huge amount of fun. If you're into grand strategy and still like to play the tactical battles, this is your game.
summary: I played it for hundreds of hours

reviewText: If you can get the game to work on Steam, it is totally worth buying.  I had to reinstall the game a few times and make sure that automatic update was turned on (for some reason it wasn't, even though all my other games were) but once it started working, it was awesome!  As far as game play is concerned, it is just as fun as the previous titles.  I highly recommend it!

reviewerName: The man with the master plan
reviewText: This is stupid. My game doesnt even work. First, i have to get steam to work. Fine. Now the game gets to a certain point and i have a white screen. I literally had to uninstall and install it again. It still doesnt work. I wish i could give this game no stars but i cant. DONT BUY IT. stay away from this game. I buy all the empire games but this one is a disaster.
summary: Worst Game ever. Completely buggy... I WANT MY MONEY BACK

reviewText:
This is a great game! Below is what I think about the different sections of it.
Characters: *** I think that they could have made them all more mysterious. There were plenty of characters though.
Graphics: ***** They were excellent graphics.
Length: ***** Not too long, not too short
Storyline: ****  The story line is very mysterious and indulging.
Exploring: ***** There was so much to explore!
Overall rating: *****
Really good game. I love it!

I loved this game because it wasn't overly challenging like a few of the others in the series, but it wasn't too easy either. It also had many humerous sections in the game which made it more entertaining.

If you are a Nancy Drew fan this is a great game to add to your collection.  Again you play as Nancy Drew to help solve a mystery.  Although this isn't my favorite Nancy Drew game, it comes a close 3rd best in my opinion.  The only thing different about this game is you can't call home for clues like all the previous games.

True, this game is really outdated. But there is something to be said about your memories of this game from when you were a child. It somehow is more fun on a computer CD, but it's a good game to keep around the house if you're ever having a bad time with adult problems and feel like being a kid again, and remember this game.

I don't think its too easy, but still, the younger the age, the more fun it will be.

Product was in good condition, delivered quickly. I bought this product for my grandson. He loves the Bookworm Adventure game and plays it every time he comes for a visit. The game teaches children how to spell and how to make decisions. A good, and a fun game.
summary: The product is in good condition...

reviewText: It's nice to be able to purchase parts for the Wii without having to pay the crazy prices that Nintendo charges.  My Wii still has a lot of life in it, and with parts like this, it'll last a lot longer.
summary: It's nice to be able to purchase parts for the Wii ...

reviewText:
The item arrived on time and it's really worth the money that I paid for.
Bought another one for a friend that cost twice as much and can't see any difference.
Definitely worth the money. Product works fine.

Though the wii motion sensor arrived in perfect working order, I was very displeased with the packaging. It came in a folder with a very thin layer of bubble wrap on the inside, without so much as an additional layer of tissue paper to keep it protected. These sensors are very delicate, and will break or become disfunctional very easily. If I'd known they were going to package it so carelessly, I would have taken my business somewhere else.

This product just does not work adequately.  The main problem is that the pointer on the TV screen jumps around continuously, even when holding the Wii remote still.  Furthermore, to center the pointer in the middle of the TV screen, the Wii remote must be pointed far to the right, away from the TV screen.  This product is pretty useless.

Once again we received our order very fast...within a few days.  This was purchased as a gift for our son.  He did not want a wireless sensor bar due to having to replace batteries all the time, so we found this wired bar.  We searched high and low in stores in our area with no luck.  Did a search and within a few minutes we found it here.  There isn't much to say on the product itself.  It works and does its job as expected.  As for the service, it was excellent and we are very pleased.

This disc has 20 or so songs on it that are not on any of the other disc . With the Wii the only thing is, is that you have to change the disc each time you want to play the different songs. I haven't tried it after playing rockband 2 yet so I don't know if it saves them on there or not. I know that after playing rockband special edition you have to change the disc for track pack 1 and 2 when you want to play them. Good songs though.

This game is fun. The only reason I resold it was that I didn't know or like all the songs on it. I'm a middle aged mother, so I wasn't totally up on all the songs, especially since my sons don't live with me any more. I'm sure this game would be great for teens and young 20's.

At the time that I got these, my daughter was big into Star Wars. She had watched the movies so many times she could tell you anything you wanted to know about Star Wars. She went nuts when she saw these listed here on Amazon. They are just a fun thing for a Star Wars fan to have.
summary: The Lightsaber Stylus is a hit!

reviewText: I got this for my son who is a major anything Star Wars fan and he loves them. He uses them all the time and I have to remind him to turn them off when he is done because they do light up! Perfect for any kid that is a DS and Star Wars fan.

I've always been a fan of Fight Night - Round 4, so I purchased it for a second time for the PS3.  I already had it on the Xbox 360 and did competitive play online and enjoyed it quite a bit.  I would recommend this game to a boxing fan or a general competitive sports fan, such as a martial artist.

I love this game.  The ability to share and download boxers is a big improvement from FNR3.  Plus, the career mode is a little easier in this game that it was in FNR3.  One drawback is fighting with the analog sticks is a little quirkier than FNR3.  Other than that, its a good game.  I highly recommend it.

With an open world gameplay how can you go wrong?  This game is awesome.  More vehicles, better crashes, and better graphics propel this game to the top of my list.  It is so much fun to play on your PC.  The bikes are included as well as all the updates.  This game is a winner.

excellent game I highly recommend it. is very interesting and entertaining story 100%. great picture quality. excellent game I highly recommend it. is very interesting and entertaining story 100%. great picture quality. hd ps3 best.

I love this game. What more could one say? The graphics are great, the story line is great, fine cars to race around in, plenty of weapons to do justice with. If you enjoy the single person shooter you will love this game.

I enjoyed this playing this game and just couldn't seem to get enough. I have since replayed it twice.  The soundtrack is great - very indicative of the time period the game is set in.  The game play and story line is great.
summary: Great game - replayed it several times

reviewText: As an action game or a third person shooter, I loved this game.  Great story and action.  If you are expecting an open world sandbox game like GTA, you won't get it.  This is a story driven action game that happens to be set in an open world.

This game contains the VIRUS that is SecuROM. Once installed it can NOT be removed by the user and requires that you either download and run the SecuROM virus removal utility or completely reformat your hard drive and reinstall your entire operating system.

Is this game worth it? It's up to you to decide.
summary: Virus included with purchase of game

reviewText:
This game is really a great game, and for the price, you can't go wrong.
I haven't noticed any issues with the so-called "anti-theft software" that EA installs with the game yet. Not sure if that's just me, or what.
I'd definitely suggest that you pick up this game, especially for the price.
It has a great storyline, and has definitely made a big footprint on the survival horror genre.

So, what are you waiting for? Buy it now!

This is a great game that keeps you on your toes.  If you like horror, suspense and action, this game has it.  Science fiction and non-traditional undead creatures with a compelling back story make this an enjoyable game.  I definitely recommend this game for anyone who likes survival horror games.  However I should note that it is rather visceral, so definitely not for little kids unless you want to serious traumatize them into a fear-induced coma.  I'm not kidding.
summary: Nobody can hear you scream in space

reviewText: This game is a total waste of time and money. I like to use the keyboard arrows to move the character, but the game would not let me re-assign the movement keys. Movement is choppy. There is no training level.  No way to save the game at your discretion. This game is awful. Do not waste your money on this.

Can you believe this game won't let you remap movement keys? I've been a PC gamer for 20+ years, and this is the first game I recall that won't allow changing movement keys. If you're not used to the W-A-S-D movement scheme, do not buy. I've tried to get used to it for several days now, but I'm unable to adapt.

I didn't care for the 3rd-person POV either, but perhaps I was biased because I felt disadvantaged from the beginning.

I've played the Xbox 360 version of this game when it first came out. On the Xbox 360 it is one of my favorite games of all time. On the PC it is one of my least favorite games of all time.

The graphics seem to be worse and the controls make them almost playable (for me anyways).

If you really want to play this game I would suggest getting it on the Xbox 360 or PS3 instead. Stay away from the PC version!

I was wondering why it was so cheap...

This is an awesome game. [...]

I, however, HAVE played the game. It is one of the most amazing games I have ever played in my entire life. Scary and immmersive doesn't even begin to describe it!

So, if you're interested in the game but are having second thoughts because of all these [...], don't listen to them. BUY THIS GAME.
summary: Sad to see all these immature reviews...

reviewText: The last hockey game I bought for the PS2 was in 2001. Ever since I bought NHL 09, I have been playing mostly that game then any other. I play hockey, so when I am not on the ice, I am playing the game just to enjoy the great sport of hockey. Great Game. I give you 5 stars for a great reason, because hockey is an excellent sport to play.

Well it's not a lie, but it's more of a bait-and-switch kind of thing. The box says it has 2000 puzzles which makes you think you're getting a whole range of puzzles -- actually it has only 4 puzzle types. I played through the whole thing in maybe 3 hours and it was only mildly entertaining.

There are lots of great puzzle games out there - this is not one of them.

I may not really understand the object or point to this game but I recieved this game this morning with my new Nintendo DS and have been playing it non-stop and I am so addicted!!! I can't wait to buy more games like this!

This is a great casual game to play when you don't want to get really deep into something.  It's really easy to unlock all the levels and can be played by pretty much anyone.  I love Slingo and would recommend this game.

Although I love to play S2, I did not find IKEA home stuff all that exciting. I am glad that I was able to get it at half price rather than paying full price because I would be very ticked off. I expected there to be a lot more of a variety of things for all the rooms of the house. Even with some of the furniture there was not a big variety of colors or a real assortment like you would find if you were actually shopping at IKEA.

Feeding Frenzy 2 is a game of fast action and reflexes. As with most newer PopCap games, the production value is superb and there's plenty of gameplay to keep you busy for a while. Definitely a good buy at $9.99.

The game is played thusly: you start as a small fish and keep eating smaller fish; when you eat enough fish, then you grow into a bigger fish. You have to avoid the bigger fish that will eat you! There is an alien intruder fish, too. And when you beat the game you can become the alien intruder. My granddaughter, 10 years old, loves this game!

I have a set that is almost 10 years old, only one earpiece works from my abuse and it is held together with duct tape, but the battery, sound quality, and normal function (of that one earpiece) still amazingly work great.  I ordered this as a replacement, but I haven't made the switch to the new one yet.  BTW, this is one of the lightest and most comfortable headsets I have ever worn.

I own the original Viva Pinata so I wasn't sure that I would find this one any more enjoyable than the previous one. I was pleasantly shocked that some of the things I found slightly annoying in the previous game had been fixed, and the addition of new pinatas was also nice.

I now own 4 copies of this fun, addictive game. I play this game for hours. I love it more than the PC or Xbox version. I don't know why I love it so much, I just do. Came in perfect condition and plays fine on my DS.
summary: Didn't realize this was from the UK

reviewText: I had to buy 2 of these games so that both my 9 year old and 6 year old had their own. They love this game and it's the only DS game they are playing right now. I'm glad i purchased 2 of them so that they don't fight over it. My 11 year old also likes to play this game when the other 2 let her :)

Both my daughters and I loved playing Viva Pinata on the Xbox 360. I got this game for my younger daughter who was 7 and it was a bit too dificult for her to play alone. My older daughter really enjoyed it and was able to figure the game out without help. They haven't played this game as much as their other DS games like Harvest Moon or Cooking Mama but they seem to really enjoy it.

Got this game for my 7 year old for Christmas and he loves it.  He played it non stop for a couple of hours and is now his favorite game.  My older kids have also played it and enjoyed it, so there is fun to be had for all ages...not just for 7 year olds.  I'd say it's a must for all Spongebob fans who are also DS owners, especially those who are also fans of Doodlebob.
summary: Awesomely fun time playing this game!

reviewText: My grandson asked for this game for Christmas and he was thrilled when he opened the package.  This is a fun game and allows the kids to be creative as well when playing it.  I recommend it for any kid who is a Spongebob fan.  My grandson said it was "awesome"!
summary: This is a must have for Spongebob fans!

reviewText: This was a gift for our daughter. She loved it when she first got it, but I have to admit that she rarely plays it now. She prefers other titles that offer more variety of activities and more challenge.

My granddaughter was very excited to get this game. The levels were fun and she enjoyed it while it lasted.  Unfortunately, she completed the entire game in less than an hour. If I had known it was that quick, I would have rented it locally for a couple of bucks instead of spending 20 on it. We were both disappointed.

I bought this for my 5 year old daughter and she loves the game. There is some reading which I help her with, but overall she knows how to play the game and enjoys it.

Amazon.com has it listed at a good price too.

We've tried playing a few times with the kids, who are huge Avatar fans. We just can't seem to get the controls for "bending" right, no matter how many times we've tried. The kids are frustrated into tears, and I am just annoyed. They've declared it "no good" and won't play anymore. I pick it up every now and then and try to figure out what I've been missing - I can't seem to get it.

[...]
summary: Can't seem to figure out how to control it

reviewText: My 6 year old loves this game. You can get new pets, name them and take care of them as well as play mini games. I have a hard time finding Wii games for my little girl that aren't too hard and something that will keep her interest. She isn't even very into LPS, but she really does enjoy this game.

I absolutely adore this game. I have a 5-year-old daughter and this game has kept her busy for hours, and it's a game that is easy for her to play and there is plenty for her to do with it. It's so cute that I even enjoy playing it (I'm 28). If they made another game like this with new pets and new locations to explore, I would buy it in a heartbeat. Great game.

I've been a fan of the sims since the very first one. When it came to the wii I was elated. Although this game differs from the usual sims style, it is still tons of fun to play. I agree with the other reviewers as far as loading goes, huge improvement.

My 6-year old daughter received this game when she was five. She still enjoys playing it!  She recently received Littlest Pet Shop Friends, which she finished very quickly.  I would recommend this game over Littlest Pet Shop Friends. Both games are very cute and fun, but the newer game seems shorter.

My 7 year old daughter plays this for hours on end.  The games are varied enough to hold her interest and have varying skill levels.  Some of them require a lot of movement, so she's not just sitting on the couch.  I feel better about that.  I've even jumped in on a couple games and enjoyed myself. Most games give good instructions on what to do.

This game provides hours of entertainment for those who like role-playing, simulation type games. I am a 23 year old female and played this with my 12 year old male cousin. I probably enjoyed it more than he did. It's simple and not difficult. There is an end-point and the game is definitely short. Expect to play it a couple days (for hours on end), finish it, then never touch it again. It's not the type of game you can play over and over.

The game is so much fun. And I received it timely, and in great condition. I recommend this game to any sim fan because it's just as quirky as any of them and just as fun. I love this game because of the buildings that you get to make - that's always been my favorite part of sims. So if you like building things and cute little characters, this game is for you!

When I got this game I thought looking at it, it was going to be really easy and would zip through it. Not the case at all. You really have to think when connecting cords. Some of the tasks are pretty straight forward, other not so much. Overall, really fun game. I liked it so much, I went so far as to buy two more games to the series.

I have 4 kids- ages 11, 9, 7, and 4 and they all play this game.  The 3 older kids get more out of it, and they love it.  It appears to be very easy for them to play, and they really like it.  It was totally worth the price I paid!

I got a Nintendo DS from my sister and I was so excited to get this game because I love the Sims franchise.
This game was a total let down. I spent a good two days playing it hoping it'll get better. It doesn't.
summary: ... was so excited to get this game because I love the Sims franchise

reviewText: I bought this for my six year old and I play with it more than she does!  I just love being able to play this game and I don't want to put it down!  This is very highly recommended for anyone who loves LPS!

We purchased this game for our 8-year-old daughter for Christmas, and three days later she is still having a hard time putting it down. In her words, it is "so totally awesome!"

We were concerned that it would be too much like the VIP online game offered by Littlest Pet Shop, but this game is, according to both girls who have played it, much better.

This was purchased as a gift for a 4 year old.  she loves it and can use it well.  There are a lot of fun things to do with this game.  Select pets, buy gear, collect coins to buy more stuff.  It's fun, fun fun.

My 10 year old daughter got this for Christmas and absolutely loves it! She had the game on Wii when she was a little bit younger and really loved it as well. She says this version of the game has a few different features that set it apart from the Wii version to make it interesting. I would recommend this game for 8-12 year olds.

My 7 year old daughter received this for Christmas yesterday, and this seems to be by far her favorite gift.  She's been playing it for what seems like non-stop since she got it.  She's a big fan of Littlest Pet Shop anyway, and combine that with a fun Nintendo DS game, and it's definitely a winner for my daughter.  This is also a game she can play easily alone, where some games are frustrating for her.  Of everything she received for Christmas, I think this game has gotten the most attention from her!

I bought this game thinking it would be like Nancy drew PC games, but in fact its not. Its more of an I-Spy. It has different people and you either talk to them or they'll ask you to find things hidden in the level. Once you find all the things, you go to the next level but there's a catch. There's no way to save the game, so if your almost done finding everything, and you shut it off. The game will reset to the beginning of the level. Its a real pain in the neck. It doesn't even follow the book.

I wouldn't recommend this game at all. Not only is it super-short (I finished it in less than an hour), but it also isn't that exciting. All you do is collect items, and there are only three levels, not counting the short ending. Even replaying the levels are boring. I was really disappointed!

I just bought this game last night. I think I beat it in under two hours. I love the PC games, but this was really disappointing. It was pretty boring and there was none of the fun that the other games have. I wish I had read everyone's reviews before I bought it. Save your money. Get a different game.

Both my Aunt & I have played this game and we both LOVE it!

It not only ties in nicely with the book by the same title, but each time you start the game it hides different items in different hiding places.

I have read all the Nancy Drew and the Clue Crew books and am just starting on the older version of Nancy Drew books.

This game is AWESOME!!

This game is so much fun. My kids and husband enjoy it. Battleship is complicated but the rest of the games are very easy to understand and play. Would recommend this to anyone who likes these board games!

I bought this game for our whole family to play at get-togethers. It was SOOOOO BORING!! Not fun at all! I would not recommend this for adults. Maybe kids would like it and enjoy playing, but for someone 10 and up, I doubt it. I lost a lot of money on this game trying to sell it to the game store. Well, I had Family Game Night 2, I'm pretty sure they're about the same.

The only thing I can say about this game is, if you like metal slug, your going to like this game, its classic metal slug and its portable, I have played this game and I played metal slug X on my friends PSP and it looks like they are the same game, just with different names. I would recommend if you have a DS and like metal slug or if you like shoot em ups in general, its worth the purchase.

To put it simply - if you like beating people up in your videogames and can handle a Mature rating then this game is for you. It's an excellent game with an amazing soundtrack, and it's a Wii game that's not to be missed.

This is a fantastic game from start to finish.  The controls are fun, the graphics are very stylized, and even the story is surprisingly interesting for a beat-em up.  I definitely recommend this one for anyone looking for a fresh, unique experience on the Wii (though the rating is definitely accurate.  This one isn't for the kids.).

Don't play a lot of Final Fantasy. This from a friend and I loved it so much that I put about 200 hours into it. I've played this game over and over again because it's just so amazing . I wish they would make more like this . Meaning it's just too good.

I hate this game, but it wasn't for me.  It was a present for my sister and she absolutely loved the game, I loved the price so I guess you could say it was a great buy all around.  I have yet to have any issues with anything being broken or late.

This is the best game I have ever played. I finished it last night and I loved it.
  I play a lot of final fantasy games and this one is the best. It has a great story line, it's challenging, the music and graphics are great, and its super fun.
  Sometimes its a little slow but it's still very awesome.

I had difficulty starting up, it takes quite a bit of effort to get through the early missions with almost no equipment and no skills.

But at a certain point, you've crossed a power threshold, and the game just takes off and it's a lot more fun.
summary: Starts a little slow but takes off

reviewText: I admit that I mostly ordered this just because I adore the color pink.  However, by using it I have found other reasons to love it.  First, it covers up the crevice in the board to give it a flat surface that is easier to clean.  Second, it blocks scuff marks that were being left by my bedroom slippers.  Scuff marks aren't an issue with the skin in place.  Third, the price is great.  My local Best Buy sells a very similar product for about $20.

I purchased this product for my daughter and she loves it.  It was delivered on time and in perfect condition.  I like how it fits on the Wii Fit Board, with the nubs and the holes for the legs.  The feel of this when using the board is nice. The design of this pad helps when using the Board.  I would highly recommend this to anyone who uses their Wii Fit Board at all.

This wii fit board cover looks and feels exactly how I expected it to from the pictures and description/reviews.  I am more than happy with my purchase.  It was a great buy at a great price, and I highly recommend it.  It also shipped in good time.

I had been looking for a pink Wii cover for a long time, but I just couldn't justify spending twenty to thirty dollars on a piece of plastic. Then, I went to amazon (I should have looked here sooner) I found this awesome cover at a great price. The cover fits my Wii perfectly and I love the color. Side note: it does tend to attract a lot of pet hair, but is easily removed with a lint brush. Great product for a great price.

It gives the Wii Fit Board the grip I think it needs.  It was easy to install, and appears to be just the right thickness for good grip and durability.  Green was not my first choice of colors, but was the only color available.  Now that I have it on, I can't think of a better color.

A demo version of this came with my computer, and after a couple of days, I knew I had to buy it.  Play it with a combination of skill, foresight, and patience, and don't let it frustrate you.  You will be rewarded with more challenging levels.  It's great brain exercise, and the graphics are very good.

I've played JQ 1 & 2 and JQ Solitaire 1 on my computer and cell phone. I am addicted! I haven't played JQ Solitaire 2 yet, but if the first version is anything to go by, it will be fun and challenging.

My husband and I purchased this as a Christmas gift for our six year old son...he has become a football fanatic and at first I thought this game would be too advance for him but it has a rookie mode which will teach him how to play...although he plays on the ps2 all the time, I think he would much rather have this especially when we are on the road...He will love this game and will have fun with it as much as we allow him to play it..

Bought for my granddaughter and she loves it. She had played the earlier version at our house and really enjoyed it so we bought this for her for Christmas. She would play it every day (and probably all day) if her parents would let her. It also gives her some ideas for new dishes to make since she loves to cook.

We had such high hopes for this game as we LOVE the DS version.  My kids & I tried it as soon as we got it and we found it so hard to play.  It's a very frustrating game & we gave up on it after a few times.  Really wish we would have gotten another game instead.

Absolutely amazing game. Instant classic. If you like shooters with a great story, then you have to get into the Gears of War franchise. It'll be like nothing you've ever played before. The characters are unforgettable, the action is heart pounding, and the story is heart breaking.
summary: Gears goes for the golden stars...

reviewText: I have to be honest and say that I was very afraid of buying something used but it turned out to be a very good product so thank you very much. I highly recommend the sellers who sent me the video game.

This is my favorite console for video games because when I play the games it takes me back to when life was much simpler and I did not have the world on my shoulders. A must have for anyone is a fan of old school games.
summary: TG16, way ahead of it's time

reviewText: Garbage.  Tried for an hour to get it to work.  Installed all the drivers that came with it on the disc but could not get the controller to work.  When I pressed the analog button on my PS2 controller it did light up red, but that's all that I could get it to do.  Save your money.  This is trash!!

I bought this to see if it would work with my laptop and PS2 controller. After screwing with it for a bit in ePSXe, I figured out how to configure it and was able to play without issue (except using the directional pad can yield some wonky walking-in-a-diagonal-line results, but I use the directional joystick, so that's not really a problem for me). I was sad to find my copy of MediEvil wouldn't play on my PS2 but now I'm very happy that I can play it on my computer!

The package included a mini-cd for the drivers, but I did not use it since I do not care about rumble support.  Works with PS3 and PC (no need for drivers on Windows 7 64bit).  The only weird thing is that the player 1 and player 2 ports seem to have been switched.  Also, I have 2 of these products and I cannot use them both at the same time on the same PC.  I tried to get 4 player action, but it was a no go.  So, if you only need 2 players on ps2 controllers then this is the perfect product.

I purchased this, as a christmas gift for my boyfriend, and we were both very disappointed with what we received. The guitar was covered in stickers, and had two exploded batteries in it. There's battery acid all over the back of the guitar. The drum set is broken and melted with wires hanging out. And to top it all off, the actually game wasn't even included in the package! Like I said in the title, worst purchase ever. Wouldn't recommend for anyone to buy this.

I'm in my late 20s and I love this game. I thought I had outgrown all video games or at least I liked to think I had, but with the wide range of songs on GH WT it appeals to a wide range of people. You can't go wrong with this if you are at all into rock music!
summary: Its fun even for us older kids

reviewText: This is a great game for any age group, as long as you don't already play the guitar.  Playing Guitar Hero is nothing like playing a guitar, but if you're like me - a non guitar player - you'll enjoy faking it by rocking to your favorite music and even to some catchy tunes you've never heard of before. This game keeps your mind sharp with each challenge, and it's a great way to get the family together to compete against one another or play in the same band.

I got this set for my kids for x-mas. Making a long story short, they haven't being able to play it, since. I play it almost every night after coming back from a long day at work. It is fun, even if you are not a musician. Very fun and highly recommended!

I bought this so I could have something to do on weekends... and now I'm playing every weekend since the past 3 months. The game is so addictive with songs that everyone knows! I would not hesitate to buy this game.
summary: Definitely worth your time and money!

reviewText: The music in this game is the best.  I have Guitar Hero 5 and that music is okay if you like a lot of rock.  But World Tour has a better variety of music and more of what I like to hear and play.  At least I know most of the songs on this game.

Guitar Hero World Tour is a great game. I would highly recommend this game to anyone who would like to rock out. I love all the songs there are like 50 songs to play. You can rock out in Mii mode or even make up your very own song. If you are a guitar hero you have to get this game!!!

This set is a lot of fun for the whole family. You do have to make sure you have 3 separate Wii remotes if you want to be able to use the drums, guitar and microphone at the same time, though. As a bonus, this set works great with The Beatles Rock Band as well.

My wife got me the full band kit for me for my birthday.  We played it all day and part of the night.  It's the most fun I've had in a very long time.  What an absolute blast.  I was originally thinking of just getting the guitar kit version, but now that we have the full band set, it was definitely worth the extra $$.

I have only good things to say about this purchase.  The package arrived on time as promised and most importantly, with all parts in working order.  We were able to set it up and start playing immediately.  It's great family fun!  The only thing I would warn users about is the drum pedal cord.  For some reason the protective cover of the wire starts breaking and peeling off, so I was forced to wrap it with duct tape.  Other than this, an excellent product.

This is a very good game! Being able to have your friends and family play with you makes it even more fun. You can have 1 person sing, 1 person play drums, and 2 people play guitar(1 if you don't buy another drum). You should order it here on amazon. Trust me it saves you a lot of money. Whats even better is that the instruments also work for other guitar hero/ band hero/ rock band games. Every thing is easy to set up and works right out of the box. BUY IT!

In this game you can play guitar, bass, drumbs or sing, or have a group of friends and play like a real rock band. The game is great, the default drums are way better than those of Rock Band, the song list is ok for me.

Look at the song list before purchase, if you like the song list then by all means buy this game, you will have loads of fun.

I ordered this awhile back for like a couple dollars. I had sold all of my original guitar hero games a long time ago after I beat them all, but decided I wanted to play them again. This game was a steal. It's still just as fun the second time around, and my whole family enjoys playing it. It has lots of great songs and levels that are perfect for everyone from beginners to experts! A must buy for anyone feeling nostalgic. I wish they didn't stop making these games.
summary: Great game, even years after it came out

reviewText: I love this game...I actually bought this one as a backup copy because mine started getting scratched up.  I now have three copies because I don't ever want to lose it!  I love the music studio where you can create your own tracks to play.  Highly recommend!  This is a must-have game for any Guitar Hero Lover!

I bought this for my boyfriend, it arrived at my house within 48 hours of ordering it, and he absolutely loves it.  The one problem we had was finding all of the songs advertised on the box, but we quickly realized that once you start a "career" there are tons of additional songs that become available.  The game is great, and doesn't get old like some of the other Wii games we've tried.

This game is great! It has great songs, lots of new features, and the Guitar controller has some improved features. The game allows you to play up to 6 songs in a set without having to go back to the menu. It also allows you to choose sets on the way to unlocking more songs. There are a lot of classic songs to play as well as some new hits. If you haven't tried guitar hero yet but would like to, this is the game to start with.

I bought this for my 14 year old son and his father and I play as much as he does! It is so much fun and I like how it has from a beginners level (just strumming) to expert level so even my 6 year old daughter can join in. This is a great game and well worth the money spent.

This game is awesome.  The track list is extensive and the graphics are amazing.  I am new to Guitar Hero and haven't gotten to all the extras this game offers, but I will.  It is easy to pick up and great fun to play.  I am a 70's baby so the songs from that era are fantastic to play.  My niece and I are already addicted. Good thing I am a teacher and have 2 weeks off. :)

This game was so much fun.  I got really addicted to it for a while.  I just love it.  The graphics are so real.  You feel like you are entering a whole new world.  I would recommend this gam to anyone.

I wanted to buy a football game that was easy for my 8 year old to play right out of the box.  This game did just that.  He started playing it right away and has been crazy about it ever since.  No frustration with this game!

This review is not about the game. I have no idea how good the game is or is not. This is because apparently this version of the game has copy protect software that is outdated. The copy protect software means that I can't play the game until I install certain drivers, but they're defunct, so my computer doesn't want them either. This means that I have a fairly expensive (well, for me), completely useless game. Yay.

I'd assume this game is great from the reviews. I just wish I was able to play it.
summary: I have no idea how good the game is or is not

reviewText: Other than a little too much "channeling" throughout the game (the game design forces you to make certain game decisions), this is a great role playing game with an excellent story. I thought The Witcher was great, and then Witcher 2 blew it away for story and graphics. I can't wait for the third installment.
summary: The Witcher 1 & 2: One of the best RPG

reviewText: I know this is an older game, but it's new for me. The graphics are ahead of their time, the gameplay unique. The decisions you make, might not be the ones you would make in real life, some of them are downright nasty, just to win the next sequence.

What a great way to protect your intellectual property...  put insane DRM on it that'll make it unplayable!  Who'd want to copy that?!

I'm using Windows 7 Home Premium 64 bit.  A friend of mine had a similar problem when installing it on his machine that had Windows XP Pro.  I'm sure there are fixes out there for it, but I'm not really that motivated to figure out how to finagle with it to make it work.  There are many other decent RPG's out there that won't install dumb "DRM Drivers" on your system.
summary: DRM clashed with my system and rendered it unplayable!

reviewText:
I played the original game twice. The Enhanced edition is a spiffier version of the original, with a better soundtrack and graphics and load times. I love it!

I like the ethical challenges Geralt has to face when he makes a decision and how that changes the whole game experience each time you play. I like the beautiful scenery and the music a lot. I like the challenge of building Geralt's character and deciding what he needs to do in the fight scenes.

Simply put--This is one of the best games for the pc in a long while. Graphics are excellent, attention to detail and gameplay are excellent. Story line is very real and refreshing. This is a mature rated game and I am enjoying every minute of it. One of the few games I can't wait to play when I get home from work and on weekends. This is definitely a must buy. I hope they will consider a witcher 2

The cables work very well. The only problem is that the connection where you plug your controller into the extension is very resistant for the first few tries. However, after the controller cable is inserted a few times, it becomes easier to do.
Only real problem with the cables is that the plug that goes into the gamecube does not fit perfectly, so the cord will easily be dislodged from the gamecube if you pull on it. As long as you're not straining the cables though, there should be no problem.
summary: Good Quality, but hard to connect at first

reviewText: What can I say? These extensions did exactly what I needed them to do. I have been using them for 4 months now with absolutely no issues. Installation was quick and easy, and the cord length makes them extremely versatile for a wide variety of game room setups. All in all I am thrilled.

At first I was kind of unsure as to whether or not I would actually like these but they were a must have. After having to sit by my gamecube to play any games. I'd say this was a good purchase. I can now sit on my couch and not have to worry about accidently unplugging the gamecube.
summary: ... unsure as to whether or not I would actually like these but they were a must have

reviewText: I'm very satisfied with how these cables work. It doesn't matter to which controller I connect these, they will work just fine. The weird thing though is that if I were to use two of these extension cables together for one controller only, this controller would easily connect with the console without any issues, but if I were to connect three or even four extensions together, the connection between controller and console is completely lost, regardless of the controller I'm testing it with.
summary: Satisfied client though there's a weird thing

reviewText: I've had this item for about 3 weeks now and it has been working great so far. I like to take the Wii to my garage and play with friends so the extra length helps when people are walking by. No more tripping, jumping over cables, or having to sit close to the T.V.
summary: Great item, love the extra room!

reviewText: I bought this for my Wii to use with my GameCube controllers to play some of my older GameCube games since I hadn't played them in a while.  The living room setup is much too long between the couch and the Wii to only use the GameCube controller.  These virtually double the length of the GameCube controller and work really well.  There is no lag also.  I only wish I had brought this pretty much when I bought my Wii to continue the use of some great GameCube games.
summary: Simple and Useful to Extend GameCube Controller

reviewText:
My wife and I bought a Wii for our son for Christmas 2007.  I have been looking for a few games that adults could enjoy, so I thought I would give this a try.

I have played the original SimCity and SimCity 2000 in the past, so I did have an idea of what to expect.  This game follows in the tradition of those older games with a few adjustments and additional options.  So far I have had a lot of fun with it.

It is important to know that this software will put SecuROM on your computer so that you can make an informed decision whether or not to use it.  SecuROM may possibly disable some functionality of your pc and peripheral devices.  Use at your own risk.
summary: Warning: This software will install SecuROM on your pc.

reviewText: As an all time Sims 2 fan only, this expansion pack is a lot of fun. It's really challenging to control an apartment full of Sims and it's almost realistic to what it would be like to live in a complex. A must have for anyone that wants the full Sims 2 experience with all of the expansion packs.
summary: this expansion pack is a lot of fun. It's really challenging to control an apartment full ...

reviewText: I PURCHASE THIS ITEM A FEW YEARS AGO WHEN IT FIRST CAME OUT AND NOW IT WON'T PLAY ANYMORE CRACKED DUE TO POOR QUALITY GAME CD! I'M SO VERY DISAPPOINTED THAT I CANNOT PLAY ANY OF MY SIMS2 GAMES AT ALL BECAUSE OF THIS ITEM!
summary: The Sims 2: Apartment Life Expansion Pack

reviewText: The Sims 2 Apartment Life is a lot of fun, it's just a different way to play the game for the fact that you have the option to be in a building instead of a house. My family and I do have a lot of fun with this game. Also it arrived a day before of what we were expecting, so we are very happy with this purchase.

I was looking for a game that would provide me with some escapism over the holidays and this fit the bill.  I had played The Sims before so this was a reintroduction to the game.  It is very clever and entertaining.  I highly recommend it.
summary: Sims 2 is clever, imaginative and addictive

reviewText: It is a little tricky to put this thing on, but once it's on, it doesn't budge!  I was initially a little worried about the feet-placement bumps that are on this thing, to remind you where your feet need to be, but even standing on it barefoot proved to be no problem at all!  It's an odd sensation, at first, but ultimately it was easy to get used to.  Plus, it keeps the balance board from getting dirty as quickly as it does without.  I definitely recommend it!

I was a little skeptical at first, when I noticed the grippy nodules where feet are to be placed on top of the board.  However, after a few minutes of using the product, I absolutely love the traction it provides.  It also helps me keep my feet centered on the board.

I absolutely loved this game. There a ton of fun games on here, from Metal Slug and Super Sidekicks 3. Not all of the titles in this compilation are true classics, but enough of them are to merit a purchase. I'd easily recommend getting this if you're into old video games or just want to have a good time with some friends.
summary: Great collection at a bargain price!

reviewText: This game is great. My roomates and I have spent hours playing the dang thing. The random luck factor makes the game very, very challenging (and sometimes annoying) but we keep coming back for more. I highly recommend this game. I've got it on both the Wii and DS. Good stuff.

This game is great! Some of the puzzles are challenging to the point of frustration, but worth keeping at it to get to the next sequence of puzzles. It is not a short game and well worth the money and time.

This game was a lot of fun to play and I have played it several times! I love how it takes place in Ireland and the romance in this one. The love triangle gives it an interesting twist that none of the other ones have. It was really really hard for those who like a challenge! You get to go outside to explore which is nice and you can explore all of the rooms, too. The scenery is beautiful and the story is interesting. You also learn a bit about Irish legends, too. Highly recommended!

I enjoyed this game very much.  I have played all of the Nancy Drew games by Her Interactive.  The last few games I played felt rushed and I did not enjoy them as much as previous games.  The Haunting of Castle Malloy goes back to the original fun of the earlier games.  The story line was great and did not feel rushed. The puzzles were fresh, new, and challenging.  These games are great for all ages.  I anxiously await the next one.

The skin doesn't slip for me when I use it, and like the way it feels under my feet. Fits nicely around the board and has a few little nubs that slip in to holes on the bottom to hold it in place. I'd only ask for it to be a tad thicker, but it works.

Just a warning to everyone. Do not buy this product. It looks a lot bigger in the picture to start. Once i got it out of the box I could not get it to connect with the wii. It says that the wii should pick it up automaticly but it doesn't. I took it over to my sister-in-laws to seeif it was my wii but it would not work on her's either.

This was by far one of the best investments that I've made for my kids Wii. The dock came with rechargeable batteries which saved me a lot of money over time. I like the way that the dock blends in with the color scheme. The set up is easy as well. I would recommend this to anyone who needs a charger for the Wii.

Got this game this morning and me and my 7 year old daughter are having a blast.  It's fun for all ages.  I love the controls.  The only down side I see is that the mini games are kind of lame.  But definitely worth the purchase.

It's ok.  I'm satisfated with that product. I recomend to Other people.  That game is fashion for me.  It's ok.  I'm satisfated with that product. I recomend to Other people.  That watch is fashion for me. It's ok.  It's entertaiment.
summary: It's ok.  I'm satisfated with that product. I recomend to Other people.  That watch is fashion for me. It's entertaiment

reviewText: My 6 year old grandson eats, breathes and sleeps Mario.  This was one game he heard about that he didn't have, so as soon as I found out it was an older game, I headed straight to Amazon where it was readily available.  Needless to say, the game was a big hit and I got a play-by-play from across the country.  I can't begin to give any details, but even his 19 year old brother wasn't totally bored.

My 3 year old LOVES baseball. He is too young to play obviously but he loves to watch his Daddy play this game. The game is fun enough for my husband to play. They enjoy it. It isn't a game they play all the time but the enjoy it when they do.

When we got our Wii, this game was bundled along with it.  I really didn't expect the kids to like it much, as they have never expressed any interest in baseball.  However, it quickly became their favorite game.  Easy to play, especially on the easy settings.  The kids would whack home run after home run and laugh and laugh.  Lots of fun for the kids.  Adults, probably not so much.

My 8 year old son and 6 year old daughter love this game.  You can play by yourself and play against the computer or with someone else.  Aside from playing actual baseball, it has other mini-games that are fun.

This game is awesome! I bought it today and haven't been able to stop playing it.  The graphics, voice acting and everything about it is great! It's nice to hear the guy from Uncharted: Drake's Fortune take-on the role of the price, which he does excellently! I would recommend this game to anybody. Don't rent it, go out and buy it! It is definitely worth it!

This game kept me waiting for something new to happen. The gameplay you get in the first hour of the game is the same gameplay you will have throughout the game. The game tries to be stylized and tries to have a feel like Shadow of the Colossus, but it fails in most ways.  I honestly hated the game and I am a big POP fan.  The story is not very deep either and while it has its twist it is nothing new.

I loved this game. It was epic and heartfelt. By the end of the story, you truly feel for the characters and their relationship. The platforming and puzzles were well thought out and fun to do. The new one-on-one battle system truly flourished.

Can't wait for the next one!
summary: The new Prince exceeded my expectations...

reviewText: Check out this breath taking game as soon as you can. In my long gaming history I haven't seen a lot of games that grab you the way this one does visually. The animated style is beautiful. The fluidity of motion is impressive, being that the characters are drawn in the same beautiful style as the background art. I don't know how they make this style work, but it's stunning. The game is more than just something pretty to look at too. Pretty much everything about the game is top shelf.

GREEN BOX WAS RE-PACKED IN A THIN CRYSTAL CLEAR PLASTIC BAG THAT IS NOT ORIGINAL WAY MICROSOFT DOES IT, NOT RETAIL MICROSOFT'S ORIGINAL STICKER PRESENT (IT'S MISSING) AND WHEN I TRIED TO RUN GAME IT STOPED AND RESTARTED SEVERAL TIMES UNTIL IT FREEZES AND DEFINITIVELY STOPS ... I'M VERY DISSAPOINTED ! I WANT MY MONEY BACK ! CUSTOMER WROTE AN E-MAIL TO ME OFFERING TOTAL REFUND OF MY MONEY, THEY SEEM TO BE HONEST PERSONS... LET'S SEE IF IT'S TRUE!
summary: I'M VERY DISSPOINTED !  I WANT MY MONEY BACK !

reviewText: I got the game in great condition. I had never played the game before, but I spent many hours on it and just had a blast. I got 840 gamer points out of it after 4 days (30 hours) of playing. Sort of reminds me of Assassins Creed.

If there was ever any ending in the history of video games that screamed, "STAY TUNED FOR THE NEXT EPISODE!" this game definately is one of those games. From beginning to end, everything about this game is pretty awesome, and the ending is nothing short of EPIC!  Extremely well done.
summary: Definately one of the best games i've ever played.

reviewText: THIS IS AN AWESOME GAME IF YOU ARE REALLY INTO SOLVING PUZZLES. I MUST ADMIT IT IS NOT EASY AT ALL BUT IT KEEPS YOU ON YOUR TOES UNLIKE OTHER GAMSE THAT AS SOON AS THE MYSTERY IS SOLVED ITS NOT FUN. IT TAKES TIME TO FIGURE OUT EACH BOARD THATS WHAT MAKES IT FUN. I WOULD RECOMMEND THIS TO ANYONE WHO LOVES PUZZLE GAMES.

This game will challenge your mind in ways you would never imagine. My husband and I team up and play. I can figure out the puzzles, but I'm not super handy with the video game controls.

You will love this game!!

Crysis Warhead is a very good game that can be played on modern computers with ease. It is between the first and third game and gives you a rundown of the story, mechanics, and weapons. Unlike the new crysis, it will not make your system cry unless it is 2008 or older. The gameplay is solid and the graphics are mind blowing for the age. Overall I would recommend this game to anyone that is looking for a cheap game that can still amaze.

I played the original Far Cry on my PC and was pleased to see this new release for the Xbox 360. I get to play it on a 42" HDTV. The graphics are great and the game play is lots of fun. I get killed most days, but I take alot of creeps with me.

BUYER BEWARE!

I was really looking forward to this game, and I don't have a problem with anti-piracy measures which stay out of my way as a PURCHASER OF GAMES.

But I will not knowingly buy a game which includes DRM which limits how many times I install it.

I want to own the games I buy, not rent them.

Even the Steam version has this too, so I won't be buying that either.

A real shame.

Another good game made terrible by EA's new DRM scheme.

You don't own this game, you rent it.

If you uninstall the game, the DRM remains.

They can collect information about your system and there is nothing you can do about it.

You cannot resell this game.

Crysis looked interesting, but I don't buy DRM-ware.

If EA won't insure that I can continue to play my game as long as I own it, I won't buy it.

Perhaps if EA reconsiders their DRM position, I might reconsider my buying position.

If you are an adult and enjoyed reading the Harry Potter books - why not give the PC games a chance?  I find that I am really enjoying this game after a stressful day at work.  What I like most is that the instructions are good for those of us who may not feel we are as good as the kids when it comes to using computers.  I highly recommend this game to people of all ages.

This game is really good but I could not play it because of my computer specs... Make sure you have the right video card because if you don't you will not be able to play it. Other than that this game is worth the money for it. At least I think it is

I am glad that I bought this game, I had this game before so I knew what to expect. This game is fun. I love the all of the characters. I get to experience what is like to be a pet groomer. I like how you can choose a male or female and get to dress the grommer up. This is a fun game!!!!

This is a really really fun game. Great graphics, good variety of missions and easy to learn how to play.  This will provide you hours of fun.

Also, there is a way to turn off the language and make it considerably less violent (elminate splattering blood), which is great if you have kids around the house.

I'm not a huge gamer, but this game is worth the money (particularly if you buy it used!)

You have no idea what you're missing until you snap these babies on.  I'm not even a gamer.  I've got two kids under 5 and a wife who doesn't "get it".  When I do get a chance to play, my fingers aren't sore anymore.  Period.

I thought the game was easy to play but that didn't take away from the game at all it had some challenging things to do and a lot of areas to explore. Buy it you will like it and you will want to play more then once.

This has been enjoyed by myself, my 14 year old grandson, my 9 year old grandson and my 31 year old son. We all agree this has been the best 007 game yet. It is fun and exciting with out being to easy or too difficult.

All I can say is that this is a great product and I am thinking about ordering another pair. I played alot of call of duty and my accuracy went up and it is easier to aim especially machine guns and keep it on target. I don't know about racing games but I guess it will give you that edge also. If you play alot of call of duty then this is the product you can't live without.

Been using these for about 3 weeks now and could not be happier.  After the first couple days it's hard to image playing a game without them.  They even look like they're supposed to be there.  Easy to snap on and will stay on even if you drop your controller on the floor.  I got a pair for my friend and he really likes them too.  The best $5 investment you can make for your PS3.

When you first start using the dual triggers it feels a little strange, especially if you are playing a game that relies heavily on the triggers. It almost feels like you aren't fully pressing the button because you don't have to reach as much. The controller feels more secure in your hands and it doesn't require as much effort to hold which reduces fatigue. I highly recommend buying a pair for every controller you own.

I bought these due to good reviews. I have to say that these are a must-have item for playing FPS (like COD) games on PS3. The PS3 controllers should have been designed this way already. I have had no problems with the triggers popping off unless the controller is dropped hard (or thrown). They seem to be made out of quality plastic that won't break easily.

been using this for well over a month now, gives a completely different feeling to the controller. I like the way the controller feels in my hands now. I think this is a must have add on for the PS3. Highly recommended

Upon purchasing this item I didn't think these little triggers would make much of a difference in my gaming. But, they are a really cool add on and actually make it easier to press the L2 and R2 buttons. They also make the controller fit better in your hands. It's so cheap, yet it adds more character to your gaming.
summary: Gives the PS3 Controller a Better Feel

reviewText: While I'm not a fan of the DualShock 3 controller design/layout as a whole (the Xbox 360 controller is superior), the RealTriggers are a huge help. They make the PlayStation 3 controller much more enjoyable to use for extended play sessions. Sony should buy out the company that makes these and incorporate their design into a revamp of the DualShock controller. The RealTriggers are that good.
summary: One of those "Why didn't anyone think of this sooner?" items

reviewText: A must have for any real PS3 gamer. I've had my ps3 for a little over a year, and I'm not sure how I was able to live without these little things. They make using the real buttons on the ps3 controller must easier to use and keeps my fingers from slipping. Well worth the $5 I paid for these.

One of the main reasons I prefer playing my 360 instead of my PS3 is due to the superior design of the 360 controller (just my opinion, I know a lot of people love the PS3 controller more and that's cool).
