But this product does a tremendous job in making the PS3 controller even better. It always bothered me the way the triggers felt. With the realtriggers you can easily make your controller feel like you're firing a gun. Plus, your fingers will no longer slip off during battle. Great product!
summary: I can finally play my PS3 again.

reviewText:
After being used to the Xbox 360 remote for so long, using the PS3 remote for extended periods of time was not very comfortable for me.

I have fairly large hands and the position I would have to keep my fingers in on the R2 & L2 triggers was not very comfortable. After snapping on these triggers, I haven't had an issue since.

They are also the same color and texture of the original buttons which is a plus for me.

It might only be 5-10 cents worth of plastic, but they are still worth it for $5.

These things are fantastic. They look a little awkward at first, but its not about looks. Soon as you put your hand on your controller you'll be asking yourself why this wasn't the way the controller was designed in the first place. These trigger add-ons are extremely easy to install and make a HUGE difference in the playability of the R2 and L2 triggers. A must have item for the PS3 gamer.
summary: Why didn't Sony design the controller this way in the 1st place?

reviewText:
Simply put, this is how the Dualshock 3 should have been made in the first place. once they are on, they never need to come off.
Bottom Line, if you have a PS3, buy a set of these for every controller you own.

Since these are so cheap I thought I'd try it out, and I'm so glad I did. I don't understand why Sony didn't design it this way in the first place. It easily snaps on and off. But doesn't ever feel like it will come out during gaming. My wife even wondered why Sony didn't design it like this in the first place and she isn't even a gamer!

I love these things:

* Don't feel bulky
* Easily snap on and off
* Feels secure and won't come off during gameplay
* Matches the other buttons exactly.
summary: PS3 RealTriggers for Sixaxis and DualShock 3 Review

reviewText: This was a great first person shooter for the Wii.  Until The Conduit comes out I think that this game is the best FPS on the Wii if you are looking for a great game to start out your Wii game collection.  However, this is more of a hardcore gamers game.  If you are a novice player you may find this game a little confusing.  If you are more of a hardcore gamer then this game will work great for you.  Definitely a buy!

This is one of the best Wii games ever.  There is a lot of strategy involved and the action is quite realistic.  There is not much graphic violence (e.g., no scenes of bloody injuries) which broadens the range of ages the game can be used for.  Overall, I would say it is A LOT of fun, especially if you like James Bond stuff.

To this day this is still one of the finest Call of Duty games ever made.  Call of Duty 4 and Modern Warfare 2 were both completely amazing games but this game is right up there as well.  I always just keep coming back to this game for the campaign and the zombie mode is just completely awesome.  If you have never played this game you need to and this review is being posted June 2016.
summary: One of the best P3 games ever made

reviewText: Whenever I say that this is the best call of duty game on the market, I'm not lying. The singleplayer is better than any other I've seen, and the multiplayer at the peak time of it's lifespan, was one of the best I ever played.

This game was worth the price and fun to play. Ive played it for a while now and i still love it. just once in a while you will find a hacked lobby, but i don't mind because i can just leave the lobby. I love this game

I bought this for my son for his birthday.  It installs but won't run.  He e-mailed technical support who told him it was a conflict with a windows update and to uninstall the update.  He did uninstall the update and the game still won't run.  Furthermore, everytime you turn your computer back on, the update reinstalls.  So, that is not a practical solution to the problem.  The game maker know there is a problem with this game and just leaves you with a worthless purchase.  Don't waste your money.
summary: Worthless. It won't work and tech support is no help.

reviewText: I hope to one day play this game, but so far have not been able to even launch it.  I am still exchanging e-mails with Activision, but in their latest response, it sounds like the game is incompatible with one of the security patches released for Internet Explorer.  This means that if you have IE (that's most of you, right?), you can't play this game.

Don't bother

I am a big fan of the Modern Warfare. However, I wanted to o little bit "old school", so I got this. The game is a lot of fun, and I would have to say that for multiplayer (not online), this is even better than the Modern Warfare ones.

I bought this as a gift for my boyfriend and as soon as he got it (he made a trip to my dorm to get it even though he was sick) he started playing it. He has a few other Call of Duty games, and he loves them. He plays this one almost every time he plays PS3. It was expensive, but as far as I can tell, it was worth it. If you know someone that loves first person shooter games, I'd recommend it.

I've played a lot of FPS games and in my personal opinion the call of duty games, and the battlefield games are by far my favorite. This game in particular though is excellent. I played the whole game with my wife (two player co-op) and it was a blast. The mass multilayer online is a blast as well. For anyone that loves FPS games this is a must have.

activision is the greatest video game company in the universe there true genius's the best of the best activision rocks,all the games activision made from the 80s,90s,2000s,2010s and 2015 are the greatest video games in the universe there true classics the best of the best all the games activison made from the 80s,90s,2000s,2010s and 2015 rocks 2015 is the greatest year for activision a perfect year the best of the best 2015 for activison rocks ^_^
summary: activision is the greatest video game company in the universe they are gods 2015 is the greatest year for activison

reviewText: I have only been playing this game for two hours now, and while the graphics aren't anything to brag about (we're talking original xbox graphics or maybe slightly better) the game play itself is a lot of fun. I'm already addicted and don't want to put the controller down. I'd say if you love the splinter cell games and first person shooter games, you should give this one a shot (hehe get it? Ahhh you get it!)
summary: Really fun game for first person shooter fans.

reviewText: Was the first Call of Duty game I ever played.. and is probably one of the BEST games I've ever played in my life. The story line is dark, depressing, violent, and full of carnage. Such is the price of going to war.. Great game nonetheless.

I've never liked much first person shooters, and the ones I own don't seem to work with the Wii Zapper, at least not for me.
But with COD: World at War, I've really enjoyed using the Zapper and have found that it makes it easier for me to play, the graphics are pretty cool for Wii and the story it's pretty interesting.
summary: COD: World at War + Wii Zapper = Tons of fun!!!

reviewText: I rented COD WaW and played for about an hour the first night I had it and I thought it was okay.  I came back to it the next day and played for three hours and loved every minute of it. Each day after I couldn't wait for my kids to go to bed so I could play again. The game only gets better as you play it. A must have for anyone who likes this type of game.  The online mode is great but for a newbie like me I found it quite hard to keep from getting shot.
summary: First time player for COD series

reviewText: This game was really well done. It isn't hard enough to keep you from playing it, but it isn't easy enough to beat in a couple of days. The game is definitely the most high end war game yet. But, to get the best of the game, you have to beat it. I won't tell you what you unlock, but it is a challenging yet exiting bonus. I give this game an A+.

I have to say this game really suprised me. Movie based games are usually flops but I found this game to be very fun. It has a decent campaign, fun multiplayer and cool weapons. What I really liked about the game was some of the stealth parts in the missions and the game is well worth multiple campaign playthroughs. For the super low price you can get this for on Amazon, you can't go wrong. Well worth the price!

From a technical stand point some will say it is a typical shooter. They are right. But I really liked how fun it was to play this game. In my opinion much of the game play is similar to the quality of Call of Duty or Halo. Well worth it!

I don't know what the people writing the negative reviews are on. This game was COD4 set in WW2. It has the same gameplay, the same violence, and the same all around great experience as COD4. I love this game and again can't come up with more great things to say about it. It is worth buying and you won't be dissappointed. You get to use a flamethrower, does it get better than that?

I got this for my 12 yr old daughter for xmas.  She loved it!!!  I enjoyed watching her play it.  It is a lot of fun,  all the characters have their own games and some characters have different actions than others, so it doesn't get boring.

World at War is an awesome game. If you are a Zombie fan you know this is the first Call of Duty that included Zombies. The campaign is also very good. I beat this game in one sit like i usually do with the Call of Duty games. You should really get this game.

I am new to first-person shooter video gaming. I'm 60 years old and grew up in the military. This product is excellent - it's well researched and very entertaining. Even though this is game has been on the market for years, and may be considered "old-school" by younger people it is still fun to play and was priced right. I will definitely be adding games from this series to my collection soon. I can't wait to see the Modern Warfare offerings.

This, I mean, wow. This was probably one of the best Cod games I ever played, and yes, i have played every single Call of Duty out there at this moment. The storyline was just amazing. It was great. I absolutely loved this game. It really gives you a picture of what happened in WWII. There are a loy of real WWII footages, which makes the game even better. Definately recommend this game to anyone who's a Cod fan. But you should probably be at least 12 to play this.
summary: This was probably one of the best Cod games I ever played

reviewText: I don't understand the bad reviews on here. I was able to install and play everything alright. I think that this is a pretty awesome game. I already own the XBox 360 version but wanted more out of Call Of Duty World At War. Unfortunately, they did not add custom zombies to the XBox 360 version. The graphics are great, everything in the game is great. I have nothing bad to say about the PC version of this game.

Screw the zombies.  I don't even know why people like that fake crap.  I played for 30 minutes and gave it to my son.  I don't miss it and I don't care for it.  It is the worst COD out of all the COD series.

This game is awesome! Even if you have played previous Call of Duty games you will notice the difference. The game is a little bit short for the price (about 6 hours of constant playing) but in the end you will not be sorry for purchasing it.

If this game were not scrutinized as successor to the Call of Duty franchise, it would be hailed as one of the greatest action games ever made.

But the fact is, the "Call of Duty" franchise is as popular as "Star Wars", and the fans nit-pick it as much.

BOTTOM LINE: THIS IS A FUN, EXCITING GAME, AND BETTER THAN MOST GAMES YOU WILL EVER PLAY.

The single player is probably the best campaign in the entire franchise.
summary: One of the greatest single-player games ever made

reviewText: Got this game for my son first. Didn't see him for a week. One day he asked me to watch for "a sniper on a roof" while he did his thing and I was blown away. This game is awesome. The single player is great. The multi-player is even better. I had to get it for myself. Great stress reliever after a long day. Now, my wife hasn't seen me for a few weeks. And, might have to wait a few more.

This was the first Call of Duty game I have played and completed. I did enjoy playing it though The only other games I have played similar to this is the Halo series of games. They are similar I do prefer Halo though.

I can't really give a total review of this game since I have never been able to run it on my computer. I installed it but could never get it to open up. It would just abort. I called support and did what they told me to do to no avail. I wrote back to them and they never contacted me and just closed my case file without helping me. I am through trying to run this type of game on my computer. I am totally appalled that a game that was once so good has gotten this bad. Buyer beware!!!!!
summary: Call of Duty: world at War

reviewText: I ordered this for a Christmas gift and it arrived in great condition and will be played by a boy who has been wanting this game. I was pleased with the service that I got and would consider purchasing again.

Everything about this game is great, and I have no idea why I traded it in for a newer Call of Duty game. It was probably all those stupid-pills I was taking. Buy this game and play it, play it a lot, you will not be disappointed.
summary: This Game Shits All Over Every Other WWII Game Out There.

reviewText:
I haven't played MW3 yet, but this is just the best CoD game in my opinion. Singleplayer is fun, the gore and swearing is great, and the multiplayer is a blast. I loved all the unlocks and leveling up, and maps were great and I love everything about this game. Except for zombies, which I think is boring. Overall my favorite CoD so far.
9/10

This game is great.  I am still having a problem trying to get used to the controls, but it is a lot more fun than the psp games.  The psp games take a long time to load.  What i like about this game is if there is a bomb in the way you have to dissarm the bomb, which is really great.  I would recommend this game.

Not a fan of CoD, however, W@W is one of my favorite games. It's the only game I cared to buy for both PS3 and Xbox. Nazi Zombies is one of the best things CoD has. I even like the multiplayer on this one, and I don't care for multiplayers at all.

Sure this game isn't anything like Modern Warfare or Modern Warfare 2. Still, it's the best out of all the WW2 COD games. The zombie game is fun, but only in Co Op mode. It's too hard and just no fun by yourself. Anyway, this is a really fun game that should keep you occupied for a long time. Parents be warned. This is not a game for  kids. There is a ton of blood and gore and a lot of language.
summary: Best World War 2 Call of Duty

reviewText: I bought this game for my husband for Christmas...he started playing it a couple of nights ago and I don't think he has gotten much sleep...he can't seem to put the controller down. I assume that means it is a great game !

This game is overly complicated, graphically stunted, and is almost as much fun as beating yourself in the face with a cactus. I wouldn't recommend this game to anyone who actually wants a game to be enjoyable.

I downloaded this game and wished I never had. The controls and interface are so backwards and strange and difficult to get used to that it will probably take you about 30 minutes just to figure out what in the hell you have to do. I downloaded this game for free and felt like I got ripped off. Don't waste your money on this piece of crap. It's atrociously bad and the programmers of this game should probably quit making games.

I love these games.  Each game is different and no matter how many times you play it, it is always a new game. I waste a lot of time playing this. I recommend it to anyone who is tired of shooting monsters.  It isn't as fast paced but infinitely more interesting and mentally engaging.
summary: Great way to waste a lot of time.

reviewText: I bought this game for my son's birthday.  It was fun and worked fine for three weeks.  Suddenly the game would not work any more but would instead display a list of runtime errors.  I've tried uninstalling and reinstalling the game with the same runtime errors displaying. If I had it to do all over again I would have bought a bicycle.  I will not ever buy another EA game.

I really  like this game. I'm really creative and that's why I have so much fun with this game. Also very addicting. When I'm at work, I wish I was home playing this game. Can't wait for the sequel to come out on May 19th.

My only complaint is my kids have to share it! I've had to put time limits on how long they play! My 3 year old loves the cell stage, my 7 year old is completely addicted, and my 10 year old is very patient waiting for his turn. I have bought this game for friends and family and no one has been disappointed! Very fun game, creative, and lets the kids go at their own pace.

Despite the terrible DRM that comes with the game, I really wanted to play it, so I gave in and bought a copy.  I had no problems playing until I got to the space stage and saved and exited the game.  Now the game is extremely unstable and crashes after only a few minutes play.

The "Nintendo DS Mini Folio" is a very sturdy case that perfectly fits the DS Lite, stylus, and 4 games or so.

The case is fairly thick and can stand on any side except the "spine".

The included metal clip is very strong and can be used for attaching the case to a backpack or belt loop.

The overall construction is very solid and does provide a good bit of protection for the DS.

Recommended!

This game is great. I bought it used and there were no problems with it. My only complaint is that the manual for the game was not in the case. But with the internet, you can basically find anything, so its been fine.

How do we rate NBA Live?  I purchased this game for my 12-year-old son, who is an avid video gamer and a sports fanatic, with basketball being his number 1 game.  He and his friends absolutely love playing this game.  The graphics are beautiful - at first glance it looks and sounds like a real basketball game.  This game is awesome!
summary: How do we rate NBA Live?

reviewText: A great game! If you like strategy, this is a must. Gameplay is great and easy to use. Been a fan of this series since the beginning. Strategy games on console don't crossover the best, but this one does. Highly recommend this game. Loads of fun

Just bought this for my six year old as a birthday gift. He loves Monster Trucks and likes that the "real" monster trucks are featured on the game. He was able to quickly pick up enough of the basics to play immediately. There are other games that he's still trying to figure out, so this game will grow with him.  Haven't played the multi-player option yet, but glad it's there.

I'm new to strategy games and I could not figure out what was going on in this game.  I was extremely disappointed that the tutorial did nothing to explain what the game was about.  Even on easy I had no idea what was happening.  One of the few games I wish I had not bought.

Storyline and acting: Not too cheesy. It has some "Are you serious?" moments, but they are few.

Graphics: 100% perfect

Handling: I was a little skeptical at first, because i had not played an RTS (real time strategy) game on a console before, but it's pretty easy to handle once you get the hang of it (which is pretty quickly, thanks to the Tutorial sessions).

I actually purchased this because my four year old grandson loves Monster Jam.  He has really enjoyed playing this game.  The adults in the family have been playing as well.  The best part about this game is a four year old can play it and yet the adults can play it and not feel as though they are playing a kid's game.  I highly recommend it.

My 4th grade daughter got this for her birthday and it has been a huge hit. It is challenging yet fun. We have fun playing it together and helping each other out with the answers. Questions are not easy but the format makes it fun!

I mainly use video games for playing with guests. I recently purchased FIFA 09, and with the exception of a few other XBOX titles, this one has become the favorite. It's very entertaining to play with friends, and the navigation is fairly simple. For many, soccer is a difficult sport to watch on TV, but with FIFA 09 there is an immersive quality that makes you feel as if you are playing AND spectating at the same time!

My son only has a few DS games and we purchased him this one for Christmas and he just loves it! He has several of the monster trucks to play with at home so this game is very exciting as he gets to drive the trucks.  It even has a few games on it that our younger child can play as well. I highly recommend this game for others, even those that may only have a few games and are looking for games for younger children.
summary: My 5 year old loves this game!

reviewText: I bought this for my 11 year old son for Christmas and he loves it! He is also a fan of nerf guns, so he was so excited when he opened this up! He would play it for hours a day if I let him, this game is truely his favorite!

My 8-year old is somewhat resistant to "educational" games, but we bought this with her new DSi. It really is a LOT of fun! She played it for quite a long time, and we "grown-ups" thought it was pretty fun, too! This game far exceeded our expectations! Can't wait to see if it's available in the next grade levels.

One great feature is that you can create multiple player profiles, so multiple children can play from the same game and all their stats and scores are saved.

My daughter (who is almost 5) LOVES Barbie but is not at all interested in this game.  She has difficulty even controlling Barbie when she walks.  After that she didn't even want to try controlling the horse.  My husband played the game to try and get our daughter interested but even he had difficulty.  It didn't take long for him to get frustrated and give up on the game as well.

I bought the game at a decent price. I didn't have to wait too long to receive it, and it was practically in new condition, it came with the manual as well. I give the price, shipping & handling, and wait time for the product 5 stars and the actual game an overall 4 stars.
summary: Pretty Good Game at a Decent Price

reviewText: Man this game is so much fun, this is the first Harry Potter game that I have actually liked since Prisoner of Azkaban. Collecting the Crests and Mini-Crests is so much fun, Quidditch controls are much easier, and making potions is a good challenge. Compared to the Goblet of Fire and Order of the Phoenix games, this game is like heaven. I have no regrets about buying this game whatsoever, a good game all around, no complaints!
summary: MUCH better than the previous two games

reviewText: Bought this game for one of my sons.  He loves it and so does his older brother.  They both loved the movie series, and the game plays into that interest.  They are ages 14 and 15, and I would recommend it to others looking for a good game for their teenage kids if their kids like this genre of game.

I'm going to keep this short and simple. If you are a Harry Potter fan, BUY THIS GAME! The castle and grounds are fully immersive. This game is especially great, if you are a fan of the books. Do not think twice about it, just buy it.

My eight year old plays this game and she says "it is the best 'ball' game I have ever played on the computer."  It is more involved than so many other games that she has played.  She likes games with lots of challenges.  The more she has to strategize the more she likes a game. If this is the kind of game you prefer, this may be worth a try.
summary: "...more fun than any ball game yet"  my daugther

reviewText: I purchased this game because I wanted something new to play.  It is so much fun that I then purchased Peggle Nights to give me more play time.  I have played this game many times.  Each time you play, the challenge is still there and it's fun to try to beat the number one name on the player list.  I wish there were more versions of this game because I would certainly purchase them.  Fun and addictive, and I highly recommend it as a way to pass the time in an enjoyable way.

I don't know how to review a game like this. It's fun for the whole family. Even if you beat all the levels you will want to keep playing over and over. I have been playing the demo on line for awhile. Just bought the full version from Amazon and have been loosing sleep over this game.

I have played many FPS's in my day, but none have been so ridiculous. This game is just a large amount of fun with a large rainbow of very unique weapons. The enemies are all creative and very nice to look at, even for an older game.

The price is right for three great games, even though two of them are expansions. I haven't gotten to playing them all yet, but I'm sure they won't disappoint. A sequel just came out, so if you like this you should pick that up.

reviewerName: Oreo Cookie Chocolate Peanut Butter Pie 2018
reviewText: This game is pretty fun. the only thing I had trouble with was the bowling game. it was a little difficult but the rest of the game is a blast. I gave it five stars because i'm a shrek fun and I like these typs of games. if you have not played this game then I recommend you do

I bought this at Target for $5 and it wasn't even worth that! There are so many bugs to this game and the graphics are horrible. It is impossible to play this game or even know what you're doing. Do not waste your money on this garbage.

I have been a fan of 2K sports since it has started, but I think NBA 2K9 is the worse out of the series. The CPU is nearly unbeatable and you can hardly get a shot off let alone make one. I have used all of the NBA teams and not one came to my liking. The graphics however are very good and very realistic. If you are looking for an NBA game for XBox 360, go somewhere else. This game really sucks!

I actually received this for Mother's Day.  It was easy to set up, I was able to use it within minutes of taking it out of the box.  I think one of the best parts is that there is a bracket that holds the game controller right on the stand.  So, everything is right there.  We have had a lot of fun playing Rock Band 2.

This is the real deal. The original NES zapper and it works perfectly. I tried one of the knockoffs and my 3 and 5 year olds broke it within a week. This one has been going strong for over 6 months now. The weight is right, the accuracy is right. If you're going to buy a zapper doo yourself a favor and buy the real deal. I couldn't believe how great the condition is.

It appears to be in great condition but I am unable to use it on my LCD TV so I have not been able to enjoy it as I thought I would. I would still recommend this Zapper to anyone with a classic television as it would work just fine.
summary: It appears to be in great condition but I am unable to use it on ...

reviewText: My 10 year old daughter has been playing it since she got it, very entertaining. This was perfect for her since she wants to become a teacher someday, I would have loved something like this when I was little.

Got this for my grandson as a gift.  He watched this with his great-grandmother as he was growing up.  So glad I was able to get this for him to remind him of those happy days with his great-grandmother.

Bought this for my grand daughter for Christmas. She hasn't said too much about it, so I can't give an honest review. I'll rate it a 5 because she hasn't complained or asked me to return it. I'm assuming it's an ok game.

I love the show so I was excited when I saw the Wii game.  I guess maybe I was expecting too much.  I thought it would be more like the game show on TV and that there would be a lot more interaction, but there really isn't.  The games last all of 10 minutes and then you have to start all over again.  It takes all the fun out of it.  For a Wii game, I think it stinks.  There should be more action and more games for us to play.

I'm not the best gamer, I take my time on everything and I mainly play single-player RPGs. That being said, this game is beautiful in many aspects, it's story, the music, the scenery is just amazing. This is a great game to play though I did get a bit scared a times, only cause I'm the biggest baby, I got through it and boy was I glad, please give this game a chance.

I don't own a balance board, so I don't know anything about that part of the game.

The graphics are excellent, it's easy to understand, and it's a lot of fun just using the remote. The controls are very simple, and there's always something to do. I recommend this game if you like snowboarding or other simulation games, and pretty much all ages as well.

I hope my review was helpful! Thanks.

I finally got around playing this game. All I can say is that it is intuitive, exciting, and fun. I really enjoyed it and wish I had played this game when it was released. If you have been on the fence like I was, jump on this game immediately!

This is a great game to use with your balance board.  You don't have to have one, and I've never played the game without one, but it is terrific fun with the balance board!  The graphics are pretty good, especially for a Wii, and it functions very well.  I am very glad that I bought it.  The kids and even Grandma are having fun with it.  It's great to work on your balance too!

My husband gave me this game for Christmas. I have been addicted to it! It is so much fun. I use the Fit board and couldn't imagine playing it any other way. It's exercise in disguise. I have so much fun playing the game that I don't realize the workout I'm getting. I would recommend this for all ages.

Okay, I don't know why I'm reviewing the PS3 version, seeing as how I played it on PC. But I just wanted to say that the original Bioshock (this one :P) is a masterpiece. It is the best of the lot, which is a huge compliment since the each installment in the Bioshock trilogy is very highly rated. This is absolutely one of the best games I've played.

It took me quite a while to get through this game but that is because I could only play 2-3 hours weekly.
Did I enjoy the game? Yes I did & very much.
Would I recommend it to others? Yes I would.
I am happy with this purchase.

I actually played Bioshock 2 first and loved it so much I decided to give the 1st one a try.  I did have some reservations about playing an older game in the series because I thought I might be let down by gameplay/visuals/sounds/etc. that they might have fixed in the 2nd game.  My fears were squashed.  This game can stand on its own and is almost as good as Bioshock 2.  I cannot wait for Bioshock Infinite to be released!

I picked up Bioshock because I had heard good things about it.  This game is easily the best First Person Shooter I have ever played.  Cool weapons and abilities make this game a blast to play.  The story is engaging, the enemies are creepy (good AI too), and the soundtrack is enjoyable yet disturbing.  I would give Bioshock a solid 9 out of 10.  You can get it here on Amazon for a good price, so....What are you waiting for?
summary: Not the Biggest FPS fan, but........WOW!!!

reviewText: This is one of the few games that I actively replayed several times after beating it the first time. The story is one of the richest on the ps3 to date. The weapons are pretty diverse and plasmids (super powers) deliver a wide array of effects. This is one shooter game that focuses on telling a story- a very good one at that. If you haven't played it, you'll definitely want to add this one to your list.

I purchased this game a couple of years ago and still consider it to be one of my favorite games. The gameplay is fun and easy to pick up. The world is so immersive that I truly felt like I was there and cared about what was happening. The atmosphere was tense, frenetic, and scary exactly when it needed to be. Pick this game up and you won't be disappointed.
summary: Escape into another world with this fantastic shooter

reviewText: Probably the best game I've ever played in my entire life. This review is probably useless by now, but if you don't own this, and you're looking at this, then you're obviously considering getting it. Just get it don't waste time you could be playing it reading these reviews. Also, part 2 is fantastic as well.
summary: Possibly the best game I've played!

reviewText:
I know this game is probably old to many since it's released date, but I just finished it and I must say I enjoyed it from beginning to end!

Many of the other reviews speaks about the in game details, so I won't bother to go into details. However, if you just recently bought a PS3 like me and looking for a excellent first person shooter at a great price, I highly recommend this game!
summary: One Of The Best FPS Ever!!!

reviewText:
What a fantastic game. I don't play games, other than FPS. Normally it's Left 4 Dead or Unreal Tournament, but this game came with the purchase of my PS3. I figured 'what the heck' and popped it in. WOW!! I was hooked from the beginning. Its set in the 40's and I just couldn't get enough. I actually spent two days in a row playing 7+ hours straight (weekend). I recommend this game to anyone looking for a storyline and FPS is one.

Excellent!!

The good
-Beautiful graphics
-Great storyline, good length
-Plenty of replay value
-Awesome weapons and powers

The bad
-Nothing

This is one of my favorite games of this generation. It's a must buy, especially at the current price.

I own this on xbox 360, ps3 and PC. While the PC graphics are indeed the best of the 3, the ps3 graphics blow the 360 version out of the water. Maybe that's because they had more time to perfect them, but this is true 1080p compared to the 360's 720. The story, characters and atmoshphere in this game cannot be beat. Do yourself a favor and pay 16 bucks for this game, it is worth every penny!
summary: A classic, the only game better is Bioshock 2!!

reviewText:
Bioshock is the epitome of what gaming should be -- brilliant story telling, endless exploration, limitless customization, movie-quality dialogue, memorable characters and locations, incredible visuals, and most importantly, perfectly refined gameplay.

Considering how much this game is selling for, it deserves a place in every gamer's collection.
summary: A man chooses, and a slave obeys.

reviewText: I didn't buy this game from Amazon (recieved as a gift), but it is by far the best FPS ever made.  The game has so many things to do and so many different ways to use your environment to defeat your enemies.  The Big Daddy is one of the best enemies ever created.  Story-wise, hands-down it is the best story ive had the pleasure of experiencing!  No complaints whatsoever on this one!

I don't really like first-person shooters, but Bioshock is an awesome game!!  Everyone should buy this game.  It's fun, creepy, scary, has amazing graphics and has a great storyline.  This game has everything.  If you don't have this already, buy it now....you won't be disappointed!

Beautiful settings, filled with character. The story is a bit tough to follow because you pick it up in little pieces, but the game is fun, and even a bit scary at times. I'm not normally a fan of 1st person shooters, but this one hooked me.

...buy this game already. It's too much fun. There's so many ways to play this game, and there's such a great atmosphere to this game, Rapture is an incredibly engaging world. Get this game already, you're wasting time reading this.

This game is different, and this is really a very good thing. The story feels fresh, the game is fun, the graphics are extremely good and the sound affects are great.

I really enjoyed it even if it not as my top game history.

I could go on and on like everyone else, but I won't.  The truth is, I think this game is the best I have ever played.  I hadn't played something this good since Half-life 2, and this was better.  It's not your hum-drum shoot-em-up like Call of Duty.  It's better.

The story: amazing.  The gameplay: awesome.  Replay value: incredible, even with no multiplayer.

My advice: don't read a million reviews, don't read Wikipedia -- it will spoil the plot.  Just buy the game, and you'll be happy you did.  I was.

I was totally shocked by the awesomeness of this game. The concept is amazing and the overall game is just great. It is a suspense/thriller type of FPS so it is at first Very VERY scary to play - it took me a week to get used to the shocks. I cannot wait for the sequel!
summary: One of the BEST FPS titles out right now!

reviewText: After reading a lot about this game, I figured now that it's dropped in price having been out for a while I might as well give it a go.  What a fantastic game.  It's tremendously fun and highly addictive.  Plenty of levels and exploration and great gameplay.  The world dreamed up in this game is very unique and the characters are sufficiently twisted to make for a pretty dark game.  It certainly deserves the M rating.  A great addition to any PS3 collection.
summary: fantastic game, especially for the price

reviewText: This game is a definite must play for first-person shooter fans. There's really nothing left to say about it that hasn't been said before, just read the reviews out there and you'll see how amazing this game is. One of the best single player campaigns I've ever played. My only gripe is no multiplayer, but hopefully they will add it to Bioshock 2 which is scheduled to be released later this year. Bring on the Big Daddys!
summary: Must play for first-person shooter fans!

reviewText:
This game takes the best aspect of the Wii Best Selling Title "Carnival Games" and moves it to the next level. I had a lot of fun playing Mini Golf, the courses are very diverse and the Wii game play is truly superb.
This game has lots of replay value, each golf course offers something unique.  It is a great title to have in your collection, fun to play by yourself and even better to play with others.
summary: Great & Fun Game for the Wii

reviewText:
I must be doing something wrong, so please enlighten me.

Once you pick a course, your only option is to play the same hole over and over again. As if that isn't bad enough, the 2nd shot looks like an instant replay of the first one. I'm glad I only spent $19.99.

Enjoy creating your character. It goes down hill from there.

We enjoy playing this game.  It is a great family game, our 4 year old and 7 year old enjoy playing this game as much as we do.  It is nice to play a game the whole family enjoys and can play together (4 player mode).  The mini games inside the courses are a nice addition.
summary: Mini golf is not mini on fun-

reviewText: This is a fun game for the whole family. Some of the holes are somewhat difficult (at least for me); however, the game keeps you interested even if you are waiting for your turn (you can annoy the other players while they are taking their shot). Hours of fun...you won't want to stop playing!
summary: A fun game for the whole family

reviewText: I have to disagree with the other reviewers who find this game fun and challenging for adults.  It is geared toward younger children, maybe 5 to 7 years old.  They will probably find it exciting and challenging.  As a middle-aged adult, I found it simple and boring.  Some of the courses can be done in one shot, without aiming.  In addition, the narrator's voice got on my nerves very quickly.  Fingernails on a blackboard.

Awesome game, really good ending to the saga, the bonus content is great, and the box as well, if you are a fan of MGS, you should buy it!

The box is the same height of a regular PS3 game BTW, when i first saw it i thought it was bigger, just for you to know.

This is one of the best point and click adventure games I've played in a long time. It ran smoothly on my 4 year old computer (XP) I encourage every adventure fan to get this game. I have played over 100 adventure games and I really love this one!

We purchased this game for our daughter for Christmas.  She is six and loves it.  She is able to start the game and play most parts on her own.  We have read lots of books about animals but she has learned some new facts by playing this game.  The graphics are pretty good, but our daughter isn't really concerned about how the game looks.  Every time she has a friend over she wants to show them her game and they end up playing for awhile.  Her friends seem to like it also.

I initially downloaded a trial for this game for my 3 yr old from Big Fish Games and she and the 3 yr old we babysit loved it so much I had to buy it. It says the recommended age for this game is 6 but they are 3 and they are able to play it. You learn a lot about animals and it is fun too!!! I highly recommend this game it is worth the $20. I just wish they sold it in stores like Target or Toys R Us so I could have saved on shipping but it is still worth it!!!

This works just as well as promised.

Yes, the graphics are a bit clunky, but it's a great way to learn board games, as well as play by oneself.

HINT: Copy the DVD contents to your hard drive, and you don't need to load the disc each time you want to play.
summary: A great way to learn board games.

reviewText: I purchased this software so that I could play cards with a friend. I found the user interface to be extremely difficult to work with. Once I was able to get into a chat, I found that I was not alone in not being able to navigate the interface. The graphics are horrible. The ability to connect and play online was absent. I would not recommend this software to anyone. On a positive note, the design of the CD label is cute. It may make a nice coaster.
summary: Worst software I have ever purchased

reviewText: Good grief! What a waste of my time and money. I even tried getting right up to the computer screen in order to see the cards. I can't put my finger on the exact problem but it seems to be the angle at which the cards are shown. Very uncomfortable and a strain for me. Uninstalled and back in the box.
summary: i can't read the fne print!

reviewText:
I've had this since I first got my first PS3 5 years ago. It does what it says, no more, no less. Hasn't let me down since.

PS: I don't know why I have to rate this as a "game"...? It works great, but it's not very fun...

Exactly what I was looking for.  There is a problem with the power cable.  I doesn't fit as snug as I'd like, but it does stay in the charging base and allows the controller to be charged.  Overall, this is a great way to charge the controller when the PS3 is turned off and to be able to charge multiple devices at one time.

I bought this thing thinking that it would just be nice to have a single spot to charge the controllers, but it's even better. The lights tell you when the controller is done charging by turning from red to green, it's small and compact and looks cool too. And it doesnt' even need to be connected to the PS3, it just needs power from a wall socket. Overall I really like this thing and have no complaints.

This game is perfect for those who like adventure games that include fighting, magic, exploration, and item gathering without the difficulty and expense of some of the online social games. It also has lots of levels so you don't feel ripped off by a game that you beat a few days after your purchase. You also have a pet that will fight along side you while you play, making things a little more interesting. So glad I tried the demo, now I have another favorite game.

For the price of admission, the game is definitely a 5 star product. It can get pretty repetitive unlike its competitors, but its competitors are at least 5 times the price. The cartoon-ish type graphics are great as it makes this a game for all gamers, young/old, experienced/casual, etc. Although it is very similar to other action RPGs, it has its own identity.

It won't keep you nearly as busy as others, but if you like Action RPGs or dungeon crawlers, this is a must buy.

This game is great.  Fun and simple.  The graphics are crisp and the gameplay is great.  It's a nice break from all the more involved RPG's.  Plus its only a few bucks.  And I don't have to worry about playing it when my kids are around, as opposed to many other game that are filled with "mature" content.

This game looks cartoony at first and I almost didn't play it. I grew tired of Diablo 3 when I got to inferno mode. I then ordered this game and have to say for the price I am very pleased. It is a great game and the silly graphics don't even bother me anymore. Very well thought out aside from a very few flaws I can think of. If you like the Diablo games this one is definitely worth considering.
summary: A great derivative type of game from Diablo creators.

reviewText: I tried out the demo and found that I couldn't stop playing so I bought the game.  It did not disappoint.  I found it very exciting with it's non-stop action.  Colorful graphics and wonderful gameplay.  A must have for any RPG fan.

I ordered this cable because a friend told me her HD TV wouldn't work without it. She was right and I was glad I ordered it. It was at a very good price and works just fine. Without it we wouldn't be playing the Wii! And it came in about 2 days!

This breakaway cable works better than the original by at least a little, and it gives you an extra 6 feet of slack for your wired Xbox 360 controller. However, I got a gray cable instead of a black one, like the image, so, it's a little misleading. But in my opinion, it's not about the color, it's about how well it performs, and it exceeded my expectations. Definitely recommend it.
summary: Really good for a third party replacement.

reviewText: This game is a great city building game. the graphics are detailed and clear. you could even trace one of your settlers all over the village! there are quests you can play, but if you just want to do whatever you want, there is that option too. if you are connected to the internet, you can compete against other players if you enjoy that. all in all an excellent game and i'm glad i got it. The price is GREAT too!!

With the release of "The Settlers 7" I became aware of the Settlers games series.
I decided to give a try to the previous release (The Settlers VI: Rise of an Empire) and I was pleasantly surprised with the quality of the game.

Good graphics and a good story line made this game a joy to play.

I gave Silent Hunter an excellent rating because it is an excellent game. It's very easy to play once you get used to the controls. I'm also an amature historian and love the accuracy of the game. Also I had the original Silent Hunter for my first P.C.It was a DOS based game and I have been unable to play for the past few years. This is like having an old friend back.

Not sure how they expect you to play this game when they do not provide any way to learn it.  There was no manual in what I bought.  There were no instructions of any type.  Submarine school seems like the place to learn, but there are no instructions or tutorials there either.  There is no walkthrough on the web (that I could find).  What a frustrating experience.  Don't buy it if you do not already know how to play.
summary: No manual. No instructions. No tutorial.

reviewText: Good game.  I'm glad I finally got it.  I've been thinking of it for some time and finally decided to see if Amazon had it listed.  I had the game 4 days after ordering it and I have been playing it daily since.

I am sorry. Usually I do not write bad reviews because I know how hard people work on these things...but this is just bad. Gameplay is pathetic...I don't feel like I control the main character at all. I played it for 5 minutes and all I can say is I am pressing buttons that the computer is telling me to press.

The game play for this game is amazing and just because it's not action and all stealth doesn't mean it's a bad game! You have to have patience with this type of game! I think it's great! To those of you who love stealth games I recommend this and to this who don't have patience don't get it. Sorry! This game wouldn't be for you! But all in all this is a great game!

I am not going to waste a lot of words on this review but to say that i agree with what everyone else has said about this game.

The controls were poorly placed and implemented, the AI is really bad, mapping even moreso  and the way the game saves to the point that you have to go back and pick up items really made this a frustrating title.

This was one of the worst XBox 360 titles I have played in a very long time.

Don't waste your money on this.
summary: Poor Controls and sloppy stealth elements killed this game

reviewText: Wow, this is bad.  If you suffer from some sort of sleep disorder then this is the game for you.  There are no exciting moments in the game, the graphics look like they are from the PS1 era and if you die during a mission you get to watch all the cutscenes again.  Do not even waste a rental on this game.

I borrowed these headphones from a friend to check them out because I wasn't sure if I would like them. They sound great, they fit well, and the microphone works great as well. The USB interface is easy to set up and the 3D sound is amazing. No complaints yet, these seem pretty sturdy and will probably last a while if not abused. Overall, this is a great pair of gaming headphones!
summary: High quality, great sound, good price.

reviewText: I was so happy to see that there is a Nancy Drew game for Wii. I loved to play the games on the computer and thought that on the Wii it will be even more fun. Could I be any more wrong? Playing this game with the Wii's controller is no fun at all. It is way to hard to navigate. I hated it and sold the game right away.
summary: Nancy drew games are for PC

reviewText: Grand Theft Auto IV is a beautiful game and has one of the best stories in video game history. I bought it for mods and for the fact that it's the only modern GTA game that can run on my PC. If you love GTA or good story games, this one's for you.
summary: One of my favorite games of all time

reviewText: The game is amazing when it is working.  I have had such a hard time getting this to work on Windows 10.  Actually, it still is not working.  The product key that I was given does not work for the Windows 10 prompt that comes up when turning on the game.  I was actually able to download and install it, but without being able to activate the game with Windows 10, you cannot save your progress so you are always stuck at the beginning of the game.  This is nuts.
summary: The game is amazing when it is working

reviewText: I got this game for my PC. I was so excited for it to ship so I could play it. I put the disk in my computer and it DIDN'T work! It installed then there was an error and it wouldn't let me play it. I looked up my problem and almost everyone had the same problem as me. I hate this GTA game.

I DONT KNOW HOW THIS PIECE BECAME MISSING OFF OF OUR PSP, BUT IM SURE MY THREE YEAR OLD HAS SOMETHING TO DO WITH THAT. I WAS SURPRISED TO RECEIVE TWO IN THE MAIL. I GREATLY APPRECIATE IT!! THIS PIECE WORKS PERFECTLY!

My computer meets the minimum requirements to launch the game, but it malfunctions and closes every time. What Amazon does not clearly tell you on this page is that the game is unreturnable. So, if you purchase this, keep in mind that there is some probability the game will fail and you will be unable to recoup the $5 purchase price.

This game is excellent. Arrived in a timely manner, good packaging, perfect condition. If buying this, research to make sure your computer has the proper specs to play this game. Only after opening and attempting to play the game did I realize my computer didn't have the proper specs to fully support gameplay. Otherwise, it's a good buy.

This not a game to play on the computer. It freezes up and is not fun at all! I bought it for my son for christmas even though the reviews were bad. He said that he read if you play it with a xbox 360 controller that it works good but this isn't the case. It still sucks and now he won't even play it so it was a waste of money!
checkout the awsome video from grand theft auto IV great footage check it out!!!! AWSOME!!!!!!!!!!!!

I bought this game with the wonderful experiences that I've had w/ GTA in the past in mind. After trying for hours and hours to get the game to work, encountering all of the problems that you read about in the other reviews, I gave up.

Shame on Rockstar for putting out a game which you can't even get to load or play. Save your time and money, don't bother with this one at all.
summary: Don't buy it... waste of time and money

reviewText:
I tried playing this on my PC, and it was very, very slow. However, the game looked fun, so I bought a new PC just to play the game. I can now play at the lowest settings for 30 minutes (sometimes as long as an hour) before the game crashes.

I guess I should've read the reviews first and bought an XBox 360. I really can't think of why they even bothered to release this. I couldn't recommend this game to anyone.

Rockstar is stealing $50 from everyone who buys this game, and installing a load of crapware on their computer.

I know they are fighting their own personal war against piracy, but this game has made me more inclined to steal games or play free games in the future.

This game is not worth going thru the draconian install process, much less what they are charging for it.

This is an awesome game. The fact that it is challenging only makes it more fun to play. The cons that I found with the game were the camera and the location of the save points. But overall the game is so good that the flaws aren't very noticeable.

even though this is an older game it is very fun and challenging. my son and I have played it on the easy level so far and it takes a while to get to the end. I am still not there after a few hours worth of game play. lots of tracks and options to choose from.

The base lights up very brightly and the fan works great. It is not noisy at all. Unlike other cooling fans which exhaust air out the back of the Wii, this one blows air up into the Wii from the bottom. It keeps the Wii cooler and makes a great night light. The USB cable comes up from the back of the base and plugs into the back of the Wii. Easy to install.

I ordered this quite a long time ago and when it showed up it didn't light up and the fan didn't turn on. When I spoke to them about it, they told me to go and PAY to return it (which would be $7.99 s/h) and then they would send me a new one. I was not interested in receiving a new one when the first was so badly made. It's a cheap item and the sellers aren't very concerned about having a satisfied customer!!!!!! I'm still furious

shipped here just fine. I charged the batteries for atleast 12 hours before I used them like it says to but the batteries do not hold a charge for longer than an hour. I would not recommend this for anyone. I'm not sure this is a fluke.
summary: Batteries don't hold charge more than an hour!

reviewText: Wii Dual Charger Station. I guess I should have paid more atention to the reviews. Keep your money! I'll be sending this back!!  Couldn't wait to receive the Dual Charger. Immediately hooked up everything, not realizing that it would take so long to charge. I'm still waiting! I guess I should have paid more atention to the reviews. Keep your money! I'll be sending this back!!
summary: Okay but not what I expected!

reviewText: Loved this headset and I'm still using it about three years later without any issue. I will say if you have smaller ears (which I do) it hurts after a few hours of use. For the price I would highly reccommend this and it's had an awesome life with me so far. I don't see it stopping working any time soon.

I thought the ps3 bluetooth was a great purchase. Not only were I able to use it for my ps3, but it doubled as a bluetooth earpiece for my mobile phone. I didn't really have anything bad to say about the earpiece at all. I just think it is a great product and pretty much a solid buy if you want to pick it up. Never had problems connecting it to neither my ps3 or my mobile phone.

Bought this for my son who loves to play online.  He hasn't used it yet, but I know he will love it.  All lot of the other players have them and they seem to work well.  My son is a little quiet but he gets pretty vocal when playing his games.  I think being able to communicate with the other players will make the game that much more fun.

The on screen notification like battery life, volume level, and mute icon are great. It lets you know quickly and easily what is the current status of your headset. Syncing it with the PS3 is as easy as plugging it in with a mini usb cable.

This Bluetooth Headset works perfectly with the PS3.  Excellent integration, easy hookup, and very good sound quality.

This does not have very good sound quality with phones as a headset for them, however I only purchased it for the PS3 connection and it works perfectly with that.  I would definitely recommend it to anyone who doesn't like the sound quality on the cheaper headsets on the market.

There are a million Bluetooth headsets on the market but there is no guesswork with this one.  It just works great.  I had it up and running within 5 minutes of opening the package.  It is harder to open the package than to get this headset working.

This is just another example of why I love things with the "Sony" name on them. Lightweight, great design, great audio, great microphone clarity, and so easy to pair with the Playstation 3. Just plug it in and the console does the rest within seconds. I'm glad I waited for Sony to come out with their own bluetooth.

This headset is excellent.  The physical controls, the audio quality, and the device's on-screen display when adjusting it are all great.

The only thing I dislike is the amount of time needed to hold down the power button in order to turn it on (3 sec) and turn it off (5 sec).  I think 1 sec and 3 sec respectively would be more convenient.

WOW! is this game different from the others. It takes match 3 games to a whole other level. You move the board in different directions to move the piece of stone to the area where it needs to be to win the round. Instead of the stone landing on the ground you have to get it to a certain spot on the board. The characters are still there to help you along and it is still much fun but very different.

I've purchased hockey games annually since the Nintendo 64 came out. This is the most notable of all I've played. While this game is graphically less than glorious, the gameplay on the wii is innovative and fun.

Definitely recommend it to a hockey fan with a Wii. If you're not a fan of hockey, you won't like this.

I finally understand what all the hype around this game is.  I had never heard of "Deus Ex" until recently.  I read about it, saw the raving reviews with few dissenting opinions.  Ok, for such short money, I gave it a try.  I'm glad I did.  It's a good 1st person shooter game but goes well beyond that.  It's not a matter of getting a big gun, running full ahead, and firing away.  There's good story development, lots of secrets, and the game is very well paced.

I love this game because everyone in our house can play it, even our six year old.  As a Star Wars fan, I just had to buy it, and I am very glad that I did.  I love the different people that you get to battle.  Good exercise too.

My husband & I really enjoy this game. It gets harder as you go. We enjoy the graphics, & the game is fun to play. You feel like you are really there! I would recommend it for young & old just to have a good time with.
summary: Lots of fun for us Seniors!

reviewText:
My grandsons are 6 and 3.  I bought the game for them and they really enjoy it!  Even my granddaughter who is 7 likes the game.  In part because the characters in the game are the same as the Clones Wars TV show they watch.

I think the graphics and sounds are excellent and it is a an easy game to learn.  If you or your kids like Star Wars Clone Wars they will like this game!

This game is amazing! I love it! It starts off slow but it's worth it. If you love Harvest Moon or Animal Crossing you will love this game. It's a great combination of Harvest Moon and Final Fantasy. You get to farm and kill monsters. Not only that you get to marry someone and have a kid and that's not even all of it. After that you get to play your kid! It's amazing, it's so hard to put this game done. I wish they had this when I was a kid. It's a wonderful game and I highly recommend it.

I didn't think it was possible but this game has even better graphics than the first.
The characters have more personality and the game has less glitches.
It's just as fun as the first if not more, and I like the fact that you can play as a boy/girl (after marriage/child).
Overall recommended, addicting and a breath of fresh air.
summary: Just as fun as the first!

reviewText:
This product came in the original box, with all parts, manuals, stickers, and packing.

Product looks and works great. All the buttons and internal switches are working and easy to use and press.

Overall a great product and I recommend it to anyone looking to get a second or replacement guitar for Rock Band 2 on the PS3/PS2.

This is a really fun game for somebody who doesn't want to seriously get into drums and spend tons of money on a drum set. They take up a lot less room and you don't have to know what you're doing to play the games. Like most games, I played it for about a month or two and now it just sits there, but it did offer great quality time for the whole family.

This guitar is not much different than one that would come with the game.  It has a new skin on it which was nice for variety sake.

It performs great and has a clear connection.  It fits well in my hands and is easy to use.  Being new to the Rock Band games, I found I was able to pick up this guitar and learn pretty quick.

Easy, fun, and a blast to play.  I would recomend this guitar to fill out your band and fully enjoy this game!

After some mishaps with 3rd party guitars I paid the extra money to get this one and I'm very glad I did. It works very well, looks great and has a high quality feel to it. The improvements over the black and white version that came with Rock Band are hardly noticable other than the color, but that's not really any criticism.

This game is just as much fun as the first version, with just more songs. My friends always enjoy coming over to play it (we're in our 30s). If you like singing out tunes and playing with friends, then you have to own this game. Even my girlfriend, that doesn't like video games at all, is now hooked on this game.
summary: What a great game. Always a hit with my friends

reviewText: This game is absolutely awesome.  After you master one instrument, there is still more left over.  After you master all the songs on disc, there are still more songs left for you to play.  After you master playing single player, you can play with other players in a variety of game types.  This game is absolutely amazing.  Infinite fun!

The most fun you will have. A must have for anyone. Once you start playing you will not stop. You will have just as much fun playing by your self or with a group of people. I LOVE IT. Worth every penny.

I have the first Rock band so when the second one came out I was so excited to get it. It is so much fun. You can transfer songs from the first Rock Band onto the second one. You can also use the instruments from the first Rock Band to the second. It is worth the money. Fun Fun Game.

My son did not preorder this game and of course it sold out everywhere locally on release date. We ordered it that day and it was here a few days later. He and his friends are having a blast with this game. They tell me it is better than the first. Very pleased with this purchase.

We received this as a gift from my parents. It is a great way for our family to spend time together on the weekends. It is a shame that they are no longer making this for PS3 as everyone that comes over to our house and plays it wants to buy one!

This product was purchased as a Christmas gift for my son.  He loves how much more responsive the Rock Band 2 drum set is over the original.  The product is very well made and I expect it to last for a very long time.
summary: Rock Band 2 drum set is more responsive than the original

reviewText:
I bought RockBand2 for my son for Christmas.  Little did I know I would be sucked into the excitement of this game.  It is so much fun.  I play all instruments and sing every time I get the chance.  The drumset is sturdy and we've had no problems with it at all.
Total fun for the whole family!

This game is addicting. My wife and I purchased this after playing Rockband at my brother's house. My wife has never been one for video games, but she loves Rockband 2. The wireless drums are an added bonus. Playing with the original drums was a bit annoying, because you are limited with the wire. I highly suggest this product for those who enjoy gaming and still want to share with the family.

If you've played Rock Band, you've basically played Rock Band 2.  Aside from some new graphics and a good selection of new songs, the gameplay and all is the same.

That said, I thought the first Rock Band title was great!

If you like rhythm based games, and enjoy the songs featured on this disc, I'd highly recommend that you picked up a copy for yourself.
summary: Loads of fun - Prefer the graphics!

reviewText: My husband, my 4 year old and I play together and we all have a blast!  If you like music and/or games its a no brainer you would love this game.  The only dissapointment for me was the limited number of songs you have to choose from in the beginning.  I am still fairly new to the game, though, and there may be a way to play more (free) and I just haven't figured it out yet...

This is a great product. I bought it for my 14 year old daughter and before I knew it the whole family was having a blast. The instruments seem to be very sturdy. It gets played everyday weather my daughter is playing by herself or with another family member. It is a lot of fun and I would recommend it to anyone to play alone or with a crowd it is a blast.

Rock Band is so much fun for the whole family.  We can't stop playing it.  My 7 year old loves to play the guitar, my 9 year old daughter sings and my husband and I take turns on the drums.  It's a fun game for the whole family!

We've had such a great time with Rock Band 2.  This is our first Rock Band / Guitar Hero game and wish we had gotten one earlier.  This is great fun for the entire family.  There are four of us though, we have to get another guitar so all of us can play at the same time.

THIS GAME IS WHAT IVE BEEN LOOKING FOR.ITS BEEN AWHILE SINCE I PLAYED THIS. MY OTHER ONE BROKE. I HAVE BEEN PLAYING THIS FOR ABOUT A MONTH NOW AND IT WORKS GREAT.NO PROBLEMS.THIS IS WHAT I WANTED.EXCELLENT!!!!

This is one of my favourite games to play with other people.  I love both drums and guitar, but I'm sure most people know that the vocals is the hardest position to fill.  So usually it's two players.  I could always get another guitar, but I just haven't gotten around to it.

I love the Rock Band series. This entry in the series is bigger and better and so much more fun. Grab your guitar or drumsticks and go to town, or be brave and try to sing along to your favorite songs!
summary: Bolster your song library with this instant classic.

reviewText: This game is awesome! Originally the only music based game that I had was band hero. This game is WAY better! I love the songs, and because of this game I learned to love new songs that I never would have considered. I have never played rock band 1 so I can't compare, but everyone tells me that this is much better. The graphics on this game are really good. I will definitely be buying rock band 3!

There are many rhythm games out right now.  This is the best one I have played, they cleaned up some of the game mechanics that I disliked from Guitar Hero.  This was also the first one to do sets instead of single songs, which is fun.

Some friends and I play together occasionally and it is lots of fun.  This may be the most enjoyable coop game out there.

I bought this kit, along with an extra guitar, as a Christmas gift for my sister's kids a year or two ago. It was a huge hit. I've had a lot of fun playing it with them too, but I'm still not all that great of a player.
summary: This Was A HUGE Hit With The Kids

reviewText: Here's all you need to know about this game.  I'm 37 years old and a father of two.  When I bought this, I thought it was a blast.  One night, we broke this thing out during a party and we were up jamming until 3am.  What a blast.
summary: Most fun I've had in a while

reviewText: We bought this for our daughter for Christmas and she plays with it constantly(as do her parents). If you spend this much money on a gift for your kids, it oughta be fun for you too! It's pretty intuitive to use, and it's nice that you can add songs later as you progress.

I bought RB2 for my 16yr old daughter this past Christmas. I played Rock Band 1 one night with my friends and had a great time. Now, I am playing in a band with my daughter and her friends. This is alot of fun. Just like when my friends and I played in a metal band back in highschool.

I find this game a great way to widen the kids interest in music; playing along to most of the same music I listened to when I was their age.
summary: I got my band back together!

reviewText: There has never been a better sounding pair of headphones for this price.  The mic is very precise.  Perfect for dictating on your computer.  If you are an audiophile, you will be shocked at what they were able to achieve in this low-rent, Made in China model.
summary: There has never been a better sounding pair of headphones for this price

reviewText: The best gaming headset I've used, by far. The sound quality is what makes it stand out. Music and games sound amazing. I've tried many others over the years, but these sound so much better. I really wanted to go wireless, but the drop in sound quality of any wireless headset I've tried is too much right now (e.g. Steelseries)
summary: The best gaming headset I've used

reviewText: I have other game consoles but this is my favorite one.  The expanded memory and graphics makes it a very enjoyable game console to use.  The variety of games available and accessories are a big plus as well.  Some of the games I prefer are not found on other console systems.  I am very happy with the Xbox 360 and recommend it.

This was well worth the money!  I can actually write a few simple sentences in Japanese (Hiragana not Kanji yet)and I've only had this game for a month.  It is defintely an excellent tool.  I will not go so far as to say that you will not require additional lessons outside of this game to get the full experience of the Japanese language but if you don't want to drop 400 dollars for Rosetta Stone before you even know if you're up to learning Japanese this is the way to go!

Great product, worked perfectly!

Note: if you plan to install FreeMCBoot, you will need a genuine ps2 memory card manufactured by Sony. If you are using a cheap chinese cloned MC, then you will get an install error and won't be able to install until you have an official MC.

Official Sony memory cards:
http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00006F2EP/ref=oh_aui_detailpage_o00_s00?ie=UTF8&psc=1

I just recently saw the movie so I decided to purchase this game.  I must say that I really enjoyed it a lot.  The game is not a movie tie-in instead it's based off the Bolt TV show.  You get to play as both Bolt and Penny in over 20 missions.  The gameplay controls are easy to pick up and the voice acting is terrific.  I really enjoyed the story and several of the missions.  If you enjoyed the film I would highly recommend trying out the demo to see if this game is for you.

I bought this game for my 5 and 9 year old girls.  I was horrified to discover that most of the game was about shooting bad guys.  There was nothing cute, or sweet, or about the story line of the movie.  I returned it.

As a huge Disney fan who likes to sing, I was so excited to get DISNEY SING IT.  The problem was there's a 1.5 second delay between when you sing and when your voice comes out of the speakers.  I got so frustrated and irritated that I returned it the next day. Do not waste your money or time on this game!
summary: BEWARE: Audio delay! I returned it.

reviewText: I bought this for my grandson for Christmas. I wanted to get him a new game, but was unsure as to what to get. This looked fun for a five year old, and he picked it up and played right away! It turned out to be a good choice!

I bought this for my 5 year old granddaughter at the time. she enjoyed this game. she complained that it wasn't a multiplayer game. she likes playing with her brother in all games. but I didn't check this out personally to know the answer. but as far as the game is concerned, she likes it very much. quick shipping, good price

This is, BY FAR, my 7-year-old's favorite Christmas present.
In fact, his older brothers (9 and 10) ALSO love to play this game.
I don't know much about it, except that it is the most popular game in our house.  I thought it was a little too expensive, but I got it anyway, knowing that my kids love Club Penguin!

I bought this game for my 9 year old granddaughter for Christmas to go with her new DSI.  She played it for two days until she finally "beat it." Once she started playing it, she wasn't interested in opening any of the other games she received.  She said it was the best game she ever played. There were a couple times she got stuck and had to go online for tips.  But she loved this game.

I got this for my 14-year-old sister for her birthday. She's a huge Disney fan.  This was a great game for her. It has a variety of songs from all the shows and stars from Disney Channel. She also wants to be a singer. This will help with her because the game tells you how well you're singing the song. A great game with hours of fun. I even enjoy playing the game with her.

We bought this game for our 9 year old daughter for Christmas. However our 7, 4 and 3 year olds love it as well. They've heard most of the songs a million times so they know the songs by heart for the most part. It's a lot of fun watching them sing. Even my husband and I play with them.

I bought this game for my child after seeing some other kids play it.  It has been a lot of fun.  We have a mix of children in and out of our house, and it's a blast to watch the boys and the girls dancing with this game.  The songs are catchy, and the game keeps the kids constantly moving.  Give it a try.  You'll be hooked!

My daughters loved this game.  It took them only a short time to "beat" the game but when they went back to play it again they realized that there's a lot more detail to it than they initially noticed.  A year later and they still go back and play the game to "play the details."

I bought this game for my 8 years old daughter and she absolutely loves it! It has been a year later and she is still playing this game as it has more levels than anticipated and a lot of activities to keep her entertained.

This item was purchased as a gift for my 6yr old daughter who recently got a DS from a friend.  She didn't know much about using the DS or playing games on it.  This game seemed a little challenging for her to play at first but kept her attention.  She has now figured it out and loves it.

I purchased this set for my son for his Xbox game.  There was a problem with the fan in the system and this was a very good part it came with instructions from the seller and so far the game has been working perfectly.  We installed it ourselves as it came with step-by-step instructions which were very easy to read.  We purchased this about two months ago and have no problems with the game since.

After purchasing this game and trying everything possible to make it work, I have a game which is useless to me. It will not run on my laptop or desktop. After speaking 4 times with Phantom support, they tell me I need a 3D graphics card to run the game. They also said I couldn't return it. No wonder why many companies are going out of business. Shame on you Phantom...

I love the newspaper Jumbles, so I couldn't wait for this game to come out.  I have really enjoyed playing it. I would recommend this for anyone who is a fan of Jumbles.  There are 3 different games on it.  Each one is really good.

Jumble Madness is just one of those games you can just keep playing. It is just like the ones in the daily paper. I had my DS for 2 years now and my wife would never play it, she's just not into video games. I showed her this game and she loves it. We do the puzzles together all the time. This game is definitely worth buying.

As a snowboarder, I feel this may be the best snowboarding game made yet. I think people who don't really snowboard or who only stick to the terrain parks may not appreciate the game to the fullest. It does take a loooooong time to get into some of the more interesting challenges and some of them are extremely difficult-- but that is a good thing!

I bought this game for my wife and she is LOVES this game.  She said it was a bit difficult to learn the controls at first but once she got through the first level she had it figured out pretty quick.  She enjoys the feeling of it being all one big puzzle, as well as the adventure.  I will say she HATES shooting games so when she had to shoot a couple of Tigers that seemed to disturb her.  However, overall she really enjoys playing this game.

What a waste of my money.  I am a huge fan of the Nancy Drew games, but his wasn't even close to those.  I had the same problems as lots of others and had to go their web site to download something to even get the game to work.  Once I got it working, it took me a while to figure out how to maneuver between the brothers.  I barely got started with the game and lost interest.  I haven't even finished it, and I have no desire to.  Don't waste your money on this game.  What a disappointment.

I was very disappointed in this game.  I did not enjoy the structure of it or the way it played.  I was expecting it to be like the Nancy Drew games and it is no where near the level of those games.  I will not buy one of these games again.  If you are a fan of the Nancy Drew games, you will be disappointed by this game.

Don't waste your time with this game. You will be disappointed. If you buy the bundle with headset you will not be able to trade or sell that game to GameStop or places like Hastings if you don't like game. There are much better shooters out there with a whole lot more replay value than this one. The bluetooth headset it comes with is great otherwise.

I am an adult and I really like this game.  It's not a shooter; it's a puzzle/turn-taking fighting game.
