I am about to start the last battle, but I decided not to move forward because there are so many side games and extra possibilities.  I want to accomplish them all before I finish the story.  I have been playing for many, many hours.
summary: This Is a Fun, Long Game

reviewText: I have also played the previous games in this series and enjoyed them as well. However, I didn't feel like there were many new features added to this game, as I find the first Disgaea much more enjoyable. This game was still fun to play and the elements of the first game that made me liked the series is present in this one as well. I still give this 5 stars because if it was a stand-alone game, it would be great. It just doesn't compare to its predecessors.
summary: Great game... just not the best in the series

reviewText: This is simply the best SRPG on the market today. If you own a PS3 and love SRPG's (strategy role playing games) then you simply owe it to yourself to buy this product. The downloadable content for the game adds in characters from previous games as well.

Disgaea 3 takes all of the mechanics from previous Disgaea games and perfects them. It is by far the most well thought out and most fun to play of the whole series. The combat is extremely deep and challenging, and the characters are interesting and fun to watch.

Disgaea 3 takes everything learned in making Disgaea 1 and 2 and uses that knowledge to create the best game in the series.

I bought this for my boyfriend for Christmas.  I can't give too many details because I haven't actually played it myself, but he loves it. He has a real snowmobile and rides whenever possible. This game is very realistic and a lot of fun.  I would highly recommend it to anybody who loves snowmobiles or racing games.

This search-and-solve game is best of its kind. It's got good graphics and replay value. It's also long enough to keep you occupied for quite some time. The story line is simple, but if you like hidden object games, you'll love this!
summary: One of the best ds games I've played

reviewText: Purchased this game for my wife for Christmas and, so far, she has enjoyed every minute she plays it...which is often.  She loves having to sift through clues to solve the different puzzles etc.  I would recommend this game to all who love to solve puzzles.

The game is fun to play I had no problems with it at all. Some things are hidden very well and some things are just right there so it is easy for younger children to play. I played it while my grandchildren were home for the holidays and we all got involved in the game. It is a great game and I would recommend this game to all.

This game is fantastic.  It is challenging, fun, entertaining and it keeps you totally focused.  Some of the puzzles are hard, but it is the player who makes it that way.  We tend to overthink.  If you remember to keep it simple it will help.
This game is really great for all ages!  My daughter LOVES it!

This game was recommended to me by a good friend and I purchased it.  I just love it.  In fact, I like it so much, I purchased another one for a co-worker and she can't stop thanking me.  She really enjoys it, too.

This game is great. I play it all the time. I can't stop. The only thing bad about this game is that it is too addicting.  I find myself staying up late at night trying to finish searching for the items.  I do however wish that the transition from the different puzzles was faster. I don't like having to read the story line before I can move on to a new puzzle.  I do highly recommend this game for hours and hours of fun.

I love this game! I couldn't wait to get home from work and play it. My husband who doesn't like playing with my Nintendo DS, had fun looking for one of the items that I couldn't find. It took me 3 weeks to complete it. Now that I'm done I feel kind of lost. You'll enjoy this game.

I loved this game. Always a big fan of puzzles, this didn't disappoint. Fun way to relax after a stressful day at work. I too am middle aged, and prefer using my stylus to play games. I also highly recommend Professor Layton as well.

I remember playing the original on the Super Nintendo and I would have been satisfied with just a port. But the developers went the extra mile and added lots of content to give us our money's worth. If you can find a decent price for it, then definitely buy this!
summary: I bought this for the nostalgia and was not disappointed!

reviewText:
This game is so much fun - I have a difficult time putting it down!

Most of the game consists of finding articles in a very cluttered room, but it also throws in some interesting puzzles in between.

I have played it for about 12 hours so far and the story just keeps going.

You can not go wrong buying this game - it is addictive!

This is a fun, quick game. It's the type of game that you can play through and go back to months later and play again without getting bored of it.

The game is only mildly challenging, but is that why we play Kirby? It's just a fun game - the characters are great and so is the music.

My 6 year old son is almost done with it and he LOVED it!!  It took him about 10 days to get thru it....but he says he plans on playing it again.  My 8 year old daughter is playing it too and she says "it's awesome!!!!"  Bought it used and my son had no problem figuring it all out.

My son picked this game out for his 6th birthday.  He loves it!  He has played the original Kirby on my old NES system, so was familiar with the basics of the game, but this game is so much more!  He got other games for his birthday, but has not opened them because he is having too much fun with KSSU.  Many of the DS games are too complex or quick for a 6 year old, but this is perfect.  I tried it too and thought it was fun.
summary: Easy enough for young kids, entertaining for all ages

reviewText:
This game is really a blast from the past. It plays just like the old Kirby Super Star on SNES, a game I hunted down a SNES for just to play again after beating it several times at my friend's house.

It never gets old.

There's so much to do and so much replayability just because there are so many games in one. For fans of old-school platforming and a jolly good time, I'd highly suggest you pick this one up for your DS collection.

I bought this game for my 5 and 6 year old sons.  It is one of their favorite games and they constantly are finding new things that keep them intrigued and interested.  They are big fans of Mario Bros. and Mario Go Kart, but this is different enough that it complements the other games.  I would highly recommend it.

The game is very good and addictive. With all three games you can go from game to game. I've had this game for a day still like it. The variety is good. If you like puzzle games, this is for you. The solitaire is similiar to tri-peaks solitaire. This is good for all those addicted to mahjong. I like being able to use the touch screen for games like this. It makes it a little easier than with a mouse like the online games. You can make quicker matches.

This game is addictive! I especially like the solitare. I have spent hours playing this game. I only wish the cards were bigger because after a while it strains my eyes and I have to put it down. It is one of those games that you can just crawl into and lose track of time.

I have been playing this for a few weeks and it is so addictive, I can not stop playing.  I just want to go on to the next level, and when I get there it's the same thing just want to get through to the next.

My husband and I recently purchased the Quest Trio.  We love it.  The only problem we have is sharing.  My husband loves the Jewel Quest portion the best and I love the Majhong portion the best.  It is nice to have a game that we both enjoy, although we may have to buy another one so that we can both play our favorite parts at the same time.

I love this game.  I've had it for about a month (maybe a little longer).  It's definitely addicting and I play it at some point everyday.  I'm not crazy about the back-story that the game includes between levels; it seems a little disjointed at times, but I'm not playing for the story, I'm playing for fun - and it is fun!

Great for my four year old! This game reminds me of the games I played in the 90s. Straightforward and easy to get the hang of. There are even arrows on the screen directing you which way to go and the instructions for what to do are on the first level so you know what buttons to push!! Very happy.
summary: 4 year old can play!! Easy to learn!

reviewText: The game itself is pretty hard. I've looked up the reviews and read that the game is very short. Those reviewers don't know anything about this game. This game is too damn hard to 100%. It's a must buy.
summary: Greatest game in the Wario franchise.

reviewText: This game is excellent, all the things you love from a Mario/Wario game.  I loved Super Mario Land III: Wario Land and this game is so much more.  Wario has awesome super moves, the graphics are second to none and the gameplay is just downright awesome.  I would recommend this game to everyone looking for an awesome platform game is classic/new Mario/Wario style.  It's games like these that I am so glad to have a Wii.

My 4 1/2 year old loves this game, though he can't do the boss battles.  I have to do those for him.  The nice thing about this game is that even if you are fairly unskilled you can complete the level, but there's still a challenge for advanced players - trying to get all the extras.  If you have a young kid who has an older sibling or adult to get him through the boss battles they will probably love it.

Great looking and fun game.

Really great game.  Definitely challenging and frustrating at times, but the combat and story are solid.  I'd recommend it to anyone who likes RPGs.

The graphics are definitely dated (pushing 10 years) and the PS2 doesn't hold up to the PS4 or PC games, but if you can get past that you'll have a great time in the game.
summary: Ten Years After Release, Still Good

reviewText: Persona 4 is up there with Persona 3 in my personal video game hall of fame. It builds upon everything that was established in Persona 3. Social links are improved, characters seem more real in a sense that you might catch feelings for them. Music is still top notch and gameplay is vastly improved in Persona 4, giving you more things to do throughout the day. The plot is immersive and compelling. In the end, Persona 4 is a step up from the already amazing Persona 3.

Amazing game, it was so cool to have the soundtrack along with it. I could play this one for days, such a nice combat system compared to Persona 3. You'll want to get every bit you can out of this game, it's incredibly fun. It's a shame that the final bit is so hidden from everything else, and that you have to play through the game multiple times for some features. All in all, it's worth your time and it has a proper voice actor for Chie.

Fantastic! One of the best RPGs I've ever played. Part sim, part old-school dungeon RPG. Story is engaging, characters are well developed. Battle-system is well developed and engaging. Would recommend to any RPG fan.
summary: Fantastic! One of the best RPGs I've ever played

reviewText: Disc worked for a few minutes, then froze and never worked again. I thought it was my PS2, butI tried it with other games and it worked. The seller gave me a malfunctioning disc, I think, but I'm not sure. I know I have a game that doesn't work, and should.
summary: Disc worked for a few minutes, then froze and ...

reviewText: Fantastic game. If you like Persona, you will love this game. Its a cross between a high-school sim and a dungeon crawler. Interesting characters and plot-line, monsters that draw from all kinds of lore... Basically a really good game. A very good follow up to Persona 3.
summary: Fantastic game. If you like Persona

reviewText: Fantastic game. I see why my friends insisted it was a classic. The art was a bit different than other anime-style games I've played before, but I got used to it fairly quickly. The only thing I wish would be that it came with the option to play with Japanese audio (unless it does, and I just can't find it?).
summary: Fantastic game. I see why my friends insisted it ...

reviewText: After years of playing Persona 3 I didn't sincerely believe I could connect to another game on the same level but Persona 4 proved me wrong! Hands down one of the greatest J-RPGs of all time, and to think we've been blessed enough to have it localized for NA/EU! Whether you've played J-RPGs in the past or this is your first rodeo you can rest assured, you will have a blast, so see you in Inaba!
summary: One of the greatest J-RPGs of all time!

reviewText: I was really excited when I got this game. I've never played any of the Shin Megami Tensei games and I heard about the Persona series from some friends. Currently, my playtime is about 38 hours since I got it a few weeks ago (I still got to keep up with my own schoolwork and knowledge skill), and I can't pinpoint a day I was playing that I was bored by the game. It's a new type of game to me. I love it and I would definitely recommend Persona 4 for anyone who hasn't picked up a Persona game before.

I have never played a rpg game like World of Warcraft, Oblivion and all those, so keep in mind i have nothing to base this off.

So for a first timer, i think this game has a lot to offer and is very intriguing. I have been playing pc and console games for many many years and only a couple have really grabbed my attention and actually had me thinking about them and waiting to get back to my PC.

I feel this game is great for a newb to get introduced to rpg games and overall is a great game.
summary: Very good and fun for a newb

reviewText:
This game is pretty much bad in every way possible. It tries to combine a platformer with a shooter - and fails at both. The platforming is dull, dumbed down and doesn't feel fluid at all. The shooter part simply feels tacked on. The cutscenes and graphics are awful. The story is boring..., the list could go on and on.
The only thing that this game has going for it is the steampunk setting, but it does nothing to really draw you into it.
Bottom line -  stay away from this

I went back and bought MW1 and MW3 since I already had MW2. My son suggested that I play all three in order to get the complete story and I'm glad he did. I really enjoyed this game and would recommend it to anyone.
summary: My son suggested that I play all three in order to get the complete story and I'm glad he did

reviewText: I have been playing Call of Duty games since the first one came out.  Hadn't bought one for a long time.  Some of the new war games are very intense, and I wasn't sure I wanted this one.  I wish I had bought it sooner.  These are games I replay occasionally.  Great for first shooter enthusiasts who don't want so much intensity your head explodes, but want the challenge.

This is a great game. It is a first player game with great graphics and sound. I would recommend this to someone who likes fast action games with great graphics. Delivery was fast. Packaging was great. Price was great.

This game never gets old. I am not a very good computer gamer, but this game is teaching me how to do WASD gaming. The gameplay is challenging but still a lot of fun. If you are a fan of shooter games, I would recommend this game.

I never understood the obsession with the Call of Duty franchise, but now that I've played this game, I'm hooked! No worries, I don't play it day and night or anything, but it is definitely a very, very fun game. The campaign is also intense - you just want to keep playing because the gameplay is addictive and challenging, and there's actually a storyline to it rather than just mindlessly shooting "enemies."

If you have not played Call of Duty before, I highly recommend this game. Super fun.

One of the best games of all time for many. I cannot argue with that.

From Call of Duty 3 to Modern Warfare, the jump between time periods is big and the changes between both are huge. I cannot even say how differently they are from each other and how much they have improved. The game is amazing.

Online play (at this point) on the otherhand, I have to disagree. It's far too "dead" with barely enough people to play in one game.
summary: The breakout game of the Call of Duty series

reviewText: I am a little behind the times when it comes to video games.  This one is a few years old, but it is great.  I don't have a top of the line video card, and the graphics still look great.  I am enjoying this game very much.  The vendor who shipped it shipped exactly what was listed in the sale.  Very happy with them.

My kid has all of the Call of Duty games.  He likes this one, but the one he is REALLY drawn to is Call of Duty 2.  No idea why.  However, due to his enthusiasm for all of these games, I would recommend this game as well.

This is possibly the BEST Call of Duty title of all time. The PC version has the ability to create MODS and with so many mods, there is still much activity on the old servers. I still play this game, ever since it came out. If you are looking for a good paintball game for PC, check this out for the paintball mods it has. Still one of the best shooters of all time.
summary: One of the Best FPS of all time

reviewText: After almost three years, I still play this game every week online.  It is so much better than all the other COD series and I own them all.  This is the best multi-player online game I have ever played.  It is intense and it is fun.  You get to do battles with players from other parts of the world.  It is also fun to throw a LAN party when you can get enough players.  If you are a gamer, you need to get this game.  It is #1 on my list even after all these years.

We already owned Call of Duty Modern Warfare 2.  We wanted to go back in time to try the other offerings.  We knew it would not be as feature rich as the most current version but for what it is, and when it was released, it is a really good game.  If you don't have the latest, go there first, and come back when it gets a little old.  We still enjoyed it but have now gone back to the most recent version.
summary: Good Game if you like Call of Duty

reviewText: I have played this for xbox 360 since launch as far as multiplayer goes, i have recently upgraded my computer and decided to get this, and i have enjoyed it like i have on the 360, its a great game and would recommend it to anyone for any platform.

This is the second game pack that I bought by this company.  The first one was a 4-pack and when I began to load it, my virus software came on and said the cd-rom was infected.  I removed it right away and returned it to Amazon.  This one had encryption errors on two of the games, after getting those, I boxed it back up and sent it back to Amazon.  Needless to say, I'm disappointed in this company.

This game is not worth the money to buy, or even rent.  My kids played it for 30 minutes, then moved on to something else.  Not only is it boring, but it is hard to understand how to use the remote to play the games.  We were hoping it would be similar to wii sports, but no comparison whatsoever.

If I could give it zero stars I would.  As someone said, you don't actually play the game you play things that, allegedly, are part of the game.  You know how some games have tutorials that you run through before you get to the good stuff?  That is what this is.  Without the good stuff.
summary: If it were free, it would still not be worth it.

reviewText: this is at best an arcade game, and a bad one at that. I just paid $39.95 for this game and i am going to trade it in at game stop for whatever i can get for it. i am also going to call customer service and complain. this game has been inaccurately described and marketed by the company as a sports game. it simply is not.
summary: how could there be a worse game?!?!

reviewText: This is probably one of the worst games I have played in a long time... the controls are so counter-intuitive that it makes me wonder how it ever made it past testing. The images are dark and blurry. You would figure that given the nature of the Wii controls and its possible uses, this game would have been a blast... so the contrary. I would not recommend this title to anyone.

I'm a huge Street Fighter fan and have been plying the game since it's original release back in the days of arcades. The online multiplayer feature is pretty weak and setting up controllers is a major hassle. Other than that I love the game. Can't recommend it enough for those who like Street Fighter.

I really like this game it is a challenge and very fun to play. I like how you can change the color of your outfit. The music is also very good and love the artwork in this game it's very nice. You won't be wasting your money if you buy this game.
summary: Very fun game and challenging game!

reviewText: I have been a flight simulator enthusiast for several years now. This program is a welcomed addition. The manual that comes with the product is well written, informative & full of ideas how to make your flight experience better. I highly recommend it & know if you purchase it you won't regret it.

I bought this game as a reward for my best friend's 7 year old son.  He's had the game for about a week now and everyday he tells me just how much he loves it and about all the different levels.  I'm not a computer freak or crazy gamer...I am a mom who can see how happy this kid is with the game.  In about a month I will update my review...we will see how the game does over time.
summary: My 7 year old loves this game....

reviewText: I bought this game for my grandchildren to play at Thanksgiving.  It proved to be quite a challenge even for the adults to find everything.  My only complaint with the game is that you can't proceed to the next step until you have found ALL the items listed.  Some of them are quite difficult.  And there is no hints or help list available.  But all in all, the game was a success.  The mini games proved to be quite challenging also.

I loved it. It seems like it would be good for the 9+ age group. I thought I could do it with my almost 6 y.o. son, but it was too hard for him. I, on the other hand, LOVED it (and I'm not a gamer). I liked the challenge.
summary: Bought it for my son, but ended up playing it WAY more than him!

reviewText: This game is a great group participation game. It is a lot like the books but it is additionally fun because there are games and clues you must create by doing things. I have a 7 year old and a 4 year old who can play together and they love it. It is easy enough for the 7 year old to do on his own, but it is also fun and sometimes tricky enough to involve adults in the clues for help etc. I think this is a well set up game.

We have been playing this game non-stop since Christmas, and now it's almost June.  The best thing is that we all can play it  2 adults, a 6 year old and a 4 year old.  It's challenging and fun.  If you love I Spy Books, you'll love this.
I review games on YouTube. If you want to see more of my reviews go to youtube.com/wiiviewr.
summary: A great game for kids young and old.

reviewText: I bought this for my 8 yr old son who likes to play Magic Pen on the computer.  But he found this game too difficult and I found it frustrating.  Sometimes you can't draw a line for unknown reasons, and it's hard to know which way you are supposed to be going.  It's not a game I would recommend.

From the bad graphics, controls, and lack of any idea of what is going on, this game gets a zero in my opinion.  I drew a line and got stuck under it and could not move.  I would not recommend this game to anyone.

My sister and I bought this game years ago and still play it occasionally. She is 14 and I am 22 and we both enjoy it. There is plenty to do within the game so it does not get boring. It also works on the Wii U if anyone was curious.

This is a great follow up on the Wolfenstein story.  Wolfenstein 3D was my first 3D game in the early 90's and was the first computer game I'd played that actually would startle me from time to time.  When Return to Castle Wolfenstein came out a few years back, I snatched it up and have played it through many times since.

This game was an unexpected surprise and I've enjoyed it very much.

This copy of Wolfenstein isn't what I wanted.  It is not like the original and that's what I expected.  If it ever comes out like the original, I would certainly buy it.  I have been looking for it a long time.

I bought this game for my 11 year old stepdaughter and she loves it! Lots of fun if you are into the role playing game where you control the world and characters around you. She plays it everyday since it's a time sensitive game that you need to keep up with. Our house is very happy with this game.

Download the 1.1 patch, then the 1.11 patch to kill the Single Player bugs described in some of the other reviews.

I got a really good deal on this because it was nearly half-off before the 1.11 patch came out.

Love this game! I am 35 years old and have had it for a few days so far. It's addicting for sure! The only thing about it I don't care for is that only one person can play at a time so I have to fight my kids for my turn. It's a good sit back and relax non-stressful game which I love. The characters are adorable. It's set up like a sims game where you live in your own town and work and earn money etc. Deffinatly worth the 35$!!

My daughter had read the book in the Goosebump series and this was one of her favorite ones. When I discovered it in game form, I had to get it for her. She loves it. Very easy to play, but challenging enough to keep her engaged.

I purchased this game for my daughter last year for Christmas when I bought her a Wii. I think it looks really fun. My daughter loves it. This is what she has to say about it...
  I think that it is really fun and addictive. I enjoy being able to design your person's house and harvest crops. I wish you could let your person get a more permenant job. I highly reccommend this game because it is really fun, is not slow on your Wii and the features are really fun.
summary: This is really a step up from Animal Crossing DS!

reviewText: I bought this game for the heck of it.  I watched a preview of it on the Nintendo site and thought it was very cute and looked like fun.  I am way too old to be playing this, but I love it and it keeps me entertained. So I guess what I am saying, is it is fun for everyone at any age.  Go on the Wii Nintendo site and play it for five minutes before buying.  You'll see for yourself.

This is a great game.  It can be simple and fun, or you can challange yourself and make the game more complex.  It's cute and allows you to do so many things with your character, your city, and your house.  I am not one that gets obsessed over a game, but I play this all the time.  Also, by adding the Wii Speak, I can go to my friends towns and play and we can have a regular conversation with each other as if we are in the same house.  This is great for all ages.

I bought this game after reading the reviews. I had never heard of this game series before and I was intrigued after stumbling upon it on Amazon.

My first impression was that it was kind of stupid. However, the more I played it, the more fun it got. Then I read more about it on various websites and learned that there is so much more that you can do in this game. And the more I played, the more I discovered. It is really cool. I can't wait for the seasons to change to discover more!!!

Very unique RPG, it tries a lot of new things and is very involving.  The gameplay can be a bit confusing at times, but once you get the hang of it, it is awesome.

Please note that you definitely need to install this game to your hard drive in order to enjoy it.  That is no big deal though, takes less than 10 minutes.

Very cool game.

Thought I would give this game a try since it was a very good price. I was not disappointed. I am in my early 30's, and even though I have not seen all of the movies that are in the game, it was still fun to play. My boys that are both under 8 years old like to play too, even though they are mostly guessing. I hope they come out with a kid version.

LOVE this game.  I bought this for my husband for Christmas, more for me than for him. I got him the xbox and wanted a game besides NCAA Football in the house!!!  We love this game so much.  We play it all the time and it's so much fun.  Very easy to use, I would suggest getting the controllers, they are worth it.

No long-winded review needed.

Simply the most fun I've ever had gaming.  Twice the fun with a friend.  A second Wii motion plus is an absolute must.

If you have a Wii, buy this game.  If you don't, buy a Wii and this game.

You'll be playing this one for years.

DO NOT BUY-

It was an okay game, but it is ONLY PLAYABLE ONLINE and the SERVERS ARE OFF.

I bought this game a couple years ago, but thought people may be picking it up for the holidays.

I repeat - DO NOT BUY THIS. IT IS NOT PLAYABLE ANYMORE.

There is NO offline mode and you will have wasted your money for a plastic disc.
summary: There is NO offline mode and you will have wasted your money for a plastic disc

reviewText: Haven't gotten very far into this game, but so far it is cute and fun and pretty intricate. Pretty good plot and story line which makes it interesting and time consuming. I was recommended this game by a friend and I recommend it as well.

The online servers have been shut down for several months now and there is absolutely no point in getting this game since it does not have a single player campaign. Honest to God, I don't know why amazon is still selling this thing considering how support for this game has officially come to an end.

At one point this game was really fun to play but now at this point it serves absolutely no purpose. If you never got to play MAG then you missed out on some good times.
summary: As Everyone Has Said, Don't Buy It.

reviewText: Do not buy this game. This game is online only which is fine..except for the part where the servers that host this game no longer exist. The game will not even boot since the servers were turned off. The only use you will ever get from this game is if you need a handy coaster.
summary: This game is no longer supported and will not boot.

reviewText: We liked the original Wii Sports as a family game and then decided this may be a nice addition to the game library and we were right. This adds several new options and brings the Wii Sports to a new level. We are hardly going back to the original Wii Sports now that we had played this title.

I bought this game for my workaholic bf, he loves this game. He will stay up all night playing this game online with other people, I think the graphics are great, this is the first time in a long time that he actually sat down and enjoyed his ps3 that he rarely played.

I bought my Xbox about 3 weeks ago and it gets very hot so I bought the Intercooler. The only problem is that it does not fit the new Xbox model. If you have recently purchased an Xbox, do not buy it because it does not fit. I'll be returning this item.

I had another fan on my xbox for years and it worked great.  I picked up a 2nd xbox and decided to get two new fans.  This one is supposed to keep cooling even when the xbox turns off.  It turns off even when the xbox is on and hot!  I have never had my xbox shut off due to heat until I plugged in this fan this week.

Don't risk your xbox with this product.  I am going to throw this one away and buy another product that actually works!

I have only had this product for 5 days.
summary: It keeps turning off when the xbox is running and killing my xbox

reviewText: With the Call of Duty's of the world dominating the market it's nice to see a game that tries something different. Don't buy MAG if you just want to run around and shoot people. MAG isn't for everyone but if you want a great team based shooter then you are in the right place,

I was never interested in video games until I saw someone playing this at my brother's house last year. I enjoyed it so much I bought a Wii for myself as soon as I returned home from vacation. Fun, fun, fun!

I'm not much of a gamer but I like to play the PSP when I'm watching TV.  I bought this game because of all of the reviews and without a doubt it was the best game I've ever played.  It was real hard and took me forever to finish.  It had a tons of levels and they were all challenging. It's a great game and it was totally worth the money.
summary: Best Video Game I've Ever Owned

reviewText: If you liked Logan's Shadow and Dark Mirror you will like this game. It is a fun shooter game with tons of non stop action. The play and feel is identical to Shadow and Mirror. I have had this game for about a week and play it a couple of hours a day. It was definitely worth the price.

My son and I have enjoyed playing this.  This gives us something we can do together and have fun.  These games are easy for me to play as I do not have much experience playing the more difficult games.  We have enjoyed playing these games.  Very happy with purchase!

This is by far the greatest game out there for the PSP. It reminded of the joy I had the first computer game I ever played- Doom. It's just plain fun with a great background story and lots of things to kill. I played the whole game in Normal mode and while it's definitely hard in parts, and frustratingly difficult toward the end of the game, it can be completed which is always great. I was also pleasantly surprised with how long the game was- it just kept going and going. Truly a magnificent game.

This game is very good except for one thing i don't like. Some times when something insane is happening they barely talk and when they do its very soft so you cant hear anything! But this game is very fun and can be challenging. I also like the variety of weapons. So I would give this game a 9.9 if i could.

We are a family of four - mom, dad, two boys ages 12 and 8. We all love Wii Sports Resort! There are plenty of fun choices of various games to play. The games are simple enough for the younger child in the family, and challenging enough for the competitive adult. It is great for family time, and for getting us all up and moving.

This is exactly what I needed in a cooler. It turns on and off automatically, it's much quieter than any other I've seen (well, heard), and it works great. It also doesn't have the very widely known problem that the EX has, which could void your warranty, because it uses it's own power supply. If you're going to get one cooler for your 360, this is the one. The only downside-it doesn't come in black, so it looks kind of funny hanging on the back of my Elite.

This is a great game!  It has enough challenges to keep you coming back for more.  I've been using it for over a month now and I still haven't even scratched the tip of the iceberg.  Nintendo has really created a well-rounded game that has a little something for everyone!

My 9 year old son got this for his birthday and then proceeded to play it for 4 hours until he was forced to go to bed.  It is an easy game to pick up and play unlike Super Mario Bros.  We love the basketball games and the sword games.  This game is kind of like Wii fit.  Once you finish a game, new games become unlocked for you to play.  The 38, 13, and 9 year olds in my family have really enjoyed playing this game.  This is a great game for family fun night.
summary: My new favorite wii game for our family

reviewText: This is one of the best games I have ever played!  There was a learning curve involved, as well as a lot of laughter when Mom's whole body got into maneuvering the Wiimote.  I found myself 'drawing' the bow slowly, just like a real bow.  I learned that I can't throw a frisbee any better in the digital world than I can in real life.  In short, it is a wonderful way to spend time if you have to be indoors!!

I do not play video games, but I play the Wii.  I liked it so much that I gave it as a Christmas present this year.  I can see how it could get repetitive and I would love it if they came up with more vocal praise rather that going back and forth between 2-3 different comments!  That's what would make it annoying in my opinion.  Overall, I liked the variety and I can make it a workout if I want to.  Enjoy!

I just got the game today, the release date.  I brought the game home and had to do updates for the last 30 minutes.  I finally get to the point where I can play the game and the network is down and the game is unplayable.  This is an online only game!!!  If the server is down on the very first day, I just bought a game I cannot play. I have now been trying to play for the last 2 hours and still nothing! Thanks sony another great ps3 title!
summary: What game, I just bought a problem!

reviewText: This game has been the most fun I have had compared to most other Wii games.  I am not crazy about the wakeboarding game but the rest of the games are just fun and I mean fun for all ages!  Out of 5 stars, I gave it a five but I would really love to give it a 10.  Great bundle for a great price.

I love this game.  I like the motion plus feature.  It is one of those games where you stay up all night and play it as soon as you get home.  My favorite game is the Island Fly Over.  I totally recommend it.

I bought this for my grandson's birthday and he absolutely loves it. Not only is it fun but it is perfect for an active young person. He has several of the Wii games and all of them are in constant use in his household. The whole family enjoys them.

This game is pretty fun for all ages, including preschool-aged kids.  Not all of the games are easy enough for a preschooler, and not all of the games are interesting for adults.  But with so many activities and variations available, you can find something fun to do with your whole family.

This is a great family game! The first night we bought it we ended up playing it for 4 hours straight. A big plus to this game is that there is something for everyone. My favorite was the archery-it felt realistic! My husband loved the cycling. With so many choices of games you can play for hours without getting bored!
summary: Great Game-a must have for the Wii!

reviewText: My family has had this game for a week now and we love it!  Its incredibly addictive.  Our faves are table tennis, cycling, swordplay and frisbee.  All of the games are fun.  You won't necessarily work up a good sweat like you do in EA Active, but you will have a lot of fun and you will be moving.  This is one of our fave Wii games.

After jacking with my XBox and watching a million YouTube videos about how to "fix" my DVD player, I finally validated the manufacturer of the original DVD reader and purchased a new one.  The replacement DVD reader arrived within a few days, and I was easily able to replace the circuit on the new DVD reader with the circuit from the original.  I have been playing Halo ever since!  Warning: you need to make sure that the manufacturer of the original DVD you order matches the original one.

I was never really into karaoke, but I love this game.  It is very easy to use and a ton of fun. My family plays it almost every Friday night. There is a wide variety of music, so there is something for everybody.

This game is a lot of fun. It's easiest to play with just a couple of friends--larger groups make it hard for everyone to get a turn. You can try having multiple people share the microphone, but it's difficult to make sure everyone's voice is registering.

This Singstar game is a lot of fun, and the microphones work well. They are also very sturdy, and they have a good weight in your hand, so a player really feels like they are a singing star! The microphones are easy to set up, and they can be used for the Playstation 2 or Playstation 3 versions of the game. I'm glad I bought them here because I got them for less than I would have in a game boutique. Good product, good value.

Honestly, I didn't expect much from this game, and I bought it only because I needed my fix of RPG's; yet I got much more than what I bargained for: a fun battle system, beautiful soundtrack and gorgeous art (pretty much at the same level as Ni no Kuni's). I'm liking the game so much I'm not getting rid of it so I could revisit it again in the not so far future.

This game's story is a little confusing, but overall a fantastic game. The animated art is great, although the look isn't for everyone. The music is wonderful, as expected from a game about classical composer and pianist Frederic Chopin.  Fantastic combat system, varied characters with different fighting styles and magic, amazing music.  I can't recommend this game enough.

I originally played this game for the first time on the 360 when it was released. I have since sold my 360 and I had to have this game again for the ps3.. I love it! I feel like my collection would be incomplete if I didn't have this game. It has a wonderful story, and lovable characters.. I would recommend to any of my friends.

I could not get in to this game. I tried. I really did. But the characters have no depth. The voice acting has no soul. And the gameplay is just run-of-the-mill for the most part.

I got to a part where it's the typical "maze you need a strategy guide for" and shut it off. Can't be bothered to turn it back on again, and I think I'll just be using it for store credit sometime in the future.

I bought this game for my brother as a Christmas present and based on what he has told me so far he loves it. His exact words were "execellent" when I asked him how he would rate the game. He cant stop playing it. But then again my brother loves RPG games.

In the current state of games, RPG's have become a rare genre. When I picked this game up I was so torn with the few RPG's out on the market. This game was a breath of fresh air. The story is good, the fighting mechanics are unique. The graphic's are beautiful. It is a great game. I recommend any RPG fan to give this a try.

What can i say, I was hooked when i first played the game and could not put it down. The music , sound, and visuals are well worth the price alone. Those who are on the fence about this one should download the demo off of the PSN and give it a try!

This is an awesome game that will make you not regret buying it. It has beautiful visuals, awesome music, good real-time based combat and every element every good JRPG should have. This one being the PS3 version has a lot more content like two extra playable characters and a longer storyline that really answers all the questions. I would recommend it for all JRPG lovers and for all those who are getting into this genre as well.

Bought this game around Christmas when it was on sale. I have played for about 40 hours so far and it's very enjoyable. The graphics is very good and the story is also very interesting.

Ignore the C+ review from 1UP. It's totally off.

I love this game and very happy with my purchase. I do not regret my decision of buying this game and recommend it. It arrived early and in great decision. The game is fun and addictive and the price for it was a reasonable price.
summary: I love this game and very happy with my purchase

reviewText: This is by far the best game I've played for the Nintendo DS. The single player is great and lots of replay-ability. The multiplayer is great fun too. Driving around the city, shooting your friends is surprisingly fun. I'm constantly amazed how well this game plays, it's very impressive for the DS.

I got it used, and it works great for playing blu rays, ps3 games, and my avi movies. This is a great step up from my ps2 system, but this is not the first generation that allows you to play PS2. So if you have any PS2 games, best to use it on the original PS2.

I can't stress how happy I am with this thing. I wanted it just to play Ratchet and Clank Future, but now I just can't get enough of it. It plays PS1 and PS2 disks, has a bunch of memory card slots, has 4 USB slots, and now, I have upgraded the hard drive to 160gb. This is very easy to do, so that's a plus as well. I'd strongly recommend this to any serious gamer.

I got this as a gift for my husband.  We already had Pikmin 2 and since everyone loved it so much I figured we would love the first one too.  He started playing this right away and became so engrossed that he completed the game in under two weeks!  It is definitely addicting and fun to play!  The only downside is that it doesn't take too long to beat the game.  However, there are challenge games that can be played for when you finish the game but aren't ready to leave the game universe.

I have played both Pikmin 1 and 2 in the GameCube, and on the Wii. The game is a little bit difficult to master, but is an awesome strategy game. The best part is the new control scheme with the wiimote and nunchuk that fits it perfectly.
summary: The wiimote and nunchuk control fits Pikmin perfectly.

reviewText: I remember originally playing this game on Game Cube, and I was so excited to get it again for Wii.  I absolutely loved the game, and I still do!  The controls are a little different, but other than that it's the same game that I always loved!  Great for kids as it's not violent!  :)

I was a little hesitant to buy this game but a friend recommended it.  It's fun and addicting.  If you enjoy real time strategy you'll like this.  Also, you may want to check out Little King's Story on Wii.  Both EXCELLENT games.

Pikmin is one of my favorite Wii games. Don't be fooled by the cutesy cover, it is not designed just for kids.

The game requires thinking and strategic planning, and it uses the wii remote features for the game play. I initially borrowed the game from a friend, but it was so much fun and so addicting, that I eventually bought my own copy.

If you like solving puzzles, then this game is for you.
summary: A great game for all ages

reviewText: I don't really feel like taking the time to write a review for this, so here goes a short one.  I like this game a lot.  It is not a favorite but it is a worthy purchase for the Wii.  If you like fighting games, I almost guarantee you will like this title.  If you liked past Castlevania games, you will most likely like this title.  If you like both, buy this title.  This is a good party game for two players at a time as well.  If you don't like fighters or swinging your arms, do not buy this title.

Fans of the Castlevania series be warned, this is not a Castlevania game! This is just another Mortal Combat rip-off. The characters are designed to slightly resemble those from the Castlevania series.
If you are looking for a Castlevania game, you will be sorely disappointed, as I was.

P.S. Returning the game is not allowed once it is opened.

I finally finished this game last night and I had a great time with it. It's much darker than the last two DS Castlevania games and now I'm even more excited for the next game (might be for the 3DS). I'd definately recommend it for any Castlevania fan but I have a feeling just about anyone could enjoy it.

I forgot I even paid money for this. What a waste. Not only did EA make this game free about a month after I bought it, the game itself is not enjoyable at all. I didn't realize how inferior this game was to Knights of the Old Republic. The first real dud from Bioware in the past 10 years. Even Dragonage, which I didn't like, was at least well made.

I'm the first to admit that I've spent entirely too much time playing SWTOR in the last 2 years. But I've enjoyed it. The story lines are great, the characters are interesting, and there are things for all different gaming personality types in this game.
summary: a great way to waste time

reviewText: My friends and I have so much fun playing this game!  We've been playing it for about a year now. It's has great graphics and story for a MMORPG. But it's not really necessary to buy the disc now since there is a free download on the SWTOR site, unless you just want it in your collection. Also if you want to go for the subscription, it's a pretty reasonable price considering other mmorpgs. More people definitely need to discover this as a great online multiplayer game.
summary: Great game but there's no need to buy it...

reviewText: Now that the game is free to play, I still don't like it. I don't like the fact that the one part of the game which I did enjoy, now costs me money to play, when I purchased multiple copies of the game to begin with.
summary: When it was new... I didn't like it

reviewText: I looked forward to this game for years. Waiting on KOTOR 3, dreaming of this game making up for such a long waited time to play one of the best rpgs in the history of the world, but nope, it was crap.

This game is a pathetic clone of other MMO's. The stories are lacking and boring. There is not attachment to the characters in the game. The gameplay is exactly the same as WOW. It is a pretty pathetic game. Save your money and get a frontal lobotomy. It would be less painful than playing this game.

My boyfriend plays this all the time so I bought a cheap copy here to play with him.  It's a great game, and since it went free to play, you don't have to subscribe monthly to play it.  I think this game is great for girls because the characters are really pretty and a lot of the quests are really sweet.  I also love the companion for the jedi that is almost like R2-D2!

As a long time fan of Knights of the Old Republic, this game is almost a dream come true.  Definitely a lot of fun and does a good job of immersing you in the Star Wars: Old Republic galaxy.  Would definitely recommend playing it.

So this game is free to play now up until you get to level 50 on your character... Why even buy this copy off of Amazon? I downloaded the game straight from the webpage for FREE. Signed up for FREE. The game is fun. I don't play MMORPGs, so I am more or less playing it as a single player adventure game. Looking at it just like a sequel to Knights Of The Old Republic.

The game is totally free. How can you not give it 5 Stars for that price? lol.

I love this game! It has everything I want in a MMORPG space battles, PVP, solo quest, group guest, guilds, and so on. I love Star Wars and it is like being apart of the world with this game. If your into MMORPG and Star Wars this game is for you!

I preordered this as soon as it was available. I have been waiting forever for a Star Wars MMORPG to come out. I was not disapointed when it did come out. This game is fun as heck and can't wait to play all sides.
summary: Just What I've been waiting for!

reviewText: This game has exceeded expectations!  I have pretty much stopped playing any other games.  MW3, I can not even remember the last time I played that.  This game is very addicting and in my opinion is better than WoW (I played WoW for along time when it first came out).

Great game, easy for beginners to get into and experienced players will appreciate the little touches that make questing enjoyable. Most players are friendly, helpful, and very mature in their interactions with others. I would definitely recommend this MMO to anyone interested in the Star Wars universe.

the only flaw to this game is that the monthly payments are bit much for what the game has to offer currently, but as the game takes off and more content is added to the game the monthly payment will become justified. If you love anything about the Star Wars universe you will enjoy this game, which is the reason I choose to play this game over WoW.

I have played WoW, Eve and many MMORPGs. They all have their good and bad points. This game brings together some of the best elements of them all. I love being able to play solo, use a companion or group up with others. I am a fan of the Mass Effect franchise and the interactive cinematic story style. So, that's my bias coming into this game. It's not perfect but it's off to a great start. Plus, it's Star Wars!

This game is a lot of fun to play! In my humble opinion, it is the best MMORPG to date. The game play is smooth, the sound is terrific, the questing is well done, as is the user interface, and everything flows together smoothly. It was also one of the smoothest launches I have experienced. If you enjoy WOW, and you like Star Wars, you should love this game. It should only get better from here!

Considering they haven't had years and years to perfect every little nuance like WoW, it's amazing how much they accomplished with this effort. I can't wait to see how the game evolves and improves over the months and years to come. I'm officially an avid swtor fan now.
summary: For right out of the gates...it's just awesome

reviewText: BioWare took careful and loving care bringing this game to life.  You can see it come to life before your eyes in rich, vibrant detail and epic story lines.  World of Warcraft has been the gold standard in MMOs for quite some time, but this game brings a whole new level of richness and fun to the experience. I can't recommend it highly enough.

It is the best MMO I've ever played.  I enjoyed WoW so much but this game has hooked me like none other.  The graphics are perfect, the quest story lines suck you in, everything is designed to maximize the fun of the game.  I can't wait to get off work so I can go home and play it.

I was in the beta and have been doing the early access. And i was surprised by how emersive this game is. It's very similar to other MMO's out there. Which is great, because it gives you the familiar feel, so it's easy to just pick up and play. I can see this game going far.

I bought this so I could play Elite Dangerous.  I was surprised that the build quality was as good as it was and it didn't feel cheap.  I'm glad I got this one instead of some of the more expensive models as this was just fine to play my game.  Who knows I might even try flying some airplanes with it. :)

The Thrustmaster unit is a great addition to your sim world. No need to spend hundreds of dollars for flught sticks that aren't dependable. The throttle is very responsive and the joystick is nice and firm. Buy this, you won't be disappointed.

Note: On the bottom of the joystick, there is a resistance knob to help with the flight of your aircraft.

I've owned this joystick for many years. I bought it for Kerbal Space Program. Flying with a joystick has greatly enhanced my immersion and enjoyment of the game.

I had a couple more functions that I wanted to assign to my stick, but I had already run out of buttons. So I downloaded a program called JoyToKey which allowed me to assign a second profile to the joystick when I hold down a certain button. So now I have double the number of keybinds!

COULDN'T GET IT TO WORK ON MY WORLD OF TANKS GAME, I ONLY HAVE USE OF 1 HAND & BOUGHT IT THINKING IT WOULD MAKE IT EASIER FOR ME TO CONTROL THE TANK WITH 1 HAND I DIDN'T REALIZE IT WAS FOR CONTROLLING AIR CRAFT WHEN I PURCHASED IT SO I HAVE TO FIND SOME ONE WITH A PLAYSTATION THAT MIGHT WANT IT!
summary: COULDN'T GET IT TO WORK ON MY WORLD OF TANKS ...

reviewText: I purchased this flight stick to be an interim stick while I saved up for a really nice one, but when I got this thing I couldn't believe the quality of what I got for the price. It's made out of very sturdy metal and thick plastic. The HOTAS separates from the stick and is also very nice. I can't recommend a better value for the price. This thing is worth every penny and I highly recommend it if you can't afford the $100 or more options.
summary: Just amazing value for the price

reviewText: I started playing Elite Dangerous, and wanted the best experience possible. Keyboard and mouse wasn't great, Dualshock 3 & 4 both sucked, so I decided to get this. It's a great HOTAS at an affordable price. Works right out of the box, and is already mapped for Elite Dangerous. Can't wait to use it on my other flight and space sims.

This is solid. Great price and smooth controls. I use this for Arma 3, Star Citizen and Elite Dangerous. I was honestly shocked that this was as good as it was for the price. Ergonomics are great for me (with large hands).

You can't beat this HOTAS for the price.  This is my second one (purchased it for my kid).  I've had my original for almost 1.5 years and it still works almost like new.  I do find that the throttle isn't as stiff as I would like after all the use, but it still holds its position.

I bought this for Elite Dangerous and it's perfect for the game.

This is a very good flight stick for the price. It has many options and works well with pretty much any set-up. Elite Dangerous is very fun with this stick and I love the "separation" option between the throttle and the stick.
If you are looking for a less expensive alternative, this stick is definitely the right choice.
summary: This is a very good flight stick for the price

reviewText: I haven't had a good joystick in quite a while. This is a great stick for the price. I haven't played any modern sims with it but my old fallbacks (Primarily X-wing Alliance) work wonderfully with it. I like that you can disconnect the throttle to locate it a little further away from the stick, it would be nice if the cord were a little longer but it is long enough for what I need at this time.
summary: I haven't had a good joystick in quite a while

reviewText: The Thrustmaster Hotas is a great product. It works great with flight simulators and all sorts of other games. It will work nicely with Euro Truck Simulator 2 as well. All around it is just a great hotas. It will work with both PlayStation and PC. It is easy and fast to hook up. I find it simple to use. I would recommend this product to any gamers tired of using the boring mouse!

This is my first HOTAS joystick, and I love it.  I got it for Elite Dangerous, and it works well for that game, but now that I have it, I'm probably going to get into other flying games because it makes a big difference over mouse and keyboard or gamepad.  The controls all work well and feel good in your hands.  It's a great value for the price, too.  I recommend it.

I've not tried the higher end HOTAS/Joysticks/etc, so I can't really compare this to anything else, but then again almost everything else is more expensive. I use this for Elite Dangerous and I honestly love it. It makes the game so much more immersive and it's at a fraction of the cost of most others
summary: I use this for Elite Dangerous and I honestly love it. It makes the game so much more ...

reviewText: You can't beat this thing for the price. I use it (along with the Roccat Powergrid app) for Elite: Dangerous and after playing with a mouse and keyboard, I find it to be a whole different experience. Unless you really want to spend more money than is necessary, this is the only way to go.
summary: You can't beat this thing for the price. I ...

reviewText:
A fantastic joystick for the money. If you're looking to spend under $100 this is the joystick for you.

I bought this to play Elite Dangerous on PC. It has served quite well for my approximately 100 hours of play time at the time of review (November 8th, 2015).

There are better joysticks out there, but you'll easily pay 2-3 times as much money. If you're an entry level gamer that's unsure if spending $200 on a joystick is a good idea, buy this one instead.

I love this game. I love how they came out with the Sonic and Knuckles expansion, Adding another character to play with. I also like that you can choose to play as Sonic, Tails,, or both. If you like 1 and 2, you won't be disappointed.

Nothing really negative to say. They work really well with what I use them for. I didn't have any issue setting them up, if they didn't already have a pre-programmed setting in the game (WarThunder had a layout already for them which was kinda cool). I'm happy with them.

Games I've tested/played with them:

WarThunder and Elite Dangerous

THIS IS THE BEST FLIGHT CONTROLLER EVER BUT THE DEFAULT CONTROL SETTINGS AREN'T CORRECT SET UP BUT HARD TO FIGURE HOW TO SET IT UP CORRECTLY AS IT WOULD BE IN A REAL AIRCRAFT THE THROTTLE STICK DOESN'T CONTROL THE THROTTLE HOPE I CAN FIGURE HOW TO SET THE CONTROLLER MANUELY SOON THEN IT WOULD BE PERFECT

I love this thing. I use it for playing Elite: Dangerous and it works great! I only paid $35 for it though. It is currently going for ~$75 and I think that may be a bit much. I would have paid $50 though.
summary: Great HOTAS! Watch the price though.

reviewText: Worked right out of the box with DCS World, Flight Simulator X, and War Thunder on my PC. Build quality is not super high but it doesn't feel flimsy either. As long as you don't knock it off your desk or something it will hold together just fine under the kind of usage most people will subject it to. For the money, It's an excellent product and will most likely last me many years to come.

It works great. I'm a huge ArmA 3 player and this combined with TrackIR adds an incredible amount of immersion but TrackIR is not required to have a great time. I read some of the reviews on here when I purchased it and was a bit worried that it wouldn't be that great, but it really is. The dead zone isn't that bad in my opinion and it's really easy to get used to. If you're looking for a great joystick (not the best) for a great price, I highly recommend this.

I really like this thing.  Prior to having this flight stick, I didn't much care for flight simulator type games.  This flight stick makes a big difference.  If you're an experienced flight simulator player then maybe you'll have a different opinion, but if you're just looking to greatly enhance your experience from keyboard/mouse or game controller, then this flight stick is kick ass.  If I had it to do over again, I would still buy this flight stick, I just would have bought it sooner.

Simple but great product. I use this joystick/throttle control to play "Microsoft Flight Sim X" and a few other flight games. There are plenty of programmable buttons on both the joystick and throttle control for the intermediate gamer, but If you want a "real" flight experience, you might want to consider a slightly more expensive/heavy duty model. However, if you are just looking to step up from the mouse and keyboard, this is a great product, and I would recommend it!

I am very happy with this flight stick.  It took me some time to get it programmed correctly, as the instructions were somewhat limited, but it's well worth the price.  This stick works fantastic once you get it set up correctly, it's hard to beat.

I've only had this item for a day and I have to say that I'm very impressed. Everything checks out with Arma 2. Haven't used it with FSX yet but will do so later on. What more can I say that many reviewers already haven't? This was well worth the 40 dollars and I'm glad to add it to my arsenal of gaming tools.
summary: My review on the Hotas X.

reviewText: Works great right out of the box. Does take a little getting use to, but after a little use it works great. I'm still trying to figure out how to reassign some of the buttons but other than that great product.

I bought this flight stick to use with HAWX 2.  It worked perfectly.  I enjoy the fact that the throttle can be attached or removed from the flight stick.  I keep it attached and put it in my lap when playing.  It makes flight sims so much fun to play.  I also like the fact that I can use it with my PS3.  Great product!
summary: Excellent Product, Met all of my expectations

reviewText: I'm into combat flight simulators.  Or at least I used to be.  But I'm getting back into it now that I have a new computer system and I needed a new joystick.  The price of this unit is amazing - like $34 when I bought it.  It works great.  If you fly flight sims, this is a must have.  Highly recommend.  Well built, programmable and you can't beat the price.

I bought this for my husband and son for use with two different PS3 games (Hawx & IL-2 Sturmovik).  It works wonderfully.  I couldn't be more pleased.  We haven't yet tried it with the PC, but I don't anticipate any problems.  I do recommend this product to anyone.

I don't even know what to say except....Are they for real??  This game is horrible, only 1 screen for gameplay the entire time.  It makes NO sense at all.  It's worse than anything I have ever played.  I honestly think this game must be a joke.

Want a game with a goal to work toward? Perhaps a definite end?

This isn't it.

This is one of those games where time advances only as quickly as you tell it to. You achieve advancements at your own pace, and there's very little for the average gamer to enjoy. This is a niche product, but if you enjoyed any of the Harvest Moon games, you might find something wonderful in this game.

I had the original Playgear Pocket for my first-generation PSP.  I gave that PSP to a family member, though, and upgraded to a PSP slim.

Sadly, there were no good case options available for the slim.  People implored Logitech to remedy the situation, and finally they have!

I got mine today.  This is, without a doubt, the best case available for the PSP slim.  If you're shopping for a good case, your search is over.

Seriously.  Buy it now.  You won't regret it.

Bought this case because it looked like the sturdiest.  It works great, but the hinge is getting a little worn out, but nothing big though... its just getting a little loose.  It doesn't affect the integrity of the case or how it holds the PSP.  The nice thing about this case is you can play your PSP with it still in the case and you can also charge it as well.  The case looks great and protects my PSP like no other.  Defiantly worth buying if you in the market for a PSP case.

I got it because I was worried that I'd scratch my PSP screen when I took it places.

I actually like it a lot more than I thought it would.  I prefer playing the PSP inside the case (rather than outside) because it is a little bit more comfortable to hold it (probably because it makes it thicker, and the way that the bottom of the case is shaped gives you something to grab onto).  And, it's a solid case, so it should protect the PSP, as intended.

Product description needs to state that it is only compatible with a few games.  It does not work with Mario Kart.  I purchased this item for my son's fourth birthday, thinking it would be easy for him to use, but it does not work with a single racing game we own.

I recommend this sellerI recommend this sellerI recommend this sellerI recommend this sellerI recommend this sellerI recommend this sellerI recommend this sellerI recommend this sellerI recommend this sellerI recommend this sellerI recommend this sellerI recommend this sellerI recommend this sellerI recommend this seller

So good

First off don't try to compare this to a Logitech G25 or G27. This is a lap steering wheel and is a huge upgrade from playing with a standard controller. The stability is good in the lap and the force feedback is great for a steering wheel in this price range. Yes it doesn't have the pedals but to be honest you really don't need them unless you plan on spending money on a stand and a more expensive wheel. Overall for the price you really can't beat it.

This item does a great job at protecting the Nintendo DS Lite game but it does add some weight to it. Haven't dropped it yet to see if it really holds up but so far so good in terms of protection.  It is a bit hard to open for my 4 1/2 year old but my 7 1/2 year old has no issues.  I like the look and the storage is great!  I would definitely recommend this product and don't regret buying it.
summary: Durable and heavy duty but a little hard to open

reviewText: This was an Xmas gift for my 10 year old daughter.  This was our first foray into the Nancy Drew games.  A niece enjoyed them so I thought we'd give them a try.  We started with the 'The Secret of Shadow Ranch'.  I was pleasantly surprised at how much was involved in solving the mystery.  This took us longer than I expected to solve and we had a lot of fun along the way.  I'll be looking for other bundles in this series to have on hand for those "boring, nothing to do" days.

I played all four games and absolutely loved them. None of the other Nancy Drew games I played after these four could compare with them. These games are challenging and make you think. I loved the puzzles and the way they let you find clues on your own.
summary: Best Four Nancy Drew Games Ever

reviewText: This is great. It charges directly into the Wii U and does not require a wall outlet. It saves money by not having to buy batteries. The battery seems to last quite some time so it does not stop during play and kids can play for hours with no issues.
summary: This is great. It charges directly into the Wii U and ...

reviewText:
After reading through the reviews I was unsure if this is a good product, but for me it works great. After I got it out of the package I charged for several hours and put it in the Wii Fit board and it worked right without any issues. I haven't used it that much that I could tell how long the battery lasts, but so far I'm satisfied.
I really like that it has switch to turn it off when not used so it doesn't discharge itself.

I chose this product to eliminate the need for multiple batteries that had to be replaced or recharged.  The battery pack can remain installed when recharging, and I have found that this pack has a very long life.  I love it!

I love this game! It is a fun way to help adults of all ages brush up on their Reading, Writing, and math skills all in one game. There are enough questions that you can never get tired of this product. I recommend this product to anyone for college prep or someone who hasn't been in school for years and wants to see how much they remember.
summary: Fun for improving reading, math skills, etc.

reviewText: This game is very simple to play, and very fun.  The game is more challenging as you proceed to higher levels.  You can play with up to 8 different friends in multiplayer mode, which is quite interesting.  Overall, the game is one of my favorite DS games to play.  Highly recommend for dinosaur lovers aged 6 - 12 (or older like my 15 year old son who loves dinos).
summary: Battle of the Giants Dinosaurs DS game review

reviewText: My granddaughter(7 yrs) says the game is a lot of fun. This was her 3rd DS game. She says she never gets bored and she enjoys playing it all the time. It's especially fun on a long car ride or trip. It was not easy but she has opened all the dinosaurs in the game.  She says she loves all the action in the game and it's a very fun game.

I love this game. Since I bought it I haven't put it down. I finally ended it 2 weeks ago. I'm sorry I finished it that fast. It was that entertaining. It really isn't for young girls based on the dialogue but its perfect for a mature young girl. I recommend this game hands down. I'm going to play it again as soon as I finish playing gardening mama.

I gave this to my 8 yr old niece for Christmas and she couldn't put it down from the time she opened it. She played it non-stop for 2 hours and was still playing when I left.

Update: I checked out the game with my niece due to complaints about adult situations. It's true and it's a bit much for young kids.

I don't care about graphics, gameplay, or anything like that. But I have to say that this game has possibly the best plot I've seen in a FPS since Bioshock, and I can say that the ending is a lot better. This is a story of betrayal, understanding, and regret. There's a lot more to the game than "fighting ice zombies". So don't judge a book by it's cover! Play the game and I know you won't be sorry!

I have not had this much fun playing a game in a long time! I like games that have unlockable content, and replayability. I can't wait for the sequel! It's worth noting that the 360 version is a prequel, not a port of the same game. So you can buy both and enjoy each for it's own merits!

Bring it on! 5 stars, my highest recommendation.

Not quite as good as the one on 360 but, it's still okay nonetheless. I do like that I can simply use a slash motion with the Wiimote. At the time of this writing, I haven't beaten it but, it seems like it'll be fun. If you played the one on 360, you'd probably have fun with this one.
summary: Not as good as the 360 version

reviewerName: Oreo Cookie Chocolate Peanut Butter Pie 2018
reviewText: I thought that this game was pretty good. there is really nothing to it. i thought that some of the characters they had for bowlers were a little cliche but the game was pretty fun. this game is for people who just want to relax and just do nothing. there is really no excitment but the game is fun. if you have not played this game then i recommend you do

At first when I got this game I wasn't sure it was going to be very good but after playing it for a few hours it turned out to be an awesome game. Most of the achievements are pretty easy to get. I have already started playing Darksiders 2 which already seems to be just as good.
summary: ... I wasn't sure it was going to be very good but after playing it for a few hours it ...

reviewText: I bought Darksiders 1 and 2 together.  Played the first one and loved it, played the 2nd one and loved that one even more.  Very cool characters and storyline.  You play as one of the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse.  What's not to like?  :)

Two years ago, I passed by this game, thinking it wouldn't be something that I would  like. I play a lot of filler games in anticipation for games that I love. (Like Zelda, Castlevania, and Prince of Persia) Boy was I wrong! This game is almost perfect. It is long, engrossing, great story, and amazing gameplay. I would recommend this to anyone.

This game is a hybrid of the legend of zelda: ocarina of time, and the god of war series.  I read that in a review and though it sounded interesting.  So I bought the game, and found out thast it was indeed interesting.  Graphics are awesome, gameplay is dynamic, and the fun factor is through the roof.  The goriness is not over the top for my tastes, but some parents may want to be careful with this one.  Overall, nothing too crazy though.  I'd say 9.5 out of 10.

This is an amazingly fun game. To give you an idea: If you are going to play one of Darksiders or God of War 3, I think you should play Darksiders (and I've played and completed both games). Great game. Get it.

Think God of War + Prince of Persia + Zelda + ...

i was hesitant at first about buying this game because i hadn't seen it advertised anywhere, but i'm big into rpg games so i thought i'd give it a chance, turned out to be one of the best games i've ever played! hands down! awesome story mode, insane weapons, freaky villians! 10 out of ten for me!

This game is difficult but it is extremely fun.  There is a rather lengthy learning curve to the game but once that is learned then the rest of the skills come in and soon you will not be able to put the game down.  It's a game definitely worth picking up.  It will just take time to get good at it but it is as realistic of a UFC fighting game as can be.  Definitely worth the buy.

If you are a fan of MMA this is a must own for you. Every sport has a video game, and now its time for MMA to get a game you are not ashamed to own. Submissions, take downs, head kicks and much more. I cant say enough good things about this game. Just buy it now and see what I am talking about.
summary: A must have for MMA fans

reviewText: I own both of the DarkSiders games, and I really do love them. I'm really excited to see what they do with the rest of the game series, and if I have my way, I'll own that one, too shortly after its release.
summary: and I really do love them. I'm really excited to see what they ...

reviewText:
I was surprised how good this was! I (unfortunately) played Darksiders 2 first, and was pumped to play the prequel, but boy was I surprised when I realized just how much content was in this game!

If you missed this one and went straight to the sequel, you should definitely go back and get it.

I wanted to like this game, but couldn't. It had some elements of God of War, but I thought it was too difficult. I have played games that have been just as difficult, but not as much fun. I will spend an hour trying to finish a level on a game if it is fun, but this was not.
summary: I wanted to like this game

reviewText: I loved this video game.  The story is very interesting.  The graphics are awesome.  Joe Mads is a great artist and his work on this game redefines what a video game can be.  The creative team on this project knew what a great video game needed, and they did it.
summary: One of my favorite video games.

reviewText: Action packed! Very interesting concept and story. It takes place in the post apocalyptic world so the atmosphere of the game is very creepy yet cool. I recommend this game to anyone who is a fan of Legend of Zelda, for Darksiders might as well be a darker version of it. The only thing that could deter some gamers is that the game is a button masher in some cases. So if you do not like button mashers, try to find another game. But I HIGHLY recommend this game. It is a fun and immersive experience!

I can't believe i just found out about this game a couple weeks ago while reading an article about Darksiders 2. This  is great fun, if it wasn't for a few challenging puzzles i would probably never stop playing!! If anyone out there wants to try out the RPG market, this is a good place to start. It was my first RPG and now i am hooked.

I got this for my husband for Christmas and any chance he got he was playing it. He would wake up early just to play it, he loved it, he was addicted. I personally didn't play it, I watched some of it, and its definitely not for youngsters, I was scared at times lol. But from what he said, its amazing.
summary: I didn't see my husband for 3 weeks after buying this for him.

reviewText: I bought this game based on the reviews, since I didn't know much about the game.  I was pleasantly surprised how fun it was.  It starts off a little slow, but after the first act it starts to pick up and becomes really enjoyable.  The graphics and the creatures are well thought out.  It's a game I can't stop playing.

This is a fun game with great graphics and many layers of interest to back it up. You have to think through some of the stages in this game, not overly hard and yet rewarding. Looking forward to the next game from this company.

The game play is great because it keeps evolving when you get more items to use with the environment.  The fighting is cool too because it responds great and does exactly what you want it to do, plus it works better when you're not button mashing which makes the game more fun.  The story is a good one too which keeps you interested in wanting to know more and what happens next.  Definitely recommend getting this game because I believe it has good replay value as well.

Great game and fun to play as well. I gave it as a gift and they loved it. The quality of the game is good.
I am not a gamer but this game had me playing for a while, so with that being said, yes i do recommend it!
