My son loves this game and is having a lot of fun with it. It is his most wanted item from his Christmas list. I have been monitoring prices from various retail stores so when I saw Amazon dropped the price I bought it very quickly. I received this game in the mail on time.

This review is about as long as the game. My 10 year old spent $40 of his hard-earned cash on this game and was disappointed that he had conquered it in 90 minutes. I'm sure he had some fun playing it, but even he thinks it was not worth the money.

This game is one of the best Sonic games out there. Where Sonic weilds a sword, it is a nice addition to the Sonic series. Think of it as playing a Sonic game, with the same controls to control your sword as The Legend of Zelda twilight princess for the Wii. It has a great story and great graphics. I would highly recomend this to any Sonic fan out there.

Bought this for my seven year old daughter for her birthday. I play the Sims 4, and she's always interested in what I'm doing; I thought this would be a good way to introduce her to the franchise. She absolutely loves it and has spent many happy hours playing.
summary: I thought this would be a good way to introduce her to the franchise

reviewText: I have to agree with most everyone.  This game sucks.  It's frustrating just like everyone says.  I wish I had read these reviews before purchasing this.  Now I'm stuck with a game I'll never use.  Read all the reviews, they are all spot on about all the bad things about this game.  There isn't anything I can say is good about it except for the cover.

This game really is as bad as the other reviewers report.  I'm sorry that I didn't listen to them.  The workout is not challenging, does not flow, and the graphics are bad.  If you like running in place in your living room, then maybe you will like this game.  Otherwise, it is just terrible.
summary: As bad as the reviewers say it is

reviewText: I could not figure out what moves I was supposed to be doing. There was a serious lack of instruction. In the end, I did not feel like I had worked out at all. Because the moves were not adequately discussed, someone is going to get hurt trying to figure it out on their own.

This game was awful!  Wish I had done some research before I bought it.  I couldn't figure out how to do any of the games.  On the log jump, I couldn't get my character to jump.  On the activity where you throw the grenades, I couldn't figure out how to throw them.  I used it one time.  Waste of money!

I thought the idea of this game would be really good. But I was wrong and decided to return it right away. You set up a profile, walk down a trail for 2 minutes, then choose an activity to play. I couldn't figure out how to play each activity, and they were only maybe 30 seconds long. Then you have to walk for 2 mins more. No thanks. Not to mention in the background you hear the girl talking about how great she is...

The one word that comes to mind is "unusable."  We got this as a Christmas present, my wife and I tried to use it, but simply couldn't figure out what the game wanted us to do and we couldn't get the game to react the our actions.  We love Wii Fit, this is such a huge disappointment.  I find it hard to believe they tested this game before releasing it.

I had high expectations for this game, especially since Jillian Michaels had her name on it. I have tried this game a few times and cannot stand it. The instructions are very poor and even if you follow the instructions the screen image doesn't do what it is supposed to.
I think who ever bought this game should be able to get their money back.

I love Wii Fit, so when I saw this game I immediately ordered it.  What a disappointment!  It is horrible!  It's very difficult to use the controls.  I feel like I'm vibrating my body most of the time.  It's not user-friendly.
I'm sorry I spent the money on this horrendous game.
Don't buy it.

The graphics aren't terrible, but are subpar to today's standards. However, this is just so much fun! The genre, once you get through the tutorials, is so unique and I felt like I was part of the story. I'd be surprised if any gamer would not like this one.

Hi,

Great game and I can't stop playing it.  Wish I had more time to delve into it.

Server time is always up and running.  Party system works and people are very nice in game!

Highly recommend it if you are new to the MMORPG or just curious about it.

Worth the money!

Matthew

The packaging was very misleading as to what the game entailed.  I bought this for my 7 year old, and I have to agree with the previous reviewer.  Basically, this game is very lame. She's tried it about a dozen times now and has yet to even see an animal. She's quite frustrated and disappointed with the game. So am I, after paying 20 dollars for a game she no longer wants to play. I can't blame her either.
summary: not at all what we thought

reviewText: My daughter, who is 9, did not like this game at all! I tried my hand at it and it was pretty pathetic. Very unclear what the character in the game was supposed to be doing, and the graphics left a lot to be desired. She said. " I want to know how to play it, it looks like it could be fun but it makes no sense."

I cannot understand why they continue to sell this game at such a low cost when they can be making so much more.  I purchased this for my daughter at Christmas since the price was so low.  She absolutely LOVES it!!  Since she loved it so much, I chose to buy one for her best friend as well.  She too LOVES it.  So, it looks as if I'll be buying one for her other girlfriend as well.  Definately recommend this game!!!

I bought this for my 10 year old daughter, who loves horses. I was hoping it wouldn't be too "childish" for her.  Not only does she love it, but her 12 year old brother wants to play it all the time, too! It's been a lot of fun watching them figure out this game together.

I've only had this battery for about a week.  So far it lasts just as long as the Sony battery that came with my PSP 3000.  I've had some bad luck with "non-official" battery replacements in the past, but I'm pleased to say this one works very well - and the price is great.

I was very pleased to find this item. You get three classic Pac-Man games for $20! I couldn't resist. It arrived in excellent condition within three days of purchase. I would recommend this item to everyone.

We purchased two of these for our kids for christmas.  The kids actually took good care of them, placing them on a shelf when not in use (they didn't step on them and break them).  One of the headsets lasted 3 days and the other lasted 4 days.  They just stopped working.  We are now having to take the kids out to buy 2 more headsets.  Save yourself the frustration and spend the extra money for a more dependable and durable unit.

There are two problems with this device: one, it does not fit on a first-generation PS3 (as pictured). Second, and most importantly, it traps heat inside the PS3. In other words, it has the opposite effect that it is supposed to have.

In my case, my PS3 got hotter than it has ever been. The system crashed almost as soon as it booted up, and will not boot up any more. I guess I'll be needing an expensive repair... THANK YOU EVERCOOL DEFENDER!

I'm impress with this product. It works effective and reduces the amount of heat in the PS3. In fact, before using the product my PS3 will make noises and I would have to turn off the PS3 because I couldn't enjoy playing games or watching Netflix. However, since using this product, my PS3 doesn't overheat nor make fan noises. It's a great product and will extend the life of my PS3.

I have 3 Guitar Hero guitars in my house, and was looking for a good multi-guitar game stand that would not cost an arm and a leg.  Found this one, and it already had great reviews.  As stated before, this works on Guitar Hero guitars as well as Rock Band guitars.  Now I don't have to worry about stepping on them!.
The stand comes fully assembled. All you need to do is unhinge the limbs that the guitars rest on.

This stand is well-made and perfect for keeping your Rock Band guitars organized. I love that I don't have to worry about finding a safe place to put them. The stand assembled in about five minutes and is the perfect size for my Beatles Rock Band guitars and bass. Love it!
summary: Perfect place to stash your Rock Band guitars

reviewText: I bought this stand a month ago and it has been great! I have the original rock band 2 guitar on it, as well as the warbeast guitar which is a full size rock band/guitar hero guitar. The stand is height adjustable and is made of steel. I thought if I only hung 2 guitars on it there would be a problem with it falling over but it has not fallen once. It Has been great so far and I recommend this stand for anyone that has more than one guitar.

I got this game for my daughter for Christmas, and she rates it five stars.  She is fairly active in the arts and sings with a children's chorus, and she has spent a good part of her Christmas break playing the game, so it was well worth the money I paid for it.  I would buy it again.

A fabulous game for young children.  They love to choose the different instruments, play the songs how they like, and especially to create the videos.  There's not a huge amount of appeal for an adult audience, but playing this game with children is a lot of fun.  It's just a joy to watch how much fun they're having with it.

I heard my niece and nephews commenting that even though Santa had been really good to them at Christmas they were disappointed that they had not gotten Wii Music.

Since both of my nephews have January/February birthdays, I ordered Wii Music and sent it to them earlier in the month as a joint birthday gift. I saw them this weekend and they were soooo happy that this had come to them in the mail. I think at the moment I am their favorite aunt. They are having so much fun playing this as a family.

Got this game because I got a great deal on it. When I purchased this game, we got a twenty dollar credit. This game isn't for guitar hero, or rock band fans. I am not one of those fans. This game is more creative, and I can't wait to have my grand daughter play it. I can see a hard core gamer not liking this game, but it is great for younger kids learning about instruments. It is fun to jam with your friends. You might want to rent it first, to see if it is the right game for you.

I love this game! It has, in my opinion, one of the best stories the Pokmon line has ever had. There's a considerable amount of more development for your character and many fun features we haven't had before.

My son got this game for Christmas and he loved it.  Unfortunatley, he loaned it to sister to play the next day and she lost it.  We have turned the house upside down, but to no avail.  Now sister is trying to save her money to buy him a new one.  Great game (for the time he had it).
summary: Son loved it, sister lost it

reviewText: I am just an average computer user and I bought this old software based on its still being usable with windows 7.  I couldn't get it to work with the newer Graphics Driver on my windows 7 computer.  I didn't want to use the option to try and load the obsolete graphics driver that came with the package on my new computer and don't know what to do with it now.  I wasted my money.

good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good
summary: good good good good good good good good good good ...

reviewText: Great program. Only upset that Microsoft is no longer supporting this product. I've used Microsoft Simulator X for years, but had to buy this version due to Windows 8.1. It's the only version Windows 8.1 will allow you to install. So I had to spend $$ in order to use Microsoft Flight Simulator X on my Windows 8.1 64 bit computer.
summary: Microsoft Flight Simulator X and Windows 8.1

reviewText: After spending several hours on the phone with Microsoft tech support, they finally told me to just return the product.  I did an on-line search of this issue and found that a LOT of people are having this problem.  I also found a couple service packs for it.  The SP1 is supposed to correct this issue but it didn't.  Apparently, there's no fixing this problem and the software might work for you or, like me, it just won't.

Glad I did not get this a few years back.  I can't seem to pull myself away from this simulator.  It's crazy fun and I have just scratched the surface of it.  I can't tell you how fun this program is.  It provides a very realistic version of operating a real aircraft.  It sure has consumed some of my time.  Not sure if my wife is still around or not.
summary: This sucks the time from your life

reviewText: Best computer ever!  My 12 year old son loves this game. He like the variety of planes he can fly. He also has a joystick that makes the game even more fun. Would recommend to kids who like to imagine being in a cockpit, flying a plane.

There are some minor deviations from real piloting but this simulator program is truly worth the price. I have been flying airplanes and helicopters for more years than I'm willing to admit to. I am retired and this program reignites my enthusiasm for the real thing. For those that may be interested I owned and flew a Sikorsky S-58 for many years. The helicopter part of the program is reasonably realistic. I would recommend this program to all.
summary: Don't pass-up this opportunity to fly.

reviewText: I'm really happy with this SIM. I have a lot of fun with free flying. If you want to get into the mission modes, you really have to read a lot of the tutorials as they don't explain everything in precise detail on the game play tutorials. Also, you can download a ton of content for this. I love flying military jets such as the C-17 and C-130's. You can buy or get them for free at a few websites.

This product has saved me a lot of money during my flight training. It allows me to practice and think the same way as if I am in the cockpit of the aircraft. i would recommend this product, it is a shame that Microsoft Discontinued making newer versions.

Speaking as an aviation enthusiast, this game is a lot of fun.  Occasionally, it freezes up and crashes, but I'm pretty sure it's just the computer I'm using.  Speaking as an engineer, the realism and control of the built-in aircraft is incredibly accurate.  Definitely a fun game if you like this kind of thing.

It is one of the best I've seen or tried to use. Don't think your just going to sit down and be an expert the first time you try it, you will be disappointed. It is the closest thing to real flying that I have tried yet. I do recommend this Sim to anyone that is serious about flying.

I'm not a real-life pilot, but this game is still a lot of fun.  I especially like the missions and the lessons, which walk you through learning to fly.  The scenery is very well done and the airplane models look pretty good.

I can't comment too much on the accuracy of the flight physics, but it has a very realistic feel.

I've had this since it came out. It's really great for gaming. I've had no problems with it up until now, the door keeps getting stuck and certain games freeze. Over 4+ years and it's still working. I bought a wireless adapter for it and it works great.

I should have known better.  The product title didn't match the description.  The description said it would come with a power cable.  It was just the unit.  No cords, no cables, no storage.  The product was shipped in a box too large for the product and was beat to hell by the time it got to me.  This was supposed to be a Christmas gift.  I couldn't be more disappointed.

The platinum edition of Forza 2 offers the standard game along with a new disc that contains all the updates that were available online (including 43 new cars and two new race tracks). For those who already own the game, 20 dollars for the updates may or may not be worth it. However, I found it to be a good deal because I don't play online but wanted to take advantage of the new cars. Someone who is buying the game for the first time is getting a great deal!
summary: All the regular greatness of Forza 2, plus new cars

reviewText: I bought this as a gift for my nephew.  He was 7 at the time and didn't really care about the big name games.  I found this on a search of Amazon and the price couldn't be beat.  He really enjoyed opening 5 games instead of the one big name game I would have paid for.  He told me a few weeks after Christmas that he really liked his racing game!
summary: Price can't be beat for racing game

reviewText: My husband and I love to have fun with our family and friends.  This game is so much fun.  It's nice that if you know how to read musical notes that you don't even have to know the words.  You can just hum the song.  This game provides us with lots of hours of fun.

I must say I was very disappointed in this game.  I am an AI fan and was so excited to play this.  But, to my disappointment, I didn't know most of the songs that were on the game.  Maybe 2 or 3 of them...which is not enough to get any enjoyment out of it.  The WII version doesn't allow you to download your own songs so I was stuck.  How many times can you sing 3 songs?  It gets pretty boring!  I am tradin this back in to Amazon today.  I really lost out on this game.

My 5 year old loves this game. Graphics are very cute and the controls are very simple. Since my daughter is new to console gaming this is actually the first game we have played that didn't require me telling her what to do even one time yet. Great, fun and simple.

This a great wii game for the kid who is just starting out on the wii.  It teaches them how to use the remote various ways and shows a picture at the bottom of the screen as to who to use the remote.  As like the other wii games, I didn't have to sit and explain how to use the remote or how to maneuver through the game because it shows and tells them how to do it.  Plus, Dora talks to them the entire time and asks them questions that they need to shout the answer back to her.  Great game for beginners!!

I originally bought this game for my 8yr old son, but my husband and I quickly became addicted to it.  I also have a 5yr old son that loved it, too!  The graphics are great and it is easy enough, (with a little practice), for a 5yr old to play.  It is one of the best wii games I have ever played!

This game tops all other fishing games that I have bought.  If you want a game that you can play by yourself or with others(up to 4) then this is the game to buy.  And with others you will do alot of laughing too. The controls are easy to use.  Not alot of buttons to remember to use.  I like that. I can't wait till the next time we play again. Oh yeah and you not only fish with a rod but with a bow and spear too.  I really like the bow and spear.  And you do the bow in a airplane sometimes.  Really fun.

Great for very young children. I have a 3 yr. old and a 4 yr. old. The 3 yr old has some difficulty with the game, but the 4 yr. old is able to play the game with ease. I have purchased some other Wii games that target kids that were almost too difficult for my 4 year old to play. This is a great game for a young child starting to play Wii games.
summary: Dora Saves the Snow Princess Wii Game

reviewText: I purchased this game for my 3 year old daughter - she absolutely loves it.  I love the fact that it has easy-to-follow instructions, a great "helper dude", and is very interactive (as are all Wii games, I guess!).  She truly enjoys "talking" with Dora and working her way through the adventure.  I'm sure my 1 year old will play it as well, in a year or so!
Dora the Explorer: Dora Saves the Snow Princess This game is perfect for a preschooler! My 3 year old is just learning to use the Wii and this game has provided her with the basics.

I have young grandchildren who love to play video games, but most of the ones I could find were for older children. I found this one and purchased it and they love it. They are ages 3 and 4. I expeciallly like it that is a learning tool, and not just a game.

My daughter is 3 years old and loves this game. There are some aspects of the game I do not think she fully understands but she still loves it! The first day that she got this game she played it almost nonstop, which made me happy because she FINALLY stopped asking me why questions every 5 minutes lol. A great buy too. I only payed $15 for it. I do not recommend this game for anyone above 6 or 7. You might as well buy a more expensive game similar to this with better graphics for that age group.

I stumbled upon this game and based on the reviews here at amazon, I purchased it for my 6 year old. It does involve some reading, but overall it's very manageable for my daughter to play with minimal help from me. She enjoys creating outfits for Lisa and helping her finish jobs for Lisa's mom. Some of the mini-games are a bit more challenging than others but overall this game has been a good fit and I'd recommend it.
summary: A good game for younger girls

reviewText: When I got this adapter, I simply installed the drivers from the website and I was good to go. I haven't had any issues with compatibility, sensitivity, or lag. It's great getting to play old NES, SNES, Genesis, PSX, N64, and GameCube games with a controller. It works perfectly with PC games as well. I bought this adapter a year ago and haven't had any problems. If the PS2 controller is your controller of choice like it is mine, you really can't go wrong with this.
summary: Still works great after 1 year on Windows 64-bit machine

reviewText: Unfortunately we bought a used disc from Goodwill through this site (Amazon) and the disc had so many scratches that it wouldn't play. It was a Christmas present for my son and he was sorely disappointed.

I bought this for my son's birthday. He loved the first game in the series. I love that he can play it byhimself with no help. It is so easy for him to navigate and he doesn't have to use the complicated controles on the wii remote. It's a pretty short game but he doesn't mind he just keeps playing it over again.

My 3 year old daughter received this game as a gift.  She wanted it so badly & I wasn't sure she'd be able to play it considering she hadn't had much video game experience.  I was completely wrong.  She is able to play it & most importantly, is able to play it by herself!
I can't imagine a child much older than 4 or so enjoying this but it's awesome for a 3 year old!

I bought this as a gift for a four year old boy who does not have much video agme experience.  He loves it and can easily play it.  My four year old son also plays it all the time and loves it.  I love it because it does not require much (if any) adult help.  Easy and fun for all ages!

This game should be subtitled: How to teach your child the basics of video games in a fun and semi-educational way.

Great premise, great game, perfect for 3-4 year olds.

They need this game so they can play other more complex and fun games later.
summary: Perfect game for 3-4 year olds to learn video games.

reviewText: This game is great for my 4 year old.  He can play all by himself and it is very fun. There is a lot of room for error so it is good for little kids. It's not too complicated for him. He loves and wants to play all the time. The best Wii game for his age!

My 5-year-old son got this game for Christmas, and he has enjoyed it so much! It's one of the few games I've seen that can truly be played by a pre-reader (or a very new reader) without an adult having to explain everything to them.

I have a 3 year old son who has trouble using the wiimote with most wii games.  This game is perfect for young children due to the fact the wiimote is used like a regular controller and does not need to be pointed at the tv screen.  He loves it.

My 3 year old loves this game because he can play it by himself (with little help from me).  The controls and movements are simple and easy to follow. The games allow an adult to assist if needed using another controller.  I highly recommend this game for preschoolers who are new to the Wii.

I know there are a lot of keyboards out there and they all have flaws but this one is very nice. love the back lit keys. The sound control is awesome and the key layout works well. I would have to say that this keyboard does have a few small flaws the back light is a little dim in some spots but not bad. Also the number pad detaches very easily kinda annoying at times and the board itself is kinda wide. Other than that stuff this is a great keyboard for all types of use.
summary: Great keyboard for everyday use and Gaming

reviewText: I bought this keyboard for my wife and it is one of the coolest keyboards I have seen. It is as good as the description says and definately worth the money. It especially makes it nice when trying to type in dim light.

As soon as I got this I hooked it up and I am LOVING it. I am not a "gamer" per say but I do love to do different things and this keyboard definitly hits all the high spots fr me. I love the fact that you can actually remove things when you really don't need the pesky little things and put them back on if someone wants to use them.
I have had several people try it out and they love it as much as I do. YES YES YES this is a great keyboard.

It worked great for a year. After that, the mouse wheel, which is made up of cheap soft plastic, crumbled away. There is also no way to open up this mouse to clean it without breaking it. Overall, it is not worth the money you pay for it.

Great product. Fits naturally into my hand, the extra buttons are well placed for gaming. Everything on the mouse feels very well put together. If you don't mind using a wired mouse, this is about as good as it gets for the price. The only negative I can think of is that the scroll mouse clicks each time that you move it. This doesn't really bother me, but some people may like a smoother scroll wheel.

I bought a DS for a vacation I was going on and I wanted something to occupy my travel time.  My husband and I enjoyed playing the games at the same time.  Once I got home, the kids hooked their DS with mine and we play head-to-head.  I usually beat them, but I still had fun.

Lots of different puzzles.  As often as I play, these games will keep me occupied for a LONG time.  It was well worth the money spent.  Enjoy!!

The game is almost a simulation than an actual game. It's pretty difficult to master the controller (also I'm an old school PC gamer) and it's taking a lot of time to actually get ok at moving around. Good thing is the auto aiming helps you out quite a bit. It's an excellent game though it takes some time to get into it. Definitely worth the money.
summary: This is a pretty hardcore game (not for everybody)

reviewText: This game is the best! I've been looking for it for years and finally found it! Its fun and you get to solve missions for your baby. Also, its really cute as you can changed them, bath them, feed them, etc! I would recommend this game if you love having fun with cuteness too!

My daughter loves this game. She spent quite a few hours playing with it from the day she got it. It is very well done. It encourages children to read as advices are given. It is very interactive especially for little girls who love to take care of babies.
summary: It is fun to be a baby-sitter!

reviewText: I purchased this for my four and a half year old granddaughters.  At first it took awhile to figure out what to do.  The girls cannot read yet so their mommy got them started.  Once they were shown what to do they took off and have loved every minute of it.  It was probably for an older child who could read and it was definitely not for grandmothers because I couldn't figure it out at all.  I believe it was a worthwhile purchase.

It's an old game from my childhood. That I still love to this day. It's a great game for the time, but I won't be reviewing a 10 year old game.

What I will tell you is that I works on my Win7 64bit gaming computer with no problem!

If you loved this game a time ago. Pick it up.
summary: Works on my Win7 64bit gaming computer!

reviewText: Loved this game when it first came out. This version is just as amazing. Don't listen to the poor reviews it works fine. If you do have issues with it running bad there are many programs out there that will slow the processing speed of your pc to run it smoothly. I am sad that I couldn't get an original copy but for 15 dollars I can't complain.

What is happening to the empire building/strategy game genres these days? They used to be awesome but now they're just a waste of time and hard drive space.  I remember back when I had the first Empire Earth game.  I had so much fun playing that game.  I also loved games such as Age of Empires, Age of Mythology, Command & Conquer and so-on.  Those were true empire/strategy games.  Today's games I just don't get.  Please don't waste your hard earned cash on this game.  It's a waste of time.

This was one of the better purchases that I have made on amazon.  This was well worth the money and cheaper on here than any store that i could find in my town.  This one also came with a game which was a great surprise.  This is for my 5 year old and he is able to play no problem.

I wish that I had known that this game was NOT compatible with the DSi.  I bought it for my son, and I didn't see anything to indicate that it wouldn't work with the DSi.  Now I have a useless game wasting space.  It looks like it would be fun, but we'll never know.

Bought as a gift for my g/f on her birthday. She had played the hell out of this game when it was on the SNES and wanted to play through it again. We've both since either misplaced or lost our SNES systems and games, so this was the next best thing.

She tells me that this is everything the original was and much more. If you want to ride the nostalgia train and/or enjoy a classic RPG then this is most definitely the game you need to get.
summary: so this was the next best thing. She tells me that this is everything ...

reviewText: This classic and overlooked RPG should be played by every gamer at least once!  Chrono Trigger was one of those games that came with awesome characters to invest in, a musical score that is beyond words, and a storyline that kept you coming back for more.  I truly believe that Square Enix has done an extremely poor job promoting this game for the new generation of gamers.  Much like the FF VII remake, it deserves that level of reintroduction to the gaming world.
summary: Chrono Trigger - One of the Greatest of All Time!

reviewText: This is an excellent version of Chrono Trigger.  It has the classic feel of the Super Nintendo, it has the movies from the PlayStation version (without the long loading menus) and new features for the DS.  After years as an avid gamer, it's still one of my favorite video games of all time.  If you're on the fence you shouldn't be, buy this game!

One of the best games ever made. I'm just happy I was able to grab a copy after recently getting a 3DS. I enjoyed it more now than I did when I first played it on the SNES when I was younger. The themes are mature and the music is absolutely incredible, one of the best video game soundtracks alongside Chrono Cross (both created by composer Yoshinori Mitsuda). It's a great introduction for anyone that wants to experience what is regarded as arguably the best example of a perfect JRPG from the 16-bit era.

The best version of this game. It has the cinematics from the Playstation version, but none of the load times associated with that version of the game. This is still a game that plays well regardless of the year and it should be in your collection of games.
summary: The best version of this game

reviewText: I have heard from a multitude of people that Chrono Trigger is a MUST play game if you like the RPG genre and boy they were right. This game is as compelling as they described, and can definitely hold its own despite being an older DS game. I am playing Chrono Trigger on my New 3DS XL and I really couldn't put it down. The storyline and the pixel art look excellent and the gameplay mechanics are very fun. I highly recommend playing this game, even if it is just your first run through, like me!
summary: Not Just Nostalgia For Some - Excellent RPG Game

reviewText: I don't even know what to say....terrible. A "standalone" game? Give me a break. I finished all three "campaigns" in about two hours. This is gouging, plain and simple. A complete let down after the last one. Very sad. Don't waste your time or money on this.

I have never played Chrono Trigger before but I have heard good things from this game. The story, the combat, basically everything is good about this game! If people were wondering if the poster is included with my purchase, it wasn't included. I am guessing it is because I got a reprint of the game and the poster came out during the first release of it.
summary: ... never played Chrono Trigger before but I have heard good things from this game

reviewText: I had never played this game before. I only had NES growing up and not SNES or play station. My boyfriend kept telling me I needed to play this game so I bought the DS version to play on my 3DS XL. It game brand new still in the plastic so that was nice. The game itself has been pretty fun so far. I think it was well worth the purchase.

A great game that has been ported as well as it can be. I think having the second screen is actually pretty useful, the loading times are snappy, and it looks good on the screen. Obviously the game is one of the best, but I think this is one of the better ways to play it.
summary: Great version of one of the best games.

reviewText: I traded my SNES cartridge away when I was a kid. I regretted doing it since. O have the PS1 version, but wasn't satisfied. This game is the best version. If you never played it before, get it. If you played it as a kid, this will bring you back. I still remeber the music from when I was a kid and this just brings me back. In no way will you regret buying this game. They utilized both screens perfectly. Game play is spot on. I can't say enough nice things about it.

This is a must have for any person that likes RPGs. I give this game a 10/10. Everything in it is awesome: music, characters, graphics (for a game made at its time), story/plot, battle system, controls, enemies. It even has 15 endings. I'm looking forward to get the soundtrack of this game, its music is unique. A must have.
summary: A must have for any RPG lover.

reviewText: There's plenty of reviews that break down the pros and cons of this game. I loved playing it on the PS1 (the rat eluded me many times), and I love playing it on the DS. This game has it all - artwork, music, characters, story, side-stories, and multiple possible scenes and endings. Replay is high, since the choices you make change certain scenes and the final ending. Be prepared to spend many many hours on this game.

I vote for this as Best RPG Ever Made.  If you have not treated yourself to this amazing game yet, do yourself a favor and pick it up.  It's also available on the Wii Virtual Console (for $7) and iOS/Android devices (not the best way to play, but it's there, $10).

This game is typically regarded as one of the best RPGs of all time. It was originally released for the Super NES, then for the Playstation 1, and then for the Nintendo DS. I hadn't played any of the previous versions, so I was new to this game. I really enjoyed it, the gameplay, the story, the art style, etc. I would really recommend it to any videgame player. It can be played in either a Nintendo DS or even the newer Nintendo 3DS.
summary: One of the best RPG games of all times

reviewText: I had always heard that this game is considered one of the best RPG's of all time and it truly lives up to that. The story is great, the characters are great, EVERYTHING IS GREAT! I cannot stress that enough. I do advise that you take your time and don't try to speed through the came because it might come back and hurt you later. Chrono Trigger needs to be in your collection!

This has been one of my favorite games since I played the original version on the SNES.

While the DS version  doesn't add much new content, it's still a superb game. The characters, the story, the gameplay, the music... everything is very well executed.

It's an awesome game, whether you have played it before or if it's your first time playing it.

If you like RPG games you can't go wrong with this one.
summary: Best RPG game I've ever played

reviewText: I own six copies of Chrono Trigger for SNES, one on my PS1, and now I have it for the DS. I have always loved this game and will purchase it on any console that it's released on. It's my favorite game of all time, and the additions in here are quite fantastic and well thought out. 10/10 would buy again.

This game was part of my teens (I played for the first time in a PS) and I've loved it ever since.
Me and my friends used to talk about it all the time (ok, we still talk about it sometimes).
To have a version of it that I can take anywhere was just perfect!

For those who love a good RPG, it's a must!

I purchased this with an amazon gift card that I had. The only problem with it other then the steep price is that the battery is simple to remove and can be easy to lose with small children in the house. Other than that it works great.

Chrono Trigger is one of the best RPG's I've ever played so naturally i had to have it. It has such an amazing story, wonderful characters, lots of exploration, and side quests. If you enjoy RPG's or want to get into playing RPG's Chrono Trigger is the way to go. Also listen to this song by Richie Branson so that you may see why Chrono Trigger is one of the best games ever: [...]

And if you need a little more convincing Watch Two Best Friends Play Chrono Trigger: [...]

I never had the time to play this game on SNES... and when it came for the DS I never knew... so I just bought a 3DS and I saw it here on amazon and I didn't think too much to buy it... just go for it if you love JRPG... you are going to love it!

The big sell on this controller was the improved D-pad, which is definitely improved. I really like the black thumb sticks, D-pad, triggers, and outline. All future 360 controllers should follow the design of this one. The price might turn off some people from buying it, but if you can afford it, you won't be disappointed.
summary: Best version of the Xbox 360 controller

reviewText: This is one great game, with lots of replay value. If you didn't play it when you are a kid on snes, do it now. If you did, do it again on NDS because its is simply one of the best games ever made. enough said.

I haven't gotten very far at all yet in this game, but so far I love the music and atmosphere, and the gameplay is great too of course. Coming from someone who isn't biased by nostalgia (I never played this game when it first came out) I would recommend it to anyone who enjoys RPGs.

just got it yesterday, I was in need of a new controller, my old one was worn out and didn't hold a charge. Great controller, great battery, great price. can't beat it, if you need a controller, get this one.

This is an excellent game. I never played it before, but read reviews on it years ago. I finally get to play this and it is one of the best rpgs around today. It is still very playable to me compared to todays games. I highly recommend this game to rpg gamers.

This controller is the same as any other official Microsoft Xbox 360 controller.  But the red and black color scheme really looks great on it.  It comes with a rechargeable battery pack as well as the play and charge cable.  Also comes with the battery case to put in standard batteries if you don't want to use the rechargeable for some reason.  If you need a spare controller or are just bored with your white one, this red controller is a great option.
summary: Standard Xbox 360 controller with a new coat of paint

reviewText: I loved this game back in the SNES days and not much has changed.  The new version has the option to use the stylus, new dungeons and added content to bridge the gap between Chrono Trigger and Chrono Cross (though it's not terribly well developed).  I'd say if you're looking for a retro classic or, like me, you had this game and lost it this title is worth your time.  If you already have a copy it's debatable whether the extra content warrants a re-purchase.
summary: A great classic with added content

reviewText: I bought this game years ago on the SNES. I really liked it, but my SNES is long since gone. This is a faithful version of the game. I don't play my DS as often as before but this is a great game in every way. If you like JRPG's this is a very good one. sadly there are fewer and fewer games like this nowadays. Square Enix still makes the best RPG's!

It's a great game to play and it's a pleasure to see it on the handheld DS now along with a few extras tied into it. For those who've played the game before you won't be disappointed and for those who have never played the game before and are into RPG's you're in for quite the treat.

This game is still (with the exception of better translation this time around) the same great game it was years ago and it is still the king of all RPG games.  The story is amazing, the characters are amazing and if you have never played this game on the SNES, you owe it to yourself to get this game.  If you like RPGs you will not be disappointed.  If you have played it, I am sure you are going to buy it again because you know what I am talking about.

I have been thinking about buying this for a while now and pulled the trigger on it about a month ago.  There is no comparison between it and the regular drums.  Way better in every way.  I haven't had any issues with the cymbals, pads are much better quality, great right of the box.  The only issue i have is that that the foot pedals sticks slightly if I press it down at an angle.  I really need to play a lot more to tell if it is really an issue or not.  [...].

I pre-ordered this game August of 2009, and it finally was available in the USA just this week. I love this type of game and this one was worth the wait! I don't know how long this game goes on for, I hope not over quickly. If you like games like Syberia and Trace Memories you will like this one.

I've had this game now for about a week and though I have only played it a few times I like it. It took me awhile to figure some of the things out in the beginning, and i ended up using a walkthrough for some of the things that where not obvious.

First of all, when you try to play a game it goes to xbox live so when you want to play a different one, you have to go back to the game disc and wait for it to load. Stupid design concept.

Second, the games play in a small box on the screen(no full screen). There was barely if any effort put into the games.
summary: Terrible way to make a compilation.

reviewText: I've been using these constantly since October 2009. I love the larger headphones, and am not a big fan of earbuds -- especially at my desktop computer. Great for gaming, and they work fine on my Windows 10 machine. I think I paid about $30 for them... but they're much more expensive now.
summary: A great, long lasting set of headphones!

reviewText: Ive had these headset for over 2 years.  It still works great and sounds ok.  Its a great entry level headset.  My only complaint is that I have a huge melon of a head so it fits pretty snug.  After an hour or two, it starts hurting my ears.  If I don't need to use my mic, I turn the headset so it sits on my neck instead of over my head and that helps a alleviate the pressure.
summary: Works great, snug if you have a large head

reviewText:
I am wearing this product right now, it is

-durable
-high quality
-comfortable
-aesthetically pleasing

You might think it is a bit bulky at first, but once you get used to it and adjust exactly how you wear it, it is very very cozy for the ears :)
summary: I am still wearing it 2 years later

reviewText:
I bought these for my husband so he wouldn't keep me up at night when he games, and he must love them because I don't even have to ask him to use them!

I've borrowed them a few times and find them to be extremely comfortable, and if I'm on my laptop, and he's gaming in the living room (volume at full blast, naturally) they totally tune out his noisy games and I can enjoy what I'm watching!

I bought these for my son and he had this to say about them: "I was looking for something that covered my ears, and not just bashed them in. These fit perfectly over my ears and provide great comfort while gaming. I haven't heard for myself how good the sound quality is from the mic, but I've been told that it sounds good over skype from my gamer friends. I can't find anything bad about them, except for the fact that the packaging took ages to cut through!"

These headphones have served me well for the past 6 months and I do recommend them to anyone looking for a good but cheap set of headphones. The mic sounds wonderful, and the sound quality is great. They are not noise cancelling, but they do block out a good amount of sound.

I've been buying Plantronics headsets for years.  It takes 1-2 years to wear a pair out, even with daily use.  With Logitech and other brands, I was buying new ones every three months.  The sound quality is great for the price range and they are super comfortable to wear.  The microphone is clear and easy to set up, works great with games, ventrilo, mumble, etc.  All in all, this is a great value for a headset that will last a long, long time.

I bought these headphones for myself for Christmas and I have been very happy with these headphones. I have not made any adjustments to them and they work wonderfully! My only complaint is that if you wear the headphones on too long they tend to press on your head and give me headaches, that could just be me but other than that they are great headphones! A good buy for anyone!!!

I bought this headset on sale, been using it for a while now. It's a great product.

Pros: Comfortable, great audio quality (can be adjusted both in PC and by the mic itself), clear voice output.

Cons: None so far.

It's great. If you find it at a good price, get it.

It is very comfortable, and has really good sound! Awesome headset for the price! Plus it looks really nice! I really like the fact that they go over the ear making it so much more comfortable to wear for a long period of time. Great for those long hours of gaming, listening to music, or just watching a movie! Very happy!!!

I bought these headphones to use for extended amounts of time at work.  They are extremely comfortable and the sound quality (good treble, deep bass, loud) is far better then I expected for the price.  The in-line volume control is a nice addition too.  On a aesthetic note, I believe the headset is constructed beautifully and the cord is different then most headphone cords.  It seems more flexible and durable.  I would definitely recommend this product to anyone; you won't be disappointed.

This headset has worked really well for me.  The microphone works very well with little distortion and the audio quality is better than any other headset I've owned.  It fits well on my head and the padding makes it very comfortable to wear over long gaming sessions.  The only small problem I've had is sometimes the padding can make it a little too warm on the ear causing me to sweat.
summary: Great headset, may get a little hot

reviewText: I have owned these headphones for a few months and they continue to work magnificently.  These are a great value for someone who wants great sounding speakers in a comfortable headset that does a good job of canceling out outside noise.  You really have to tap me on the shoulder when I have these on to get my attention. Also these are a great fit for those of you who may have a larger noggin.
summary: Great Value on a Great Headset

reviewText: I have had these for about a month and they have done me well.  The mic is nice and clear and my friends have no problems hearing me.  I got this for 25 bucks so I think it was a good deal.  I love the look of these and would recommend this to anyone.

Works great! I almost bought a whole new Xbox 360 remote because I thought it was broken. I bought this hoping it would fix the problem and sure enough it did. I guess the battery case just wasn't closing tight enough on the remote or something. Glad I was able to fix the remote and not have to pay so much for a new remote.

The quality seems a little flimsier than the actual Microsoft version. However it fits perfectly and does what it's supposed to. The only bad thing is I can't pick the color. I now have a white controller with a black battery pack. But for the price it's fantastic!!!

I couldn't find any of the battery pack covers for my wireless controllers. Even if I could, my black controller's pack cover was loose and occasionally detached mid-game.

I ordered this in hopes of being able to use my wireless controller and was not disappointed. This was worth the purchase and far cheaper than the cost of a new wireless controller.

not the best game in the world BUT since this game is a bargain price, its worth picking up! I enjoyed this game and I am glad I didn't fork over the full price which would of been $59.99 but instead I got this game for $14.99 during a sale.

I loved the game but it was a little too repetitive and the worst thing about it was the loading time. I don't understand why it has to take so long. But besides those things I did like it. The gore, violence, and the pictures of Rick's girlfriend. The character is very cool. I would recommend it to my friends and already have. I'm just not ready to give it to them yet.

I purchased this game for my son, it was supposed to be for his xbox360, but wound up being the ps3 version.  Lucky for us, we also have a ps3, so I didn't make a fuss. all in all the game was a hit.  Both my son's, 16 & 20, love it.

So I bought this game a while back and never opened it, thought that when I'll get to it I'll play it. Of course, in the meantime Microsoft stopped their DRM servers and I can't play the game. I can't even register the key on Steam. Great customer service, buy something and can never play it because of their DRM, not going to buy games with DRM from now on, that's for sure.

One of the best Batman Games ever! The graphics are breathtaking, and the game mechanics are awesome.
Mark Hamill does the voice of the "JOKER", and he really brings him to life!

Mark Hamill:
American actor, writer, producer, and director. He is best known for portraying the hero Luke Skywalker in the original Star Wars trilogy and reprising the role in Star Wars
summary: One of the best Batman Games ever

reviewText: Really good game.  I enjoyed it from beginning to end.  Arkham Asylum is a great stealth-action game.  I enjoyed the exploration, the mystery, the detective work, the creepy and haunting villains, and the gadgets.  The voice acting here is superb.  God the Joker is funny!  The characters are wonderful, especially the Joker and the Scarecrow.  This is a good game for fans of Batman and fans of stealth games, such as the early Assassin's Creed games.

This game is has great graphics, awesome gameplay, and an interesting storyline. It even works on Windows 8! My only complaint is that you aren't able to save your game progress unless you make a windows live account so if you don't have internet this game might suck for you.
summary: Great Game, Great Price, Great Price, Great Graphics

reviewText: This is an excellent game, that really captures the flavor of the Batman experience.  There are a lot of different things to do in this game, and my five-year old daughter, who is a big Batman fan, enjoyed playing it with me and hunting for Riddler Trophies.  My only gripe is that in the final battle, the game perspective changes, so it was a challenge to try and fight this difficult battle from a new perspective, but it was overall a very good game.
summary: A fun game with a lot of challenges

reviewText: This is one of the best games ever made. The graphics are amazing and gameplay is original, creative, unique, and manages to draw you deeper into the world of Batman than you ever thought a game could. Whether you are just a gamer, a Dark Knight fan, or both, this game is guaranteed to satisfy and delight!

I was highly DISSAPPOINTED with this product! After taking forever to install, I was unable to get the game to start up at all. Also, this did NOT include the 3D version of the game, which was the main reason I bought it. If anyone knows what the problem is with this game, please reply. I love the game itself (had the 3D DEMO version), and would love to get this working. Any help would be appreciated.

I'm not much of a video game player. I come from an era when PONG was a sensation. I bought this game from a demo I saw and It is absolutley the best money I have ever spent on a game. It keeps you interested, guessing, and amazed throughout the main quest. Then when the main story is over the challenges, which are seperate part of the game that you earn by playing the main story, keep you coming back for more. I can hardly wait for Arkham City that comes out later this year. Five Stars.

I don't usually play these types of games but as a huge fan of Batman and his rogues gallery I really enjoyed this. I love the gameplay, animations, production design and the story. Can't wait for the sequel!

If your a fan of Batman and video games you must buy this game!

I've played it on both the Xbox 360 and PC and both version play great. I used a 360 controller to play it on the PC and highly suggest it if you're going with the PC version. The graphics are a little sharper on the PC if you have a really good computer to run everything at the max.

Great game, you won't be disappointed.
summary: Best Super Hero Game Ever Made

reviewText: I have never had an issue with Amazon and this is the first time that I've gotten damaged product. When I got the product the case was cracked and the disk was scratched up and on top of that the game sucked. So it really wasn't a good buy.

I purchased this game for my 12 year old daughter, she really
loves it, I thought it would be too rough, but so far it doesn't
seem to scare her and she is having a lot of fun playing it.

Interesting story line, can't wait to see what happens next kinda game..

Batman Arkham Asylum is hard to put down.  Graphics are awesome, story is interesting, gameplay is challenging but not something only hardcore gamers can figure out.  The strong language doesn't occur too often, but I didn't feel like it added anything to the game and should have been omitted.  I borrowed the game from a friend and soon purchased it for myself.  You're not going to find a better game for the price.
summary: One of the best Xbox 360 games ever!

reviewText:
What can I say that hasn't already been said? This game is everything a Batman game should be. Stealth, combat, and, of course, his wonderful toys! It is a little light on actual detective work, but the rest of the game more than makes up for it!

Graphics are great. From the interior of the asylum to the island itself.

Controls are easy to master. Combat looks awesome.

This has got to be one of the funnest games I've played.  I've heard the sequels are even better!  I can only imagine.  I'm definitely getting the other ones.

You're BATMAN!  It's a great combo of stealth, brute fighting, swinging, dodging, explosions, detective stuff, and engaging story.

So if you like Batman and fun, you'll like this.  The End.

I had a blast playing this game, the freeflow combat works great. I think it's the best comic book character game I have played. The one thing I didn't like though is you spend too much time in detective mode, which changes the way everything looks and you don't get to see the scenery as much.

This game was great. The graphics were amazing and the plot was well though out. My favorite parts were with scarecrow. I would definetly recommend this game. It held my interest the whole time I played it.

You do the same thing over and over again. You go in a room and beat up five or six guys then repeat. I have no idea how this got game of the year. There is also absolutely no exploring aspect to this game because all you do is go in a room and beat up a few guys then repeat.

THIS WAS GREAT!! MY SON WAS SUPER EXCITED. MY SHIPMENT CAME IN WITHOUT ANY DAMAGE AND IT ARRIVED JUST IN TIME FOR CHRISTMAS. I LOVED THE ENTIRE PROCESS. THE GAME WORKS PERFECTLY FINE. IF ONLY I CAN GET MY SON AWAY FROM PLAYING THIS GAME.

Let me start off by saying this is a great game whether you are a batman fan or not...period.  It has just the right mix of action, cinematics, and problem solving.  And overall...it's just a very fun game to play.
summary: One of the best games I've played...very well done ;)

reviewText: I have not played it yet, but bought it for $15, so I am pretty sure it's completely worth the money I paid. Besides, when I played it at Best Buy, the fight scene was pretty EPIC. Still have yet to find time for this game, though!

This game is terrific. The graphics are solid, the storyline keeps you interested, and most of all the weaponry you get to use during fight sequences are awesome. The Game probably took me between fifteen to eighteen hours to beat so it was worth the money. Also, throughout the game, you can open challenges to keep you busier when the game ends. This Batman title is a great game to add to your collection especially if you are a Batman fan.
summary: One of the Best Games of the Year

reviewText:
this game has great pacing and flow, something that many other games in many other genres could learn from, making this game very accessible and entertaining to all that will play it while maintaining what true Batman fans love about the caped crusader. This is a truly great game, and if you play it you will know how good it is.

warning to parents there is some visceral, and brutal violence in this game so if you don't want to expose your kids to this subject matter then stay away

I was skeptical about this game, as so many other licensed games flat-out suck.  But I just finished it and it's fantastic!  Batman Arkham Asylum has done for superhero video games what Batman Begins and the Dark Knight did for superhero movies.  It's fun, reasonably long and has very high production values.  If you are at all interested in Batman, you should play this game!
summary: Best Batman game you could hope for!

reviewText: Batman: Arkham Asylum is a great game all around. Lately, I've been losing interest in most games after a few hours of play time, and I just attributed it to getting older, but Arkham Asylum has renewed my faith in gaming. The story line is great and the voice acting is top notch. The game play is engaging and doesn't become too repetitive. I love this game.
summary: One of the best games I've played in a long time!

reviewText: This is probably the most fun I have ever had with a videogame. It combines the perfect amount of stealth and aggression, and every one of the characters are very well done. While the game was a bit short, the challenge maps add some level of replayability. I was initially hesitant to buy this game, because licensed games are generally terrible, but after playing Arkham Asylum, I am looking forward to giving the developers more of my money for the sequel.

i downloaded the demo and wasn't happy. i didn't know what to expect but what i played i didn't like.

then a few months later i decided to get the game because it got some great reviews. although the demo was the same thing as the beginning of the real game- i ended up loving it. such a great game. it has everything. not repetitive...there is always something new. can't wait for the second one. in the mean time i say YOU NEED TO GET THIS!
summary: hated the demo but loved the game.

reviewText: This game was fantastic. The story was amazing, making you feel like you were playing an original Batman comic book. The gameplay was strong, giving you adequate difficulty without being overbearing and the voice acting was some of the best you will come across using Kevin Conroy(batman) and Mark Hamill(joker). These guys reprised their roles from the Batman animated series and it was the smartest gaming move in years. Great game and a must buy.

Batman is supposed to be the dark knight. In previous games you were anything but suttle when you moved from room to room. In this game you can hide in the shadows and drop from the rafters to take out henchmen and scare the others. You also have tons of cool gadgets that help you through each level. The hand to hand combat system is by far the coolest I have ever seen. If you love Batman you will want this game.

this game is out of control and i cant wait for the next one.  everything about this game is perfect in every way.  the fight scenes are tight and spot on.  all the gagets are incredible.  i have recently beat this game and i want to play it again. there are many things to do and solving the riddler's puzzles is fun.  this is definitely one of the best games ever made thus far for ps3.  get it now.

Batman Arkham Asylum is so good. I enjoyed this game way more than any of the Batman movies. There's appearances from Joker, Scarecrow, Bane, Harley Quinn, Poison Ivy and more. But the fun comes from sneaking up on enemies, either from above or below and taking them out silently while their comrades stand by oblivious.
Everything about this game is top notch. The creators should be extremely pleased with themselves for exceeding the high expectations fans had for this game.

This has dethroned (just barely) Infamous as the best superhero game ever.  You feel like Batman, you do the awesome things Batman does.  And you do it with the style of Batman.

The main campaign is a little short, but this game is an incredible ride.

The portions of the game where you sneak around hunting the bad guys are pure fun.  This is what video games are supposed to be about!

This game was awesome. Great mix of action and puzzles. I enjoyed almost every aspect, found the voice work to be fantastic and really had a great time playing it. My only gripe would be the boss fights were pretty easy once you figured them out. However, don't let that detract from the game as the story is cool, the graphics are great and it was like playing an updated version of the batman cartoon from the 90's. Definitely Recommended.

This is one of the best Batman interpretations I've ever seen.  This is one of the best video games I've ever played.  The voice acting is top notch.  The play is insanely fun.  The story is great.  And the game is even a little scary, as well it should be since it all takes place on Arkham Island.  I can't even express effectively enough how awesome this game is.  Buy it.
summary: One of the best Batman bits o' media ever.

reviewText: I was a little skeptical about this game, but then read the reviews and decided to buy this game.  It was a great decision.  This game rocks.  From the graphics to the voice acting, this game is amazing.  I would definitely recommend this game.  It has everything a batman game should have.

I thought no other game could be at the level of METAL GEAR SOLID 4. Well, I was wrong. This BATMAN game is incredible, from the gameplay to the story telling, everything is well done! A must for all PS3/XBOX owners.
summary: One of the best games I've ever played!!!

reviewText: This game has a lot of different scenarios and the fight scenes are amazing. It doesn't get old and the riddles are also fun. The fighting is some of the best I've seen in beat 'em up games and the cinematics are great. Voice acting and graphics are great too. Like the others said, you really feel like you're Batman.

This game rocks!  This truly feels like a Batman game.  From the graphics to the voice-overs to the overall story-line.  The game just feels so Dark and engulfs you into the character.  I wasn't planning on buying this game but after playing the demo(which is one of the best demos I ever played) I knew I had to get it and I don't regret it at all.  If you're a Batman fan or even if you're not a fan, you will get enjoyment out of this game.
summary: What The Dark Knight is all about!!!

reviewText: I play a lot of Fifa and this mic works great. Other than a little bit of echo once and a while, it works great. I recommended it to my friend and he bought it and he loves it. If you can get a hold of one of these, do it and it is worth every penny.

These are great for the price. My kids put their headphones to the test on a daily basis and these are durable and work great. They cannot hear the actual game through these but can talk to their friends and that is what is most important to them anyway. For the price, you can't beat this set of headphones for the Xbox 360. I already bought two sets of them and this set I bought for a backup just in case they break one or the price goes up.

I was surprised to find a headset for my Xbox 360 that was very inexpensive, but that soon faded once the headset stopped working after a month. There would be a static sound coming from the headset and people couldn't hear me even though I could hear them. Needless to say, it's not worth spending your $5 on this. Better to invest in a higher quality version that will last you longer than 4 weeks.
summary: Bad Quality, You Get What You Pay For

reviewText: These are fairly inexpensive headsets, but they work great.  If you're looking for a simple headset that works well, this is a good fit.  It's comfortable and covers both ears, so it's very easy to hear through.  The microphone is about the right sensitivity and picks up sound clean.  I would very much recommend this headset!

When I got it and used it for the first time, I realized the mic made my voice sound horrible. Very distorted and scratchy, to the point you could barely understand what I was saying. Couldn't be bothered to return it though... you get what you pay for.

I wasn't sure how good the quality would be when I bought these for my son, however we were pleasantly surprised at how good they worked. They pick up any voices in the room but block out all background noise which is fabulous. They are comfortable to wear as well as easy to change volume and mute while in play. We liked them so much I bought another pair.

I have had this product for a month now and I love it. Fits good, sounds great and the mic doesn't mess up when talking into it. Although the mic does pick up a lot of surrounding sounds. I like to play music while playing games and the people in my party can hear it too unless my music is a certain distance away or a lower volume.
summary: ... had this product for a month now and I love it. Fits good

reviewText: When I saw the price for these headphones, I was a little iffy about buying them but honestly they are excellent for the price. The sound quality is great and the shipping was fast. I will definitely be buying these again once my other ones stop working.
summary: I was a little iffy about buying them but honestly they are excellent for the price

reviewText: I bought 2 of these for my son. When the first one broke, I thought my son had misused the product. I decided to buy another one since the price was pretty cheap. On the second, the wires tore and became unusable within two weeks. It is cheap quality. I do not recommend this product. Invest in something that will last.

I got these for my guy for Christmas and he appreciated it.  The headphones were completely intact.  He gave them a try and said that the sound was good and obviously the person he was talking to could hear him.  The only con I can think of is that the cord plugs into the controller, so he can't use his chat pad, but this isn't such an issue because he doesn't need the pad with the headphones.

The ear pad fell off within the first 2 days.  We were able to put it back on but you had to be extremely careful with it.  This microphone only lasted 2 months and now it doesn't work.  I thought it would be more comfortable for my son when he was playing with his older brother but it just couldn't handle normal wear.

My son loves these headphones....they are the ones I see him using the most. He says they are comfortable and don't hurt his ears and the sound quality is excellent. They were received in a timely manner in good shape. For the price...you can't beat it...I bought two...just in case the dog gets one again!!!

I don't know why some people are complaining about these headphones. Bought one for my boyfriend and my brother in law loved it and bought one too. It's great because I can play my music loud in the apartment and my boyfriend can still hear his teammates, and yes he cannot hear the game on the tv but he doesn't care because he's interacting with other ppl and whenever he's playing by himself he doesn't use the headphones.

I must admit, I didn't have high expectations for a headset that cost me 8 dollars. Fortunately, I wouldn't have been disappointed even if I had. No it's not as comfortable as a turtle beach, but the bios quality is the same as the entry model turtle beach. The sound is fine if you don't care whether it has that surround sound feel to it. I haven't had any complaints from anyone not able to hear me so far. I would definitely recommend this to anyone on a budget.

The headset didn't even work right out of the box. I could hear other people talk, but whatever I said wouldn't go through. And the earmuffs are huge and block out all of the sounds of the game, which don't play through the headphones themselves. Don't waste your money

Despite what the other people have said, this is a great headset for the price. I bought this 3 months ago, and have been using it every day sense. As long as you take care of it, don't pull on the wire, and really care for it, then you will have this for a while.

The headset is nice and comfortable and worked well. I'd have given it a much higher rating but it only lasted 7 weeks before the mic went bad. I'd suggest looking at something else if you want something that lasts.

I bought this game a couple a weeks ago and I really tried to get into it but I couldn't. It plays very weird. I own fashion designer ny and I love that game. I thought it would play the same way but it didn't so I traded it in for store credit at gamestop. Maybe someone else will have better luck than I did.

My daughter got this game for Christmas and still loves to play it.  I have three children (girl 10, girl 8 and boy 5) and they all love to play this game both alone, together, and with friends.  They play it quite a bit and they still haven't "won".  There are plenty of awards along the way and the kids really get their exercise while playing.

I've really enjoyed my Korg DS-10.  I'm not a musician, but I can make some very pleasing sounds from my DS with this tool.  It's really not a game, so I'm not sure why it's listed as one.  If you've ever felt like twiddling knobs on a synthesizer but didn't want to buy one to do it, this little program will give you that option for a pretty reasonable price.

I haven't figured out how to export the recorded music to my computer.  I certainly hope that's an option that I just haven't found yet.

Works great! If you have an Xbox wheel and a Playseat this is the best way to mount it IMO. Only complaint is that mine didn't come with bolts/nuts to fasten it to the Playseat so I had to make a special trip to the hardware store for that. Would have been nice if they came in the kit.

I love action adventure games! This game place exactly like the computer version (except that you touch the items on the screen instead of using your mouse!). One great bonus is that you can save three games at once so you and your friends can play at the same time. Another great bonus is that there are three levels of play; kiddie size, regular size, and jumbo size. I can only hope now that they develop a version for the Wii.

Not as well known as the Civilization franchise, Europa Universalis 3 is an outstanding grand strategy game with much greater historical accuracy. Basically take control of any country from the 15th century to the 19th. Gameplay has a bit of a steep learning curve, but once you master it, all of history is yours to rewrite.
summary: One of the best strategy games

reviewText: THIS IS THE WORST GAME I HAVE EVER PURCHASED!!! I WAS EXPECTING A STRATEGY GAME WHEN I PURCHASED THIS GAME BECAUSE IT STATED IT IS A LONG LASTING STRATEGY GAME!!! BE ADVISED DO NOT PURCHASE THIS GAME IF YOUR ARE EXPECTING A STRATEGY WAR FIGHTING GAME, YOU DO NOT EVEN GET TO ATTACK OR ASSUALT OTHER ARMYS. YOU JUST SIT THEIR ON A MAP AND TWIDDLE YOUR THUMBS. THE WORST GAME ON THE PLANET!!!!!!!

I think this is a great game. It wasn't expensive and we had a blast. My boyfriend even enjoyed it. We had fun. The kids learn new things and so did we. We haven't played much because I only purchased it a couple days ago. But I look forward to enjoying it more in the days to come.

This is a simple yet fun game to play.  You can play by yourself or with multiple people and you can either play against them or team up and play co-op.  We have been playing this game for a while and there have been no repeat questions and the questions aren't too hard or too easy, just right.  I would recommend this game as not only fun but educational too!
summary: A Fun Game that We Keep Coming Back To

reviewText: The biggest flaw with the port of Bully would be the controls, but these are easily alleviated by using a gamepad, ideally the Xbox 360 controller itself. Other than that the game runs pretty well on the PC, and is just as fun as it was on the console. The gameplay is varied enough, and the story has the classic Rockstar tongue in cheek satire, and the sandbox world is fun to explore.
summary: Decent port of an awesome game

reviewText: These items are great, I love the fact that all these items came in a bundle for a fair price.  The keyboard came in handy because you just can't type very fast without it.  If you have an Xbox 360 I would say that this is a must have.

Bought this game and it arrived on time. This game also includes the soundtrack on a seperate disc. Works great and the game includes more classes than console versions. Works well with a PS2 controller through a KMD usb adapter also available on Amazon. Happy gaming (:

KMD USB adapter for PS2-PC:  http://www.amazon.com/KMD-PS2-Controller-Converter-PlayStation-2/dp/B0045EF5CA/ref=sr_1_3?ie=UTF8&qid=1360436404&sr=8-3&keywords=kmd+usb+ps2

I just wanted to point out that these are not really pink.  They look more reddish purple to me. I had to double check here to make sure they sent me the right pair.

They're a lot more sturdy than I thought they were going to be.

I love, love, LOVE my new drum sticks! They are very sturdy, but not too heavy. I personally don't care for the rubber tips, so I just don't use them. Everyone always compliments my drumsticks...because they are awesome!!
summary: These make me feel more like a real drummer!

reviewText: I bought this game about three weeks ago and i must say it is the best super bike sim out there. The game is somewhat difficult at first but the initial settings make it easy to learn and start winning races. Then when you feel comfortable you can turn up the difficulty or change the settings to make it more realistic. This game has the most realism. The only thing i wished that they improved was the graphics. The game looks good but not like GT5 prologue.

I was really wondering how this would all come out to be, and I wasn't disappointed. It was really fun to play and I sat down with it for hours literally. If you're a fan of the King of Fighters Saga you can take a bite out of this. If it's not your cup of Tea don't bother, and bash the game. I hate seeing that.

This was one of the first games I played for Nintendo DS. The game starts out quite slow and never really picks up. The main problem isn't the story line. The game is simply very boring and repetitive.

When I first got Sims 3 I have to admit I didn't see what all the hype was about. But I noticed the more I played the better it got and the more I noticed I could do. The customization is incredible...I learn more each time I play!
Keep in mind this is the first issue and will only get better and better!
If you have the game keep playing and you will see what I mean.
If you are considering the game...it's worth it!

If you can have a look at my son's face, you will realize how much he loves the console. He is buying new games left and right and also some new accessories. It came in with a game and a movie. Both of them played well as far as I know.

I would recommend this to every kid out there.
summary: On behalf of my Son. It is awesome

reviewText: It takes a while to get used to so as to not have to look down at what you're trying to type, but after that, it's incredibly useful and fun to use. The battery life also seems to last a very long time, but you can't check and see that, as there's no battery gauge either on the keypad or in the console menu.  Finally, it's nice that it's Bluetooth, and therefore requires no keeping a track of a dongle.

Another surprise for my son. He had mentioned wanting a keyboard for his PS3, but did not put it on his wish list. I read the reviews on this item and most were good. He uses it often. Yes it is small. It attaches to the PS3 controller. It works fine for his needs.

when i first saw this item, i saw it at a store. it was selling for $40. i checked on amazon and the price was only $30. the shipping was extremely fast and i got my package hand delivered to me. i am using the ps3 wireless keypad right now to write this review. this is a great product. don't buy any of those cheap knockoff keypads. spend the couple extra bucks and buy this one.

The keyboard exceeded my expectations. Despite being a small keyboard, has countless features, apart from being keyboard, it can be used as a mousepad and not only it can be used with the PS3, you can also use it as a wireless keyboard with your laptop. It was an excellent choice and very good price.

I use this when I connect to the internet with my PS3, and overall, I'm happy with it. The keys are small, but not too small, and if you can send text messages on a QWERTY cell phone pad then this should be no problem. Only complaint I have is that they keypad should have been lit so we could see them in the dark.

This keypad is designed very well. It fits on the PS3 controller perfectly and does not get in the way of gameplay. Of course, it is not as fast as typing on a full size keyboard, but it is compact and allows me to type way faster than finding the letters with the directional control. If speed is what you're going for, get a USB keyboard (it will save you about $30 dollars too).
