Love this game, I like the fact that the game gets harder, more challenging as you go.  Very addicting.  Display is bright and colorful, as well as easy to understand as you go along.  Lots of different levels to reach.  I sometimes get so caught up in the game of making matches that I do not pay attention to the timer!  I just can't get enough of this game.

I purchased this game and 7 Wonders of Ancient worlds and I like this game a lot more.  It has the same concept as the 7 Wonders but it lets you play each level as many times as it take until you solve it.  There is no penalty for not completing the level on time.  It has power-ups that can help you completing the level.  The graphics are great, music is very catchy as well.  I highly recommend it.

This is a great game.  As you complete each level, the next level gets progressively more difficult.  You can learn interesting facts along the way as you build Rome.  I would highly recommend this game.

I can say a lot of good things about this game, and some of the bad, but I am a man of few words, at least I am today, What I will say is don't be fooled by reviews from IGN and others, The is a good game, with flaws, but still enjoyable. Do not let this one slip by

I have not had this much fun playing a game in a long time! I like games that have unlockable content, and replayability. I can't wait for the sequel! It's worth noting that the Wii version is a sequel, not a port of the same game. So you can buy both and enjoy each for it's own merits!

Bring it on! 5 stars, my highest recommendation.

I REALLY LOVE THIS GAME SO I ORDER AMAZING ADVENTURES AROUND THE WORLD AND ANOTHER AMAZING ADVENTURES GAME. AT THE TIME I THOUGHT WERE FOR THE DSI BUT WHEN I GOT THE GAMES I FOUND OUT THEY WERE FOR MY PC.  I WAS REALLY DISAPOINTED. LIKE I SAID I REALLY LIKE THIS GAME AND WISH THEY WOULD MAKE THE OTHER AMAZING GAMES FOR THE DSI. PLEASE TELL ME WHY THIS CAN'T BE DONE.  THEY MAKE MORE INVOLVED GAMES FOR THE DSI WHY NOT THESE GAMES?

I really like this game. I'm not much of a gamer but this game seems to be harder than the Millionaire game. That game was so easy, I beat it in 2 weeks of on and off play. This game is alot harder, and at times frustrating so much so I had to put it down. But I love it though.

I love this game! I love hidden object games, but have had a hard time finding one I liked on the DS. True, you go through the same areas finding things, but you're looking for different things. And even though it's the same area sometimes it's hard to find what you're looking for. I like the mini-games and the unlimited play where you can go and find everything in the area. I'm almost done with the game and look forward to starting over again to beat my score. :)

I gave it to my husband and he played it for three days straight, he really liked it. After he finished it the kids tried it, it was a little hard for them but they still enjoyed it (which is good, I'd rather see them challenged!)
It's probably not for younger kids, but for older kids and adults it's excellent.

Edited to add:it has made it's way through the whole family now, and we all liked it. The puzzles were entertaining, and some of the kids have gone on to become puzzle game addicts.
summary: It made it's way through the family...

reviewText: i am still playing this game.  i just play the mini games now.  i went through the whole game in a matter of hours and it was fun.  although it is repetitive, it is fine for those of you (and me) that just want a quick game.  my favorite is the jigsaw puzzles and you can play about 10 games in 5 minutes.  it's hard to keep my attention on something, so i play a few minutes a day and i am satisfied.  if you want a long game, this is not the one for you.  this is very easy and entertaining.
summary: will keep you busy for a while

reviewText: I love this game and can play it for hours. I like how there are two "games" on here. Peggle and Peggle Nights. There are also bonus levels too so you get a lot of gameplay on this game. Even if you have the newer 3DS check this game out because it's really fun. Even if the graphics are starting to look dated I still enjoy it so much.

Peggle is an addictive game that you can play for 5 minutes or an hour. It is a pachinko style game that you eliminate the orange color balls. It has unicorns, it has Ode to Joy, it has rainbows, it is an awesome game you won't be able to put it down.

This game is great! If you've played other versions of Peggle, the DS version has some added content worth checking out! If you haven't played Peggle yet, head over to popcap's website and try it for free. Great game for kids and adults! My parents like it, I like it, and my kids (nieces and nephews too) like it as well!

I was looking for a new game to get for my DS. I kept seeing this Peggle Dual Shot come up, but I wasn't sure if I was going to like it or not. Finally, after talking myself into it, I bought it, figuring what the heck, I'll give it a try! I am SO glad I got this game! It is fun and addicting and I'm hoping they come out with another Peggle game because this one was so much fun!! If you're thinking this is going to be like Pong, you are so wrong! Its way better than Pong!!
summary: Way better than I had anticipated!!

reviewText: I have purchased many games for my DS, but this is the best one yet.  I have been playing it now for weeks and find it hard to put it down.  Even my husband, who doesn't usually play games is enjoying it.  You'll absolutely love it.  It's well worth the price.

I have played this on my PC for awhile and when I saw this on the DS I had to get it.  There isn't as much control with the DS as with the PC and there isn't as much "ball bounce" but I still love the game.  It is super fun!  The music is great the game is great.  I think people who love the PC game will love to play it on the DS.  You can take Peggle with you!!!!!!!!! how awesome is that?

This game is very addictive.  As an adult DS user, I found it challenging and just a ton of fun to play.  It is very easy to catch on too, the game pretty much teaches you how to play from the start.  Just plug it in and go for it.  For those who love games like Zuma, this game is for you!

I love hidden object games and this is one of the best I have played.  It is as good as any of the "Mystery Case Files" games that I have played in the past.  This was definitely one of the best Christmas presents that I have given to myself to date.  LOL!

This was one of the first games I bought for my new DS and I purchased it because I have some of the same genre games on my home computer.  I wasn't disappointed in the game for DS and was very pleased with the delivery time and condition of the game.

PS3 and Xbox 360 have a lot of the shooter games with the "M" rating.  This is finally a game for the crowd that likes those games but has a Wii.  The game itself is very simple, even somewhat predictable, but it is still very fun.  There are different modes, features, and weapons.  This will add a little bit of replay value.  Don't fool yourself into thinking that you will keep coming back to this one and get a lot of play out of it.

Still a very good buy and very fun to play through.

Sega has really upped the ante for the House of the Dead Series. I originally started playing HoTD games on the Sega Saturn and have been a fan for many years. House of the Dead Overkill is the best of the series, bringing a truely unique experience to the Wii console. This is not a game for children, it is rated mature for a reason. It has some very gory scenes of violence and adult language. That being said, I loved it and so will everyone who has ever liked HoTD in the past.

Had reservations about getting this but have to say I've really enjoyed it and even laughed out loud a few times. Boss fights are good too and even though it's supposed to be gory, it does it in such an over-the-top fashion it's not even scary (and I don't like scary stuff). I'm over half-way through and this will be one of the few games I really play to completion.
summary: Enjoyed it more than I thought I would

reviewText:
Great fun! I was so pleased to see that this game was made well! I'll be playing it for a while to come.

If you like this, then also check out House of the Dead 2/3 also on Nintendo Wii. Great fun!

5 stars, my highest recommendation!

I never share my thoughts about my purchases, but just had to about this game.  This is one of the worst hidden object games I have ever played.  The game being extremely short was not even the worst thing about it.  The graphics are horrible and outdated.  You had to constantly click to go to the next screen or to make the stupid butler go away.  Don't waste time and/or money on this one.

I really like this game except for the fact that it gets stuck and will not let you move forward about 1/4 of the way into the game. I have restarted the game several times on several different computer/versions of Windows and it gets stuck in the same spot every time. Do NOT purchase until this problem is fixed.

This is a really fun game to play as it is a hidden object, puzzle and adventure all in one.  Each time you play it, the hidden objects seem to change just a little bit.  The puzzles would get a little more difficult to solve, but once I did, I loved it.  I liked this game so much that I ordered another Samatha Swift game.

Brilliant, for the price I really wasn't expecting too much but i was impressed. The controller has so many control surfaces it is amazing how many functions you can assign!! The joystick is a bit resistive and takes some time to get used to, but other than that I'd definitely recommend this to anyone!

This joystick was great for a long time. However there is one huge problem that would prevent me from ever buying another one. In windows 8 there is no option to calibrate this joystick. And after many years of use the calibration is way off with no way to fix it. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT IF YOU WANT TO RUN WINDOWS 8!

Wow! I am so disappointed. The stick is the worst joystick I ever bought. The biggest problem is that after only 2 months the stick is useless. The first thing that went was the right lower button on the upper part of the stick. Next, the lower left button in the same location snapped off. Then, within a few minutes, the yaw went bad so that if you just grip the handle the yaw goes left as if twisting left. It's completely useless after only 2 months.

I bought this because it looks cool, but it is the worst joystick I've ever owned and I spent a lot of money on it. I recommend the Logitech Extreme 3D Pro. It's inexpensive, and it is about a hundred times better.

I never review products. But this is a must. When I purchased this, I was unaware that I was purchasing a European version. I couldn't even use the download code that came with it. This was a total disappointment for my 5 year old daughter.

Now we can play Animal Crossing and hear each other! Wii Speak is great, it makes the game so much more fun! I highly recommend this product, it's easy to install and easy to use. Just follow the directions and it takes only minutes! Great product and well worth it to hear my nieces laugh and have a great time.

A game like Rock Band is all about the music.  More tracks equal more fun.  Of course you want the right songs and for me this pack had them.  Normally I would just download different songs I like but I tend to like most songs on this pack so it was worth it to just get the whole pack.

So take a look at the track list and if you like a majority of the songs then grab it.  If not then just download the ones you want and save yourself some cash.

This is my first time to ever write a review, but I decided to write a quick one with this game.

It was fun and quirky and I found the characters banter to be entertaining.  I hope more get made like this.  I have already told many of my friends about this game.  Several of them have gone out to buy it.

I have an 8 year old and an 11 year old who both love it.  It is great to see that Sony put out this type of games that can be played by the younger crowd as they do not have very many.  It has great background music that we all find enjoyable to listen to as well.

This is a great game. It is fun, somewhat strange, but quite addicting once you start to play. It is also very easy to learn and a good game for all ages. Would recommend this game if you are looking for something a little different to play and enjoy.
summary: Great game and lots of fun!

reviewText: Bought this for my granddaughter who loves to cook. She said it's great. We prepared some of the recipes. All came out pretty good. The feature I like the best other than the recipes is the grocery list that goes with each recipe. It's great. Just take the DS to the store with you.

This is actually a great game!  I was a little stumped at the beginning though, because I thought it was supposed to be a game like Cooking Mama.  I have made fifty recipes so far, and all of them have become a sucess.  My first dish was the macaroni and cheese, and it was so good!  I highly recommend the chow mein recipe.  My son and I love this game.  I totally recomend!

This is a boring game. The instructions are horrible.
Do not buy this unless you are under the age of 13.
Bad game play. Unimaginative. Waste of time.
We will be taking our copy to a store that will let us trade it in.

DON't BUY THIS GAME

I am a huge Halo fan, and when I heard that Halo Wars was going to be an RTS, I was scared. Halo has always been a FPS, and I liked that, anything different would of turned me off. Which is why I waited so long to play Halo Wars. When I finally got around to playing it, I quickly realized that I was dead wrong. Halo Wars is just as much fun as a normal Halo would be. And for the skeptics that thought a RTS couldn't be perfected on a console, Ensemble Studios did an excellent job!
summary: Great Halo Game, Perfected RTS on Console!

reviewText: Ever since I first bought this game in 2009, it's been the most fun I've had on Xbox live. Sadly, a few years later, my Xbox got knocked over with the game inside it, scratching it beyond repair. I had wanted to replace it ever since, and when I saw the limited edition for such a low price, I jumped at the chance. This is a great collector's item, as well as an amazing game even to this day.

Halo Wars is the best RTS I have played on a console. The fact that the developers targeted the original control system with the X360 in mind gives it a huge advantage over every other RTS that was ported down from a PC. I love RTS games on the PC, and the idea of playing a decent RTS game on a console was promising, but Halo Wars went beyond my expectations, it is an incredible game.

If you are looking for a DS game that actually challenges the kid to do more than one math problem in a minute, then this is NOT THE GAME you want.  They threw in the name MATH to make it sound educational, but it is game trying to pass itself off as a learning tool.  If you are looking for a game, then you won't be disappointed with this.  If you are looking for an educational tool to help your kids learn math, this is NOT going to help them much!

Board games are great, don't get me wrong; but sometimes, you wanna be get up and move, and be silly!

Great for all ages, this addictive, dynamic, multi-player game is chock full of fun challenges and guaranteed to keep your guests (or kids) actively entertained for hours and hours, over and over.

I've had this game for years (I owned another copy prior to this purchase, but lost it in a move); and it never gets old!
summary: One of My Favorite Party Games!

reviewText: We had rented this game a couple of times and my daughters (12 and 14) had great fun with it.  I'd have to say this is their favorite Wii game.  I purchased this for my 12 year old's birthday.  I'll have to admit it's great fun just watching them play this.  And I like that it makes use of the Wii balance board, which we already had for my Wii Fit.  All around a great game well worth the money!

This is the ultimate party game.  It's so fun that since coming to my house to play it, several of my friends (in their 30's and 40's) have bought a Wii and/or Wii Fit balance board so they can play this game at home.  It's family friendly but great fun for adults!
summary: So much fun it got several of my friends to buy a Wii or Wii Fit!

reviewText: I am enjoying this game. It's really straight forward and entertaining. I am a little confused about the regional names of some of the items but that's what makes it interesting. For instance in the south,  "shades" refers to sunglasses but here in the north shades are window coverings. So I have to figure out if I'm looking for sunglasses or window coverings.

I bought this game for my girls after we played it at a cousin's house.  We absolutely love this game.  The three of us play together and we have so much fun.  Can't remember the last time I laughed like this.  It's fun entertainment and it gets you up off your rear end and moving. The music takes me back to being a kid and in high school.  This is a great game!  The rabbids will have you cracking up!

This game is the third release for Raving Rabbids.  We have all three games and can't get enough. The game is funny, fun, and great entertainment.  My son is 9 and giggles the whole time he plays.  I highly recomend this game for a night of fun and laughs.

So I work in an electronics store and I get to look at all the games as they come in and whatnot. Well I saw this game was going to be on sale and I'd read really good reviews for it...so I bought it. It's hilarious and I sat there and played it for hours! I can't wait until I get another nunchuck so that my mom can play it with me.

I mean, it's not too late to buy it, but if you had bought it when it came out and it had been more popular, maybe we'd get to play the sequel. But nope. Too bad. I hope you're happy having ruined it for everybody.

I've owned a DS for about a week, and in that short time i've acquired around 20 games. Retro Game Challenge is one of these games I purchased on the DS and I must say its one of the best. If you're a fan of the the old 8Bit NES then this game is for you. Do not hesitate, buy it and you're sure to be pleased.

The controls are weird, the game is totally not kid friendly, it has no real point. I got this as something to play with my kids, and it isn't even worth the effort. We turned it on once for about an hour and it just isn't worth the effort. The movements required are difficult for adults, near impossible for kids. Save your $ and don't even bother with this, even if you get it free, its still not worth the effort it takes to play.

My husband and I recently bought this game and it is a blast. So many fun things to do and it does bring you back to your childhood. I was not a video game person and really hated them. However, the first time we went to a friends house that had a Wii. So, I had to have one and this game is great. You will love it.
I review games on youtube. If you want to see more of my reviews go to [...]
summary: A shallow overpriced game with little content.

reviewText: I'm a fan of the other CSI video games so I decided to give NY a try. Really wish I hadn't. The graphics are HORRIBLE and its nothing like the other games. Complete waste of money and if I had bought the physical copy instead of the download, I'd be selling it on Ebay.

This is one of my first CSI games so I am new to this genre, but this game is just plain fun. The characters are unique and well executed (uh oh, did I give away the plot?). The game play is varied and the tasks are always a new challenge. If you love CSI then this is the game for you!

I bought this for a Christmas gift so I don't know how well it works. But with all the good reviews I'm hoping we are just as happy with it. I wanted to write this review just for the incredibly FAST shipping!! I bought it on the 7th, they charged me on the 8th and I got it on the 9th! I couldn't believe it. This is the fastest shipment ever. Amazon is always fast with their shipments, but this was in the speed of light...lol! Thanks Amazon!

I love my xbox360... I just wish I had enough time to actually play it.  I've never had any trouble with it and I really enjoy playing online with my friends who have moved across the country.  You can play with them in the same game or you can make an audio chat room to all talk together while you play separate games.

How can they continue to release a product with such a high rate of failure????  1 in 3?  This is ridiculous.  And it's BULLSH**!!!  How come the PS3 or Wii don't have these problems?  You never hear about that.  It's just a matter of laziness and pure stupidity on Microsoft's part.  They haven't been in the console industry for long, and it looks like they won't be around long either.

Though I was disappointed with the fact that my first Xbox 360 went dead on me after only a year and a bit, I had to get another one because I love the graphics and some of the games are awesome to play. The online feature is truly magnificent.

We bought this for our 11 year old son because he wanted to be able to play with his friends from home and because we wanted a movie player with high definition capability.  It arrived in perfect condition and we all love it.  He can play with his friends, while talking with them using the included headset, and he's had a blast.  He also enjoyed the included games quite a bit.  Now, we just have to work on the time limits............

This game is so much fun to play! You're rushing around like crazy trying to take care of this farm and you can barely keep up with it! I like that they include sounds (because you can't see the whole farm at once on the screen) so that you can tell when something is needed on another part of the farm. But even for all the rushing, the game isn't hard. Great game!

Turbine got it right with Lord of the Rings Online. This is a highly polished game that makes excellent use of the LOTR license. If you're looking for an alternative to WoW, or just want to try something different, give this game a shot. It is now available as Free-to-Play, so you don't need to pay anything to get started.

I've played several MMO's (WoW, Dofus, Warhammer, etc...) but the thing that keeps me coming back to LotRO is that I don't have to spend money if I don't want to. There are other free MMO's but this one has quality and depth that the others lack. It also helps that the source material is rich, and the in game community is the best. They're the most helpful I've every found in any type of online game.

I'm really not much of an MMO type gal, but I do love the Lord of the Rings books and movies, so I decided to give this a try.  At first I just tried the free online version, but after a week I was so in love with the game, that I just HAD to buy the actual disk, so I could get to areas and do quests I couldn't with the free to play version.  This is more in line with the books than the movies, which I really enjoy.  It's a great game for old gamers and new gamers alike.

One of the best games on the DS.  It mixes platforming and match-three puzzles really well.  The game looks and sounds great.  The character designs are excellent and funny.

The only thing is that the difficulty seems to climb up really fast as you progress but that is not necessarily a bad thing.

Note:  The soundtrack is also great.  You can download it for free from the game's official site.

"Good Show!" - H. Hatsworth

Great graphics and after you figure out how to play it, it is a fun game to play. Took awhile to figure out the training of the foals but am slowly getting it now. Other than that, it is pretty easy to figure out and to play. Loving it!

I got this for my daughter a couple of weeks ago and she really loves it. She turned 6 not long ago and is really good at games and technology so it hasn't been too hard for her. :) I read some things that she has trouble with but for the most part she can nearly handle the game without much help.

It charges fast and works great.  I've had no problems with using my fit board since putting in the battery.  It fully charges in less than 4 hours.  I use the board everyday for workouts and games and it definitely lasts more than 6 hours of use one charge.  The lithium battery makes it convenient because you can charge it whenever you want without need to worry about draining it first (as with NiMH rechargeable batteries).  I'd recommend it.  It even comes with a 1 year manufacturer's warranty.

This rechargeable battery just doesn't work.  Even after charging for a day or more, it just doesn't work well with the Balance Board.  After firing up the Balance Board, it only works for a matter of minutes before conking out.  Not sure if the battery doesn't hold a charge, or if it just doesn't connect properly with the board.  Either way, it doesn't work.  I wouldn't recommend this battery.

Unfortunately, my wife pitched the packaging, so now I own it for keeps...

This charger is great and suits my needs. I like that the controllers stack nicely and it's easy to plug and unplug the controllers. I would recommend this to anyone who wants to organise their controllers.

I purchased this item in Feb 2016. It has been about 6 months and it has already stopped working. I believe the ac adapter broke as I have heard this is a common issue. This is also the 2nd one of these I have purchased in the last 2 years. The first was from a big box store. I am not pleased with the outcome of this as shipping the unit back from an RMA costs about 1/2 as much as a new one itself!.
summary: I am not pleased with the outcome of this as shipping the unit ...

reviewText: I've been on the hunt for a good DS game case for a while now, and I finally found what I was looking for in this product. The design is compact, convenient and sturdy. The previous cases I had only held 3 games each, and the games were not secured inside. Now I can have all my games in one place with room to grow. It fits nicely in my purse and there's no more fumbling with multiple cases looking for the game I want. If I ever acquire enough games to fill this case up, I'll be back for a second one.

I got this Game Card case for Christmas and filled it with my collection of 12 games. I had gone on trips prior to receiving this case, and bringing along all my games in cases was tough, considering I only had so much room in my bags. This case fits 16 games in less than the size of 1 normal DS game case! It's easy to add & remove games to the case, and the case stays shut no matter what. I highly recommend this case to anyone who wants an easier way to carry around their games.

I love this DS game card case.  It's small and compact, yet not so small that I might easily lose it.  The Nintendo DS Lite games fit in neatly and don't fall out.  It's easy to open, easy to flip through to find the desired game, and it looks sleek.  My kids like it so much, they don't want to use their old DS case, which isn't that old.  If I fill this one up, I will come back to buy another.
summary: Does what I need it to do very well

reviewText:
This game case is very efficient and well put together. I have had no problems getting the games in and out of the case, the case is small enough to store in a bag, but big enough to not get lost, and and the heavy plastic is very durable.

Overall, I'd buy it again.

At last, the kind of DS game storage solution I've been looking for in stores for 4 years! If you have lots of DS games that are always on the go with you, then this is your product. It is the only game case I've seen that holds this many games in a perfectly compact and secure way. It even looks stylish. I'm thrilled with it, and I wish it had been on the market years ago. Thanks Hori! This thing is awesome. I will definitely be buying more as my game collection increases.

I just received this after ordering it on Amazon, couldn't find one in a brick and mortar. It is a little bigger than I expected, but is exactly what I wanted. The plastic seems durable and the case seems well constructed. The only problem I have is that now I have to go out and buy more games to fill the slots! I really like this product. It will BARELY fit into the mini folio with the DS, but it does fit. I'm buying the pink version of this for my sister!

This case is durable, fits games nicely and has a good Nintendo DS look to it. It's also transparent so it's easy to see the games. This product is highly recommended if you don't want to lose your games, plus, it's a great value.

Nice and affordable headset. I really like the flexbility of the attached boom microphone. Comfortable on my head and around my ears. Most of all I appreciate the included dual 3.5mm audio adapter. The cable and adapter are long enough to reach all the way around to the back of my PC sitting on the floor next to my desk. A great all-around headset for gaming and more.
summary: Great all-around headset and reasonably priced

reviewText: I tried another brand of headset with microphone and it was too tight and I could never get them to fit correctly and comfortably. I returned them and bought this set. It is comfortable, the microphone makes my voice really clear to the person on the other end, and they seem to be of good quality and have lasted with no issues for the several months I have had them. I would buy again.

Very comfortable! Long lasting! I'm generally not hard on my headsets but this is one of the longest lasting sets I've ever owned. The only problem I can see is that if you don't like your entire ear covered or if you have ears on the slightly larger side, you might not like this.

I've had these headphones for a couple of years now and couldn't be happier. They are comfortable and have all the features I need. The price was perfect for these and the quality matches. I would buy again from this company in the future.
summary: ... for a couple of years now and couldn't be happier. They are comfortable and have all the features ...

reviewText: I have had a pair of these for a couple of years now.  I use them mainly to watch videos, play games and chat over the internet.  I find the quality is fine and I have no troubles hearing or being heard.  I liked them so well and they have held up so well that when my son needed a pair for his new computer, I got him one.
summary: I find the quality is fine and I have no troubles hearing or being heard

reviewText: This headset has lasted me a long time. It has really nice sound. The mic quality is pretty good, though it has gone down a tiny bit over the years, it is still usable. My ears might get a little sore after five or six hours of use. But this is one of the best headsets I've had, and for not a lit of money.
summary: It has really nice sound. The mic quality is pretty good

reviewText: Great for their price! I bought these things thinking that I'd have a cheap headset for a while until I had saved up enough money for a higher quality set. It turns out these are still working great and I haven't had any issues with them at all. Money well spent.

Wow, what can I say. For the price I have a comfortable pair of headphones that I can wear for 8 hours straight without a headache. They also come apart so you can use them on a PS4 controller! Incredible buy. So far I have no issues with these. I wish I bought these for my kids as well.
summary: Why would you pay over $100 dollars for Turtle Beach for what? Looks? This is what you want!

reviewText: I've had this headset for a year now. I've been using it pretty much every other day, and I have not one complain. The headset gets a lot of abuse from me (getting yanked, falling on the floor, the cable abruptly disconnected-- you know, stuff that happens with toddlers in the house). It's still going strong, sound quality is great, and I love it has a volume control right on the cable. The mic isn't crystal clear, but clear enough and easy to move around. For the price, totally recommended.

This is a great headset! I was looking for a good headset for my youtube channel, but I was very short on money. I read the reviews, and they seemed pretty good.

I wasn't really buying them for the headphones, I was just getting them for the mic. But the headphones are amazoing! They sound like $100 headphones! And the microphone is great too! The mic sounds very clear!

This is definitely your best option for a cheap headset!

Excellent product. After hanging out in a Microsoft store one day I stumbled upon the new Dr. Dre Beats headphones. Those things are excellent, but the prices are ridiculous. After looking around on Amazon I found these, and read through many of the reviews. I would say that these are an excellent set of headphones that compete with the more expensive Beats. Plus, they come with a microphone! If Yapster came out with a set of walk around headphones, I would absolutely buy those. Highly recommended.

I play a lot of online games and need a headset to talk to the people I game with.  I had been getting the cheap $5 - $10 headsets for a while and was getting frustrated because it was starting to cost a lot to keep replacing them.  My brother suggested these ones and I've had them for 2 years now.  I still love them and use them every day.  The cord is a little longer than I would like, but the quality is outstanding for the headset it's self.

You honestly cannot beat this headset for the price. I actually went and bought an extra one just in case my current one went bad because i figured they would be discontinued by the time I needed it. I game quite a bit and have gone through some very expensive headsets. I'm not saying there aren't better quality sets out there, but I have to say, the mic sound and speaker/headset sound for the price is just unbeatable.

I bought this some time ago for my everyday use at my desk. I use it to make and receive calls, and it has been a durable and reliable item. I was hoping it would break so I can upgrade to another unit, but it keeps on working like a new one. I highly recommend this item.

I originally had a review complaining about this headset, but since figured out the problem on my end. Now I use it regularly and really like it. The sound quality isn't anything to write home about, but for the price the ability to chat is reallllly good.

Excellent product at a very cheap price. One of my friends said he had problems with this headset in that the cord came disconnected from the headphones, but I've had it for months and haven't had a problem with it. Excellent product.

I've bought several other pairs of cheap headphones within the $10 to $20 range. These are at the higher end of that spectrum, but they are pretty good. These have good construction quality and don't break too easy. The speaker quality is good.

The microphone quality is Not great. Be sure to use it in a quiet place or it will pick up background noise.

The quality is really good and it is very comfortable to wear.

The only drawback is the long wire of it. I have gotten tangled in it. And it twist around a lot.

A wireless version of this would be superb.

Other then that I LOVE it.
summary: LOVE this headset. Wish there was a wireless like it

reviewText: The headphones aren't anything AMAZING, but they are nice. The mic quality is decent, and the sound quality is good. They definitely block outside noise better than most models. The mic is on a swivel and bendable boom, which makes for easy and accurate adjustment. I would recommend, especially for the price.

I work from home on a laptop and it is perfect. There is no disturbances when I use the headset and it works amazingly! This is the third one I have purchased, as the other two were worthless. This one however has been exactly what I wanted and more!

These headphones are great. I bought them to replace a set of similar style. I was a bit nervous about buying them online, because my old set hurt my ears so bad if I wore them for too long. But these ones are very comfortable! I wear them for hours at a time with no problem. The mic has decent sound quality and is adjustable. Its also convenient that you can turn the mic off with a switch on the headphone cord. Anyways, I'd recommend these headphones to any non-audiophile looking for a budge pair.

I have gone through several pairs of expensive headsets.  They all keep breaking.  I didn't have high expectations for these, since they don't cost as much; but they seem to be every bit as good as the more expensive ones.  The sound quality is better than I expected.

After reading reviews, I expected this headset to have as great audio quality as $50+ headsets. It doesn't.

The audio quality is quite clear. Very efficient for gaming, but don't expect amazing performance.

The mic quality is very clear. The ability to move the mic around is super convenient.

For such a cheap headset, this thing is crazy efficient for its price range. Buy if you want a great budget headset.

The ear muffs that come with the headset are comfortable, which is awesome because I have to listen to a lot of audio for business. I've only used the microphone once, but it seems to record clearly enough. Overall, a good product.

I was kind of worried about buying this headset because I had read some reviews about how it broke quickly.  I have been using it to play Heart of the Swarm for a few weeks now and it has held up just fine.  It is a great value if it continues to hold.  I can say that my experience has been good so far.

I used to have an expensive headset but somehow it failed on me... I got this as a replacement since I didn't feel like wasting a bunch more on a new one and this works just fine. Its not the best headset out there but it allows you to use it to chat and play games. Headphones are decent quality and are very comfortable. I like how they are not huge and the super flexible mic piece that stays in place.

I needed a microphone to do a series of instructional videos for a client.  These worked fine for about 2 weeks while I was building the system, but when I actually had to sit down and record the tutorials on how to use what I'd built, the mic stopped working.  These are a complete waste of money.

I bought this years ago and have no problem with the product at all. It is comfortable and works great. I especially love that I can adjust the volume and turn on/off the mic easily and without needing to find the setting on the computer.

I got this about a year ago, skeptically. For its price, you wouldn't expect much. I still use it today! I am very happy with its microphone's quality and the audio quality as well! Definitely recommended for those of you looking for a new headset.

I needed a quick replacement. This headset lasted less than a week before it started having sound issues. The kind where you have to jiggle the cord to get it to work. A short while later, the mic started going bad as well.

I can see that some people aren't having issues with it, but why would you take such a gamble with your money? Just spend a little more for much more quality.
summary: Just splurge a little for a more reliable set.

reviewText: I've had this for a few months now and have had absolutely no problems with it.  It dampens the sound so no one else hears what's going through the headphones, though I don't blast the volume through them.  A great item I would recommend to anyone who's looking for a solid headset at a good price.  Only thing I would say is that it's not USB, but a seperate audio and microphone cable.  If you need a USB headset look elsewhere.

I bought this in a set of five and gave them away as Christmas presents so my family could talk to one another while playing online games. The sound quality is amazing. I love the fact that it has directional sound - ie, making it seem as though a sound you are hearing is from the left or right. The microphone works great, allowing my family to play together with a lot less work and more fun.

I am not the kind of guy who would ever spend $100 on headphones.  For $15, these headphones sound amazing.  I would be hard pressed to look at anything else.

The mic works well and the cord is long enough that I can move around a bit while narrating my videos.

The only thing that I always get hung up on is the mic swivel. I can never tell which way it goes so I have to play with it before I put the headset on.

So far so good! I was a little skeptical at first with some of the reviews I had read. I have been using my headset for over a month with zero issues. The sound quality is very clear. I would recommend this product if you are in the market for an inexpensive headset for an average gamer.

I gotta say that I had my doubts about this headset but they have all been quelled. The sound on it is pretty loud and clear, and the mic works great. I have been playing battlefield 3 with this headset and it has been working great! The price was great and it works really good so I would definitely recommend this headset!

I purchased the headset for my PS3, but when I received I couldn't use it because I needed an adapter to use it. I ordered the adapter and received 1 week later. It has been good so far, I have use it about 20 times, no problems.

This headset does everything you'd expect a $30 headset to do for $15. I use it for gaming (Battlefield 3) and the sounds quality is fine and I've never had issues with the microphone.

The headset fits comfortably on my head and it feels like it is built with quality.

I've been using this headset for almost a year now, And it has been the best headset (for the price) I have ever used. The quality is crisp and clear on the mic, and the sound has a high quality to it. Deep lows, crisp highs. Definitely worth my money :) 5 stars :)

I just wanted a cheap headset that worked well and it comfortable. this is exactly that. when i first got it it was a little uncomfortable but after a while i got used to it and i could wear it for endless hours. the sound quality is pretty good and i can tell if treated well it will last a long time.

I have to admit, I was very skeptical about these when reading how good they are. Sure enough, they have amazing sound. I would put them just a little ahead of the Sennheiser HD210 and that is pretty amazing. The microphone is just as good. For under $20, you won't get a better deal than these.

I got these for my husband as a late Christmas gift and he loves them . He uses them all the time. The only thing he mentioned was that he wishes they had made a way to fasten the mic to the head set when not using it to keep it out of the way better.

I bought these on a whim last week and they are so perfect. I was a little skeptical considering the price, but I just got done a three hour play session on GTA with my cousin and the headset worked amazingly. You don't need to spend $50+ for an awesome headset, because it's right here.

Bought this headset for my grandson for Christmas. It has a mic so he can play games with other kids using his laptop. The price was great. I'd recommend the headset to others who are looking for a reasonably priced headset.

It's so cheap, but it works so well! The sound quality is better than what you'd expect out of a $15 headset. The microphone will not take in loud sound, but you'll have no problems chatting with it. I wear this headset when I skype with my classmates over the internet. It works.

Honestly when I first ordered this headset I thought... alright it is cheap and I did not expect a lot from it.  I was mistaken this headset is so comfortable and has great quality.  I use the headset day in and day out and I recommend this headset to anyone who has a headset on for long hours at a time.

I bought this as a gift for my boyfriend, who is an avid PC gamer. I've used the headset several time for skype calls. The cord is ridiculously long. I can stand at least five or six feet from my computer and still be connected. The mic is superb, even too strong at times. If you're playing a game and talking to your friends at the same time, most of the time, they WILL be able to hear parts of your game coming from the headphones. The mic is just that good!
summary: A must-need for every avid gamer

reviewText:
I wanted something for online gaming and video chatting with my girlfriend.
Not wanting to spend a lot, I bought these, which were very inexpensive.
These headphones are great. I've used them every single day since I've gotten
them (a couple of months) and I haven't had a single problem. For the price,
it's a good buy.

I bought this for my 11yo son as he enjoys producing game videos. I am amazed at how great this headset sounds, especially for the price! It seems very sturdy (and would need to be with an 11yo boy using it) and I was really impressed with the flexibility of the microphone and the comfort of the earphones. We are very pleased with this product.
summary: The Yapster Gaming Headset/Microphone is Awesome!

reviewText:
This is by far the best deal you will find anywhere for a gaming headset. I bought it mainly because my mic in my laptop is really bad quality, but I was astounded by the quality of the speakers. They are better than my Sony headphones. I mean this product is fantastic and is super cheap. Get this headset if you need a gaming headset or even if you need it for Skype/work/fun. 5 stars because everything is great and it is the cheapest thing out there.

Overall Great Deal!

This product is well worth the money. I buy almost everything on amazon and rarely feel compelled to write reviews but this gaming headset is amazing. Feels very comfortable, sounds great, and has very good sound. Shipped very fast of course and arrived in style. If you are looking for a budget headset for skype or gaming this is it.

I bought this headset about a month ago, and I couldn't be happier with my purchase. Not only are they absurdly low-priced, but they are sturdy, comfortable, and provide excellent incoming and outgoing sound. I Skype every day, and this headset has performed infinitely better than my last $55 dollar headset. I use them for gaming as well as movie watching, and again, the sound quality is really decent. Zero complaints here!

For the price, these headphones are great. You gotta understand that they won't be the most orgasmically comfortable headphones ever, but I can wear these for 2-3 hours before my ears start to hurt. Purchased to use with skype and they work great.

I ordered this headset to replace the earbuds I used to use, as well as to obtain a microphone so I could video chat.  They both work fantastic, and for the price I feel that I got more than I bargained for.  The sound quality is great, and the mic works well.  The ear phones also fit quite comfortably, and I can wear these headphones for quite some time without getting irritated by them.

After owning this unit for over a year, I must say that it is worth every penny. The headset is very comfortable, sound is great and the microphone works just great. I use it for Skyping all the time and everybody can hear me great, also use the Yapster for playing games on my pc and it performs extremely well. if you are looking for the best value under $20 for a light weight headset that looks great and works like a $49 headphone, look no further....go with the Yapster.
summary: Great headset for chatting and gaming

reviewText: Unless your an audiophile, it doesn't make sense to get a fancier headset than this. This one has really good sound quality and is quite comfy. The microphone is really nice and flexible and seems to have good quality (no one has complained about not hearing me, at least). Now if only I could get as good a value on a PS3 headset!

You won't find a better headset for the price. Sure I'm a little worried that the microphone could break off if I bend it too often, but who cares for less than 20 bucks, I'll be happy if they last me a year, but I'm sure they will last much longer than that since they just sit on my desk.

I needed to replace my gaming headset and didn't have much money to spend.

This blew away my expectations. The mic and headset work great! Great quality microphone and the sound out of the headset is fantastic.

I couldn't ask for more.
summary: Won't find better at this price

reviewText:
Well, I bet there are many other headsets in the market that are better than this one. But c'mon... look at the price. This one is cheap, surprisingly comfortable (I can wear it for hours, with a very good sound quality and a good mic. I have had this thing for months and it's working perfectly well (even after being used and abused by small children).

Bottom line: very good quality, very comfortable and great price. If you want something else, stop looking at $15 headsets. What do you expect?

These headphones are very comfortable for my ears.  if my ears were much larger they would hurt a lot.  the sound quality is amazing for the price.  the mic. works great and is extremely easy to move around.

Great game for PS2. I had originally played it on gameboy advance, but this version is just as good. The delivery was a little delayed, but it was purchased during the holiday season, so it is totally understandable. This is definitely worth a play through if you have a PS2 and are a fan of the Kingdom Hearts series.

I know I should have read into it, but I was not quite expecting the battles to be the weird button-smash card deck combo that it is. It's a fun game if you like Kingdom Hearts, but if you're not into the other games don't bother. Otherwise, if you can get it for a decent price & aren't bothered by the idea of a different battle system, it's a pretty fun game.
summary: Fun if you like Kingdom Hearts

reviewText: I purchased Kingdom Hearts Re:Chain of Memories for my nephew who absolutely loves the Kingdom Hearts games. He really is enjoying this game and has already spent many hours on it and within a week or so he was half way through the main story line. I am sure he will continue to love this game as much as his other Kingdom Hearts games.
summary: I am sure he will continue to love this game as much as his other Kingdom Hearts ...

reviewText: I played KH 1 and 2 so I got this one to see what it's about. I didn't like the way it uses cards but once you figure that out, the game gets real interesting. If you don't give up you'll love the game.

It seems like a good game for its time, but it totally wasn't what I expected. I bought this game expecting something that had more up-to-date graphics and mechanics, but instead it was just a bunch of old mini-games, and it is frustrating to control the characters. In fairness, though, I should have read closer when it came to the features of this game.
summary: It seems like a good game for its time

reviewText: My son loves it. He just started playing it. I could hear him yelling. He said because he died a few times trying to get past the 2nd level of Sonic. But he says he loves it. He is so happy that he can play a game that he hasn't played in a long time.
summary: He is so happy that he can play a game that he hasn't ...

reviewText: Bought this for my nephew, who's starting to get into video games. Sadly, he got bored with it rather quickly--he'd much rather play a racing game or Skyrim. I'm still glad I bought this, though. I didn't have a Sega Genesis when I was younger (Super Nintendo all the way!) and now I can finally enjoy some classic Sonic. There are tons of other Sega games on here as well, but I haven't given any of them a try yet.

I really enjoyed this game. I had originally played the game boy version and thought the game play was fun but didn't get you as involved in the story (which may be the best part of this game) because it lacked the cut scenes. This version added the cut scenes and really improved/polished the game play.

I think I would like the game more if not for the battle system. It's not normal; you fight using a card system and I just don't enjoy it...at all. It makes me not even want to play, to be honest. I would like to play the game through to get the story out of it, but I don't see that happening. I feel like I've wasted my money on this product.

This item arrived with the other two games in the same shrink-wrapped box. I was very impressed with the quality of the product and the care that was taken to ensure they arrieved in good shape when they were shipped. I was also pleased that these games were brand new! Very happy with this item!

This is a full PS2 remake of the original GBA Kingdom Hearts: Chain of Memories. It's much better than the original, mainly because of the graphics and the new voice overs. It's probably not as good as the Japanese version, which came out in March of 2007, but it's as perfect as you can get. It also definitely helps with the wait for Kingdom Hearts: 358/2 Days and Kingdom Hearts: Birth By Sleep.

This has to be one of the coolest Kingdom Hearts games I have ever played. The cutscenes are beautiful, and the gameplay is cool. This game was originally released in japan with Kingdom Hearts 2 Final Mix+, which was a remake of Kingdom Hearts 2 with extra battles, weapons, and cutscenes, that was only released in japan. The Organization 13 bosses are hard, but still cool and a fun game. It is a must have for any Kingdom Hearts fan.

I played many of these games as a child, so it is so much fun to be able to play them again, but this time with my little girl. It is laughable how simple the graphics were then, but the nostalgia of playing Streets of Rage again is well worth is. Love it!
summary: so it is so much fun to be able to play them again

reviewText: Sonic's Ultimate Genesis Collection is by far one of, if not, the greatest collection of classic games ever made. This collection includes 40 Sega Genesis games plus 9 unlock-able games that you can unlock by completing certain challenges in the other games. All of the games are expertly made (ported) and fun to play. overall if you missed out on certain games or never had a Sega Genesis to begin with, it's time to see what you been missing out on.

I picked this up a couple of years ago. If you enjoy some of the old Sega games, this collection is for you. Great value in this set. Buying just a couple of these games used for the SEGA Genesis would cost more than what you are paying for 40+.

Boy does this game have a ton of old school, nostalgic SEGA Genesis games on it that I played when I was a wee widdle boy. I've only played Ecco the Dolphin and Sonic and a few others, but it was sure nice going back in time to the early 90s. Haven't played it in a while though. Maybe I should? We'll see.

This is a great games with so many games inside the game making it exciting, fun and very entertaining for hours and hours.  I would recommend this game to anyone who enjoys the fun of Sonic as well as many other games.
summary: Lots of fun for all ages

reviewText: My first game system was the Sega Genesis, so I was really excited to get this and try out all the Genesis games again after so long. It was crazy to realize how much more challenging the old games were, but its so much fun!

Great collection of games. My son loves Sonic so this was a great introductory game set for him and my wife is a fan of many old school Sega games as well. So it's cool we actually have ONE game in the collection where we can all sit and play together, as my wife is not much of a gamer....but she loves the nostalgia of the old games, so this one was a good choice!

I absolutely love the collection of games it comes with. A lot of which I played as a kid growing up. Some of the games I had never heard of and did try them out. They're so much fun. I am not disappointed. I recommend this collection to gamers of all ages.

I grew up with Sega Genesis (well, "Megadrive") and this collection is pretty much a "childhood-in-one-game-disc" for me.
Some of my favorite games like Comix Zone, Streets of Rage 1/2/3, Golden Axe 1/2/3 and all the Sonic games are on this disc and they still hold up after 2 decades.
I would suggest this collection to anyone who had the Sega console, because for under $20 this collection of games is a steal.
summary: Great collection for a great price

reviewText: Great game guys! If you had a Sega console and loved Sonic this is for you! Not only does it have Sonic, but it comes with a host of other games such as Streets of Rage 1-3! What a great collection! A must have!

This thing is absolutely packed for the amount of money it costs. I don't think I've ever seen a retro game collection quite like it. In addition to the obvious choices like Sonic 1-3, Sonic and Knuckles, Sonic Spinball, Sonic 3D Blast, Streets of Rage 1-3, and Revenge of Shinobi, it also has several RPGs and various other games.

Not to mention it has some interview clips, and even more bonus games as unlockables.

If you like retro Sega, I can't recommend this one enough.

First of all, I can't believe that I didn't pick this up sooner!

I've been getting some of these games from the Wii's Virtual Console, and when I discovered the massive library that this game has... I was dumbfounded.

I'm not going to waste another penny on Genesis VC games. Ever!
summary: Effective as a Wii Virtual Console replacement for the best Genesis games

reviewText: I have read many reviews about the Rock Band 2 Cymbal Expansion sets.  I bought the 3 pack and love it.  It really adds to the drumming experience.  The set looks better and is a lot more fun to play.  If you want a real drum set, buy that.  If you just like having fun with your friends on Rock Band 2, then these cymbals really help.

This is a great MMORPG. I was a huge fan of Ultima, started playing Ultima Online when it first came out, and I hated it. never played another MMORPG until WOW came out. It's a great game, and I enjoy it. If you're a fan of the game, get collectors edition, not regular. Casual players should get regular edition.

There is not much to say that hasn't already been said by one person or another. Based on my personal experience, either you love WoW or you hate it. Simple as that.

Wrath of the Lich King is an amazing upgrade for people already deep in the game as well as a great hook to reel in new players. The new areas, dungeons, armor, everything is designed very well. If you enjoyed the previous expansion, The Burning Crusade, this is a must have.

These cymbals work great.  One of them wasn't very responsive out of the box, but seems to have loosened up a bit, but is still not as responsive as the others.  I made it the 'green' cymbal, since green is usually the crash cymbal on Rock Band.  It hasn't let me down, yet.

Other than that little quirk (which I'm sure is not a typical issue), they work great.  The response is great when playing freestyle mode.  They make the Rock Band experience a little more real for experienced drummers.

The game itself is a worthy updating to the WoW franchise. The collector's edition includes a beautiful hardbound artbook, a DVD with a 'making of' video and other features, a CD with music from the game (which I feel is worth the price all by itself!), collectible cards from the collectible card game, and an exclusive in-game pet. All told, it's not quite a must-have if all you care about is the game itself, but I feel it's well worth the extra expense.
summary: Well worth the extra cost for the extras

reviewText: I bought this for my husband. He has had it for over a month, but didn't get to try it until this weekend. He loves it. He said that it takes some time to get use to it, but he has more fun playing rock band and it makes the drums sound better. If you like rock band and have the wireless drums; you gotta have the cymbal kit.

We have only had the cymbals a few days, but so far, we are loving them!

If you install them correctly, they don't slip, and they aren't in the way of the drum pads.

Great and inexpensive add-on to the RB2 drum set!

As other people have said, these are a bit loud, but aside from that they're a great addition to the drum set. I've been using them with Pro mode in Rock Band 3, and it really makes it feel more realistic. The mountings are rock solid as long as you connect them properly, and they're definitely a lot of fun to play with.
summary: Works great, just a little noisy

reviewText: I read the reviews on here and thought I would buy this game. I am so bored with it and I just started it. There is no challenge ot it. Just push the "A" button through most of it. Good thing I bought it used, and didn't waste that much money on it. I am very disappointed.

The stand along drums work great and arrived quickly! We gave this to our 9 year old son as a Christmas gift. The drums are a lot more challenging than the guitar but they are a lot of fun for the whole family! I couldn't be happier with the product, it was easy to assemble and everything works great! Thanks!

If you want to really see what the Wii can do on your HDTV, then you need one of these. Be sure to set the video to 480p in the Wii settings. Now you'll finally be able to read that tiny text and see all the detail that you've been missing with that old composite video connection.

The cable set is constructed well too. The plugs have a very solid feel to them. Just don't yank on the cables, becaus the cable jackets are very flexible. All in all, it's a great deal.
summary: Best picture possible on the Wii

reviewText: I haven't tried some of the cheaper cables out there because I wanted to be sure I got something reliable. Belkin's generally been good for me in the past, and they did well for me here, too, at least so far. I've had the cable for about a month and have no complaints. 480p definitely looks better, though it's a minor improvement only.

I was looking for a high quality HD cable to hook up my Nintendo Wii to my flat screen, I can say that this product was exactly what I was looking for, excellent quality for a reasonable price, highly recommend it!

Bought this for my brother at his request. This was one of the few places that he could find it for a reasonable price outside of Japan. He had the option of selling it at a profit or keeping it for himself and out playing competitors online and he chose to keep it. It's a great product for a great price. Highly recommended. It's like having an arcade at home.

I purchased this game for my fiance, because he really wanted it. As soon as he got it he tried it out and was completely satisfied with it. It is an action pack filled game. Great story line. Great graphics. Completely happy with it.

I wish the game was longer.
I never say that about a game, I just grab another one.
In this case though, the gameplay was so much fun I wanted more.
Graphically speaking it might not be up to par with some next gen games,
but it also doesn't look bad at all.
If you like GTA series then I'm sure you will wanna try this out.
Very underrated game.

*Not recommend for the kids as it contains nudity.

I pre-ordered this game in great anticipation of it coming out. I should have waited and played it first. The first Godfather game was so good that I thought there was no way the second one would be any different. Man, was I wrong. This is the most horrible game I ever bought. Francis Ford Coppola is crying in his grave right now. The looks, the action , everything sucks. Please people, don't waste your money like I did. The graphics are absolutely terrible.

I've installed and uninstalled and reinstalled this expansion multiple times.  It crashes...  and then it crashes...  and then it crashes.  Occasionally you're able to use it for a while before it completely kills everything, but more often than not, that's not the case.  I love it, but I hate it because I'm not able to use it.  :P

This game will never get old. This was one of the first Wii games I bought and it still entertains. Great to play by yourself or in groups. There's a lot of combos of characters and their cars to play with. All of the levels are fun, unique, and challenging. 100% recommend.

Our family loves this game. It's easy enough that our 5 year-old can play, but entertaining enough that it engages adults too. Our 5 year-old loves unlocking the characters in the game. I recommend picking up some of the steering wheels that are available here or at any game store (used), as they really add to the feel of the game.

Classic Mario Kart game that uses maps, karts, and characters from all previous Mario Kart games. Tons of fun a replayability.

IMPORTANT NOTE TO MARIO KART WII U PLAYERS:
You CANNOT use just a wiimote without using motion controls. On the Wii U version, you can turn the wiimote sideways and use the D-pad and buttons. You cannot do this on the Wii version - have to either hook up a nunchuck or use a classic controller, or you are stuck with motion controls.
summary: Super fun classic, Wii U owners look out for motion-only wiimote controls!

reviewText: I purchased this as a gift for my adult son & daughter. They both enjoy it and like the challenges it presents and the unique aspects of the game play. Although I don't personally play the game, I do find myself caught up in the story & the game play and end up watching them. I especially like the design & visual appeal of the different cities depicted in the game. I am impressed with the skill & imagination of the people who build these "worlds". Well worth the $60 investment!

I got the game and I can't play it until my Birthday which is March 29th and I ask a friend to tell me about it and she said it is the best game she has in her collection. I have pogo and it is almost like that but you get no tokens for playing. I know I will have fun with this game and I will not put it down until I get tired of playing it. When I say the cover i said this is a game for me. Just me no one else will be playing this at all. Thanks for a great game.

I got this game for my 7 year old and both she and my 6 year old daughter love it.  Games like this almost make me want to buy two so they don't fight over who gets to play it!  I would recommend this game for any child in this age range - maybe even older!
summary: My 6 and 7 year old girls LOVE this game!

reviewText: Bought this game for my son.  When he couldn't find some of the pieces I started to help and that's where I got hooked.  I think I love this game as much or more than he does.  We've completed all of it I think so we're looking for a similar game.  It's nice to find a game that's not blaring at you and that you can take your time with.  We loved this game :)

This isn't some amazing product, it gives you exactly what it says.  There are extra parts you can add to your creatures in order to further customize them.  That's it.  So, why am I rating this five stars?  Because!  It gives what it advertises.  So, if you want to get every Spore product out there, or want more options for your creatures, this is the expansion pack for you.  If you don't really care about the expansion side of things, you should probably avoid this.

It is a very convenient, safe and easy way of adding money to your PSN account.

You do not need to put your credit card on the PSN network to add money if you have this. This is a far more controlled way of adding money to your PSN account rather than linking the PSN account to a credit card with a huge limit.

Please note that this is for the US PSN store only.

This is a great way to buy things on PSN without using your credit card, either if you can't use it (cards issued outside US) or if you don't want to use it.

Keep in mind that you have to add $9 for shipping and handling and taxes to the final cost.

I 100% recommend this card, you won't regret it. (just choose wisely what you are going to buy at the store of PSN)

I was a bit surprised to see there are 25 songs and all of them are perfectly known. It's entertaining and we love the music videos in the background.

If you're a fan of ABBA, there's no question about it, get it! You won't regret it.
summary: Fun game, great songs... all 25 of them.

reviewText: I was skeptical. I read the reviews and thought it wouldn't work with my Wii. However, I decided to give it a go. I followed the instructions and inserted the cleaning disc into my Wii. To my surprise, the cleaning pad came out with dirt on it, proving it had worked. I reinserted Super Smash Bros Brawl, and now it reads the disc perfectly. No more disc read errors.
summary: Was skeptical, but it worked for me!

reviewText: Was very disappointed with this purchase.  Was a total waste of our money.  It should have cost a fourth of what it did if you could have purchased in store, but we couldn't so we went ahead and paid the overpriced charge.  Biggest mistake ever.  Was just a complete waste of our money.  Ended up buying a new Wii and it still doesn't seem to help clean anything!  Don't waste your money!

Work great i clean mi wii thanks guys
Work great i clean mi wii thanks guys
Work great i clean mi wii thanks guys
Work great i clean mi wii thanks guys
Work great i clean mi wii thanks guys
Work great i clean mi wii thanks guys
Work great i clean mi wii thanks guys
Work great i clean mi wii thanks guys

THIS PRODUCT DID NOT WORK FOR MY WII VIDEO GAME SYSTEM.  RATHER THAN HAVING TO SEND IT BACK TO MANUFACTURER FOR REPAIRS, I DECIDED TO BUY A WHOLE NEW GAME.  THE CLEANING KIT WAS NOT THE SOLUTION TO MY PROBLEM...

I love this game.  I had this game but it stopped working.  I got a new one because I liked it so much.  It's more interactive than the game that comes with the Wii Fit board.  It gives a good cardio workout but also has upper body, lower body, core, and flexibility options.  All the workouts start with a warm-up and end with a cool-down.  The choices for music, venue and additional equipment makes this a very versatile game.

I really like My Fitness Coach.  I needed something a bit more challenging than what I already had.  My Fitness Coach does that.  She explains how to do the exercise correctly while you are exercising and you can click the tutorial button to see how to do it correctly.  Every exercise is different and is more challenging every day.  Definitely would recommend this to anyone who is wanting to get into exercise again, like me, or is just starting out with exercising.

THIS SAME ITEM SELLS NEW ON SEARS.COM FOR $19.99 YET IT'S ON AMAZON.COM USED FOR (IN SOME CASES) $151. I have contacted amazon.com about this but nothing has changed as of yet so I figure that I should let others know about this huge problem with the pricing on this item.

As for the item it's probably a great product, I really don't know. Because of this price issue I have decided not to purchase this item from amazon.com.
summary: CHECK THE PRICES ON THIS ITEM!!!

reviewText: This Fitness Coach is so much better than I was expecting! I recommend this to anyone who wants to get into any kind of shape. You can personalize this to what works for you. I am very impressed with everything you can do. I love it!

Great way to get a workout in. You don't have to think about what you are going to do next. It is like having someone there right in front of  you showing you the moves. It is hard for me to go to gym and workout. This way i can get 15-45 min in a day. Love it.

I love this fitness game. I get bored very quickly with my workouts, so I like that it changes it up a bit each time you workout. I also like that I can use my equipment I already have with it (fitness ball, step platform and free weights), and it will give you credit for any exercise you do other than the game. It will ask you a few times during the workout if it's easy or too hard and will adjust your future programs. I highly recommend this game.

I bought this game a Wal-Mart yesterday. It's a few dollars more but I didn't have to wait and I didn't have to pay shipping. It takes a few minutes to set up. You'll need to weigh and measure yourself so make sure you have your weight and a tape measure handy. I did the upper body workout in the morning and the yoga routine in the evening.. and I'm sore! But it feels great. I've tried countless videos and I don't think I've had such a good workout in my living room. Worth the price.

I put the game in the Wii, started it, realized you need to do alot of things at first to even set up the game.  You need a tape measure to measure your body to enter it in the system.  I gave up and haven't used it yet.  You need to have a lot of time to do this, I didn't have the time.  One of these days I will get around to it.

This game is a lot of fun.  It mixes up the workouts to keep them challenging and not boring.  If you tell the game that your current workout is too hard or too easy, the game will adjust accordingly the next time.  I like it a lot and definitely work up a sweat.
summary: Get in shape with "My Fitness Coach"

reviewText: I have a tendency to buy work out tapes and then to give up on them halfway through. I have stuck to this for a few weeks and I really enjoy it. I feel good after I'm finished and I really like the fact that it's interactive.

I used this product back when it was Yourself Fitness for the Xbox, and I lost 50 pounds working out with Maya!!! I can't rave enough about how great this program is. If you're the kind of person (like me) who gets bored doing the same workout every day, this is a great solution- the workouts are different every day.
I have been recommending this to everyone I know for the last 4 years, and I will keep spreading the word!
The only reason I gave it a fun rating of 3 stars is because I hate to exercise! :)

I purchaed this after I purchased the Wii Fit. I found the Wii Fit to be fun, however, felt that I was not being challenged. I purchased the "My Fitness Coach" and felt like I met my challenge. I have only used the "cardio" workout and find it to be an excellent workout. This purchase was well worth the money and I would, and have, recommended it. It is well worth the money.

I have been wanting to get into better shape for a long time.  I was always buying different videos and never sticking with them.  After getting this one, I have gotten up extra early each morning to complete my workout before starting the rest of my day. I haven't lost any weight, but I have lost inches from my trouble spots.  I am very pleased with the results so far.  I highly recommend My Fitness Coach.

My husband and I recently purchased gym equipment after canceling our gym membership at $80 a month. We both need to lose weight and get in shape. I purchased this game from Amazon based on the stellar reviews and am so happy that I did. You get a personalized plan to work out to, with great instruction, good scenery, and decent music. It really is a good workout. I'm finding muscles I didn't know I had. :) For this price, you can't go wrong!
summary: This is a must-have and absolutely amazing

reviewText: I gave this a 3 star for fun because a workout isn't supposed to be fun!  It is a good workout and you can customize it with the workout equipment you already have.  I use this with my WiiFit.  I have only used the cardio section and so far I am impressed.  I feel tired when I get done with the Fitness Coach.  I would recommend this as a stand alone workout program or use it with an existing workout program.

I, like many others, enjoy working out, but find it hard to get to a scheduled class, or to the gym.  This video makes it easy to work out in the comfort of my own home (in my pj's if I want).  Even at the end of a long day I can always find time for even 15 minutes.  This is fun and have recommended it to many of my friends.

Flip Words is such a fun game to play.  It is much like "Wheel of Fortune", we have watched for years. Once we start the game it is so addictive that my husband and I do not want to stop playing. Time flies by quickly as you get so absorbed in the game.
I would highly recommend this game if you want to have a fun and relaxing time.
summary: So fun you don't want to stop playing.....

reviewText:
I purchased this game several years ago from Gamehouse and paid $20. for it.  One day it suddenly disappeared from my computer.  I contacted gamehouse and basically they told me that it was my loss and they would sell me another.
When I saw this one and the price I couldn't wait to try it.  I am very glad I did.
Very pleased with the product and the performance plus I have the c.d. in case I need it to re-install.
Thanks Amzon!

If you like a quick word game, that doesn't require too much thinking, this is it.  When I want to relax and just play something fast and fun I play this game.  It is colorful and gives you 3 choices of ways to play the game.  It is not too easy but not too hard so anyone can play.

I think it's a bad design problem, because the battery pack is essentially flush with the floor, on the same level as the WII Fit balance board legs.  As soon as you stand or move on the WII Fit balance board, the battery pack pushes in, and connection is lost.  It will work great, if you don't ever stand on the balance board, but that really isn't much use, right?  You shouldn't have to alter your balance board to work with a battery pack.  I'd bet 1/4 of an inch would have made all the difference.

I was afraid to buy this at first due to the other reviews and the price.  So I went ahead and got it and it worked great.  No interuptions at all.  You will never know the difference.  I like it so much, I am buying another one for a gift.
summary: Works Great For My Wii Board

reviewText: I took a chance buying these being that there are some negative reviews. I use the legs on my board and it did lose it's connection once or twice but I just had to wiggle the cord and it was fine. When not in use I leave it charging on its side. When I am ready to use it the battery is fully charged and ready to go. I only use the board for about 45 minutes at a time, so I don't know the full life of a charge.

For the price this a very nice usb cable that allows you to play at a distance from your Playstation 3 while your controller charges. The usb cable that comes with the Playstation is way too short. Outside of that it does what it is supposed to do.
summary: Great exentsion usb cord for Playstation 3

reviewText: Bought this to replace my old charger, which was exactly the same. I owned the first one for 8 years and it worked fine, which is I suppose the most I could hope for out of something of this price. It was a good thing.
summary: I owned the first one for 8 years and it worked fine, which is I suppose the most I could ...

reviewText: Our original high-end charger broke after a couple of years and we bought this as a replacement. I like this one 10x better because it's way easier to mount the remotes onto the micro USB. With the old one we had to struggle to get the remote to latch and it was a huge pain. This has worked perfectly, no issues, full charge every time. I also like that it doesn't take up very much space. Great product!
summary: Easy to Mount Remotes, Great Charge

reviewText: We've had the Playstation 3 Energizer for years now and it's still charging our controllers without a hitch. (It's seen quite a few of the controllers come and go as they wear out much more quickly than this charger.) It's an easy way to keep two controllers charged and ready to go. Well worth the money for the convenience and longevity we've enjoyed from it's use.
