summary: ) It's an easy way to keep two controllers charged and ready to ...

reviewText:
Great product for charging your controllers. Keeps them orderly in one area too which is a plus for me. Only complaint I have is that it is a little difficult to slide the top controller in place, meaning I have to actually pick the stand up to be able to fit the controller in. But other than that it's great. I would recommend this to others.

I bought it from the amazon seller FYI.
summary: Great stand to organize and charge

reviewText: I bought this for my boyfriend for christmas last year and it was the sleeper gift! It's great because it fits out of the way and doesn't take up a slot on the playstation. Also it doesn't hurt the controllers if you leave them plugged in after they are fully charged. I highly recommend this to anyone who likes to keep their back up controllers fully charged!

This device is great because I don't have to deal with cable tangle, and I have a place to organize the PS3 controllers. The light turns green once the controller is charged, which is very handy! I wish they still made the version with the extra USB pass-through ports, but this one does its job.

I debated buying this for a long time. I figured it was a waste of money and it wouldn't really serve a purpose.

Turns out I was wrong. I broke down one day and figured I would try it and I really like it. I like the convenience of having a stand hold my controller and I like that it is constantly charging them. If one of my controller's battery is low, since I have three, I just swap one out for another and I am ready to get back in the game.

It's a great product and I get a lot of use out of it.

After using this product for more than 3 years I can safely say I have never had any problems with it. It made the whole process go by much quicker since I didn't need to use the charging cables whenever the ps3 remote died. Instead I can just always have them charged and ready to go.

I like the overall design of the charger. It charges my controllers as it's supposed to. I like the indicator lights to tell you when it's charged. It'll take some getting use to inserting the controller in the base, but you'll get the hang of it.

The charger arrived very quickly.  The product description was very accurate.  Charging time was shorter than the time described on the box.  The only complaint I have is when placing the controllers on the chargers, it takes a little bit of moving around the controllers to hook them up because the connectors are really small.  Other than that, they are perfect.

This charger is great for my kiddo! Before we had it the only way we could charge the remotes was to have them plugged in to the PS3, but had to leave it on. I wasn't a fan of that option. This charger is a great alternative and it keeps the remotes up and out of harms way while he isn't playing.

I hate that you can't tell if your controller is charging or not on the ps3. I got this so I could charge both of my controllers at the same time without connecting anything to the play station so I know it's charging even when the ps3 is off. It charges the controllers very quick too.
summary: Necessary for players with more than one controller

reviewText: I have bought 3 of these as gifts so far.  I do not own a Playstation 3, but (obviously) know a few people that do.  Each one of them have exclaimed how much they liked having this Charging System for their wireless controllers.  It's small enough that it sits out of the way, and I've been told the remotes hold the charge very well.  And the price is right.  Which is why I've bought 3.  I've also bought the same item for the XBox 360 as a gift as well from the same company (also from Amazon).

This is a wonderful PS3 charger. Besides the two bays, there's two more usb ports on the right side of it. If you want more usb ports, just buy a usb hub and plug it in. Then you can charge anything you want with the right size usb port of course.

I bought this as a gift. I have been using another one for quite a while. This is a very nice charger that lets you know when your controller is fully charged. This will be a nice addition to your PS3 system.

This charger feels really sturdy, is quite compact, and looks nice.  The USB port, which can be used with the PS3 headset dock that is included, is a great addition when you want to charge your controller while using it.  Rather than having to be three feet away from your system, you can be right where you place your charger (I have mine right next to the couch), which is very convenient.  A great product that looks good and gets the job done in an excellent fashion.

The product description and photos clearly indicate that this item has 2 USB ports on the side. But when I opened it, there was only 1 USB port. I bought this item so I could charge both of my 2 DualShock controllers and 2 Move controllers. But I can't charge both Move controllers if there is only one USB port. I am returning it.

I LOVE this thing! This is one of the best purchases my husband and I have ever made! We only have two controllers, which is perfect because that is all this charging dock holds. It also holds my headset so it always has a full charge. The price for this item on Amazon was amazing, about 10 dollars cheaper than any store I have searched! The package was undamaged... The only reason this product gets a 4 out of 5 stars is because the headset jack is loose.
summary: Playstation 3 Energizer Power and Play Charging System

reviewText: Have had this unit for several months and I love it. I like how it is powered separately and you don't have to have the PS3 on to charge your controllers. I also really like that it has two extra usb ports that you can use to charge several separate things like your camera or whatever. Highly recommended.

It looks pretty flimsy at first. I was skeptical when I took it out of the box, the connections look like small but it is built very well. The controllers fit perfectly. I have used it many times with no issues at all. I'm very pleased with the product.

Bought this for my husband for his game controllers and he couldn't have been more pleased. He had been wanting one for a while and finally purchased it for a Christmas gift this year. It makes recharging controllers a breeze!

I was looking for a way to charge my game pads without hooking them up to the PS3. The Playstation 3 Energizer Power & Play Charging System solved that problem for me. It really works great and holds the game pads in place nice and secure. I like the red and green light when you put the game pads in to tell you if it is charged (green light) or if it is charging (red light), plus it looks really cool and the design fits with the PS3 design. I would recommend this to anyone with a PS3.

This charger is awesome, it lets you place two controllers infront and charge them both while not connected to the console at all. It has a LED system in the front that glows around the top of the controller when its connected to the charger it will glow red if its charging or green if its fully charged. It looks pretty awesome too, it comes in a shiny black plastic design and is very easy to use.

I would highly recommend this to anyone looking for a way to keep their controllers charged up.

This is a wonderful charge station for the PS3 controllers.  It's easy to hook the controllers into it.  When it's red, it's charging and when it's done it turns green.  I can play my PS3 all day without having to worry about my controller dying.  When I'm done, I just put it on and it charges it with no problems.  No more having to leave the PS3 on to charge the controllers.

This is a must buy for any PS3 owner.  You will not be disappointed.  I guarantee it!

I love this PS3 controller charger. Its easy to use and can charge 4 controllers at once. I hated having to charge the PS3 controller with the USB cord attached to the PS3. Now I put it in the charger at night or if the controller needs charging when I'm playing, I can attach a USB cord directly to the unit. I also like that its by Energizer.

It charges fast, the controllers fit just right, it looks really nice, it's not overpriced, no negative side to this product. If you own a PS3 and don't have this, put it on the list. It is a must have. Don't buy a cheaper one that might not work correctly. It is worth every penny

I bought this product to charge my PS3 remotes and it does just that. It seems to be pretty well built and I have enjoyed having it. My question is why doesn't the PS3 have powered USB drives that work when the system is off, so we don't have to buy this type of device in the first place? That being said I would highly recommend this product to those who would like to be able to charge their remotes while their PS3 is powered off.

I searched high and low for this guitar, not really knowing what I was looking for.  I could not find it locally so I went to Amazon.com because I found out you can find anything there.  Love the guitar.  It's a lot of fun.  I was really impressed how it all works together.  I am new to all these games so of course everything has passed me by.  I had to have a 10 year old show me how to use it...but it is very enjoyable.

Well, I don't have tons to say other than it's Rune Factory on the Wii. It's an amazing game and I absolutely love it. There's plenty to accomplish in it, so you won't be finding yourself running out of things to do within the first 20+ hours of gameplay for SURE, although I still haven't gotten through the game so I'm not sure just how far it goes. I've played a solid 15-20 hours and still don't feel like I've even gotten very far since there's still tons to do.
summary: Solid Harvest Moon Meets RPG Game

reviewText: My son has been wanting this game for the longest time and when I finally purchased it for him he was so happy. He got his twin to play with him and they have been playing ever since. The game arrived within days, and now I have two very happy kids. Once again thank you Amazon !!!

I have always been a huge fan of the Harvest Moon Series, and this game is that, plus whimsical awesomeness! I really enjoyed the townspeople, the wooing aspect, and the farming. I like that there is actual "fighting" involved, and the game feels more fast-paced than the traditional Harvest Moon games. I really enjoyed it!

One of my favorite games ever. It is addictive. I like that you can basically do whatever you want. You can fish, farm, fight, etc. As others have said the Runey system can be annoying but I didn't spend too much time thinking about it and everything seemed to work out okay, just grow lots of grass. You also have to wait a few seconds between each screen of the game which I wish could have been a little faster.  Also, it is a very pretty game.

My 10 year old daughter has been playing this game and absolutely loves it and after several try's, she finally convinced me to try playing the game. I have always been a hardcore gamer and I thought that I would be extremely board by the game but found it strangely addicting. There are enough different activities in the game that make it suitable for players of any skill level. The dialogue is written for young players. Overall, the game is more fun than it should be.

This is my favorite game that I own. It's totally addicting and there are so many different elements to it that you don't get bored and there is something for everyone. You can farm, catch and raise animals, build relationships, collect items to craft with, and battle. There are a few annoying little flaws, like editing issues or mispelled words occasionally, but these are fairly rare and don't interfere with game play. I definitely recommend it.

I only say that because I enjoy this game so much, and it is so addicting that I find myself playing for hours on end without realizing it.  If you like Harvest Moon and RPG's then this game will exceed expectations.
summary: This game may ruin your relationships

reviewText:
This is the best Wii game I have in my collection right now. The gameplay is addictive, however, it leaves me feeling satisfied after playing for about 20-30 minutes. This is the perfect game for anyone just wanting to play at most an hour a day. The combat is fun, the RP elements are well-incorporated, and the storyline is great (despite the poor localization).

I really recommend this to any Wii owner.

I am very happy with this game.  There is so much to do, but you don't have to do anything before you are ready.  The dungeons are great, because they break up the day.  You are not just planting crops any more.  I am addicted to it, and sometimes neglect other things in order to play it.

The controls are a little wonky at first, but once you get over the learning curve this game is great. I always feel starved for decent side scrollers and this game fills that void. The art style is amazing, and the combat keeps you coming back for more.

This is the first time i've ever bought a game mainly because of the music in it. (it's really good). The game is a lot of fun to play and although you can play as 2 different characters with different story lines, it doesn't take long to finish either one of their stories. Jumping around in order to fight 2 or 3 bosses can be a pain at times, but other than that, the gameplay is pretty solid.

I just want to add a 5-star to the list of great reviews. I've played through one storyline and have just started another. I've played for about 12 hours. I agree the game can be a bit repetitive, but honestly, it's a lot of fun. It is great to look at and is simple enough to just grab and play. At $15 bucks it's easily a steal.

Really!  Look at the price.  As I write this, the game is twelve dollars.  Come on!  The price is amazing, the art is amazing, the game-play is amazing.  I really enjoy myself when I play this game.  It's /beautiful/ and the characters are likable.  I wholeheartedly recommend it.
summary: THERE IS NO REASON /NOT/ TO GET THIS GAME!

reviewText: One of the few Wii games I have ever looked forward to, and I forgot to get it.  They stopped carrying it in stores but I found it on here, brand spanking new for 17 bucks so of course I got it.  I played the game for hours, but I eventually got bored with it.  I'll pick it up again eventually.

This is by far one the best games I have played on the Wii.  The graphics are just stunning!  I would often stop myself from playing just to admire the world around me.  The combat system is superb, and the ability to collect and upgrade swords is just phenomenal.  The game also changes based on which character you choose.  All of this adds more Replay value to an awesome game!
summary: Beautiful graphics, awesome gameplay, and great replay value.

reviewText: this game is awesome.  I love the limited game play it has to offer.  It is a unique story in itself.  I would recommend to anyone who doesn't mind putting a quite a few hours into a game.  I read about it on a otome site, bought it and have loved it since.
summary: I Love this game.  Got it for 9.99 @ game stop

reviewText: I just couldn't get anywhere in this game.  I spent most of my time trying to figure out what to do, and when I finally figured it out, was never very impressed.  I didn't get far enough in the game to give it a proper chance - but there was very little incentive.

Awesome Starter Pack. The main reason I bought this was because I needed the storage space. I also had to buy a memory card in order to transfer all the content on my 20GB Hard Drive over to my 60GB Hard Drive. In the end it all worked out.

I haven't gotten very far yet, but this is a really good game.  It's a lot of fun, and the controls actually aren't that bad.  It can get a little tough, and some of the things I don't QUITE fully understand, but you figure it out better as you go.  Anyway, I recommend the game, it's a lotta fun, tough to stop playing.

The game itself is pretty boring.  It was just sitting on my shelf, and I never felt compelled to play it again.
It is a below average 1st person shooter game.  The controls never really work that well, and the game just doesn't give you that immersion feeling.

I'm going to make this short and sweet.

If you liked any of the Halo games and killing aliens, evil military types and giant bugs, this is your game.

If you like well designed FPS games, you've found the best one for the Wii.

I own a lot of Wii games, and this is by far my favorite.  I've played it through countless times.

The only thing negative that I'll say is that the Multiplayer lacks depth, and your online options are... well, limited.
summary: Don't even hesitate.  BUY THIS GAME NOW.

reviewText: I went snowboarding "for real" for the first time this year and loved it so I thought this game would be a fun way to snowboard year round....and I was right! The movements that the game requires you to do are def similiar to the real thing. However I do recommend that you play this game with the Wii Balance Board because the only downfall that I would say this game has is that it is difficult to play with just the remote and nunchuck. Other than that, I would def recommend this game!

It looks like fun.  However when you actually try to use it, it doesn't work.  Once you attach the poms to the holder & put the wii controller in the holder, the signal to the console is lost because the play poms are to dense at one end.  This kills the signal between the controller & the console & renders the device useless.  Once you remove the controller from the pom holder, everything works again.  Wish I could get my money back.

I bought this game as a Christmas gift for a friend. I had to play through it before wrapping it. I have played this game before. While the game is long, the plot is different than that of the Halo series. Game play is still the same, the enemy is still the same, but this game lacks Master Chief. The game is also very dark, so if you have vision issues, be sure to lighten your television. It is still a great game.

I have heard many criticisms of this game from both friends and strangers and I must say that I do not understand. This is one of the best halo campaigns I have played, and includes one of the most beautiful soundtracks for a Halo game. Take it from a person who has played every Halo game from Combat Evolved to 4, buy this game!

This was a fantastic game. I like all the Halo games so I'm bias but if you want to try a good first person shooter than this one is for you. My only beef with this game and the others is that I just can't get enough of them. I wish the campaign mode was ten times longer!

For those who think the game is not worth the 60 dollars, they are right. It is way too much money for a game that gives you Halo 3's multiplayer on one disc (with three extra maps, nonetheless), and a short campaign that can be completed in 6-7 hours (on another disc). But for the price tag that it has right now (somewhere from 20-30 bucks), it really is a steal. Grab it at this low price and you won't regret it, because the campaign is great- hey, it's a Halo game.

After Halo 3 I was waiting for a great game that will keep me entertained and with a great story, and Halo 3 ODST did it!! The graphics are amazing, the action is great! Best game of the year!!

Now I'm waiting for Halo Reach coming out next year.

Don't bother buying this product. It doesn't work. The pom poms cover the Wii sensor on the remote. Amazon should stop selling a product the so clearly doesn't do what it is supposed to do. Check out the other reviews and you'll see how lame this product really is.

If you like fighting the same enemy over and over on the same street over and over, this game is for you.  This game seems to just be a filler with the same buildings, the same enemies, and only a few changes for hours.  Seriously, what a dud.  I loved the first Halo, and even the other two were good, but this one is just flushing your money down the drain.
summary: Same Street Over & Over & Over...Same Enemy Over & Over

reviewText: For anyone who likes Halo and knows how to do a little research before purchasing a game, ODST is great. If you were expecting a whole new experiance, than you will be disappointed. It's that simple! That's why it is HALO 3: ODST, not HALO 4. Is $60 a bit pricey? Yup, but money isn't an issue for this guy. The price will go down (it's already $50 on Amazon) and then it will be more worth it for everyone else.

I keep seeing a lot of bad reviews here on Amazon for this game, and I think people are being a bit overly harsh.

The story is excellent, and the gameplay is exactly what one would want. Its a mix of the tactical with the run-and-gun that Halo is so famous for. The music is gorgeous and the game is textured visually, in sound, and emotionally. If you want a fun game experience, and a fun multiplayer one as well, I'd advise picking this one up. Don't believe the anti-hype.

Seems this was advertised as being compatible with RB1, which it isn't, and I feel for the folks who bought it under those pretenses.  However, it does work with RB2 for the Wii.

That said, I love it.  The strum bar is much more accurate than the Strat that comes with RB2.  The only complaint is that it doesn't have the solo buttons at the bottom of the neck, but that's not a huge deal.

Love this headset, For the price you cant go wrong, It has great sound quality with the 40mm speakers. Super easy setup just plug and play pretty much. I really like that the mic is removable, If I want to watch a movie I can just take the mic off and its out of the way. I would definitely recommend this head setup for a beginner headset.

This is a good gaming headset. We use it with our XBOX One. It is comfortable on the head for long periods of time. You can bend the mic around to a comfortable position for you. Sound quality is good.

I thought this was only made for an SNES. The fact that it can be used on more than one console definitely makes it that much better than an A/V cable that only works for one system. I highly recommend this cable to anyone who has lost the original cable that came with the above listed consoles.
summary: More than I was expecting! Totally worth buying.

reviewText: I recently had the urge to hook up my old SNES so that I could go back and play some of the classics.  I was dissappointed when I realized that I did not have the A/V cables to do this.  After searching on Amazon I found they had some at a very low cost so I decided to purchase them.  After hooking up my SNES I am happy to say it works as good as it used to... and the games still hold up pretty well.

style.Edition:: Ice Blue with Brain Age and Case

reviewText: I bought this for my wife for Christmas and she loves it. The great thing about the DS is that they have a great color selection for the picky people out there. The graphics are pretty good on the DS and the game selection is great. I also like the DS over the PSP because its more robust.

style.Edition:: Ice Blue with Brain Age and Case

reviewText:
This is fun. I don't know if my brain is actually getting younger but I am getting faster and more accurate with the games!

I'd recommend it for families and friends, too.

I'm going to splurge on Brain Age 2 pretty soon.
summary: Brain is getting younger, I think

style.Edition:: Ice Blue with Brain Age and Case

reviewText: This bundle is just awesome, great price and great fun!. The game is very easy to play and with just a few minutes a day you can train your brain pretty well!!. I couldn't believe how bad my brain was when I first played it but I'm improving a little every day...LOL. I totally recommend this game to people of all ages, specially the over 30 like me...
summary: Excellent deal and very good game

style.Edition:: Ice Blue with Brain Age and Case

reviewText: This game was originally a gift from "Santa" to our younger son. Now, I'm thinking of getting one for me. The games are fun and challenging. I haven't done all the tests yet but both my kids have and they love it. If you love challenging games, brain teasers and puzzles, this is the game for you. I'm glad "Santa" stumbled upon this great deal at amazon. It comes with a carrying case, charger and an extra stylus.

style.Edition:: Ice Blue with Brain Age and Case

reviewText: I purchased this the day after Thanksgiving at the same time my sister-in-law was rushing out to the store at 6:00 am, only to find them sold out!  The price was a couple of bucks less then the store and I didn't have to leave the house!  It was a great deal and my daughter was very happy on Christmas morning! Everything needed to get started playing was in one box so all that was left for me to do was look at some other game cartriges to add to it! I am very happy with this purchase!!!

style.Edition:: Ice Blue with Brain Age and Case

reviewText: This is a great bundle. The game is fun. I love the color of the Nintendo DS Lite. The carrying case is great. You can put your Nintendo DS, 3 games, and a DS pencil in there. You should get it before they sell it all. This is a limited edition so get it now!
summary: Nintendo DS Lite Limited Edition Ice Blue with Brain Age: Train Your Brain in Minutes a Day! And Carrying Case Bundle

style.Edition:: Ice Blue with Brain Age and Case

reviewText: I bought this system for my 9 year-old daughter for Christmas and we have been playing it every since then. I have taken over her game. We love it!! I would recommend this not only for children but for adults too. I should have bought me one too!

style.Edition:: Red Mario with New Super Mario Bros.

reviewText: Nintendo DS Lite Limited Edition Red Mario with New Super Mario Bros. I bought this for my son for Christmas and he absolutely loves it. It works great and the game that came with it was a brand new game at the time. He loves playing it!! Awesome product at a great price!!

style.Edition:: Red Mario with New Super Mario Bros.

reviewText: I purchased two of these, one for each of my grandchildren, (2 girls). They don't live near me but I have heard that they love them, (as do their mother).  I am looking forward to my next visit so I can try them out.

I totally love this game! I like it even more than the console version of Phantasy Star Universe. It is a bit easier to play, and more versatile. It is not the same story, and it seems to happen after the events of PSU, and that is also a plus. As a long-time Phantasy Star fan, this is a perfect game.

This game has gotten more play time from me than just about anything else lately, and I have to say that other than some of the Square Enix ports to the DS (namely Final Fantasy IV and Chrono Trigger) this has to be the best RPG for portable systems that I have played.

I purchased this game years ago from Amazon and never got around to reviewing it. Now I've got well over 300 hours in the game since buying it, and I still play the game despite there being a sequel released.

If you liked the Baldur's Gate and Neverwinter Nights series, then you'll love this game. It's a classic RPG with extensive dialogue, 4-party battle group strategy, medieval politics with a twist of dark fantasy, and romance. Your main character is highly customizable with 3 main classes to choose from and multiple sub-classes to specialize in, along with 3 main races: elf, dwarf, human.
summary: If you liked the Baldur's Gate and Neverwinter Nights series

reviewText: There are 150+ reviews now so I won't waste my time telling you all what has already been said. I will just say the game is really good and enjoyable with 50+ hours of gameplay and tons of replay value. With that being said 5 stars. For more specific reviews read the other 90+ 5 star reviews. Just know the game is worth every penny and even more so now that the price has dropped to half or lower. you can't go wrong with Dragon Age.

The Good:
-Fantastic characters, you'll get attached to them
-Long storyline
-Great replay value
-Possibilities seem endless
-Combat tactics will come in handy, especially on higher difficulties

The Bad:
-Graphics are sub-par, particularly the blood effects
-Frame rate issues at times

Even with the graphical issues, the gameplay more than makes up for it. This is a very absorbing game. I've just finished my first playthrough and I plan to have many more.
summary: One of the best RPG's I've played this gen.

reviewText:
There is no need for me to go into complete detail. The reviews already listed does this game justice. What a great game. It will be hard for me to go to another RPG without wishing it were somehow like this game. I am anxiously awaiting the next installment of this game.

The writers and actors on this game are AWESOME.

I consider the games from Baldur's Gate series by Bioware to be the best RPG games ever created. This game essentially is Baldur's Gate in 3D. Great dialogues, great story, lots of sidequests, great humor, etc. A must for any RPG fan. Buy it, you will not regret it!
summary: Bauldur's Gate in 3D, a must for any RPG fan

reviewText:
AWESOME GAME!!!

The world you play in is BIG...there is a great supply of side quests and extra missions, you can customize your characters, have romances, steal, kill and be as evil or good as you wish, and the story line changes with your decisions throughout the game. I've played every DLC there is so far (at least for PS3), and I'm happy I did.

If you've enjoyed games like, Diablo, Diablo 2, KOTOR, KOTOR 2 or any AD&D game you would not go wrong with this game.
summary: Fantastic RPG, Great story...Long live the Grey Wardens!!!

reviewText: I had no problems installing the game but when I try to play it I get 5 minutes into it and it crashes. It's an older game so I thought my year old PC wouldn't have any problems but it locks up and crashes non stop. I've never experienced this with a game before. Very frustrating. I downloaded a patch and that made it worst if anything.

If you like watching an endless parade of cut scenes, in game movies and engaging in long drawn out conversations with NPC's this may be the game for you.

5 hours in and I haven't spent 10 minutes in actual RPG combats.

"Pardon me good sir, but do you know where the urn of the sacred ashes is"?

"Blah, blah, blah, blah, blah".

"Was that a yes or a no"?

"Blah, blah, blah, blah, blah".

Gets my vote for the most over hyped, long winded game ever.
summary: Cut scenes, in game movies, and boring conversations

reviewText: I was so excited to play my game once I finally received it. I actually received it when it said it would get here but when I put in the game into my PS3 it was not working properly. I was very disappointed but I had hope so I cleaned it and tried again but it would freeze my console. I decided to just return it and get my refund because it wasn't worth it.
summary: I was very disappointed but I had hope so I cleaned it and ...

reviewText:
If you can read the producer card at the end of Big Bang Theory tv show, you should be able to read this game. If you have any difficulty reading the card, don't bother with this game.
Another sloppy part of the game is the dice rolling noise. It fails to shut off, so you end up with that incessant noise in the background. If you play this in a group, you'll probably turn the volume down anyways.

This product is not worth the money.  One of the battery packs never took a charge and never worked.  The other chargers only last a couple of hours and have to be recharged.  Save your money and buy another brand.

The disc would not work on my computer. I tried troubleshooting the problem, I tried looking up how to fix the issue, I ran my computer on various settings, yet nothing worked. Turns out I wasn't the only one who had the same problem and nothing fixed it.

I downloaded this "Free" full-version game thinking that I was getting a free full-version game. Then I played for a short time (really enjoying myself) and time was up. This was a "trial" version but it didn't say that anywhere. Not even when I loaded the game. That's just wrong. It should say "play free for an hour" or something like that. I never would have downloaded it if I knew it was just a trial.

I was expecting something a little better. The graphics are hard to see and hard on the eyes I could only play for a half hour before I quit. The game was also unresponsive. I was glad that it was a free download.

I never even bothered to open the game. As soon as I downloaded it my computer went off in a different direction.  I'm still trying to get rid of the crap that came with the download.  I don't care how good the game is because my computer has not been the same since I downloaded this.  I was naive to think i would get just the game.  Should've known better.  Once bitten twice shy.

After downloading the game successfully I started to play it.  Once I finished the first level it shuts down and says there's a problem and it will be fixed shortly.  Nothing has been fixed and I don't know how to get it done.  I'm disappointed because I really want to play it.

Unable to download from my game library, but I have played it before on another machine until I switched machines and lost the game. I enjoyed playing the game and would very much like to be able to download it again and play.
summary: I enjoyed playing the game and would very much like to ...

reviewText:
I purchased version 2 of the Big Kahuna Reef because my family and I enjoyed the 1st version and I thought the extra features of the 2nd version would be fun. I would have never purchased this game had I known there would be a large, nearly topless mermaid in the background. I find it so pointless to include that graphic on a game that will be played by children.
If you're considering paying for Big Kahuna Reef 2, save your money and stick with the free version. I sure wish I had.

This software has caused my Windows 7 computer to lock up several times.  Task manager does not work with it.  I had to do a hard shutdown a few times.  I finally gave up and uninstalled the program.  When I did that, my mouse did not work and there were other non functioning issues.  I did a restart and I had a system crash and had to do a system crash dump.  My computer appears to be working now.  I hope I do not experience any other problems as a result.

If you would like to practice your mouse dexterity on a static background, this is the game for you. If you are looking for a fun game that has more than one movement, then you should try something else.
summary: Boring game.. the only movement is the mouse

reviewText:
This was a fun game, but it totally screwed my computer up and I would not recommend anyone download it.
I had to delete it and my computer has never been the same, but I don't want to spend money on a new one.
Also, kept crashing!
summary: loved playing it,but it actually ruined my computer

reviewText:
Both the friendly AI and the enemy AI are incredibly dumb, mechanic, not realistic.

The game does not let you save your progress. Even worse, it pretends that you are saving a game. Then, when you try to load the saved game, it will start from the beginning of the mission.

I purchased this product and at first loved it since I didn't have to keep buying batteries for my remotes. But after about 2 months the charger stopped charging the remotes and now it is a useless peace of crap. I suggest you spend a bit more to get something that will last longer then a month or two. I plan on getting a new charger after Christmas! Do yourself a favor and do not buy this product!!!
summary: For those who had a great review... wait a month or 2 and then you will see why everyone else hates this product

reviewText:
First of all, I realized you can't plug this product into a wall - it has to be plugged into a computer - which of course makes you have to leave your computer on to charge it.  Also when it says it's fully charged, it's not - I'll play my wii for 5 minutes and it will say that it's got one bar of battery left.

Lame product.

These chargers did not work out like I expected. the remotes do not fit into them perfectly and even if they have been on the charger for awhile they do not hold a charge very long after you take them off. I was not at all impressed.

This Charging station SUCKS!! First of all it's difficult to even get the remotes to charge on the station, if you don't put the remote in just right it won't ever charge and if you walk away it won't charge. Second, the battery life doesn't even last for 30 minutes of inactivity! There is NO WAY to even play a whole game with the battery life it gives you. DO NOT waste your money!!

Granted, this is one of the cheapest chargers out there, it's also one of the worst.

Mine lasted a few days, that was it. The batteries take a couple of hours to charge, and die with about 2 hours of gameplay.

I recommend you save your money and try a Nyko charger, I hear they're decent.

One side of the charger registers a remote is put in for about 4 seconds, so it does not charge it at all.  The other side claims to be charging, but the battery always run out within 10 minutes of use.

I don't know if mine was defective or not, but this was a total waste of money.

I can't figure out what this thing is and/or how it works.  I'm sure I just need to read something more carefully.  Maybe I need some additional items.  However, I've wasted my money on an item I can't use
summary: If you can figure out how the heck it works, please let me know!

reviewText: This game had been on my wish list and I was so excited when I got it as a Christmas gift. What a huge letdown. There are hardly any options for games except for boxing, which is not a workout at all. I never broke a sweat and didn't get out of breath at all. Not quite the "cardio workout" I was hoping for. I ended up selling it to a secondhand video game store.

Warning: Do not buy this if you are looking for a full workout or if you do not own the balance board.

I purchased this thinking that it was a full cardio workout. Boy was I wrong.  This is a boxing game...the end. Although it's fun at first and provides a little workout, overall for what I am looking for it was a waste of money.  I would not recommend this to anyone.

Video game companies must be punished for abusing their customers with DRM.  Please do not buy any game or support any company that uses DRM.

I am more than willing to pay for and support games from companies that actually appreciate their customers.  I will "acquire" this game, but I will do so in a manner that will insure that these jacklegs will not see a penny of my money.
summary: Spread the word:  SAY NO TO DRM!

reviewText: I don't need to preach the horrors of DRM, being as so many others before me have already done that. I will say that I will buy a copy of the game for the Xbox (a console I don't even own) because I support the Riddick franchise, but I will not support Atari's decision to use DRM protection. I am being forced to acquire the game for my PC through other means because (like so many others) I don't want to buy a rental game.

This game isn't hard, its just too fast. I got it because I thought it would be fun and easier than the original Sim games, but its more frustrating than anything. The object is to play these mini-games and score the highest. No matter how hard you shake, wiggle, or push what you are supposed to on the controller, you can never keep up. I was to the point where I was like WTF? My daughter is 7 and she hates the game too. Good thing I only spent $10 on it, but that's still a waste of money.

I bought this because the manufacturer raved about the quality of the gaming experience when using this, but as soon as I opened the box I realized this keyboard was obviously a piece of garbage. It's tiny, uncomfortable, and super thin with letters that look like they'd break after a few uses. I will be sending this back, as it's way overpriced for the quality. Buy a Logitech or another keyboard, as this thing is expensive and worthless

I bought this case for my DS Lite to protect it from damage. The case doesn't fit and the DS won't close all way. It was very hard to put my DS Lite in the first place. Don't buy this case and save your money.
summary: Don't buy the horrible case save your money.

reviewText: I bought this console mainly to play nintendo games, but that is the only part that really doesn't work. when you can get the game to turn on, the color is all messed up! i wish i wouldn't have bought it!

When I installed the game my virus protection software kicked in and wanted to remove it.  When contacted, tech support told me to contact my virus protection vendor because they didn't think the file actually contained a virus.  I told them I really didn't have any interest in going back and forth between companies to see if I could get it to work and that I would like my money back.  Amazon graciously complied and refunded my money - which I appreciate.
summary: My computer thought it was a virus

reviewText: This game was so addicting and engaging. At first I spent hours on it at a time. But, when I finally started to get to the really good part of the game it started messing up with glitches or something. I was sooo bummed!

I have had this game for a few years now, and I can NEVER get past the plane level! I can't even manage to shoot one plane down! The remotes are programmed so that when you push up you go down, and when you push down you go up! Forget hitting other planes, it's impossible to just FLY! I can't believe how freakishly hard this is. The library will probably be getting my copy. What good is a game if you can't even play it? :/
summary: Can't Even Get Past the First Level!

reviewText:
I made the mistake of going cheap and I regret it.  The "transformer" is just a plastic shell made to look like the original and the plug doesn't fit snuggly into the power jack so you have to fiddle with it laying on a flat surface and then walk away slowly or it will lose the connection.  Don't even think about charging it while you play.

Just pay a little more for something better.

If you're looking for a good single player campaign, give this one a pass. There is no single player campaign (just skirmishing against the AI), there is no tutorial, the manual is tiny and incomplete, and the game locks up a bit more often than it should.

If you're looking for a multiplayer bragging-rights kind of game, then disregard this review. But if you were looking for a narrative-driven campaign, trust me, this game isn't for you.

DO NOT BUY THESE UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCES.

I just took mine out of the package, following the instructions to charge them before use. I can't get the charger to make contact with my remotes for more than 1 or 2 seconds. Wiggling them around helps, if i could wiggle them for 12 hours to keep them connected.

This product is absolute garbage. Save your money.

Okay. Just like I said, "Literally a DS game." All they did was take the DS game and make it playable on the Wii. This MIGHT be a worth while game for the DS, but on the Wii the graphics are awful and the levels are lame. I don't know what else to say other than don't bother reading more reviews. Save your self some time and move on. Do not buy this game.

If you are interested in playing a fun game with lots of interaction, this is not the one for you.  I bought it thinking it was going to be a lot like SIMS where you get to control the characters throughout the game.  Instead, it is a series of videos broken up by a few easy games for you to play with your Wii remote.  Wii Play is more fun and more challenging than this game was.  If you like Grey's Anatomy like I do, just watch the show and forget the video game.

Have no idea if it's fun or not.  We bought this for my son, he saved up for weeks, and was so disappointed when it finally came and we realized he needed the original Spore in order to play.  There was no mention of that in the Amazon description when we bought it, so now he has to save up again to buy the original in order to play it.  Talk about a horrible lesson learned.  Poor kid.
summary: Misleading...need the original Spore before buying

reviewText: I love this mouse and would love to give it a 5 star review. The problem is it only lasts 1-2 years before you need to buy a new one. I have gone through 3 of these now hoping to get one that wouldn't have this issue, but after a year or two either the scroll wheel stops working or a button won't register your clicks. No mouse is not worth $35-70 per year... I can buy one with all the same basic functionality for about $5 that probably won't randomly stop working every year or two.

When it is working it is a fun game. However, the fun is taken out of it when you have to repeat a 30 min long mission. The first time the game wouldn't end because I shot down the fighters before I was told to do so. I was forced to just quit the mission. The second time, on the way back to the base after having shot everything down or bombed them in order, the game just froze.

I'm taking it back.
summary: nice game but is way too buggy

reviewText: Sorry but I agree with those who say this game is hard. I just can't get a hit. So, I'm giving up. Plus, it is very hard to get the ball over the plate when pitching. Yet, it's easy to hit a batter. What gives? And there are endless passed balls. I'm giving up on this game. Yet, I so wanted to enjoy it.
summary: Too Hard to Hit and Pitch

reviewText: I'm going to keep this short and simple. The item I received looked nothing like the item that is pictured. There is a a layer of silicone covering both the directional pads and the control buttons. There is also no way of changing the UMD out without taking the entire case off. The coverings can easily be cut out, but it still makes changing the UMD a very big hassle. Sadly, this product did not live up to my expectations, don't waste your money on this.

I did not like the storyline. It bored me. The gameplay was pitiful. I was really disappointed that I couldn't train my characters and level them up before the next chapter. Many of my characters had to be sacrifices just so I could proceed to the next chapter. I never even finished this game since I got so bored. Big waste of my money.

Please don't make the same mistake that I made: This is not a cable that will work with Nintendo DSi.  Since it will cost more in shipping to send it back than it's worth, I feel like I've thrown money away.  I realize that since I haven't tried the product, it's probably unfair to give it a one star rating.  This is mainly for those who are uninformed about DS cables, as I was.  There's really no way to tell until you get it home and try to plug it in.  At that point, it's too late.

I'm sure this is great for a _DS_, but despite the name, it doesn't work with a DSi. The product description text does say this, but I assumed that "NDSi" in the product name referred to "Nintendo DSi", not "Nintendo DS".

I purchased this on cyber Monday and was pleased with it for a while but only three months later I'm left with a sour taste in my mouth. I'm very disappointed with the quality of the material. The sound is still great still but the plastic casing has already started to crack and break. You get what you pay for.

I can't even say much for this game because I won't be finishing it. It was slow and boring at first, with clunky controls, but I was willing to give it a chance. However, I have no use for a game that requires you to club small helpless animals to death in order to progress to the next mission. That's not cute or funny. This one will not be added to my collection.

I ordered two of these and neither one would charge either our Nintendo DSi or Nintendo DSi XL. One wouldn't work at all when plugged in and the other would work only if you held the cord with your hand in exactly the right position. I have already returned these and replaced them with the original Nintendo chargers which both work fine. You get what you pay for.

I could not get my Wii remote to work in the steering wheel. I don't know what the problem was. I googled the issue and watched youtube videos in an effort to double check that I was doing everything right. Still couldn't get my controller to work in the wheel. I purchased the wheels to play Mario Kart and had to return it. Save your money and buy the classic controller instead.

The game is not fun at all, my family and myself tried to play this game and we all were frustrated as the controls were extremely difficult to use and the tracks you could go on were annoying. I wouldn't recommend this game

I was disappointed to receive this as a gift and then to have to return it.  I did not know there was a difference between a CD-ROM and DVD-ROM and did not know I had to look on the package to determine which it was.  Apparently I only have a CD-ROM drive and these were DVD-ROM games.  I'm sure the games are great but I couldn't load them into my computer.
summary: Read Labels Carefully and Know your Computer

reviewText:
I was hoping for a game similar to the "death from above" section in Call of Duty 4. If you value graphics in a game and have a high-end system like me, you will be disappointed with this game.
If you don't care so much about graphics and just like to blow stuff up, then it might be worth the 8 bucks.
It wasn't worth my time, I returned it.
summary: Not good quality graphics or AI

reviewText: Loved the first game so I was happy to see this one come out so quickly.  Follows the same pattern as the first one.  Except as I got into the game it froze on this one screen and wouldn't let me advance beyond that section.  I uninstalled the game from the computer and reinstalled it and the same thing happened.  Just a warning because it may not happen to everyone.
summary: Women's Murder Club:  A Darker Shade of Gray

reviewText: I looked forward to the "new" Tiger Woods PGA Tour 10 but was disappointed when I found that it is essentially the same game as last year. Still a great game to play but I would have hoped that with their resources it could have been better.

I bought a PC download version of this game. I tried playing it on an up to date version of Windows 7. After a few minutes of play
the game locks up and freezes. I have to use Task Manager to kill the non-responsive program. Don't buy this, it just wastes your money.
summary: I bought a PC download version of this game. ...

reviewText:
If you enjoy wandering around wastelands with no idea what to do no idea how to sell your stuff or how to survive without spending hours reading walkthroughs, then this game is highly recommended.

If you enjoy intuitive games with proper instructions that are well designed and fun to play, this game is not for you.
summary: Not a hybrid or a FPS, its pure RPG

reviewText: This game is a waste of money.  The gameplay just sucks.  The dueling at the end of almost every chapter is a bore and doesn't exactly work.  You can hardly see what you are shooting at even on a 42 inch HD screen.  You can't see where you are going.  It is worser than the first.  The game just isn't fun.  This is the last ride for this cowboy on this series.

I am very frustrated with the speed of this game. Each screen takes a very long time to load, but the mini game takes only a short time to play. Then it is back to the next wait for a long load. I can not recommend it.

This review doesn't need to be very long, the simple fact is that this game is pretty terrible. I'm not sure what I was expecting, but it certainly wasn't a medieval-themed Mario Party knock-off. The game's execution was rather terrible, as the controls didn't seem to actually affect much of what you did in the mini-games.

I would not buy this game again, and have in fact already re-sold it.
summary: A Mario Party knock-off that doesn't do very well.

reviewText: This is the most boring game I have ever played.  I have no idea how it got its Greatest Hits status, but this is just horrible.  The only reason why I continued to play it is because I already knew that John Marsten (you) get shot to ribbons at the very end, and I wanted to see that.  But even then, its so boring that I am a mission or two away from beating the game and I still do not have any desire to really "play" the game.
summary: This is the most boring game I have ever played

reviewText: I ordered a modified controller and got an inadequately modified controller that had all of the screws missing and would not stay together. I contacted the company and they are sending me a new one and I am returning the one they mailed me. I will update my review after I receive the new item to let everyone know if it is the correct item.
summary: Did not get what I ordered

reviewText:
This Wii Remote, after setting up and synchronizing it with my Wii, still requires me to make it search again and again (by pressing buttons) to make it "find" the Wii every time I turn it on. This includes times that I'm watching a movie and have to wake the remote up. It ends up taking about 5 minutes to make the remote work each time.

Not worth the money.

I wanted this for my son in time for Christmas and he specifically asked for light blue. That is the color shown in the picture when I placed the order. But when the package arrived it was not light blue. I do not recommend ordering this product from Amazon. It would be more reliable to buy somewhere where you can actually see what you are getting before you purchase. I will be returning for a refund.

Bought this item because I needed the charger base. It didn't work at all. I emailed the company to ask if they could just ship me that piece and they said I had to mail it to them in California. Very disappointing.

Bought this game thinking it would be fun. However, it would not load, and the disc just kept going round and round. Shame 'cos it seems like it would be a worthwhile distraction. Apparently, there is a problem with this version of the game. Maybe if they fix it and re-launch it in the future, I may think about buying a copy then!
summary: Couldn't even get it to load!

reviewText: Do not buy this memory card if you own a playstation 2 slim model. It will not work. I plugged in the memory card, ready to play my game, and when it came time to save it the memory card was not detected. I then checked the playstation 2 slim (without a game running)to see if it would show up (in the browser section) and it did not register at all. Take my word for it; do not buy this item.
summary: Does Not Work for PS2 Slim

reviewText: If you are planning to use this with a Playstation 2, it won't work. I got my game to recognize that there was a memory card, but it couldn't save any game files. I chalked it up to the memory card itself being useless, but an employee at one of the local game shops said Komodo brand will only work on the PS1. I should have done my research.

I'm not sure what is up with this game, but it won't play properly.  I think one of the problems is that it is a "Live" game.  I would rather have a single player off line game, which is almost impossible to find these days.  Wish they would all go back to the good old days when it was installed, and played directly on the PC.

I made a huge mistake with buying this game, I was under the impression that there was a single player game however all they did was use a few multiplayer maps with a bunch of bots.

The multiplayer is far too Halo for most PC gamers so is almost worthless.

If you like games like Battlefield Bad Company 2 avoid this game as you will regret spending your money on it. However if you think the PC needs more games like Halo and have no wish to play single player at all... then this is your game!

update: I do not recommend this game at all. I played it even though I bought it without knowing it was an on-rail shooter and I still didn't like it. I at least gave it a try:) If you like on- rail shooters then you will more than likley think this game is awesome.

Purchased this item thinking I was getting the real deal.  I don't think that it is. Moreover, it does not work very well at all. My children have had problems with it from the beginning.  I should have returned it when I had the chance.

In my opinion this was the worst rabbid game ever.  I have played all the rabbid games before this one and thought they were amazing and hilarious.  I then bought this one and thought it would be as fun and challenging as the previous but was wrong.  The game is way to easy,  i beat it in 2 days.  As far as fun goes the best part was harming santa claus.  All in all if you are looking for a fun rabbid game then don't buy this one.  Again this is my opinion.

In a similar fashion to everyone else, this game is literally unplayable. I purchased this game from steam in an attempt to avoid the issues described by the other reviewers, but to no avail. It has taken me 3 days to even get the game to start due to the ridiculous proprietary Uplay bs. Requiring the internet to play a single player game is absurd. I wish I could get my money back.
summary: Ubisoft sold their souls a while ago

reviewText: Can't really say if the game is fun, since I can't play it. Unfortunately, it doesn't run on Bootcamp. I contacted Ubisoft Support and they say it's not meant for that. The problem seems to be the game launcher. I installed it on a pure windows machine and it's running, after the game launcher crashed there as well, but at least it runs. Too bad that PC can't handle the graphics. Oh, and I had no problem playing the first Assassin's Creed on Bootcamp. Go figure.

I'm having the same problems as everyone else and I keep getting disconnected. Was a huge waste of money! The thing that makes me the most angry is I bought a book guide for this game and now I can't use it. It's just more ways for them to get more money out of us. I hate them for that!

UBISoft should be ashamed!  Having to use their servers is one of the dirtiest schemes I've come across in gaming!  If you're ticked off about this, or you refuse to buy the game because of this, please leave your comment.  The only way we can keep this from becoming an industry standard is by speaking out and refusing to buy these kinds of games.  If UBISoft continues to feature games that have to use their servers, then I have purchased my last UBISoft game!  I'll spend my money elsewhere.

Always been a fan of the first Assassin's Creed, it was an awesome game to play.  I was so looking forward to this squeal... until I found out about the strings attached to the PC version.  I don't have the most stable internet, and even if I did, I don't like the idea of my games calling home every second for permission to play a game that I payed full price for.  If I am going to be treated like I am renting the game rather than owning it, then the price should reflect it.

Since the game doesn't work, this is a pretty short review: this game, despite being a single player game, requires a constant internet connection to the game maker's servers...which themselves don't work. So the game can't be played.

Don't waste money on this crap!

I purchased this game because of the many reviews from adults saying how much they enjoyed playing it.  I was very dissappointed. The whole story and game is quite simple, boring and silly.  In my opinion, it is not a game for adults. I did not have the patience necessary to finish it all the way to the end.
summary: IT IS TOTALLY FOR KIDS, NOT FOR ADULTS

reviewText: This battery is cheap and defective. My old psp battery broke and I thought it was a cheap replacement that will work. Boy I was wrong, this battery worked for me a couple of days and turned off while I was charging my psp. I tried to charge it but it says external charging, broken battery. DO NOT BUY THIS BATTERY! CHEAP GENERIC BATTERIES ARE TOO GOOD TO BE TRUE AND WILL BREAK ON YOU. I contacted the seller and there was nothing that they could do about it. i would give it a 0 but you can't do that.

I ordered this product expecting the same action replay I had as a kid. I was super excited to receive my product that I'd spent almost $30 on, nd it turns out my product was lost in transit, and they were out of stock, so my product couldn't be replaced. I know for a fact that this product is fantastic and nothing can beat it, it's just the company that sold it was bull crap, and the customer service was also bull crap, all they could do was refund my purchase.

The company that made this game went out of business, so now there is no support for the game.  As far as XBox live is concerned this game does not exist, the downloadable content which was available at one point is no longer accessable.  Since the game is not really any different than the prequel, or Xmen Legends, I'd suggest you get one of those.
summary: The company that made this game went out of business ...

reviewText:
After I placed my order, I was taken to a screen where I was to 'wait' for my code.  It timed out, I never got my code, and now I have to deal with customer service.

I thought this was going to be 'the easy way' of getting points.  No luck.  :(
summary: Digital Distribution Sucks - Buy the Card Instead

reviewText: I was very disappointed with this game. It is a hidden object game, which I wasn't expecting it to be. I usually like hidden object games so that did not bother me. Some of the objects are so small it is nearly impossible to find. I wish that I had not wasted my money on this game. I will never pre-order another game, I will wait and read reviews before I waste my money.

I ORDERED 2 OF THESE CONTROLLERS. NEITHER CONTROLLER WORKED AS IT SHOULD. WHILE PLAYING DR. MARIO, IF YOU PUSH DOWN IT WILL GO TO THE LEFT OR RIGHT....NOT DOWN. SOMETIMES IT WOULD NOT MOVE AT ALL.THESE WERE THE WORST CONTROLLERS I HAVE EVER PURCHASED. THE CONTROLLERS I WAS TRYING TO REPLACE WORK BETTER THAN THESE.DO NOT BUY.

I put the cd in and it installed correctly and all i get is the start screen. it doesnt do anything else. I deleted it from my computer and tried to install it again. and again, it just sits at the start screen. very very sad.

I can't say much about this product because it won't run. It installs successfully but when I try to run it I get an error having to do with a failed attempt to validate the license. Online info says this is a typical Electronic Arts boondoggle. I just don't have time to fiddle around with phone calls or whatever to get this fixed, so I'll probably just delete it and forget about it.

The second I placed the order for this arcade stick, I read in a review that this no longer works with PS3's with the latest firmware installed.  It was too late to cancel the order so now I'm returning it.  Much like a previous reviewer, I'm wondering why Amazon is still selling this product.  Also, I happened to pick up another arcade stick since this one doesn't work and happened to notice that the quality of this thing is also pretty low compared to others out there.

I couldn't figure out how to play the game. It is not clear how to select the ball that you want to target AND then actually make the corresponding shot. I had to wait until my 12 year old nephew came to visit, and he figured it out for me. The problem was that I had lost interest by then. The game seems to be pretty tedious.
summary: Need better instructions or a 12-year-old to figure it out

reviewText: This game was terrible. I bought it because it was a two player game, and I really was hoping that it would be something that my husband and I could play together. I was so disappointed that I couldn't move. I thought that I would get to explore, and do missions, but no such luck. It was all mindless shooting. You don't even need the nun-chuck just sit, point, and shoot.

I've played RTS games on the PC for years.  This game is horrible.  The unit interface is clunky and you're sitting there trying to select the right unit while your other units are dying.  Storyline/dialog is HORRIBLE.  Real let down of a game.  If you've never played other RTS games, maybe it can be fun, but I couldn't stand it.

You can complete this game in about 4 hours.  It really is a horrible game.  If you can get it for free then it is worth it, but I wouldn't pay over 5 bucks for it, and I paid 8 without knowing how bad it is.  Maybe 1 dollar would be more appropriate.  Buy something, anything else.
summary: I feel for those that pre-ordered

reviewText: I bought this game because it is one of a limited number of games my boyfriend and I can play couch co-op style with split screen.  We barely made it through the first couple of chapters before giving up in disgust.  The weapons were lame, the mechanics were unsatisfying, and the camera style was slightly nauseating.  The story might have been somewhat interesting but it wasn't worth the hassle of playing the game.

This could have been a cute, fun game for your kids. But for some unfathomable reason, some moron at the game company decided to make boss fights as tedious and frustrating as possible. Your kids won't be able to play through the boss fights. So be prepared to have to take the controller and waste a half hour or more slogging through incredibly stupid, needlessly finicky boss fights to get your kids to the next level.
No matter how cute it looks, avoid this game, and anything by this game company.

I am very disappointed, I couldn't even get this game to load.  I bought it in September, 2013 and didn't even open it to play until today, March, 2014.  So too late to do much about it.  Wasted my money.

I received this battery and immediately had trouble charging it.  It fit very poorly into my DS Lite and it took some effort to get it to seat properly.  Once it was properly seated on the contacts, I charged it.  However, with a "complete" charge it lasted about 2 minutes before the DS died.  I tried charging it a few more times, but never managed to get even 5 minutes of battery life out of it.  Waste of my money.

You have been warned!

This thing is as temperamental as they can get. They need to have an air conditioner, they have to be elevated to a certain height, etc or else it drops the connection. It will drop the connection if the air in the room gets above 80, it will drop the connection if it is too high, and if it is too low, and it will drop the connection if it processes a lot of data, so much for gaming.

Its like dealing with a spoiled child and you have to let it win.

Bought this less than a year ago. Never worked right. Every time I wanted to use it, I had to unplug it and plug it back in and then it would work great. It lasted less than a year and just quit working...no power or nothing. Emailed support and did not even get an answer back. Buying a different brand this time around.
summary: Did not last or work properly

reviewText: When I received this in the mail, I found that it is not what I expected.  It is a knock-off from another country with poorly written english on the packaging.  The seller was contacted twice about returning the unopened item, but didn't bother to respond.  I won't purchase from this seller again.

This cable does not properly charge my New Nintendo 3DSXL. I had plugged it in and left it a few times, and when I checked back it was charged. I assumed this was a functional cable. The last couple of times I have plugged it in and attempted to use the device, I noticed that the battery status was changing rapidly. No matter what USB power box I used I was still receiving spotty power from this cable on my device. I don't trust it, and I have purchased an official Nintendo charger to replace it.

This is not compatible with the 3DS XL or New 3DS XL. While the plug fits, the cable does not charge the device while it is active. It will very slowly charge the device if it is powered off or in sleep mode. However, after charging for 8+ hours overnight while powered off, my New 3DS XL was not fully charged. It was only at about 75%.
summary: Not compatible with 3DS XL or New 3DS XL

reviewText: I purchased this for my 8 year old son.  It was one of the top items on his Christmas wish list.  However, he did not like the game and has only played it once. Make sure it is what your child really wants before purchasing.

BOUGHT IT USED, AND THE GAME CODE WAS ALREADY USED AND I COULD NOT GET A REPLACEMENT CODE. VERY ANGRY AT THAT. I HAVE PLAYED THE PREVIOUS VERSION ON THE GAMEBOY DC-LITE, AND THAT WAS A GOOD GAME. I AM SURE THIS GAME IS GREAT, HAD I HAD THE CHANCE TO PLAY IT.
summary: GOOD GAME FROM WHAT I HEAR, BUT UNABLE TO PLAY

reviewText: Your have to sign up for an on line service or return the game.  I wish I had returned the game! There are several missions that can only be played by two players, as I play solo, I am unable to play these missions.  I wanted a stand alone PC game that I could enjoy at home.  This was not what I wanted at all.

DO NOT BUY FOR PC, DO NOT BUY FOR CONSOLE.

Why do they hate PC gamers so much?

As if the fact that it is a lame console port that lacks all the features to take advantage of a PC (which is the reason we play PC games in the first place) they charge us MORE for it than the console versions?

Don't buy this game at all. If you go buy it for your console that just reinforces that the money is in consoles not PC, and they will neglect PC games even more.
summary: PC Gamers: Unite against this trash, crappy game!

reviewText: This game was in the "young children" category when I was looking up Wii games, but it requires reading, and my 4 year old can't read yet, so he can't play the game. It was very disappointing. The game itself SAID it was for 6-8 year-olds when it arrived, but that's not what it said in the product description.

I saw this game and thought it reminded me of Pokemon and Digimon but was really disappointed when I started to play the game. It wasn't my style and completely was the opposite of what I had witnessed from online videos. It just wasn't for me and not something I should have purchased.

First of all, it's a challenge to even start playing any of the games, the menus are all these cheesy 3d animations and it's hard to even know what you should select, even for an adult, impossible for a child. I wish the maker of this game had taken a lesson from Nintendo and made the games about being easy and fun for all.

The games are super lame, no challenge and the 3D is not even 3D, it's a scam.

Don't bother, rent it if you don't believe me.
summary: Very hard to play - Not fun for anyone

reviewText:
Stay away. None of the games on this disc are worth your time. They're impossible to control and just plain not fun. My kids were bored within 5 minutes.

You're always forced to play as if 4 players are playing and 90% of the time (because the controls don't work properly) you can't even see yourself on the screen.

We loved this charger until it quit working just a few months after we bought it.  And I can probably count on 2 hands the number of times we actually used the charger!  We get a flashing red light which means the battery pack can no longer be charged.  It looks like many others have had the same problem.  Avoid this charger!!

This is the dumbest game Ive ever played. Also it is very rude. I played it a few times and it wasn't very good of course. But the game tells you how disappointed it is in you and how bad your attempts were. Wish I could send it back.

This game is unplayable.  I bought it for PS3,and can not play the game due to the horrible glitches and freezing issues.  I never pay attention to these review, however I hope you do.  Save your money for now and wait to see if they fix it.  The first patch only made it worse.  I honestly can not play this game for more than 20-30 minutes without it freezing and requiring me to manually hard reset my system.  DON'T BUY THIS GAME.

I have played Fallout: New Vegas, and it is an amazing game, but I am giving my particular copy one star. When I received my game, it didn't work. There was a large air bubble on the disc, but no scratches. Everything looked brand new, it just didn't play. My xbox wouldn't even recognize the disc. Sadly, this was two years ago when I was naive about how online shopping worked, and didn't know that you could get refunded.

I was dumb and did not read the reviews prior to purchasing this and as most others have stated, right out of the package it does not work!  What a waste of time and money!  You clearly get what you pay for.  I would have expected it to work at least once or twice, but ours didn't work at all!
summary: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT - IT DOES NOT WORK!

reviewText: The other reviews are correct - this game is bad. Some puzzles are simple, some are just crazy, and others seem to defy any sort of logic. It is not fun at all. The music is terrible. I cannot say anything good about this game.

So, I've played this game for approx half an hour and I'm completely stuck.  There are no helpful hints at this stage and no other items that need to be gathered.  I'm left with a pair of tweezers and only 3 rooms in which to use it.  Can't figure out what to do next and I'm not sure I care.  The graphic characters are a bit creepy to look at.

Very disappointed with this game!  If I could give zero stars I would.  You basically spend your entire time moving through the forest looking for something to shoot - which is rather annoying.  Personally, when I buy a hunting game, I want to shoot things.  Not so with this game.  Not sure what games are out there where you can just "light it up" but if you like to pull the trigger, skip this one.

Xbox live is badly overpriced. It's well known that both Sony and Microsoft have small profit margins on the actual consoles, but they make money off of both the subscriptions and a licensing fee for every game.

Microsoft is definitely making a ton of money off of Xbox Live. It doesn't cost them all that much (per gamer) to provide the servers.

We gave this to our son for Christmas, and it was a big disappointment.  The calibration kept failing and the only way he could get it to recalibrate was to remove the batteries.  After a couple of tries, he became so frustrated that he stopped trying to play with it.

Beware: If you have a windows 10 computer this game will not work on your pc. I tried installing it four or five different times with no luck and eventually had to send it back. I was anxious to try this game out since I've only ever heard about it and never played it before but no matter what I did it wouldn't work so if anyone is trying to buy this for their windows 10 don't bother. I am starting to realize that there is not much games that are compatible with windows 10.

My husband and I thoroughly enjoyed the first Family Game Night and were excited to hear some of the new games on Family Game Night 2. Our enthusiasm was short lived when we got the game. There's really nothing good to say about the game. The controls are extremely clunky and trying to play any of these games became too frustrating. We quickly resold the game.
summary: Keep the First, Pass on the Second

reviewText: I've never had this issue before where the controller was plugged in, and yet the game doesn't even recognize it. Apparently this is a common problem. DO NOT buy this game if you wish to use the 360 controller! I would return it if i I could, but I paid to download it!

Like everyone else mentioned here, this game does not work! At all!

I've tried a lot of things to fix it but none work. This is a horrible, horrible game. Please don't waste your time or money buying it.

P.S. It's not worth $7. I found it at the dollar store for one dollar in the big packages. Apparently it was because no one bought them so they ended up there.

This was so difficult to play that I didn't bother to finish it. I had played the first one. This one required that I use a walk thru right from the start which is more work than I want to put in to play a game.

I bought this for my wife who loves this game.  Unfortunately, you get about 2 minutes of game play before it crashes.  I don't know about other windows versions, but if you have windows 10, stay away from this.  Waste of money as it doesn't work.

The game is great but unfortunately it crashes every couple minutes which makes me redo what I had just done, then by the time I'm caught up again it crashes all over again. So since I cant actually play the game it is a waste of money.

I was VERY disappointed in this game. In order to solve any of the puzzles, you must watch the "movie". I was under the impression you could attempt to solve any of the puzzles at any time. The advertisements are geared toward adults, therefore I assumed it would be similar to Brainage or Big Brain Academy. In my opinion, this game is more for teens. I'm really sorry I spent $30 on this game!!
summary: Very disappointed in Dr. Layton's Diabolical Box

reviewText: Absolute junk - I've had this thing for less than a month, and it no longer works. I was using it with a Raspberry Pi until it stopped working, and then I tried to connect it to my brand-new laptop and it says it won't recognize it. I know this is one of the recommended controllers out there to run retro games on, but its durability leaves something to be desired.

Was supposed to be plug and play on PC, but didn't work at all. I researched the issue I was having for 3 hours and it turns out there was nothing wrong with my PC and configuration. I have read that other users have the same problem with being shipped a defective controller. You get what you pay for people.
summary: Was supposed to be plug and play on PC, ...

reviewText: Normally I am not one to post reviews but since I am a little irate, I will post this one. The one I got was 1.0 USB port and I have USB 3.0. I think whoever is selling this should be laser specific. The controller (for what it's worth) would seem like a good investment b/c it looks and feels like the original SNES controller. But seeing how the controller was a complete waste of time and money, it will receive a 1 star.
summary: The controller (for what it's worth) would seem like a good investment b/c it looks and feels like ...

reviewText: This game is not at all what i expected, perhaps it was my fault for not looking it up first, but in my opinion the game just stinks, bad graphics save the cutscenes and just not good. What else can i say?

I played this game for a few hours and gave up.  I could not get past the horrible combat system.  The graphics were nice but not what I would expect for a PS3 game.  It was not worth it, I took it to a Gamestop and traded it in for a better game.  Don't buy.

This game is an absolute ripoff. You pay for the game, now you must pay for service. In short, this is a XBOX360 rip off all in one CD. Gameplay sucks too. If you're a fan of the original Final Fantasy, you will hate this one.

Was very disappointed in the game.  Apparently you pay $20 for the game and get a 30 day free trial to play it but then have to pay a monthly membership in order to keep playing it.  What a rip off.  Don't buy this game.
summary: great game but what a rip off!!!!

reviewText: I saw the trailer and I pre-ordered this game only to find out it is complete garbage. Gameplay is extremely stupid, the tasks that you are set out to do are ridiculous.
