The only good thing about this game is the excellent ability to customize your character. Worst PS3 game I have ever bought. Actually it is also the worst final fantasy game ever created.

This game has to be one of the worst games I have ever played. The multiplayer was awful. I din't like the weapons and that customization was a mess. It was all over the place. The campaing was decent and kind of enjoyed it. One thing though that was bad was the difficulty of the game, even on the easiest difficulty it was extremely difficult to beat.

Can not get this program to work properly on my computer. It will run but it takes about 5 minutes to load, another 5 minutes to start, and pauses for a minute or two quite often in the game. I play all the other new shooter games so the computer is capable but this program just won't work properly.

I've been a game player for a long time and this is one of the worst.  The graphics are so bad, it makes it difficult to figure out where your enemies are.  I bought a video card way over the specs and is still lags and drags.  I was a big fan of the interface on the previous game and this one is much less user friedly.  From the short time I played this, my evaluation is that in every way, this game is much worse than the original.  Don't waste your money or your time.

The other 1 star reviews sum it up pretty well.  The game is not fun to play, the game play is not smooth, the tasks are tedious, and it gets old quick.

I'm very disappointed in this game.  I only bought a Wii for this game, its such a let down that I won't be buying a nintendo platform again.

The single player game is less than 10 hours long. It requires Steam and thus internet access at all times to play it. You cannot save the game. You have to play each chapter entirely or lose all progress. If you want a single player game, try another.

I'm new to this franchise. not kidding. and so far this game bores me. the campaign is slick so far, but i don't think I'll pick it up once i begin playing a new game. can anyone tell me why this game is worth my time?

I was excited to pick up this game when I purchased my Wii, having been a fan of the FF series for a very long time. This made the playablility of the game very frustrating, as I'd love to be able to play it. The controls, holding B while yanking back on the remote, makes for a very unreliable targeting system. I mean, really, who wants to spend an hour of their life trying to catch a stupid ferret?

I only wish I had known this before I shelled out the $50 it cost me.

This was a total waste of money. The new wires were installed for my broken cymbals on the drum kit, and they did not work at all! I am pretty angry. I ended up going out to Gamestop and buying a whole new drum kit for $50. Don't waste your money on these "replacement wires". And yes, they were put in correctly more than once. Total BS

This is the worst game of the Lego video franchise.  The game play is terrible.  The menus are terrible.  Even the home screens are terrible.  The first Indiana Jones was great.  This one.  Not so much.  Save your money and look into the other Lego games.  Take a look at Harry Potter, Pirates of the Caribbean or even the Star Wars games.

I PURCHASED THIS ITEM IN MARCH 2012 AND THREW IT OUT IN AUGUST 2012 BECAUSE IT WOULD NO LONGER WORK.
THERE WAS NOTHING TO ADJUST NOR FIX. IT WAS JUST NOT WORKING. I FIGURE ONE OF THE WIRES CAME LOOSE OR THE PRODUCT WAS DEFECTIVE. I WAS MORE THAN DISAPOINTED. I AM CAREFUL WITH EQUIPMENT. I WOULD NOT PURCHASE THIS PRODUCT. THE EAR CUPS WERE NOT THAT COMFORTABLE AS WELL.

I should not have let my son buy these, after four months the ear cup broke.  It is a very poor design where the swivel is made out of plastic.  If you go on youtube you will see plenty of videos of kids coming up with way to fix them.  My son is really careful with his stuff and was really disappointed when they broke.  If I could give this less than 1 star I would.

IF YOU BUY THESE BE AWARE ITS NOT IF THEY WILL BREAK IT IS WHEN.

I WILL NEVER BUY ANOTHER TURTLE BEACH PRODUCT AGAIN.
summary: **JUNK ALERT** Poor Design They will break

reviewText:
I recieved this product for Christmas, and have not been very happy with it so far.  It has two major deal breakers for me:

1) A constant hiss.  Even with the volume slider turned all the way off and no audio coming through the headphones, there is still a fairly loud hiss.  Its very distracting.

2) It has a "Mic Monitor" feature, that instantly sends any microphone input into the headphones.  I find this very annoying, and there is no way to turn if off.

I purchased this headset after getting a PS3.  Attempting to use it for Call of Duty MW2, the mic does not work at all.  I went through the setup in the Playstation, it shows up in the game, but it doesn't pick up any sound.  I have tried contacting technical support but they won't get back to me.  I called customer service and they say I have to wait another 2 weeks before I can expect an answer to my emails.  Save your money and get the headset made by Sony.

I just bought this game. There is some glitch with the security feature, which is supposed to allow you to download additional content, which is preventing me from installing the game. It seems to think I have a stolen code, because something went wrong while I was installing it and I had to attempt it a second time. Now every time I try to install it, it gets to around 15% and then just says "Installation failed," with no explanation.

So after having this remote for awhile, I have to change my review. This remote is our back up remote, it worked well as that for awhile, however, we haven't needed to use it for awhile until recently when my original remote stopped responding. I put batteries in it and it is completely dead. So I am not a happy camper. I didn't expect it to be perfect, but I did expect it to last more than a few months.
summary: Died after a few months of intermittent use.

reviewText: This will not run on anything newer than Windows XP so if you don't have that, you can't play. Since this game is literally unplayable anymore i have to give this 5-star game a 1-star rating. Back in the day it was a great game but unless they update the engine it isn't coming back.
summary: DOES NOT WORK ON NEWER COMPUTERS

reviewText: Do not buy this game if you have Windows 7. It was a buggy game to start with but it is horribly broken if using windows 7. I spent 2 days reading forums and trying what they said but never had the game running any longer than 5 minutes before it locked up. From everything I read, it works OK on Vista and great on XP. Guess I should have bought it 4 years ago when it came out.

this game may or may not work on a windows 7 pc.  for some people it works fine, and for others, it will simply not run at all regardless of how many "fixes" you try.  i had hoped that bethesda would improve all the compatibility issues and bugs that their previous games (like oblivion) had on pc's, but i am very disappointed that they have not.  if you wanna take a gamble and HOPE that it works on your computer, go for it, but don't get your hopes up.

Nintendo and Microsoft need to allow Sony to release this game for the PlayStation 3. I am not going to be forced into buying a Xbox 360 or Wii in order to play this game. Both of those consoles are REALLY EXPENSIVE!!!!!!! I am boycotting this game until Sony is allowed to release this for the PlayStation 3. I know that Pinball Hall Of Fame: The Williams Collection was released for the PlayStation 3, so there's no excuse not to release Pinball Hall Of Fame: The Gottlieb Collection for the PlayStation 3.
summary: Nintendo Needs To Allow Sony To Release This Game

reviewText: I played it for a few hours and just couldn't do it anymore. It looks so dated, and it's just not worth the money. If you want a game of this sort of scope, just go buy Oblivion. Oblivion is a much better game, Fable is better, even the old King's Quest games are better.

I cannot get it to run.  My disc drives will not recognize the disc.  I do not have this problem with other games.  It is really frustrating. I have asked for help and have not gotten any.  I won't buy any sequels.

My 12 year old was bored of this the first day and hasn't picked it back up. He's a Lord of the Rings fan, so I thought for the price it was worth a try. I wish I had spend another $10 and gotten something he would have loved.

This game is no different from the 2007 one I already have.  I ended up returning it because there is no difference between it and the older game.  Oh yes, there is a difference:  you can't go back and check your scores against the game like you could on the older one.  I"m going back to that one.

I ordered this a few months ago. Finally got around to checking it out. It doesn't work. I don't know if it's because I have Vista. It didn't specify. It only says that I have an error because it can not find a certain file on the disk and to insert the disk...when the disk is already in there. It had other bugs before I even got to that part.

It's a real disappointment, waste of time and waste of money.

Save your money, because it's a rip off.

The game play controls are horrible. You will get dizzy trying to move the character. I don't see how this game gets good reviews compared to so many great games out there easy to use game play controls. If your into Call of Duty, Metal Gear, etc. this is not the game for you.

After reading all the glorious reviews for this game I had to buy it. Yes the graphics are amazing but the game is slow and boring. Its not really a game, its a movie and depending on how you "shake" or move your controller, determines which part of the movie you get to see next. Its VERY boring. For those of you who remember games made for the Sega CD, this is very similar. I would wait until this game drops to the $10 bargain bin before you purchase it.

I imagine this would be an interesting fitness program if it worked properly.  Unfortunately, I cannot get the menu to appear on screen and consequently, I cannot change the song or the view.  I am stuck on a fitness track with the same song playing over and over.  I am using the Nunchuk but I don't think that should matter because it gives you the choice of three different methods, the Nunchuk being one.

This may be a defective disc but if it is not, I would not recommend this to anyone.

I ordered this because I just recently got my Wii. As you know wii only comes with one remote, so I ordered this to play with my friends. It does not work! it looks good and all, but I can not get it to work at all. I've tried syncing it and connecting it, but nothing works. Its basically junk.

This game falls in my personal "uncanny valley," it's almost an open-world sandbox RPG, but it is NOT an open-world sandbox RPG. It offers a few different story lines for you to play through as a specific predetermined character, and it doesn't actually give you many choices as how to play.
summary: Wanted an RPG, didn't get one.

reviewText: $8.99 is way too much to charge for this game.  I was excited when I heard this game was coming out because of all the various aspects that were claimed to be part of the gameplay.  I spent an entire day playing it and I have to say it is a complete waste of time.
summary: I spent an entire day playing it and I have to say it is a complete waste of time

reviewText: This game is an insult to gamers. I don't want to repeat everything that everyone else has said, but I had very high hopes for this title. They dropped the ball in every possible way. If you insist on purchasing this game--you've been warned. Yes, it's THAT bad.

I'll keep it simple. This game is a broken mess. You can't play it solo cause the bot AI is horrible, and you can't play it online because the lag is awful. Aside from that, the game suffers from poor texture streaming and a frequent loss of audio. Do not buy, do not rent, don't even bother playing this. It is unbelievable that this game was even able to pass certification.
summary: This game is straight up broken.

reviewText: I spent 15 minutes trying to walk to where I want to walk, not because of the difficulty of the game, but rather the difficulty of the controls. It's horrible -- the worst controls I've ever experienced on any game from any platform. It's the most frustrating thing. I've no idea how this is actually on the market.

Nothing against the seller, but this game just is NOT Jak and Daxter. It's not done by Naughty Dog, it is done by some other studio. The graphics are just bad and gameplay is mediocre at worst. If you value this beloved franchise, stay away from this game!
summary: The graphics are just bad and gameplay is mediocre at worst

reviewText: This game was a complete waste of money. From beginning to end I was waiting for the game to get good, but it never did. I cant imagine the PSP version being any better. There isn't really anything positive to say about it.

Don't waste your money on this. I read the reviews before I bought and they seemed mostly positive at that time. Since then, I see there are many that agree with me. The program makes no sense, is poorly organized, and unless you are already practiced in Yoga (I am not), I don't think it will help you at all. I am going to trade it in. What a waste of money!

I was so excited to get this game. I had taken an intro to yoga class, and thought this game would be great for practicing what I'd learned. It was horrible. Like some others have said, the story mode just shows you around a temple. You don't really practice the poses. If you go into training mode you can do the poses, but there is no instruction for it if you don't watch the screen. If you are watching the screen you can't do the poses. Just a bad game in general. I really was disappointed.

This is one of the most badly written games that I have ever had the misfortune to play.  Nina and Max's personalities have completely changed from the first game.  Max left his brain in the last game and Nina is completely unlikable.  The story is weak and filled with lame attempts at humor.  The voice acting is awful.  Characters were either monotone or emphasizing the wrong words.  Sam's voice was ear piercing.  On the positive side, the game ran smoothly and the graphics were good.

Have 11 year old twins who got this for their birthday but the game (as mentioned in other reviews) is too monotonous for a tween's attention span.

If you expect to be taking care of all kinds of animals, you'd better have a LOT of time on your hands.

The game is not very user friendly, either.
summary: Rated Everyone, but not Everyone wants to

reviewText:
2 problems:
1. It eats up batteries
2. Since you have to get up to turn it off, if you are just playing a game from the couch, turning it off is a pain, but if you don't it eats up the battery (yes, I'm slightly lazy :)

Even on the minimum setting for conserving battery life and shutting it off after you're done, you're lucky if you can get two hours of play out of this. If you get this, do yourself a favor and get some rechargeable batteries along with it.

I was looking forward to playing this game, so when I got it I was overjoyed! But then I put it in my Wii, and it didn't work. I was confused, but then I looked at the box, and it said Us, Mexico and Canada only. In the listing it did NOT mention this. Just a heads up.

I bought this game for my brother. He didn't like it at all; I decided to give it a try myself and I realized why he didn't like it. The game is difficult to play, the graphics are horrible, and it's just not fun to play it. I had to almost give it away, nobody wanted this game.

This has got to be one of the worst zombie games I have ever played. It takes up a lot of computer resources, and the story line is awful. The game is more about babysitting than killing zombies. To make the game suck even more, the people you try to save are incredibly slow, and they don't always follow you, and you have to fight humans that appear to have super human abilities.

This is the first time I have actually been disappointed with my purchase from Amazon. Even if it may be a generic charger, it should still do the job. There is something that is going wrong with the cord. It won't keep a steady charge, if the ds is moved at all, it "disconnects". It's not like I am waving my DS around or anything but I shouldn't have to sit my DS in a certain manner in order for it to charge. If it were to even stay connected properly.

Got this in the mail and was excited to plug in my DS since I had lost my charger. Plugged it in the wall and it didn't work at all. I asked to be sent another, but was told this was not possible. One positive is that I got a refund.
summary: Got this in the mail and was excited to plug ...

reviewText: I thought I'd take a chance and buy the cheap version, well you get what you pay for. It didn't work, and after looking up online and reading past reviews it's pretty clear that you need an actual wii adapter for a physical internet connection to work. I don't recommend this product for newer wii users. Maybe it works for the older consoles, but it doesn't work for the newer ones. Don't make my mistake, spend the extra buck and pay for what you know will work.

I was thinking the game would let you connect to the internet to play with other people. I also thought it would be a two plus person game and that we could play with or against others. That wasn't the case. If I knew that prior I wouldn't have bought this game.

We really looked forward to getting this game, but it isn't that fun. The answers are all off. There may be one or two answers that fit the questions, but the rest are all weird. They also don't give you enough time to type your answer out on the controllers. It's really frustrating to be in a competition and know the correct answer and not be able to type it in fast enough. I wish we could send it back for a refund, but we can't since we opened it.

I don't know if it works with any other games, but I bought it for use with the original Rock Band.  After trying to get it to work for about an hour, I tried doing some internet searches to see make sure I was doing everything correctly.  It turns out I'm not the only one with problems.  So I'll save everyone the time right here.  Don't buy this product if you intend to use it with the original Rock Band game.  I've since purchased a different mic that works great.
summary: Does not work with Rock Band

reviewText: This was given as a gift to my daughter.  We hadn't read the reviews until now.  She is 9 and finished it the day she got it.  She was so disappointed.  To quote another reviewer, "I'm begging you not to buy this game!"  It's a complete rip-off.  Nintendo should be ashamed of themselves.

I am sure this is a great game on the other consoles, but for the Wii, the controls are horrible. The nunchuck is the Wii's biggest gimmick and the Wii remote makes the game more challenging than it needs to be. In my opinion this game should have been compatible with the Wii classic controller or the Gamecube controller.
summary: The controls are horrible for the Wii

reviewText:
This game was horrible. Didn't even take me a day to finish it. Graphics were awful, the story line was awful, there was no difficulty at all, and it was too short.
I figured that with a great movie, they would have a great game. Not so. Bottom line, it's a waste of money, use it on a different game.
summary: 1st place for worst game of the year

reviewText: This item should not be called a mini back pack! Its more like a mini purse. The item is really small and you can only fit the 3DS and a couple of games in it. THE charger will not fit if the 3DS is in the bag. If your 3DS has a cover it will not fit in the bag at all. The bag is really well made and of good quality, but it is way too small.
summary: Do not buy, not a mini backpack.

reviewText: I ordered this game to add to my Nancy Drew collection. Not only did this take FOREVER to get to me, but it also arrived smashed. The seller packaged this game very poorly. They should have put it in a hard box, not an envelope. The case was smashed all to pieces. Luckily the disc seems to be working just fine. I took out the cover art and put it in a new case, so now I have an actual case for my game.

The first few days the controller worked as expected. Then in the middle of a game it stopped working. I tried reseting the sync, putting in new batteries in the controllers, unplugging the cables and reseting the Wii but nothing worked. Remote just does not work any more. I do not recommend this item.

I told myself "I might as well buy the real thing if I'm going to replace my controller." However, after playing games for a while, I noticed that the controller didn't feel right. It wasn't smooth at all. Turns out, this is a fake Sony controller. Very in satisfied that I payed $43 dollars for a controller that is terrible. Will be asking for a refund
summary: Fake controller - not actual Sony brand.

reviewText: I was so excited to get this gaming controller.  When it arrived I ripped the box open and plugged it in.  The controller was a knock off from China.  I was so disappointed.  I cannot believe that Amazon will condone this!!!!!!  I am so upset and angry!!!

Shipper was very good and prompt, but the game is very difficult to maneuver and the graphics are horrible. It does not save your game. Unless you are very good at hard to use video games, I would NEVER recommend this game to anyone.

I ordered this for my 6 year old sister and she was super excited about it. HOWEVER when we recieved the package and she opened it the game was NOT in the case. Which honestly makes no sense at all since it was in it's brand new unopened plastic casing that all DS games usually come in. :(

Can't say anything more than what has already been said. There is only one save file, and it cannot be erased. The game doesn't have enough replay value to warrant this kind of move. You will want to trade it in, but you're not going to get much in return. Hopefully Capcom doesn't pull this stunt again with the next Resident Evil title on 3DS.
summary: Only one save file. Capcom fail.

reviewText: I purchased this a few days ago and I was excites when I got it in the mail today. I got it I popped the disk in my 4GB Xbox 360 that had an 8GB hard drive in it. When I opened the game on the xbox it said I needed an Xbox360 hard drive. I did some research and found out this: You need a 20+GB xbox 360 hard drive which about $100, it can't just be a regular 20+GB hard drive. If you have a 20GB hard drive for your Xbox 360, great. Enjoy your game. If you don't, be ready to make some more purchases.

BUY AT YOUR OWN RISK!  YOU CANNOT RETURN THIS ONCE PURCHASED AND THE DIGITAL RIGHTS MANAGEMENT (DRM) IS NOT DISCLOSED UNTIL YOU OPEN AND READ THE MANUAL!  THIS IS A "CHOOSE YOUR OWN ADVENTURE" WHERE YOU CAN'T GO BACK AND CHANGE YOUR CHOICES.  BUYER BEWARE!

I was planning to go out and get this today.  I've always enjoyed Resident Evil and the Mercanaries part of the games.  After reading about only being able to save once I'm not even going to bother.  This is the first time I've left a bad review or missed out on a game that I was really looking forward to because of a feature in a game that I didn't like.  This goes far beyond that.  If I buy a game it is my copy and I would like to play it as many times as I would like.  Capcom you have lost me too.

I purchased this game hoping it was going to be as good as GTA 4 or Red Dead Redemption.  Boy was I wrong.  After you complete the first case every case after is exactly the same except its a different scenario.  It gets so repetitive its annoying.  Also some of the action sequences are so hard that it lets you skip them.  This game was not as nearly as fun as I thought it was going to be.  If you like very repetitive games with a a very confusing storyline this is the game for you.

This game did not live up to the hype or my expectations. Did not find the game fun to play at all. No sense of directions or clear orders as to where to go, or the objective of the game. My brother loves these types of games so I thought I would get his opinion of it and after an hour of playing he felt the same way and didn't care to play the game any more, even though he had been wanting to play it for some time. Really wish I had not bought this game.
summary: Very disappointed with this game. Confusing and all over the place.

reviewText: Well, you don't have any options but to play in slow mode and I'm not talking about internet lag. Just by playing the arcade mode you will know what I mean. It's slow, which makes the game unbearable to play. I'm a big Street Fighter fan but this game is a big disappointment. It has potential of being a good or maybe even great game, but what's the point of playing a game if you have to play it in slow mode? I bought DOA today and I'm glad I did. I can FINALLY play a fighting game in normal pace.
summary: Buy this game ONLY if you like playing in slow mode

reviewText: This isn't a review of the game-play as such. Popped the game into my Xbox 360 and got the message that it requires a hard drive to be played. Nowhere on the product description page does it say that this is required. Not cool.

Capcom has confirmed that the Downloadable Content for this game is already on the disc. They expect you to pay for the DLC later, which is really just an unlock code for the content that is already on the disc. Do not let capcom get away with this. I have cancelled my order for this game and I hope you all do the same to let these greedy companies know that they can't get away with this. Seriously, they are selling you the same product twice. It has to be illegal somehow.
summary: DO NOT BUY, DLC ON DISC

reviewText: Be aware that this is one of the few games out there that is ONLY in English language. This game includes subtitles in Spanish though, but I love games with Spanish language. I have no idea why they did not include AT LEAST the Spanish version from Europe(Spain). This makes the game less fun for those of us that do not understand too much English, as well as for those who do not understand English at all. Yes, I know it contains subtitles, but reading them gets very annoying.
summary: This game is in English language only

reviewText:
I own the original PS3, with the SIXAXIS controller. And I cannot play this game. After a lengthy install it tells me I can't play with the "navigation" controller, even though I'm using a full controller. Apparently, it is impossible to play this game without a newer "Dualshock" controller or the move controller. As I don't want to spend $50-100 on a new controller for one game, this is a nice coaster.

It's a shame, because I love the Wii version and I was really looking forward to this remake.

I pre-purchased the game for Xbox 360.  It arrived on day of release, well packaged and safe.  I played it for 10-15 minutes the first day and the game froze, then reset to the title screen.  It has been like that ever since. I cannot play the game, it seems there are problems with the servers being down.  This problem is known and after two days there is still no ETA on a fix.  I would advise people to either stay away from this game or wait until you can actually play it.

i have played this game on-line and loved it. when i recieved the game i tried to load it on my computer for music,games and pics only (this computer does not have the internet), and it said i needed to connect to the internet. even if i had the internet on this computer i would have sent it back. i don't like the fact that the only way to play the game is to go to [...]. i will never buy anything that has [...] on it because you can not play it offline.

I ordered this same item twice because the first order was missing the plastic insert that holds the wand in place so you don't need to use the silicon sleeve.  Instead of the insert there was a plastic device that connects to the paddle to extend it.  I probably would have been happy with this product if the insert to hold the wand had been included.  I returned the second one for a refund.  Beware if you order this item

I was happy to get three of my favorite games at such a low price.  However, the old saying goes, "You get what you pay for."  When I tried to play Wild, Wild Words, I could not play the game full screen because I could not see some parts of the game.  The other games played fine.  If you can live with this glitch, the games are fun to play.

I do not reccomend this product. Firstly,it is very poorly made,and the cartridge itself feels very flimsy. Also, many codes for Super Mario 64 DS do not work or cause the game to freeze. It is also hard to use with any game. I also feel that it is very overpriced. Do not waste your money.
summary: Poor quality product coupled with high price.

reviewText: Yet another single player game that requires you to have an internet connection and have clunky Steam software installed on your machine to play it. I refuse to jump through hoops just to play a game that I purchased. No wonder PC gaming seems to be on the decline...

not very good. doesnt work at all. slides around on your wrist and just wasn't worth the money I paid for it. I wouldn't have paid .50 for it if I had know it didn't work any better than that. would not recommend it at all.

I purchased this device a couple years ago. Worked OK with MacOSX 10.6 but when 10.7 Lion came out it stopped working. Contacted HField support and they said they needed to update the Wi-Fire driver to support 10.7. That was over a year ago and still no update for 10.7 or 10.8 users. They just ignore my emails now.

Don't waste your money on this Mac users.
summary: Does not work with Mac OSX 10.7 or 10.8!

reviewText: Enough said, the only reason i gave it 1 star is because I couldn't rate it any lower, and I was able to use the supplied cord to charge my cell phone. If it wasn't for the usb cord fitting my cell this thing would have been ABSOLUTELY WORTHLESS.

I paid almost $15.00 for this game, but when I tried to install it, it wouldn't install at all. I have all the requirements for it but it still didn't install. I did some research and I guess it didn't install because my base game is US and this expansion pack is UK. I was really looking forward to it.

Could detect the remote, but any movement of the remote and the cursor would fly off the screen. If you could get the cursor on the screen, you would have to barely move the remote to get the cursor to move where you want it. The remote couldn't be more than 1 foot away from sensor or it wouldn't detect it anymore. Couldn't play any games.

I'm a child of the 70s and 80s, and this is the worst game I've ever played in my life.  Given how far video games have come, and that Wii has the fun Mii characters, the avatars and graphics on this are some of the worst I've seen in decades.  Some of the games are impossible to figure out and don't properly use the Wii technology available to them.  Worst $20 I have ever spent.

Ok this has to be the most uncomfortable headset I've ever worn. I have a big head and I wear glasses. This did NOT work out for me at all! I had a cheap Turtle Beach headset and a Logitech G430. Those two were way more comfortable than this one...
summary: Those two were way more comfortable than this one

reviewText: This product is great for anyone who is looking to turn their wii controller into a classic looking controller.  But do not be fooled it is not the classic controller.  So if you are looking to play old school games on your wii, do not buy this product.
summary: It Is NOT the classic controller

reviewText:
Very comfortable.  The microphone is very soft, even with the mic volume turned all the way up.

Causes my computer to lock up and crash about 30-60 minutes after I plug them in.  Took me forever to figure out what was causing the crashes (thought it was a memory or HDD problem at first).  Maybe they'll make a new driver that fixes the problem, but until then it's a 1 star for me.

The lights on the keyboard will go off and on with every key press and some times they even change colors.  After 2 days of use the M keys stopped working so I can't switch modes.  The USB port doesn't work either.  When I plug my mouse into it I get an error message about not enough power.

I own several Logitech devices and this is the only one I have been disappointed with.

DO NOT BUY.

I love the Final Fantasy series but this is terrible. I haven't even played the game.
I paid for the disc basically. All it does is load a bunch of crapware on your pc and then you have to have a subscription to play online.

What a shame. It came with a free trial, but you have to use a credit card to get that.

No thanks.

No wonder I hadn't heard much about this one. Skip this one and get FF XIII.

I would rather play Duke Nukem Forever than this game. I advise you to not waste your money. It is literally the worst game I have ever played. Even if you see it as a free download....DON'T DO IT. You will end up smashing ur game, tv, and system from the aggravation this game creates. I was seconds away from punching a baby in the face. Seriously. Don't get this game.

This game is only fit for a young child.  The games are short and not challenging.  You click on a box to get to a game but you have no idea what game you are about to play.  If you find a game you actually like you can't find another one like it.  It should be in a $5.00 bin in some store.

I can't be 100% sure it's not my N64, but the last time I tried to use it i had no issues. Since have lost the cable, replaced it with this one, and upon plugging it in - nothing. Ah well, it was cheap enough that I'm not too upset about it.

The item plugs into my N64, but didn't work. I would receive poor sound quality and the video was pixelated and had no color. It was completely unplayable. I tried again with my old AV cable, that had a short in it, to see if my N64 was working and it worked fine. I tested this item on another TV and it still didn't work.

I did receive a refund, but I wouldn't bother with this item again. I will purchase a higher quality one.

I'm not sure what everyone else is smoking, but this game is horrible.  Boring and worthless.  I don't care how cool the graphics are, if the game isn't fun to play, then it goes in the trash, which is where this game is heading unless I can find someone who wants it, which may be difficult.  Also, I'm running Windows 7 with 4 GB's of RAM and a dedicated video card, and it still runs like crap.  I would not recommend this product.

I never received this game from the seller.  I contacted them after a month and they gave me a refund immediately.  I highly recommend buying this game from a different source as it is a great game to play.

I got this game and I was super excited to play it, but every single time I tried to play it on my computer it would crash my computer. I have windows 7, if that makes any difference. I know it was only 74 cents but it messed my computer up every time I tried to play it. :(

I purchased the item but when I got it it didn't work. It didn't work in my working ps3 ether. So I put in a refund request. I'm now having to fight with the company I bought it from to get my money back. They are refusing to refund the money and keep telling me they will only replace it, but I don't want a replacement.

Amazon is being very helpful in helping me get my money returned. They really have my back.

I have been through two sets of these Energizer battery sets.  They work for about a week or so, but now the light on the charging unit just flashes red when I place the controllers on it.

I bought replacement battery packs from a local retailer.  Worked great at first, but a month later, the same thing happened.  Don't buy this product.  Energizer obviously didn't do any long-term testing of the battery packs.

I wasn't expecting the Xbox 360 to not work.  It was very disappointing to find that out after spending money on a game, controller and a hard drive for it.  I wasn't impressed with the seller for selling something like this.  The product didn't come as quickly as other items that I have ordered.  This was very disappointing as well.  I won't order from this seller again or get an Xbox 360 used through Amazon.com.

The game shipped very quickly but when I put it into the tray, it didn't work. Upon further inspection, there was a small chip on the disc that was beginning to warp. However, after notifying the seller about the problem; they were very courteous and refunded my money almost instantly. Poor product, but excellent customer service.

These are the worst battery packs ever. I don't know if its because they are old or they just suck. I bought two b/c of the price... One lasts for about 15 min and the other lasts for 5 min. I would send them back but its not worth the shipping cost. Spend a few more dollars and buy a NYKO.

The wire came off the hard plastic that attaches to the controller the first time I tried to disengage.  Its a piece of crap; the only reason I didn't send it back is because it wasn't worth the time or effort.  And it was worth it just for the rechargeable battery.  Spend a few more bucks and get the real thing.

I would like to begin by saying that this game is fun... when you can play it.  This game along with the original is known for its glitches and bugs on the PS3 version.  I did enjoy it for the Xbox 360 and would give that version 3 stars.  I do not recommend buying this game for the PS3 due to the constant freezing you will experience.  Other than that, this game is ok.
summary: The Darkside Is With This One!

reviewText: I had high hopes for this game and was dissapointed. I played this game only once for five minutes and it is awful. You have to do a lot of jumping around at first while chasing someone. I tried to bounce off the walls ten times and got annoyed and shut it off. This game is just like Superman 64. It doesn't allow any margin for error.

The "battery" holds a charge, but it doesn't seem to power the Wii remote. One of the two batteries is fine, but the other doesn't seem to fit into the remote properly to make a connection. It looks right and sits fine in the charger, but I can't get the remote to turn on. The remote works fine with real batteries and with another rechargable battery brand I have, but not with this one.

I purchased this when I purchased the wii for my son, knowing that the wii is a battery-killer. We plugged it in as instructed, and attempted to dock the wii remotes to it. First of all, you cannot dock it if you have the wrist strap on your remote. Second, even without the wrist strap it does not 'seat' properly and therefore does not make a good connection. Third, if I had it to do over, I would have spent a little more money and bought one that would actually work.

I bought the recharging station as a hedge against a never-ending stream of disposable batteries and lost.

The recharging stations does not recharge the batteries that came with it. My advice is to stick to disposables, they don't need to be replaced as often as I had feared, and the rechargables don't work.

This receiver is basically worthless. It appears to be some sort of knockoff that Windows will not recognize.

After both trying to use the installer included with the product and downloading the driver software directly from Microsoft, Device Manager will not recognize the receiver as anything more than a generic USB device.

I would not recommend this item to anyone.

This was great while it lasted.  Batteries are light and seem to last a long time.  Charging station is convenient and easy to use.  However the product is no good if you have to send it back after a week because one of the batteries won't charge.  I hope they get this right, I would love to be able to use it.

It's a good thing I got this game for free, because it is definitely not worth the $40 price tag. This game is absolutely awful. The gameplay is tedious,the voice acting obnoxious, the controls spotty and the graphics might have looked good 10 years ago. Stay away from this game if you value your life.

I bought this game for my 8 year old son and he has a very difficult time playing it. It is very challenging and hard to figure out the different puzzles. He says it's not fun and gets frustrated after awhile because it's too hard.

I don't know why I didn't return this the day I got it.  It didn't work with the game I bought it for but I thought that it was because it was a low-budget indie game.  Turns out, my computer doesn't even recognize this thing as a controller.

Just to top it off, I can't find any trouble-shooting information for this thing, even on the Kinobo website!

I bought this controller (Tomee NES USB Controller) and a SNES USB Controller (same brand). I plugged it in and it worked great at first. Then the cable got very hot and the controller stopped working. That was after 10 minutes playing Super Mario Bros. The controller feels very light, the cable is too thin, and the Select and Start buttons are plastic, not rubber. It looks very cheap.

The SNES controller is still working great, though.

Unfortunately, I could not get this to work on my computer. I was hopeful after a few people said they got it to work for Windows 10, but I guess I wasn't so lucky. I've attempted to download and install at least 3 times. Installation process runs smoothly and the only error is when you try to actually open the game. Every time there is an error that says "d3dx9_33.dl is missing from your computer." After trying to reinstall for the 3rd time, it's just not worth the hassle. Save your money.

I bought this game and it downloaded (and took forever to do so) , however when I go to install it, it will not install or allow me to play. I'm pretty upset, and I don't know how to get a refund! I have a brand new windows 10 computer, it should work!

I have the same problem as R. Wilson.  The game just does not work.  I installed it, and when you open it up, you get all the sounds just fine but the screen is absolutely frozen.  You can do nothing.  I uninstalled and reinstalled the game to no avail.  I guess I should have just opened up the garbage can and tossed $6.99 right into it.  Don't waste your money!!!

I downloaded the free version to try. Thank goodness I did.  The screen was frozen and I could not play the game.  I have a new Gateway computer with Windows 7.  I think there is a software glitch for Windows 7 that needs to be addressed.

I BOUGHT THIS GAME BECAUSE I AM A HUGE FAN OF THE SHOW, HOWEVER, I FOUND THIS GAME VERY BORING. IT TOOK A WHILE TO SETUP PICKING YOUR OPTIONS AND GETTING READY TO GO.  BUT, ONCE YOU GOT GOING THERE WAS NO EXCITMENT.  I PLAYED IT SEVERAL TIMES, HOPING FOR MORE - BUT I'M NOT SURE HOW MANY MORE TIMES I WILL PLAY THIS GAME.  MIGHT BE A GOOD ONE FOR TRADE-IN.  WOULD NOT RECOMMEND THIS GAME.
summary: DULL, NOT A VERY GOOD GAME.

reviewText: This game should be good but I can never get the player to let go of the ball.  He moves all over the place, his arm and hand move but he doesn't let go of the ball.  This becomes insanly frustrating.  Don't pay more then $15 for this game.

My 12-year-old bought this with his Christmas money, and although we have the required operating system as listed on the back of the game (Mac OS X 10.6) and very fast Internet service, the game is so slow to load ("laggy," as my son puts it) that it's impossible to enjoy.  As is always the case with software, you can't see if it works until you've installed it, and once you've opened the box and installed it, you can't return it.  Funny how well that works out for the manufacturer!

This game is terrible.  It is overly complex.  The controls are poor.  The lighting in the game is so dark that you can't make out details.  There was 1 level I played 3 times before I relized what to do because the terrible lighting made it impossible to see wht you were supposed to do.  This game might be acceptable as a rental, but I would never reccomend actually buying.  You will be very disappointed.  It is far below the fun of any of the other lego games.

Be careful when you purchase items from Amazon.com. I purchased this xbox game for my husband for Christmas. When he went to play it the screen said the disk was unreadable so he tried to reinsert it a couple of times and it still didn't work. He had played other xbox games earlier that he was given on Christmas Day so we know the xbox is working fine. I went to Amazon's return policy and because it is open we can not return it. Bottom line- I am going to rethink where I buy games.

This PS3 fan is a piece of junk.  Not only did it not cool like it was supposed to but it made the loudest, nastiest noises I have ever heard.  I had to hit the unit to make it stop until I just gave up, took it off and threw it in the trash.  I make sure the PS3 is not blocked by anything and I leave my ceiling fans on high to keep the air flowing around the room.

I ordered two of these, one for each of my two PS3's. The product looks nice, but does not work as advertised! I attached it to the back of the PS3, and after only a few minutes the PS3 was a LOT more hot than before attaching this fan assembly. The grill slats are not large enough, nor are the fans large enough to efficiently move enough air through the PS3 in order to improve cooling. It actually impedes the flow of air because of the small size fans and grill holes.

When I received the package yesterday I immediately hooked it up to see how it worked. Within 15 min my PS3 was hotter than it ever was. I can understand the fan cooler getting hot but not the whole PS3. About 30 min later my PS3 froze and I packed it back up and headed for the post office to return it.

I bought my Intercooler at Best Buy and as many of the other reviewers are reporting, this thing is a piece of junk!  After a couple of weeks, the fans start squealing so loud, you have to shut the whole system down.

On top of that, my PS3 is still overheating even with the Intercooler on.

It didn't work with any of the games I tried.  When I ordered it I thought it was the same as the controllers that come with the Wii itself, but they are not.  I was particularly upset that Amazon recommended this with the purchase of the Wii.  I wanted 2 controllers right off the bat and this one never worked, not to mention they are not the same as the official Wii controllers.

I got the first one and it held a charge for the first week, then stopped working unless it was plugged in. I couldn't get ahold of the manufacturer so I contacted the seller. The seller sent me a new one which did the same thing straight out of the package. I also agree with other reviews that the qwerty buttons are cheap and get stuck

This is a pretty bad game. You don't get to customize your character, you have 4 preset characters to choose from. The voice acting is cheesy and the dialogue is awkward and silly. The graphics are cheesy and you can tell that not much thought or effort went into this game.
summary: Cheaply made game with not much thoughr put into it

reviewText: The zippers on this bag are terrible. I ordered it because it looks perfect for my ds lite and games. As soon as I received it though, I noticed that two of the teeth were missing from the zipper and it absolutely would not close. A mere twenty minutes later another tooth slipped out of the bottom section and another one had become dislodged and crooked. Needless to say I returned it for a refund. I absolutely do not recommend it because it is very, very poorly made.

I only have one game that I wanted to use this remote for, which is the Super Mario Bros. game.  It doesn't work at all.  It isn't compatible with it.  So, now I have two controllers that I can't even use.  But, I guess it works for some games, just make sure it works for the games you have before you buy it.

While the buttons seem to function just fine, what ruins it for me is the left joystick. Not only does it constantly squeak as you twist it around and around, but it also feels stiff and uncomfortable, making it almost impossible to play any N64 Virtual Console games.

This garbage was, when I purchased it, made up to look like an OEM Nintendo device. It's not. I bought it as a gift, so not only did I give a useless device, I gave a useless device that made me look like a clueless cheapskate.

When I plugged this in, it took a minute to recognize. Then it worked with no issues. After 1 week of casual use, like an hour a day, it stopped working. I thought something was loose, so I plugged it back in and out. No change. Controller stopped working. Then I realized this is a generic model, does not even have a "Wii" name on it. This was a waste of money, and I simply forgot to send this back. Don't buy, you will be disappointed like everyone else.

I got this to play old nintendo games on my wii like super mario 1, 2, etc.  I read the so-so reviews and thought to myself it can't really be that bad.  It is...I hate it.  It looks like it would be okay but it's not.  It is not even fun to play because it seems like there is a delay or something in it.  I press jump and there is a hesitation and I keep dying in the game because of it.  This controller sucks.

I bought this for my little brother. It worked the first night he got it. After that, it seemed to be possessed. All the buttons would be activated even when he put the controller down. He even got scared and left the room. I know it's not possessed, but I believe it was defective.

pretty boring. there's no map so you get completely lost when you're trying to do your quests, and every time you come into an area you have to try and figure out if you've already been there. Also (and this is super nitpicky, i know) there is no money system in the game, which is something i really like an RPG to have. all in all, I played it once and never put it in my xbox again.
summary: boring, no map, no money system.

reviewText: This is a POS!  If you don't know what POS means then send me an email and I will explain it to you.  I was never able to get this to work on any laptop or desk top computer.  It was a "COMPLETE RIP OFF"!  Don't waste your money!!!

This game worked fine for one month. Lots of fun. But yesterday, everything on my computer went to hell, and went to BLUE SCREEN three times.  And you know what that means.
Long story short, I wasn't able to restore the system until I uninstalled the thing that was making my computer unstable.  And that was this product.
This may not be the experience for everyone, but ... I don't know if I'd ever trust this product after what happened. And I would never want this to happen to any happy gamer out there.

Don't buy this.  These batteries don't last at all.  I only use it a few minutes a day and I need to recharge daily, otherwise the next day it will have no battery.  I am back to regular batteries now.

This is the first time I tried Virtual Villagers.  Very slow.  I didn't even use the whole 30 minutes of the free trial because it's very slow and I found my mind wandering and wondering if I really wanted to waste my time and money on this game.  Some people might enjoy it, but I don't see why.
summary: Check out the Free Trial first, save your $

reviewText: I had to return this immediately after purchase as it is not compatible with my new iMac running the latest version of OSX.  One of the games will not load.  I called the company and they said they had no plans to fix it or push out an update even though the version sold through the Apple store did get a patch to fix the problem.  They suggested I send it back.
summary: Not compatible with the latest Mac OS -10.7!

reviewText: I bought this game to play co-op only to find that this feature is broken and doesnt even connect. After searching online I find that it was broken for a very long time and never fixed...what a waste of my money.

I purchased this exact product from a different web site, but had similar problems as other reviewers.  The batteries, when placed on the charger, would charge for about 10 seconds, then the lights would change from red to blue (indicating they are fully charged).  The batteries were not fully charged.

The charging kit was returned.

I got this controller for some co-op play with friends.  For the first few weeks it worked great, but now it will randomly shutoff in the middle of a game.  Like other reviewers, no we did not damage the controller in any way.  It sat on my console, then was used for a game.  There was no throwing, hitting, or smashing.  I guess you get what you pay for.

This game should've been more like Just Dance but it failed on all accounts. The choreography is slow and boring, the graphics are distracting and difficult to follow with all the camera angles. I wish I could get my money back.

I heard great things about this game and was excited to play. It's completely open world and you can do whatever you'd like in the game. However I found it to be frustrating, boring and not pretty to look at.

I purchased this game for my daughter, thinking that it would be a great way for her to improve her gymnastics skills and have fun on the Wii.  First off the graphics in this game are horrible, worse than most Wii games.  Secondly I was already fed up with the game by the time we got done picking out her gymnast and outfit.  Then we found the game play just too confusing to follow.  I gave up on the game, and we never touched it again.  There are lots of good games for the Wii, this is not one of them.

I purchased this video game the end of August 2012 for my personal use.  I have played it less than ten times and it stopped working.  I tried contacting the seller,but I have received no response.  I would not recommend this to anyone.

I bought this for my grandson and had it shipped to Colorado. He was ecstatic when he saw it. Unfortunately, it did not hold air and by day two had to be held together with duct tape just so the air would stay in.

I purchased this controller in October, by December it was acting weird, and by January it was completely dead. I was tired of the kids breaking controllers so I kept this one hidden away to use for myself only. I am a light gamer and didn't really have a lot of time to use it. This controller was such a disappointment to me. Other than it not working, the design is nice and when it did work it was pretty awesome. Don't buy it if you plan to use it for more than a couple of months.

We ordered this product.  Shipping was fast.  However, we opened it up, plugged it in and it doesn't work.  The controller lights up, but the buttons don't work.  I contacted the seller.  They will issue a refund, however, I have to pay to ship it back.  Seems like a bad deal to me.

I love this game but when I purchased this one with the microphone that came with it, it didn't sound good at all.  The voice from the mic was always behind.  I would love to have this game with a mic that works.  I returned it for a refund.

Tried to connect this thing today only to find out it doesn't work. I spent hours trying to find a solution. It appears there should be a receiver included with the unit, but I never received it. There was no instruction whatsoever. Bad product and a waste of money.

I have played every CoD game since the first one, and have loved them all, but Black Ops is just sad. The creativity behind Call of Duty really stopped at Modern Warfare 2, and this game shows it. There is NOTHING new about it, and the multiplayer modes are all the same story. Wish I had my money back, because I played this for about 2 weeks and have since never played it again, due to the boredom.

As a long time buyer of PC-based video games, including all of the MOH series, I have never experienced such a frustrating game! My biggest gripe is the Steam user interface. I recently had to reset my PC to a previous date setting due to a problem, and I simply can't get this game to work through the Steam interface. I don't understand why I should have to use the Internet to use this game.

I am a huge Call of Duty fan. With that being said, this game was a huge letdown. It is filled with bugs, laggy servers, graphics issues, and an overall "tacky" feel. The graphics are also a downgrade from Modern Warfare 2, which is severely disappointing. I also have a 7.1 surround sound system, and this game sounds very poor on it, whereas the sound in Modern Warfare 2 was amazing. This definitely does not feel like any of the other Call of Duty's, and I don't mean that in a good way.

I purchased the game and I have to say- it's just awful.  The graphics are so bad I can't really tell what is going on.  I tried to place a chair- a simple chair! and it appeared as a blob.  I gave the game to my husband for a second opinion and he also found it unplayable.

Wish I'd saved my money on this one :(.

I love The Sims, but it really doesn't work well on the Wii. First time I sat down to play it, everything froze up. I gave up on it for the night. Came back the next day and got farther than the night before so I thought it was just a fluke. It wasn't. About 5 minutes later it froze up again and it does it every time during gameplay. I wouldn't recommend this game for the Wii.

I am a huge fan of The Sims games. Two years ago I had received this game as a gift. I was so excited and had anticipated this game coming out for some time. To my dismay, I found this game to be incredibly glitchy and the longer I played, the worse it got. I am stunned there has not been a recall out there for this game because it simply cannot be played after a certain point. DO NOT BUY THIS GAME FOR THE Wii.

If you are used to the PC version of the Sims, then don't get this. I have played on my PC for years and love it, but absolutely hated the Wii version and could not bring myself to play it for more than a few minutes.

This is the most infuriating game.  It takes forever to do basic things, and you can't keep up with a family at all.  People won't eat when there is food in the fridge, and starve to death.  Several functions don't work.  It's full of glitches that make it unplayable.  Worst game I've ever played.  Don't buy this game.

well...i bought this game and the same day i decided to return it because its really bad on the Wii. the graphics are bad, the options are limited and im sure that a lot of people can agree with me on this one. if you are looking to buy, dont. its a waste of time and money...especially if you planned on using that time to play sims 3. save yourself the trouble :(

very disappointed

This game was ok (just ok) when it worked, but after about 10 hours total of play time it doesn't work.  We were very dissappointed by the glitch that made it impossible to buy the cool homes.  We did play around that but now the game has stopped completely.  We received a black screen that said we had to remove the disk and unplug the Wii.  I did that and now everytime I try to load this game it gives me the black screen.  This game is a complete piece of junk on the Wii.  Do not waste your money.

I was very excited about Sims 3 for Wii, but was very disappointed.  I could not believe how boring the game was.  It seems a lot easier in the PC version to look at your Sims needs and navigate around.  I did not like the nunchuk with the remote.  Also the graphics are terrible.  It was very confusing to have to look at different menus for the needs, wants, etc.  I will definitely go back to playing Sims 2 on my PC.

I have owned the original Sims, Sims 2, and Sims 3 for my computer. I was SO excited about the release of Sims 3 for Wii, but have been very disappointed. There are too many things to even name, but for example, switching between characters is a bit cumbersome and time consuming. Also, when a sim has a baby, they baby comes home from the hospital as a child.

I wish I had saved my money and just stuck with the computer version of Sims 3.

I got this game and expected so much more from it. The time goes so fast and your Sim is so slow that if you get up at 7am and have to be to work at 10am you don't even have time to use the bathroom and make yourself breakfast before work... And the game is so full of glitches it's ridiculous! My Wii constantly grinds when I'm playing. EA should be ashamed to put out a game like this! Don't waste your money on this game.

This game was great, and my kids loved it. But we just had to replace our wii, and since the new wii doesn't contain any gamecube ports, there is no way to use this game (because you can't attach the mat via a port). Our wii broke after we had it for only two years, and we figured out that we could replace it for less than we would pay to fix it. But this game (and DDR) won't work with the new wii. Buyer beware.

As the title of this review implies, the build quality of this charger is questionable. After working for about 3 months, it seems to have stopped working. The LED lights flash briefly before shutting off, and any devices plugged in do not charge. I would return if I could.

I bought two of these. I plugged the first in and it worked without any problems. I swapped the first out for the other and it would not connect. I tried both at the same time and they would interfere with one another (still, the second controller won't work.) There is a reason it's so cheap.

I hate this nuisance of a game. The humor comes off as annoying and know-it-all-ish. I know this game is popular and there is a significant number of people who like it. It just isn't for me (or anyone I've ever met in person).
summary: I hate this nuisance of a game

reviewText:
I ordered a brand new game.  Checked my order over and over--I wasn't wrong in the order.  But I was sent a used game.  It works and everything, but I feel cheated that they sent me a used game for the price about a new game.
When I contacted them, they said that they will refund it if I send it back.  They did not offer to replace it if I sent it back--which is what I expected--but no.

Bought this game today, from a dealer who did NOT list it as a dead game.  Installed it, tried to register it, only to find out, that all servers have been shut down and the game is dead.  Needless to say I am a little peeved about this, but lesson learned... If its not being sold in stores, then don't try to buy it I guess...

I spent years playing FFXI. I thought I was purchasing that games successor. I played this "game" for 3 months and it was just simply awful. The why's behind its awfulness are well documented on any FFXIV forum so I'll leave you the potential buyer to go there for additional information, but suffice to say, if you are looking for an experience similar to FFXI, you won't find it here.

Don't waste your money.
summary: Don't waste your time or money

reviewText: I have played every Soul Calibur since the first one and have owned every one since the second one (and still own) and this is by far the worst one yet. I highly regret paying full price for this (Ezio being in the game is what made me want it the most). I haven't played it since the first day I got it. I wish I could get my money back in fact. Do yourself a favor if you are considering this game: stick with Soul Calibur 4 or earlier, or go for a completely different game. This one is junk.

The user-interface is a joke.

The quest system is belabored.

Practically every single mechanic in the game is designed to slow you down for absolutely no reason.

This game is a catastrophe of biblical proportions.

I am not going to waste too much time writing this review but this game is horrible. I just bought a PS3 and bought this game to start building my collection. I ended up trading it in because it is just horrible. It is boring and felt like the same activities over and over.
summary: Outdated now, horrible story, same experience each mission

reviewText: This game had a bad glitch.  As you proceed deeper into the game, the game was unable to save  any advancements I made.  The game was unable to save after about 2 hrs of play.  To advance, I had to replay many levels that I had already won, so I was too frustrated to finish the game.  Don't know if this is "normal" or if I just got a bad game.  Up to the repeat levels, however, the game was very fun.

Do NOT buy this game online, there's a good chance you WILL get scammed. This is the second time I've been sent the stupid Essentials edition. So if you think you're saving yourself some money by purchasing online, YOU AREN'T! Some have gotten lucky and have been sent legitimate copies, but there's a great chance you won't. So in the end, buying from a used videogame store will end up saving you the trouble in the long run.

We bought this as a present for a friend in July for his birthday.  Unfortuately with busy summer schedules he was not able to open the game until end of August.  We later learned that the game didn't work when he tried to play it.  They returned it to us in hopes we can exchange it for another game.  However, the policy is no returns after 30 days.  Now we are stuck with this non-working game that we paid over $40 for.  Lesson I learned....don't buy videogames online.

I got rid of my first Xbox 360 because it got the "Red Ring of Death", among many other problems. After Microsoft launched the new Xbox 360 S I thought all that was a thing of the past and decided to buy an Xbox 360 (the newest version) again, but just after a week I got the "Red Ring of Death". There's no way I'll buy another Xbox, that's it for me.

I bought Just Dance 2 for my Wii, and after dancing to one song, the disc froze my Wii. I tried all of my other games and the Wii was fine, but JD2 froze it up so badly that I had to unplug it and plug it back in to fix it. I sent it back for a replacement and the replacement did the same thing. This game screws my Wii up each time.
summary: The game and its replacement both froze my Wii.

reviewText:
If you want a system with good games then this is not for you.

If you want something for kids and adults to both be able to play this is not for you.

This system only exists to create psychos that pull off mass shootings.

This headset is absolutely terrible. It breaks very easily and the microphone on it doesn't work hardly at all. You basically have to have it in your mouth for it to pick up your voice. I would not recommend this for anyone ever.
summary: This headset is absolutely terrible. It breaks very easily and the microphone on ...

reviewText: i bought this headset a bit more than a week ago. it came in on a friday when i was out of town. i got home sunday and used it for a day or 2 then the microphone went out on it. i contacted the seller and they want me to pay the shipping to return a defective item. the shipping costs more than half the items cost. save your money and buy a better one than this.

I bought this for my boyfriend for Christmas because his last one was a different brand and broke only a few months after we bought it. This one was even worse. The earpiece no longer works and in order to use it he has to plug it in when he wants to talk and then unplug it and listen from the TV speakers. I think it was a big waste of money.
summary: Broke a month and a half after purchase

reviewText:
I recieved the package in the mail. Opened it up, plugged it in, logged on, and it didn't work.

Defective right out of the package - can't say much more than that.

I ordered 2 pairs of them and the second one will be comming soon. We'll see if that one works.

This really is the worst game I've ever played. There are many reasons why:

1. The games are too hard for little kids, and not very fun to begin with.
2. It gets old very fast.
3. When you're not playing a game, there is really nothing else to do.
4. The controls run terribly.

If you want a party game, get your kids something in the Mario Party series!

Got this as a birthday present for my son who loves wrestling.  My husband and both boys did not like it.  The game is glitchy and the controls are a lot more difficult than the ALL STAR Wrestling Game.  Needless to say it is sitting on the shelf.  The All Star is by far the best and most fun wrestling game.

When I looked into this game, it had some good to decent reviews, so I decided to give it a shot. Bad mistake. This game did not live up to the expectation that the reviews seemed to hint at. As a result, I ended up wasting $40 on a game I could not wait to get rid of.
summary: Bought into the hype, and paid for it the hard way.

reviewText: So far I have been unable to get this program to work on my computer and I have to contact the company to see what is wrong.  I want it to work in the worst way because it looks great---but maybe my computer doesn't have the "power" to make it work.  I get an error message when I try to play it.  Gosh, I hope that I can get it to work!!

Don't waste your money on this game. I'm not a video game expert but I have been playing video games for over 20 years and I have to say that this one is one of the worst I've ever played. Buy something- anything- else!

I have to say that I was pretty disappointed in this game.  The graphics were not that great, and the checkpoints were poorly placed. I also ran into a bug almost immediately.  I'm so glad I only rented this.

We bought this game for our 3 year old son.  He loves the idea of the games and is eager to play.  However, it is very aggravating to him and us that the wii remote has such a hard time controlling the game.  In many of the games, he needs to tilt the remote to get the cursor to move to the right answer. The cursor usually skips the answer or will not move where it needs to be.  While the concept of the game is great, the execution leaves a lot to be desired.
summary: Would not buy if we had tried it first.

reviewText: My daughter got this game for Christmas. It is extremely disappointing. It looks like a very old computer game not professional at all. The graphics are terrible, the games are very basic. My daughter played once or twice when she got it. She never wants to play it anymore and I don't blame her! Don't waste your money on it!

I just bought this and immediately upon starting the game I noticed that the mouse pointer is not lined up with the buttons. You have to be an inch to the left and two inches above the link you want to click on, making it almost impossible to function in the game. I am very disappointed with this purchase and do not recommend anyone else buy it.

Having played all of the other games, I was sorely disappointed with this one. I can't even begin playing it. The first scene is so choppy that I can't kill any death eaters. I wasted my money on a game I can't even play.

Not sure why, but it wouldn't install on my computer. It could have something to do with it being "only for supply in UK" but that may just be a coincidence. Either way, judging by the box art and the "PG" rating, I'd steer clear of this.
summary: Not sure why, but it wouldn't install on my ...

reviewText: I've been a big Need For Speed fan for all my life so I had to try this out, especially since the original Hot Pursuit was one of my favorites. The game sucked. Seriously. The cars all handled terribly, shortcuts were impossible to take and worst of all, most of the best cars are locked. You can see them in the garage, but you gotta PAY EXTRA just to unlock them. Im already paying $60 for the game, now you want me to pay EXTRA for cars that are ALREADY IN THE GAME? SHAME ON YOU EA, SHAME ON YOU.

This game is horrible. I have owned and played almost all of the NFS titles and this one is by far the worst. Unrealistic driving controls, you have to drift all the time, there is no story line. The graphics are nice, but everything else is horrible. Really, save your money. Don't buy this game.

I have always had a special place for ratchet and clank but this game is a joke. everything i do in this game just feels cheap and it was so bad that i couldn't even bring myself to finish this game, and that's saying something.

This product is not the one pictured at all.  It's a cheap knock-off that doesn't fit properly and breaks easily.  The triggers look nothing like the ones pictured.

They also come with some cheap stick covers (also not pictured, since it's obviously not the same product as in the picture).

These are garbage, they are not what I ordered and I urge you to look elsewhere if you want trigger covers.  Don't get ripped off like I did.

I really like this game- great graphics and interesting. But it doesn't save- every time I get back on the game it's in the same scene and I can't get past it. I looked online and a lot of people have the same problem. Unfortunately, it can't be finished.

After a 40 minute download I was unable to get this to play. I wrote to amazon and was given some suggestions to help it play. They didn't work either and there's no way to respond to that email. I know the game's cheap, but it's not free.

I bought this game for my kids who are 6 and 4. The games are vague, the controls are weird and they're not even that fun. For example, the first game you played kept telling us that we needed more starts to do the game. However, it wouldn't let  you go back to get more stars in order to complete the game. We had to turn it off, then get the stars. This is not a good game, don't get it.

This game comes with little to no instruction as to how to play the game, other than what each of the buttons on the Wii Remote and Nunchucks will do. We, let alone my 5 yr old niece, could not figure out how to play this game. She LOVES Tangled and she was done with this game in less than 15 minutes.
summary: We could not figure this out...

reviewText: Does not work.  It was poorly packaged, which may have been the cause of it being broken, but would still be the fault of the seller.  Yes, it arrived much earlier than expected, but I didn't pay for a broken product.  Do yourself a favor, it's not worth saving $20 to get a 250g hard drive.  Buy a Microsoft certified one.  Yes, they're overpriced, but at least they work.  I sent the seller an email with my terms for reparations, hopefully I'll hear from them soon.

This seemed like it would be a good game. However, just as everyone has said, the game is very buggy. The sensor tracks you for awhile and then decides to track someone else. I haven't tried this game solo, perhaps it would work better then. All the characters look very cartoonish. The gameplay is very simplistic when you can get it to work. I'm going to have to trade this game in. I wish I checked out the reviews before I purchased it.

This game does not work at all on the Kinect. When I contacted the manufacturer of this game to ask what could be done, they pretty much said "too bad". They did not stand behind their product and they are aware that your movements cannot be recognized on the Kinect. This game was a complete waste of money, you might as well flush your money down the toilet and save yourself from paying for shipping too.
summary: Deca Sports does not work at all!

reviewText:
I was excited to see this bundle and bought it for my original Wii, after checking to see in the description that it was for my version of the Wii. No where in the descriptions did it indicate it was for WiiU.  After getting the box, I examined it carefully before I opened it, and again, no indication that it was only for WiiU. After opening the box, I found that the CD plays in my Wii, but the mat would not work. And of course since it was opened, I can't return it.

What a ripoff!
summary: Beware! This is Only for Wii U!

reviewText:
I ordered this to hook up my PS3 to my SmartTV and was really confused when I couldn't get my television to register my PS3.
Turns out the cord wasn't working for whatever reason.  I had to go out and buy another one to hook it up.

Very disappointed with this product.

I hate this game. I hate the characters, the story, the setting and the aesthetics... but most of all I hate what EA has done to Bioware.

The game is bad. Really bad. The writing is on par with what you would expect from a 12-13 year old. It's sad that they couldn't find better writers.

The characters are all whiny cry-babies. I could go on and on about how bad this game is but I won't. I'll just say - don't buy.

Bioware betrayed its fans by making a quick cash-in of a game. This game has NOTHING in common gameplay wise with the first game. If you enjoyed the first game, you will most definitely despise this travesty of a game.

This item is a complete waste of your money. Like other buyers, I wish I would have read the reviews before I jumped on this cheap controller. The joystick does not work at all!! Sometimes it will work, but goes in any direction it wants, and sometimes one direction will work fine, but others won't. I was extremely disappointed with this product.

Can not figure out how to get this game to work.  It is too hard to try and figure it out.  Kept trying to play it the first few days I got it and then just gave up.  Will have to try and pick it up again when I dont' have anything to do.  I was dissapointed in it.

I took it out of the box and put the batteries in my Wii remotes. All 4 had a red light for a few seconds and then the light turned blue. The blue light indicates that the battery is fully charged. When you try to use the remote it works for about 10 seconds and then is dead. I returned these the following day.

This is possibly the worst controller I have ever had. It was horribly uncomfortable to hold. If you look at the pictures you'll notice that sections of the back are flat, and this makes it really awkward to hold and press the trigger buttons while also using the analog sticks. Because I want to feel like I didn't waste my money I'm going to try and make myself get used to the controller, but for anyone who hasn't bought it, don't. You'd honestly be better off buying any other controller.

don't buy this it doesn't work it's a piece of crap.. didn't work with any of my games on either mode..

EDIT: got it to work by using joystick mapper, but that still doesn't allow me to have one person playing with the keyboard and one using the controller.. if you are planning on using joystick mapper with this then i suggest just getting a PS3 controller.

This is a non-working game machine. We just received it today and after putting a game in and turning it on, there is nothing on the screen but lines and black and white. I knew I was taking a chance on this because I read the reviews. I was just hoping we would luck out and receive one of the systems that was in good condition. I was wrong.

My daughter got this for Christmas and was soo excited...She also got the WII for Christmas so this game was what she really wanted. She played it one time and the next time we tried, the WII wouldn't recognize that the mic was plugged in. We've tried many times now to get it to work but haven't had any luck. Since it was a gift, I'm not even sure what to do with it....
summary: Mic didn't work after first use.

reviewText: This PlayStation was shipped with no styrofoam or bubble wrap to protect it. The box showed up extremely damaged.
