I took pictures before I opened it up, just in case I would need them later. And when I turned the PlayStation on, I found out that this PlayStation doesn't even work. The power will come on, but it does not recognize the game i put in it, or the controller attached with it.  It's completely worthless
summary: This PlayStation was shipped with no styrofoam or bubble wrap ...

reviewText:
My 10 year old is a huge fan of the show, so I got her this game. She can't even make it past the first challenge & until you do, you can't do any other challenges. I'm just glad I didn't spend that much on this game.

The game arrived quickly though, and in good condition.

This game is a total waste of money.  You would think they would include some type of instructions with it, but that's not the case.  It just shows a little picture in the bottom right corner of the screen, but it doesn't tell you exactly what you need to do with the controller, so you just end up moving it all around until something starts moving on the screen.  I would suggest "ZOO," the game-maker, provide better instructions for it.

As soon as I took this console out of the box I knew I was in trouble. It weighed maybe 1 lb. I looked inside the mostly hollow plastic shell and found a small electronic board that looked like it was soddered in place by a child. I set it up and not to my surprise, it doesn't work. It was in the trash 20 minutes after I took it out of the box. too much hassle to return it. Don't waste your money. I feel like I've been scammed.

I bought this game.  It was OK.  I had it a couple of weeks and got a message from my antivirus program that there was malware in the game.  I had to uninstall it and now am afraid to download it again.

This game is based on the movie, which I suppose is its best feature, but I was still surprised by the adult content/language in the game. The game itself isn't very challenging. Once through the game, which didn't take long, there was no point going through it again because you know where the hidden objects are. It seems to me you're paying for the story line and graphics, more than the challenge of the game.

When I searched for Minecraft for WII this is what came up, so I bought it.  I am not familiar with mine craft, so I did not know that this was not it.  My daughter was not too happy, I told her to try it.  She did not like it.  Disappointing.

This is a really fun game to play, but I got stuck in putting coins into a display case. I found the coins, but in trying to put them in the case, it just didn't work. If you just want a couple of hours of play before this hidden object scenario, buy it, but if you want to finish it, don't. I could even get help on the internet.

ANYONE WHO PURCHASED THESE AND TRULY THINKS THAT THEY IMPROVE YOUR GAME IS EITHER LYING OR STUPID. I'M A HARDCORE FPS GAMER AND THESE THINGS WILL HURT YOUR GAME! THEY INCREASE THE LENGTH OF YOUR JOYSTICK BY SNAPPING ON TO YOUR EXISTING ONES, THEREFORE CREATING A LONGER JOYSTICK. WHICH MEANS THAT YOU HAVE TO PUSH FURTHER IN ANY DIRECTION THAN YOU DO WITHOUT THEM ON.IF YOU HAVE REALLY LARGE HANDS THEN MAYBE YOU'LL LIKE THEM, BUT THEY ARE HYPED UP JUNK!

Plugged this nunchuck into 3 different Wiimotes and had the same problem: it randomly "pushed" a whole bunch of buttons. It was impossible to get out of the main menu, let alone play a game. I'm guessing that this was a defective one, but I have returned it and will not be purchasing another.

My kids got this nunchuck to use with their existing wii remotes.  It worked at first, then started not responding sometimes.  Now, the wii will not even recognize that the nunchuck is plugged into the controller, so it can't be used at all.  Unfortunately, this happened after the 30 day window to return or exchange it, so we can't replace it.  I am not sure if we just got a bad controller, or if this brand is poorly made.  Either way, we did not have a good experience with this item.

I have Windows 7, so I thought this game would work.  I had purchased this game for $30.  Many hours have been invested trying to get this game to work.  Nothing would come up on it.  I have contacted City Interactive three times with requests on how to get it to work.  They have not contacted me back.  Wal-Mart would not refund my money and only give me another game.
summary: I have Windows 7, so I thought this game ...

reviewText: Maybe it was my fault, maybe not.  I thought I double-checked before ordering it, but when it arrived, it was the wrong size.  I bought it knowing that the old battery was on the way to its demise, but by the time I needed it, it was too late to return.

My first keyboard broke within a month, I sent it back to get a new one.

The second keyboard then broke within a month.

Rather than waste another $20 to ship it back and get another replacement that will break, I decided to cut my losses.

I'd recommend getting one of the more expensive but higher quality keyboards.
summary: Two keyboards broke within a couple months

reviewText: I bought two of these controllers and both of them started malfunctioning after 2-3 months of use. There is some issue with the wire and they both disconnect frequently while plugged in. I thought the first one was just bad luck, but after having two controllers with the same issue I won't be purchasing a third.
summary: I thought the first one was just bad luck, but after having two controllers with the ...

reviewText: I was new to Xbox, and I got this as a second controller. I sent it back because it didn't work. I found out from my son later that you had to sync it to the unit. he was here when I got my second one, he synced it and it worked.
summary: I was new to Xbox, and I got this ...

reviewText: My boys are telling me that one of the buttons on this controller doesn't work now, and because I bought it online, there will be a lot of hassles to get a replacement.  Right now I don't even have time to deal with it.
summary: This product has quality issues- my boys say it doesn't work.

reviewText: I love game show games in general, but I absolutely hate this game.  I find it annoying to play and it's not smart at all about understanding your answers.  I really wanted to like this game as I've liked other Family Feud games I've played on previous game consoles.  I can't find anything to say that I like on this one, sadly.  I don't recommend it at all.

Luckily this game was only a rental.  If I had paid anything more than $2 for this game I would have been really mad.

Not even mildly amusing.  Horrible, unresponsive controls.  Unimaginative games.  Probably the worst Wii game I have ever played.

I could never open this game to play it and had to purchase it from someone else to be able to play it.  I love the game, but I won't be purchasing any other games from Amazon.  Even when I added the game loading software I still could not open it.  I even wrote to you to ask for help, but after reading all the things I needed to do I still couldn't open it.  I purchased from IWin and have had no problem opening and playing their games.

I do not recommend this product. The levels are pretty much the same and the graphics are awful. I bought this for my husband and we are going to be selling this game to someone else who wants it because it was not worth the money at all.

At first, I loved this controller, but then after some time it was all downhill from there. First, the battery stopped working and would not hold a charge. After about 2 months, the plastic on the bottom back that holds the battery started to crack. Eventually that broke completely off. Keep in mind that I take very good care of my gaming accessories and don't drop/toss them anywhere. I was expecting a better quality item from Microsoft.

DOES NOT SUPPORT WINDOWS 8.1.  YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED.

I ordered this and was very excited to use it.. Tried to install and it looked like it might work, but it does not actually even install properly.  They use this software for all of their products.  Which means none of the gaming line even works on Windows 8.1.  I called their tech support twice with the same results and same answer just because I could not believe they are so far behind.
summary: Tried to install and it looked like it might work

reviewText: This device does not work with Windows 8.1. A lot of people are complaining to Logitech to update their driver for this device, but they still haven't done anything. The only way this product is of any use to me is to use the Xbox 360 driver that's built into Windows, but I've already run into stability issues with that method. I believe all these problems justify this low rating.

I selected this game because of the good reviews, and now I'm mystified why it's rated so high.  The game is terribly buggy -- many of the slots don't even work.  Those that do work are boring beyond belief.  In addition to that, although the description says it's Windows 7 compatible, you'll have to install it in XP-compatible mode.  There is no mention of that.  The regular installation will hang, and you'll have to deduce this fact on your own.  I really would not recommend this game.

Some of my friends have had great success with this set but it did not work well enough for me. It had poor quality and after about 6 months the mic stopped working altogether. Spend the extra $, you and your friends will appreciate it.
summary: Some of my friends have had great success with this set but it did not work ...

reviewText: My son-in-law should have read the reviews before asking for this as a present. It was Dead On Arrival right out of the box. Neither the earphones nor the microphone worked. I do not recommend this product.
summary: DOA right out of the box

reviewText: This item broke after only 10 days. If I could rate it lower than 1 star then I would. If you are looking for a good mic to use for a while this is not the mic that I would recommend to you. This is why it is so cheap... Shame...
summary: If you are looking for a good mic to use for a while this is not ...

reviewText: I WAS LOOKING FORWARD TO THIS GAME WHEN IT CAME OUT . OWNING ALL MONSTER TRUCK GAMES , THIS BY FAR IS THE WORST. THE DRIVING IS HORRIBLE , GRAPHICS ARE STILL FROM THE 90'S , NO FUN AT ALL. I FELT THE NEED TO DRIVE TO THE DEVELOPER'S AND DEMAND MY MONEY BACK ! IF YOU LIKE MONSTER TRUCK GAMES YOU WOULD BE BETTER OFF GETTING A CHEAP $20 GAME INSTEAD.

This mouse is uncomfortable. It is too small. It also has a strange curve to the right. It is a non-returnable item, though Amazon gave me a full refund and let me keep it (though I have no use for it, because it hurts my hand; I guess I'll have to find a small handed friend to give it to).
summary: This mouse is uncomfortable. It is too small. ...

reviewText: Please consider another option and stay away from this product. I bought mine on 8/1/11 and lasted until 12/27/11. The quality of sound is excellent and you can use it easily with PC, PS3 and Xbox360. However the hinge that holds the speakers so they can be rotated as needed is made of cheap plastic and will break without exerting any force. At least that's what happened to me. Of course warranty would not cover it.

I don't understand all the good reviews for this game. You spend your time trying to mimic MJ's movements with no training at all. So unless you are a huge fan and already know all his moves I don't see the point. You might as well just watch one of his videos and try to copy it. It's also a poor workout, you'll just flail your arms around. I just don't get it. I respect MJ, but waste of $40 from video game developers.

I found the first boss kill impossible, even on easy.  Without being able to complete the first boss kill, you cannot proceed in the game and will be unable to complete about 4/5 of the game.  I traded in the xbox 360 version and got the PC version so that I could download some mods to get past the first boss kill.  The game is otherwise very enjoyable.  I would recommend the PC version unless you are a glutton for frustration.  One star for the xbox version, 4 stars for the PC version with mods.

I downloaded this game and played it. Good game and was fun, but there is some sort of problem with the manufacturing company that will not allow you to redownload and reinstall.

I had to reformat my computer and cannot get the game to work at all.

So I first got this when I had a different laptop. It worked perfectly and I had a lot of fun. That one broke and now I have a new one. I went through the lengthy download process again and now the game isn't working properly. It randomly stops working and kicks me out after less than 30 mins without saving my progress. Is there any way to fix this??? Please help! Five stars if it works again.

I'm so disappointed in this game coming from Sims 2.  I plan on getting rid of this one and going back to the second one.  There are actually too many options in everything and it's overwhelming; I just want to play!  I feel like it's a whole new game and I have to relearn everything.

I plan to re-review the game when I actually get to play it.  I have a new laptop that is fast.  It took 5 1/2 hours to download this game.  Isn't that kind of ridiculous?  And as a previous reviewer said, I'm not even done yet.  I had to go to bed and didn't bother with the "software update" that's available.  I guess I'll tackle that today if I can bear it. I hope the game is woth it.

If you've been playing command and conquer from the beginning of the franchise, don't waste your time or money on this game.  If you're looking for the classic base builder, just replay the older games.  For the franchise finale, EA has gone out of their way to completely revamp, tweak and basically ruin a great thing.  Good job.  If all you like is online multiplayer, then this is the game for you.  If not, don't bother.  So disappointed.

I have been a fan of C&C since the beginning. So, I feel confidant when I say this is not C&C or even remotely related to it. This game is not fun. It is hard to learn, hard to play, and requires a ridiculous manner to open. Do not waste your money on this and maybe they will come out with a version that is like the old C&C that everybody enjoys.

This is not Command and Conquer, I don't even know what this is. Since there are SO MANY people who have already commented the negatives about this game, I will just keep this short and simple.

1. DO NOT BUY THIS GAME.
2. DO NOT BUY THIS GAME.
3. DO NOT BUY THIS GAME.
4. I am serious, even more so than preparing for or taking the MCAT exam.

Last 3 words - ridiculous, useless, and disgraceful.
summary: STAY AWAY FROM THIS GAME, STAY AWAY PEOPLE!

reviewText: Nothing, I mean nothing like Command and Conquer. Everything that was great about the previous versions is now gone. This is a completely different game using the C&C name to get people to buy. As I said, they should offer refunds to all us loyal C&C fans who got duped into buying this one. DON'T BUY THIS IF YOU ARE LOOKING FOR C&C.
summary: They should Refund our Money, this is NOT C&C!

reviewText: I never received this item. My nephew has been waiting for this for almost a month because he has a game he cannot play without it.  I don't know what is going on with this company, but I will never again order anything from them.

Nintendo's policy is that they WILL NOT transfer games from one system to another.  If you are buying this to replace an older model just know that you will NOT be able to transfer your downloaded content (Virtual Console, WiiWare games) to this system.  You will have to start all over and pay for the same content you've already bought for a second time.
summary: Beware!  Cannot transfer VC and WiiWare games!

reviewText: Purchased this PS3 version and enjoyed the game until it was time to leave the mage tower basement. The first door zapped open but Door 1 is now locked and won't let me through. I tried installing all the patches with no luck. I also tried going to a previous save point but that didn't help either. One would think they would have fixed this before releasing the game. Basically, the game is now worthless. Not sure how I can give it more than one star when I am not able to play the majority of the game.

I started this game and was really enjoying it. I got to a point that I was stuck. I retraced my steps time and time again and even restarted the game but never progressed passed the point where I was stuck.

When I got part way through the game, I was unable to get the action that was supposed to happen.  I, therefore can't continue playing game.  It is most disappointing and I'm not sure who to contact.  This is the first game I have purchased through Amazon, and it has not been a good experience.

I gave this to my son for Christmas and he LOVED it! Unfortunately it stopped working after only a few weeks. Looks like several other people have had the same problem I had. Our Wii is at least three years old and both original controllers still work. Needless to say I expected a little more out of this one...

I downloaded this and tried to install and it does nothing! I have previously downloaded Sims 3 Late Night and that worked fine. I was very excited to get this new adventure but after 2 attempts of downloading and installing the game and even re-downloading the installer package and launching the game does not work. It downloads and then says it is installing and then disappears and does not show up when I launch Sims 3. Waste of money, waste of time.
summary: Terrible! Would not work at all!

reviewText: Don't buy this, especially if you liked Civ IV. The graphics may be better, but that means nothing when the game is so overwhelmingly boring. The interaction with the other "players" is mind-numbingly stupid. I wish we could go back to Civ IV!

I have been playing the Civilization games since the original came out very many moons ago. Sorry, but this is not a worthy successor to any of those titles. The details of why this game is horrible have been covered by others both here and on the web. Boiled down, it is dumbed-down, prettified and just not fun. I tried to get into it; but it is not fun and, well, it is not Civ, either. I have uninstalled it and have gone back to Civ4.

I was really looking forward to this game. Unfortunately, it will not run on my computer. The community forums on Steam and 2K are full of comments from others who have bought the game only to find that:

a) it either won't run at all, or if it does run, it crashes regularly, and
b) no refunds are possible.

Unless your computer is newer than the game, avoid it.

As a long-time fan of the CIV series, I'm really disappointed with this game. I loved Civ IV but they've taken a huge step back with this. They basically took all the things that make the game fun like going to war, expanding your empire, and trading and made them much more difficult. The game is bogged down by the more boring elements like managing your towns. One of the most annoying things is that units can't stack on a tile. Good luck moving an army around.

I spent a day reading through forums and trying to contact tech support. It won't run on my machine (which runs Starcraft 2 just fine). I don't know what exactly is wrong. I suspect that if you don't have a brand-new top-rated gaming machine, you won't be able to run the machine. And once you buy it, you can't return it. So just set the $50 on fire and save yourself the grief and time wasted on trying to get this game to run.
summary: It won't run on your machine, so don't bother

reviewText:
This is not a review of the game but the delivery system. They did research a while back and determined that online shoppers were less likely to buy a product if they had to create a separate online account. With this game you can't even play a single player game without setting up an online account with Steam and then have to wait to start it up while it updates.

If I would have known about all this I would not have purchased.

Since more than 15 years ago, I started to play CIV. I spent numerous nights on CIV 1, CIV 2, CIV 3, and CIV 4. This is the worst. I can not even stand it for one hour! Do not waste your time on money on this, if you really want to play, go back to CIV 4. This CIV 5 tarnish the CIV series reputation.

reviewerName: An Infinitely Hot and Dense Dot
reviewText: No matter how many times EA puts this on sale, it's still not worth it. Even if they paid me $5, I wouldn't play it again. It's just horrible compared to previous Civs. I feel bad for people who spent full price on this.

I've been playing Civ since the first iteration of the game.  Every year it has progressed.  I have to say that I am very sorry that I purchased this game.  The game play is not fun.  It seems to be more about managing relationships with city states than it does about building an empire.  What a complete fail of a game.  I've returned to playing Civ IV.

Game runs way too slowly (fyi, nothing wrong with my pc) and the graphics are nothing to be impressed with. I feel like I've wasted money on this one. Btw, I am (was) a huge fan of Sid Meier's franchise but... you guessed it - not anymore. Don't waste your money on this one.

This game is not ready to be released at this time.  Do not buy it.  This might as well be a free demo version because it fails to work for a large section of the people who bought it.  Please read the forums at the games website to see the problems.

I'm a long time fan of the Civilization games and thought some of the additions in Civ 5 would be interesting and they were.  However, this game is not at all ready to be released.  It is slow and crashes constantly.  I've spent more time trying to get the game to work than actually playing it.  It is absurd that Firaxis and 2K games released a game in such a state.  Duping people out of $50 for a non-functional game is abuse verging on the criminal.
summary: Good until it crashes, which it will

reviewText:
"According to the Steam Subscriber Agreement, Steam's availability is not guaranteed and Valve is under no legal obligation to release an update disabling the authentication system in the event that Steam becomes permanently unavailable."

Funny how this isn't mentioned at the point of purchase.  To me this is the #1 reason for not purchasing Steam games.  I understand this is not a review of the game.  But if I am going to pay $50 dollars for something, then I better own 100% of it.

I downloaded the free trial first, and I'm so glad I did. There are no instructions on what to do, the graphics are bad, and the game wasn't making sense.  You don't start out with any "hints" or "skips" and it tells you that you must use "fireflies" to use them, but doesn't tell you how to find them! I looked for 10 minutes in the only 2 rooms I was allowed in, and didn't see any. Some of the items you have to find are so tiny, it's just luck that you see them at all.  Horrible game...deleting.

I can't believe I even bothered spending money on this. I should have expected it after the first game, but I apparently didn't learn. If you're on the fence, wait for the game to reach $20, because that's how much the devs put into this game, and that's how much it's worth. It's just such a shoddy mishmash of a game. I plan to stop supporting anything that comes from EA. Sorry devs.

I wish I could get a refund. This game was a complete waste of money. One of the worst games I've played in the last 10 years. An awful, soul ripping disappointment. Failure of epic proportions. I will sell you my copy for $5 paypal if you want.

What is there to say?  They used to have a fantastic RPG, and decided they wanted to make a 3rd person button masher combat game.  That's fine, but it shouldn't have been released under the Dragon Age IP.  Very disappointed to have purchased this, and found it to be just an action game.  Give it to your kids, they'll probably get a lot more out of it than you will.
summary: They turned one of the best RPG's of all time into a button masher

reviewText: My husband has been looking forward to this game from the moment they announced it.  Nothing was up to date and you are limited on what you can actually do with it.  We traded it in for something else 2 days later and only got $20 for it.

The game is just unplayable right now. Even with the day 1 patch (which was supposed to fix the bugs, it didn't).

Races end before the race is over.

Cars crash before races start.

Game is constantly freezing.

I'd expect this if I was beta testing the game, but not if I just paid $60 for it.

Trash.

The wireless transmitter worked only intermittently right out of the box. I finally gave up on it after a few weeks and used it as a wired mouse.

The mouse completely stopped working today after less than a year, and I have absolutely no plans to replace it with anything produced by Razer. Overpriced, cheaply made, trash.

This mouse always gave me problems, and the battery life isn't that great when in use frequently. Got to the point where I had to keep it plugged in almost all the time which kinda defeats the point. If your going to use this for gaming, stick to a wired mouse.

I purchased this mouse new. When I took it out of the packaging I noted that the left click button was rather loose, but it didn't impede the performance of the mouse (other than it was a little annoying).

Within three days the mouse stopped working. I've tried everything to revive it, including trouble shooting and trying on different machines.

This is the third Razer product I've had that's turned out to be a dud. You'd think I'd have learned my lesson by now.

Can't recommend this POS.
summary: Poor quality - stopped working after 3 days.

reviewText:
This was the worst Scrabble game I have ever owned. I had to get a new game when I upgraded to Windows 7 unfortunately and I assumed this game would be like the last one I had for many years.
Don't waste your money on this item.

i don't know who designed this but it doesn't even fit into any of my controllers. i have two official microsoft controllers and one cheap no name brand wired one and this thing doesn't fit any of them properly. its a really tight fit and you have to push it very hard and even then it doesn't look like it's all the way in. i can't speak to sound quality because i couldn't even get it plugged in all the way.

I have (and absolutely love) all the previous Luxor games and didn't believe the bad reviews for this one.  I mean, how could a Luxor game possibly NOT be good?  Well, I should have listened.  Though I continue to play the earlier versions over and over, I got so bored with this one that I couldn't even make myself finish it even once.  The levels are boring, the new power-ups worthless and the bonus levels are just plain stupid.  I'm sorry to say that for me this Luxor was a huge disappoinment.

I was very excited to buy this game. My boyfriend and I tried to get it to work on 2 computers and it wouldn't. It kept giving us a weird message about release date failing. We googled it and found that this happens to A TON of people who buy the game. Someone had very complicated instructions on how to try to get it to work but it never would. Then he bought the game and downloaded it online and it still wouldn't work.

Call me stone-age, but I don't have internet at home. I ordered the game from here at work, took the game home, put the disk in, installed it, and was ready to play. But now the game won't unlock because I don't have internet access at home. I wasted all my money, all my time, to NOT play a game. There's no way around it, nothing I can download to a stick and put in my comp at home, nothing. I so loved the first game and was super psyched about playing the second. Now, I don't want either.

I have never been able to download this disc to my laptop no matter how many times I tried.  I have played Jewel Quest since it first came out and was looking forward to playing.  I would like to send it back and get a credit.

It is a shame, but this program does not work as advertised.  We have a computer running XP that is only a few years old and the graphics on it will not work with this game.  I could understand if this computer was very old, but it isn't and I did all of the updating that is possible and my drivers are up to date and it still will not run.  Have uninstalled, updated, reinstalled, etc. three times and no luck with nothing that can be done about it.  It is a shame because it looks like it would be fun.

I bought this game for my son. Needless to say we have been looking for the game for a long time and were very excited to find it on Amazon. However when we downloaded it, it would not work. There is no way that I found to contact the makers of the game. It is not my computer either because it is only a year old. I also googled the issue it has and apparently ALOT of people have the same problem. Dont buy it is all I can say total waste of money!!!!!!!

You are unable to save your progress without logging into a Games for Windows Live account. If for some reason Games for Windows Live does not work on your PC (as is my case even after 2 hours of troubleshooting) you won't be able to save your progress, making the game almost unplayable.

I payed $20 dollars for this game. First I had a download problem: "Unable to reach Amazon" or something along those lines. When it finally downloaded and installed I couldn't (and still can't) get the CD key to work. When I open games for windows live it says that I don't have a valid key even though I payed for the game and used the key that Amazon supplied me. This is absolutely ridiculous. I want my money back.
summary: I will never buy a download from Amazon ever again...

reviewText:
Do I like Shogun II?

Well, I have no idea, because I can't play it. Why can't a customer just buy a game, download it and play anymore?

To even get to the game, you have to download Steam, and go thru that.

Well, I can't get thru Steam, and I can't figure out why.

What possible gain did the dolts at Sega think they were getting when they partnered with Steam?

I loved Shogun I, Shogun II just rots away on the shelf.

It flashed green for a second so I thought it was working, but then the light went out and it wouldn't charge. I tried numerous different USB ports (including the XB360), and tried wiggling it in case it just didn't fit the controller in quite the right spot. Nope, nothing worked. Amazon was very prompt with their response to refund my money, so as always, I'm happy with them. But I'm going to spend a bit more for a product that will actually function.

I plugged this thing in and I could hear a weird audible noise coming through the tv's speakers. I suppose maybe I just got a defective one, but this thing doesn't seem to meet the standards of the ones made by sony directly. I wouldn't waste the money on this, but instead opt to buy one from a reputable company like sony, that way you know you're getting one that's not cheap. I returned mine.

I tried it on two different monitors. The first one it was shows a shattered screen for about 5 seconds and then it goes blank and it just continues like this. The second monitor it didn't work at all. Save your money and don't buy this!

After using it over the weekend, I dropped it just once. After dropping it, the mouse wouldn't track correctly. So I unplugged it and tried troubleshooting. And now, today, it's not tracking at all. I tried contacting the manufacturer of the mouse but since they're a German-based company, they couldn't do much but tell me to contact my dealer.

First.  It's a charge-only cord.  No data.  I bought this to connect our wireless controllers to a Raspberry Pi for use with an emulator.  It doesn't work for that purpose.

Like others have indicated, the connector doesn't fit tightly into the controller.  You have to carefully adjust how it is sitting in the controller to see the light come on at all.

I tried to return it but the seller seems to have a no-return policy.
summary: Charge only - the cord doesn't carry data.  Can't return it.

reviewText: I couldn't get this to work. As soon as I plugged it in, it made my 360 freeze and gave it the red ring. Luckily, as soon as I turned off the system and unplugged it, it acted fine again. Tried it a few more times and the same thing kept happening so I couldn't use it.

I am a huge fan of Tomb Raider but this game was totally different. The format has drastically changed, the character of Lara has been altered, from the beginning the creepiness factor is way up there, and the level of violence is disturbing to say the least, not to mention the foul language. I could not continue to play it I am sad to say.
summary: Totally different from previous Tomb Raider games

reviewText: Prototype 2 is a terribly boring and pathetic game. The main character acts like a moron. The story is laughable. The controls aren't very good. However I can overlook this except for the fact that the game just isn't fun. After about 20 minutes I found my mind wandering or looking at the clock. I would not waste my money on this game.

This game is terrible. Bad/mediocre graphics, the voice acting is as bad as it gets, character design is laughable,and the game play is just plain boring. I do not recommend that you waste your time playing this failed attempt at a game.

Folks, don't buy this. It was non functional when I got it. Don't do what I did. I didn't read close enough and figured this was first party nintendo.
I mean I've bought 3rd party controllers in the past and had mixed results, but I've never had one just plain broken.
summary: Folks, don't buy this. It was non functional ...

reviewText: This garbage was, when I purchased it, made up to look like an OEM Nintendo device. It's not. I bought it as a gift, so not only did I give a useless device, I gave a useless device that made me look like a clueless cheapskate.

Doesn't work with ANY of the original Wii games. It displays an error message that says THIS IS NOT A SUPPORTED CONTROLLER, PLEASE DISCONNECT. I'm sending it back... not sure why they would advertise this as working with the Wii.
summary: DON'T BUY - Non-Supported Controller doesn't work with the Wii.

reviewText: I was very disappointed in this controller. I purchased it because it was way less expensive than the authentic controller. I knew it was going to be inferior quality but it was really inferior. I only lasted about 6 weeks before it broke due to brittle wires. When I attempted to open it up and fix it the screws stripped the plastic. If you want a throw away controller(s), I guess it might be OK. I replaced this with the real deal and the real one is worth the money. I don't recommend this controller.

The battery itself seems to be in good shape, however, no matter how much you charge it, it won't let you play with your GBA for more than 20 mins. Wasted money here.... i wish there was a way to find original batteries, because this one is just not worth the time and money.

This game is advertised as a shooting gallery game, when all it is is a hunting game. You spend more time waiting for the pages to load than you do actual hunting. It gives you less than a minute to shoot anything the goes to a page that you have to wait to reload all over again. For a 10 year old it's very disappointing. Do not waste your money on this game!

I was excited to get rechargeable batteries for my controllers.  I would give these 5 stars, but the batteries do not make good contact with the charger when the controllers are set in the charging station.  I always have to fiddle around with them to get good contact.  Even then, they sometimes lose contact after a minute or two.  I gave up on this and went back to using regular batteries.
summary: Would be 5 star, but does not make good contact when in charger

reviewText: I was not impressed with the battery life.  I've had them for over 6 months and I've already had to switch back to rechargeable batteries.  It's a nice concept but they don't last.  It's definitely not worth the money.
summary: Lasted for only 6 months - try another option

reviewText: I bought this charger, because I have the same charger and batteries in white, and it works great.  I got the charger.  It is a totally different charger than the one pictured.  The batteries don't keep a charge.  You can use the controller batteries for about 10 minutes, then they die.  Put them on the charger, it goes red, then about 5 minutes later it goes green, and tells you it's charged.  Which it isn't.

First of all, the product I received was not the product shown in the picture. Though it was very similar looking and had the same features, it was not the product I thought I was ordering. Also, read the description closely (I didn't) as this product requires a USB port and does not plug into the wall. It does not come with a wall adapter either. Though it works, don't get fooled

I purchased the charging station and it worked great for about a month when one of the ports stopped charging the controller. And just a couple of months after I purchased it, it doesn't work at all. It would have been cheaper to waste the money on batteries.

Seller wouldn't do anything about the defective product as it was outside of their 30 day window. Better to spend a bit more money and purchase this at a store where they care about their customers.

We bought this with two new controllers because we wanted to save on buying batteries, and, be able to always have charged controllers. We have used this for couple of months now, and unfortunately it is no longer charging the batteries for the controllers. I contacted the seller for a replacement and was told that because the order was over 30 days old I was out of luck.
summary: DO NOT BUY POOR CUSTOMER SERVICE

reviewText: So i read the reviews and everyone seemed to like this chat pad more than the original so i ordered it. the first thing i noticed when i got it was that it feel s cheap a lot lighter than the other one, also i attached it to my controller and nothing. i tried 5 other controllers and it didn't work with any of them. it is worth it to just buy the original one. i would return it but its not worth the effort. so all in all just stay away from this chat pad.

My son lost interest in this game pretty quickly.  I'm not sure if he just didn't have the patience to get to the good part or there was no good part.  I would not recommend spending any money on this game, which is unfortunate because my son LOVES the tv show.

I did not buy it on Amazon but I was so excited to get it. It is so pathetic. It is nothing like Just Dance and the other dancing games for the Wii. Why they would not make them like that I have no clue. The moves are hard to follow. They do not flow together and you cannot see what is coming next. I am very disappointed. If they want to make another country dance, they need to seriously rethink how it looks and works. I would be ashamed to be the singers that said yes to such a low quality game.

Downloaded it from Amazon.  Could not get it to play.  Contacted Amazon and they supplied me with a way to fix the issue.  It didn't work, so I am out the money I paid for the game.  Not very happy about the situation.

This game isn't nearly as good as the PC. I wasn't expecting it to have EVERYTHING the PC game has but this has almost nothing. I was really disappointed especially considering I've had other sims games made for the DS that I enjoyed but this one wasn't anything like them. I tried playing several times but it's really hard to get into a game and get anything done. The graphics really don't make up for it either.

This is a poor quality product with three flaws.

1) the batteries only last for a few hours at full charge;
2) battery packs must be placed precisely in order to charge properly, requiring multiple adjustments to charge which can be difficult for children; and
3) one of the battery packs failed after 6 months of use.

I recommend not purchasing this product.

The review of this game was that it was the best.  I don't like this game.  You basically tell the characters which person to kill and then sit back and watch them do it.  What kind of game is this.  You don't really participate in the game.

THIS GAME IS SO FRUSTRATING. I HATE THE WAY THE JOYSTICK ASSIGNMENTS ARE DONE. SO BAD I ONLY PLAY JUST TOO SEE IF IT STILL WORKS. ALL IT HAS DONE IS SLOW DOWN MY COMPUTER. I WISH I HAD MY MONEY BACK. HATE THIS GAME.

After playing test drive unlimited where I could cruise around Hawaii and have tons of fun, this game is just an abomination. It is just plain bad. The graphics are bad, the sound is bad, the menus are terrible. If I could rate it a zero I would but one of the lowest it could get.

Rating - 0/100. Terrible game.

This product sucks. It couldn't have been a bigger waste of my money. I plugged it in to my Xbox 360 Slim (what it's meant for) and it came up with an error. The light in the middle turned red and started making a funny noise. If you want my opinion, just buy the regular Xbox 360 hard drive that you can find at Gamestop.com. It's more expensive, but it's worth it. You're guaranteed to have a good quality hard drive that's easy to return.

This game is...just...terrible.  Bad music, weak graphics, ridiculous voice acting, bad combat, and the story is, well, stupid.  If you spend more than a dollar on this game, you'd be getting ripped off.  I take that back, you'd still be getting ripped off.

All I can say is that I'm glad I borrowed this from a friend. I only played this for a few hours and I'm glad that I didn't spend my hard earned cash on this. It wasn't even worth playing for free. Avoid at any cost
summary: All the negative reviews are true

reviewText: This is not the item I ordered. On the same page you can choose the starter kit or the expansion kit. They are not the same price and do not have the same items included. As I look through other reviews it seems like a total gamble as to whether or not the one you choose will be the one you actually get...

We never had a chance to play the game. That is the only reason for the one star. I purchased the game because it had coop. Unfortunately, it DOES NOT have off-line co-op. just to be sure, I contacted the company. Bummer. We like to sit in the same room and play.

I wish companies would make more off-line coop. They are losing out on A LOT of money.

I had really high hopes for this game.  What a humongous let down.  I just about shed a tear.  I probably would have been OK if I spent $20 on this game.  WFC, this game is not.  It cannot even be mentioned in the same breath as WFC.  It makes me wonder if High Moon even developed this Transformers title.  I don't even know where to start.  Maybe I won't.  Just take my advice.  Save your money.

This game is the worst game I've played in a while. It's so dull and boring that I gave up on it before I really understood what the plot of the game was really going to be. I left her in the magic shop and never looked back.

There's a difference between being challenging and being unfair.  This game is both.  I played for about 5 hours and got pretty far but the game is just not fun to play. As an old school gamer, I refuse to watch youtube videos or other sites to figure out a game. But to progress in this game you will almost have to do one of those things.  That's not a game, that's like a job.  Games are supposed to be fun, but this game isn't.  I was able to sell the game for what I paid so it was no harm no foul.

Don't waste your money!  I have bought MANY Amazon download games in the past and I have never had a problem downloading.  Now I get an error message with this game.  It seems that I am out $5.  I have tried over and over and I still get the same message "requires elevation"  I have no idea what that means.  I will be contacting Amazon to try to get a refund.

The title says it all. This is a very low price for a very, very good older PC game. However, after downloading it we discovered it won't run on my Windows 7 64-bit system or my Vista 64-bit system. The only place it will work is on my girlfriend's Windows 7 32-bit system ... and she doesn't play first-person-shooter games. Am I disappointed? In a word, yes.

I was tired of replacing batteries in our Wii remotes, so I thought this would be a great substitute. We fully charged them when they first arrived, and for the first few weeks they worked fine, but now they won't hold a charge for any length of time. You can take them directly off the charging station when the light is blue (means they're fully charged), put them in the remote, and then the remote is out of power in about 5 minutes. Seriously, don't waste your money.

This product does not work. I placed my new chargers into the machine and within 5-10 minutes they went from red to blue. No way they could have been charged. so I took one out and tried to use it and the remote died in about 3 minutes. I put it back in the charger and it was red, 5 minutes later it was blue.

Sadly I waited too long to try this product out and it went past the return date. I tried unsuccessfully to make this work over many months, they never did...threw it away.

Do not buy this product. There was no way to even plug this into the Wii station and have it charge. It says that you can plug it into the USB port but the only place that it plugged into was the power port for the Wii. I am returning this product.

All I have to say is that when I got this thing, I followed the instructions and charged the batteries for at least 12 hours before initial use. However, ALL 4 batteries lasted no longer than 5 minutes after being charged. This thing was absolutely terrible for me.

I purchased this game for my husband for Christmas.  Since we own neither a PS3 or an XBox360 - I bought the PC version.  My husband has spent several days off on the phone with Ubisoft technical assistance, but still cannot get the game to work.  So far he has purchased and installed a new sound card, a new video card, and finally a new operating system.  Nothing has helped.  My advice - buy the game, love the game - but buy it for a game system - not for your computer.

On the plus side, I plugged it in and connected my Kinect to my PC, and everything worked. But as soon as I tried to unplug the adapter from the wall power outlet, the adapter literally fell apart, with the wall plug piece snapping off and one of the internal wires becoming disconnected. I've bought chinese-made crap plenty of times in the past and I've never had something fall to pieces so easily. Stay away.

Not only does the launcher give you nothing but a blank screen, but it will not uninstall from your computer, either.  I Googled the problem and found that EA has known about this common problem since November of 2011, and they still haven't bothered to fix it.  I don't recommend anyone wasting their money on such a crummy product from a company that cares so little for their customers.

Don't buy the game if you're running Windows 8. There's supposedly a patch that will make it work, but you pretty much have to be a computer genius to get it to run. I've tried contacting EA and they aren't very helpful. Instead, just don't bother buying the game. I wish I could get my money back.

I downloaded this a week ago and haven't successfully used it yet. I searched everywhere to find out what to change to make it run. I haven't found anything that works. The installation program is very primitive and frustrating, restarting your computer over and over again without producing anything that works. Don't buy.
summary: Essentially impossible to run on Windows 7

reviewText:
Stupid game doesn't tell you that when you start, you will be stuck in tutorial mode until you finish a quest that has dozens and dozens of steps, requiring hours of game play. Therefore, you CANNOT save any of the progress you might make until all these steps have been completed. I had to search the internet forums to discover a solution to this.
Oh, by the way...did I mention that the game is idiotic and boring?
Consider yourself warned...

This game was nothing I expected it to be.  Very disappointed.  I was looking for something along the line of the Sims 3.  If however you are looking for something with a plot to it and want to do tasks.  This is the game for you.  I just wanted something to play with my 4 year old.

It worked great for about a month.  Now, after every recharge, I have to re-seat the battery.  This is the case for both of these batteries that I bought.  I don't know about using the 3DS' charging port as this was a replacement because the charging port no longer works.  I suppose I'll just put the original battery back in and find out how much Nintendo would charge to repair the charging port.
summary: It worked great for about a month

reviewText: The product did not work when I received it. I gave it a review of 1 star since the product arrived broken and I was unable to use it due to the broken part. Other than that the product looked nice and shiny. All other parts seemed liked they would work if the one part that was not working actually did work but we may never know for sure.
summary: Product did not work at all.

reviewText:
This device looks nice. It comes with a tiny screw driver. I don't recommend using this screwdriver if you have a better (bigger) one because using a small screwdriver makes it likely that you will slip and scratch your 3DS (happened to me) or strip the screw head.

After installing this battery, it would not charge. I discovered that it does not make a reliable electrical connection with the 3DS even though it is completely flush.

I love each version of this game but I was not
able  to get it to install on Windows 7. I was
disappointed because I've played it on xbox360.
I would like to see them update the program
to work on the Windows 7. I don't know if it's
because I use a touch screen computer. I'd like
to know if others have been able to get it to
install on their systems with windows 7 on them.
summary: I love the game but it doesn't work for me on windows 7

reviewText: I was excited about this game and played for quite awhile.  I saved my city before I turned the game off and when I went back to play the next day it hadn't saved all of my progress.  I then built a little bit and tried saving it and turning the game off and on again to see if it would work or not and again it did not save anything I had done.  So I'm not playing it anymore and wish I could get my money back!!!

This didn't work for me.  I have had friends that have had success with similar kits but this particular one did not work on my Xbox.  Im sure these are pretty much hit or miss.  But I can't rate it higher because it just flat out didn't work for me.  And yes I used it properly.  My friend got it working with a different kit.

Item was NOT for the 3DS at all. I have no idea what form factor this is supposed to be, but it is NOT for the 3DS, and you will be wasting your money by buying this. Just shell out the extra $10 to buy it direct from Nintendo.

Description says this fits the 3DS and it DOES NOT FIT THE 3DS or DSI! Please do not waste your time and money on this product if you are looking for a Nintendo 3DS or DSI charger, again this one WILL NOT FIT.
summary: DOES NOT FIT Nintendo 3DS or DSI!!!

reviewText: I could not get this game to work even though I had all the system requirements. The only reason I'm writing a review is to suggest downloading the trial version first. That way you won't be buying something that doesn't work.

The game is very short and is good for only online play. Some characters are better than others but you can not select the same character every time because two people can not be the same person at the same time. Over all i think the shortness of the game was my main disappointment. As a reference, I am a gamer that doesn't like call of duty games.
summary: You get what you pay for.

reviewText:
This is just the worst Resident Evil Game so far. I played like 30 minutes and I felt like I was playing a mock version of Gears of War.

There are no words to describe how awful this game is. Resident Evil Revelations is so much better than this.
summary: Worst Resident Evil game so far!!!

reviewText: Not only is this piece of crap official, it doesn't work. I plugged it in and played Skyrim for about an hour before it started overheating and producing a noxious scent. My dad looked it over and took it apart and confirmed that it is, indeed, a piece of crap and a waste of money. Do not get unless you want your entire house on fire.

Didn't know this until after I paid and downloaded...

Graphic Cards supported

ATI Radeon HD 2400, 2600, 2900GT
ATI Radeon HD 3450, 3650, 3850, 3870, 3870 X2, 3870 Crossfire
ATI Radeon HD 4800, 4850, 4850 Crossfire, 4870, 4870 X2
Nvidia GeForce 8400 GS, 8500 GT, 8600 GTS, 8800 GT, 8800 GTS, 8800 SLI
Nvidia GeForce 9600 GT, 9800 GT, 9800 GTX
Nvidia Geforce GTX 260, GTX 280, GTX 280 SLI
summary: Check your System Specs- Especially Graphics Card

reviewText: I normally like the Tomb Raider games. That is, until I bought this one.  It looks nothing like the others, plays nothing like the others, and if I had thought about it, I would have tried to get my money back.  Everything is in 'tiny-ville'.  What I mean is, the characters, the scenes, nothing is up close like the other games. It's like you're playing it from above. I wouldn't waste my time on this if I were you.

Seems like a good product until we tried to use it for the 5th time.  Doesn't work at all.  I have tested it and yup, it's shot.  Waste of money.  Do not buy this if you expect it to work more than a few days.

I bought this for my son so he could play Zelda. We didn't use it right away, but it doesn't work and it's past the return date. We borrowed one from a neighbor and it worked fine. I should have checked it right away.

I was very unsatisfied with this item. The description on the item was misleading, I thought it was for Wii and I received it and it was for Xbox. Upon receiving this item I returned it the same day for a refund and purchased it elsewhere. I would recommend this item but be carefully when reading the descriptions, if possible try and purchase from a store rather than from online to insure you get the one you want.

I bought this last fall and it worked for a little while (about a month) and then it quit recognizing the remotes.  I thought the new game that I bought was broke but eventually realized that it was the sensor bar.  At first it would work once in awhile after messing with it for 30 minutes but now it doesn't work at all.  I thought it was a good deal when I bought it, but it turns out it was a waste of money because I had to pay for the piece of junk and now I have to pay for a Nintendo one too.

I bought this game for my husband because he has wanted it for a long time and the price was finally right at $20 vs. $50. He played it and played it but kept getting hung up in the same location. He read some other online reviews that stated the same problem. He got so frustrated with this game that he hasn't played it in months! I wished I hadn't bought it.

I really wanted to love this game because I had heard so many great things about it. But, without an objective... It just didn't keep my interest. I found it so boring and repetitive. I am sure it was better when you could actually play online with friends. I do not recommend this game.

I couldn't play my PS3 for a few weeks because my HD tv wasn't available so i trusted on the regular video cable, but oh surprise it didn't work, it wasn't the cable itself but the cable video port in the PS3 ! I don't live in the US so there was no way for me to exchange my PS3 for a new one, a few weeks later I got my HD tv back and I could play with my PS3 using the HD cable

if you want to play online, you will need to pay $10 for a code so add that to the price.  Something I did not expect. I didn't return it since it wasn't the sellers fault.  I will not buy another EA game.  Oh and if you want to share it with your family or friends, they will also need to pay $10 to activate their account.  So if you have 3 ppl in your family who wants to play they need to either use the same account, or pay that $10 fee.
summary: Cough up andother $10 if you buy used

reviewText: I ABSOLUTELY HATE THIS!  The guitar didn't even work!  NOT a happy customer AT ALL!  Do NOT buy this!  Save your money and go elsewhere.  I originally bought this hoping to get a decent guitar for a fair price.  Save your time and pay a little extra for a guitar that actually works.  I'm so disappointed.  I'm shipping it back immediately.  Should have listened to the reviews!  DO NOT BUY THIS!

This game was a huge waste of money. The framerate drops while collecting things in the mountains periodically. In addition, once you start growing large amounts of crops, the framerate slows to a crawl. If that wasn't enough, the game freezes at least 2-3 times per season.

The game itself is fun. Buy the DS version. It doesn't have all the annoying issues.

I am a huge Harvest Moon fan, but I found this to be an utter disappointment. Natsume needs to get it together!

The game would not connect to the EA servers which is a requirement to run the game.  I spent hours re-downloading, contacting EA support and working through the troubleshooting steps, but it never connected.  This was a total frustration and not worth the $10.  In fact, they should pay me for all the wasted time I spent on this game that never worked.
summary: I wish I could give 0 stars.

reviewText: I ordered this to keep my Kinect Sensor out of reach of my 1 year old.  I went to go put it on top of my tv, and before I even got the sensor on it, the foam on the back came unglued.  Without the foam, there is nothing keeping the mount and sensor from falling off.  I tried to reattach it but it came right back off.  I have since put it back in the box and have not used it.  I'll look elsewhere for something that's going to work better.
summary: Set-up is simple, but did not work well for me.

reviewText: This product arrived broken and unusable.  The prongs that are supposed to grasp on to the Kinect camera did not work at all.  I'm the kind of person that is always looking for a good bargain.  In this case, you get what you pay for.

Unless you own an X-360 Ki-Nect I don't recommend this product. The pictures showed a different item than what I actually got. It is a cheap knock off, and the box says it is for X-360 Ki-Nect. The kinect sensor fits on it but doesn't latch on securly. Also the product is cheap and not at all what I was expecting. I will be returning this product for a refund and I will urge Amazon to stop selling this item.

DO NOT BUY... unless you own an X-360 Ki-Nect of course.
summary: Horrible knock-off product, DO NOT BUY!

reviewText: Do not waste your money on this product. This charging station is very poor. I've had it less than a yr. For the first month it worked great, after that it stopped charging 4 remotes. I could only charge two at a time. Now it will NOT charge at all and have to buy a new charging station.

This is ABSOLUTE JUNK...it is very difficult to get all the remotes to charge at once, and now a few months later 2 battery packs won't hold a charge at all. The other ones that do die very quickly. JUNK JUNK JUNK JUNK JUNK

Ordered this a few months before Christmas, and kept it away in a closet as a gift for my kids. Once we opened it on Christmas day, we put all the batteries in the remotes and put them on the dock only to realize that the cord was not in the box with it. Im Pretty sure it's way too late to do something about it now.
summary: didnt come with cord, don't know if it works or not!

reviewText: While in the picture it does show a USB charger, it does not state that it does not come with a wall plug. Perhaps it's my fault for not inspecting the pictures carefully enough, but one expects a dock to come with a wall plug, not a USB connection. I may return the product if it does not work well.

I have a large screen (2560 x 1600). When I started this game it went instantly into full-screen mode and I got a pop-up box telling me that I would have to switch to a lower resolution to play it. I couldn't switch out of this screen or use my mouse, and there was no way to set the game to a windowed mode. I eventually closed the game with command-W.

Negatives: Badly programmed, irritating music, takes over your computer.
Positives: It was free.
summary: Incompatible with a screen larger than 1920 x 1048

reviewText:
It just didn't work on my mac-book pro retina. Does any call of dutys work on macs? If they did I'd buy it. I'm just a casual user looking for the most basic version of the game so I thought I'd give this older cheaper version a try but it didn't work. After i realized it didn't work I found a few other reviews who had the same problem. ****AMAZON WAS GREAT AND REFUNDED MY PAYMENT IMMEDIATELY. I WAS SHOCKED ON HOW QUICKLY AMAZON DID IT.
THANK YOU AMAZON.
summary: It just didn't work on my macbook pro retina

reviewText:
I have heard a lot about Call of duty games, and I really wanted to have one for a long time. So, to start with, I bought this product (Call of Duty 2) hoping that I was buying a wonderful product. However, to my surprise, the graphics of this game is horrible, just like watching a cartoon of early 80s! I am very disappointed.... may be I should try Call of Duty 4! I do not know whether I will buy the 4 or not... :(
Please do not buy this product if you love good graphics!

i'm a big fan of civ games.  i know that there's a lot of back and forth regarding the qualities of this game - but for me the sheer bugginess of the game makes it pointless.  the game frequently freezes up and crashes.  it's almost impossible to play unless you are willing to save constantly and go back and replay.  i'm new to macs and this is my first mac game.  i've never experiences a piece of software that was so buggy.  it's really a shame that they released it in this state.
summary: what's the point due to bugs

reviewText:
Once in campaign mode, the program crashes to the desktop at the end of every turn.  It didn't do this at first, but got worse as the game progressed.  I'll check and see if this keeps up in other game modes.

I like the game...but I'm leery of buying any others from this company.

Beware of buying games like this. I found that this game did not have the code for me to play online. I had to pay $10 on PS3 Network to get the ability to play online with friends.

The game itself is quite entertaining and visually appealing both on single-player and multi-player modes.

This game is very slow and the controls are confusing at the beginning.  If you are not the most patient person in the world then I would not recommend it.  The concepts seem really interesting but I was never patient enough in the game to really accomplish anything.

The game cost next to nothing so I figured I'd give it a shot. I read all the negative reviews, and pretty much all of them happened to me. I had download issues and password issues to the point where I have not as of yet been able to actually play the game itself. Glad I didn't pay full price.

I downloaded and installed the expansion without a hitch, but when I try to start the game I get an error saying I'm not connected to the internet. While I do have a slow connection I don't understand why I'm getting this error for an offline game. EA needs to get their act together. This is ridiculous.

I just purchased this yesterday and digitally downloaded it, it won't run or update because it's saying The Sims 3 is incompatible with the other add-on games. I purchased all of the games at the same time and digitally downloaded all but one of them. I have no clue what's going on and will call Amazon for a refund.

I bought this product yesterday, and I am still trying to download it to my computer.  Have I mentioned that my MacBook Pro is only 15 hours old?  I would never purchase a downloadable game again.  I would rather drive to the store and load it in less than an hour.  I haven't even gotten to the activation code or playing of the game yet, but this was enough to make the rating 1 star!

I waited 8 hours for the game to download and now it has an error. There is no help available to figure it out, so I had to email customer service.  Looks like I should have read the reviews, stay away from this game! What a terrible waste of time and money!

I played the game for a while and then my computer broke. I got a new one and tried to download the game and the system kept saying that the file was corrupted. I tried to download it on three different computers thinking that maybe my new laptop was the one that wasn't working but it still wouldn't download and it still said that the file was corrupted. I wasted my money and I am really disappointed. I had it for maybe three months before it broke.
summary: Had it for three months and then it broke

reviewText: This COD sucks. The guns are terrible. They all sound the same. You can't ever tell if you're using a AK-47 or a SMG. Just go back to Black Ops 1 or forward to Black Ops 2 and pretend this COD never happened.

I've played COD games for quite a while, and I've enjoyed them.  Unfortunately, this game is just too much like MW2.  I'm glad I purchased a used copy at Gamestop.  They have a great return policy for "pre-owned" games.

This is a review of the PC game.  I bought Battlefield and it looked amazing, but I was still excited for MW3 and thought it would blow BF3 out of the water.  Not even close.  This game feels like it came out 6 years ago compared to BF3.

If you've played any of the other CoD games, you'll be surprised by this game. And by, you'll be surprised, I mean that you won't even be able to tell that it's a separate game in the series. It's MW2, with basically some new maps/skins. MW2 was same as CoD: World at War, etc. $60 is way too much to spend on what equates to an expansion. It even still uses DX9c, and looks like a terrible console port, yet again. Don't waste your time on this one.
summary: CoD: Just Like Every Other One

reviewText: I can't overstate how disappointed I was in this game.  This has to be the most overhyped terrible game ever made. Please don't waste your money on this game go buy Batman Arkham City or Modern Warfare 2 which is superior in every way.

First off, I'm reviewing the multiplayer aspect of this game because that's what most people are interested in.

Despite hearing some of the bad reviews for this game, I gave it a shot and purchased it because it's COD.  But let me tell you, every negative review is absolutely spot on.  This game feels old and tired and is just an extension of MW2.  There is very little that is new or novel in this game compared to MW2.  If that's what you're looking for, then by all means get this game.

I didn't believe the other reviewers who said this game was bad. I thought that they were just expecting too much. I was WRONG. This game is bad. There are few highlights. I do not recommend it to anyone at any price.
summary: Worst FPS that I've ever played

reviewText:
Damn, I wish I could have a refund. This game completely sucks, it's slow and hard to play. Makes no sense whatsoever and is simply difficult to do anything in the game. I couldn't even figure out how to finish peeing at the urinal or get out of that stupid locker room. LAME!!

Don't waste your money, people. Lame game. SO LAME.

It's finally here. I pre-ordered it since I was a fan of Duke Nukem 3D. This game puts the entire series to shame. I've tried to finish the single player in 4 separate occasions and it's becoming more of a chore to beat it.

I hate extended fights in low lighting; it's the only aspect in games that makes me nauseous. It's like the developers were too lazy to add detail so they made the scene dark and this game is filled with it.

The only thing I can recommend is for you to stay away from this game.
summary: Better as a joke than a game

reviewText: I played original duke nukem games and i was really excited when a friend told me that duke nukem forever is finally out...i bought it right away without reading any reviews and now i want my money back :( this game has very little of what the duke nukem games are supposed to have. Yes, graphics are bad, but graphics were bad in all duke nukem games and yet they were excellent games... this game is just missing 'duke nukem' spirit.
summary: NOT the duke nukem you expect

reviewText: I tried installing this game and although it says it is compatible with Windows 7, I could not play it.  The game wants me to adjust my screen resolution, which I did and still it would not play on my computer.

Bottom line: If you have the choice, do not inflict this game upon yourself or others. There are much better options out there.

Games should be fun. Resistance: Burning Skies is not.
The story is virtually non-existent. Game play is generic at best. Graphics are OK, but not near what you should expect from a Vita game. The overall experience is just mediocre.

Avoid this game at all costs. This game has an issue with corrupt save files on the PS3. Just recently my game froze while playing. The only option I had was to turn my console off. After turning it back on and starting the game back up, I was horrified to see the intro video playing again. It turns out my save file was corrupted and all my progress was lost. So that was hours of work down the drain. Save your time and money for something more worthwhile and stay away from this game.
summary: Corrupt save file issues on the PS3

reviewText: I don't know why this game is getting all these good reviews it sucks. The story line is stupid and the graphics are sub par. If you like anime and cartoons you may enjoy this game but it wasn't for me.

MOST PEOPLE WHO LOVE TO PLAY THESE GAMES CAN'T AFFORD TO PAY SUCH OUTRAGIOUS PRICES. THIS IS ABSOULTY OVER THE TOP. I'M SO UPSET OVER THIS GREED I'M NOT SURE I WILL EVEN BUY THE GAME. IF I COULD I WOULD ENCOURAGE ALL GAMERS TO REFUSE TO BUY. SHAME ON YOU GUYS.

RICHARD

P.S. I'TS JUST A GAME!!!!!
summary: THESE PEOPLE MUST BE OUT OF THEIR TREE

reviewText: I have lots of racing games. The racing engine is not at all well developed. The cars do not handle well, as well as steer atrociously. The graphics are what I would have expected in a game 7 or 8 years ago. Seems like EA racing games have been going downhill for a while now.

Could not install because it said that we had to make an account and when we tried to sign up, it said that we already had an account with our e-mail address so we couldn't sign in and we couldn't load game.  Very disappointing.

I couldn't play this game...it didn't even download to my computer, even though my operating system meets the requirements. I'll think twice before clicking "download" next time for a game I would like to play

The only "fun" part about this game is you can play with some characters from the Nintendo Universe. This game is basically a video game version of Monopoly. It takes a long time to play. It is similar to Mario Party WITHOUT the mini-games...

It's a shame it did not work not even once. Bad luck for me. I'm really sad and disappointed! And the worst part is that I will be on another country for a long time, like 4 months, so I will not be able to ask for a replace or refund.
summary: I got the blue blinking light of DEATH out of the box!

reviewText: I had heard a lot of good reviews about this game. It's old but I figured I'd give it a try. I wandered around in the game for about an hour and noticed moving around was difficult, and I got bored. I haven't touched it since and that was 2 months ago.

I had huge expectations for this game after absolutely loving Heavy Rain, but it was a huge disappointment. The controls were awkward, the storyline was very hard to follow at times, and the characters were not even in the same league as Heavy Rain.
summary: but it was a huge disappointment. The controls were awkward

reviewText: I purchased this game because I loved the original Need For Speed: Most Wanted, but this was nothing like it. The game doesn't carry on the spirit of the previous one, and they just got the game all wrong.

this game could of been better, i think its not worth the price it should be less. i brought this game like about a week ago an i was not impressed with this game, i thought it would be better than what it was but i guess i was wrong.
summary: don't buy this game unless ur a kid

reviewText: I cant believe I paid money for this. You literally do the same thing over and over till the end of the game. It is way too repetitive. I was highly disappointed and wouldnt recommend this game to anyone.

It works great. The only problem is it doesn't have the shoulder buttons. How does a Microsoft controller not have all the buttons?  I don't know but every game I have to use this controller with requires those buttons so this is useless. I suppose it's my fault I didn't check to see if all the buttons were there before I bought it.

I purchased as a gift for Christmas and although it was what I thought someone might want, they had tried one and didn't like it so I had to send it back unopened and pay to have it shipped back.  I must add it is the first time I have had to pay to return an item, but it was a gift.

I absolutely hate this game.  It's fun through most of the game, but the final levels are virtually impossibe to beat.  It's so frustrating to play the same level over and over again, getting nowhere.  This is the worst game ever.
summary: Worst Game Ever - Impossible to Beat

reviewText:
You cannot play this game out of the box.  My husband contacted support and had to pay $10 for the base license but the license still doesn't work.  It looks like it is going to cost $13/month to play this.  Hopefully we can get it to work without the monthly cost, but we are not sure.  Still working through support on this.

If you are interested in this game, check it out online and see what your options are, but do not buy this game!

I used to keep my 10 year old child away from these kind of games, but now that they have cute little pandas in it I think it's a safe bet to say that kids will enjoy this. My 10 year old has no complaints!

This game is not in English version, I do not understand anything. I tried to contact the seller but there is no way you can get a hold of them. Please do not buy this product, they not even tell you that is not an English version. I will tried to get a refund on this product. So mad.....

This is hands down the worst game I have ever played. I loved all the other Fable games, this is nothing like any of them. I played for an hour and all I did was steer a horse down a predetermined road. What a waste. I would have had more fun spending this money on a pile of dirt.

I don't want to have a limit on how many words I have to write in a review, that is one of the reasons I don't take the time to do these on amazon.com.  I have a lot to write and I don't feel like writing lengthy reviews on each of them. there for don't expect me to write anything about your co.
summary: rip off don't buy from them

reviewText: This is, without a doubt, the worst Fable game I have ever played. One of the worst videogames I have ever played, period. I love the other Fable games. I don't know what the developers were thinking. The gesture control is quirky and very frustrating. Don't waste your money on this title.

After spending three days trying to get Far Cry 3 to run, I finally gave up. Ubisoft is no longer on my list of preferred game producers. I have both Far Cry and Far Cry 2 and they are great games. Far Cry 3 was a waste of money.
summary: Far Cry 3 is a no show.

reviewText: I got this game for my boyfriend's birthday. He tried to install it and the computer did not recognize it even as a disc. Complete waste of my time! I did get a full refund, but it put a damper on his birthday.
summary: Thank you for giving me a blank disk

reviewText: This game is so cheap because it is so broken that you can't finish it. There are serious bugs in it that EA isn't going to fix, so you literally get to a point where you need to do something to move on and can't, so you are stuck.

FEWER GAMES!!!! NO BOXING!!! I DEFINITELY GOING TO RETURN THIS GAME. IT'S A TOTAL RIP-OFF... THE FIRST VERSION IS WAY BETTER. WHY DO THEY HAVE TO MAKE A SECOND VERSION THAT IS WAY BELOW THE FIRST VERSION??? JUST SAYING...

What can I say that hasn't already been said?

If you quit WoW thanks to the awful turn the game took since WotLK, don't bother coming back. The game is a complete joke now. MoP is nothing more than the same crap that made you quit the game in the first place.

Resident Evil 5 was the only game I ever played and completed every achievement. I thought it was a great game and have it both on PS3 and Xbox 360. My hopes for RE6 were high - really high. Unfortunately they were not realized: This game is a huge downgrade from RE5. If I could get my money back I would. It's so sad that at this point the movies are better than the games. The controls are clunky, the graphics are sub-par, and the story is one big fracture. RIP RE.

When I pre-ordered this game I had high expectations for it. I must say that it fell way short in terms of multiplayer satisfaction. This game has a lot of bugs, few multiplayer maps and overall bad graphics for a PS3 game. With EA and Frostbite headlining in the game this should have been a much better game. Considering that the previous MOH title was actually a pretty fun game, this falls way short of my expectations and I will be getting rid of it as soon as possible.

Unfortunately this game is only in the English language.
My kids do not really understand the language, so it really is difficult to understand.
If your children do not speak English, I do not recommend purchasing this game

The graphics are good but that is all.  Game play is horrible.  The fact that you can't just walk or run and point to where you want to go is ridiculous.  The game was so difficult to control that my granddaughter gave up on it.

Don't waste your money on this game.  To move children have to hold their arm up and move it in the direction they want to go.  The game is not responsive and children get frustrated.  It is really bad and companies shouldn't release this trash into the marketplace.

Bought this to try with NBA Baller beats. http://www.amazon.com/NBA-Baller-Beats-Xbox-360/dp/B007XUQXL0
Unfortunately it does not work well at all. I'd return it, but it doesn't seem to be worth the effort.
summary: Bought this to try with NBA Baller beats. http ...

reviewText: I love the statue it is big and well detailed. But as soon as I started the game the game froze and I had to reboot my ps3. I won't be playing the game until they release the 1.4 patch and hopefully this fixes the problems
summary: BUGGY LAGGY GAME BUT STATUE IS GREAT!!

reviewText: The game worked for a week. Then we got some message that it needed to be reinstalled. Yeah. We tried that multiple times and can't get it to go past the title screen at this point. What a waste of money.

The only reason why I bought this was because it clearly states that it is MAC compatible.
