However the disk it comes with is a mini disk that shouldn't be inserted into a mac drive, since there is no tray. The controller is useless to me now as I tried a million ways to get it to work and nothing worked.

It seems like a good product, if only I could get it to work on my mac!! If anyone has a solution for this - please let me know.
I will be returning this for one that is MAC compatible.

Buyer beware. Amazon has this advertised as the US version of the game... but what they send you is the European version. I've tried to get the correct game from them TWICE now and I'm still getting the wrong version.
summary: Have been sent the European version twice

reviewText: We have been trying unsuccessfully for nearly a week to get this to run on our PC using Windows 7. We have tried every tip we can find online to no avail. If you have the option of purchasing a different platform (for example, Playstation 3, Xbox 360), we would recommend that you try that instead.
summary: Can't get it to run properly

reviewText: So apparently I wasted my money on this game, because no matter what I do it will not launch. Lots of other people are also having this problem, but none of the alleged fixes I've found on the internet work. Rockstar has, of course, done nothing to fix this issue. I'm never buying one of their games again unless they release a patch or a solution for this problem.

Turns out, I don't like GTA... Not even a little bit.  I thought I'd try it because I hadn't ever and it seems like it would be fun, but I'm really, really not a fan of any part of it.  But hey, I tried it.

This game doesn't allow you to choose a difficulty setting. If you're a complete novice, you're expected to play at the same level as the seasoned pros. I'm new to video games and bought this one since it was rated so highly, but after trying a ridiculous number of times to succeed in just the first two missions, I realized I wouldn't be able to enjoy this game. I would suggest other novice/beginner players save their money.

343 Industries has one last chance with me as the Halo series has been getting worse with every release.  Halo 4 isn't just bad for a Halo game, it's just bad for any game.  The enemies are annoying and uninteresting.  The scenery leaves much to be desired.  I can't think of anything I liked about this game and I played it through until the ending.  It was a chore.
summary: Total fail.  Stick with Halo 1, 2, 3, ODST, and Reach.

reviewText:
I had high expectations for Halo 4, but was bitterly disappointed.
Games should be entertaining and fun.
Took me a whole 9.25 hours to get through the entire game.
Graphics are good, but that's about it.
Maybe a 5 year old could have fun with it.

My son was really excited to get this game last Friday. Unfortunately, his enjoyment has been tempered by the extreme bugginess of the release. Since he made it to the 6th year, the game has crashed constantly. We finally called customer service this morning and were informed that it has been recalled. We will be sent a new disk in the mail. I am happy with how WB has handled the issue, but if I were in the market to buy the game, I'd hold off until it's clear that the new release is less buggy.
summary: Fun, but bugs are ruining enjoyment

reviewText: I am not happy with this product at all. I played it and did not enjoy it at all. I didn't know or like any of the songs on it, which made it harder to enjoy excercising with this product. The seller makes it hard and costly to refund.

I am so angry!! I ordered this for my son under the impression that it was the original game - not a Nintendo Selects version. If I wanted the Nintendo Selects version, I would have ordered the copy on Amazon that only costs $21 - I wouldn't have paid $36 for the same thing! This will likely be the last time I purchase a video game off of Amazon. I've gotten nothing but bootleg versions of games and when I purchase what appears to be an original game, I receive Nintendo Select versions.
summary: I am so angry!! I ordered this for ...

reviewText: This game falls incredibly short of its predecessor. I played about halfway through and I don't think I'll continue to play till the end. Do yourself a favor and go play the original Luigi's Mansion instead of this game.

I like the first 2 Just Dance games.  They are fun and entertaining for my daughter and I.  I'm just not sure why they would put a song like "premiscuous" on here with a game that so many kids play.  I'm skipping this one and buying Just Dance 4.  I don't want to have to explain what that means to my 7 year old daughter.  If you are not buying this for kids then it would be okay.

I love this game, but it got corrupted twice and could not proceed in the game. I got an error message every time and could not proceed in the game. the game is very corruptible. it's a very fun game, but i think they need to make sure that error messages, freeze, and power offs do not happen.

I purchased this game for my son TWICE.  Each time it worked for a very short while and then froze.  I ended up returning it twice.  Then I bought it for him at GameStop and it works fine.  I have never had a problem with a product purchased from Amazon before but I thought I should let you know in case the shipment is defective.

This product was a christmas present for my 14 year old grand daughter. She informed me that this product did not meet her expectations as she attempted to use them and nothing came through in the sound department and all she could hear was the sound coming from the speakers on the television. I am trying to figure out how to contact someone to return them and possibly get something that isn't on the wireless type.

I bought these headphones a few months ago for my boyfriend for his birthday. He misplaced the USB adapter, and now Sony is telling me that I have to buy another pair because they do not sell replacement adapters. This means that the headset is now useless, and I might as well throw them in the trash. I will definitely not be buying another set of Sony Headphones. If you are buying these headphones and lose things regularly, stay away from these.

The headset worked pretty well. The range was pretty short though. Another thing I didn't like is that it doesnt come with a charging wire. You need to buy one if you don't have one.
I would have been pleased with it if it didn't STOP WORKING AFTER 2 DAYS!!. Did not want to go through the hassle of returning it, so lost 90$ on this thing.

I received these for my birthday, they worked for about 1 hour then stopped.  They won't charge and no lights appear on the headset.  I sent them to Sony for repair.  3 weeks later I get them back and same problem.  This time they worked for about 2 hours then stopped.  No lights, no sound, nothing.  DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME OR MONEY
summary: Very poor - breaks at the slightest touch

reviewText: EA does not support this game any longer. When trying to install the game, it will fail as it tries to authenticate with EA. Their is no work around for this and EA will not assist in getting the game to work. If you buy this game you will NOT be able to play it or get a refund as downloadable games do not have a refund policy.

I was able to download the program but it wouldn't run or anything. I have tried downloading the program 3 times and it wouldn't work. If I could please get help on trying to download the game that would be great, if i can't I would like to have a full refund please.

I bought this game in February and have had nothing but trouble trying to play it. The issue is the EA account that is required to launch the digital download version of the game. I am extremely disappointed in not being able to return the game for a refund, since I have never been able to play it. I will NEVER purchase a game from Amazon using their digital download service again.

I used to play Trivial Pursuit all the time (referring to the original board game), this was a far cry.
By far one of the worst games I've ever played, my husband agrees. Questions are ridiculous, the format is weird. I will give it another shot, if I change my opinion, I will update my review (it's only fair).
summary: Glad I didn't spend too much on this

reviewText: This is a confusing mess.  My daughter and I are still trying to figure out what the point of this game is.  I can't even describe what you're supposed to do with the characters you create or why they say it's better with Kinnect.  We are going to trade this for something else.

I got this game for Christmas and right away i started to have a little problem starting the game. After trying a few times i finally got the game to start. Then a few days ago starting the game got so bad now i can't start it at all. It pretty much stinks because i started to play and make a town,loving the game soo much and now i cant play it at all! I have no idea what the problem is, spending most of the day trying everything! So anyway this game was amazing until of course it stopped working :(

I've bought all of the other Sims games, and they have worked just fine.  I install this one, and all of a sudden everything freezes, and the game is crashing.  I was hoping the new patch would fix it, but now it's acting worse! I tried contacting EA games support, and they haven't responded.  My problem is not unique, there are tons of other people out there who have the same problem... and so far there isn't a solution :(
summary: It would be great if it worked

reviewText: I am wondering if I am the only one that this game has been a total bummer for me. All the animals are contored. I am so bummed..does anyone have any idea how to fix this problem? I have unistalled and reinstalled and still it is tha same thing. I really would like some help from anyone who might have the same problem and how to fix it. Thanks

Works just like it should. Not much else to say really. Seems to work just as good as the original.

EDIT: I only use this to test it when I got it, and it worked then, but now I actually tried using it again for the second time and it does not work at all. Tried it with several controllers and none will work with it. Many other reviews also say it worked at first and then stopped shortly after.

We bought this for our grandchildren.  I guess our imagination was better than the game, because once we began to play it, we found it was difficult to navigate and we could not see the beautiful pictures from around the world.  I had hoped it would be educational for the kids, but it was just a frustration.  Sorry National Geographic, but you could have done better with this one.

Bought this switch about 2 months ago. Box was way too big but whatever. More importantly it didn't work for me at all. I got disconnected from every game I tried on Xbox 360 and PC.

Length was alright at least but that didn't do me any good. You can take your chances with it but as far as I'm concerned it's garbage.

I started the game and it showed me an unskippable three minute video on how to put a rubber jacket on my WiiMote.  Unfortunately I wasn't paying enough attention, and instead of putting the rubber jacket on my WiiMote, I ended up swallowing it and had to go to the hospital.  Luckily I could come back to the video to watch it at any time.

This game is terrible. I cannot even get it to work properly. It loads incredibly slowly and does not allow you to actually do anything. I have been sitting here just watching the game load...yay! I am not happy with this game and will be contacting the seller in order to attempt to obtain a refund! Do not buy this game. There is some kind of glitch with the game.

Not sure what happened with this one.  The first game was great, but the story in this game proceeds as if it had no ties to the first game at all.  Truthfully, I couldn't even finish it.  What a waste.

I bought this... it worked correctly all through the installation process. But when it came to actually running the game, the serial number that Amazon provided didn't work at all. EA says that the serial isn't in their database. I emailed Amazon for a replacement serial and am still awaiting their reply. What a waste of time and money.

Don't waste your time, just go for the legit xbox wired usb controller. It might be a little more but it's worth it in the long run. I used this thing maybe 2 times with a couple hours of use and went to use it again a few days ago and it just kept connecting and disconnecting.

TLDR: DONT BUY
summary: Stopped working after  a couple uses.

reviewText: We returned this item. It does NOT work. The wireless feature of this controller never worked despite the battery being fully charged. Looking at other customer reviews, it looks like others experienced the same problem. The only good thing that came out of this whole experience was that Amazon allowed us to return this item for a refund.

I sadly have to give this a 1-star rating, not because I didn't like it, but because it simply does not last. Used by an adult, I have had two of these controllers stop working. As others have mentioned, it works great and then just suddenly stops - as if it has shorted out. The first one lasted almost a year. The second lasted six months. It's too bad because I really like the design feel.

I purchased this game for my 8 year old daughter... she has been asking for it for over two months. After receiving it she was very excited but shortly thereafter very disappointed. The graphics are horrible in comparison to some of the other games for the DS.

I COMMENTED RECENTLY ABOUT HOW BAD THE BIDDING WAS FROM THE NORTH HAND.  I JUST HAD THE TERRIBLE EXPERIENCE OF HAVING THE NORTH HAND OPEN BIDDING WITH ONE NO TRUMP.  THE HAND HAD 16 HIGH CARD POINTS. I HAD 17 HIGH CARD POINTS AND BID FOUR NO TRUMP. THE NORTH HAND PASSED OUT. WHEN THE HAND WAS PLAYED ALL THIRTEEN TRICKS WERE TAKEN. I THINK THIS CARD GAME IS TRASH AND SHOULD NOT BE SOLD TO ANYONE ELSE.
summary: OMAR SHARIF BRIDGE 5 ISN'T WORTH ONE STAR

reviewText: I should have listened to what the other reviews were saying with regard to the D-pad. When you hit the "right" button, it sporadically changes between the "top" and "bottom" buttons, and ironically, hardly registers the "right" button. Don't buy this item. You're better off with anything else.
summary: Do not buy. D-pad is Useless.

reviewText:
Well about the only positive thing I can say about the controller is that I received it. The D-Pad is really stiff and the right and down buttons do not work and the Y button does not work.

So now I have to decide if I want to waste my time to re-package and send out this awful product or just say forget it and waste money.

This product is trash... It even had a QC (Quality Control) sticker on it saying it "Passed". Don't waste your time or money. Stay away from this product.

Not sure if mine was defective or not, but the buttons has to be pressed down pretty hard for them to work. The joystick was either too sensitive or didn't work when sending messages. I also tried plugging in the PS3 cable for a better connection, but that didn't help either. Over all not very happy with this product. I sent it back and got a refund.
summary: but the buttons has to be pressed down pretty hard for them to work

reviewText: This game has so many issues I don't even know where to start. From the horrible controls to the frustrating calibration issues, this game is a mess. Waste of money. I will be returning due to calibration issues. Worst game I've ever seen. Ever!

If you have 3-4 hours and steady hands you may, may get to calibrate the gun. But I doubt it, what a waste of time and money. I have no idea how they could have released this to the public. I guess they were hoping people would not bother to return it and throw it away. It should be thrown away but I will count on Amazon to stand behind this junk and go to the trouble of returning it. Wow, what a loser

I bought this puzzle board game because I wanted to update my old one.  It doesn't have as many games in it and as many options.  It also has the same glitches in it as the old one.  If it's supposed to work with Windows 7 why haven't the glitches been removed. I won't use it.  I took it off and put my old one back on.

This was the worst purchase I have ever made.  I tried downloading this game twice and it still does not work properly.  I am now searching for an actual CD game that I can install on my computer.  THIS IS TRULY NOT WORTH THE MONEY!!!!
summary: This was the worst purchase I have ever made

reviewText: This does not work on my computer. I need for you to please refund because I am going to have to uninstall it. I had to buy the disk to install on my computer. It seems that I am unable to download programs from Amazon anymore.

This could be a GREAT game, but for me it doesn't work the way it is supposed to.  I have to set it up every time I log in for the first time in a day.  It also doesn't let me in the game at all until I tell the pop up that it CAN make changes to my computer.  Too bad that the first 2005 version was so great and this one is so BAD.

This product is awful.  Not even one star!!!  I just bought a new computer and decided to purchase the 2012 version.  It doesn't even fill the screen of my new computer.  The graphics are terrible.  I have already removed it from my computer and have lost the money I paid for it since it was a download.  I previously had an old version for Windows 98 and enjoyed it for many years including when I upgraded to Windows XP.  DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THIS PRODUCT.  It's pure garbage.

Meh!
This game takes over your computer.  What they don't tell you before you buy is that you cannot play the game off the disc. You have to down load Steam that takes over your computer and then try to figure out where the game is and how to play.
It's a big waste of time and money. As well as privacy issues.
summary: You need to join some 3rd party site to play

reviewText: PC game run by Steam.  I had an old account for Steam.  I tried to reopen the account to no avail.  I mean I tried everything possible.  I must have spent over 2 hours of MY time.  I cannot even open a new account.  I cannot play the game.  It went in the garbage.  I wish Amazon would put an alert on all games run by Steam.  Never again will I buy a game run by this anti-American company.

I was hoping this would fix the issue of having convex triggers and how uncomfortable it is to hold it down for long periods of time, but it does not. It makes the controller even more awkward to use and it just doesn't feel good in the hand. The silicon thumb covers also do not feel good either. I do not recommend this product.

I had super high hopes for this game, especially since I was a big fan of the n64 version, but this game was nothing short of terrible.  Within the first 10 minutes, I was sick as a dog from getting so dizzy and the game has less functionality than the n64 version.  Basically if you love Daniel Craig, then this game is for you.

I hate this game beyond all belief, avoid at all expense.

I don't even know where to begin with this game.  It is utter trash.  If you liked Ninja Gaiden 2 then you will be very disappointed in this one.  This game is severely dumbed down.  I'm not even going to waste anymore time writing this review.  The game sucks and it sucks bad.

This game is awful! It isn't worth the money. I bought it because I love playing the Zoo Tycoon games. Well this game didn't work on my computer. I have a 7. I tried it a couple of times and it froze in the same spot. My son saw Zoo Tycoon yesterday at a store. We bought it for his computer and I loaded it onto mine. Works awesome!!! So if you want a game like Zoo Tycoon then you need to buy Zoo Tycoon.

This is the worst headset I've ever used. It only stays connected intermittently - and even when it is connected, the sound is so low that you can barely hear it. I purchased these on black friday for what I thought was a steal @$39.99. If given the opportunity again, I wouldn't have paid a penny for them. Do yourself a favor and buy a different brand.

Undoubtedly very nice wireless headphones, however, I have never been able to make them connect to my computer, and after following the manufacturer's suggested troubleshooting procedures, the headphones will not power on at all, and the USB based transmitter is not recognized by the PC. I have not had time to return them, but plan to try with another pair to give them a fair review.

When I first got them, the mic wouldn't work unless I turned on the transmitter, then the headphones, then off for the transmitter, then turned the transmitter back on. After that they worked. Then one day, they just stopped working. I returned it and got a new one thinking that it was just a manufacturing problem. My new one does the same thing now! And to top it all of, it won't even pair to the transmitter. It's just a bad, outdated headset. Not to mention the software is prehistoric.

I STONGLY SUGGEST ANOTHER BRAND OF HEADSETS... I'VE HAD 2 TURTLE BEACH HEADSETS AND THEY ARE CHEAPLY MADE THEY BOTH BROKE WITHIN MONTHS I WENT THROUGH 2 HEADSETS AND LESS THAN A PERIOD OF A YEAR... GOOD FOR SHORT TERM BAD FOR LONG TERM.... I DON'T ABURSE MY HEADSETS OR THROW THEM ACROSS THE ROOM... I TAKE LOTS OF CARE TO MY HEADSETS... CHEAPLY MADE FOR YOUR MONEY

I got this for my son expecting it to work with the Xbox he has, but ended up needing an adapter to get it to work so we had to order one and wait for it to come.  Once we got it to work the mic stopped working after a couple weeks.  Not real happy with products that say they are compatible with a system and then having to spend more on an adapter to do what they say they are supposed to do out of the box.  If they need an adapter then include the adapter.

Don't waste your time or money. These headphones only worked for a week and then I had problems with them. I returned them for another pair and a week later the replacement stopped working. The seller was prompt with giving me back a refund. I thank the company for that.

DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!

For some unidentifiable reason the microphone on this headset made me sound like a robot to my friend. It drove both us crazy trying to figure out what was wrong with the headset. The issue was never resolved after half a day of trying to fix the problem. I even tried plugging my computer directly into the wall socket instead of a surge protector.
summary: For some unidentifiable reason the microphone on this headset made me sound like a robot to my friend

reviewText: We bought the X-Box version of this game for our daughter's birthday.  She had played a demo of it at the store and loved it.  Well after playing this game only twice she finished it!  What a waste of money. I'm very upset the game was so short.

I'd heard good things about the Silent Hill games but hadn't played before ordering. I wish I would have because this game is terrible. The story line did not make sense, the directions were unclear and the lighting was so dark that it was hard to make out what was going on. I couldn't get anywhere without an online walkthrough and even still the game was boring and confusing.

I got this game because I was looking for a flight game that was not too expensive that I could play with my flight stick. So, I got this game only to discover that it does not work with the flight stick. I don't know why this game even popped up in my search.

This is a great game, except for the fact that it did not save my game status, therefore I had to start the game from the beginning. This did not happen until the 3rd time I continued playing the game. The first 2 times it did save my status, but not the 3rd. This is VERY frustrating!!!!!!

I was used to games that are more interactive and this was not it. My family gave it many tries but did not like it at all. They also did not like the fact that they were forced to "sleep" before being able to complete activities.

I bought this headset because it looked VERY cool. I like the idea of it being small and being able to just basically snap on your ear, but I wouldn't recommend to anyone that's looking for a mic/headset. You have to yell for it to even recognize your voice. Had it about a week and it stopped working.

I bought this to replace my old Xbox 360 wireless headset that was the previous model. This one is terrible compared to the old design. It is hands down the most uncomfortable and painful headset I have ever worn. Every time I want to talk to my friends I cringe about the pain that will ensue about 30 minutes into the gaming session. I am torn as to whether it is worth the pain to cut the cord or just to use one of the third-party wired headsets instead. Tough choice.

HORRIBLE. UNCOMFORTABLE. DONT BUY - YOUR WELCOME

Most uncomfortable headset I have ever used. I do not understand why the old models were replaced with something that are more uncomfortable to use. If I could give it zero stars I would. The only good thing about this headset is that it looks really cool, but what difference does that make if you don't use it?

Fit was too tight for the Kinect sensor. It was going to scratch the sensor too much for my taste. Since it was brand new, I didn't want to damage the sensor in case I had to send it back. I wound up just using double sided tape to connect the Wii sensor to the Kinect. Considering how little I paid for the bracket, it wasn't worth the time and money to request a return and ship it back.

http://www.amazon.com/Legends-Pegasus-Online-Game-Code/dp/B008VFUQX2/

This game has been released in an alpha state and is unplayable for most players.  I for one cannot get past anything after the main menu.

My recommendation is to stay far away from this game for quite some time until they patch all of the existing issues.

This game is just terrible, and a huge waste of money. I bought this expecting to have fun, because my friends said it was a great game, but after an hour of playing, I found there are no guns! How can a game be good if it doesn't have any guns?!? Think that's bad? It gets worse. There's no online deathmatch mode. Get with the times, Nintendo! All in all, this is a horrible game, not worth anybody's time.

Difficult to install on computer (it took forever) and you have to go online and set up an account in order to play.  It kinda defeats the purpose of buying a disk instead of a download.  By the time I finished installing Assassin's Creed I, I'd lost interest in playing the game.  I haven't even bothered with Assassin's Creed II yet.  A game should be fun...not work.

I am not into video games but my boyfriend bought an x-box. There are some kinect games that came with it that are a lot of fun and that I really enjoy. I've always thought it would be fun to be a contestant on this show- so getting this game was a no-brainer. It is horrible- the game doesn't explain to you how to play and the kinect does not work well with this game. Anyone who has come over and tried to play it has just given up in frustration. I highly recommend finding another game.
summary: not easy, not fun, just frustrating.

reviewText: I didn't have time to go to the video game store and buy an official Nintendo controller, so I ordered this one. It didn't work at all. Don't buy this, go support your local video game store and buy an actual Nintendo controller.

As soon as I got it I plugged it into my N64 and started playing. When I pointed the joystick in any direction, my character in the game moved ONLY to the right. Along with that, the A, B and Start buttons all kept sticking and when I pulled it out of my N64 to use my old controller, it broke off inside of the N64 and I spent the next five minutes trying to pull the end of the controller out of my console. Definitely not worth the buy.
summary: As soon as I got it I plugged it into ...

reviewText: I love family feud.  I play it on my iPhone almost everyday.  I ordered this game thinking it would be similar to the game I play on my iPhone.  WRONG!  The delay is ridiculous.  Don't waste your money!  It is not fun.  I ordered this a few months ago and after 3-4 games, I was done playing.  Really really really regret buying this game.

If I could give it zero stars I would.  Opened the package, it looks like a brand new power supply, however it had a red light as soon as I plugged it in.  Waited a while, tried again, still a red light.  Left it plugged in to the wall for a bit and the red light never went away.

Same problem as everyone else. It works for a short time then breaks. I didn't get more than six months out of it. At first it worked great, but before long it just started turning off randomly. Then it turned off and wouldn't go back on. I'd expect a product to last longer than that. It's really disappointing to pay for cheap merchandise.
summary: Same problem as everyone else. It works for a ...

reviewText: Doesn't work! Bought this after my original one failed and my Xbox 360 still would not power on. I bought a used Xbox 360 on craigslist thinking that the Xbox itself was toast and this power supply did not work on it either. Luckily the power supply that came with the other Xbox worked on my initial Xbox, but now I have two consoles and only one power supply. I am returning this to Amazon, thankfully they are a company that stands behind the products that they sell.
summary: Does not work. Didn't power up my Xbox even one single time.

reviewText: It worked fine at first, but now my console randomly turns off after I've been playing for five minutes. I don't even try to play it much anymore, because I just end up getting annoyed when it shuts off.

This game is terrible for the simple fact that you can't get the gun to sync to the game.  My husband and I have tried countless times over the course of 2 years to get this thing to work and it is so incredibly frustrating that today I just threw the whole thing out.  Was a complete waste of money.  My kids and husband were able to play it maybe 3x in 2 years.  Would NOT recommend.
summary: This game is terrible for the simple fact that you can't get the ...

reviewText: I should have paid more attention to the reviews...  Calibration is awful.  I have been trying to calibrate my brand new game for about an hour.  This is extremely frustrating!!  Then I read the reviews and see that you must calibrate it often.  No wonder it was $20 less than their other versions.  I would have gladly paid more for it to work.  Unless a miracle happens, I will be sending this back.

Just to let you know that I bought yesterday this game on Amazon. The downloader is an absolute nightmare: it is slow, it crashes all the time, it corrupts your data and finally it re-starts the download from 0.

So far, I haven't been able to download the game and my computer has been running for the last 24h.

So if you buy an electronic version of the game on Amazon, well, now you know what to expect.
summary: amazon downloader, the worst I have ever seen

reviewText: I really have no idea if the game is any good or not, because although I placed my order 3 hours ago, the order is still being "processed", and I still have not received any link to download it.  This is the only place I've ever bought a game online and not been able to download it right away.

They sent me 3DS XL pens instead. I do not have a 3DS XL so it was a waste of money. Price wise, they were very cheap so I think I'll just give them to my friends. They definitely aren't bad quality, but they aren't the ones I ordered.
PLEASE DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM! This is not even an official Nintendo licensed product!
summary: I BEG YOU NOT TO BUY THIS PRODUCT! IGNORE ALL THE GOOD REVIEWS! DO NOT PURCHASES THIS!

reviewText: The male end does not fit into my NES. The female end doesn't accept the NES controller. Is it 7 feet? I don't know. I honestly do not care. I bought this for my NES and it doesn't fit. Why does this "extension cable" exist?

My seven-year-old loved this game. She played and played and bought all the toys in the store. Now, however, she's stuck. She can still decorate Hello Kitty's room, but she can't take any toys out of it. There's no point in earning money for the store because there's nothing left to buy in it. I can't believe they'd make a game with no reset. She really wants to start the game over and return toys to the store, but that's not an option.

If anyone knows of a way to reset this game, please share!
summary: It's great until you're finished. There's no reset!

reviewText: I don't have a pause/break key on my keyboard, which is required to start the game (at least on the version I have). In December 2012, contacted DCS twice through their website to ask if there was a way around this problem. It's mid-February, and I have yet to hear back from them.

I bought DCS Warthog more than a month ago.  I have spent so many hours trying to get it to work, and I haven't played it once.  I have Windows 7, 4GB RAM, a great video card, etc.  DCS tech support has been quick to respond, and they've had me try many things to get it working, and it still won't run!!!  Do not waste your money!!!  I had to give it one star because Amazon doesn't allow zero stars.
summary: This game is garbage.  Do not buy.

reviewText: I purchased this item to transfer data from my xbox to the new star wars special edition xbox. When I plugged the cable in it did not work. I tried reading troubleshooting tips online and I still have not been able to get this to work. I would not recommend this to anyone. The cable may be bad but I will not risk buying another one. I am going to use a flash drive to transfer my data. This is the first bad experience I have had with Xbox products. I hope it is the only bad experience.

Unfortunately this does not work with the new 3DS.  Apparently there was a software update or something, because I was told it did work at one time, but as of September or so of 2012 it no longer does.
I don't mean it doesn't work with 3ds games (which is stated somewhere that it does not), I mean it does not work on the 3ds system at all.
If you have a 3ds, don't waste your time...

They didn't test this game before they put it on the market. It's impossible to play. Something is wrong at every turn and I tried to play it three times and each time it froze up and I had to turn off my computer to get out of the game.  It's torture to play.
summary: They took a classic game and turned it into garbage.

reviewText: This controller looks just like a Sony controller, but unfortunately it isn't. If you look closely, you'll see a few subtle hints, but most telling of all is that it won't pair with the PS4. Shop carefully.

I was super happy when I purchased this, I have never liked any controller more.. for the first few weeks.

After having the best time ever playing, I started having issues with my left trigger being pressed whenever I was walking forward.

It started small, but grew to be 50% of the time, and unusable.

I really did love this controller, and gave it my best shot despite all the bad reviews it had.

It broke my heart, and we parted ways.
summary: It left me with a broken heart.

reviewText: I found this game to be like watching a movie where occasionally you interacted with it. For the most part all you do is hit X or Y when the game tells you to. There isn't a whole lot of decision making. Overall I was very disappointed with the game.
summary: One long video with button mashing

reviewText: I bought one and not long after purchase it would randomly stop working. I went to their tech support of help and they gave me several different steps to try. After each test I had the same results. After weeks of going back and forth they ran out of ideas and then stopped communicating with me. They could not fix their product and just gave up. I will never buy another of their product again.

This product is a waste of money, not only does it not come with the appropriate software to be able to transfer codes via the usb codes it freezes every time you try to use it.

I wish I had not wasted my money in buying it.

I returned this item. I bought it for my grandson and did not realize that it was only for use with a Nintendo AND a PC. The description does not mention that it is only PC compatible. He has a Mac. I don't even know why you need a computer for this, but you do. So IF YOU HAVE A MAC, don't order it.
summary: I returned this item. I bought it for my ...

reviewText: I was able to download everything just fine, but it crashes every time I go to play it. It goes through the first loading screen, but then it goes to a second load screen (looks like the load screen for when you are playing a family in Sunset Valley), and then it crashes. My computer is perfectly capable of running this game, so I'm not sure what the problem is. Maybe I'll try it again later.

Not too surprised. I have heard more negative reviews on this demo then positive ones. I signed in and everything but can not even click the button to download the demo. I'm under the assumption that I have to purchase the game just to download the "free" demo and that doesn't make much sense to me. I'd rather buy the game in store and I'm not going to pay $40 for a demo to play immediately. More then anything I'm just confused with how to access this demo.

downloaded for mac. It didn't even open. I waited for it to download and install  (which took long)  and when I tried to open it, it said that there was an error. No matter how much I tried to fix it, it just wouldn't work.

The game didn't work. Yes they did refund my money but once i contact them about the game wasn't working they acted like they knew nothing. I finally had to send it back and I will have to find a new place to buy it. It is a major shame because I was looking forward to playing this.
summary: Yes they did refund my money but once i contact them about the game wasn't working they acted like they knew nothing

reviewText: Not only are these cables really overpriced, but they're extremely fragile. I've owned two of them and they BOTH broke. The second one that broke, broke WHILE I was using it. What kills me is that, if you want to play these games, you NEED this expensive cable! What a load.

I purchased this game based on reviews posted here. Sadly, I found the graphics to be no better than games made years ago and the controls less realistic. FPS is very slow on my system, even at lowest settings, for some reason. I don't have this problem on other games, including Skyrim. To top it off, the game keeps crashing. I can't even finish the 2nd tutorial without the program crashing. Waste of money for me.

I should have read the reviews first because it's not working for me either. I'm running Mac OS 10.6.8. I downloaded the software which put a folder called "The Sims 3 Pets" on my desktop.  Inside is a disc image called "TheSims3Pets.dmg."  When I clicked on it to open it, I got a message, "The following disk image couldn't be opened... not recognized."  You might have better success buying the DVD version instead of the download version.

This mouse was very uncomfortable and didn't work on any of my computers with or without their software. I love corsair and most of my computer is corsair parts, but I feel like they need a lot of work done on their mice and keyboards.

This is a great mouse, especially for the price.  But it has one serious flaw that has me regretting the purchase.  The bottom of the mouse is metal and has completely scratched my desk.  I then bought a hard plastic Razer mouse pad and it too has become completely scratched by the mouse.  I have never had a mouse scratch my desk or mouse pad before.  For this reason alone, I do not recommend the mouse.  I have used the mouse for about 6 months.
summary: Great Mouse with a Serious Flaw

reviewText: I purchased this item, although I didn't receive the item pictured, I did receive a similar item.  The R button doesn't work.  This is actually the second one I received and neither one had a working R button.  Some games don't require an R button, but the ones I play do.  So I was unable to use this item.  Not worth $1 much less what ever I paid for it.  Unhappy with item.

After having this thing for almost a year I've noticed the one battery pack is no longer working in my controller. It's not even that it's not charging (cause it is) it just refuses to work. I've tried multiple controllers, none of them work.

If you owned the previous Alien games, you will be disappointed. Granted I am not an online-gamer, and this game seems to have been written with that in mind. But you would expect the stand-alone gameplay to be at least as good as the older games. It's not. I was VERY disappointed and will never trust a SEGA product again without letting some others go first. Just to let you know i own Modern Warfare 3 and this game doesn't hold a candle to it.

I wish I had spent my $$ on something else.

This is likely to be the game that completely keeps me from ever pre-ordering a game ever again. The hit detection is terrible, the animations are awful, the plotting is miserable, and the textures were out of date in 2004. I have no idea what went wrong with this game but stay far, far away.
summary: Worst PC game in recent memory, buggy poorly written garbage

reviewText: I am running Windows 7 on a 64 bit machine. I have been trying to get this game to run for about 2 hours. I have installed, patched, uninstalled, reinstalled, and repatched. It hangs on the loading screen. I looked in the forums, and my problem is not uncommon with 64-bit windows 7. Maybe they will release a patch to make it work? I own and have played every other Heroes of Might and Magic game. I love these games and an very sad that this one is so broken.
summary: Beware - game may or may not work.

reviewText:
I just bought this game on 12/30/2014 and have all the latest patches.  For the time that game actually works, it's fun.  The problem is that it crashes on average, about every 20 minutes.  The computer needs a reboot to get it running again.

There are a lot of discussions on the web about the instability of this game.  Apparently Ubisoft isn't able to fix the bugs since they've had 2 years to do it and it is still a broken game.

I have played every game from the Heroes of Might and Magic Series, and I still play Heroes III occasionally. Even Heroes IV, which brought down the original maker of the series is more engaging and fun. There is a freely available demo for Heroes VI, I do strongly suggest you download it and play it before you buy the whole game. If you've never played a Heroes game you may find it interesting, but to me it is just too much failed expectations.

I would have liked to play this game but this game is not able to be played on a laptop. If there was a warning about not being able to play it on my laptop I wouldnt have bought it. I gave it to my brother to play since he has a PC.
Just fair warning, If you plan on playing this game on a laptop it will not operate.

This would be a great game were it not for the fact you have to connect to the internet and be a part of Ubisoft's unstable "Conflux."  When their conflux is down, you cannot play.  Doesn't matter how good a game is, if you can't play, it's worthless.  I looked forward to spending my day off playing this game but couldn't because they were having some sort of issue.  When I buy a game, I expect to be able to play it.
summary: The Conflux has slain what could have been a great game.

reviewText: This has always been my favorite series of games, so I was VERY excited when I saw this game at Amazon. Downloaded the game so I could play it immediately. I have had this game for 3 days and have yet been able to play it. Keeps downloading updates, then crashes in the process. do not waste your money as I did.

This game is just plain rotten.  It Stinks.  My saved games are always missing.  I have to start a new game almost every time I play 'cause my saved game is gone.  You can't get any help anywhere.  And forcing you to play on line doesn't sit well with me.  Why do I have to be on line to play this?  Don't waste your money like I did.  An add on has just been released but I won't buy it.  Phooey!!!!

How is it acceptable to deny the customer the right to play the game they've paid for?

I've been able to log on maybe 1/2 the times I've attempted to play this game.  You cannot play if the Ubisoft servers are down and they are down A LOT.

Be very wary of any Ubisoft game that requires you to connect to their servers to play.  I was going to buy the new Anno game but no way in hell now.

If you try to install it on 64-bit Windows 7, it doesn't install. I get the message

The program of feature "\??\E\Civ4\autorun.exe" cannot start or run due to incompatibility with 64-bit versions of Windows. Please contact the software vendor to ask if a 64-bit Windows compatible version is available.

The game doesn't work.  I have contacted EA many times and we can't get the game to work.  For some reason, the game works once in a while.  Most of the time it says that "Battlefield 3 has stopped working" while it is trying to load.

Just letting EA and everyone else know that it's not ok to act like this. Put your game on steam, get rid of the useless DRM and all that other crap you force us to have that not a single person wants, then you'll get a lot more sales. I know you don't care about making video games, but that's what you do. And you should at least do a good job and make a good user experience for it. Then we will buy it.

Till then-

Thousands of gamers.

This game is full of bugs.  I've played plenty of video games, and this one needs a lot of work.  Crashes, freezes, unresponsive commands, error messages.  It looks like a game that is still in beta.  I'll think about buying it when EA gets rid of Origin and fixes the bugs.

this sucks! you can't even finish a level because all the players in SINGLE PLAYER won't load!!! so when you need to get into a door, if not everyone is there you are not going in that door. so if you buy this game off amazon and they make you download it with Origin, get use to RELOAD LAST SAVE POINT, RELOAD LAST SAVE POINT, RELOAD LAST SAVE POINT, RELOAD LAST SAVE POINT ,RELOAD LAST SAVE POINT, RELOAD LAST SAVE POINT until hopefully everyone shows up and moves around correctly.
summary: Cant play through a level without glitch and error

reviewText: I'VE PLAYED THE PS3 VERSIONS OF "BATTLEFIELD 1 & 2" AND I REALLY ENJOYED BOTH OF THEM VERY MUCH!! I WAS LOOKING FORWARD TO "BATTLEFIELD 3" THINKING THIS WOULD BE A CONTINUATION OF THE STORY OF THE FIRST TWO, BIG DISAPPOINTMENT! I DID NOT ENJOY THIS GAME AT ALL, AND I WILL BE TRADING THIS ONE IN AT MY LOCAL VIDEO GAME STORE AS SOON AS POSSIBLE! NOTE: THIS WAS A BIRTHDAY GIFT, AND I DID NOT PURCHASE THIS FROM AMAZON.COM

I'd like to give an honest review of this game but the fact is the Origin and BattleLog service strapped to this game have not allowed me to experience much of the game. The service is so annoying to use and ruins the experience. I've had little success finding and connecting to servers, and when I am able to connect I am randomly kicked in the middle of a match for no reason. Do yourself a favor and buy Modern Warfare 3.
summary: Absolute Mess of a game and service

reviewText: The sound in game is truly AMAZING and the graphics are pretty good, although some of the textures look a bit blurry compared to B2BC.  The problem is the game-play is pretty crappy when compared to any of the other Battlefield games.  I'll continue to play B2BC since it still offers great graphics and great game-play.

I didn't listen to the reviews and I regret it. The installation was a nightmare, the worst I have ever seen in a game. I had to download it 3 times, once from Amazon, and twice from Origin. Origin is awful, the game takes forever to load.  It doesn't run well and crashes often.

I wish I could get my money back. What a disappointment.

I know the game is great because I did the beta/alpha testing but now cant play the final product. I pre-ordered this game on May 31st. One would imagine that it would at least be shipped by the release date of the game. But it has still yet to be shipped. Why did I waste my money on amazon ordering a game when I won't even get it till a week after the release date. I could have just as easily walked down to best buy and pick it up. This is terrible service by amazon. It gives zero reason to shop here.
summary: Why has it not even shipped?

reviewText: Graphics are the only thing I like about the game. I expected greatness from this game and it fell flat. Most people are mad about the roster since like 10 characters are DLC. Gems just don't work. Definitely a cool idea and I think it works best online and not for local play. Sound issues when playing online are bad enough to affect gameplay. It's just a bad game all around. If you like Street Fighter, play Street Fighter. If you like Tekken, play Tekken. Just don't play this game.

When I saw this game, I was very excited but as soon as I played, I was completely disappointed. In order to control the firefighter, you must use the stylus along with the joystick. The stylus is used on the touch screen to look up, down and side to side and the joystick controls the movement. What you see is from the firefighter's perspective but again it's difficult to control. Kids will have a very hard time trying to maneuver this game.

This download did not work.  When I contacted the seller they said there was nothing they could do about it. They said they were sorry but the sale was final even though it did not download to my computer.  I will never do business with this company again and I DO NOT RECOMEND you do any business with them.  You will be disappointed!!!!

this was a birthday present for my son. He downloaded Fruit Ninja, but when he tried downloading the other game it froze at 2% and it sat for so long he exited out of it. When he tried to do it again, he got a message that the number was already used and he couldn't download that game....we're still trying to figure out what to do...

It is really hard to say how much I hated this game. It bored me on just about every step of the game. I tried to like it I even gave it about 3 hours more hours than it deserved but I could not like this game. The game play is ok but the tasks are so dull and everything takes way longer than it should.
summary: One of the most slow and boring games I have ever played.

reviewText:
Went and bought it from a local store, opened it up, plugged everything in and realized I'd need two extra adaptors to get it to work. I use an HDMI cable from my PS3 to my TV so I'd need a second audio cable to use along with the provided ones just to send the audio, and I'd need a usb hub to plug in both the audio dongle and my headsets usb power.

All in all, I found this to be a complete waste of money. Others might not have such an annoying time.

I never have figured out how to use this program to play against the computer. Also, while I purchased the product off of Amazon it keeps asking me to buy something else and I do not know what it is or why I should buy it!

It worked fine; for about a day and a half. The adapter that plugs into the controller isn't big enough to snap in place, it just loosely swivels around to the point that it doesn't even work now. Not to mention its impossible to turn down the volume low enough so that the sound doesn't distort (unless you have Beats or a headset with volume control on it). All in all, I hate it, I would love to return it, but it would just be a waste of time and packaging.

I wish I could actually give this game a real rating, my husband was so excited to get it, but no matter what I do it won't play on my PC (which is running the standard minimum requirements).  I'm running windows 7 on a computer that isn't very old.  For someone with a gaming PC or at least a higher quality video card than what comes with most PCs out of the box I'm sure it would work, but I don't recommend it for anyone using a more basic computer.

I was not too pleased with this game.  The difficulty level is very unsettling.  I saw a friend playing it on her Kindle...I thought it would be fun to have on the computer.  Big mistake.  It is very frustrating to play.  The first level isn't too bad, but after that, forget about it.  Big waste of money.

This thing is a piece of trash. It never worked when I hooked it up. There were times when it would look like it would work, then my mouse didn't do anything. The keyboard controls never seemed to sync up either. I would not recommend this unless you were trying to play a cruel prank on someone. And if you are....may God have mercy on your soul

I got this for my son when he was 4 because I thought it would be easy for him to use. I couldn't be more wrong.  Even I had difficultly with this. I bought this for him for Christmas. He's used it once in January and hasn't touched it since

WHY DIDN'T I READ THE REVIEWS BEFORE I BOUGHT THIS?!?!?!?!??!  Like everyone else, I bought this table to play Pictionary.  Yeah, it doesn't work.  It's cheap enough that it's not worth paying the shipping to return it.  SOOOOO I had to buy the UDraw tablet TOO!  And, btw, we've had a blast playing Pictionary with the other tablet.

If you are looking for Diablo, or any other scrolling game where you walk around and kill things, this is not a bad game at all.  However, if you are expecting the plot, the feeling, the VIBE that is Silent Hill, you will be sadly disappointed.  There is pretty much no plot to it, and what there is feels so forced that it might as well not even be there.  I'm a Silent Hill nut, so I will keep it, but you can bet I will not play it again.

This game did not work on Windows 7. I returned it for a full refund.
I found out that the game had a flaw that prevented it from running after the 2012 baseball season. 2K sports came out with a patch for the console versions but not for the PC version. 2K sports decided to stop supporting it on the PC.
summary: Returned it because it didn't work!

reviewText:
screw the ending screw bioware for ruining the series
screw the ending screw bioware for ruining the series
screw the ending screw bioware for ruining the series
screw the ending screw bioware for ruining the series
summary: screw the ending screw bioware for ruining the series

reviewText: This isn't a review of the actual game (since I spend literally days downloading this game only for it not to work even though I have all the requirements to play this game), but I think this download it faulty and you are better off going to the store and getting the actual physical game because I spend hours upon hours downloading this game only to have it not work and I am currently having to download it again.
summary: DON'T BUY THIS GAME I SPENT HOURS DOWNLOADING THIS GAME ONLY FOR IT TO NOT WORK?

reviewText: Replayed Mass Effect 1 and Mass Effect 2 many times. Bought all the add-ons. Once I finished this game, I could not bring myself to play it again. I guess the devs thought, if they want to replay, they can do the MultiPlayer. I don't do MultiPlayer, so that was it for me. Major disappointment.

Anyone who played any of the first games will expect an excellent experience and closure playing this one.
Unfortunately, this couldn't be further from the truth.
This game is simply abysmal, and one is hard pressed to find anything good to say about it after playing it through.
It is not only the terrible ending everyone is (rightly) talking about, but also the dumbing down of everything in it compared to previous games. Don't buy this game.

The game is more of the same from Mass Effect 2, and then there's the ending. The ending which is the most terrible ending to anything ever, and which not only undoes everything that has come before, but is a complete break from everything that has come before. It's a slapped-together abrupt deus ex machina that brings to mind the ending to Battlestar Galactica, only worse. So, so much worse.

If you love Mass Effect, play ME and ME2, but avoid ME3 at all costs.

I am purposefully not telling you about this game for good reasons. It is best if you just imagine that this game never came out and you must imagine the ending. If you think you have the ability to stop playing right before the last mission, then this game is great!

I don't know what world UBISoft thinks they're living in.

I've had more problems with UBISoft than any other software company over the years, but this one is a new level of stupidity on their part.

No support for gaming laptops?! Are you kidding me? I don't even own a PC anymore.
Sure enough, $50 for a game that doesn't support my high-end gaming laptop... and then no support to fix it.

I should have waited for it to hit the cheap shelf, and at this rate, it won't be long.
summary: No Laptop Support AND DRM Issues in a single package!? Wait for the $5 shelf.

reviewText: This headset does not work as it should. The mic on this is not sensitive enough to pick up your voice at a normal volume in the intended position. To get it to work, I had to have the earpiece on my cheek in order for the mic to pick up my voice without shouting.
summary: Does not work as it should.

reviewText: If you're into slow moving RPG's, this game MIGHT be for you. But if you're expecting a game like Skyrim or LOTR: Conquest as far as action and adventure, you've come to the wrong place. This game is without a doubt the least fun game I have ever purchased. Got through four missions hoping it would get better, but it just got worse.

Fallout IV is everything I have come to expect from Bethesda. It is essentially Fallout III with an entirely new world to world to explore and a much more complicated main storyline.

But you have to use STEAM to play it. For me STEAM is an automatic no-go.

Make your own choice.
summary: Great Game but it is stuck with STEAM.

reviewText:
Game is fun, but TOO MANY BUGS TO ENJOY.  A console game should not have so many bugs in it that it crashes the system several times per hour and have internal glitches that eventually make it impossible to complete the game.  None of these issues have been patched either.  In 20 years of gaming I have never played a console game that ever crashed the system.  This game does it multiple times per hour.

This isn't even worth the $10 it cost to buy

Looking at it as I write this review, this card is going for $51.34. The price changed while it was in my cart, and that's almost double what it's worth.

It'll probably go back down in price again, so be sure to double check.

Beyond that, this game is great.
summary: Double check the price before you buy

reviewText: You buy the game and then after trying to download it in the computer all of a sudden you're asked to pay to play.  the cheapest is $14. for one month, $43 for three months and $77 for six months.  You have already paid for the game and at the time nothing is said that it's going to cost more.  I consider this a rip off andd not a very good Christmas present because it is a big disappointment.

After the download was complete, my AVG detected a virus.  I had to make the decision whether to remove or not...I chose remove and now I can't use the game.  I've had problems in the past with viruses and don't want to take the chance of infecting my computer.  It was only $2.99 but it was a waste of money.

I tried to install it on two different computers that met the requirements for the game but it still didn't work. I emailed technical support but have not received a response. I guess the next step is the credit card company.
summary: My son wanted this for Christmas but it didn't work

reviewText: This was not the type of game I thought it would be. It is just a matching game that is redundant and I really did not like it. The only positive thing is that you can play it and completely turn off your brain for awhile.

I would love to play this game; but, try as I might, I cannot get it to open on my laptop (I run XP.) Have tried everything I know to get it open, with no success. Have also contacted the designers of the game, with no reply.
Anyone else have this problem?

I was very excited when I purchased this item and the first thing I did was try to open the top lid to be able to play the old GameCube games we had. To my surprise I found that Nintendo went very cheap on this one as there is no such lid anymore in this version. If you really like to enjoy all the power of the Wii console do yourself a favor and buy something else, just make sure that the basic stuff (like this port) are there, otherwise it will be a waste of money.

I bought sims 3 on here and it would crash after about an hour. Bought this pack and it crashes in 10 minutes. I wish I didn't get the direct download since there are no refunds. Because this game was a complete waste of money. I can't even play it anymore. I'd love a refund for this but I guess the customer service isn't that good. Don't waste your money

Having been a long time fan of Ridge Racer games (since the early play station days). I bought this game without reading any of the negative reviews. All I can say is that I wish I had read the reviews first! The lack of offline content in this game is mind blowing. This honestly feels like a demo release, I wish I had opted for the physical copy instead of the digital download, I want my money back on this one :(

I REPEAT DO NOT BUY THIS:

The game servers for this game DO NOT EXIST you CAN NOT play this game. I can not make this any clearer, YOU CAN NOT PLAY THIS GAME. DO NOT GIVE THIS COMPANY MONEY UNLESS YOU CONSIDER IT A DONATION.

Upon ordering this download, my son and I were then directed to another site where we were instructed to purchase other options before he could even begin to play the game.  After looking at the description provided, I could not see where any of this was in the description of this game.  No where does it tell you that you have to make another purchase to actually be able to play the game.  What a let down for my son and major, major rip-off.
summary: YOU HAVE TO SPEND MORE THAN THIS!!!!!!!!!

reviewText: I will just say: stay away from this game. Read other reviews for reasons, I was going to write my own but realized I would just be repeating what all others said. This is the worst MMO I have ever played.

Nice to wear for about 1/2 an hour, then they start to hurt your ears. The ear cushions are not large enough to encircle your ears so they have to sit on top of your ear. The headband is not a good design and mine broke at the pivot point where the ear cup is attached. Not sorry to throw them away. There are much better choices on the market.
summary: works good but uncomfortable to wear and not very durable

reviewText: Not much to say about this card. Most games require a memory card and this is the cheapest one you can buy. With 4GB you can't expect to hold much other than some saves and a few PSN games, so if you plan on downloading full titles you'll want a bigger card.

Ridiculously overpriced.
It is a 32Gb card.
It holds up to 30Gb of games.
It is slower than the regular 32Gb Micro SD.
It is 3 times more expensive than the regular 32Gb Micro SD.
It's just not worth it.
Seriously, don't buy it.

There is absolutely no reason that Sony should make a completely different storage card for the Vita.  However, they did and you pretty much have to buy it!  When you can purchase the same card in "SD" form and it's nearly a 1/3 of the price, there's something wrong.  Eithery way, if you want more storage, you're going to have to purchase one of these cards.

This is just ridiculously overpriced and there is absolutely nothing you can do about it!

If you have a PS vita, and actually want to put something on it, you're going to have to give up some of that hard earned cash to have a little R&R worth your ever-fleeting time. Good luck guys, it's worth it once you have it, but do you really need it? Probably not, but it will leave you worry free of "Error - Not Enough Memory"

I bought this case at a retail store for my 5 and 8 year old boys to hold their games. Not only am I the only one able to get the games in and out for them, the entire "pages" pop out every time you flip them. The outside is durable, but the inside is cheaply made. Knowing this product will be used by kids, you would expect it to hold up better, but it does not.

I can't say a single good thing about this game.

No towns to explore. The areas are dull and repetitive.  The enemies are dull and repetitive.  The main characters are dull and repetitive. The leveling system for your characters sucks. Very, very few cutscenes...

Don't buy this garbage. No matter who you are.
summary: Horrible game - you can tell how little effort was put into this title

reviewText: I was incredibly let down by this keyboard. I have used this keyboard for almost six months and it's gone to complete crap. Some of the keys don't press and some get stuck. Even after removing the keys and cleaning them off, the issues still occur. This keyboard is completely unplayable for competitive gaming. I would not recommend this keyboard for anyone. Save yourself the trouble and invest into an actual mechanical keyboard.
summary: I have used this keyboard for almost six months and it's gone to complete crap. Some of the keys don't press and some ...

reviewText: The drive was more difficult than it should have been to insert into the console. Then, when it finally was inserted, the console did not recognize that any new hard drive had been added. Upon trying to remove the hard drive, it will not come out. I've never written a review on amazon, but do not buy this product.
summary: Not recognized by console nor can it be removed

reviewText: If you are going to play this game, you will need a  state-of-the-art gaming rig to get it to work. My computer will play Dead Space 3 and Dragon Age 2 on the highest graphics settings just fine, but can barely play this one on it's lowest setting. There are far too many keyboard controls that have to be memorized for this game to be enjoyable. This game appears to have been designed for a very narrow market of Witcher fanatics who own supercomputers.

Despite the pictures and claims to the contrary, this is not a Sony cable. It does not come in a Sony box as pictured, instead, it comes in a plastic bag with a rubber tie around it. Whether it works or not, this is deceptive marketing at best.

I'm sure this cable works fine if you have the original PS Vita.  The connector on the end of this cable is too large for the PS Vita Slim.  If you need a cable, you will just need a USB - Micro cable (http://www.amazon.com/Mediabridge-USB-2-0-High-Speed-Gold-Plated/dp/B004GF8TIK/ref=sr_1_2?s=electronics&ie=UTF8&qid=1400859082&sr=1-2&keywords=usb+micro)
summary: Not for the PS Vita Slim

reviewText: I thought this device was SO CUTE, when I bought it for my daughter about a year-and-a-half ago. But it is now VERY UGLY, since my daughter brought it to me this morning, to show that it already is not working anymore! I am very disappointed, since I paid over $200 in late March 2014 for this short-lived toy!
summary: I am very disappointed, since I paid over $200 in late March ...

reviewText: So, MS has announced that a NEW version with the hardware from the Xbox One is on it's way. I've been playing with 3D printing for about 2 years now, and am kind of excited to see what's around the corner for this low cost scanner. Worst case scenario, if this IS the one for you, expect the price to come down as the old units go on clearance.
summary: No hate, just hold out for upgrade summer '14

reviewText: This was one game I really was looking forward to.  In fact out of all the games I bought, this one was the first one I put in.  I just couldn't believe that I would shafted paying 40 bucks for a game you could hardly play because of so much lag.  I can understand having lag in a game that's played online, but I was playing the story line, no online at all.  The lag was so bad, I finally just gave up.
summary: One Game I Really Wanted - Disappointed!

reviewText: I bought this, played it for a few minutes, then asked Amazon for a refund. They obliged me, and I never touched it again. I am a long-time fan of Sonic, but I hated this, the controls are slow and unresponsive, it's like trying to run in a frozen swimming pool of molasses, and the gameplay is painful.

We got the mouse, plugged it in, and it worked for all of 2 days before it simply stopepd working. We went through all of the customer service and help to get it to work and were given no explanation as to why it stopped. I put it back in its box because I had no way to return it at the time and there it has sat for a year in a box.

Purchased this awhile back, and it was just awful. The mic didn't work at all, when I tried to use it, it would pick up the sound from the headphones but not my voice. Needless to say, I bought the hyperx clouds a few weeks later and these have been sitting in the junk drawer ever since.
summary: Spend a few extra bucks and get something else

reviewText: This is my second pair after the first pair gave out within a few months. I was frustrated because I had not abused them and the price is a bit high. I figured that maybe I had gotten a bad pair and ordered some more. The same exact thing happened a couple of months after purchasing. It's a shame because the sound quality is good and they are comfortable! I just wish they weren't so 'cheap' all around.
summary: I won't be purchasing another Turtle Beach product.

reviewText: I ordered this headset for my 13 year old son 11 months ago for a Christmas present and he loved it. My son took good care of this headset, but about two months ago, they just stopped working while he was in the middle of using them. Turtle Beach was contacted at that time but they have yet to respond (2 months has passed). I am very disappointed, as is my son....They did not last as long as expected.

You have register and be online to use the driver software. No, not just to download it, but to actually use it. Want to change some driver settings? Have to log in. Want to update the driver? Have to log in. This will be the last product I ever buy from this company.

I strongly recommend you don't waste your money on this product.

Within just 2 months of use, the sound quality from this has deteriorated so badly that I can't hear anything but the blaring sounds of the bass! I can't even hear the dialogues over jarring background music, when I'm watching a movie.

After 3 months, the microphone stopped working.
After 5 months, the right ear speaker stopped working.

You get what you pay for, and these are usually pretty cheaply priced - even so, I could not recommend these to anyone.

I returned this immediately. The ear cups are pretty stiff and the headset is very uncomfortable to wear. I tried keeping it on for about 10 minutes and couldn't bear it. Spend a little extra money and get something more comfortable.

DO NOT BUY THIS UNLESS, YOU JUST WANT THE GAME!

Ordered this to get all the extras, as I already own the game. It was selling at really nice price too.
The game that was sent to me was not the special edition. It was just the regular game in a DVD case, without all the extras that are even spelled out in the product name.

None of the extra stuff. Just a game in a DVD box.

I guess the deal was just too good to be true.

If you';re a hardcore gamer with lots of experience with this type of game, it might be fun. Can't recommend it for anyone else, as even on the easiest mode it is far too difficult, and you can easily get into a situation where the game is unplayable with the panic levels and whatnot.

Should have included a "casual" mode for people not used to this type of game.
summary: Too difficult for all but the most hardcore

reviewText: The description is misleading. They do not provide the instructions on how to program the mouse. So you have a mouse with extra buttons. I have spoken to them several times and was told the mouse is plug and play. Also I was informed that the description offering instructions for setting up the mouse was an error, but they have yet to correct this on the description of the product. Not worth the time or money to order.

I reluctantly bought this game for my son's birthday, he had really wanted it. I had a feeling that it would be bad, and unfortunately I was right. It was more frustrating than I expected. I thought the game would be kind of corny but playable, the game was not. I wish I had my money back.

This game is not a good one to get from Amazon. The game that they give you is unplayable without a critical patch that you cannot install on top of this version of the game. Buy it on Steam or another service that installs updates for you if you really want to play this game.

I think this is a WONDERFUL concept for people who like to use their classic controllers to play games. I'm very unhappy with the line of controllers made for PS3 for Street Fighter type games and wanted to go back to using my classic Saturn controllers (since the ones sold on here are VERY cheap...see my review for the Saturn USB controller) Unfortunately this does not work with the PS3, so I had to return it. Hopefully someone will make one for the PS3 so that we may enjoy our old controllers again.

I have not been able to download on my notebook. It says not enough room and I don't know how to fix it. I am afraid to delete anything, afraid I will delete the wrong thing. I downloaded it on my laptop, but can't open it.

I bought this game because I became obsessed with lego games on my Xbox but never tried them on wii. I really regret buying this game. I had no idea that the game required a nunchuk to play. If I did I would've never bought it. The second thing is the game is SO dark that I could only see my character 50% of the time. I'm extremely disappointed.

I was enjoying the game quite a bit until I discovered that the Save Game and Exit feature doesn't work.

That's a deal-breaker, obviously.

I may try the XBox 360 version instead, to see if it is less broken.

The game is very simplistic, to the point of boredom. It is not interactive at all. It lacks imagination. There are no real challenges or need for strategy in this game. We gave up on it and donated it to charity.

I don't know where to start. I guess I'll start with the terrible graphics. These graphics are so bad I can't even see what I'm doing, and I don't have a bad rig either. Story line is meh. Nothing about this game is anything special, what a waste of money. I even asked for a refund but of course was denied one. I bought this game on a whim because they removed the monthly subscription and what a mistake it was!
summary: Worst game I have ever played

reviewText: If you are going to buy this game make sure it's the 3DS version. For some reason it just is terrible on the ps vita because the screen is all blurry. So this game is awesome don't miss it but the reason I'm giving it a 1 star on the vita is because of the flaws in the game. I mean it would be nice to actually play it on the vita.
summary: Lego batman 2 is a lot better on the 3DS so get that version instead.

reviewText: As others have mentioned this is a 3DS port of the lego game, unfortunately there was no effort made to make it look good on the vita.  Even if they didn't rework the whole game the cut scenes could have been re-rendered in a higher resolution.  It looks bad, it looks cheap and it is distracting to the point of making the game not very fun.

You need 3rd party drivers to get this to work on a PC. Many of the drivers that are offered for free are not real. I got legit 3rd party drivers and it worked great for a few weeks them the quality took a nose dive.

I'm sure this works great on a play station but it's not a very good alternative for a PC web cam.
summary: I got legit 3rd party drivers and it worked great for a few weeks them the quality took a ...

reviewText: Do NOT waste your money on this useless piece of garbage. It ships in such a flimsy envelope that there's no chance you will receive it unbent. Mine was so bent, I took it out of the envelope and put it directly in the garbage. The seller should be ashamed of themselves for stealing people's money.

I read all the reviews and bought it based on the reviews.  I am surprised no one has the same problem I do.  The grip is made out of a rubber/silicone material, but it is not tacky in any way-meaning it is slippery.  I do not understand why it feels like it has non stick spray on it.  I am having a problem keeping a good grip on it.

I was not expecting a lot from this product but I was expecting something. I spent countless hours searching the internet on how to properly install the dongle with no success. After a few days I just gave up and decided to open up the thing. The inside circuits were rusty and it seemed like some of the pins were not properly soldered.

This was much cheaper than the other wireless adapters being sold on here which is why I bought it but that doesn't matter because it does not work. I have tried all of the suggestions I could find online and from the manufacturer but still cannot get it to work on windows 8.1. Also, Amazon wouldn't let me just return it through them, they wanted me to jump through a bunch of hoops with the manufacturer.

This product is a completely worthless piece of junk. It's like the seller knows that it's junk because they don't offer returns on it. I've tried everything in my power to troubleshoot this receiver and it still won't work. What an absolute waste of money and time.
summary: Just Buy A Controller - Don't Settle

reviewText: If you have Windows 8, do not get this. There is a major compatibility issue that even Microsoft can't seem to find a solution to. I am sure it works great, just not on Windows 8. I have spent the last hour trying to figure this out, and no help on the internet has gotten me the solution.
summary: I am sure it works great, just not on Windows 8

reviewText:
Didn't work.  I followed the instructions and got a controller connected but the controller would not stay connected.  I tried two different controllers all the same, the signal is not working properly.

I am sitting right next to the receiver.  And it isn't fun when you lose control of the game when you are in the middle of playing.
summary: And it isn't fun when you lose control of the game when you ...

reviewText: Worst product I've ever bought. The disk comes with the product was cracked and this product won't even connect to USB on my laptop. Every time I plug it in it disconnects right away so my laptop can't even read the device. Do not buy it.

My PC can't locate it, and when it does, it falters and becomes unable to be located within a matter of 30 seconds. I put up with this long enough to install a driver, and then refused to give it any more attention, as it once again became unrecognizable. Don't waste your money.

I unfortunately had this thing sitting on my shelf for a few months before I ended up using it.  It is some cheap knock-off version of the Microsoft receiver.  It was a pain trying to get this thing setup in the first place but once I did I was only able to get it to connect to a controller for about 20 seconds.  After that it wouldn't connect anymore.
