reviewText: Um..... how's this game good again? Lol I'm sorry, but this is the worst game I've ever played. There really isn't nothing fun about it. Just stealing stuff from people and not trying to get caught. Tbh, this game is only for game nerds and stuff lol.

What a boring game.  The lack of a plot, bad voice acting, and one attack button give this game all its glory.  If you're looking for a game to cure insomnia, then add this to cart now.  Within the first 2 hrs of playing my eyes were shutting on their own.  The 2nd day I gave it another try, but found I shouldn't have expected different results.  The 3rd day I traded it in.  By far the worst game I've played in the last few years.

When buying a game, especially on PS4, always check to see if it has EA on the front package.

If it has EA on it, avoid it at all costs, its a bad game, and not worth your money, spend it elsewhere.

If you are unfamiliar with games, EA is actually a warning label that lets the prospective buyer know that they will get the absolute lowest quality product at the absolute highest price. There is ZERO value to any product stamped with the EA warning label. Fact!
summary: Seriously, what did you expect from EA?

reviewText: Do not buy this game expecting Next Gen graphics or gameplay. This is a port of the PS3 version, plain and simple. The whole "new" Next gen Ignite engine is nothing but a complete lie, this is the same engine Madden has been running on for the last 8 years or so. Don't waste your money on this garbage money grab excuse of a game. Don't let EA rob you of your hard earned money.
summary: This game is a complete fraud!

reviewText: I have not been able to play this game. It does not launch and my pc is strong enough to handle. I have contacted Steam support a couple of weeks ago and still I have not received any help from them. This is the only game that I have problems with. Save your money.
summary: I have not been able to play this game. ...

reviewText: This game has a gamebreaking bug which resets your character stats and inventory.  After 10 hours of gameplay, I have lost everything.  Techland is aware of the issue and doesn't seem to be doing anything about it.  Buy and play at your own risk.  A one star review may seem harsh, but I feel it's deserved.  I paid full price for a broken product that I cannot return.  I will not be buying from this developer ever again.
summary: Legitimate one star review, not a troll

reviewText: We bought a skin for our 3DS XL and it did not fit. The description was not clear that it only fit the old 3DS XL. Not a new 3DS XL. The seller was not helpful in resolving. We would not recommend this seller.
summary: We would not recommend this seller

reviewText: This game is unplayable. The graphics, presentation, music, sound effects, and gameplay are all bad. I got this game for $15 and I can confidently say I was ripped off. The reviews for this game are misleading.

Does not always work for windows 8.1 had to upgrade.

It worked on my computer on win 7 and when I upgraded it to win 8.1.

But when I got a new desktop built with win 8.1 it did not work.

Audio does not work, only sound

Not compatible with Windows 8.1.  Not sure if this is a Turtle Beach issue or a Win 8.1 issue, but I have the same exact problem on my iBuyPower PC and my HP Envy 15 laptop.  Win 8.1 either does not recognize the headset or when it does, asks to download updated drivers that DON'T EXIST!

Do not buy this product if you are using Win 8.1
summary: Avoid if you are using Windows 8.1

reviewText:
My son wants to play this game very badly, but he can't. About a week after we got the game, it started playing in such a way that the characters constantly walk in one direction when you aren't pressing any buttons. We have tried different systems, different remotes, and made sure not to touch the controlers at all while it loads, but the issue still happens.

Total waste of money. I have never been so disappointed in a video game. It's not fair to my son, either. It was his biggest Christmas gift.
summary: Loved giants, this wii version is glitched.

reviewText: If you want the full game, buy it for one of the big game consoles. The one for the 3DS is a cliff's notes version. What bugged me the most was the fact that it costs just as much as the set for the Wii or one of the other game consoles. What a ripoff.
summary: There is a lot less game here

reviewText: We bought this Swap Force pack for our grandson.  It's been a few months since buying it since we were saving it for him.  We just now tried to plug it in and it doesn't work.  We've done all the troubleshooting involved and it still doesn't work.  What a waste of $35.

Purchased this game for my Grandson for Christmas. He was excited when he opened it but that balloon popped when we put the game in and it did not work. The reviews on this site were mostly good, but after receiving this game and researching the issue that I had with the game, I learned that lots of folks have the same issue. I intend to return it for a refund.

I'm really enjoying the game so far. However, I'm giving it a poor rating because it is VERY badly optimized. My PC can run Battlefield 4 on max settings, but it can't run Rocksmith at a consistent framerate. The A/V stays in sync though, so it's playable, but you should definitely buy a console version of this game if you can. Avoid the PC version.

I've been playing guitar for 30 years, and wanted something that I could practice with when I can't be with my band.  And, since I've never had any formal training, thought it might be a good way to pick up some tips.

I've been disappointed. I've never been able to figure out what notes I'm supposed to play.  The concept seems good, but it's very difficult to identify what note the game wants me to play.  It should present the notes in a TAB format rather than in some guitar hero-like mishmash.

A waste of money. Software is not user friendly. Absolutely un-intuitive. Navigation is terrible. If you want to learn to play guitar practice. If you don't have anything better to do with your time then you could buy this product and try to learn how it works.

It's really hard to load.  After I loaded it I couldn't connect to "Steam," whatever that is.  So I wrote them and they told me how to solve the problem.  I followed the steps, there were lots of them, and it didn't work.  I did it again, still didn't work.  It's been a month and I haven't played the game.  I'm sure it'll eventually work but it shouldn't have to take this much time and effort to load a disk.

Gave this to my son and less than 3 months later, it would not even play. Just keep getting an error message. It was a gift for his birthday so I ordered ahead of time. By the time it decided to no longer work, I was told it could not be exchanged or returned because of the time period. Waste of money for a product that lasted less than 3 months.

Worst game I've played in years.  The game does not seem to save games properly forcing you to replay the same levels over and over again.  Sometimes when you load a game, the entire level is missing and you end up falling forever.  I've read many others having issues with the game freezing up as well.  The forums are full of people reporting numerous bugs and crashes.  Honestly I don't know how this game made it out the door in its current state and I'm baffled at the positive reviews here.

After playing this game on the PC and realizing that it did not live up to the past games [D1 + D2], there was no way I could conceive this game as being decent.  The game was meant to be played on the PC, not on consoles.  But hey, if you played it on PC and decide to go for a romp with your friends on the couch then more power to you.  Hope you have a blast, but this outing is NOT for me.

My son bought this, along with another kit to dress up our PS3 controllers. No one in our house could get either of these kits to work. Sadly, when all was said and done, our controllers never worked quite right afterwards no matter what we did (even after removing the kit). In the end, the controller had to be replaced.

Awful. Just awful

I bought my kids a wii for Christmas and decided to pick up a few extra games for them to use on it. It turns out that the version I bought was for a version of wii that does not work on the regular wii.  My kids and I both found this out when we opened it and figured out that they are not compatible.  We are now stuck with something we can't use.  I wish I had just bought it from a local store where the sales person could have shown us what we really needed.
summary: Stuck with something I can't use.

reviewText: So... I bought this thinking I would get the game from Steam.  Apparently, it's not available yet?  What the hell do I do now? You can't even search for it on Steam and when I activated the code, it said that my activation was successful, but it didn't even mention the name of the game I was activating.  I can only give it one star until I get the game.

Right out of the box the right ear was not working. Tried plugging it into my phone and still nothing, played with the cable to see if I did anything wrong and still nothing. Sent it back for a replacement, hopefully the second one works fine.

Mine came with HDMI cable, but it came with two cords that don't fit to this model, one of which was the power supply for an Xbox 360 Slim. This means that I had to purchase a power supply and wall plug for this model. Let's just say I was very displeased. At least it came with the correct Xbox.
summary: Mine came with HDMI cable, but it came with ...

reviewText: This game is a total failure, it is unplayable unless you've got an Xbox live gold subscription (which in my opinion is overpriced) and there is no single player mode for those who do not have the subscription. Fail. It sucks. Do not buy it. It let me down. .
summary: It sucks. Do not buy it

reviewText: Not a fan. Just felt like it was a bit gimmicky. Not to mention the lack of a campaign/storyline. Very few people still play the game also, which says most of what you need to know. I'd pick it up for dirt cheap just to check it out. But certainly didn't feel like it was worth my $60 at launch.

I am the biggest halo fan on this planet. I've played since I was 5 years old. I own every single game, and I have thousands of hours logged between them all. This game was a disgrace to the franchise. Split screen halo games are what we all know and love. The online was garbage. Halo 4 was my favorite online multiplayer. I wish they could just stick to one thing and leave it at that. With halo wars 2 coming out, I'll have to see how that is. Hopefully it isn't another let down for us halo fans.
summary: Split screen halo games are what we all know and love. The online was garbage

reviewText:
This game is 4 steps backwards.
I'm not even joking. The graphics feel like Halo 2. Only Halo 2 was fun. This game is a joke. The no split screen was the poo flavored icing on the proverbial cake.
Halo 2
Halo 3
Halo 3: ODST
Halo Reach
Halo 4
all have better gameplay and graphics than Halo 5

I paid $15 and some how feel I got ripped off.

As someone who has been playing Xbox and Halo since 2002, I'm absolutely disgusted with what has happened with this console and Halo franchise.
summary: Xbox Gen 1 graphics. No split screen.

reviewText: Basically this game is an abomination to any real fan of the Halo franchise. The only real thing Halo 5 has going for it is that it is a very pretty game, but other than that, it's just a pile of corporate lies, misdirection, false advertising on top of poor gameplay and extremely sub-par writing and the single worst campaign of the series.
summary: The only real thing Halo 5 has going for it is that it is a very pretty game, but other than that

reviewText: Not worth the money it cost to print the packaging on. Do not buy this game especially if you want to play with other people over at your house, because you won't be able to. Bought it thinking it would be cool to play with friends but you can't. Very disappointed! You suck Respawn!

How can EA come out with a console game without a single player mode??? Every console game should allow different modes so the player can choose how they want to play. Aside from that the rest of the game is mediocre at best, certainly not worth the $60 EA was charging for it when the game was first released. It's not even worth the $48 that Amazon is currently charging for it, maybe half that price.

marketing on this was deceptive. My 10 year old asked for the game, so I gave it to him for good grades. Little did I know when I pre-ordered that you also had to spend another $50 on XBOX Gold membership and that the game can only be played online. So, the game really costs over $110. I will never buy a game like this again. The XBOX Gold membership should have been included for free, for at least a year. Shame on EA.
summary: Money Pit - Gold Service Required to Play

reviewText: I cannot sit in a room with my kid and play the game together, turning the potential for social game playing into something completely insular and disappointing. I don't design video games, but if this isn't an epic failure, I don't know what is. $60 bucks for a game and I have to have a subscription to even have the opportunity to play with another person? Are you kidding me?
summary: I cannot sit in a room with my kid and ...

reviewText: I bought this game, played it, and gave it a polite, concise one star review. It was removed within an hour on this site. They are deliberately removing any negative reviews of this game. I don't know how why they are doing this but it is wrong. This game is terrible and apparently companies are doing anything to keep bad press from getting out. I fully expect this review to be removed too but wanted to warn people, the game is terrible, bland, and boring.

I've been a long time fan of Halo. I've owned every single Halo game and collector's edition. Halo 5 was the reason I bought an xbox one. But this game lost almost every aspect of what made it Halo. I regret buying this game. I don't think I will ever own another Halo game from 343 industries.

For some reason the battery pack refuses to charge. The cord works just fine on its own, I used it to charge my phone to 100%. The light refuses to turn on while plugged into the Xbox controller to let you know it is charging. I have tried it while playing a game, without playing a game, and in a normal wall outlet. Nothing seems to make it work. Very disappointed.

I'm getting a battery life of about an hour on my standard controller after a few month's use. I feel like I just got a bad battery, but it took me too long to notice since I don't play much. WARNING: If you plug the cord in while playing a game, it may sign you out of your account and quit the game.
summary: Be prepared to test and return!

reviewText: Don't waste your money on the Play and Charge Kit. The battery pack won't hold a charge after about a year of minimal use. I probably only drained and re-charged it a dozen or so times. Same thing happened with my Xbox 360 Play and Charge Kit. You're much better off spending the money on a set of Eneloop rechargeable AA batteries. Very disappointed.

Not sure if I have a defective unit, but this charge kit does not hold a charge at all.  I have to keep it plugged into an outlet for it to work.  When it is unplugged I can only use it for like 5 minutes before it dies.
summary: When it is unplugged I can only use it for like 5 minutes before it dies

reviewText:
We have two XBOX One consoles and are xbox fans.  But I'm sure this will get downvoted into oblivion.

The first one of these I purchased (late 2013) is still going strong.

The second one was purchased around that time for our second console.  It failed.  Another one was bought last year.  It also failed.

I have no confidence in buying another one.  And, for the record, this kind of thing isn't required on the PS4, which comes with integrated batteries.
summary: Overpriced, unreliable, should not be required in the first place.

reviewText: I've only have this for a couple of weeks and I'm already having connection problems. If I hold the charger into my controller, it'll charge fine. As soon as I set it down, it stops charging completely. So it seems that the connectors are just a little bit too short. I got ahold of microsoft and they said they can't do anything about it since I didn't purchase through a microsoft store. So I spent retail price on a piece of junk. Microsoft, you dirty bastards you.

5 STARS

Update: I DID NOT write this review!!! I have no idea who this company is, but I wouldn't trust them. I'm really offended someone would hack into my account and write a review for something I didn't buy, nor would I ever be stupid enough to buy!

This is a good game but the language used in the game is awful. It is loaded with a lot of action and imagination but a lot of foul language. Would be a great game if not for the language but definitely not for kids.

As of right now this is the worst game I have ever played on PS1, PS2, PS3, and PS4. It is just awful. I'll update if something changes but I'm pretty sure I am about to walk to GameStop and get a whopping $27 for it and go to the bar and count my losses.

The game we received is broken. It will not load; it will not play. Our other games play, so it's not a problem with our Wii U. Unfortunately I was busy and not able to play the game until after the return window closed. By the time I got around to trying to play the game, I discovered the return window had closed and I was up the proverbial creek. I will not buy video games from Amazon in the future.

After just a few weeks of playing this disc in the WII-U, an error occured on the disc and it stopped working. I was very disappointed after spending $60. My husband looked up the error online and it appears it is well known for other people as well.

I am hesitant to purchase another one, even though my 5-year old son loves this game, as I can't buy a new disc every few weeks when it breaks.
summary: Stopped working after a few weeks

reviewText: I am not game system saavy and I bought this for my kids as a gift. We have a wii, not a wii U. No where in the description of the game did it say this game was not compatible with a wii. My kids were so disappointed that it wouldn't work on our wii.

Do you like to spend about an hour setting up a game before getting to play it?  Do you like games where all communication is strictly text (no voicework)?  Do you like playing a game for a month for free, just to be told you then have to pay a monthly fee to continue?  If you answered yes to all three questions, then this game is for you!  Otherwise, save your money.

I bought the game at Gamestop but thought Id put my experience here. I bought the game at launch and hadn't had a problem until a couple weeks ago. For some reason I cant log into the game from Origin. So now I have a game installed on my pc that doesn't work. Complete waste of money. It was fun though before this happened.

I tried for a very long time to get into this game. I played it for weeks, hours at a time. I just couldn't get into it. It seemed like the story never began and I spent a lot of time doing small mindless tasks. I love Final Fantasy, but this is nothing (and I expected this) like any traditional Final Fantasy game. This game was just not for me at all. I was very excited for this release, but unfortunately was left disappointed.

For me this game was a total disappointment. First problem is there is no single player campaign, so you are forced to play online. Then if you have a marginal connection, you may never get to even do that as I continually get "unable to connect to game servers" error.
I would never recommend this game to anyone.

I was really enjoying this one until it froze up on me.  I exited out and tried again.  Same problem.  I tried being a different player and it froze at the same spot.  I am going to try uninstalling and reinstalling the product and see if that works.  Will let you know.

This game is so boring. The only good thing about it is graphics. The gameplay is repetitive. The enemies are repetitive. The AI is ridiculous. The story is non-existent. I definitely regret buying it.

I wanted to like this game, but after playing it for awhile, I can honestly say I hate this game.  If you want to throw your controller at your TV multiple times while playing, then go ahead and get this.  If you like extremely repetitive gameplay, then go ahead and get this.  If you like getting killed with one or two shots, but it takes about 50 to kill your opponent, then, you guessed it, go and get it.  As for me, I am trading this in and getting a game that is actually fun.

I received this game for Xmas and I have not been able to play it since.  The Ubisoft servers have had major issues and I am unable to login to play.  Customer service has been attentive but I am still unable to play the game.

Don't waste your time!
summary: Don't Waster Your Time!!!  Can not play Game, Server DOWN.

reviewText: The game is a bit buggy and doesn't have the same style as the others.  While there are some cool features, it feels like a cheap knockoff of Dishonored more than anything else.  It's a shame, because I loved Thief 1 and Thief 2, and even appreciated some of Thief 3.
summary: Play Thief 1, Thief 2, or Dishonored instead

reviewText: I rented this game before purchasing it and I'm glad I did.  I cannot stand first person games!  This was suppose to be the first game for the PS4 and it sucks.  It would have been nice if the developers offered a choice between first and third person but they didn't so I won't be spending my money on it.  Thief you have been caught and found guilty.

I received my Atrox in the mail at around 12:30pm this afternoon. Only 7 hours after I opened the box it stopped working. Nothing happens when I plug it into my Xbox and it drains the power from my USB hub. If I connect it to my laptop it says that the device is draining too much power. They claim that it was designed to be used in competitions, but it stopped working after 2 hours. In the end I spent $200 for a hollow box with premium sanwa parts. I wouldn't recommend this to anyone.

I'm so glad I rented this instead of buying it. I was looking forward to this game but I don't know if they rushed it or what but the graphics and textures were just horrible. It bugged me so much I couldn't even make it past chapter 2. Maybe they'll fix it with updates but for a next gen game this can't be accepted. I know everyone has there own opinion but I can't see how anyone can give a five star rating. If you have a opportunity to rent this or play before you buy please do. I'm sure glad i did.

I could write for hours about how excited I was about this game ...
I could also write for hours about how let down I was when I played it.
I could write for hours about how much I wanted the game to end so many times...

I won't because this game robbed me of enough of my time - as a LONG TIME fan of horror and survival games... don't waste your time with this game.
summary: the evil within it is that it just drags on forever and goes nowhere.

reviewText: This is not what I expected. Don't get me wrong it's a cool game, but it takes way to long. It's a very long process just to get through one chapter. It gets boring very easily and the camera angles are very tough to get use to.

This game is terrible, I don't see how so many people seem to like it. The game play is glitchy, the horror is just a ridiculous level of gore that's almost cartoonish, and the constant dying/ waiting for the game to reload is just frustrating and unenjoyable.

This game is just awful. I have no idea what the story is, if there even is one? The graphics are way sub par. It isn't scary or creepy in the least bit, it's just annoying. Like, i don't get the premise of the game, it's just confusing. I cant believe i wasted money on this piece of trash.

Just bought this game yesterday. The game play is alright, but my god the black bars are so annoying! It makes it nearly impossible to see what's going on when you turn the camera angle and I've never played a game where they were that thick before. Very distracting! I sure hope they come out with an update to get rid of them...
summary: but my god the black bars are so annoying! It makes it nearly impossible to see what's ...

reviewText: Wasted money on this game. I can't even get it to download because it's so huge!  I've had my PS4 going for 4 days straight now just trying to get this do download. It tells me 52 hours. I get halfway there and it quits and starts all over again. I just got the PS4 so this is the first game I've tried. If I have to download mega games every time I want to play then I'm tossing the console in the trash because at this point it's nothing but a paperweight taking up space.

This game is unplayable. I can NEVER connect to the server. I've owned it for 2 weeks now and have yet to be able to play. How is that acceptable? How did this get released like this? I want my money back!

This game was not worth the sixty five dollars I dropped on it. I did not purchase the game through Amazon. I actually stood in line for the midnight release at a huge gaming chain. The game is hard to load, when you can manage to get into it it's really buggy, non player characters don't appear on the screen and cannot interact with you, and these are just some of the issues I have had. If I had it to do all over again I would wait until many of the issues to be resolved before I purchased this game.

I recieved this keyboard hoping it would be a nice durable keyboard, but when I got it, a lot of the keys didn't work. When I looked for technical support, they didn't even have a website. I returned it, spent a few extra dollars, and got myself a mechanical keyboard which I love.

So I received my monoprice xbox360 adapter today, and it is DOA! For those that don't know what that means, it means, dead on arrival. I am so disappointed. I have been waiting for this plug to come in, and when it finally did,it didn't work! I have filed a claim, lets see what happens...

This is easily the most tedious boring video game I've played in my whole 6 years owning a PS3. If you like stealth confusing missions and lame gaming mechanics then you will love Deus Ex Human Revolution: Director's Cut. More than anything Deus Ex Human Revolution: Director's Cut is boring and while I can forgive a video game for many shortcomings. I can't forgive Deus Ex Human Revolution: Director's Cut -... for being boring on a scale I have never experienced in another video game.
summary: A GAME SO GUT WRENCHINGLY BORING AND CONVOLUTED THERE ARE NO WORDS TO ADEQUATELY DESCRIBE IT!

reviewText: I have played hundreds of these games and I have to say that in my opinion this was the worst. It was short, boring, and for the most part, had no talking just reading in the story, but, even worse was the music! VERY annoying! I waited month for this game to be released. Needless to say, I was very disappointed.

This is a review about the product. It came in incomplete and the belt is missing. Therefore, I cannot enjoy the game as much as I would wish to enjoy. For example, if the disc was missing, how could I enjoy the game? The disc is part of the product just as the belt is part of the product.
summary: I cannot enjoy the game as much as I would wish to ...

reviewText:
I ordered this game and was super excited to get it. As soon as I got home, I opened it, popped it into the wii aaaaand.... Nothing. The disc couldn't be read. I thought maybe it was because my wii needed updated, so I did that, and still nothing. I am incredibly disappointed.

What makes it even worse is that it works on my parent's system, but not mine. WHY?! Anybody have any opinions on why that would be? My wii plays every other game but this one.
summary: I ordered this game and was super excited to get it

reviewText: Garbage, garbage, garbage. I mean, I understand the whole "you get what you pay for" theory, but I expected to at least get a good run out of at least ONE of these headsets. First one died the day after my return window closed. Second one went kaput four days later. You do, indeed, get what you pay for. Buyer beware.
summary: Both Died Immediately After Return Window Ended

reviewText: A kid's review: These lasted only for 2 months. One of them didn't even work to begin with. I was very careful with them and handled them gently, but they stopped working for no reason. One of them stopped working completely, even when it was on my head being used during a game. I did not do anything to break it. I'm sorry that I spent my money this way.
summary: Review by a very disappointed 12-year-old who bought these with his own money

reviewText: Maybe I'm old school, but when I buy a Disc, I want to be able to play it when I put it in the machine.  Needless to say, this game took 2 hours to update or install, or whatever it was it thought I wanted it to do.  But what really frustrates me is that the game shows me standing in front of it, and will not allow me to start it.  It's a piece of garbage.  Get something less frustrating.
summary: 2 hours to 'install' and Kinect doesn't see me on the start screen

reviewText: Most of the games don't work right. If you can get them to work they require a lot of tweaking and/or patching. It would be nice if they included the latest patch with the games. I advise spending a little more and getting something better. It might be better under Windows XP but I an running Windows 10 Pro.

I had bought 2 copies of this game. One for me, and one for my boyfriend. We were both very excited to play this game until we realized that you have to have a super computer to play it. We both have very advanced (fairly new) computers and the game literally had about a 20 second lag. Even modifying the settings didn't help. This game was definitely going for the "wow" factor. But how do they expect to get that reaction if only a handful of people can actually play the game?

So I am a big FPS game fan, so I bought this modded controller to make me better online. Well, I completely wasted my money. This controller makes you play a lot worse than normal, and the buttons don't even feel right! I'm telling you now, don't waste your money

The game probably works just fine and plays well, it just so happens if you have the PC retail version of the game this won't recognize the game at all. This DLC requires steam, but it just won't work if you have the retail version of the game. Im not giving this game a bad review or anything, just that it was not addressed for retail buyers.
summary: The PC retail version WILL NOT work with this!

reviewText: DO NOT PURCHASE THIS GAME UNLESS YOU ALREADY HAVE THE WALKING DEAD SEASON 1 INSTALLED ON YOUR STEAM ACCOUNT!!!  I JUST LOST $4.99 BECAUSE AMAZON DOES NOT DEAL WITH THE ISSUE AFTER YOU PURCHASE.  AMAZON SHOULD APPLY A WARNING TO THIS AND ALL OTHER DOWNLOADABLE CONTENT TO PROTECT CONSUMERS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
summary: BEWARE **** NO PRODUCT CODES******IF YOU PURCHASED THE WALKING DEAD FROM BESTBUY KEEP RECEIPT***

reviewText:
Item arrived a week sooner than listed from China, but came with a cord. A non removable cord. For a wireless mouse that says "Wireless Mouse" on the back in large letters.

Do not buy this if you want an actual wireless mouse. Or if you want a mouse with a cord. Or if you want a mouse.

I just made the mistake of purchasing the downloadable version of the game.  Unfortunately I learned too late that it's an EA 'Origin' game.  I had an Origin account, but it won't let me log in, and password reset emails don't get sent.

And to add insult to injury, there's no avenue to get my money back, and no 'real' way to contact Origin customer support.  I know, I just spend an hour trying.

I'd give this game a -5 star rating if I could.  GOD I HATE ORIGIN!!!

We bought these a few years ago and they lasted quite a while. In the past two weeks we have purchased another pair, returned it because it did not work and purchased another new pair, which also doesn't work. No sound in either and the second caused the computer to malfunction along with no sound. I will find another set in its place. I would not recommend this to anyone now that the quality has changed.

I wish I hadn't bought this, not because you do not get exactly what you ask for but because the game itself has a very toxic community that ruins it. I had to stop playing so this was a waste of money.
summary: I had to stop playing so this was a waste of money

reviewText: I bought this as a gift, but it was not compatible with the Wii they had.  I will have to get it back from our son so that I can return it.  Maybe I didn't read the fine print well enough, but I am disappointed because I thought it would work.  Little kids were disappointed also when they couldn't use it.  Make sure you read the description carefully and know what sort of Wii you have before purchasing.

I've played through the whole game on my phone.  It's fun but there is no way I'd fork over $39.99 or $29.99 or even $19.99 for this game.  This is a small screen casual game and putting it on a bigger screen doesn't add *that* much value.  Sorry.

This game was a disapointment and not what I expected it to be.  It's geared towards more of a young gamer or someone who is not very good at video games.  My 5 year old was able to play it with no problems,  I would not pay very much if anything for this game.
summary: a childs game, not a game for adults

reviewText: It's Terrible!! We bought this for our five year old and he hardly ever wants to play it. The graphics are like playing an old game and not in a good way. Very repetitive controls! My husband and I played it and within five minutes he said, "I cant believe I bought this game". I have to agree. I wish I would have known sooner. I would have sent it back and got a refund. Don't waste your time or money.
summary: I wouldn't if I were you...

reviewText: Game does not work properly at all.  While playing, it hesitates and doesn't respond.  There is no way to save progress, exit the game and you start from the beginning.  No instructions as to what "options" mean.  This is a horrible game and very disappointing.  Don't bother to buy it.

I bought this for my 5 year old.  I hate it, and he likes it.  The game play consists of shooting robots.  The scenes are all the same just different colors.  So boring, the only reason my 5 year old likes it is that he just shoots robots and doesn't have to think anything through.  I don't recommend this game at all.
summary: Its like playing the same level over and over again...

reviewText: For the price, it isn't too shabby, but I would not recommend it to anyone who games. It is not ergonomic at all, I thought the extra weight would help. DPI is garbage. I'd recommend it only if you're looking to use it for a short period of time.

Do not buy this! It's not worth getting a PS3 that only has 12gb because certain games can take up 3-5gb. That's mean you only can play 2-3 games. It's better to buy a PS3 that contains 120-500gb, and it's almost the same price. You can swap hard drives and upgrade it, but the hard drive cost at least $100.

This product was way overhyped with less-than-honest demo videos. After a day of playing with it, I haven't had a desire to plug it back into my computer.

Even if the hardware and software improves, I think there is a fundamental problem with the idea of controlling a 2D screen with 3D gestures.

Every now and then the buttons decide to keep repeating the command. So instead of closing a tab, it will end up closing all of my tabs and I lose everything. Or instead of pasting something, it pastes it a dozen times.
I was hoping it would "break in" over time, but that doesn't appear to be happening.

Worked well for about a month, then it said the battery was at zero percent and the cursor wouldn't move. I installed new batteries and it still wouldn't move. I thought well maybe I got bad batteries, so I bought a different pack and installed those. It still wouldn't work.
summary: I thought well maybe I got bad batteries, so I bought a different pack and ...

reviewText: I misunderstood this description. I was under the impression that this was a rechargeable cordless mouse. So the batteries are supposed to last 250 hours? I don't think so. I took it out of the package last night when I received it, pulled the tab and voila one bar on the battery meter. I need to return this I just don't know how to go about doing it.

Garbage.

Pro - Long battery life on any mode.

Con - Intermittent connection. Can be so bad it becomes unusable.

I forgot about returning this so I am going to give it away.

If you can get this for free I would recommend it.

Would not recommend paying any amount for this.
summary: Bad connection kills what would be a good mouse.

reviewText: Pretty boring. It's not like Harvest Moon. Pretty much all you do is sit in your shop. If you don't have the TV on or something else to do while the game is open you'll be bored to tears. Don't recommend it.

I'm really disappointed in this game. I've played games in the franchise before and loved them but this one is horrible. its repetitive, boring and you don't really do much in the game at all. your character sleeps, walks around and stands in the shop to sell items which half the time you're standing in one place not doing anything. don't waste your money on this one folks.
summary: don't waste your time and money

reviewText: I can't begin to tell you how terrible this game is. The graphics are soft and muddy, making the targets are very difficult to see. The sound is awful, the maps are so large you spend most of your time running around not seeing any targets. That is, when you're not being sniped constantly. I'm a huge fan of Black Ops 2, but I wish I didn't waste my money on this crappy new version.

1 year after buying this mouse, I've run into the double clicking problem. For those of you that haven't heard of it, basically 90% of my clicks are now double clicks. I've tried cleaning the micro switches with alcohol and compressed air but no luck. In addition, the middle mouse button frequently doesn't work. I used to love this mouse but I'll be trying a different brand from now on.
summary: I used to love this mouse but I'll be trying a different brand ...

reviewText:
To configure your mouse, you have to connect to the internet, create a naga account, download an update, and restart your computer.

These steps were not required when I bought the mouse, and have been added in the last few years.

What's more, you can't even contact Razer without looking up your date of purchase, place of purchase, and serial number. Completely obnoxious.
summary: WHY DO I HAVE TO CREATE AN ACCOUNT TO USE A MOUSE

reviewText: I think the side buttons are an awesome idea and I love the ergonomics but the problem I have with this mouse is after just one month of use the main clicker (the left click) is broken it no longer works at all. I've had other Razer mice in the past that have lasted years and still work. So I'm not sure if they cheeped out on this model or maybe its just a defective part.
summary: I think the side buttons are an awesome idea and I love the ergonomics but the problem ...

reviewText: Purchased this mouse and tried using it for the first time with no success. Installed the Razer Synapse 2.0 application and tried to calibrate it to my mousepad with no success. Won't move the pointer at all.
summary: Purchased this mouse and tried using it for the first ...

reviewText: My wife bought this for Christmas because I needed a better charging system than one wire. If I could give it less than one star I would. Controllers are a complete pain to line up right. Can't get it to work 90% of the time. When I can get ONE to work, I have not yet been able to get the top part to work at all. This is an awful piece of garbage, and I am taking it back as soon as possible.
summary: ... wife bought this for Christmas because I needed a better charging system than one wire

reviewText: I bought this thinking that it looked exactly like my NIKO charger for my PS3 controllers.  It turns out, it's nothing like the NIKO, it's a piece of junk compared to NIKO.  With the NIKO, the charging ports are plugged into easily, and then connect to the charging base.  This piece of junk has you plug directly into the base, and the majority of the time, it doesn't charge the controller.
summary: I bought this thinking that it looked exactly like my NIKO charger for my PS3 controllers

reviewText: My old set of Energizer's were only lasting an hour or so after a few years of use (originally lasted 6 at least) so I decided it was time for new ones. When I unboxed the new ones I threw the old ones away which was a HUGE mistake because these new ones are useless. One of them lasts about an hour and the other one only turns on for about 15 seconds at a time.
summary: Battery Life Shorter than my Old Batteries

reviewText: The game seems like it would be a lot of fun. A glitch however makes it unplayable in the two player mode. On a number of levels the two player split screen switches back and forth constantly, making it impossible to get through the game. I think they rushed to get this game out and gave us a defective game for the X-Box One. I only hope the Wii U version is better.

Didn't work from day one. Wasn't worth trying to send it back. Was a Christmas present for my son so I had them unopened for a month before he even opened them. Very cheap product. I guess you get what you pay for

Bought this just for the DLC. Didn't play it for awhile since I was playing Black Ops 3. Went to download the DLC and was told that the code was invalid. It was over a month and I couldn't return it. So, beware if you are buying this for the DLC as it looks like some of the codes are invalid.

Just another recycled COD game. I've had this game since the PS4 was released and I've only played it a handful of times. Incredibly disappointing. If you're looking for a great shooter to play, buy Battlefield instead!

I'm a longtime COD fan but have played nearly every Battlefield since 1942. I've never quite liked Battlefield as much as COD but as the latest COD hardly made any improvements, I decided to pick up a copy of Battlefield 4. I can surely say it was a waste of money. The short time I did get to play the game before crashing, the gameplay just wasn't up to par in my opinion. Battlefield players will probably like it, that's if they get to play it for more than 10 minutes without crashing.
summary: I really don't get the hype

reviewText: This game is as bad as it gets. The shooting is not realistic. It takes forever to hit somebody even when you aim at them. The online sucks because it takes forever to find a game. Once in the game it is usually fine. The campaign is boring and not fun. The overall game is pretty bad. I would not recommend at all.
summary: HORRIBLE DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY

reviewText: This game only gets 1 star because I can't give it zero. Don't waste your money. If I could get 1/2 my money back, I would return it tomorrow. I loved Battlefield 3 and had high hopes for this game. I was sadly disappointed. There are TONS of problems with the online play. It is not fun at all. An overpriced game that was rushed through development. Don't waste your money like I did!!!!!!

Campaign mode  is so glitchy as to be unplayable.  In my first run-through the campaign froze on the second mission.  Restarting from the previous checkpoint and replaying the level did not work.  Yes, there are work-arounds requiring uninstalling patches, deleting files, etc., but there has been no fix.  This is absolutely inexcusable in this day and age.  I've waited too long to get a refund, but I'll think twice before buying EA games in the future.
summary: Campaign mode is fatally flawed - and EA can't be bothered to fix it

reviewText: If you love to push elevator buttons and open doors for others to run thru, if you love running around in a maze of hallways that go nowhere looking for other players you are going to love this game. If you want a first person shooter then this game is not for you. You will spend hours listening to others talk, talk, talk, and get in your way of playing a game then you will love this game. I hate this game!
summary: Do you love to push elevator buttons and open doors?

reviewText: I hate this game so much and I'm a big fan of first person shooters. Everything about this game is horrible. There's no multiplayer lobby. It puts you in games with nobody in them. It constantly freezes. And the graphics look like a Nintendo 64. I will be selling it to get some money back at least.
summary: Horrible graphics, bad lobbys, constantly freezes. Overall extremely disappointing

reviewText: Blew $60 on this only to discover it can't be installed on an XBOX 360 4GB console. It *requires* a hard drive. This was not disclosed when I pre-ordered, and it's still not listed on the Amazon page It will not work with the internal 4GB internal flash drive. It will not work with a USB flash drive. Only with a hard drive.  This should be stated loudly and clearly *before* you purchase.
summary: BEWARE - DOES NOT WORK WITH XBOX 360 4GB CONSOLE

reviewText: This game was terrible. I am a COD duty guy and I got this game because of the good reviews for BF4 and the bad reviews for BO2 and Ghosts. I bought this game for $24.99 on amazon and traded it in to Gamestop for $30.

If you want a good game, stay away from this one.  You apparently have to pay extra to access "premium" features.... like playing the online game with people of your choosing.  If you want to play with random 11 year olds, this is your game.  If you want to play with your own friends or make your own teams, look elsewhere.

It doesn't work. It has been a month since its release and the game is still broken. In fact it was working ok the first week, but after they did something on their end, it completely broke the game for me, I can not play online, I can only play the campaign.

This game was meant for the PS4/Xbox One. It should have never been released for the current consoles. The graphics are horrible, the weapons are underpowered, overall...complete waste of my money. I am pissed. I wish I listened to the Gamestop employee when he told me not to get it.
summary: Worse graphics than BF3, don't get it.

reviewText: Don't waste your money on this. If you've played The Sims 3 you're going to be very disappointed. there are 82 features missing from this game that were in previous titles, but the biggest in my opinion is the open world. This is a step backwards. It feels more like Sims 2. You'll be tired of this game after 2 hours.

I have been a die hard Sims fan since the first one. Not so much anymore. This game is a glorified version of Sims 1. I thought it was supposed to be Sims 4. I could fill several pages of my complaints regarding this game, but I realize EA just does not care about its audience, so I will not waste my time or money again.
summary: so I will not waste my time or money again

reviewText: After about 2 months of playing the game will not even load when I open it. After some research I have found that a good number of people are experiencing this issue with little to no help from EA to resolve the issue.  I actually enjoy the game but what good is it if you can't play it?  Sims 3 still works fine on the same PC.  EA needs to fix this problem or offer some kind of compensation to the many customers who have wasted their money on this game.

I've been a fan of the Sims since the beginning.  I was really excited about the Sims 4.  It looked great in the previews with the different "tweaking" that could be done to the Sims body parts.  I got it and it's just been disappointing.  It's not fun, at all.  It's not worth the price.  There's no real content to justify the price.  And the customization is so lacking in so many ways.  I don't like it.  I'll just stick with my older Sims games, they're more fun.

Not worth the money. If I can figure a way to get my money back, I will. There is SO much missing. I was bored of the game after just a couple hours. I created a single person then created two people thinking that would be more fun. It's not. It's lacking so much that it's hard to have any fun at all. I'm back to playing S3... I just wasted $80 because I won't play this again.

I've always loved the Sims. I played the very first one and have been obsessed with it since. The Sims 4 is a major letdown. It's focused mainly on the Sim itself doing its own free will.

I cannot stand the camera and how it's controlled. You can even angle it.

Feel like there's nothing to do in the Sims 4. Other than take care of your Sim.

I am not impressed. This game looks like an animated cartoon - I feel like the graphics went backwards. This original game (The Sims 4, no expansion packs) is very basic and it seems that you would need to buy a lot of expansion packs just to make it fun to play.

For now, I will continue to play The Sims 3, which I highly recommend.
summary: This game looks like an animated cartoon - I feel like the graphics ...

reviewText: If I had known this was an online download thing, I would've never bought it. I cannot currently figure out what to do, and am left with a $50 paperweight that I will have to return. My advice is don't waste your money, find a game that's not a digital download. I hope the return process is simple, because I'm really frustrated.

I enjoy playing Sims3 and I really liked Sims2 as well. This one is highly disappointing to me. I waited a year after initially playing to see if it got better, but it hasn't. If you really want to enjoy the game, go for the sims 3, it's cheaper and better than this one.
summary: I enjoy playing Sims3 and I really liked Sims2 as well

reviewText: I've played the sims since the first game came out. The Sims 4 has been a disappointment, the graphics are awful compared to the sims 3. I was hoping for an improvement there, not being worse. The gameplay and map are extremely limited and has little to offer. Overall, the sims 3 is a much better game and I've gone back to playing that.

Initially I thought the game was okay, but recently there have been a lot of bugs in the game that makes it unplayable.  I played my game for 10hours in total and now I am unable to load any households; when I found this out I went onto EA forums and found that hundreds of others are having this same situation.  I would urge you to wait to buy this game until all of the bugs are worked out.

I've been playing the sims ever since I was 10 years old on a junky old windows computer. As a longterm customer I found this game to be an extremely disappointing waste of money. It is not at all worth the price and doesn't have the magic of the old games. Don't buy it...
summary: As a longterm customer I found this game to be an extremely disappointing waste of money

reviewText:
I really, really abhor these headphones.  After owning three pairs of the V2 over the years, I decided to try the V3.  They're not even close to the V2.  The ear pockets are too small, they block out far too much sound and the mute button is just awful.  They are so bad, that I can't hear myself talk, which is a very strange feeling.

These are, honestly, the worst headphones that I have ever tried.  I'm going back to the 5HV2.

Don't get me wrong, these headphones sound amazing. When they're working properly.

After 30 minutes or so of solid gaming, you'll start to hear the audio stutter, about 4 times per second. Quietly at first, but louder if you ignore it. The only way I've found to fix it is to disconnect and reconnect the mixamp. Power cycling the mixamp does nothing, nor does powercycling the headphones.

I'd go with another brand.
summary: Great when it works, agonizing when it doesn't (which is often).

reviewText: The controller is very twitchy. It doesn't respond well. In particular, the joy stick does not work at all. I bought 3 of these, thinking it would be great to pull out and play with family and friends. None of them worked. It is worth it to bite the bullet and buy a real controller. This controller is a horribly made generic.
summary: the joy stick does not work at all

reviewText: The controller is very twitchy. It doesn't respond well. In particular, the joy stick does not work at all. I bought 3 of these, thinking it would be great to pull out and play with family and friends. None of them worked. It is worth it to bite the bullet and buy a real controller. This controller is a horribly made generic.
summary: the joy stick does not work at all

reviewText: A horrible experience from start to finish. I can not recommend enough that you don't even consider this one. For the sake of your sanity and your wallet don't waste your time. If I could have given it zero stars I would have. If you do for whatever reason decide to ignore my warnings please be sure to have dremmel on standby so you can mod the internal components to actually make them work.
summary: Don't waste your time or money!

reviewText: I tried to return this keyboard because i could not get the software to work on it. The seller would not let me return it. The keyboard is defective. I cannot even use it. Do not buy this worthless junk.
summary: I tried to return this keyboard because i could not ...

reviewText: I love this game, Unfortunately the digital download is flawed. The game will freeze at a certain point during the campaign and there is no work around. I had to rent a disc from the video store before I could finish this game. This is a well known glitch that still has not been fixed. And of course you can't return a digital download on amazon.
summary: The game freezes and makes it unplayable.

reviewText: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY UNLESS YOU HAVE A XBOX LIVE GOLD MEMBERSHIP!!!!  RIDICULOUS!!!  Why are we so intent on squeezing every penny out of everyone???  So upset and my child is in tears because he can't play his new game.  I can't spend that much money on a stupid game!!  So upset!!!!!
summary: don't waste your time or MONEY!!

reviewText: You can only play this game as a multiplayer. This means you are forced to buy an Xbox Live Gold Account or the game is unplayable. Packaging does not indicate that this is the case. Was a waste of money.

I have a very upset son right now. He got this game for Christmas and is devastated that he can't play it. I didn't realize what the problem was until I came onto the reviews and saw that others were having the same issue about not being able to play. Very, very disappointed that a company could be allowed to charge extra after you have already purchased a game to even be able to play it.

Not a multi-player game - you can play with up to 24 players online, but my two sons sitting in the same room cannot play together. I would never have bought this game if that had been in the description.

I can't rate this game any higher because I cannot play it without paying Microsoft money for Xbox Live Gold, and I refuse to fall for their ploy. A game you can buy as a disc in a store should work without you having to pay again. They should have made this a download only game. Selling it in stores is deceptive, to say the least. In the future I won't just check the ratings before I buy a game for my children. I will also check to see if Microsoft is trying to bilk me.

Just want to echo what most other reviewers are saying. Unless you pony up the subscription fee for XBox Live Gold, you just bought a shiny drink coaster. The game literally does not play at all without it. The only warning you'll ever get is a tiny square, maybe 0.75" x 0.75", at the bottom of the package. Given that this is a game that's marketed mostly to teenagers and younger children, I think it's an unconscionable bait-and-switch on the part of M$ and EA.
summary: Just want to echo what most other reviewers are saying ...

reviewText: As my son says, "This is crap!"  We have played Plants vs. Zombies on the kindle, and thought this would be a fun addition.  Instead, it is basically unplayable.  We have live, but since we won't let him play with people he doesn't know, and none of his friends have this, it is useless.  There is no single player mode, and he can't even play against people here in the house.  What a waste!

There is no reason to buy this for the XBOX 360, unless you only like to play online with strangers or have multiple XBOX 360s. Only one person can play per console, plus every player who plays must have an Xbox live gold account. That means for a family of four, you would need four consoles, four TVs and four separate XBox Gold accounts.

This game is terrible because:

1. You need an xbox gold membership to play.
2. You can't play co-op with profiles on the same  system.
3. You have to link to an origin account to play.

This game is simply not worth the trouble or effort to play.

This game cost $30.  In order to play the game you have to have a Xbox Live Gold account and pay a subscription at $60/year or $10/month.  I would think that this would be one of the first items listed in the description of the product.  It isn't.  If you are truly a gamer and have an account, it probably is a lot of fun.  My son was very disappointed when he spent him money and found out he needed to spend more in order to play it.
summary: Not what you think it is?

reviewText: This is the most disappointing game I have ever played. I bought it to play with my boyfriend and there is virtually nothing you can do using the same console. I am retiring this within 3 hours of buying it. Such a waste of money.
summary: Impossible to play with a friend on the same console

reviewText: REQUIRES XBOX LIVE GOLD TO PLAY! My son ordered this with his Christmas money and waited patiently for it to arrive. He asked about it nearly everyday. Turns out, you HAVE TO HAVE XBOX LIVE GOLD TO PLAY!  Nowhere in the description did it say anything about that, and now my son can't play it unless we shell out MORE money to Microsoft. So, in summary, if you don't want to pay extra to play something you've already payed for, DO NOT BUY THIS GAME!
summary: REQUIRES XBOX LIVE GOLD TO PLAY!

reviewText: My 3 sons were so excited to get this game. We even have Xbox Live Gold so I figured it wouldn't be any problem. They were happy about the fact it was 4 player so they could all play together. Wrong! It is actually 1 player and you can play co-op with 3 other Xbox live friends. If you think more than 1 kid on the same Xbox is gonna play this, you are mistaken. We wasted $30.

I wish I could give this game zero stars because it doesn't even deserve a single star. I am a long time Forza fan, I've been playing since the first game and this is just trash. Everything started going downhill with Horizon and this is the nail in the coffin for me: I will never buy another Forza game.

If I had read reviews prior to purchasing, I wouldn't have bought Forza 5. You can drop $60 for the game, and then they expect you to buy the DLC for another $60-80. Sorry but I'm not paying extra money to unlock cars that should have been included in the game to begin with. The pricing is 100% a scam.

I strongly feel that this is a counterfeit product.  I bought mine from GameStop and it doesn't look anything like this.  For example, the PS symbol is does not look like that, and it's lower on the side.  DO NOT PURCHASE THIS!  The official Sony product is $24.99, and you can pick it up at almost any store.  I am unable to find the official Sony product on Amazon.  The official Sony product is well built and works great!
summary: I bought mine from GameStop and it doesn't look anything like this. For example

reviewText:
If it was better quality this would be a great charger.  We bought our first one in March of 2015. It stopped working in 7 months later.

We bought another one in November of 2015. It stopped working about 10 months later.

It worked for about a month and then stopped.  From the very beginning it was very hard to get the controllers to sit correctly on the charger so that they would continuously charge.  It's just easier to get another charging cord if you need two controllers to be charging at the same time.  I really can't recommend this product from my experience with it.
summary: I really can't recommend this product from my experience with it

reviewText:
First unit wasn't working at all out of the box. Ordered a replacement and had the same issue with the second unit.

There's a decent chance you will either have issues out of the box or have one side fail after a few weeks as others have noted.

I'd suggest looking for a higher quality charger. Best of luck.

I was reading other reviews before I bought this, and one said it would drain the controller batteries.  I thought that unlikely, but it happened to me too.  The controllers I charged on it will not hold a charge nearly as long as before using this product for a couple of months.  Now, not only will I need to buy a new charger, I'll need to buy two new controllers.  Caveat Emptor.

I wish I'd have known what a hassle this was going to be. There is nothing intuitive about this charger. It's a pain to get your controllers on it. They get knocked off easily. Sometimes it doesn't even charge my controllers. It's just a really bad design but unfortunately it was the only design that was available when I bought it.
summary: There are way better charger setups out there.

reviewText: Every time I try to use this it kills the battery on the controller. The controller lights amber and looks like it's charging but the next day when I go to use it it's completely dead. I don't get it? Must be broken or something.
summary: Looks like it's charging but it's not

reviewText: I love Sims 3 and was hoping Sims 4 would be even better. I was let down when I discovered that Sims 4 wasn't much of an improvement on the original at all. I deleted this one off my computer after about 3 attempts/10 hours of game play and I have gone back to playing Sims 3 instead.

I would give it no stars because there is nowhere to enter the code on the website it sends you to. I spent two days going over every inch of the website and still could not find it. If there is a way to input the code by all means let me know.
summary: Do not waste your money code does not work

reviewText: A lot of people are disappointed with the game, myself included. It's as if EA is going backwards instead of forward. But, the company Origins said that they will give you a refund if you don't like it, which is refreshing considering that you can't return an open video game to the store.
summary: The company will refund your money

reviewText: This charger started to turn black,  the plastic began to melt, and there were electrical "crackling" sounds coming from within it. This occured while the Wii U was plugged in and charging, but not being used. Luckily, my son was awake and noticed it since it was in his bedroom. He told me about it, and I unplugged it before it could catch on fire. It's scary to think what could've happened if it had been while we were sleeping.

The first charger that I ordered lasted about two weeks and then shorted out. I contacted the company and they were kind enough to send a second charger to me at no cost. The second charger that I received worked fine for the first three weeks, and then shorted out shortly after. I don't really feel like dealing with it again, so I just went ahead and ordered a charger and charging dock from Nintendo for about $20 all together.
summary: Charger Shorts Out In A Few Weeks

reviewText: I bought this for my 9 year old last year, along with the red one because I like the colors and the price. They feel very cheap. The blue had pieces of plastic chipping off around the cord and and it started splitting along the sides until we had to throw it away. He still has the red one, but it is being held together by duct tape. I realize you get what you pay for, so I will not buy this kind again.

I can't really say anything about the game, since I was never able to even get it activated.  The process of downloading, installing, and activating is very cumbersome.  I received error messages every step of the way and finally could not get past, even with help from EA chat, a problem with activating the software.  I hope it's worth the trouble for those who manage to get it working, but I never did and would never buy anything from EA again.

I know I should have listened to the reviews! This program runs terribly on my MacBook Air. The graphics are fuzzy in places and, even when it works, the whole thing is too busy looking to know what's going on. It's hard to figure out how to do things. I loved the old SimCity. This doesn't come close to living up to the old game.

You have got to be kidding me.  Why would anyone in their right mind pay more than face value for a gift card?  What are they thinking?  Just go to your local grocery store and pick one up for face value.
summary: You've got to be kidding me...

reviewText: Whatever you do, do not buy anything even remotely related to Steam. If you ever have any problems, you can't talk to a person, you have to email them, and from what I've experienced, and what I've read, they take a VERY long time to solve even the simplest of problems.

Rip off. There's simply no good reason to pay this much for a card. Go to gamestop, pay $20, get a $20 card. If you have steam, you can put $20 in your account without the need to buy a card in the first place. Total complete rip off.

Are you kidding me?? Seriously, $68.00 for a $50.00 gift card!!! Outrageous! I need one, but won't buy it here. This is totally scalping. I know it is a little drive to go to either WalMart or Gamestop, but you can get them there for $50.00.

Drivers have been a never-ending source of frustration. These headphones are way too loud and no amount of fiddling with drivers or settings has fixed the issue. I really regret buying these headphones.
summary: Drivers have been a never-ending source of frustration. These ...

reviewText:
I ordered 2 sets of these. One for a friend, and one for me. In my set, one side was significantly louder than the other side. I RMA'ed them and they sent me a new pair. The new pair worked great for a few days and then stopped working altogether.

I'd like to point out that Corsair's customer service was excellent. At this point I don't feel like paying for another RMA, so... yeah.
summary: The new pair worked great for a few days and then stopped working altogether

reviewText: I was really excited for this game, but once it was downloaded it didn't work properly. The delay between when you tell the character to perform an action (such as run forward, jump, etc) and the time they actually do it was very distracting. Movement was sludge slow. If the game worked properly for me, I'm sure it would be pretty decent, I'm just judging by my particular copy of the game.

If you're buying this because you love the original Plants Vs. Zombies and want more...be warned, you ain't gonna get it from this. This is a multiplayer shooter game. I have no idea how to play it, and there's no manual. I don't know what "stickers," "coins," or "stars" are supposed to be. I don't know how you're supposed to move around in the game. And I don't want to multiplay. Maybe the design or music or something would be good, but since I can't get this game to do anything, I don't know.
summary: If you're buying this because you love the original Plants Vs

reviewText: i bought this game for my PC and have tried everything to get it to play but nothing works.they said it was for windows 7 and that's what i have. when i launch the game i get message saying that my computer does not meet the minimum requirements for playing this game.

I bought this controller about a year ago and I really haven't used it that much.  When it worked it worked well.  The LED lights were too bright so I never used them.  Now out of the blue the controller will not work at all.  It has only seen casual use by me (an adult).  I've never beat on it or thrown it or anything.  Like I said it worked just fine for a year, but I expect a little more longevity than that.
summary: Like I said it worked just fine for a year

reviewText: I ordered this as a Christmas gift for my grandson who was so excited to get it. Now it is only 4 months since he had it and it is broken, there is a wide colorful line across the top screen. I would not recommend this to anyone.
summary: I would not recommend this to anyone

reviewText:
This keyboard worked perfectly the first time I plugged it in. After plugging it in again, it shut down, and half the keys no longer work. Buy from a different manufacturer.

Edit: Apparently, this is a problem the manufacturer knows about, and hasn't corrected. Save your money, go with a cheaper keyboard. I ended up with a CM Storm keyboard and mouse for less than the cost of the single keyboard, and it not only feels better, and works better, but it includes a mouse as well

This product was great when I first bought it about 2 years ago. Then the battery started to lose charge and the dock has now had issues with knowing when a controller needs a charge. If you plug in your mic it will shut off due to not having enough juice to power the mic and the controller which is just annoying. I really was hoping this would last a lot longer but it was only good for the first year. Sad
summary: Good for a one (1) year then the batteries started to lose power.

reviewText: This is one of the worst things you can buy. First off it doesn't even work for one of my controllers. Second problem is that the charge doesn't last long at all. It was ok for about 3 weeks and then it went downhill.

One would think that buying a game of the year edition of a game means you are buying the game plus some extra stuff, right?

Wrong.  This is just the extra stuff.  If you want the original game, you must buy that separately.

Despite purchasing this in part because of the reviews, this did not work for me! I have an HP that runs Windows 8 and despite all the tips and tricks we found on installing it, it would not install the driver needed. So, while I am sure this is a great product for other users, it was not great for me. Thumbs down!!!

This wheel is not a wheel at all. It's just like a game pad and not like other Thrustmaster wheels. I am in the process of sending it back after it would not set up properly for any of my games. So it's a huge waste of Money, Don't buy it.
summary: Not what I had hoped for

reviewText: Sad to say I bought this to use with Truck Simulator.  It doesn't work with it.  We tried everything to get it to work but no go.  So now it just sits unused.  I wish it would have said it didn't work with it.  I hope it works with other games but this is the only game my grandson likes at this point and he just has to use the keyboard.  DO YOUR RESEARCH BEFORE YOU BUY.
summary: Sad to say I bought this to use with Truck ...

reviewText: The one I got was terrible it didn't even power on unless I plugged it in even though it said it had a full battery. I bought this one instead it works great  buy this one  ----------> https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B015WKY3IM/ref=oh_aui_detailpage_o01_s00?ie=UTF8&psc=1
summary: The one I got was terrible it didn't even power on unless I plugged it ...

reviewText: There is a problem on Act 2.  If you have an AMD driver, Blizzard is recommending to revert to an older driver version to make the game play.  The problem dates back to 2015.  There are 26 pages of complaints on Blizzard's FAQ page about this.  I don't understand why Blizzard refuses to fix their problem.  If I had seen these issues before I bought the game, I wouldn't have bothered.

I already have one for me so I bought two more, one for my boyfriend and one for the dog. Both came DOA. One has a scratch by the screw on the back. I am not going to bother opening it but I'm wondering if it even has a battery in it.
summary: I already have one for me so I bought two ...

reviewText: These are made of very cheap hard plastic that will hurt your thumbs as you play. They look very similar to the original SNES controllers but they feel nothing like them. The buttons are loose and don't seem to have good contact when pressed. I would recommend just using a Playstation controller or whatever other USB controller you have lying around the house instead.

I purchased this controller to use on my Imac.  The description of the item says that it is plug and play with any OSX 10.6 or higher.  I am running Mavericks and the controller would not work.  I also tried installing some of the controller mapping software to use with it but, they would not recognize the controller either.  I did not have a good experience with this controller and returned it.

I got this so I could cheat on White Knight Chronicles. The grinding in that game is awful and I just wanted to get max money, guild rank, and the best items so I could sit back and enjoy the story. Except this doesn't work - every time I try to activate cheats on my game save it gives me the error "There was an error when trying to patch the game save."

Don't get this. It's a waste of money and doesn't do what it's supposed to do.
summary: There was an error when trying to patch the game save.

reviewText:
I can't stand this brand any more. I used to love it.

Our charging station wouldn't work with these. The one day I plugged in the controller and didn't pay attention the battery melted into the controller and fried it. I don't know about you, but replacing a controller isn't cheap. Save your money and buy anything else.

Save your money and DON'T BUY THIS!!!!!!!!!

I had this style for my xbox 360 and I loved them. I've replaced them once and in less than two months the front charger isn't working and the back charger is really picky. I can't stand these. I'm just waiting for my next pay check to replace them.

DOES NOT WORK WITH NYKO CHARGE BASE!!!

https://www.amazon.com/Nyko-Charge-Base-Xbox-One/dp/B00FLLFJE0/ref=pd_sim_63_1?_encoding=UTF8&pd_rd_i=B00FLLFJE0&pd_rd_r=J2V54KR1EF64YWF50QSB&pd_rd_w=yCndp&pd_rd_wg=JXx3G&psc=1&refRID=J2V54KR1EF64YWF50QSB

Was looking for replacement battery packs and thought damn this would be the ticket...

Wrong!

Smelled funny as soon as I plugged it in...

All this fire hazard reviews have got me frizzled...
summary: DOES NOT WORK WITH NYKO CHARGE BASE!!!

reviewText:
I wish it worked better, but you get what you pay for. The batteries don't hold a charge for even half as long as the official ones, the charger is sometimes finicky, and it didn't take long before both of the batteries started doing after only a couple of hours (or less) of use.
When I tried to file a warranty claim I found that all forms of contact were ineffective, and never was able to contact the company.
summary: I wish it worked better, but you get what you pay for

reviewText: We had the exact same problem a lot of people had while using this product. It would only charge one controller. Both controllers would be on the charger and both lights would light up, but one controller would only last for a couple of minutes. We enjoyed the streamline design of the system, but it's a total waste of money. Do not purchase.

This product has never charged a battery.  When I place the controller on the charger, it starts to charge then after a few minutes the charge light starts blinking (indicating a poor connection).  I have had this product for a few months and I have never been able to get it to successfully charge a single battery.  Perhaps I have a faulty unit?

Don't know what happened but nyko needs to go back to the drawing board on this one. I have used nyko a very long time and that was the reason I purchased this one. Sadly to say it's a major letdown. Sometimes it will charge and sometimes it won't.

I had no problem figuring out how to place the batteries in the charger, it really isn't hard if you use your eyes and your brain. However, after only a month I am down to only 1 working charge dock, and it is on its way out, so now I have to buy a new one. I'm gonna buy the Energizer one now.

This product was great up until yesterday. One of the batteries completely stopped working. When I put it to be charged, it flashes and there is no way for me to contact the seller and get a replacement for it!

I originally recommended this to many of my friends, and they all bought it. I am now very disappointed. Please help!
summary: Great! but now not working anymore! :(

reviewText: Not much of a review. The batteries only held a charge for about 10 minutes and when placed on the charger it took about 5 minutes to charge the batteries. Obviously this charging station was a lemon but I'm not sure if others had the same experience.

I bought two of these charger kits for my new Xbox 1 after being relatively happy with the Nyko chargers for the 360. However, I've have problems with both sets of chargers (either not charging at all or only charging from one of the two stations) and would never recommend this product to anyone. I've since purchased the "BD&A Charging Station for Xbox One" and am very happy with that.
summary: Avoid - get the BD&A charging station instead.

reviewText:
I bought one of these a few months ago.  Worked ok for the first week but then the charger wouldn't "see" the batteries and I would have to fiddle with it for a couple of minutes to make sure it was charging.

When that stopped working I resorted to taking the batteries out of the controllers and taping them to the charger.  After a week of this I came to my senses, threw this piece of crap in the trash and bought the Hori Dual Charger for Xbox One.  Haven't looked back.
summary: threw this piece of crap in the trash and bought the Hori Dual Charger ...

reviewText:
As numerous others have stated, this charger does not work correctly. Only one of the two ports on the base works, and to even get the one to work, you need to ensure that you have the correct batter/port combo.

If you need a dual charger for your Xbox One controllers, I would recommend the one by Energizer instead.

Does NOT work with the Special Edition Call of Duty Xbox One Controller.  This was ordered as an accessory to this bundle, which I received today.  I'm not sure if the Call of Duty controller is sized slightly different from the normal controller, but this will not work with this controller.  When putting in the rechargeable battery and included backplate, the charge strips do not line up with the hole.  As such, they cannot be charged.
summary: Does not work with Call of Duty Xbox One Controller

reviewText: The case does not come with new controller backing (at least mine did not), so if I want to charge my controllers I have to remove the battery cover which, for some reason, doesn't easily slide off and on.  I've had it less than a month and the charger has already stopped working entirely.  All in all, I wouldn't recommend that anyone buy this product.

I installed this into my computer a while back, but I could not get it to work properly.
