My computer works perfect without it, but as soon as I plug this into my motherboard, the computer fails during startup, as if there was not enough power (which is ridiculous, because I have plugged other things into the PSU without any problems, considering this fan controller should only take a small amount of power). Maybe I will figure out a problem sometime soon; only then will I change my review.

If I had read reviews prior to purchasing, I wouldn't have bought Forza 5. You can drop $60 for the game, and then they expect you to buy the DLC for another $60-80. Sorry but I'm not paying extra money to unlock cars that should have been included in the game to begin with. The pricing is 100% a scam.

I have ordered this product three times and it has broken every single time. I am absolutely sick and tired of reordering this product. It came broken to me the second time I ordered it. The ear piece falls out of the headset usually. This is the last time I am ordering something from Gioteck.
summary: BROKEN within days. 4 purchases. Zero satisfaction.

reviewText: For a cheap headset, I thought it might be good enough until I find a better one that I want. Sadly. that wasn't the case. After a few days, it simply died during gameplay. I wasn't able to get it to work again after that. My honest advice to anyone would be don't waste the 10 bucks or whatever it costs at the time!
summary: Cheap headset, died after a few days

reviewText:
First of all, its a 'right ear' only device. I use my left ear for most listening (phone, etc.).

Secondly, the mute switch stuck in mute the first time I used it. In other words, I can hear them, they can't hear me.

Unfortunately for me I didn't get around to trying the mute switch until I'd had the headset for over 30 days.
summary: First of all, its a 'right ear' only device ...

reviewText: I've only gotten about 10 minutes of gameplay out of this because of uPlay. uPlay is hands down the worst client I've ever had the displeasure of using. If you like wasting hours of your life troubleshooting instead of playing amazing video games, by all means, waste your money on this purchase. It would be less of a hassle to purchase a console and a physical copy of this game than to deal with uPlay.

I bought this on October 26th as a Christmas gift for my 12 year old daughter who is in love with retro video games.  I installed the console onto her television today, only to find that the NES game slot is not working properly.  It will not respond to the controller.  So I went to return it today on Amazon, but they will not allow me to return it as there is only a 30 day return period even though the gift was not RECEIVED until yesterday.  I am annoyed on so many levels.

Out of the list of compatible games on their website, I only play Riptide 1 & 2.  It works fine with Riptide 1, but lags quite a bit with Riptide 2.  The product box also says their Android app will let you configure the controller, but it does not.  It only serves as a guide to their products and gives descriptions.  I'm returning it tomorrow.

I'm using Android 4.4 on an HTC One M8.

Some of the keys work, but most dont, which annoys the crap out of me. I was like, oh, I'll get the driver, but one didn't come with it, so i went to the website and the driver download wasn't valid anymore. Although others seemed to have gotten ones that actually work, so if I don't find out how to make this work, I'll return and look for a new one. Don't waste your time and money buying this.
summary: Most of the keys don't even work with no driver to repair them

reviewText: At first glance, it seemed like a decent keyboard. Until I plugged it in..  When I hooked it to my computer, it started installing like normal.  Everything went smoothly.  When i went to try it, none of the keys worked.  So, i tried it on my other computer.  Only the B and N key worked.  Color change did NOT work.  I'm returning it.  Will not buy again.  Waste of money

I was hoping to get a fairly decent keyboard for $30, but was very disappointed. First off, the keyboard does NOT change colors. It is blue and has a few light settings and isn't as bright as I was hoping. The picture looks nothing like the lighting it emits, only through the letters. The keys rattle a bit when pressing them and just feels cheap. The design is nice, but that's about it. I do not recommend.

STAY AWAY FROM THESE BATTERIES. THEY ARE ONLY GOOD FOR ABOUT 5 HOURS. MAYBE LESS. MY RECHARGABLE DOUBLE AA'S GO ALMOST ALL DAY LONG WITHOUT BEING REPLACED. MICROSOFT'S RECHARGABLES DON'T NEED TO BE SWAPPED NEARLY AS MUCH AS EITHER. FOR THE PRICE OF THESE, RECHARAGABLE AA'S ARE MUCH BETTER AND LONGER LASTING. VERY DISSAPOINTED IN THESE BATTERIES.
summary: DONT BUY THESE BATTERIES, THEY DON'T HOLD LONG CHARGES.

reviewText: I bought this charger thinking it would be a good one since the batteries are made by a reputable company. The batteries wouldn't charge and the charger would continually blink red. I contacted the company and put in a claim. They replaced both the charger and the batteries but the second set had the exact same issue. They wouldn't charge either! It took several months and emails to get the company to respond to the claim so I decided to buy from another company rather than try again.

This is a great idea for a device. I went through one whole cycle on my device before it wouldn't charge, again. The USB connection is faulty (perhaps due to bad solder or looseness), and will only charge if you hold tight and at just the right angle.

Now, if I want to use this, I have to extricate my vita, charge the vita separately, and put it back in the device. Not only is that annoying, but it means you don't get the added benefit of the extra charge.

I had played the two previous Walking Dead releases and I was really looking forward to this one. I was able to download it but I kept getting an error message when I tried to launch the game. I spent two hours on the phone with an Amazon represent who tried very hard to resolve the issue, but we never did. I credit Amazon for their support personnel but I am unhappy that I can't play the game.

I bought this from Amazon and they emailed me the code.  I logged into PSN and entered the code.  It said it downloaded.  I started the game and did see Season Pass in the menu, but every time I click on it all it does is tell me to "re-download".  Don't buy this. Save your money.

this game is so boring i only played it for 1 hour, i couldn't stand it any more. my be its just me but i started out playing killzone and that has to be the best shooting game ever. there was never a moment that went by were you wouldn't be trying to find something or not shooting something. this game is the worst game i have ever played, i don't know how it got such good reviews. don't buy it, its a waste of money!

This was one of the worst games I ever played. Its not even worth a rental. Boring, monotonous and predictable. It was designed to dupe anyone who really loves the show into buying it. The only reason I finished the game is because I stupidly paid for it sight unseen. Don't waste your time and money on this trash!
summary: Don't judge a game by its title

reviewText: This game was very disappointing, it was fun while you played it made my adrenaline pump. It took forever to kill the zombies though, graphics weren't good and it was very easy for you to die, then on top of that it took a good 3 minutes for it to load the game to start over. Could have beat the game in about a day or two but it took a good week, week and a half because it was sooooo slow.

The simple reason this game is bad is because it tried to cash in on the success of not only the show, but of the Walking Dead game made by Telltale Games, which is far superior to this disaster. This is truly the only thing related to The Walking Dead franchise that is bad, and you need to stay away from it.
summary: A cheap and horribly made game

reviewText: I had high hopes for this game because I love the walking dead so much. This game is horrible compared to Telltale games the walking dead. The graphics are awful and the game play is repetitive. The best part of this game is when the credits roll at the end.

NBA 2k has become ridiculous. They are essentially releasing the same game as the previous year with very few modifications. They shut down the online servers from past years so people are more likely to go out and buy the new edition. If you buy the game just be aware that you'll have less than a year to play online before they shut down the servers and you'll have to go and buy NBA 2k14. Think of it as an annual NBA 2k subscription. $40-60 per year just to continue playing the same game.
summary: NBA 2k12 with a new paint job

reviewText: While I love the concept of the product, I hate the fact that it is made in China. I was shocked to find out that I might not have gotten it until January 18th but received it well before Christmas. I had no idea until after I ordered it that it was coming directly from China. The packaging was completely in Chinese.

This game is a total waste of time and money. I bought this game on PSN for $20 and destroyed my controller cause I was so pissed. This entire game is one mission. Yes that's right. ONE. MISSION. Granted it comes with five side missions but it's still not worth the $20. If you're wondering why this game is so cheap that's exactly why. All this game us us a demo

I can't say much about the game, because it crashes without even letting me open it. Every other Assassin's creed game I have plays with no issues, as does Skyrim, but something about this download is glitching out. I don't know if I am the only one, but I sincerely hope this problem gets corrected.
summary: I can't say much about the game, because it ...

reviewText: Warning, if you have a 16:10 monitor, i.e. for example, one that runs a resolution of 2560x1600 or 1920x1200, do NOT buy this game. The game only supports 16:9 monitors. Instead, if you try to run it on a 16:10 monitor, you will end up with huge black bars on the top and bottom of your screen which is completely unacceptable. It is basically a clear indication of a bad console port. It would have taken the developers 10 minutes to add this aspect ratio, but they were too lazy to bother.
summary: WARNING: does not support 16:10 aspect ratio monitors

reviewText: My computer is equipped with an AMD Radeon HD 5670 graphics card (a medium high end card) but I've only been able to get the frame rate as high as 10-15FPS when I lower all of the graphics options. At the game's default settings I only get 4-5 FPS. This frame rate is way too low to play the game. Ubisoft has not acknowledge the problem nor does it appear that they will release a patch. It's a waste of time to play any game with 4 FPS.
summary: Frame Rate Extremely Slow for PC.

reviewText:
I was hesitant to purchase this because I wasn't sure if it would fit correctly. It does, it really helps with the slippery feeling you get from the plastic when your hands get sweaty. I liked it so much I just ordered my buddy one.

I edited my review because of the misleading x2

This has exactly the same game play as the Batman series, yet in this game it's very boring and uneventful. I guess if you're a huge fan of LOTR you might like it, but it didn't hold my attention at all and I ended up reselling it.
summary: yet in this game it's very boring and uneventful

reviewText: Extremely repetitive game with absolutely no story, you can't change the difficulty, so if you aren't into RPG games, and don't want to spend 20 hours learning the game so that you can actually win a fight, it's probably not for you.
summary: Shadow of Mordor - WAY too difficult

reviewText: This is a warning for people who bought the game and couldn't figure out how to play it.  There is no way that you can resell it if you have loaded the game.  You are forced to use "Steam" and once you have activated a Steam account, the game can only be played by you.  Not sure why Steam does this -- other than to force the game owner to buy the game all over again.  Now I have a game I cannot play and a buyer who can't play it either.  Not fair!
summary: This is a warning for people who bought the game ...

reviewText: The game is FANTASTIC- but not on this platform. It was clearly made for PC and/or PS4 and is almost unplayable on PS3. There is also A LOT of detail that is just NOT THERE in the PS3 version because the engine isn't capable of rendering it.
summary: The game is FANTASTIC- but not on this platform. ...

reviewText: This game is so incredibly difficult! I thought it would be a fun game for my husband and I to play but it's so impossible to kill those damn orcs when they start to gang up on you! And it's so annoying that they keep increasing in rank and difficulty every time you lose to them!
summary: I thought it would be a fun game for my husband and I to play but ...

reviewText: Does Not work if you are not connected to the internet. I repeat! Does not work if you are not connected to the internet! No! you cannot play if your XBox fails to connect to the internet. Why do you need to be connected to the internet to play by yourself? Who needs to know my progress in Mordor?
summary: XBOX Will not let you play if you are not connected to the internet! Stormy weather? Nope!

reviewText: I do not recommend this product. I mean it fits well and feels good, but it is so thick around the thumbsticks that you cannot move them all the way unless you really force them. Really the only good use for them is to protect your controller from dust when you're not using it.

My son saw this and asked for it for Christmas. Was looking forward to his reaction on Christmas Day and he was excited. He hooked it up and was ready to go when it would not connect to wifi or anything. It was fully charged so we didn't understand what the issue was. After 3 days of having a very frustrated 10 year old, I realized I had wasted my money. My son is very tech savvy and he nor my brother could get it to work. Do not waste your money.
summary: DO NOT BUY THIS. IT DOES NOT WORK WITH SAMSUNG OR IPHONE.

reviewText: This does NOT work with the latest version of iOS as they claim (currently using 11.2.6). I can get it to work briefly if I turn on airplane mode and restart. However, after a few seconds it will say that the accessory is not supported. It does this on both my iPhone and my iPad. I wish Apple would be more open with the devices it allows to work with iOS. Until then, this is completely useless.

Don't bother with this one. There are better controllers out there for the same or less. This thing is cheaply built, the software is junk, and it has problems on Mac and iOS.

Unless you use android this thing will give you trouble. Even if you do use Android, find something else.

I bought these just because I've seen them around and they looked interesting. Total waste of money, if I start playing with them I find myself taking them off mid game, it's not like there was anything wrong with the joysticks to begin with, these just make movement more difficult. Not to mention they are more slippery than the normal joysticks. Don't buy them.

Not as grippy as the bare thumb sticks. I felt my thumbs sliding off the stick, and the bumps on the sticks were not giving any traction. They are also a pain to put on the thumb sticks. I fidgeted with it for 10 minutes before I could get them on. They eventually just came off on their own. For 6 bucks I expect a lot more.
summary: Not as grippy as the bare thumb sticks. I ...

reviewText: I purchaced a 2 pack a couple days ago and when i got them, i was anxious to use them, so i plugged one in, let it charge, and then got on a game. The look of the controllers is nice, but the quality is terrible. The buttons are very difficult to press. the joysticks have to be moved all the way to be activated and when they are activated, its at full movement unlike what is needed especially for an FPS game. Overall, these controllers are a waste of money and i would not recommend investing in them.

Been trying for weeks to get this thing to work but it doesn't. The light flashes a few times then turns off. I even bought new batteries for it. This thing was a waste of my money that $45 I'm probably never getting back. I don't even know what to do with the useless thing. Never buy these things used, even on Amazon.
summary: DON'T DO IT, TURN AROUND AND BUY ELSEWHERE!!!

reviewText: Once I plugged in the dongle and HDMI cable, it turned off my Wii.  I double checked that it was the dongle that was the issue by plugging the standard video connector in, and my Wii worked.  There is something wrong with this product.

This is garbage. We spent a week with this thing before sending it back. At first, we spent an hour or so trying to get it to connect and reading reviews about how to connect it. We knew there was a chance it wouldn't work based on other reviews. In the days following, it would randomly connect for short periods of time and then not work again. I love cheap things. I am all about trying things out myself and giving something the benefit of the doubt. However, don't waste your time here.

This power supply worked for about 15 minutes, before it shut off and then gave me a fault indicator (blinking red light).  The power brick was hot to the touch and smelled of burning plastic.  Needless to say, it doesn't work now.

When it did work, the fan was extremely loud.  I don't recommend this product to anyone.  I hope Microsoft releases official AC power bricks soon.
summary: Too loud for the short time it functioned

reviewText:
The feel of the controller is great, but after using it for 2 weeks the X button has fully depressed. It's not like I'm doing anything out of the ordinary.  This is disappointing.. I really liked this controller.

I will probably have to take it apart to push the button out.
summary: X button has fully depressed after a couple of weeks.

reviewText: This mouse does NOT work with Windows 7 64-bit. I have installed the latest and correct drivers and software on two machines (both Win7 64-bit), and I am unable to get the programmable buttons to work at all. The left/right mouse buttons work, as well as the DPI switch, but the programmable buttons do not. I have previously owned the RAT 7, so I do know how to install and set up the mouse. I will be returning this product if I am still unable to get it to work by Monday

The mouse came with a faulty sensor right out of the box.  Sometimes it doesn't move, sometimes it moves on its own.  You have to press it down against the surface for it to register movement.

I advise you to look elsewhere for a gaming mouse.
summary: The mouse came with a faulty sensor right out of ...

reviewText: I bought this 5 months ago and it now does not work. Each time I plug it into my USB port a little light shines but does not connect to my laptop and then the light goes out. While it did work it was great, I love the number pad at my thumb and all the extra buttons on it and I am really really sad that it does not work anymore.
summary: Worked for five months and then will not connect to computer.

reviewText: Terrible after chapter 4. You might as well stop playing it after that because you're basically replaying the same chapter over and over and over and over and over and over and over. I want to throw my 3ds at the wall at this point. It's otherwise a great rpg but this ruined the entire game. I can't recommend anyone play this.

I have never been so disappointed in a product as I am with this.  I ordered this for my son to surprise him.  He was ecstatic when he opened the package.  Imagine our surprise when the skin would not lay down on the controller properly.  The skin is too thick for the adhesion to work properly.  Save your money...

I am extremely disappointed. I played it for several days through my Steam account then all of a sudden it started to refuse to load. I have spent the better part of the last 24 hours trying to fix it to no avail. I will be requesting a refund.
summary: This game worked until it didn't. it has defied all attempts to fix it.

reviewText:
I have windows 7 and it will not play.  I have a Steam account and it will not play.  It is advertised that it is for Windows 7.  I am very disappointed!
I checked out what to do with problems but it is not clear why it is not working.  I have have checked Forum and it seems I am not the only one so what is the problem?

The product will not download.  The instructions that Amazon provided are not accurate and customer service was unable to provide any assistance.  Amazon will also refuse to provide a refund for this product.

DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!  You will be throwing your money away if you do so.

Don't waste your money on this download code or any other versions sold by Amazon.  None of them work on Windows 10 and probably any other platform in the past 3-5 years.  The description online says it will work on Windows XP, Vista, Windows and Windows 2000 and I have never found any other program that works on these operating systems that wouldn't work on newer Windows versions.

Since it is a download code, there is no return possible, so I wasted $21.81.
summary: DON'T BUY THIS GAME CODE unless you want to waste your money!

reviewText: NOTE: If you use Windows 7 or higher, this game will not work! It was made before Win 7 came out, and there is an issue with the compatibility. Every time I start a new game, it crashes. I've searched everywhere for help, but nothing seems to help. Which is very unfortunate, because the game itself is AMAZING. I used to own it for PS3.....guess I'll just have to buy that version again.
summary: Does not work on WIN 7 or later!!!!

reviewText:
Buyer beware! This Steam game is labeled [sic] "Fallout 3 is not optimized for Windows 7 and later."

In this case this actually means "may or may not launch at all" on Win 8.

Steam has no return policy, so if you want to take a gamble and plop down some hard cash for a game that may or may not run, you have been warned. A real shame too, since I love Fallout 3 and was very much looking forward to playing it on PC.
summary: since I love Fallout 3 and was very much looking forward to ...

reviewText: I hated all the steps it took to get this game working, its a great game for sure but there needs to be more info about why it won't work on Windows 8/10 and if you do get it working its a real mess and most people will not want to go through the steps that i did.

I ordered two of these cables in December as Christmas gifts for my teens. Neither of the cables work anymore, one quit working within a few weeks and the other lasted a few months.  I know it's not a huge amount of money, but now I have to order two more cords for my kids.  I feel like they should last longer than a few months.
summary: I feel like they should last longer than a few months

reviewText: It will work for a while. You'll think it's good, but soon it will stop making contact and you'll have to jiggle the wire to TRY to recharge. Eventually it stops working. I read the reviews and said, well it can't happen to everyone. Well, it happened to me. Don't waste your money!
summary: Waste of money. Will stop working.

reviewText: This is a piece of JUNK! I decided to go against all the negative reviews I saw. I thought "maybe it'll work for me." But nope! Worked fine for a few weeks and then completely broke. WAS NOT WORTH THE BUY. DON'T RISK IT. SAVE YOUR MONEY AND YOUR TIME. Don't think you'll be the exception to all these negative reviews. It WILL randomly stop working. It's complete garbage.

I'm a big gamer, and my wife is not, so I figured this would be fun to try cooperatively. This is, by far, no exaggeration, the absolute worst game I've ever played in my life. It's so crappy on so many levels (no pun intended) I can't even begin to elaborate. I played it for a couple of hours and just couldn't stand it anymore. It's boring. There, that's a good way to put it. Boring and just bad in every way a game can be bad.
summary: I really tried to like it

reviewText: This game is great on the ps4, its pretty much the same game as before just with better graphics, on the ps4 at least. On xbox one it looks the same as last gen. So if you plan to get this game, buy it on ps4.

This game is WAY TOO HARD and not very intuitive, I typically like games of this ilk, but I couldn't get a grasp on where to go and what to do, seemingly ever. I have tried four different times over two years and have basically given up on this game.

I am sure it is probably if you can figure out what to do, but that is a big if and for me it was far too confusing.
summary: I typically like games of this ilk

reviewText: Little did I know when I bought it that I would never be able to play it.  I have seen the credits many times but after they are finished the game just quits/stops. I don't know if it is because I have Windows 7 or what the problem is.

Well I have not gotten the item.
Maybe I will some day, but I placed the order on 10/1/2014
It is now 10/13/2014.
So maybe it will be great!
But I have no clue, as I don't have the item I paid good money for!
summary: I don't have the item I paid good money for!

reviewText: I dowloaded it and I can't get it to open. I have Windows Vista and for some reason it won't open . so I uninstalled it 3 times and reinstalled and still no luck. If anybody knows how to fix this . I could use the help.
summary: I dowloaded it and I can't get it to open ...

reviewText: The graphics and gameplay are pretty good.  However, I had finished the entire game in a couple of hours.  It felt like a demo game.  At a minimum, I expect a game to give me at least $1/hr of entertainment and I didn't even get that.  Don't waste your money.  As a side note, I have yet to play an Xbox One game that has made me happy that I purchased an Xbox One: Ryse: Son of Rome, Rising Dead 3, and now Metal Gear Solid V are all pretty lame.
summary: The graphics and gameplay are pretty good. However

reviewText: Took me a half hour to complete.  I'm just glad I got it free from PSN, as I would have been upset if I had paid any amount of money for it.  This is a demo masquerading as a game - I have no idea what kind of extreme fanboy gets 15-20 hours of play out of it.
summary: I'm just glad I got it free from PSN

reviewText: Worst Metal Gear game ever. I've been a huge MGS fan since the original Metal Gear games on the NES, and this one shouldn't even be considered a game. It's a short Demo that is not worth anything over $5.
summary: Short Demo not worth anything over $5.

reviewText: This game was a waste of money and time. I am not sure what Konami was thinking releasing this short game. It was a complete waste of time and instead of making me want to buy the full version when it is developed, it made me never want to buy another Konami game ever! Only thing that was good was the graphics.

This is barely a game. It was about 10 minutes of actual game play. The rest is just video scenes. The publishers should make it clear that there is not a lot of game play. Not what I expected at all. Would have not bought it if I was aware of this.

I wouldn't say the game play itself is bad, but they should make people very aware of the short game play. People who buy games like this expect hours of game play, not 10 minutes. Feels like a scam.

Worth $5-10 not $30.

This "game" is nothing more than a glorified demo, Konami should be ashamed to try charging money for this. Don't waste your money, you'll finish this one in a couple of hours maximum. If enough people buy this, all it will do is encourage game companies to keep pulling this kind of crap in the future.

My son got this hard drive for his game Destiny the Taken King.  He has an Xbox 360E and this hard drive doesn't work on it. He keeps getting a message saying: "You must need an  Xbox 360 hard drive to play Destiny". We don't know what could be wrong since he can play other games that don't require a hard drive with no problem.  Has anybody had this problem? please let me know.  Thank you.
summary: My son got this hard drive for his game Destiny ...

reviewText: I don't like this version of Solitaire or Free Cell.  I didn't even bother to try any of the others.  I don't like the way the screen looks.  I don't like the way the cards move.  The way they place the cards, it is difficult to tell what is going on.  The game of Free Cell is not played like the original game of Free Cell.  I will be removing this game immediately.

Putting this thing on is more complicated than it needs to be and to me at least it didn't feel right. After playing with it a little bit I peeled it off and trashed it. I also bought the grip for the ps4 and refused to even take it out of the package. I'm aware it's got a lot of glowing recommendations, but I just really, really hated it.

I bought this game at launch at gamestop and have played it maybe 5 times since. It's so boring and repetitive. It also suffers from a lot of balancing issues. I'd by this game if it were like 15 bucks but not anymore. Also, don't even get me started on the dlc. That's a money grabbing joke.

I'm not an avid game player. I just like to relax once in a while and play something cool to get my mind off work. I bought this game based on the previews... but, it ain't nothing like the previews. It's dull and boring and, after just thirty minutes, I moved into something else. Total waste of time. Total waste of money. If I could give this game zero stars, I would.

It's like buying a hamburger with just the plain bun and patty.
You want lettuce, it'll cost you extra $$.
You want cheese, it'll cost you extra $$.
You want tomatoes, it'll cost you extra $$.
You want pickles, it'll cost you extra $$.
You want ketchup and mayo, it'll cost you extra $$.

I'm surprise they don't make you pay for the achievements you earn.
summary: Imagine paying $60 for a free to play game

reviewText: The game should come with a credit card swipe on the side of the box. This game is designed to rob you of every penny. The initial purchase price only gets you 10% of the game. If you want the rest you'll have to pay upwards of $100-$200 more to get everything in the game.

My sister got me one of these for Christmas. I was excited at first because it looked cool and it felt like an original controller but when I plugged it in was very dissapointed. The joystick doesn't work at all. It makes Mario run every way but the way you want to go. Sometimes it will work for a second or 2 but then it's back to random directions. Don't buy this product it is completely useless and a waste of money.
summary: I was excited at first because it looked cool and it felt like an original controller but when ...

reviewText: This worked for 1 month and then the joystick just fell off.  I ordered a green one at the same time as this one, and it didn't work right out of the box.  I have since ordered 3 used official N64 controllers and they all work very well.  They cost a little more, but it is worth it.  Stay away from these generic pieces of junk.

Works great on my laptop. Bought an adaptor for the usb port since I don't have a mic port but the volume is great and the mic works for gaming.

Edit: It worked great for about a month then failed miserably. I'm guessing it's loose wiring or something but the mic will randomly start buzzing. At first I thought it was the usb adapter so I replaced the adapter and the problem persisted. I then tried it on a laptop w/ a mic port and the same issue is there so it's definitely the headset.

When you plug in any VGA cable to your display, your display will at the very least acknowledge that there is a VGA cable plugged in. When I plugged in this cable to 4 of my displays, none of them even acknowledged there was a VGA cable plugged in. I returned the first cable one I bought, but the second cable had the exact same problem.
Sound does work, but it is full of static and not pleasant to listen to.

Conclusion: Find a different way to get video from your Dreamcast.

WHAT A LOAD OF COMPLETE BOLLUCKS!!!!!!!!

NO CONTROLLER SUPPORT. doesn't even have some keys so you have to use the KEY BOARD + A CONTROLLER. NO CONTROLLER SUPPORT. NO CONTROLLER SUPPORT. NO CONTROLLER SUPPORT.

WASTE OF 20 BUCKS!!!!!! SERIOUSLY RAGED.

scammed out of 20 bucks.
summary: COMPLETE CRAP. NO CONTROLLER SUPPORT FOR PS4/PC.

reviewText: I gave this one star because I am unable to fix a bug in the sound. I did a web search and there is a common problem with the sound that has not been addresses by Bethesda yet. The problem ranges from no dialog sound to no sound at all. I have the no sound at all problem. I tried many solutions posted on forums but I am unable to resolve this problem as of this date.
summary: I gave this one star because I am unable to ...

reviewText: It didn't work at all. I was using the Turtle Beach PX3 headset. Whether it's plugged in or not, if you try and use the hardware buttons on the headset like volume control, it will immediately disconnect from the PS4. And the audio quality produced is awful. No one can hear me and I can't hear anyone else very clearly either. I have changed the settings many times but it simply doesn't work.

This headset requires way to much work. One of the parts that you need to make it work isn't even included in the box. You have to go out and buy it seperatly. Out of the box it feels cheap but what do you expect for a 25 dollar headset.

These didn't work for my 9 year old. Bought these for the xbox 360. Couldn't figure out how to get the mic to work, sound coming out of the tv and not the headset. We are probably the problem. We just can't figure out where to plug them in.

Nice controller, I have A game that I can play it with, but that's it. It is not cheap by any means so I would caution anyone to look into what games it is compatible with before you buy it. It is well made and for the one game I have tried it on it works well. But as of the time of this posting and I would think for some time after you will have to wait for some better games to come online that you can use.
summary: So are too expensive for the limited amount of games........

reviewText: So, it seems like a great idea.  It really does give you better control.  The problem, though, is that they don't stay on.  It was constantly falling off.  Maybe I'm hard on my sticks, but it's not even worth using because it falls off of the controller all the time.

Really liked this product at first, however after a few months, the scroll wheel has stopped working. What happened was that the rubber around the wheel has started to slip. This basically makes it useless. To make this even more frustrating, I contacted the company and they told me if I paid to ship it they would resolve the issue. So my options are to just buy a new mouse, or pay 75% of the original cost to repair a mouse that may have a problem in the future. Would look elsewhere for a better option.
summary: Mouse scroll wheel has issues / poor customer support

reviewText:
Mouse constantly stutters. The USB connection seems to not work well. I tried using both USB 2.0 and USB 3.0, but both ports result in almost constant stuttering and jittering of the mouse.

I WOULD NOT recommend this product.

Do not know how there can be so many good reviews.  My mouse seems to lag.  I have to move it back and forth to get it to go and it is always behind where I want it to be.  I hate it.  I already ordered a different mouse, hoping that would be better.  I would not recommend this to anyone.  Gamers would really be disappointed.
summary: Slow - even made adjustments - cannot count on it to go where you point it.

reviewText: I bought this as I needed a new replacement for the mouse I had and liked the look of it but the mouse seems to disconnect randomly and lags a lot. It stops working when its plugged in and I constantly have to re plug it back in when I am playing video games or doing other things.

Mouse worked well for a while. Now it disconnects randomly and has to be unplugged and plugged back in. This works most of the time, but only for so long. Seller offered to send a new mouse if I paid for shipping the old one back. Not doing that.

The mouse was malfunctioning for a while but I didn't realize it was the mouse until it stopped working. This happened within a couple of months after I bought it. I contacted the manufacturer and they were willing to replace it for me but I had to pay and parcel it back to them myself first. It would have cost me about the same to buy a new one of the same so it wasn't worth it.
Maybe mine is a one off , I don't know.
summary: The mouse was malfunctioning for a while but I didn't ...

reviewText: I bought this mouse to play League of Legends with and at first I really liked it. However, 4 months in it started misclicking and now it's messing with my ranked games so I need to buy a different mouse. If you play games like Guild Wars 2 it's fine, but not for LoL.
summary: Not Reliable Enough for League of Legends

reviewText: Immediately after starting to use this mouse I found it jittery and unreliable. Sometimes the pointer would jump around, and sometimes it would actually move in the wrong direction altogether. I also found the mouse somewhat uncomfortable as it was too small to fit well in my hand without my palm dragging on the mouse pad. Finally, it definitely has a very cheap feel to it. If you want a real gaming mouse, you should probably just spend the extra money and get something that will actually work.
summary: You get what you pay for

reviewText:
Had it for less than a month and it stopped working. While it worked it was great, I contacted the company hoping for a replacement, but I doubt it. As said, it was great while it lasted, I'd probably buy it again because of the price, but I was very disappointed.

Edit. Just got a second one to replace the first broken one. I got it last night, just went to use it, and guess what. Less than 4 hours, and the new one doesn't work either
summary: While it worked it was great, I contacted the company hoping for a replacement

reviewText: Mouse felt great in my hand and the weights were cool. The only issue I had was that there was no audible click when pressing the right click and there was no feel of a click when right clicking. The slightest touch on the right click activates the right click and there was no possible way to comfortably rest your finger on the right click. In other words, broken straight out of the box.
summary: Broken straight out of the box.

reviewText: This mouse looks cool, feels nice, and functions awfully. I am really sad about the performance of this mouse in FPS games. I happen to love starcraft 2. I took a look at the mouse, and bought it. Unfortunately, it really does not work well at all. If you play FPS games, then I would not recommend this mouse.
summary: This mouse looks cool, feels nice

reviewText:
I've had this headset for a few years. After about 3 years, the material that covers the cushion around the earpiece has started to flake off. This makes a huge mess and whenever I wear it, there is black stuff all over my face and in my ears.

I kept the headset on a stand, in my room in very mild temperatures.
summary: I've had this headset for a few years. After ...

reviewText: All audio is very distorted and cracks very often.  The sound quality is some of the worst I've ever heard.  When in a party with other people, they are able to hear me just fine, but I am unable to hear anyone else no matter what setting I tweak.  I don't understand how they can sell these for $80.
summary: The sound quality is some of the worst I've ever heard

reviewText: After reading reviews for this product I had high hopes that it would work as a good replacement for my son's dead power pack. Unfortunately it only worked for a week or so. It is on its way back to Amazon for a refund!

It only lasted a couple of months and then it broke.  The original power supply broke after I moved it to an enclosed area with little ventilation.  When I bought this replacement I made sure not to make that mistake.  It had plenty of ventilation but still only lasted a couple of months.
summary: Worked for a couple of months then broke

reviewText:
After an hour or so of trying to get this to work, I am giving up for now and giving a one star rating.

Steam fails to install. As a result, the game cannot be installed, so it is completely useless.

If Steam Product Support ever gets back to me, and if they are able to resolve the issue, I will consider updating this review.
summary: Steam installation failed. Cannot use game.

reviewText:
I should've known better. I should stick to nintendo's own games. They know best how to code and polish.

Disney did not optimize this game at all. It's extremely choppy on my 3DS and the sluggish frame rate is making my eyes hurt. I got mine on the eshop. I wish I could return it. :(

If choppy frame rates don't bug you, then you will probably love this game. The frame rate issue is the only reason why I cannot play it, otherwise, I'm sure it's a great game.
summary: I should've known better. I should stick to nintendo's own games

reviewText:
Do not buy this game. This game REQUIRES installation of a 3rd party client that is known to be buggy and this game will not work at all without the 3rd party installation. Additionally the game requires internet access. Want to play on a plane? At the Doctors in the waiting room? While waiting for your vehicle to be done at the shop? Too bad, it is not possible due to the 3rd party client.

Send Firaxis and 2K games a message that you don't support this and vote with your dollars.

This game does not come with any instructions. It is very hard to learn, and very very boring. I am a patient person with an open mind, but I would never purchase this product again nor would I recommend it to anyone at any price. It's not even worth $5. I truly feel bad for those who purchased this product for children & teens as this is not even suitable for adults. Did I mention NO INSTRUCTIONS and HARD TO LEARN? ...And I have owned every Gameboy, DS, etc and many games.
summary: Worst Nintendo Game I have ever ATTEMPTED to play. NO INSTRUCTIONS!

reviewText: I like this keyboard's features. However, I've been using it for a little over a year, and suddenly the keys have started failing. This keyboard is warrantied for 5 years, but there seems to be no formal process for submitting a claim with the manufacturer.

Bought this in April 2015 and it's already failing. The "c" "a" and "5" keys don't work correctly. I have to keep hitting the keys over and over to get the to work. It started with the "c" key last month, and now it's also the "a" and "5" keys. I expect more keys to start failing. I removed the key caps and there's no crud or anything in there that would prevent the keys from working correctly. So it's the electronics that's failing. This was disappointing.
summary: Keyboard failing after a year and a half

reviewText: When I got the keyboard, I immediately noticed a problem when I started typing, hit the 'e' key, and noticed that there was an extra space inserted after the 'e'. Hit the backspace key....and nothing happened. Hit the left arrow key, so I could go back....and still nothing. I then realized that about 1/4 of the keys did nothing at all.  Very poorly made keyboard. I sent it back for a full refund. Thanks Amazon!

Maybe I don't know how to set this bar up on my PC, or my Wii controllers don't work well, but I have more than a week trying to get this to work without any result. Also, after a few minutes of being connected i got the message that the device is not recognized, and sounds like when you unplug it. Maybe I'm doing something wrong, so please, if anyone could guide me step by step and how to use it on Windows 8.1 I'll be very greatful.
summary: Can't get it to work on Windows 8.1

reviewText:
Giving this a one star because of the item name. This is not wireless. It is USB wired.

I have a large room and while the cable is long, it isn't long enough for my needs. The item name states that it is wireless, I took that to mean that it had a bluetooth dongle and a wireless sensor bar but this is not the case. The wireless in the item name refers to the wireless connection between the Wii remote and the bluetooth in the DolphinBar, which is redundant considering that Wii remotes are wireless only.

I hate this game!  It doesn't work at all with the XBOX 360 controller like the manual says it should and the keyboard controls aren't that good either!  And the support website is no help at all.  DO NOT PURCHASE THIS GAME!
summary: Doesn't work very well if at all.

reviewText: This game is not compatible with the Windows 10 Operating System or nVidia graphics hardware. If you use either of these, ensure that your installation is working prior to purchase, as the developer has not addressed any of these graphics issues in over 2 years.

This might be one of the worst pieces of garbage I ever bought.  I read reviews before I bought it and those people are either on drugs or work for Sega.  You spend all of your time running away from EVERYTHING in this game with no opportunity to fight back.  The game is so directed why didn't they just make a movie.  The save system sucks.

I feel totally ripped off.  I have no desire to play this anymore and I've only played it a couple of hours.
summary: This might be one of the worst pieces of garbage I ever bought

reviewText: This game was pretty bad, when i first played it i thought it was okay but after awhile it just got boring. The characters are funny but too shallow too be interesting. The plot is awful which won't be so bad but the characters are also awful. The combat is shallow and the design of the game is too uninteresting.
summary: I got rid of this game

reviewText: I bought this game and spent many hours downloading and installing it. Finally I get it installed and I go to login. It gives me a message that my computer has an unknown IP address so I have to enter the access code sent in an email that was sent to me. So I check my email and there it is. I open the email and it is totally blank, no code no information , nothing. So I contact customer support and wait and wait and wait. No reply ever from customer support.

This could be a great game but the $15 dollar a month subscription is ridiculous. You have no access to anything, unless you pay the subscription. Also, the "FREE" month that is advertised is not available until after you sign up to continue paying. Don't waste your time unless you really want to get taken on a ride.
summary: Don't waste your time unless you got the money

reviewText: Downloaded to play with friends that already had it. If I declare war on someone and take a city, I am a warmonger. If someone declares war on me and I take a city, I am a warmonger. There is no chance to build underwater cities or build into space which was available in older versions of the game. I don't understand how you come out with new additions of the game, yet instead of adding NEW stuff, you seemed to have taken out a lot of content.
summary: Downloaded to play with friends that already had it. ...

reviewText: For some reason I thought this was the easiest game ever.  Finished it in 2 days and none of it was challenging at all.  I don't know if I got a demo or what, but it wasn't the demo.  It was like beating the first 2 castles in Super Mario World.
summary: It was like beating the first 2 castles in Super Mario World

reviewText:
Follow up: Contacted Amazon and they promptly refunded us the cost.

Ordered this cute water bottle for our 1st grader.  He loves it and took it to school the first day of class.  When my wife went to wash it, she found a sticker on the bottom that says: "Warning: This produce contains chemicals known to cause cancer, or birth defects, or other reproductive harm."  What???  I can't believe Amazon even sells it.  If we hadn't already used it once, I'd send it back for a refund.
summary: Ordered this cute water bottle for our 1st grader. ...

reviewText: I bought this for my grandson for his birthday.  My daughter had to throw it away because it has been banded in other states and we worried about it's safety.  We saw the warning on the bottom of the container.  I had to give it 1 star so I could write this review. I was not happy that the warning was not in the description.
summary: I was not happy that the warning was not in the description

reviewText: I purchased this water bottle for my 3 year old. I live in The Bahamas and on the bottom it says "WARNING: This product contains chemicals that are known to the State of California to cause cancer, birth defects, or other reproductive harm." So now I'm terrified for my daughter to use this bottle.

The worst game I ever purchased. This seller uses 3rd party installation software, that doesn't work, and you can't use your mouse to control the game, only your keyboard, that doesn't function well with this game. You find this out after you purchased the game. It was sooo horrible, that I got a refund for this game immediately. reviewText: Not sure if I got a bad copy or if I did something wrong, but whenever I start a game, the only button on the controller that does anything is the left thumb stick. The other buttons do absolutely nothing, so all I can do is walk around on the court.

I love the game, the problem is I can't play for more than 10 minutes without it freezing. It is also very glitchy, most of the time my character does not have a gun in his hands but still looks like he is holding one. This game is so frustrating to try and play its almost not worth it. I was going to buy the season pass but chose not to because of all the issues. If these are Activisions issues they should be embarrassed.

Great concept but won't work for us. If you use headphones while gaming then you have to have the headset or sound adapter plugged into the controller. With that plugged in, you cannot attach this cell phone holder. So it's useless for us. Would love to see it re-designed so that it can be used while wearing headphones.

By far the worst hockey game EA has ever produced. The gameplay is absolutely horrible and very frustrating to play, and it is missing almost all of the other features that NHL fans are accustomed to. Even after a few updates, the game is no better than day one. Unless you just can't live without jerseys that flap in the wind in a video game, I'd stay away form this game and hope that EA gets their act together next year.

I was excited to get this great looking charger. Unfortunately after only a few months it doesn't work anymore. I'm really disappointed. I bought my wife a cheaper model of this brand and thought I'd pay more and get a better one. I guess I should have bought the cheaper one because hers still works fine. Looks like I'm stuck with a useless little brick now.

I purchased this product to use on a camping trip and it held a charge once but then died and was unusable thereafter. I did return this product to Amazon hassle-free but chose not to purchase a new one based on my first experience. I would not recommend this product and feel that there are plenty of other options for portable chargers out there.

I charged this battery several times and was never able to get it to charge my iphone 5s or my ipad mini. Every time it showed the battery was fully charged. I had to return it. I assume it was just defective.

It worked for 1 day and then the next day it started shorting in and out rapidly when I tried to charge it. I had to put the old battery (that doesn't hold a charge) back in. I'm going to exchange this one for another and will update my review if the next one works.
summary: It worked for 1 day and then the next day ...

reviewText:
This was never delivered to me, so how can I rate it?

I was super excited for it, because I haven't played a Pokemon game since diamond.
The price was pretty good, so I was stoked when I found this so I could get back into it before the new game comes out.

IF this is ever delivered to me, I'll be sure to change my review.  I'm hoping it's just late.
summary: I was super excited for it

reviewText: this is a disgraceful, disgusting game made by bad people. the fact that they delight in the most shameful profanities and the ugliest sort of violence, really shows you what kind of people they are. also, it is one of the most, if not the most unfair game I have ever played. after finally get sick of the frustration, and tired of all the ugliness, I just had enough.
summary: disgusting game made by bad people

reviewText: There is no way to skip these annoying cut-scenes, and some of them are really long! I don't understand why it is so hard for these game developers to implement a simple skip button. Playing this game can be such a waste of time. Do NOT buy it!

What a total piece of crap.
1) Graphics are worse than a free iPhone app.
2) It doesn't matter what character class or weapon you choose, because your sorcerer will just shoot magic out of his two-handed battle axe.
3) I know. It doesn't make any sense. Leveling up serves no purpose and has no fulfillment. This 2015 game is worse than 90s Gauntlet Legends in every way.
4) Diablo II is better than this game.
5) Diablo is better than this game.
summary: What a total piece of crap. 1) Graphics are worse than a free iPhone ...

reviewText: Microsoft is not standing by this product. I received a brand new Xbox One bundle, the controller was defective, I confirmed with Microsoft Technical Support that it was defective, and MS wants me to pay for return shipping of the controller.  This is totally unacceptable.
summary: Microsoft Does Not Support This Product

reviewText: As other reviewers have said since I bought this, the analog stick is not analog.  Took me a while to figure it out, since I do not do a whole lot of retro gaming, and the games I was playing didn't care much.  Also, the D-pad seems to map to the same controls as the joystick.

Quick and simple - this is the worst game I've ever played. The controls are clumsy, the movement of the character is glitchy feeling, and there is little to no guide as to what does what. Save your money or donate it to charity.

This has to be one of the worst games I have paid for in a long time.  It has 3 minutes worth of action and then 12 minutes of story and walking around doing nothing.  Even when you are playing the very few action parts of the game, the game play is not that good.
summary: Terrible game, too much story mode

reviewText: Has no ergonomics whatsoever, it doesn't feel comfortable at all like other reviewers have said. The mouse itself performs okay and feels decent, but the mouse is so uncomfortable for me to use. The mouse forces me into a claw grip and my pinky is forced into resting at an awkward angle that puts pressure on it. For the price, it's hard to complain, but I would suggest looking at more ergonomically shaped mice.
summary: it doesn't feel comfortable at all like other reviewers have said

reviewText: I don't know how good the game is.  I downloaded it and installed it.  I registered it with Ubisoft.  There is no way to start the game.  Not in the "Start" menu.  The Ubisoft game launcher only gives the option to get the access code I paid for or to use it.  No way to start the game once I've paid for and used the access code.  I imagine it might be a great game.  but this way of buying it?  Don't do it!
summary: I don't know how good the game is
